# rang gi gzugs rnams la bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mig gis lta ba na gsum ni rang gi sa pa yin la / / mig ni de'i sa pa yin no /
kāmāvacarāṇi paśyataḥ kāyavijñāne svabhūmike rūpāṇyadharāṇi cakṣustadbhūmikam
# 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams la lta ba na lus dang rnam par shes pa dag na rang gi sa pa yin la / / gzugs rnams ni 'og ma pa yin no / / mig ni de'i sa pa yin no /
dvitīyadhyānabhūmīni paśyataścakṣūrūpe tadbhūmike śeṣaṃ svabhūmikam
# bsam gtan gnyis pa rnams la lta ba na mig dang gzugs ni de'i sa pa yin la / / lhag ma ni rang gi sa pa yin te /
evaṃ tṛtīyadhyānacakṣuṣā yojyam / dvitīyādidhyānopapannasya svaparacakṣurbhyāṃ svaparabhūmikāni rūpāṇi paśyato yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam / ayaṃ tu niyamaḥ
# bsam gtan gsum pa la sogs pa'i mig gis lta ba'i yang de bzhin du sbyar ro / / bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rang dang gzhan gyi mig dag gis rang dang gzhan gyi sa pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o / / 'di ni nges pa yin te /
na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ / pañcabhūmikāni hi kāyacakṣūrūpāṇi kāmāvacarāṇi yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikāni / dvibhūmikaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca / tatra yadbhūmikaḥ kāyastadbhūmikaṃ cakṣurūrdhvabhūmikaṃ vā cakṣurbhavati na tvadharabhūmikam
# lus la 'og ma'i mig ma yin / / lus dang mig dang gzugs rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar sa lnga pa yin no / / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dang sa gnyis pa yin no / / de las gang ba'i lus yin pa sa de ba'am / / sa gong ma pa'i mig yin gyi sa 'og ma pa ni ma yin no /
yadbhūmikaṃ cakṣustadbhūmikamadharabhūmikaṃ vā rūpaṃ viṣayo bhavati
# 'di'i mig gi yul ni de'i sa pa 'am / / sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs yin gyi /
ūdhrvaṃ rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ / na hi kadācidūrdhrvabhūmikaṃ rūpamadhobhūmikena cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ śakyate / vijñānaṃ ca
# mig gi gong ma'i gzugs ma yin / / sa gong ma pa'i gzugs sa 'og ma pa'i mig gis mthong bar ni nam yang mi nus so / / rnam par shes pa'ang /
ūrdhva na cakṣuṣo rūpavat
# gong ma ni mig gi ma yin te / / gzugs bzhin no /
asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ / asyetyanantaroktasya cakṣurvijñānasya rūpaṃ sarvato viṣayaḥ ūrdhvamadhaḥ svabhūmau ca / kāyasya cobhe rūpavijñāne sarvato bhavataḥ / yathā cecaṃ cakṣuruttaṃ vistareṇa veditavyam
# de yi gzugs / / lus kyi 'ang gnyi ga thams cad du / / de'i zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul ni gong ma dang 'og ma dang rang gis ba'i gzugs thams cad du yin la / / lus kyi 'ang gzugs dang rnam par shes pa dag thams cad du yin no / / ji ltar mig 'di rgyas par bshad pa ltar /
tathā śrotraṃ / na kāyasyādharaṃ śrotramūrdhvaṃ śabdo na ca śruteḥ
# rna ba'ang de bzhin du rig par bya ste / / lus la 'og ma'i rna ba yin; / / rna ba'i gong ma'i sgra ma yin /
vijñānaṃ cāsya śabdastu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ / vistareṇa yojyam
# rnam par shes pa'ang de'i sgra / / lus kyi'ang gnyi ga thams cad du zhes rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o /
trayāṇāṃ tu sarvameva svabhūmikam / ghrāṇajihvākāyadhātūnāṃ kāyaviṣayavijñānāni svabhūmikānyeva
# gsum dag ni / / thams cad rang gi sa pa nyid / / sna dang lce dang lus kyi khams rnams kyi lus dang rang gi yul dang rnam par shes pa rnams rang gi sa pa kho na yin no /
ityutsargaviśeṣeṇa kṛtvā punarviśeṣaṇārthamapavāda ārabhyate
# de ltar bye brag tu ma phye bar spyir bstan nas / / yang bye brag tu dbye ba'i phyir dmigs kyis bsal ba rtsom ste /
kāyavijñānamadharasvabhūmi / kāyaḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ ca svabhūmikānyeva nityaṃ bhavanti
# lus kyi rnam shes 'og dang ni / / rang gi sa / / lus dang lus kyi khams dang reg bya ni rtag tu rang gis pa dag kho na yin no /
kāyavijñānaṃ tu keṣāñcit svabhūmikaṃ yathākāmadhātuprathamadhyānopapannāṃ / keṣāñcidadharabhūmikaṃ yathā dvitīyādidhyānopapannānāmiti / aniyataṃ manaḥ / kadācit kāyamanovijñānadharmaiḥ samānabhūmikaṃ mano bhavati kadācidūrdhvādhobhūmikam / pañcabhūmike 'pi hi kāye sarvabhūmikāni mana ādīni bhavanti samāpattyupapattikāle yathāyogamiti vistareṇa samāpattinirdeśe kośasthāna etadākhyāyiṣyate / atihahugranthabhāraparihārārthaṃ tu nedānīṃ punarākhyāyate
# lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni kha cig gi ni rang gi sa pa yin te / / 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang por skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o / / kha cig gi ni sa 'og ma yin pas te / / 'di lta ste / / bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa rnams kyi lta bu'o / / yid ma nges te / / res 'ga' ni lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang chos dag dang mtshungs pa'i sa pa'i yid yin la; res 'ga' ni sa gong ma dang 'og ma pa yin te / / de nyid kyi phyir sa lnga pa'i lus la yang snyoms par 'jug pa dang skye ba'i tshe yid la sogs pa ci rigs par sa thams cad pa dag yin te / / 'di rgyas par ni snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas nas 'chad par 'gyur ro / / tshig gi khur ha cang mangs pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir da ni mi bshad de /
alpaṃ ca prayojanaṃ mahāṃśca śrama iti samāpta ānuṣaṅgikaḥ prasaṅgaḥ / idamidānīṃ vicāryate
# dgos pa chung la ngal ba che ba'i phyir ro / / zhar la 'ongs pa'i skabs rdzogs so / / da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
aṣṭādaśānāṃ cdātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca vijñānānāṃ kaḥ kena vijñeyaḥ
# khams bcva brgyad dang rnam par shes pa drug po rnams la gang zhig rnam par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin zhe na /
āha / pañca bāhyā dvivijñeyāḥ / rūpaśabagandharasaspraṣṭavyadhātavo yathāsaṃkhyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyavijñānairanubhūtā manovijñānena vijñāyante
# smras pa; gnyis kyis rnam par shes phyir lnga / / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams ni grangs bzhin du mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shas pa dag gis nyams su myong nas yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes te /
evamete pratyekaṃ dvābhyāṃ vijñānābhyāṃ vijñeyā bhavanti / śeṣāstrayodaśa dhātavaḥ pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāmaviṣayatvādekena manovijñānena vijñeyā ityākhyātaṃ bhavati / eṣāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ madhye kati nityāḥ katyanityāḥ / na kaśct sakalo 'sti nityo dhāturapi tu
# de ltar na de dag ni re re zhing rnam par shes pa gnyis kyis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no / / khams lhag ma bcu gsum ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa gcig pus rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes rnam par bshad par 'gyur ro / / rtag pa rnams ni du / / mi rtag pa rnams ni du zhe na; khams gcig ril por rtag pa ni med mod kyi /
nityā dharmā asaṃskṛtāḥ
# 'on kyang / / 'dus ma byas chos rtag pa'o /
tena dhārmadhātvekadeśo nityaḥ śeṣā anityāḥ
# des na chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag la / / lhag ma rnams ni mi rtag pa yin no /
katīndriyaṃ kati nendriyam / dharmārdhamindriyaṃ ye ca dvādaśādhyātmikāḥ smṛtāḥ
# dbang po rnams ni du / / dbang po ma yin pa rnams ni du zhe na / / chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni / / bcu gnyis nang gi rab shad dbang po /
dvāviṃśatirindriyāṇyuktāni sūtre / cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyaṃ manaindriyaṃ strīndriyaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ sukhendriyaṃ duḥkhendriyaṃ saumanasyendriyaṃ daurmanasyendraiyaṃ upekṣendriyaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smādhīndriyaṃ prajñendariyaṃ anājñātamājñāsyāmīndariyam ājñendriyaṃ ājñātāvīndriyamiti / ābhidhārmikāstu ṣaḍāyatanavyavasthānamādṛtya jīvitendriyānantaraṃ manaindriyaṃ paṭhanti
# mdo las / / mig gi dbang po dang rna ba'i dbang po dang sna'i dbang po dang lce'i dbang po dang lus kyi dbang po dang yid kyi dbang po dang mo'i dbang po dang pho'i dbang po dang srog gi dbang po dang bde ba'i dbang po dang sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang yid bde ba'i dbang po dang yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang dad pa'i dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang dran pa'i dbang po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang shes rab kyi dbang po dang mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang kun shes pa'i dbang po dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis gsungs pa la chos mngon pa ba rnams ni skye mched drug gi go rims rnam par gzhag pa la ma gus pas yid kyi dbang po srog gi dbang po'i mjug thogs su 'don te /
sālambanatvāt / tatra dharmārdhaṃ jīvitendriyādīnyekādaśendriyāṇi trayāṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmadhātupradeśatvāt / dvādaśānāmādhyātmikānāṃ cakṣurādayaḥ pañca svanāmoktāḥ / sapta cittadhātavo manaindriyaṃ stripuruṣendriye kāyadhātupradeś iti paścād vakṣyati / śeṣāḥ pañca dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca nendriyamiti siddham / abhidharmakośabhāṣye dhātunirdeśo nāma
# dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro / / de la chos kyi phyed ni srog gi dbang po la sogs pa dbang po bcu gcig dang gsum po dag gi cha ste / / chos kyi khams kyi phyogs yin pa'i phyir ro / / nang gi bcu gnyis ni mig la sogs pa rang gi ming gis smos pa lnga dang yid kyi dbang po ni sems kyi khams bdun no / / pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni lus kyi khams kyi phyogs yin no zhes 'og nas 'chad do / / lhag ma khams lnga po de dag dang chos kyi khams kyi phyogs ni dbang po ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'grub bo /
prathamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptam iti / ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat
# chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa las khams bstan pa zhes bya ba ste mdzod kyi gnas dang po'o /
teṣāṃ ca yo nirhodha evaṃvādīu mahāśramaṇaḥ / likhāpitamidaṃ śrīlāmāvākeneti / dvitīyaṃ kośasthānam / oṃ namo buddhāya / uktānīndriyāṇi / kaḥ punarindriyārthaḥ / idi paramaiśvarye / tasya indantīti indriyāṇi / ata ādhipatyārtha indriyārthaḥ / kasya caiṣāṃ kvādhipatyam / caturṣvartheṣu pañcānāmādhipatyaṃ / cakṣuḥśrotrayostāvat pratyekaṃ caturṣvarthevādhipatyam / ātmabhāvaśobhāyāmandhabadhirayorakāntarūpatvāt / ātmabhāvaparikarṣaṇe dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca viṣamaparivarjanāt
# dbang po rnams bshad pa la dbang po'i don ci zhe na / / dbang ni dbang phyug dam pa'o / / de dbang byed pas na dbang po rnams te / / de'i phyir dbang byed pa'i don ni dbang po'i don to / / 'di dag las gang zhig gang la dbang byed ce na / / lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la dbang byed / / re zhig mig dang rna ba dag re re zhing don bzhi la dbang byed pa ni long ba dang 'on pa dag ni mi mdzes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir lus mdzes par bya ba dang mthong ba dang thos nas yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba dang mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa dag skyed pa dang gzugs blta ba dang sgra mnyan pa dag gi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la dbang byed pa'o /
cakṣuḥśrotravijñānayoḥ sasaṃprayogayorutpattau / rūpadarśanaśabdaśāravaṇayoścāsādhāraṇakāraṇatve / ghrāṇajihvākāyānāmātmabhāvaśobhāyāṃ pūrvavat / ātmabhāvaparikarṣaṇe taiḥ kavaḍīkārāhāraparibhogāt / ghrāṇādivijñānānāṃ sasaṃprayogāṇāmutpattau
# sna dang lce dang lus rnams ni snga ma bzhin du mdzes par bya ba la dbang byed pa dang de dag gi kham gyi zas la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba la dbang byed pa dang sna la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa rnams skyed pa dang dri bsnams pa dang ro myang pa dang reg bya reg pa rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la dbang byed pa'o / / bzhi rnams gnyis la lo / / pho dang mo dang srog dang yid kyi dbang po rnams ni re re zhing don gnyis la dbang byed de /
gandhaghrāṇarasāsvādanaspraṣṭavyaspaṛśanānāṃ cāsādhāraṇakāraṇatva iti / dvayoḥ kila
# re zhig pho dang mo'i dbang po dag ni sems can gyi bye brag dang khyad par dag la dbang byed de /
caturṇāṃ / strīpuruṣajīvitamanaindriyāṇāṃ
# de la sems can gyi bre brag ni pho'o mo'o zhes bya'o /
dvayorarthayoḥ pratyekamādhipatyam / strī puruśendriyayyostāvatsattvabhedavikalpayoḥ
# sems can gyi khyad par ni nu ma la sogs pa dbyibs dang nga ro dang spyod pa gzhan pa nyid do /
tatra sattvabhedaḥ stri puruṣa iti / sattvavikalpaḥ stanādisaṃsthānasvarācārānyathātvam / saṃsleśavyavadānayorityapare / tathā hi tadviprayuktavikalpānāṃ ṣaṇḍha paṇḍakobhayavyañjanānāmasaṃvarānantāryakuāśalamulasamucchedā na bhavanti saṃvaraphalaprāptivairāgyāṇi ceti
# gzhan dag na re ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dag la dbang byed de / / 'di ltar de dag dang mi ldan pa dang nyams pa za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa rnams la sdom pa ma yin pa dang mtshams med pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa dang sdom pa dang 'bras bu 'thob pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams med do zhes zer ro /
jīvitendriyasya nikāyasabhāgasaṃbandhasādhāraṇayoḥ
# srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par mtshams sbyor ba dang yang dag par 'dzin pa dag la dbang byed do /
manaindriyasya punarbhavasaṃbandhavaśibhāvānuvarttanayoḥ / tatra punrbhavasaṃbandhe yathoktaṃ gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataracittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti
# yid kyi dbang po ni yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba dang dbang gi ngo bo dang mthun par byed pa dag la dbang byed de / / de la yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba la dbang byed pa ni ji skad du / / de'i tshe dri za'i sems gnyis po rjes su chags pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa 'am / / khong khro ba dang lhan cig par gyur pa gang yang rung ba zhig mngon du gyur na zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
vaśibhāvānuvarttane yathoktaṃ cittenāyaṃ loko nīyata iti vistaraḥ
# dbang gi ngo bo dang mthun par byed pa la dbang byed pa ni ji skad du / / 'jig rten 'di ni sems kyis khrid do zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o /
yat punaḥ sukhādīndriyapañcakaṃ yāni cāṣṭau śraddhādīni teṣāṃ
# bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga gang yin pa dang dad pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa / / lnga dang brgyad po de rnams ni /
pañcakāṣṭānaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānayoḥ / ādhipatyaṃ yathākramaṃ pañcānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ saṃkleśe
# kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang la / / go rims bzhin du dbang byed de / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / / bde ba la sogs pa lnga po dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la dbang byed de /
rāgādīnāṃ tadanuśāyitvāt / śraddhādīnāṃ vyavadāne / tai rvyavadāyate / vyavadāne 'pi sukhādīnāmādhipatyamityapare / yasmāt sukhitasya cittaṃ samādhīyate
# de dag la 'dod chags la sogs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro / / dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni rnam par byang ba la dbang byed de / / de dag gis rnam par byang bar byed do / / gzhan dag na re bde ba la sogs pa rnams ni rnam par byang ba la yang dbang byed de /
duḥdhupaniṣacchraddhāṣaṇnaiṣkramyāśritāḥ saumanasyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / apare punarāhuḥ / naiva cakṣuḥśrītrābhyāmātmabhāvaparikaṛṣaṇaṃ vijñāya viṣamaparihārāt / vijñāne tu tayorādhipatyam
# 'di ltar bde bar gyur pa'i sems mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu can gyi dad pa zhes bya ba dang yid bde ba la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba la rten pa drug ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / / gzhan dag na re rnam par shes nas yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir mig dang rna ba dag gis lus yongs su bsrung ba ni ma yin ba nyid kyi de gnyis rnam par shes pa la ni dbang byed do /
nāpi vijñānādanyadrūpadarśanaṃ śabdaśravaṇaṃ vā 'sti / yatastayorasādhāraṇakāraṇatve pṛthagādhipatyaṃ yujyeta
# gang gi phyir de gnyis thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la so sor dbang byed par rung bar 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa las gzhan pa gzugs mthong ba 'am skra thos pa yang med pa de'i phyir de dag de lta bur ni dbang po nyid ma yin no; /
tasmānnaivameṣāmindriyatvam
# 'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na /
kathaṃ tarhi / svārthopalabdhyādhipatyāt sarvasya ca ṣaḍindriyam
# rang gi don dang thams cad la / / dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug /
cakṣurādīnāṃpañcānāṃ svasyasvasyārthasyopalabdhādhipatyam / manasaḥ punaḥ sarvārthopalabdhāvādhipatyam
# mig la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rang rang gi don la dmigs par bya ba la dbang byed do / / yid ni don thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la dbang byed de /
ata etāni ṣaṭ pratyekamindriyam / nanu cārthānāmapyatrādhipatyam
# de'i phyir de dag ni so sor dbang po yin no; / / 'di la don rnams kyang dbang byed pa ma yin nam zhe na /
nādhipatyam / adhikaṃ hi prabhutvamādhipatyam / cakṣuṣaścakṣūrūpopalabdhāvadhikamaiśvaryam / sarvarūpopalabdhau sāmānyakāraṇatvāttatpaṭumandatādyanuvidhānāccopalabdheḥ
# dbang byed pa ma yin te / / lhag par dbang byed pa nyid ni dbang byed pa nyid yin la / / mig ni gzugs thams cad la dmigs par bya ba la thun mong gi rgyu yin pa'i phyir dang dmigs pa de gsal ba dang mi gsal ba nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir gzugs la dmigs par bya ba la lhag par dbang byed pa yin gyi /
na rūpasya / tadvi paryayāt
# de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi ni ma yin te /
evaṃ yāvat manaso dharmeṣu yojyam
# yid chos rnams la dbang byed pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro /
srītva puṃstvādhipatyāttu kāyāt strīpuruṣendriye / kāyendriyādeva strīpuruṣendriye pṛthak vyavasthāpyete
# mo nyid pho nyid las dbang phyir / / lus las mo dang po'i dbang dag / / lus kyi dbang po kho na las mo dang pho'i dbang po dag rnam par bzhag ste /
nārthantarabhūte / kaścidasau kāyendriyabhāga upastha pradeśo yaḥ strīpuruṣendriyākhyāṃ paratilabhate / yathākramaṃ strītvapuṃstvayyorādhipatyāt
# don tha dad par gyur pa dag ni med kyi lus kyi dbang po'i cha 'ga' ste / / mdoms kyi phyogs mo dang pho'i dbang po'i ming 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni rim bzhin du mo nyid dang pho nyid dag la dbang byed pa'i phyir ro /
tatra strībhāvaḥ striyākṛtiḥ svaraceṣṭā abhiprāyāḥ / etaddhi striyā strītvam
# de la mo'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin nga ro dang g yo ba dang bsam ba dag ste / / de ni mo'i mo nyid yin no /
puṃbhāvaḥ puruṣākṛtiḥ svaraceṣṭā abhiprāyāḥ
# pho'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin nga ro dang g yo ba dang bsam pa dag pa dag ste /
etaddhi puṃsaḥ puṃstvam
# de ni pho'i pho nyid yin no /
nikāyasthitisaṃkleśavyavadānādhipatyataḥ
# rigs gnas kun nas nyon mongs dang / / rnam par byang la dbang byed phyir /
jīvitaṃ vedanāḥ pañca śraddhādyāścendriyaṃ matāḥ
# srog dang tshor ba rnams dang ni / / dad sogs dbang po lngar 'dod do /
nikāyasabhāgasthitau jīvitendriyasyādhipatyaṃ saṃkleśe vedanānām / tathāhi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśete duḥkhāyāṃ pratigho 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyetyuktaṃ sūtre
# srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par gnas par bya ba la dbang byed do / / tshor ba rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba la dbang byed de / / 'di ltar mdo las / / bde ba'i tshor ba la ni 'dod chags rgyas par 'gyur / / sdug bsngal la ni khong khro ba / / sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa la ni ma rig pa zhes gsungs so /
vyavadāne śraddhādīnāṃ pañcānām / tathāhi taiḥ kleśāśca viṣkabhyante mārgaścāvāhyate
# dad pa la sogs pa lnga po dag ni rnam par byang bar bya ba la dbang byed de / / 'di ltar de dag gis nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon la lam yang 'dren par byed do /
ata ete 'pi pratyekamindriyamiṣṭāḥ
# de nyid kyi phyir de dag kyang so sor dbang po yin par 'dod do; /
ājñāsyā myākhyamājñākhyamājñātāvīndriyaṃ tathā / uttarottarasaṃprāptinirvāṇādyādhipatyataḥ
# mya ngan 'das sogs gong nas gong / / 'thob pa la ni dbang byed phyir / / kun shes byed dang kun shes dang / / de bzhin kun shes ldan dbang po /
pratyekamindrimityupadarśanārthaṃ tathāśabdaḥ / tatrājñāsyāmīndriyasyājñendriyasya prāptāvādhipatyam / ājñendraiyasyājñātāvīndriyaprāptau ājñātāvīndriyasya parinirvāṇe
# de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra ni so sor dbang po yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro / / de la kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba la dbang byed do / / kun shes pa'i dbang po ni / / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba la dbang byed do / / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba la dbang byed de /
nahyavimuktacittasyāsti parinirvāṇamiti / ādiśabdo 'nyaparyāyadyotanārthaḥ
# sems rnams par ma grol ba la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i phyir ro / / sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rnam grangs gzhan bstan par bya ba'i phyir te /
katamo 'nyaḥ pāryāyaḥ
# rnam grangs gzhan gang zhe na /
darśnaheyakleśaparihāṇam pratyājñāsyāmīndriyasyādhipatyam
# kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la dbang byed do /
bhāvanāheyakleāśaprahāṇaṃ pratyājñendriyasya
# kun shes pa'i dbang po ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la dbang byed do /
dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāraṃ pratyājñātāvīndriyasya
# kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir dbang byed de /
vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedanāditi / ādhipātyādindriyatve 'vidyādīnāmupasaṃkhyānaṃ karttavyam / avidyādīnāmapi hi saṃskārādiṣvādhipatyamata eṣāmapīndriyatvamupasaṃkhyātavyam / vāgādīnāṃ ca
# rnam par grol bas dga' ba dang bde ba la so sor yang dag par myong ba'i phyir ro / / dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po nyid yin na / / ma rig pa la sogs pas kha bskang dgos te / / ma rig pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'du byed la sogs pa rnams la dbang byed pas / / de'i phyir de dag kyang dbang po nyid du kha bskang bar bya la /
vākyāṇipādapāyūpasthānāmapi cendriyatvamupasaṃkhyātavyam / vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandeṣvādhipatyāt
# ngag la sogs pa dag dang lag pa dang rkang pa dang rkub dang mdoms rnams kyang tshig dang len pa dang 'gro ba dang rtug pa dang kun tu dga' ba'i bya ba dag la dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po nyid du kha bskang bar bya'o zhe na /
na khalūpasaṃkhyātavyam
# kha bskang bar mi bya ste 'di ltar 'dir ni /
yasmādiheṣṭam / cittāśrayastadvikalpaḥ sthitiḥ saṃkleśa eva ca
# sems kyi rten dang de'i bye brag / / gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid / / tshogs dang rnam byang ji snyed pa /
saṃbhāro vyavadānaṃ ca yāvatā tāvadindriyam / tatra cittāśrayaḥ ṣaḍindriyāṇi
# dbang po dag kyang de snyed du / / 'dod de / / de la sems kyi rten ni dbang po drug dag yin te /
etacca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ maulaṃ saṭtvadravyam
# skye mched drug po de ni sems can gyi rdzas kyi gzhi yin no /
tasya strīpuruṣavikalpaḥ strīpuruṣendraiyābhyāṃ sthitirjīvitendriyeṇa saṃkleśo vedanā bhiḥ
# mo dang pho'i dbang po dag gis ni de mo dang por bye brag tu 'byed do / / srog gi dbang pos ni gnas par byed do / / tshor ba rnams kyis ni kun nas nyon mongs par byed do /
vyavadānasaṃbharaṇaṃ pañcabhirvyavadānaṃ tribhiḥ / ato nāvidyādīnāmindriyatvamiṣṭam
# dad pa la sogs pa lngas ni rnam par byang ba'i tshogs sogs par byed do / / gsum gyis ni rnam par byang bar byed de / / de'i phyir ma rig pa la sogs pa ni dbang po nyid du mi 'dod do /
pravṛtterāśrayotpattisthitipratyupabhogataḥ
# yang na 'jug pa'i rten dang ni / / skye dang gnas dang nyer spyod las /
caturdaśa tathā 'nyāni nivṛtterindriyāṇi vā
# bcu bzhi de bzhin ldog pa la / / dbang po rnams ni gzhan yin no /
matavikalpārtho vāśabdaḥ / apare punarāhuḥ
# yang na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gzhung lugs tha dad par bstan pa'i phyir te /
pravṛtteraśrayaḥ ṣaḍindriyāṇi
# gzhan dag na re 'jug pa'i rten ni dbang po drug yin no /
utpattiḥ strīpuruṣendriye
# skye ba ni mo dang po'i dbang po dag yin te /
tata utpatteḥ / sthitirjīvitendriyam
# de las skye ba'i phyir ro / / gnas pa ni srog gi dbang po yin te /
tenāvasthānāt / upabhogo vedanābhiḥ / ata etāni caturdaśendriyāṇi / tenaiva prakāreṇa nivṛtteranyāni
# des gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro / / tshor ba rnams kyis ni nye bar spyod par byed de / / de'i phyir de dag ni dbang po bcu bzhi yin no / / rnam pa de nyid kyis gzhan dag ni ldog pa yin te / / ldog pa'i rten ni dad pa la sogs pa yin no /
śraddhadīni hi nivṛtterāśrayāḥ / ājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ prabhavaḥ sthitirājñendriyam upabhoga ājñātāvīndriyeṇetyata etāvantyevendriyāṇi / ata eva caīṣāmeṣo 'nukramaḥ
# skye ba ni kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po yin no / / gnas pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no / / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang pos ni nye bar spyod par byed do zhes zer te / / de'i phyir dbang po dag ni de snyed cig yin la / / de nyid kyi phyir de dag gi go rims kyang de yin no /
vācastu nendriyatvaṃ vacane śikṣāviśeṣāpekṣatvāt
# ngag gi tshig smra bar bya ba la dbang po nyid ma yin te / / slob pa'i khyad par ltos pa'i phyir ro /
pāṇipādasya cādānaviharaṇādananyatvāt
# lag pa dang rkang pa dang len pa dang 'gro ba las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te /
tadeva hi tadanyathā 'nyatra cotpannamādānaṃ viharaṇaṃ cocyate
# de dag nyid de dag yin te / / gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung ba la len pa dang 'gro ba zhes bya'o /
vināpi ca pāṇipādenādānaviharaṇāduragaprabhṛtīṇām
# sbrul la sogs pa la lag pa dang rkang pa med pa bzhin du yang len zhing 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
pāyorapi nendriyatvamutsarge gurudravyasyākāśe sarvatra patanāt / vāyunā ca tatpreraṇāt
# rkub kyang rtug par bya ba la dbang po nyid ma yin te / / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i rdzas lci ba thams cad du ltung ba'i phyir dang de rlung gis kyang bro bar byed pa'i phyir ro /
upasthasyāpi nendriyatvamānande strīpuruṣendriyakṛtaṃ hi tat saukhyamiti
# mdoms kyang kun tu dga' bar bya ba la dbang po nyid ma yin te / / dga' ba de ni mo dang po'i dbang pos byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
kaṇṭhadantākṣivartmaparvaṇāmapi cābhyavaharaṇacarvaṇonmeṣanimeṣākuñcanavikāśana kriyāsvindriyatvaṃ prasajyeta
# lkog ma dang so dang mig gi lam dang tshigs rnams kyang mid pa dang bca' ba dang 'byed pa dang 'dzum pa dang bskums pa dang brkyang ba'i bya ba dag la dbang po nyid yin pa 'am /
sarvasya vā kāraṇabhūtasya svasyāṃ kariyāyāmityayukataṃ vāgādīnāmindriyatvam / tatra cakṣurādīnāṃ puruṣendriyaparyantānāṃ kṛto nirdeśaḥ
# rgyur gyur pa thams cad rang gi bya ba la dbang po nyid yin par thal bar 'gyur bas ngag la sogs pa dbang po nyid yin par rigs pa ma yin no / / de la mig la sogs pa pho'i dbang po la thug pa rnams ni bstan zin to /
jīvitendriyasya viprayuktatvādviprayukteṣveva karisyate nirdeśaḥ
# srog gi dbang po ni ldan pa ma yin ba yin pa'i phyir ldan pa ma yin pa dag gi nang kho na nas 'chad par 'gyur ro /
śraddhādīnāṃ caitteṣu kariṣyate / sukhādīnāmājñāsyāmīndriyādīnāṃ ca karttavyaḥ / so 'yaṃ kriyate
# dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni sems las byung ba dag gi nang nas 'chad par 'gyur ro / / bde ba la sogs pa dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa bshad par bya ste de brjod par bya'o /
duḥkhendriyamaśātā yā kāyikī vedanā
# lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang / / sdug bsngal dbang po'o /
aśātetyupadhātikā duḥkhetyarthaḥ / sukham / śātā / sukhendriyaṃ kāyikī śāta vedanā
# sim pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni gnod par byed pa ste sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / sim pa ni bde ba'o / / lus kyi tshor ba sim pa ni bde ba'i dbang po'o /
śātetyanugrāhikā sukhetyarthaḥ / dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam / tṛtīye tu dhyāne saiva śātā vedanā caitasī sukhendriyam
# sim pa zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa ste bde ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / bsam gtan gsum pa na / / sems kyi de ni bde dbang po / / bsam gtan gsum pa na ni sems kyi tshor ba sim pa de nyid bde ba'i dbang po yin te /
nahi tatra kāyikī vedanā 'sti / pañcavijñānakāyābhāvāt
# de na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga med pa'i phyir lus kyi tshor ba ni med do /
anyatra sā saumanasyaṃ / tṛtīyāddhyānādanyatra kāmadhātau prathame dvitīye ca dhyāne sā caiatasikī śātā vedanā saumanasyendriyam / tṛtīye tu dhyāne prītivītarāgatvāt sukhendriyameva sā na saumanasyendriyam / prītirhi saumanasyam
# gzhan na de yis bde ba yin / / bsam gtan gsum pa las gzhan pa 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa na ni sems kyi tshor ba sim pa gang yin pa de yid bde ba'i dbang po yin no / / bsam gtan gsum pa na ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir bde ba'i dbang po kho na yin gyi yid bde ba ni ma yin te / / dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin no /
aśātā caitasī punaḥ / daurmanasyamupekṣā tu madhyā / naivaśātānāśātā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā madhyetyucyate
# sems kyi sim pa ma yin pa / / yid mi bde ba'o btang snyoms ni bar ma'o / / sim pa yang ma yin sim pa ma yin pa yang ma yin / / sdug bsngal yang ma yin / / bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni bar ma zhes bya ste /
sopekṣendriyam / kiṃ kāyikī caitasikītyāha
# de ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po yin no / / ci lus kyi 'am / / sems kyi zhes bya zhe na /
ubhayī
# smras pa /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamiyamabhisamasyai kamindriyaṃ kriyate
# gnyi ga'i yin no / / ci'i phyir 'di bsdus nas dbang po gcig tu byas she na /
avikalpanāt / caitasikaṃ hi sukhaduḥkhaṃ prāyeṇa vikalpanādutpadyate na tu kāyikam
# mi rtag phyir / / sems kyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni phal cher rnam par rtog pa las skye'i lus kyi ni ma yin no /
viṣayavaśādarhatāmapyutpatteḥ
# yul gyi dbang gis ni dgra bcom pa rnams la yang skye bas /
atastayorindriyatvena bhedaḥ / upekṣā tu svarasenāvikalpayata evotpadyate kāyikī caitasikī ce tyekamindriyam kriyate
# de'i phyir de dag dbang po nyid du tha dad kyi lus kyi dang sems kyi btang snyoms ni rnam par mi rtog pa kho nar rang gi ngang gis skye bas dbang po gcig tu byas so /
anyathā ca kāyikam sukhamanugṛhṇātyanyathā caitasikam
# lus kyi bde ba yang gzhan du phan 'dogs la / / sems kyi yang gzhan du phan 'dogs so /
evam duḥkhamanyathā kāyikamupahantyanyathā caitasikam / upekṣāyāṃ tveṣa vikalpo nāstyata upekṣaṇaṃ pratyavikalpanādabhedaḥ
# de bzhin du lus kyi sdug bsngal yang gzhan du gnod pa byed la / / sems kyi yang gzhan du gnod pa byed do / / btang snyoms la ni bye brag de med de / / de bas na / / btang snyoms ni bye brag med pas tha dad pa med do /
dṛgbhāvanā 'saikṣapathe nava trīṇi / manaḥ sukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ sraddhādīni ca pañca / tāni navendriyāṇi triṣu mārgeṣu trīṇīndriyāṇyucyante
# mthong bsgom mi slob lam la dgu / / gsum yin / / yid dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms rnams dang dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang dbang po dgu po de dag ni lam gsum dag tu dbang po gsum zhes bya ste / / mthong ba'i lam la ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o /
darśanamārge anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyaṃ bhāvanāmārge ājñendriyam aśaikṣamārge ājñātāvīndriyamiti
# bsgom pa'i lam la ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o / / mi slob pa'i lam la ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
darśanamārge hyanājñātamājñātuṃ pravṛttaḥ
# mthong ba'i lam la ni mi shes pa kun shes par bya bar zhugs pa yin no /
bhāvanāmārge nāstyapūrvamājñeyaṃ tadeva tvājānāti śeṣānuśayaprahāṇārtham
# bsgom pa'i lam la ni sngon ma mthong ba kun shes par bya ba ni med kyi / / phra rgyas lhag ma spang bar bya ba'i phyir de nyid kun shes par byed do /
aśaikṣamārge tvājñātmityavagama ājñātāvaḥ
# mi slob pa'i lam la ni kun shes so snyam du rtogs pa ni kun shes pa ste /
so 'syāstīti ājñātāvī
# de 'di la yod pas sam /
ājñātamavituṃ śīlamasyeti vā / kṣayānutpādijñānalābhāt / duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñātavyamiti tathābhūtasyenriyamājñātāvīnriyam
# 'di kun shes pa srung ba'i dang tshul can yin pas na kun shes pa dang ldan pa'o / / zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes te yang yongs su shes par byar med do snyam pa ste / / de lta bu'i dbang po ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po yin no /
svabhāvanirdeśāṃ kṛtvā prakārabhedo vaktavya kati sāsravāṇi katyanāsravāṇi inriyāṇityevamādi / tatra tāvadyadetadanantaroktamājñāsyāmīnriyādikametat
# rang gi ngo bo bstan nas zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du / / zag pa med pa rnams ni du zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa rnam pa'i bye brag brjod par bya ste / / de la re zhig kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa bshad ma thag pa gang dag yin pa de /
amalaṃ trayam
# gsum ni dri ma med pa /
anāsravamityarthaḥ / malānāmāsravaparyāyatvāt
# zag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / / dri ma rnams ni zag pa'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro /
rūpīṇi jīvitaṃ duḥkhe sāsravāṇi
# gzugs can srog dang sdug bsngal dag /
rūpīṇi saptendriyāṇi jīvitendriyaṃ dukhaḥdaurmanasyendriye caikāntasāsravāṇi
# zag dang bcas pa / / dbang po gzugs can bdun dang srog gi dbang po dang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dag ni gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa yin no /
rūpīṇi punaḥ sapta cakṣuḥ / śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyastripuruṣendriyāṇi rūpaskandhasaṃgrahāt / dvidhā nava / manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ śraddhādīni ca pañca etāni navendriyāṇi sāsravāṇyanāsravāṇyapi
# gzugs can bdun ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang mo dang po'i dbang po rnams te / / gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro / / dgu rnam gnyi se / / yid dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms dag dang dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang dbang po dgu po de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa yang yin la zag pa med pa yang yin no /
anāsravāṇyeva śraddhādīnītyeke / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā yasyemāni pañcendriyāṇi sarveṇa srvaṃ na santi tamahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ vadāmīti
# kha cig na re dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni zag pa med pa kho na yin te / / bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la dbang po lnga po 'di dag thams cad du thams cad med pa de ni phyi rol so so'i skye bo'i phyogs la gnas par nga smra'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro / / de ni khungs su mi rung ste /
nedaṃ jñāpakamanāsravāṇyadhikṛtya vacanāt
# zag pa med pa rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
tathā hyāryapudgalavyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā yasyemānītyāha
# 'di ltar 'phags pa'i gang zag rnam par gzhag pa mdzad nas gang la dbang po 'di dag ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
pṛthagjano vā dvividhaḥ / ābhyantarakaścāsamucchinna kuśalamūlo bāhyakaśca samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ
# yang na so so'i skye bo ni rnam pa gnyis te / / nang pa dang phyi rol pa'o / / nang pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu ma chad pa'o / / phyi rol pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa ste /
tamadhikāṛtyāha bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ vadāmīti
# de'i dbang du mdzad nas phyi rol so so'i skye bo'i phyogs la gnas par nga smra'o zhes gsungs pa yin no /
uktaṃ ca sūtre santi ca sattvā loke jātā loke vṛddhāstīkṣṇendriyā api madhyendriyā api mṛdvindriyā apī tyapravarttita eva dharmacakre
# mdo las kyang sems can 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa rnams la dbang po rnon po dag kyang mchis; dbang po 'bring po dag kyang mchis / / dbang po rtul po dag kyang mchi sa so zhes chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba kho na'i tshe gsungs te /
tasmātsantyeva sāsravāṇi śraddhādīni / punaścoktaṃ yāvacchāhameṣāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ samudayaṃ cāstagamaṃ ca svādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ nādhyajñāsiṣaṃ na tāvadahamasmātsadevakāllokāditi vistaraḥ / na cānāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmeṣa parīkṣāprakāraḥ
# de'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yod pa nyid do / / yang ngas ji srid du dbang po lnga po 'di dag gi kun 'byung ba dang mi snang ba dang ro myong ba dang nyes dmigs dang nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma shes pa de srid du nga 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa 'di las zhes rgyas par gsungs te / / zag pa med pa rnams la ni yongs su brtag pa'i rnam pa 'di med do /
katīndriyāṇi vipākaḥ kati na vipākaḥ / ekāntena tāvat / vipāko jīvitaṃ
# dbang po du ni rnam par smin pa dag yin / / du ni rnam par smin pa ma yin pa dag yin zhe na / / re zhig gcig tu srog ni rnam smin /
atha yadarhan bhikṣurāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati tajjīvitendriyaṃ kasya vipākaḥ
# 'o na dge slong dag dgra bcom pa'i tshe'i 'du byed dag 'jog par byed pa'i srog gi dbang po gang yin pa de gang gi rnam par smin pa zhe na /
śāstra ukthaṃ kathamāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayati / arhan bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃścetovaśitvaṃ prāptaḥ saṃghāya va pudgalāya vā pātraḥ vā cīvaraṃ vā anyatamānyatamaṃ vā śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāraṃ vā dattvā tat praṇidhāya prantakoṭikam caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
# bstan bcos las / / tshe'i 'du byed dag ji ltar 'jog par byed ce na / / dge slong dgra bcom pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sems la dbang thob pas dge 'dun nam gang zag la lhung bzed dam chos gos sam / / dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba phul nas /
sa tasmāt vyutthāya cittamutpādayati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate yanme bhogavipākaṃ tadāyurvipākaṃ bhavatviti
# de bsams te rab kyi mtha' pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing de de las langs nas / / bdag gi longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de /
tasya yat bhogavipākaṃ tadāyurvipākaṃ bhavati / yeṣāṃ punarayamabhiprāyo vipākoccheṣaṃ vipacyata iti
# tshe'i rnam par smin par gyur cig snyam du sems skyed par byed cing tshig tu yang smra bar byed do / / de'i longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de'i tshe'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo /
ta āhuḥ pūrvajātikṛtasya karmaṇo vipākoccheṣaṃ / sa bhāvanābalenākṛṣya pratisaṃvedayata iti / kathamāyuḥsaṃskārā nutsṛjati
# gang dag rnam par smin pa'i lhag ma rnam par smin par byed do snyam du sems pa de dag na re ni nges tshe rabs snga ma la las byas pa'i rnam par smin pa bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis drangs nas so sor myong bar byed do zhes zer ro / / de'i tshe'i 'du byed dag ji ltar gtong zhe na /
tathaīva dānaṃ dattvā praṇidhāya prantakoṭikaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate / yanme āyurvipākaṃ tat bhogavipākaṃ bhavatviti tasya tathā bhavati
# de bzhin du sbyin pa byin nas bsams te rab kyi mtha' pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing de de las langs nas bdag gi tshe'i rnam par smin pa gang yin bde longs spyod kyi rnam par smin par gyur cig snyam du sems skyed par byed cing tshig tu yang smra bar byed de /
bhadantaghoṣakastvāha / tasminneva āśraye rūpāvacarāṇi mahābhūtāni dhyānabalena saṃmudhakarotyāyuṣo 'nukūlāni vaihodhikāni ca
# de'i de lta bur 'gyur ro / / btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs na re ni des lus de nyid la gzugs na spyod pa'i 'byung ba chen po tshe dang mthun pa'am 'gal bdag bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis mngon du byed do /
evamāyuḥsaṃskārān sthāpayatyevamutsṛjatīti / evaṃ tu bhavitavyam / samādhiprabhāva eva sa teṣāṃ tadṛśo yena pūrvakarmajaṃ ca sthitikālāvedhamindriyamahābhūtānāṃ vyāvrttayantyapūrvaṃ ca samādhijamāvedhamākṣipanti
# de ltar tshe'i 'du byed dag 'jog par byed cing / / de ltar gtong bar byed do zhes zer ro / / 'di lta bu yin te / / de dag gi de lta bu de ni / / ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu kho na ste / / des sngon gyi las las skyes pa dbang po'i 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi gnas pa'i dus 'phen pa ni zlog par byed la / / sngon med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i 'phen pa ni 'phen par byed de /
tasmānna tajjīvitendriyaṃ vipākaṃ tato 'nyattu vipākaḥ / praśnāt praśnāntaramupajāyate
# de lta bas na srog gi dbang po de ni rnam par smin pa ma yin la / / de las gzhan pa ni rnam par smin pa yin no / / dri ba las dri ba gzhan 'byung ste /
kimarthamāyuḥsaṃskārānadhitiṣṭhanti
# ci'i phyir tshe'i 'du byed dag byin gyis rlob par byed ce na /
parahitārthaṃ śāsansthityarthaṃ vā / te hyātmanaḥ kṣīṇamāyuḥ paśyanti / na ca tatrānyaṃ śaktaṃ paśyanti
# gzhan la phan pa'i don tam / / bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i don du ste / / de dag ni bdag nyid tshe zad par mthong zhing de las gzhan nus pa yang ma mthong ba yin no /
atha kimarthamutsṛjanti / alpaṃ ca parahitaṃ jīvite paśyanti rogābhibhūtaṃ cātmabhāvam / yathoktaṃ
# 'o na ci'i phyir gtong bar byed ce na / / gson na gzhan la phan pa chung ba dang lus nad la sogs pa lta bur mthong ba yin te / / ji skad du /
sucīrṇe brahmacarye 'smin mārge caiva subhāvite
# tshangs spyod 'di la legs spyad cing / / lam la'ang shin tu bsgoms na ni /
tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣayāt bhavati rogasyāpagame yathā
# tshe zad pa la dga' 'gyur te / / dper na nad dang bral ba bzhin /
iti / athaitadāyuḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ sthāpanārthamutsarjanaṃ vā kva kasya vā veditavyam
# zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / 'o na gang du'am / / gang zhig gi tshe'i 'du byed dag 'jog pa'am / / gtong ba de rig par bya zhe na / / mi'i nang kho na dag tu ste gling gsum po dag tu'o /
manuṣyeṣvevatriṣu dvīpeṣu strīpuruṣayorasamayavimuktasyārhataḥ prāntakoṭikadhyānalābhinaḥ
# gang zhig gi zhe na / / dgra bcom pa pho mo rab kyi mtha'i bsam gtan thob pa dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam bar grol ba ste /
tasya hi samādhau vaśitvam / kleśaiścānupastabdhā santatiḥ
# de ni ting nge 'dzin la yang dbang zhing nyon mongs pa dag gis kyang rgyu nye bar ma bstan pa yin no /
sūtra uktam bhagavān jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāyāyuḥsaṃskārānustsṛṣṭavān / teṣāṃ ko viśeṣaḥ
# mdo las bcom ldan 'das kyis / / srog gi 'du byed dag byin gyis brlabs nas tshe'i 'du byed dag btang ngo zhes gsungs pa de dag la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
na kaścidityeke / tathā hyuktam jīvitendriyaṃ katamat
# kha cig na re cung zad kyang med de / / 'di ltar srog gi dbang po gang zhe na /
traidhātukamāyuriti / pūrvakarmaphalamāyuḥsaṃskārāḥ pratyutpannakarmaphalaṃ jīvitasaṃskārā ityapare
# khams gsum pa'i tshe yin no zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro / / kha cig na re ni sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu ni tshe'i 'du byed dag yin la / / da ltar byung ba'i las kyi 'bras bu ni srog gi 'du byed dag yin no zhes zer te /
yairvā nikāyasabhāgasthitista āyuḥsaṃskārāḥ / yaistu kālāntaraṃ jīvati te jīvitasaṃskārā iti
# gang dag gis ris mthun par gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni tshe'i 'du byed dag yin la / / gang dag gis dus gzhan gyi bar du 'tsho ba de dag ni srog gi 'du byed dag yin no /
bahuvacanaṃ bahūnāmāyurjīvitasaṃskārakṣaṇānāmutsarjanā dhiṣṭhānāt / nahyekasya kṣaṇasyotsarjanamadhiṣṭhanaṃ cāsti / na ca kālāntarasthāvaramekamāyurdravyamiti dyotanārthamityeke / bahuśveva saṃskāreṣvāyurākhyā nāstyekamāyurdravyam / anyathā naiva saṃskāragrahaṇamakariṣyadityapare
# mang po'i tshig ni tshe dang srog gi 'du byed kyi skad cig ma rnam pa mang po rnams la gtong zhing byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir te / / skad cig ma gcig la ni gtong ba'am byin gyis rlob pa med do / / kha cig na re dus gzhan gyi bar du 'dug pa tshe'i rdzas gcig pu ni med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / / kha cig na re 'du byed mang po rnams la tshe zhes bya ba'i tshe'i rdzas gcig pu ni med do / / de lta ma yin na 'du byed smos pa mi mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
kimarthaṃ punarbhagavatā āyuhsaṃskārā utsṛṣṭāścādhiṣṭitāśca
# yang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe'i 'du byed dag btang zhing byin gyis brlabs she na /
maraṇavaśitvajñāpanārthamutsṛṣṭājīvitavaśitvajñāpanārthamadhiṣṭitāḥ / traimāsyameva nodhrvam vineyakāryābhāvāt / yaccāpi tat pratijñātam evaṃbhāvitairahaṃ caturbhirṛddhi pādairākāṅkṣankalpamapi tiṣṭheyaṃ kalpāvaśeṣamapīti / tasyāpi saṃpādanārtham
# 'chi ba la mnga' ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ni btang la / / tshe la mnga' ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ni zla ba gsum kho na byin gyis brlabs te / / phyin chad ni gdul ba'i don med pa'i phyir ma yin no / / gang yang ngas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po de ltar bsgoms pa dag gis 'dod na bskal pa'am bskal ba bas lhag par bzhugs par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa de yang sgrub pa'i phyir ro /
skandhamaraṇamārayornirjayārthamiti vaibhaṣikāḥ / bodhimūle kleśadevaputramārau nirjitāviti
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re ni phung po dang 'chi bdag gi bdud dag las rgyal bar bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te / / byang chub kyi shing drung du ni nyon mongs pa dang lha'i bu'i bdud dag las rgyal lo /
niṣṭhitamānuṣaṅgikam
# zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so /
prakṛtamevārabhyate / dvedhā dvādaśa / katamāni dvādaśa
# dkyus ma nyid brtsam par bya ste / / bcu gnyis gnyis / / bcu gnyis gang zhe na /
antyāṣṭakādṛte / daurmanasyācca
# tha ma brgyad dang yid mi bde / / ma gtogs pa ste /
antyamaṣṭakaṃ śraddhādīni daurmanasyaṃ ca varjayitvā / jīvitendriyādanyāni dvādaśa dvividhāni vipākaścāvipākaśca
# dad pa la sogs pa tha ma brgyad dang yid mi bde ba ma gtogs pa srog gi dbang po las gzhan pa bcu gnyis ni rnam pa gnyis te / / rnam par smin pa yang yin la / / rnam par smin pa ma yin pa yang yin no /
tatra cakṣurādīni saptaupacayikāni avipākaḥ
# de la mig la sogs pa bdun rgyas pa las byung ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa ma yin no /
śeṣāṇi vipākaḥ / manoduḥkhasukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇi kuśalakliṣṭānya vipākaḥ / airyāpathikaśāilpasthānikanairmāṇikāni ca yathāyogam
# lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yin no / / yid dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can rnams dang spyod lam pa dang bzo'i gnas pa dang sprul pa rnams ni ci rigs par rnam par smin pa ma yin no /
śeṣāṇi vipākaḥ / jīvitendriyaṃ cakṣurādīni dvādaśa hitvā śeṣāṇyavipāka iti siddham / yadi dauarmanasyendriyaṃ na vipāka iti sūtraṃ kathaṃ nīyate trīṇi kāryāṇi
# lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yin no / / srog gi dbang po dang mig la sogs pa bcu gnyis ma gtogs pa lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar grub po / / gal te yid mi bde ba rnam par smin pa ma yin na las ni gsum ste /
saumanasyavedanīyaṃ karma daurmanasyavedanīyaṃ karma upekṣā vedanīyaṃ karmeti saṃprayogavedanīyatāmadhikṛtyoktam / daurmasyena saṃprayuktaṃ karma daurmanasyavedanīyam
# yid bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang yid mi bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang btang snyoms myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zhes gsungs pa'i mdo 'di ji ltar drang zhe na / / mtshungs par ldan pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa yin te / / yid mi bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i las ni yid mi bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ste /
yathā sukhasaṃparayuktaḥ sparśaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ
# dper na bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i reg pa bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin pa bzhin no /
saumanasyopekṣāvedanīye api tarhi karmaṇī evaṃ bhaviṣyataḥ
# 'o na ni yid bde ba dang btang snyoms myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
yathecchasi tathā 'stu
# ji ltar dga' ba de ltar yin la rag ste /
saṃprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ vipāke 'pi na doṣaḥ
# mtshungs par ldan pa yin na yang nyes pa med la / / rnam par smin pa yin na yang nyes pa med do /
agatyā hyetadevaṃ gamyeta
# go skabs med pas na de ni de ltar shes so /
kā punratra yuktirdaurmanasyaṃ na vipāka iti / daurmanasyaṃ hi parikalpaviśeṣairutpādyate ca vyupaśāmyate ca / nacaivam vipākaḥ / saumanasyamapyevaṃ na syādvipākaḥ
# yid mi bde ba rnam par smin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod ce na / / yid mi bde ba ni kun tu rtog pa'i khyad par dag gis skyed par byed pa yin gyi rnam par smin pa ni de ltam yin no / / yid bde ba yang de dang 'dra bas rnam par smin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro /
yadi tarhi daumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syādānantaryakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ daurmanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt
# 'o na gal te yid mi bde ba rnam par smin par gyur na mtshams med pa byed pa rnams de'i phyir yid mi bde bskyed pas las de rnam par smin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
saumanasyamapyevam / yadi saumanasyaṃ vipākaḥ syāt puṇyakāriṇāṃ tannimittaṃ saumanasyotpādāttatkarma vipakvaṃ syāt
# yid mi bde ba yang de dang 'dra ste / / gal te yid bde ba rnam par smin par gyur na bsod nams byed pa rnams de'i phyir yid bde ba skyed pas las de rnam par smin par 'gyur ro /
vītarāgāṇāṃ tarhi daurmanasyāsaṃbhavāt
# 'o na 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la yid mi bde ba mi srid pa'i phyir te /
na caivaṃ vipākaḥ / saumanasyamapyeṣāmavyākṛtaṃ kodṛśaṃ vipākaḥ syāt
# rnam par smin pa ni de lta ma yin no zhe na / / de dag gi yid bde ba lung du ma bstan pa rnam par smin pa yang ji lta bu zhig yin /
yādṛśaṃ tādṛśamastu
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
sati tu saṃbhave saumanasyasyāsti vipākāvakāśī na dauarmanasyasya / sarvathā 'samudācārāditi nāstyevaṃ daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# ci 'dra yang rung ste / / yid bde ba la rnam par smin pa'i go skabs yod ji srid du zin kyang; yid mi bde ba ni rnam pa thams cad du yang kun du mi 'byung bas yid mi bde ba la rnam par smin pa med ces zer ro /
tatra jīvitendriyāṣṭamāni sugatau kuśalasya vipāko durgatāvakuśalasya
# de la brgyad pa srog gi dbang po dang gzhan rnams bde 'gro na ni bde ba rnam par smin pa yin la / / ngan 'gro ba ni mi bde ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no /
manaindriyamubhayorubhayasya / sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇi kuśalasya / duḥkhendriyamakuśalasya / sugatābubhayavyañjanasyākuśalenatatsthānapratilambhaḥ / natvindriyasya kuśalākṣepāt
# yid kyi dbang po ni gnyis kar gnyi ga'i rnam par smin pa yin no / / bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams ni dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no / / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no / / bde 'gro na mi dge bas mtshan gnyis po de'i gnas rnyed pa yin gyi dbang po ni ma yin te / / dge bas 'phangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
gatametad
# de ni rdzogs so /
idaṃ nu vaktavyam
# 'di brjod par bya ste /
katīndriyāṇi savipākāni katyavipākāni / yadetat daurmanasyamanantaroktaṃ
# dbang po du ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa dag yin / / du ni rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin zhe na / / gang 'di yid mi bde ba bshad ma thag pa /
tattvekaṃ savipākaṃ / tadekaṃ savipākameva
# de gcig ni rnam par smin bcas de gcig pu ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa kho na yin no /
tuśabda evakārārtho bhinnakramaśca veditavyaḥ / nahi tadavyākṛtamasti nāpyanāsravamasamāhitatvāt
# ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kho na zhes bya ba'i don dang rim pa gzhan du sbyar ba yin par rig par bya ste / / de ni lung du ma bstan pa yang med la / / mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yang med de /
ato nāstyavipākaṃ daurmanasyam / daśa dvidhā / savipākānyavipākāni ca / katamāni daśa / mano 'nyavittiśraddhādīni
# de'i phyir yid mi bde ba rnam par smin pa med pa ma yin no / / bcu rnam gnyis / / rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yin / / rnam par smin pa med pa dag kyang yin no / / bcu gang zhe na / / yid dang tshor gzhan dad la sogs /
anyavittigrahaṇāt daurmanasyādanyat veditaṃ gṛhyate
# tshor ba gzhan zhes bya ba smos pas ni yid mi bde ba las gzhan pa'i tshor ba gzung ngo /
śraddhādīni śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamāchiprajñāḥ / tatra manaḥsukhasaumanasyopekṣā akuāśalāḥ kuśalāḥ sāsravāśca savipākāḥ
# dad la sogs ni dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab po / / de la yid dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms mi dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no /
anāsravā avyākṛtāścāvipākāḥ
# zag pa med pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin no /
duḥkhendriyaṃ kuśalākuāśalaṃ savipākamavyākṛtamavipākam / śraddhādīni sasravāṇi savipākānyanāsravāṇyavipākāni
# sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni dge ba dang mi dge ba ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no / / lung du ma bstan pa ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no / / dad pa la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no /
anyadavipākamiti siddham / kati kuśalāni katyakuśalāni katyavyākṛtāni
# zag pa med pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa dag yin no / / gzhan ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no zhes bya bar grub bo / / du ni dge ba dag yin /
ekāntena tāvat / aṣṭakaṃ kuśalaṃ
# du ni mi dge ba dag yin zhe na / / re zhig gcig tu dge ba brgyad /
pañcaśraddhādīni trīṇi cājñāsyāmīndriyādīni / dvidhā
# dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum mo /
daurmanasyaṃ / kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ca
# yid mi bde ba rnam gnyis; dge ba yang yin mi dge ba yang yin no /
mano 'nyā ca vittistredhā
# yid dang tshor gzhan ni / / rnam gsum /
kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtāni / anyadekadhā
# dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dag go / / gzhan ni rnam pa gcig /
kiñcidanyat / jīvitāṣṭamaṃ cakṣurādi
# gzhan de yang zhe na / / mig la sogs pa dang brgyad pa srog ste /
etadavyākṛtameva / katamadindriyaṃ katamadhātvāptameṣāmindriyāṇām
# de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no / / dbang po 'di rnams las dbang po gang zhig khams gang du gtogs she na /
kāmāptamamalaṃ hitvā
# dri med ma gtogs 'dod par gtogs /
kāmapratisaṃyuktaṃ tāvadindriyaṃ veditavyam / ekāntānāsravamājñāsyāmīndriyāditrayaṃ hitvā / taddhyapratisaṃyuktameva
# re zhig gcig tu zag pa med pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum ma gtogs pa'i dbang po rnams ni 'dod pa dang ldan par rig par bya ste / / de ni ldan pa ma yin pa kho na yin no /
rūpāptaṃ strīpumindriye
# pho mo'i dbang dang sdug bsngal dag /
duḥkhe ca hitvā
# ma gtogs gzugs gtogs /
amalaṃ ceti varttate / duḥkhe iti duḥkhadaurmanasye / tatra maithunadharmavairāgyādaśobhākaratvācca rūpadhātau strīpuruṣendriye na staḥ / kathamidānīṃ puruṣāsta ucyante
# dri ma med pa yang ma gtogs zhes bya bar sbyar te / / sdug bsngal dag ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dag go / / gzugs kyi khams de na 'khrig pa'i chos kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir dang mi mdzes par byed pa'i phyir po dang mo'i dbang po dag med do / / da ni ji ltar na de dag pho zhes bya /
kvocyante / sūtre / asthānamanavakāśo yat strī brahmatvaṃ kārayiṣyati / nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate
# ga las 'byung / / mo tshangs pa nyid byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de gnas med do /
sthānametat vidyate yat puruṣa iti
# pho gang yin pa de ni gnas yod do / / zhes gsungs te /
anyaḥ puruṣabhāvo yaḥ kāmachātau puruṣāṇāṃ bhavati / duḥkhendriyaṃ nāstyāśrayasyācchatvādakuśalā bhāvāccha / daurmanasyendriyaṃ nāsti śamathasnigdhasantānatvādāghātavastvabhāvācca / ārūpyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohya rūpi ca / strīpuruṣendriye duḥkhe cāmalaṃ hitveti varttate / kimavaśāiṣyate
# pho'i ngo bor gzhan 'dod pa'i khams na pho rnams la yod pa gang yin pa ni yod do / / lus dang ba'i phyir dang mi dge ba med pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi dbang po med do / / rgyu zhi gnas kyis brlan pa'i phyir dang kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi med pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'i dbang po med do / / gzugs can dang bde ba'am ma gtogs gzugs med gtogs / / pho dang mo'i dbang po dag dang bde ba dag dang dri ma med pa yang ma gtogs zhes bya bar sbyar ro / / ci zhig lus she na /
manojīvitopekṣendriyāṇi śraddhādīni ca pañca / etānyārūpyapratisaṃyuktāni santi nānyāni
# yid dang srog dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dad pa la sogs pa lnga po de dag ni gzugs med pa dang ldan par 'dod do / / gzhan dag ni med do / / dbang po du ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag yin /
katīndriyāṇi darśanaprahātavyāni kati bhāvanāprahātavyāni katyaprahātavyāni
# du ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin / / du ni spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dag gi yin zhe na /
manovittitrayaṃ tredhā
# yid dang tshor ba gsum rnam gsum /
katamad vittitrayam
# tshor ba gsum gang zhe na /
sukhasaumanasyopekṣāḥ / dviheyā durmanaskatā / dauarmanasyaṃ dvābhyāṃ praheyaṃ darśanabhāvanābhyām
# bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms rnams so / / gnyis kyis spang bya yid mi bde / / yid mi bde ba ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang gnyis kyis spang bar bya ba yin no /
nava bhāvanayā / heyānītyadhikāraḥ / jīvitāṣṭamāni cakṣurādīni duḥkhendriyaṃ ca bhāvanāheyānyeva
# dgu ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no / / zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te / / mig la sogs pa dang brgyad pa srog dang sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag kho na yin no /
pañca tvaheyānyapi
# lnga po ni / / spang bar bya min yang /
śraddhādīni pañca bhāvanāheyānyapyaheyānyapi / sāsravānāsravatvāt / na trayam / trayaṃ naiva praheyamājñāsyāmīndriyādikamanāsravatvāt
# dad pa la sogs pa lnga ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag kyang yin la / / spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dag kyang ma yin no / / gsum min / / kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum ni zag pa med pa'i phyir spang bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
nahi nirdoṣaṃ prahāṇārham
# nyes pa med pa ni spang bar 'os pa ma yin no /
uktaḥ prakārabhedaḥ / lābha idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ
# rnam pa'i bye brag bshad zin to / / da ni rnyed pa dpyad par bya ste /
katīndriyāṇi kasmindhātau vipākaḥ prathamato labhyante
# khams gang du dang po nyid du dbang po rnam par smin pa du zhig rnyed ce na /
kāmeṣvādau vipāko dve labhyate / kāyendriyaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ ca
# 'dod par dang por rnam smin gnyis / / rnyed de / / lus kyi dbang po dang srog gi dbang po 'o /
te punaḥ
# de dag kyang /
nopapādukaiḥ / upapādukapratiṣedhādaṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajaīriti veditavyam
# rdzus te skye bas min / / rdzus te skye ba bkag pas sgo nga las skye ba dang mngal las skye ba dang drod gsher las skye ba dag gis rnyed par rig par bya'o /
kasmānna manaupekṣendriye / pratisandhikāle tayoravaśyaṃ kliṣṭatvāt / athopapādukaiḥ kati labhyante
# ci'i phyir yid dang btang snyoms kyis dbang po dag ma yin zhe na / / de gnyis ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tsheg don mi za bar nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro / / yang rdzus te skye ba dag gis du zhig 'thob ce na /
taiḥ ṣaḍa vā / yadyavyañjanā bhavanti
# de yis drug gam zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan ma med pa zhig yin na ste /
yathā prāthamakalpikāḥ / katamāni ṣaṭ / cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyajīvitendriyāṇi
# 'di ltar bskal pa dang po pa rnams lta bu'o / / drug gang zhe na / / mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang srog gi dbang po rnams so /
sapta vā / yadyekavyañjanā bhavanti
# bdun nam zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ste /
yathā devādiṣu / aṣṭau vā / yadyubhayavyañjanā bhavanti / kiṃ punarubhayavyañjanā apyupapādukā bhavanti
# 'di ltar lha la sogs pa dag na'o / / brgyad ces bya ba ni gal te mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin na'o / / ci rdzus te skye ba yang mtshan gnyis pa yod dam zhe na /
bhavantyapāyeṣu
# ngan song dag na yod do /
evaṃ tāvat kāmadhātau / atha rūpadhātāvārūpyadhātau ca kathamityāha
# re zhig 'dod pa'i khams na ni de lta bu yin no / / 'o na gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams na ji lta bu yin zhe na /
ṣaḍ rūpeṣu / kāmapradhānatvāt kāmadhātuḥ kāmā iti nirdiśyate / rūpapradhānatvād rūpadhātū rūpāṇīti / sūtre 'pyuktaṃ ye 'pi te bhikṣavaḥ śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārupyā iti / tatra rūpadhātau ṣaḍḍindriyāṇi vipākaḥ parathamato labhyante
# gzugs na drug go zhes bya ba smos te / / 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa rnam zhes bstan la / / gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs rnams zhes bstan te / / mdo las kyang / / gang yang gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das te zhes gsungs so / / gzugs kyi khams de na ni dang po nyid du dbang po drug rnam par smin pa 'thob ste /
yānyeva kāmadhātāvavyañjanaiarupapādukaiḥ / ekamuttare
# 'dod pa'i khams na rdzus te skye ba mtshan ma med pa dag gis rnyed pa gang dag yin ba de dag nyid do /
rūpadhātorārūpyadhāturuttaraḥ / samāpattitaśca paratvādupapattitaśca pradhānataratvāt / tasmin ekameva jīvitendriyaṃ vipākaḥ prathamato labhyate nānyat
# gong mar gcig / / gzugs kyi khams pas ni gzugs med pa'i khams snyoms par 'jug pas ring ba'i phyir dang skye bas ches mchog yin pa'i phyir gong ma ste; der ni dang po nyid du srog gi dbang po gcig kho na rnam par smin pa thob ste / / gzhan ni ma yin no /
ukto lābhaḥ / tyāga idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ
# rnyed pa bshad zin to / / da ni gtong ba brjod par bya ste /
kasmindhātau mriyamāṇaḥ katīndriyāṇi nirodhayatīti
# khams gang du 'chi ba na dbang po zhig thams cad kyi tha mar gtong zhe na /
nirodhayatyuparamānnārūpye jīvitam manaḥ / upekṣāṃ caiva rūpe 'ṣṭau / rūpadhātau mriyalmāṇo 'ṣṭau nirodhayati / tāni ca trīṇi cakṣurādīni pañca / sarve hyupapādukāḥ samagrendriyā upapadyante mriyante ca
# gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni / / srog dang yid dang btang snyoms nyid / / 'gag par 'gyur ro gzugs na brgyad / / gzugs kyi khams su 'chi na phung po de dag dang mig la sogs pa lnga dang dbang po brgyad 'gag ste / / brdzus te skye ba thams cad ni dbang po rnams tshang bar skye zhing 'chi'o /
kāme daśa navāṣṭau vā / kāmadhātau mriyamāṇa ubhayavyañjanī daśendriyāṇi nirodhayati
# 'dod par bcu'am dgu 'am brgyad 'dod pa'i khams su 'chi na mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin na ni brgyad po de dag dang pho dang mo'i dbang po dang dbang po bcu 'gag par 'gyur ro /
tāni cāṣṭau strī puruṣendriye ca
# mtshan gcig pa zhig na ni dgu'o /
ekavyañjano nava / avyañjano 'ṣṭau
# mtshan med pa zhig yin na ni brgyad de /
sakṛnmaraṇa eṣa nyāyaḥ / kramamṛtyau tu catvāri
# cig car 'chi ba la ni tshu la de lta bu yin no / / rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi /
krameṇa tu mriyamāṇaścatvārīndriyāṇi nirodhayati / kāyajīvitamanaupekṣendriyāṇi
# rim gyis 'chi na lus dang srog dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dbang po bzhi 'gag ste /
nahyeṣāṃ pṛthagnirodhaḥ
# de rnams la ni so sor 'gag pa med do /
eṣa ca nyāyaḥ kliṣṭāvyākṛtacittasya maraṇe veditavyaḥ
# nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba la ni tshul de lta bu yin par rig par bya'o /
yadā tu kuśale cetasi sthito mriyate tadā / ṣubhe sarvatra pañca ca
# gang gi tshe dge ba'i sems la gnas te 'chi ba de'i tshe ni / / dge ba thams cad dag tu lnga /
kuśale cetasi mriyamāṇaḥ sarvatra yathoktamindriyāṇi nirodhayati / śraddhādīni ca pañcādhikāni
# dge ba'i sems la gnas te 'chi na thams cad du ji skad bshad pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhag par dad pa la sogs pa lnga 'gag ste /
eṣāṃ kuśale cetasyavaśyaṃbhāvaḥ / evamārūpyeṣvaṣṭau nirodhayati rūpeṣu trayodaśāeti vistareṇa gaṇanīyam / indriyaprakaraṇe sarva indriyadharmā vicāryante / atha katamacchrāmaṇyaphalaṃ katibhirindriyaiḥ prāpyate / navāptirantya phalayoḥ / navabhirindriyaiḥ praptirantyaphalayoḥ
# de rnams ni dge ba'i sems la gdon mi za bar yod do / / de ltar na gzugs med pa na ni brgyad 'gag par 'gyur ro / / gzugs na ni bcu gsum mo zhes rgyas par brtsi bar bya'o / / dbang po'i skabs su dbang po'i chos thams cad dpyad par bya ste / / dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gang zhig dbang po du dag gis 'thob ce na / / 'bras bu tha ma gnyis ni dbang po dgus 'thob bo /
ke punarantye / srota āpattiphalamarhattvaṃ ca
# yang tha ma gang dag yin zhe na / / rgyun du zhugs pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'o /
ke madhye / sakṛdāgāmiphalamanāgāmiphalaṃ ca
# bar ma gang dag yin zhe na / / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
tatra srota āpattiphalasya śraddhādibhirājñātāvīndriyavarjyairmanaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ ceti navabhiḥ
# de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dad pa la sogs pa dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dgus 'thob ste /
ājñāsyāmīndriyamānantaryamārge veditavyamājñendriyaṃ ca vimuktimārge
# kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni bar chad med pa'i lam la rig par bya'o / / kun shes pa'i dbang po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam la rig par bya'o /
ubhābhyāṃ hi tasya prāptirvisaṃyiogaprāpterāvāhakasanniśrayatvādyathākramam / arhattvamasya punaḥ śraddhādibhirājñāsyāmīndriyavarjyairmanaindriyeṇa sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāṃ cānyatameneti navabhiḥ
# gnyis kyang de 'thob ste / / go rims bzhin du bral ba'i 'thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang rten yin pa'i phyir ro / / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dad pa la sogs pa dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang yid kyi dbang po dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig dang dgus 'thob bo /
saptāṣṭnavabhirdvayoḥ / sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalayoḥ pratyekaṃ saptabhiraṣṭabhirnavabhiṣcendriyaiḥ prāptiḥ
# gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus / / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dag ni re re zhing dbang po bdun nam brgyad dam dgu dag gis 'thob ste /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ tāvadyadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ / pañcabhiḥ śraddhādibhirupekṣāmanaindriyābhyāṃ ceti
# ji lta zhe na / / re zhig gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang btang snyoms dang yid kyi dbang po dang dbang po bdun dag gis 'thob bo /
atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa tasyāṣṭabhirindriyai praptiḥ / ājñendriyamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati
# 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni des dbang po brgyad dag gis 'thob ste; brgyad pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no /
atha bhūyovītarāgaḥ prāpnoti tasya navabhiryeneva srota āpattiphalasya / anāgāmiphalaṃ yadyānupūrvikaḥ prāpnoti sa ca laukikena mārgeṇa tasya saptabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ
# ci ste phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste / / gang dag kho nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa kho na yin no / / gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po bdun gyis 'thob ste /
yathā sakṛdāgāmiphalasya
# lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ji lta ba bzhin no /
atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa tasyāṣṭabhistathaiva / atha vītarāgaḥ prāpnoti tasya navabhiḥ
# 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po brgyad kyis 'thob ste / / de dang 'dra'o / / ci ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste /
yathā srota āpattiphalasya / ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ
# rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ji lta ba bzhin no / / 'di ni khyad par yin te /
sukhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇāmanyatamaṃ bhavati / niśrayaviśeṣāt / yadāpyayamānupūrviko navame vimūktimārge tīkṣṇenriyatvā ddhyānaṃ praviśāti laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpyaṣṭābhirindriyairanāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti
# rten gyi bye brag las bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig yin no / / gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la / / rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsam gtan la 'jug pa de'i tshe yang dbang po brgyad kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob ste /
tatrahi navame vimuktimārge saumanasyendriyamaṣṭamaṃ / bhavatyānantaryamārge tūpekṣendriyameva nityamubhābhyāṃ ca tasya prāptiḥ
# de la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la ni yid bde ba'i dbang po brgyad pa yin no / / bar chad med pa'i lam la ni rtag tu btang snyoms kyi dbang po kho na ste / / de ni gnyi gas kyang 'thob bo /
atha lokottareṇa praviśāti tasya navabhirindriyaiḥ prāptiḥ
# 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pas 'jug na nad dbang po dgus 'thob ste /
ājñenriyaṃ navamaṃ bhavati
# dgu pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no /
yattarhyabhidharma uktaṃ katibhirindriyairarhattvaṃ prapnotītyāha ekādaśbhhiriti
# 'o na chos mngon pa las dbang po du zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob ce na / / smras pa /
tat kathaṃ navabhirityucyate / navabhireva tat prāpnoti
# bcu gcig gis 'thob po zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ji ltar dgu dag gis 'thob ces bshad ce na / / de ni dgu kho nas 'thob ste /
ekādaśabhirarhattavamuktaṃ tvekasya saṃbhavāt
# bcu gcig dag gis dgra bcom nyid / / 'ga' zhig srid phyir bshad pa yin /
asti saṃbhavo yadekaḥ pudgalaḥ parihāya parihāya sukhasaumanasyīpekṣābhirarhattvaṃ prāpnuyādata ekādaśabhirityuktam / natu khalu saṃbhavo 'sti sukhādīnāmekasmin kāle
# gang zag gcig 'ga' zhig yongs su nyams shing yongs su nyams nas bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa srid pa yod pas de'i phyir bcu gcig gis zhes bshad kyi / / bde ba la sogs pa dus gcig tu srid pa ni med do /
kathamanāgābhino 'pyeṣa prasaṅgo na bhavati
# 'di phyir mi 'ong ba la yang ji ltar thal bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
nahyasau parihīṇaḥ kadācitsukhendriyeṇa prāpnnoti na ca vītarāgapūrvī parihīyate
# 'di ni yongs su nyams phan chad nam yang bde ba'i dbang pos 'thob pa med do; / / 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba la ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yang med de /
tadvairāgyasya dvimārgaprāpaṇāt
# de'i 'dod chags dang bral ba ni lam gnyis kyis 'thob pa'i phyir ro /
idaṃ vicāryate / katamenendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ katibhiḥ avaśyaṃ samanvāgato bhavati
# dbang po gang zhig dang ldan na gdon mi za bar dbang po dag dang ldan pa dag yin zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste /
tatra / upekṣājīvitamanoyukto 'vaśyaṃ trayānvitaḥ / ya eṣāmupekṣādīnāmanyatamena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ tribhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatyebhireva
# de la btang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni / / yid dang ldan la nges gsum ldan / / gang zhig btang snyoms la sogs pa 'di dag las gang yang rung ba zhig dang ldan ba de ni gdon mi za bar dbang po gsum dag dang ldan ba yin te /
nahyeṣāmanyo 'ynena vinā samanvāgamaḥ / śeṣaistvaniyamaḥ
# de dag nyid dang ngo / / 'di dag ni phan tshun med na mi ldan pa yin gyi lhag ma rnams dang ni ma nges te /
syātsamanvāgataḥ syādasamanvāgataḥ / tatra tāvaccakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvendriyai rārūpyopapanno na samanvāgataḥ
# ldan pa yang yod mi ldan pa yang yod do / / de la re zhig mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce'i dbang po dag ni gzugs med par skyes pa dang mi ldan no /
kāmadhātau ca yenāpratilabdhavihīnāni / kāyendriyeṇārūpyopapanno na samanvāgataḥ
# 'dod pa'i khams na ni gang gis ma thob pa dang rnam par nyams pa dag dang mi ldan no / / lus kyi dbang pa ni gzugs med par skyes pa dang mi ldan no /
strīndriyeṇa rūpārūpyopapannaḥ / kāmadhatau yenāpratilabdhavihīnam / evaṃ puruṣendriyeṇa / sukhendriyeṇa caturdhyānārūpyopapannaḥ pṛthagjano na samanvāgataḥ / saumanasyendriyeṇa tṛtīyacaturthadhyānārūpyopapannaḥ pṛthagjana eva
# mo'i dbang po dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med par skyes pa dang mi ldan no / / 'dod pa'i khams na ni gang gis ma thob pa dang rnam par nyams pa dang mi ldan te / / pho'i dbang po yang de bzhin no / / bde ba'i dbang po dang ni bsam gtan bzhi pa dang gzugs med par skyes pa'i so so'i skye bo dang mi ldan no / / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang ni bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang gzugs med par skyes pa'i so so'i skye bo kho na dang mi ldan no /
duḥkhendriyeṇa rūpārūpyopapannaḥ / daurmanasyena kāmavītarāgaḥ / śraddhādibhiḥ samucchinnakuśalamūlaḥ
# sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med par skyes pa mi ldan no / / yid ma bde ba dang ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba mi ldan no / / dad pa la sogs pa dang ni dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad par mi ldan no /
ājñāsyāmīndriyeṇa pṛthagjanaphalathānasamanvāgatāḥ
# kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang ni so so'i skye bo dang 'bras bu la gnas pa dag dang mi ldan no /
ājñendriyeṇa pṛthagjanadarśanāśaikṣamārgasthāḥ / ājñātāvīndriyeṇa pṛthagjanaśaikṣaikṣyā asamanvāgatāḥ / apratipiddhāsvavasthāsu yathoktasamanvāgato veditavyaḥ / caturbhiḥ sukha kāyābhyāṃ / yaḥ sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ caturbhirindriyaistaiśca tribhirupekṣādibhiḥ sukhendriyeṇa ca / yaḥ kāyendriyeṇa so 'pi caturbhistaiśca tribhiḥ kāyendriyeṇa ca
# kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ni so so'i skye bo dang mthong ba dang mi slob pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams ni mi ldan no / / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang ni so so'i skye bo dang slob pa dag dang mi ldan no / / ma bkag pa'i gnas skabs dag tu ni ji skad bshad pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o / / bde lus ldan la bzhi dag dang / / gang zhig bde ba'i dbang po dang ldan bde ni gdon mi za bar btang snyoms la sogs pa gsum bo de dag dang bde ba'i dbang po dang dbang po bzhi dang ldan la / / gang zhig lus kyi dbang po dang ldan ba de yang gsum po de dag dang lus kyi dbang po bzhi dang ldan no /
pañcabhiścakṣurādimān / yaścakṣurindriyeṇa so 'vaśyaṃ pañcabhirupekṣājīvitamanaḥ kāyendriyaistena ca / evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvendriyairveditavyam / saumanasyī ca / yaścāpi saumanasyendriyeṇa so 'vaśyaṃ pañcabhirupekṣājīvitamanaḥsukhasaumanasyaiḥ / dvitīyadhyānajastṛtīyadhyānālābhī katamena sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgato bhavati / kliṣṭena tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikena / duḥkhī tu saptabhiḥ
# mig sogs ldan la lnga dang ldan / / gang zhig mig gi dbang po dang ldan ba de ni gdon mi za bar btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dang lus kyi dbang po dag dang de dang dbang po lnga dang ldan te / / rna ba dang sna dang lce'i dbang po dag dang ldan ba de yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o / / yid bde ldan yang / / gang zhig yid bde ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa de yang gdon mi za bar btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dang bde ba dang yid bde ba dang dbang po lnga dang ldan no / / bsam gtan gnyis par skyes pa bsam gtan gsum pa ma thob pa bde ba'i dbang po gang dag dang ldan pa yin zhe na / / bsam gtan gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang ldan no / / sdug bsngal ldan /
yo duḥkhendriyeṇa so 'vaśyaṃ saptabhiḥ kāyajīvitamanobhiścaturbhirvedanendriyaiḥ
# bdun dang gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang ldan bde ni gdon mi za bar lus dang srog dang yid dag dang tshor ba'i dbang po bzhi dang bdun dang ldan no /
strīndriyādimān
# mo'i dbang sogs ldan /
aṣṭābhiḥ / yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamaṣṭabhiḥ taiśca saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇaca
# brgyad dang gang zhig mo'i dbang po dang ldan pa de ni gdon mi za bar bdun po de dag dang mo'i dbang po dang brgyad dang ldan no /
ādiśabdena puruṣendriyadaurmanasyaśaraddhādīnāṃ saṃgrahaḥ
# sogs zhes bya ba'i sgras ni pho'i dbang po dang yid mi bde ba dang dad pa la sogs pa gzung ste /
tadvānapi pratyekamaṣṭābhiḥ samanvāgato bhavati / taiśca saptabhiraṣṭamena ca puruṣendriyeṇa
# de dag dang ldan pa ni re re zhing yang brgyad dang ldan pa yin te / / bdun po de dag dang pho'i dbang po dang ldan no /
evaṃ daurmanasyendriyeṇa / śraddhādimāṃstu taiśca pañcabhirupekṣājīvitamanobhiśca
# yid mi bde ba'i dbang po yang de dang 'dra'o / / dad pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni lnga po de dag dang btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dag dang ldan no /
ekādaśabhistvājñājñātendriyānvitaḥ
# kun shes ldan pa'i / / dbang po ldan la bcu gcig ldan /
ājñāta indriyamājñātendriyam / ya ājñātendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamekādaśabhiḥ sukhasaumanasyopekṣājīvitamanaśraddhādibahirājñendriyeṇa ca
# kun shes pa la dbang byed pas na kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'o / / gang zhig kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa de ni gdon mi za bar bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dang dad pa la sogs pa dag dang kun shes pa'i dbang po dang bcu gcig dang ldan no /
evamājñā tāvīndriyeṇāpi / taireva daśabhirājñātāvīndriyeṇa ca
# de bzhin du kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang ldan ba yang bcu po de dag nyid dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang ldan no /
ājñāsyāmīndriyopetastrayodaśabhiranvitaḥ
# kun shes byed pa'i dbang ldan la / / bcu gsum dag dang ldan ba yin /
katamaistrayodaśabhiḥ / manojīvitakāyendriyaiḥ catasṛbhirvedanābhiḥ śraddhādibhirājñāsyāmīndriyeṇa ca
# bcu gsum dag dang ldan zhe na / / yid dang srog dang lus kyi dbang po dag dang tshor ba'i dbang po bzhi dag dang dad pa la sogs pa dag dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang ldan no /
atha yaḥ srvālpaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhirindriyaiḥ
# yang gang zhig nang na nyung ba dag dang ldan ba de dbang po ji snyed cig dang ldan zhe na /
sarvālpairniḥśubho 'ṣṭābhirvinmanaḥkāyajīvitaiḥ / yuktaḥ
# dge med nang na nyung ldan pa / / lus tshor srog yid brgyad dang ldan /
samucchinnakuśamūlo niḥśubhaḥ
# dge med ne dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu chad pa ste /
sa sarvālpairaṣṭābhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ / pañcabhirvedanādibhiḥ kāyamanojīvitaiśca
# de nang na nyung ba dag dang ldan na tshor ba lnga dag dang lus dang yid dang srog dag dang dbang po brgyad dang ldan no /
vedanā hi vit vedayata iti kṛtvā
# tshor bar byed pa ni tshor ba ste /
vedanaṃ vā vit
# myong bar byed pa'i phyir ro /
yathā saṃpadanaṃ saṃpat / yathā ca niḥśāubhaḥ sarvālpairaṣṭābhirindriyairyuktaḥ / bālastathārūpye / bāla iti pṛthagjanasyākhyā
# yang na tshor ba ni tshor ba ste / / dper na phun sum tshogs pa la phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba bzhin no / / ji ltar dge ba med pa nang na nyung ba dag dang ldan na dbang po brgyad dag dang ldan pa ltar gzugs med byis pa'ang de bzhin te / / byis pa zhes bya ba ni so so'i skye bo'i ming ngo /
katamairaṣṭābhiḥ
# brgyad gang dag dang ldan zhe na /
upekṣāyurmanaḥśubhaiḥ / upekṣājīvitamanobhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca
# btang snyoms srog yid dge rnams dang btang snyoms dang srog dang yid dang dad pa la sogs pa dang ldan no /
ekāntakuśalatvāt śraddhādīni śubhagrahaṇena gṛhyante
# dge ba smos pa ni dad pa la sogs pa gzung bar bya ste / / gcig tu dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
ājñāsyāmīndriyādīnāmapi grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ / na
# kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa yang bsdus par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
aṣṭādhikārād dvālādhikārācca / atha yaḥ sarvabahubhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhiḥ
# brgyad kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir dang byis pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro / / yang gang zhig nang na dbang po mang po dag dang ldan ba de ji snyed cig dang ldan zhe na /
bahubhiryukta ekānnaviṃāśatyā 'malavarjitaiḥ
# mang por ldan na bcu dgu ste / / dri ma med rnams ma gtogs so /
anā sravaṇi trīṇi varjayitvā
# zag pa med pa gsum ma gtogs so /
sa punaḥ / dviliṅgaḥ
# de yang mtshan gnyis /
dvivyañjano yaḥ samagrendriyaḥ ekānnaviṃśatyā samanvāgataḥ
# mtshan gnyis pa dbang po tshang ba gang yin pa de ni bcu dgu dang ldan no /
kaścāparaḥ / āryo rāgī / avītarāgo 'pi śaikṣaḥ sarvabahubhirekānnaviṃśatyā samanvāgataḥ / ekaliṅgadvayamalavarjitaiḥ / ekaṃ vyañjanaṃ dve cānāsrave varjayitvā
# gzhan yang gang zhig ce na / / 'phags pa chags bcas te / / slob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba yang nang na mang po dang ldan na bcu dgu dang ldan te / / mtshan gcig dri med gnyis ma gtogs / / mtshan gcig dang zag pa med pa gnyis te /
ājñātāvīndriyaṃ dvayośācānyatarat / ukta indriyāṇāṃ dhātuprabhedaprasaṅgenāgatānāṃ vistareṇa prabhedaḥ / idamidānīṃ vicāryate
# kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang gnyis po las gang yang rung ba zhig ma gtogs so / / khams rab tu dbye ba'i zhar la 'ongs pa dbang po rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba rgyas par bshad zin to / / da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
kimete saṃskṛtā dharmā yathā bhinnalakṣaṇā evaṃ bhinnotpādā utāho niyatasahotpādā api kecitsanti
# ci 'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag ci ltar mtshan nyid tha dad pa de bzhin du tha dad par skye ba zhig yin nam / / 'on te kha cig nges par lhan cig skye ba'ang yod ce na /
santītyāha
# smras pa yod de /
sarva ime dharmāḥ pañca bhavanti / rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāścttaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca / tatrāsaṃskṛtaṃ naivotpadyate / rūpiṇāṃ tu dharmāṇāmayaṃ niyamaḥ / kāme 'ṣṭadravyako 'śabdaḥ paramāṇuranindriyaḥ / sarvasūkṣmo hi rūpasaṃghātaḥ paramāṇur ity ucyāte
# chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung ba dag dang sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dag dang 'dus ma byas dang lngar 'gyur ro / / de la 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba med pa nyid do / / chos gzugs can rnams kyi nges pa ni 'di yin te / / 'dod na dbang po med pa dang sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad / / thams cad las phra ba'i gzugs ni bsags pa'i rdul phra rab ces bya ste /
yato nānyataro vijñāyeta
# de las ches chung ba ni mi mngon no /
sa kāma ghātāvaśabdako 'nindriyaścāṣṭadravyaka utpadyate nānyatamena hīnaḥ / aṣṭo dravyāṇicatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri copādāyarūpāṇi rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni / sendriyastu paramāṇuraśabdako navadravyaka utpadyate daśadravyako vā / tatra tāvat / kāyendriyī navadravyaḥ / kāyendriyamatrāstīti so 'yaṃ kāyendriyī / tatra navadravyāṇi / tāni cāṣṭau kāyendriyaṃ ca / daśadravyo 'parendriyaḥ / aparamindriyaṃ yatra paramāṇau tatra daśa dravyāṇi / tānyeva nava cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvendriyāṇāṃ cānyatamam / saśabdā punarete paramāṇava utpadyamānā yathākramaṃ navadaśaikādaśa dravyakā utpadyante / asti hīndriyāvinirbhāgī śabdo 'pi ya upāttamahābhūtahetukaḥ
# de 'dod pa'i khams na sgra yang med dbang po yang med pa zhig yin na ni rdzas brgyad dang ldan par skye ste / / gang yang rung ba zhig med par ni ma yin no; / / rdzas brgyad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs bzhi ste / / gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams so / / rdul phra rab dbang po dang bcas la sgra med pa zhig yin na ni rdzas dgu 'am / / rdzas bcu dang ldan par skye ste / / de la re zhig / / lus dbang ldan la rdzas dgu'o / / 'di la lus kyi dbang po yod pas na 'di ni lus dbang ldan no / / de la rdzas dgu ni brgyad po dag dang lus kyi dbang po'o / / dbang po gzhan rdzas bcu'o / / dbang po gzhan gyi rdul phra rab gang la yod pa de la rdzas bcu ste / / dgu po de dag nyid dang mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce'i dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig go / / rdul phra rab de dag sgra dang bcas pa zhig tu skye na ni go rims bzhin du rdzas dgu dang bcu dang bcu gcig dang ldan bar skye ba na skye'o / / dbang po dang tha mi dad pa'i sgra yang yod de / / zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba gang yin pa'o /
kathamihāvinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścideva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina utpadyate kaścideva drava uṣṇo vā samudīraṇo vā
# ji ltar na 'byung ba rnams tha mi dad pa las 'di na 'dus pa kha cig kho na ni sra bar dmigs / / kha cig kho na ni gsher ba'am dro ba'am g yo bar dmigs she na /
yadyatra paṭutamaṃ prabhāvata udbhūtaṃ tasya tatropalabdhiḥ
# gang zhig gang na ches gsal zhing mthu'i sgo nas shas che ba de ni de na dmigs te /
sūcītūnī kalāpasparśavat saktulavaṇacūrṇarasavacca
# dper na khab dang sdong bu'i tshogs la reg pa lta bu dang phye dang lan tshva'i phye ma'i ro bzhin no /
kathaṃ punasteṣu śeṣāstitvaṃ gamyate / karmataḥ saṃgrahaghṛtipaktivyūhanāt
# yang ji ltar de dag na lhag ma rnams yod par khong du chud par bya zhe na / / las kyi sgo nas te / / sdud pa dang 'dzin pa dang smin pa dang g yo ba'i phyir ro /
pratyayalābhe ca sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ dravaṇā dibhāvāt apsu śaityātiśayādauṣṇyaṃ gamyata ityapare
# rkyen dang phrad na sra ba la sogs pa yang gsher ba la sogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / gzhan dag na re chu dag la grang ba'i khyad par gyi sgo nas dro ba yod par khong du chud do zhes zer ro /
avyati bhede 'pi tu syācchaityātiśayaḥ
# ma 'dres kyang khyad par yod par 'gyur te /
śabdavedanātiśayavat
# sgra dang tshor ba'i khyad par bzhin no /
bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ityapare
# gzhan dag na re de dag las de dag sa bon gyi sgo nas yod kyi rang gi ngo bor ni ma yin te /
santyasmin dāruskandhe vividhā dhātavaiti vacanāt / kathaṃ vāyau varṇasadbhāvaḥ
# shing gi phung po 'di la khams rnam pa sna tshogs yod do zhes gsungs pa'i phyir zhes zer ro / / rlung la kha dog ji ltar yod ce na /
śraddhānīya eṣo 'rtho nānumānīyaḥ
# don 'di ni dad par bya ba yin gyi rjes su dpag par bya ba ni ma yin no /
saṃspandato gandhagrahaṇāt tasya varṇāvyabhicārāt / rūpadhātau gandharasayorabhāva uktastena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭadravyakā ityuktarūpatvāt na punarucyante
# yang na 'dres par dri 'dzin pa'i phyir te / / de la ni kha dog 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro / / gzugs kyi khams na ni dri dang ro dag med par bshad pas des na yod pa'i rdul phra rab rnams ni rdzas drug dang bdun dang brgyad dang ldan pa zhes bshad zin pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir mi bshad do /
kiṃ punaratra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate āhosvidāyatanam / kiṃ cātaḥ / yadi dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate atyalpamidamucyate aṣṭadravyako navadaśādravyaka iti / avaśyaṃ hi taddravyasaṃsthānenāpi bhavitavyam / tasyāpi paramāṇusaṃcitatvāt
# yang ci 'dir rdzas kho na la rdzas su gzung ngam / / 'on te skye mched kyi rdzas la rdzas su gzung / / des na cir 'gyur / / gal te rdzas kho na la rdzas su gzung nas ni rdzas brgyad dang ldan pa dang rdzas dgu dang bcu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di ha cang nyungs par smras pa yin te / / de yang rdul phra rab bsags pa yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za par de la dbyibs kyang yod do /
