# gzhan dag na re mdo gzhan las ma rig pa'i rgyu tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin par gsungs te / / de yang mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas gti mug las skyes pa'i yid la byed pa'i rnyog pa skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir reg pa'i dus su bstan pa yin la / / mdo gzhan las ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la brten nas sred pa skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir tshor ba'i dus su yang ma rig pa gdon mi za bar yod do /
ataḥ sparśakāle bhavannayoniśomanaskāro vedanāsahavarttinyā avidyāyāḥ pratyayabhāvena siddha iti nāstyahetukatvamavidyāyā na cāṅgāntaramupasaṃkhyeyam
# de lta bas na reg pa'i dus na yod pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni tshor ba dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i ma rig pa'i rkyen gyi ngo bor grub pas ma rig pa rgyu med pa nyid kyang ma yin zhing / / yan lag gzhan gyis kha bskang bar yang mi bya'o /
nacāpyanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ
# thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
tasyāpyayoniśomanaskārasya punarmohajavacanādāvilo manaskāro mohaja iti / tattarhyetadantyatroktamiha punarvaktavyam
# gti mug las skyes pa'i yid la byed pa rnyog pa zhes 'byung bas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de yang gti mug las skyes par gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / 'o na ni de ni gzhan du gsungs pas 'dir yang brjod par bya dgos so zhe na /
na vaktavyam
# brjod par bya mi dgos so /
kathamanucyamānaṃ gamyate
# ma brjod bzhin du ji ltar go zhe na rigs pa las so /
yuktitaḥ / kayā yuktyā
# rigs pa gang gis she na /
nahi niravadyā vedanā tṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayībhavatyarhatāṃ na cāvīparītaḥ sparśaḥ kliṣṭāyā vedanāyāḥ / naca punarniravadyasyārhataḥ sparśo viparīta ityanayā yuktyā
# dgra bcom pa rnams kyi tshor ba ma rig pa med pa ni sred pa'i rkyen ma yin no / / phyin ci log med pa'i srid pa yang nyon mongs pa can gyi tshor ba'i rkyen ma yin la / / dgra bcom pa ma rig pa med pa'i reg pa yang phyin ci log ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pa 'dis so /
atiprasaṅga evaṃ prāpnoti / yauvat yuktyā saṃbhavati tāvadanuktam gamyata iti / tasmānna bhavatyayaṃ parihāraḥ / acodyameva tvetad
# ji snyed rigs pas 'thad pa de snyed ma bshad bzhin du yang go bar 'gyur na / / de lta na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te / / de lta bas na 'di ni lan ma yin no /
avidyājarāmaraṇayoḥ pareṇāṅgantarānabhidhānātsaṃsārasyādyantavattvaprasaṅgaḥ / nacāparipūrṇo nirdeśa iti
# ma rig pa dang rga shi dag las gzhan ma bstan pa'i phyir 'khor ba la thog ma dang tha ma dang ldan par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni klan kar mi rung ba kho na yin la ma tshang bar bstan pa yang ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
pravṛttisaṃmūḍebhyo vineyebhyaḥ kathaṃ paralokādihaloka ihalokācca punaḥ paralokaḥ saṃbadhyata ityetāvato 'trārthasya vivakṣitatvāt
# 'dir ni ji ltar na 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir / / 'jig rten 'di nas yang 'jig rten pha rol du 'brel snyam du 'jug pa la rmongs pa'i gdul ba rnams la de tsam zhig brjod par bzhed pa'i phyir la /
etasya ca pūrvamevottatvāt
# de ni / / sngon dang phyi mtha'i bar dag la /
pūrvāparāntamadhyeṣu saṃmoha vinivṛttaye
# rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro / / zhes bya ba 'dis sngar bshad zin pa'i phyir ro /
uktaṃ bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādaṃ vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi pratītyasamutpannāṃśca dharmānityathaka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ
# bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams kyang bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa / / yang de dag la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
śāstratastāvanna kaścit / ubhyaṃ hi sarve saṃskṛtā dharmā iti / kathamidānīmanutpannā evānāgatāḥ pratītyasamutpannā ityucyante
# re zhig bsnyan [*bstan?] bcos las ni khyad par cung zad kyang med de / / gnyi ga yang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad yin par gsungs so / / da ni ji ltar na ma 'ongs pa ma byung ba rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dag ces bya /
kathaṃ tāvadakṛtā evānāgatāḥ saṃskṛtā ucyante
# re zhig ma 'ongs pa ma byas pa rnams kho na yang ji ltar na 'dus byas dag ces bya /
ābhisamskārikayā cetanayā cetitatvāt / anāsravāḥ katham
# mngon par 'du byed pa'i sems pas bsams pa'i phyir ro / / zag pa med pa rnams ji ltar /
te 'pi cetitāḥ kuśalayā cetanayā prāptiṃ prati
# de dag kyang thob par bya ba'i phyir sems pa dge bas bsams pa dag yin no /
nirvāṇe 'pi prasaṅgaḥ / tajjātīyatvāttattatraivātideśo yathā naca tāvadrūpyate rūpaṃ cocyate tajjātīyatvādityadoṣaḥ
# mya ngan las 'das pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na / / de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir de kho na bzhin du mthun par bsgres pa yin te / / dper na re zhig gzugs su ni rung ba yang de dang rigs mthun pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba bzhin pas de ni nyes pa med do /
sūtrābhiprāyastvayamucyate
# mdo'i dgongs pa ni / / 'dir ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te /
heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ matam / hetubhūtamaṅgapratītyasamutpādaḥ samutpadyate 'smāditi dṛtvā phalabhūtamaṅga pratītyasamutpannam
# byung ba 'bras bu yin par 'dod / / ces pa 'di yin te / / rgyur gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin te / / 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / 'bras bur gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste /
evaṃ sarvāṇyaṅgānyubhayayathā sidhyanti / hetuphalabhavāt
# de ltar na yan lag thams cad kyang rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir gnyi gar 'grub par 'gyur ro /
na caivaṃ satyavyavasthā bhavantyapekṣābhedāt
# de lta yin yang ltos pa'i bye brag gis rnam par gzhag pa med pa yang ma yin te /
yadapakṣaya pratītyasamutpādo na tadevāpekṣya pratītyasamutpannaṃ hetuphalavat pitṛputravacca
# gang la ltos nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa yin pa de nyid la ltos nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ma yin te / / rgyu dang 'bras bu bzhin dang pha dang bu bzhin no / / gnas brtan bsam rdzogs na re /
sthavirapūrṇāśaḥ kilāha syāt pratīyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpannā dharmā iti / catuṣkoṭikaḥ / prathamā koṭiranāgatā dharmāḥ
# rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin la / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos dag ma yin pa yang yod do zhes bya ba mu bzhi ste / / mu dang po ni chos ma 'ongs pa rnams so /
dvitīyā 'rhataścaramāḥ / tṛtīyā tadanye 'tītapratyupannā dharmāḥ / caturthya saṃskṛtā dharmā iti
# gnyis pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos tha ma 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams so / / gsum pa ni de las gzhan pa'i chos 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams so / / bzhi pa ni chos 'dus ma byas rnams so zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
atra tu sautrāntikā vijñāpayanti
# 'dir mdo sde pa rnams rgol bar bye de /
kiṃ khalvetā iṣṭaya ucyante yā yasyeṣṭirāhosvitsūtrārthaḥ
# ci 'di dag gang zhig gang 'dod pa'i 'dod rgyal du 'chad pa zhig gam / / 'on te mdo'i don yin /
sūtrārtha ityāha / yadi sūtrārtho naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ
# smras pa / / mdo'i don yin no / / gal te mdo'i don yin no zhe na /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / yattāvaduktamā vasthika eṣa pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśa pañcaskandhikā avasthā dvādaśaṅgānī tyetadutsūtram
# 'di ni mdo'i don ma yin no / / ji ltar zhe na re zhig gnas skabs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga'i gnas skabs kyi yan lag bcu gnyis pa dag yin no zhes gang smras pa ni mdo dang 'gal ba yin no /
sūtre 'nyathā nirdeśād
# mdo las ni ma rig pa gang zhe na /
avidyā katamā / yattat pūrvānte 'jñānamiti vistareṇa / yacca nītārthaṃ na tat punarneyaṃ bhavatīti naiṣa sūtrārthaḥ
# smras pa / / sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa gang yin pa'o zhes rgyas par gsungs te / / nges pa'i don gang yin pa de ni drang ba'i don ma yin pas 'di ni mdo'i don ma yin no /
na vai sarvaṃ nirdeśato nītārthaṃ bhavati / yathāpradhānaṃ cāpi nirdeśāḥ kriyante
# bstan pa'i sgo nas thams cad nges pa'i don kho na yang ma yin gyi / / gtso bo ji lta bar bstan par yang mdzad de /
tadyathā hastipadopame pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ ityadhikṛtyāha keśā romāṇīti / santi ca tatrānye 'pi rūpādayaḥ / evamatrāpi yathāpradhānaṃ nirdeśaḥ syāt
# dper na glang po che'i rjes lta bu las / / sa'i khams gang zhe na zhes bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas 'di lta ste / / skra dang kha spu dag go zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / / de dag la ni gzugs la sogs pa gzhan yang yod de / / de bzhin du 'dir yang gtso bo ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa yin no /
aupasaṃhāra eṣaḥ / nahi tatra keśādayaḥ pṛthivīdhātunā nirdiśyante / yata eṣāmaparipūrṇo nirdeśaḥ syādapi tu keśādibhireva pṛthivīdhātuḥ tatra nirdeśyate / na ca keśādīnabhyatītyāpyasti pṛthivīdhāturiti saṃpūrṇa evāsya nirdeśaḥ
# 'di ni dpe ma yin te / / de las ni gang gis na de dag ma rdzogs par bstan par 'gyur ba sa'i khams kyi skra la sogs pa ston pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de las ni skra la sogs pa dag kho nas sa'i khams ston pa yin te / / skra la sogs pa ma gtogs pa yang sa'i khams med pas 'di rdzogs par bstan pa kho na yin no /
evamihāpyavidyādīnāṃ paripūrṇa eva nirdeśo na sāvaśeṣaḥ / nanu cābhyatītyāpi keśādīnaśrukheṭa śiṅghāṇakā diṣvasti pṛthivīdhātuḥ / so 'pi nirdiṣṭa eveti / yadva punaranyadapyasmin kāye khakūkhaṭaṃ kharagatamiti vacanāt bhavatu vā tathaivāvidyāvaśeṣo yadi śakyate darśayitum / jātyantarasya tvavidyāyāṃ kiṅkṛtaḥ prakṣepaḥ / yadyapi ca tāsvavasthāsu pañca skandhā vidyante yasya tu bhāvābhāvayoryasya bhāvābhāvaniyamaḥ tadevāṅgaṃ vyavasthāpayitum / satyapi ca pañcaskandhake 'rhataḥ saṃskārā na bhavanti pañcaskandhahetukāḥ / kiṃ tarhi
# de bzhin du 'di las kyang ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa kho nar bstan pa yin gyi lhag ma dang bcas par ni ma yin no / / skra la sogs pa ma gtogs par yang mchi ma dang mchil ma dang snabs la sogs pa dag la sa'i khams yod pa ma yin nam zhe na / / de yang bstan zin pa nyid de / / lus 'di la gzhan yang zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / yang na gal te de kho na dang 'dra bar bstan par nus na ma rig pa'i lhag ma yod la rag go / / rigs tha dad pa ni ma rig par ci'i phyir bstan / / gnas skabs de dag la phung po lnga char yod du zin kyang gang zhig yod dam med na gang yod pa dang med par nges pa de kho na yan lag yin no / / dgra bcom pa la phung po lnga yod kyang 'du byed rnams kyang mi 'byung la /
avidyāhetukā eva / tathā puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyopagaṃ ca vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇā dayaśceti
# bsod nams ma yin pa dang mi g yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa dang sred pa la sogs pa yang ma yin pas mdo'i don ni ji skad bstan pa kho na yin no /
yathānirdeśameva sūtrārthaḥ
# mu bzhir bshad pa gang yin pa de la yang /
yadapyuktaṃ heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaṃ phalaṃ yāvaccatuṣkoṭika iti / etadapyutsūtram
# gal te chos ma 'ongs pa rnams rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin nam rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
sūtre 'nyathā nirdeśāt / pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ
# ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar dag yin no zhes gsungs pa'i mdo dang 'gal lo /
yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇoktvā iti yā 'tra dharmatā dharmasthititā yāvadaviparyastatā ayamucyate pratītyasamutpāda iti / dhrmatā ca nāma dharmajātiḥ dharmāṇāṃ śailiḥ / ato yeyaṃ dharmatā ya eṣa niyamaḥ / avidyāyāmevasatyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti nonyathā / eṣa pratītyasamutpādo na hetureva
# yang na skye ba dang rga shi'i yan lag dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rnam par gzhag par mi 'dod par bya dgos pas cha gsum du dgod pa rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro / / de sde pa gzhan dag na re / / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung chos nyid 'di dag ni gnas pa kho na'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni 'dus ma byas yin no zhes zer ro /
yadapi catuṣkoṭikamuktaṃ tatra yadyanāgatāḥ dharmā na pratītyasamutpannāḥ sūtraṃ virudhyate / pratītyasamutpannā dharmāḥ katame / avidyā yāvajjātiḥ jarāmaraṇam / tayo ranāgatādhvavyavasthānaṃ naiṣṭavyamiti trikāṇḍavyavasthā bhidyate / asaṃskṛtaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti nikāyāntarīyāḥ / utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaiveyaṃ dharmateti vacanāt / tadetadabhiprāyavaśādevaṃ ca na caivam
# de ni dgongs pa'i dbang gas de bzhin yang yin la de bzhin yang ma yin no / / re zhig ji ltar de bzhin yin / / yang na ji ltar na de bzhin ma yin zhe na / / gal te dgongs pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung rtag tu ma rig pa la sogs pa dag la brten nas 'du byed la sogs pa rnam pa kun tu 'byung gi ma brten par ram / / gzhan dag la brten nas ni nam yang ma yin pas rten cing 'brel pa ni rtag pa'o zhes bya ba yin no zhe na ni /
kathaṃ tāvadevaṃ kathaṃ vā naivam / yadyayamabhiprāya utpādadvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā nityamavidyādīn pratītya saṃskārādīnāmanutpādo na kadācidapratītyānyadvā pratītyāto nitya iti evametaditi pratigrāhyam
# de de bzhin no zhes gzung bar bya'o / / 'on te dgongs pa 'di rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba dngos po gzhan rtag pa cung zad cig yod do zhes bya ba yin no zhe na ni de de lta ma yin no zhes dgag par bya'o / / ci'i phyir zhe na /
athāyamabhiprāyaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma kiñcit bhāvāntaraṃ nityamastīti / naitadevamiti pratiṣeddhavyam / kiṃ kāraṇam
# 'byung ba ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / / dngos po gzhan rtag pa ni mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid yin par yang mi rung ngo /
utpādasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāt / na ca nityaṃ bhāvāntaramanityasya lakṣaṇaṃ yujyate
# 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba yin pa'i phyir 'di ma rig pa la sogs pa dang ci zhig 'brel na gang gi phyir de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes brjod par 'gyur /
utpādaśca nāmotpatturbhavatīti ko 'syāvidyādibhirabhisambandho yatasteṣāṃ pratītyasamutpāda ityucyeta / padārthaścāsamartho bhavatīti nityaśa nāma pratītyasamutpādaśceti
# rtag pa zhes kyang bya la / / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes kyang bya bas tshig gi don kyang nus pa med par 'gyur ro / / yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don gang yin zhe na /
atha pratītyasamutpāda iti kaḥ padārthaḥ / pratiḥ prāptyartha eti gatyarthaḥ
# rten cing 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni phrad pa'i don to / / ai ti ni 'gro ba'i don to /
upasargavaśena dhātvarthapariṇāmāt prāpyeti yo 'rthaḥ so'rthaḥ pratītyeti / padiḥ sattārthaṃ samutpūrvaḥ prādurbhāvārthaḥ
# nye bar bsgyur ba'i dbang gis skad kyi dbyings kyi don yongs su bsgyur ba'i phyir phrad nas zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel te zhes bya ba'i don yin no / / pa da ni yod pa'i don to / / sam dang aud gong na yod na 'byung ba'i don to /
tena prātyayaṃ prāpya samudbhavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ
# des na phrad nas 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin no /
na yukta eṣa padārthaḥ
# tshig gi don 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
ekasya hi kartturdvayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakālāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ ktvāvidhirbhavati
# byed pa po gcig gis bya ba gnyis ni dus sngar te zhes bya ba'i rkyen yin te /
tadyathā snātvā bhuṅkta iti / nacāsau pūrvamutpādāt kaścidasti yaḥ pūrvaṃ pratītyottarakālamutpadyate / nacāpyakartu kāsti kriyeti / āha cātra
# dper na khrus byas te bza'o zhes bya ba lta bu yin no sngar phrad nas phyis skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba'i sngon rol na 'ga' yang med la / / byed pa po med pa'i bya ba yang med do / / 'dir smras pa /
pratyeti pūrvamutpādādyadyasattvānna yujyate
# gal te 'byung sngon phrad nas yin / / med phyir rung ba ma yin no /
saha cet ktvā na siddho 'tra pūrvakālavidhānata iti
# gal te lhan cig 'dir de ni / / ma grub sngon du byed phyir ro /
naiṣa doṣaḥ
# 'di ni nyes pa med de /
idaṃ tāvadyaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ śābdikaḥ
# re zhig sgra pa la gnas skabs gang gis chos zhig skye /
kimavastho dharmaḥ utpadyate varttamāna utāho 'nāgate iti / kiṃ cātaḥ / yadi varttamāna utpadyate / kathaṃ varttamāno yadi notpannaḥ
# da lta'i 'am 'on te ma 'ongs pa zhig ces bya ba 'di bri bar bya'o / / de las cir 'gyur / / ci ste da lta'i zhig skye'o zhe na ni / / gal te ma skyes na ji ltar da ltar yin /
utpannasya vā punarutpattāvanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ / athānāgata utpadyate kathamasataḥ kartṛtvaṃ siddhatyakartṛkā vā kriyeti / ato yadavastha utpadyate tadavastha eva pratyeti
# 'on te skyes zin pa zhig yang skye na ni thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro / / ci ste ma 'ongs pa zhig skye'o zhe na / / med pa ji ltar byed pa po nyid dam / / byed pa po med pa'i bya ba 'grub / / de'i phyir gnas skabs gang skye ba'i gnas skabs de nyid dang phrad nas zhes bya ba bzhin no /
kimavasthaścotpadyate
# gnas skabs gang zhig skye zhe na /
utpādābhimukho 'nāgataḥ
# skye ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i ma 'ongs pa ste /
tadavastha eva pratyayaṃ pratyetītyucyate / aniṣpannaṃ cedaṃ yaduta śābdikīyaṃ kartṛkriyāvyavasthānaṃ bhavatītyeṣa karttā bhūtirityeṣā kriyā
# gnas skabs de kho na rkyen dang phrad nas zhes bya'o / / sgra pa'i 'di lta ste / / byed pa po dang bya ba rnam par 'jog pa 'di yang grub pa ma yin te / / skye'o zhes bya ba 'di ni byed pa po yin la /
na cātra bhaviturarthāt bhūtimanyāṃ kriyāṃ paśyāmaḥ
# skye zhes bya ba 'di ni bya ba yin na 'di la skye'o zhes bya ba'i don las bya ba gzhan yang ma mthong ngo /
tasmādacchalaṃ vyavahāreṣu / eṣa tu vākyārthaḥ / asmin satyasya bhāvaḥ asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti yo 'rthaḥ so 'rthaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti / āha cātra
# de lta bas na tha snyad dag la klan ka med do / / tshig gi don ni 'di yod na 'di 'byung / / 'di skyes pas 'di skye zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to zhes bya ba 'di yin no / / 'dir bshad pa /
asannutpadyate yadvat pratyetyapi tathā 'tha san
# ji ltar med pa skye ba ltar / / med pa phrad pa'ang de dang 'dra /
utpanna utpadyata ityaniṣṭhā 'san purā 'pi vā / sahakāle 'pi ca ktvā 'sti dīpaṃ prāpya tamo gatam / āsyaṃ vyādāya śete ca paścāccetkiṃ na saṃvṛte
# skyes pa skye na mthar thug med / / 'on te snga na yod na 'ang rung / / lhan cig pa la 'ang de yod de / / mar me byung nas mun pa med / / kha gdangs nyal bzhin gal te phyis / / btsums pa la yang ci phyir min /
anye punarasya codyasya parihārārthamanyathā parikalpayanti / pratirvīpsārthaḥ
# gzhan dag ni klan ka 'di yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir don gzhan du yongs su rtog par byed do / / rten cing 'bral pa ni zlos pa'i don yin no / / sam ni 'du ba'i don yin no /
itau sādhava ityā anavasthāyinaḥ
# a'itya ni 'gro bar rung ba ste mi sdod pa'o /
utpūrvaḥ padiḥ prādurbhāvārthaḥ
# aung gong na yod pa'i pad ni 'byung ba'i don te /
tāṃ tāṃ kāraṇa sāmagrīṃ prati ityānāṃ samavāyenotpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti / eṣā tu kalpanā 'traiva kalpyate / iha kathaṃ bhaviṣyati cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānamititi / kimarthaṃ punarbhagavān paryāyadvayamāha asmin satīdaṃ bhavati asyotpādādidamutpadyate iti
# 'di skad du tshogs pa de dang de na 'gro bar rung ba rnams 'dus nas skye ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o zhes bshad pa yin no / / rtogs pa 'di ni 'di kho na la rab tu brtag tu rung gi mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes bya ba 'di la ji ltar rung / / yang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di yod na 'di 'byung / / 'di skye bas 'di skye'o zhes rnam grangs gnyis gsungs she na /
avadhāraṇārtham
# nges par gzung ba'i don te /
yathā 'nyatrāha avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti nānyatrāvidyāyāḥ saṃskārā iti
# dper na gzhan las ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams 'byung gi / / ma rig pa'i rkyen med par 'du byed rnams ma yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
aṅgaparaṃparāṃ vā darśayitum / asminnaṅge satīdaṃ bhavati asya punaraṅgasyotpādādidamutpadyata iti
# yang na yan lag 'di yod na 'di 'byung ngo / / yan lag 'di skyes pas yan lag gzhan skye'o zhes yan lag brgyad par bstan pa'i phyir ro /
janmaparaṃparāṃ vā / pūrvānte sati madhyānto bhavati madhyāntasyotpādādaparānta utpadyata iti
# yang na sngon gyi mtha' yod na da ltar gyi mtha' 'byung ngo / / da ltar gyi mtha' skyes pas phyi ma'i mtha' skye'o zhes tshe brgyud par bstan pa'i phyir ro /
sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa pratyayabhāvaṃ darśayati / kadāciddhi samanantaramavidyāyāḥ saṃskārā bhavanti kadācit pāraṃparyeṇeti
# yang na res 'ga' ni 'du byed rnams ma rig pa'i mjug thogs su 'byung ngo / / res 'ga' ni brgyud nas so zhes mngon sum dang brgyud nas rkyen gyi ngo bor bstan pa'i phyir ro /
ahetunityahetuvādapratiṣedhārthamityapare / nāsati heto bhāvo bhavati na cānutpattimato nityāt prakṛtipuruṣādikātkiñcidutpadyata iti / asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ pūrvapadasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti / asyotpādādimutpadyata ityanenaivobhayavādapratiṣedhasiddheḥ
# gzhan dag na re rgyu med na dngos po mi 'byung la / / rang bzhin dang skyes bu la sogs pa skye ba med pa dang ldan pa rtag pa las kyang cung zad kyang mi skye'o zhes rgyu med pa dang rgyu rtag par smra ba dgag pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te / / rtog pa 'di la ni tshig snga ma smos pa don med par 'gyur te / / 'di skyes pas 'di skye'o zhes bya ba 'di kho nas smras pa gnyi ga dgag pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro /
santi tarhi kecidya ātmani satyāśrayabhūte saṃskārādīnāṃ bhāvaṃ parikalpayanti avidyādīnāṃ cotpādāttadutpattim / atastām kalpanāṃ paryudāsayitumidaṃ nirdhārayāṃvabhūva yasyaivotpādādyadutpadyate tasminneva sati tat bhavati nānyasmin
# 'o na ni gang lags bdag rten du gyur pa yod pas 'du byed la sogs pa rnams 'byung ngo / / ma rig pa la sogs pa skyes pas de dag skye bar rtog par byed pa yod pas de'i phyir rtog pa de bsal bar byas pa'i phyir gang zhig skyes pas gang skye ba ni de nyid yod pas de 'byung gi / / gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes 'di nges par gzung ba mdzad pa yin te /
yadutā vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatiti
# 'di lta ste / / ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar yin no /
aprahīṇotpattijñāpanārthamityācāryāḥ / avidyāyāmaprahīṇāyāṃ saṃskārā na prahīyante / tasyā evotpādādutpadyanta iti vistaraḥ
# slob dpon dag na re / / ma rig pa ma spangs na 'du byed rnams mi spong la de nyid skyes pas skye bar 'gyur ro zhes ma spangs pa dang skye bar 'gyur ba rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / / gzhan dag na re rgyu'i rgyun ji srid pa de srid du 'bras bu'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
sthityutpattisaṃdarśanārthamityapare / yāvat kāraṇasrotastāvat kāryasroto bhavati
# rgyu nyid skyes pas 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas pa dang skye ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te /
kāraṇasyaivacotpādāt kāryamutpadyata iti / utpāde tvadhikṛte kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sthitivacanasya bhinnakramaṃ ca bhagavān kimarthamācakṣita prāk sthitiṃ paścādutpoādam / punarāha asmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti kārye sati kāraṇasya vināśo bhavatīti
# 'byung ba'i dbang du mdzad pa yin na gnas pa'i tshig tu thal ba ci zhig yod / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ci'i phyir rim pa mi mthun par sngar ni gnas pa dang phyis ni skye ba gsungs par 'gyur / / yang smras pa / / 'di yod na 'di 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu yod na rgyu 'jig par 'byung ba yin no /
syānmata mahetukaṃ tarhi kāryamutpadyata ityata āha nāhetukam / yasmādasyotpādādidamutpadyata iti / eṣa cetsūtrārtho 'bhaviṣyadasmin satīdaṃ na bhavatītyevācakṣata
# 'o na ni rgyu med pa las 'bras bu 'byung ngo snyam du sems par 'gyur bas smras pa / / de'i phyir rgyu med pa las 'byung ba ma yin te / / 'di ltar na 'di skyes pas 'di skye'o zhes bka' stsal to / / gal te mdo'i don de yin par gyur na ni 'di yod pas 'di mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba kho nar bka' stsal par 'gyur la /
pūrvaṃ ca tāvat kāryasyotpādāne vācakṣata paścādasmin satīdaṃ na bhavatīti / evaṃ hi sādhuḥ kramo bhavati
# re zhig sngar ni 'bras bu skye ba kho na yin la / / phyis ni 'di yod na 'di mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal par 'gyur te / / de ltar na go rims legs pa yin no /
itarathā tu pratītyasamutpādaḥ katama ityāderarthe kaḥ prakramo vināśavacanasya / tasmānnaiṣa sūtrārthaḥ / kathaṃ puna rvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvat jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇāmiti
# gzhan du na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba'i skabs su 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa gang zhig yin / / de lta bas na de ni mdo'i don ma yin no / / yang ji ltar na ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yin pa nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar dag yin zhe na /
ābhisaṃbandhamātraṃ darśayiṣyāmaḥ / bālo hi pratītyasamutpannaṃ saṃskāramātramidamityaprajānan ātmadṛṣṭyasmimānābhiniviṣṭa ātmanaḥ sukhārthamaduḥkhārthaṃ vā kāyādibhistrividhaṃ karmārabhate āyati sukhārthaṃ puṇyaṃ sukhāduḥkhāsukhārthamānaijjamaihikasukhārthamapuṇyaṃ tasyāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ karmākṣepavaśācca vijñānasaṃatatistāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gacchati
# 'brel pa tsam zhig bstan par bya ste / / byis pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'du byed tsam 'di mi shes pas bdag tu lta ba dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal la mngon par zhen cing bdag nyid bde ba'i don tam / / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i don du lus la sogs pa dag gis las rnam pa gsum rtsom ste / / tshe phyi ma la bde ba'i don du bsod nams bde ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i don du ni mi g yo ba /
jvālāgamanayogenāntarābhavasaṃbandhāt / tadanyasaṃskārāpratyayaṃ vijñānam / evaṃ ca kṛtvā tadupapannaṃ bhavati vijñānāṅganirdeśe vijñānaṃ katamat / ṣaḍvijñānakāyā iti / vijñānapūrvakaṃ punastasyāṃ tasyāṃ gatau nāmarūpaṃ jāyate pañcaskandhakaṃ kṛtsnajanmānugatam / vibhaṅge mahānidānaparyāye caivaṃ nirdeśāt
# tshe 'di la bde ba'i don du bsod nams ma yin pa rtsom ste; de dag ni 'di'i ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed dag yin no / / las kyi 'phen pa'i dbang gis rnam par shes pa'i rgyun srid pa bar ma dang 'brel pa'i phyir me 'bar ba 'gro ba'i tshul du 'gro ba de dang der 'gro bar 'gyur te / / de ni 'di'i 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin no; / / de ltar bshad na rnam par shes pa'i yan lag bstan pa las / / rnam par shes pa gang zhe na / / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug go zhes bshad pa de 'thad pa yin no / / yang rnam par shes pa sngon du 'gro ba'i ming dang gzugs phung po lnga po 'gro ba de dang der skye bar 'gyur te / / rnam par 'byed pa las de skad bstan pa'i phyir ro /
tathā nāmarūpaparipākātkrameṇa ṣaḍāyatanam / tato viṣayasaṃprāptau satyāṃ vijñānasaṃbhava iti / trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sukhādivedanīyaḥ / tatastrividhā vedanā
# de'i 'og tu ming dang gzugs yongs su smin pa'i rim gyis skye mched drug go / / de'i 'og tu yul dang phrad na rnam par shes pa skye bas gsum 'dus pa las bde ba la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa'o / / de'i 'og tu tshor ba rnam pa gsum mo /
tatstṛṣṇā / duḥkhotpīḍitasya sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ kāmatṛṣṇā
# de'i 'og tu sred pa ste / / sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i tshor ba bde ba la ni 'dod pa'i sred pa'o /
sukhāyāmaduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ ca rūpatṛṣṇā / aduḥkhāsukhāyāmārupyatṛṣṇā / tata iṣṭavedanātṛṣṇāyāḥ kāmādīnāmutpādanam
# bde ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la ni gzugs kyi sred pa'o / / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa la ni gzugs med pa'i sred pa'o / / de'i 'og tu tshor ba yid du 'ong ba la sred pa las 'dod pa la sogs pa nye bar len te /
tatra kāmāḥ pañca kāmaguṇāḥ / dṛṣṭayo dvāṣaṣṭiryathā brahmajālasūtre
# de la 'dod pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag go / / lta ba dag ni drug cu rtsa gnyis te / / tshangs pa'i dra ba las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no /
śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyaviratiḥ / vrataṃ kukkuragovratādīni
# tshul khrims ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims spong ba'o /
yathā ca nirgranthādīnāṃ nagno ghavatyacelaka iti vistaraḥ / brāhmaṇapāśupataparibrājakādīnāṃ ca daṇḍājinabhasmajaṭātridaṇḍamauṇḍyādisamādānam / ātmavādaḥ punarātmabhāvaḥ
# brtul zhugs ni khyi dang ba lang gi brtul zhugs la sogs pa dang ji skad du gcer bu pa la sogs pa rnams ni sgren mo gos med pa yin no zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu dang bram ze dang phyugs bdag pa dang kun tu rgyu la sogs pa dag dbyu gu dang g yang gzhi dang ral bu dang thal ba dang dbyu gu gsum dang sgre bo la sogs pa yang dag par len pa'o / / bdag tu smra ba ni lus te /
ātmeti vādo 'sminnityātmavādaḥ
# de la bdag tu smra ba yod pas na bdag tu smra ba'o /
ātmadṛṣṭyasmimānāvityapare / kathamanayorātmavādatvam / ābhyāmātmeti vacanāt / ātmano hyasattvādātmavādopādānamityucyate / prajñaptimātrakasyopādānāt / yathokta mātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito natvatrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā iti
# gzhan dag na re bdag tu lta ba dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal yin no zhes zer te / / 'di gnyis ji ltar na bdag tu smra ba nyid yin no zhe na 'di gnyis kyang bdag go zhes smra ba'i phyir ro / / bdag med pa'i phyir bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa zhes bya ste / / skad du dge slong dag bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa btags pa'i rjes su lhung bar zad kyi / / 'di la bdag gam bdag gi ni med do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
teṣāmupādānaṃ teṣu yaśchandarāgaḥ
# de dag nye bar len pa ni de dag la 'dun pa dang 'dod chags gang yin pa ste /
evaṃ hi bhagavatā sarvatrākhyātam upādānaṃ katamat
# bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad las ji skad du nye bar len pa gang zhe na /
yo 'tracchandarāgaṃ iti / upādānapratyayaṃ punaḥ paunarbhavikaṃ karmopacīyate
# 'di la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa'o zhes bshad pa lta bu'o / / yang len pa'i rkyen gyis yang srid pa'i la sogs par byed pa de ni srid pa yin te mdo las /
tadbhavaḥ / yadapyānanda karmāyatyāṃ punarbhāvābhinivartamkamidamatra bhavasyeti sūtrāt
# kun dga' bo tshe phyi ma la yang srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i las gang yin pa de ni 'dir srid pa yang yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
bhavapratyayaṃ punarvijñānāvakrāntiyogena / anāgataṃ janma jātiḥ pañcaskandhikā
# srid pa'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'jug pa'i tshul du ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba ni skye ba yin te / / phung po lnga po yin no /
jātau satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yathā niriṣṭaṃ sūtre / evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo ghavatīti
# skye ba yod na rga shi 'byung ste / / mdo las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o / / de ltar 'di 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o /
kevalasyetyātmīyarahitasya / mahato duḥkhaskandhasyetyanādyanantasya duḥkhasamūhasya
# sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi tshogs thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o /
samudayo bhavatīti pradurbhāvaḥ
# yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skye ba'o /
sa eva tu vaibhāṣikanyāyo yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ / athāvidyeti ko 'rthaḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba'i lugs ni sngar bshad ba gang yin pa de kho na yin no / / yang ma rig pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin /
yā na vidyā / cakṣurādiṣvapi prasaṅgaḥ
# rig pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'o / / mig la sogs pa dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
vidyāyā abhāvastarhi
# 'o na ni rig pa med pa yin no /
evaṃ sati na kiñcit syāt
# de lta na ci yang ma yin par 'gyur te /
na caitat yuktam
# de yang rig pa ma yin no /
tasmāt / vidyāvipakṣo dharmo 'nyo 'vidyā 'mitrānṛtādivat
# de lta bas na / / rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs chos gzhan / / ma rig mi mdza' brdzun sogs bzhin /
yathā mitraviparyayeṇa tadvipakṣabhūtaḥ kaścidamitro bhavati na tu yaḥ kaścidanyo mitrānnāpi mitrābhāvaḥ
# ji ltar mdza' bo zhes bzlog na de'i mi mthun pa'i sa phyogs su gyur pa mi mdza' pa 'ga' zhig yod kyi / / mdza' bo las gzhan pa gang yin pa yang ma yin la /
ṛtaṃ cocyate satyam / tadvipakṣabhūtaṃ vākyamanṛtaṃ bhavati
# mdza' bo med pa yang ma yin pa dang bden pa zhes bya ba ni bden pa'o /
adharmānarthākāryādayaśca dharmādipratidvandvabhūtāḥ / evamavidyā 'pi vidyāyāḥ pratidvandvabhūtadharmāntaramiti draṣṭavyam
# de mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa'i tshig ni mi bden pa yin pa dang chos ma yin pa dang don ma yin pa dang bya ba ma yin pa la sogs pa yang chos la sogs pa'i mi mthun par gyur pa de bzhin du ma rig pa yang rig pa'i mi mthun par gyur pa chos gzhan zhig tu blta bar bya'o /
kuta etat
# 'di ga las she na /
pratyayabhāvenopadeśāt
# rkyen gyi dngos por bstan pa'i phyir ro /
api ca / saṃyojanādivacanāt / saṃyojanaṃ bandhanamanuśaya ogho yogaścāvidyocyate sūtreṣu / na cābhāvamātraṃ tathā bhavitumarhati / na cāpi cakṣurādayaḥ / tasmāddharmāntaramevāvidyā / yathā tarhi kubhāryā abhāryetyucyate kuputraścāputraḥ / evamavidyā 'pyastu
# gzhan yang kun sbyor sogs kyi phyir / / mdo dag las ma rig pa ni kun tu sbyor ba dang 'ching ba dang phra rgyas dang chu bo dang sbyor ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / / med pa tsam ni de lta bu yin par 'ongs pa ma yin la mig la sogs pa yang ma yin no / / de lta bas na ma rig pa ni chos gzhan kho na zhig yin no / / 'o na ni dper na chung ma ngan pa la chung ma ma yin zhes bya ba dang bu ngan pa la bu ma yin pa zhes bya ba ltar ma rig pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
kuprajñā cenna darśanāt
# gal te / / shes rab ngan pa'o min lta phyir /
kutsitā hi prajña kliṣṭā / sā ca dṛṣṭisvabhāvā iti nāvidyā yujyate
# smad pa'i shes rab ni nyon mongs pa can yin na de yang lta ba'i rang bzhin yin pas ma rig pa yin par mi rung ngo /
yā tarhi na dṛṣṭiḥ sā bhaviṣyati / sā 'pi bhavituṃ nārhati
# 'o na ni gang lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa de yin par 'gyur ro / / de yang yin par mi 'os so /
kiṃ kāraṇam / dṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktatvāt
# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / lta ba de dang mtshungs ldan phyir /
avidyā cet prajñā 'bhaviṣyanna dṛṣṭistayā yujyate saṃprāyokṣyata / dvayoḥ prajñādravyayorasaṃprayogāt
# gal te ma rig pa shes rab yin par gyur na shes rab kyi rdzas nyid mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir lta ba de dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ro /
itaśca / prajñopakleśadeśanāt / rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ nāvamucyate avidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatītyuktam sūtre / na ca saiva prajñā tasyāḥ prajñāyā upakleśo yukta iti
# shes rab nyon mongs bstan phyir ro / / zhes bya ba 'di las kyang 'grub ste / / mdo las / / 'dod chags kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sems ni rnam par mi 'grol lo / / ma rig pas nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i shes rab ni rnam par mi 'dag go zhes gsungs te /
yathā cittasyānyo bhinnajātīya upakleśo rāga evaṃ prajñāyā avidyā / kiṃ punarevaṃ neṣyate
# shes rab de nyid shes rab de'i nyon mongs pa 'dod chags rigs pa ma yin pas ji ltar sems kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa 'dod chags rigs tha dad pa gzhan yin pa ltar shes rab kyi ma rig pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
kliṣṭayā prajñayā kuśalā prajñā vyavkīryamāṇā na viśudhyati / ato 'sau tasyā upakleśa iti
# yang ci'i phyir 'di ltar shes rab nyon mongs pa can dang shes rab dge ba 'dres na rnam par mi 'dag pas de'i phyir 'di de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yin par mi 'dod /
yadvāpi rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ na vimucyate / kiṃ tadavaśyaṃ rāgaparyavasthitaṃ bhavati
# 'dod chags kyis nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sems rnam par mi 'grol ba gang yin pa de yang gdon mi za bar 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa yin nam ci /
uapahataṃ tu tattathā rāgeṇa bhavati yanna vimucyate
# gang rnam par mi 'grol ba de ni 'dod chags kyis de ltar nye bar bcom pa yin la /
tāṃ punrbhāvanāṃ vyāvartayato vimucyate
# bag chags rnam par bzlog pa ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro /
evamavidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatītyavidyopahatāṃ pariklpayāmaḥ
# de bzhin du ma rig pas nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i shes rab rnam par mi 'dag pas ma rig pas nye bar bcom pa yin par yongs su brtag par bya'o /
ko hi parikalpayan vāryate
# yongs su rtog pa la ni su zhig bzlog ste /
jātyantarameva tvavidyāṃ varṇayanti / yo 'pi manyate sarvakleśā avidyeti tasyāpyata eva vyudāsaḥ / sarvakleśasvabhāvā 'pi satī saṃyojanādiṣu pṛthagnocyeta dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyeta
# ma rig pa rigs gzhan kho na zhig yod do zhes brjod do / / gang yang nyon mongs pa can thams cad ma rig pa yin no snyam du sems pa de'i yang 'di nyid kyis bsal ba yin te / / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin na kun tu sbyor ba la sogs pa'i nang du yang logs shig tu bshad par mi 'gyur zhing /
anyena vā kleśena dṛṣṭyādīnāṃ paraṃparāsaṃprayogāt cittamapi cāvidyopakleṣṭamevoktaṃ bhavet / atha mataṃ viśeṣaṇārthaṃ tathoktamiti / prajñāyāmapyavidyāviśeṣaṇaṃ karttavyaṃ bhavet / bhavatvavidyā dharmāntaraṃ kastu tasyāḥ svabhāvaḥ
# lta ba la sogs pa phan tshun mtshungs par ldan pa med pa'i phyir lta ba 'am nyon mongs pa gzhan dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur la / / sems kyang ma rig pas nye bar nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa kho nar bshad par 'gyur ro / / 'on te bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir de skad du bshad do zhes bya bar 'dod na ni shes rab la yang ma rig pa bye brag tu bya dgos par 'gyur ro / / ma rig pa chos gzhan zhig yin la rag na de'i rang bzhin ci yin /
satyavanna karmaphalānāmasaṃprakhyānam / etaccaiva na jñāyate kimidamasaṃprakhyānaṃ nāmeti
# bden pa dang dkon mchog dang las dang 'bras bu rnams mi gsal ba'o / / mi gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin pa 'di yang mi shes so /
yadi yanna saṃprakhyānaṃ saṃprakhyānābhāve 'pi tathaiva doṣo yathā avidyāyām
# gal te gsal ba ma yin pa zhig gam / / gsal ba med pa zhig yin na ni ma rig pa la ni ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du skyon du 'gyur ro /
atha saṃprakhyānavipakṣabhūtaṃ dharmāntaram / tadidaṃ tathaiva na jñāyate kiṃ taditi / evañjātīyako 'pi dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśo bhavati / tadyathā cakṣuḥ katamat
# 'on te gsal ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa / / chos gzhan zhig yin no zhe na yang de bzhin du de ci yin pa 'di mi shes so zhe na / / chos rnams bstan pa de lta bu yang yod de / / dper na mig gang zhe na /
yo rūpaprasādaścakṣurvijñānasyāśraya iti / asmīti sattvamayatā 'vidyete bhadantadharmatrātaḥ / kā punarasmimānādanyā mayatā
# gzugs dang ba mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang btsun pa chos skyob na re nga'o snyam du sems can la 'jug pa ni ma rig pa'o zhes zer ro / / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal las gzhan pa'i 'jug pa gang zhig yin zhe na / / mdo las bdag gis de ltar shes /
yā 'sau sūtra uktā so 'hamevaṃ jñātvā evaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāsāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ mayatānāṃ sarveṣāmahaṅkāramamakārāsmimānābhiniveśānuśayānāṃ prahāṇāt parijñānānniśchāyo nivṛta iti / astyeṣā mayatā
# de ltar mthong ste / / sred pa thams cad dang lta ba thams cad dang 'jug pa thams cad dang ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal la mngon par zhen pa'i phra rgyas thams cad spangs shing yongs su shes nas grib ma med par mya ngan las 'das so zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de yin no; /
sā tviyamavidyeti kuta etat / yata eṣā nānyaḥ kleśaḥ śakyate vaktum / nanu cānyo māna eva syāt
# 'jug pa de yod kyang de ni ma rig pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na 'di ltar nyon mongs pa gzhan yin no zhes brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro / / nga rgyal gzhan yang yod pa kho na ma yin nam zhe na /
atra punarvicāryamāṇe bahu vaktavyaṃ jāyate / tasmāttiṣṭhatvetat
# 'di la dpyad par chad na brjod pa mang por gyur te / / de lta bas na 'di ni bzhag go /
atha nāmarūpamiti ko 'rthaḥ
# yang ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di'i don ci zhe na /
rūpaṃ vistareṇa yathoktam / nāma tvarūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ
# gzugs ni rgya cher bshad pa yin no / / ming ni gzugs can min phung po /
kiṃ kāraṇam / nāmendriyārthavaśenārtheṣu namatīti nāma
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / ming dang dbang po dang don gyi dbang gis don rnams la gzhol bas na ming ngo /
katamasya nāmno vaśena
# ming gang gi dbang gis she na /
yadidaṃ loke pratītaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāmarthānāṃ pratyāyakaṃ gauraśvo rūpaṃ rasa ityevamādi
# 'jig rten na grags pa ming yin pa ste / / don de dang de dag go bar byed pa ba lang dang rta dang gzugs dang ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
etasya punaḥ kena nāmatvam
# de yang ci'i phyir ming nyid yin zhe na /
teṣu teṣv artheṣu tasya nāmno namanāt
# 'on te de dag la ming de gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir ro /
iha nikṣipte kāya upapattyantare namanānnāmarupiṇaḥ skandhā ityapare
# gzhan dag na re 'dir lus bor nas skye ba gzhan du gzhol ba'i phyir ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po dag yin no zhes zer ro /
ṣaḍāyatanamuktam
# skye mched drug ni bshad zin no /
sparśo vaktavyaḥ / ṣparśāḥ ṣaṭ / cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśa iti
# da ni reg pa brjod par bya ste / / mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar ro /
te punaḥ
# de dag kyang /
saṃnipātajāḥ
# 'dus te byung ba ni /
trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātājjātā indriyārthavijñānānām
# dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes pa dang gsum 'dus pa las skyes pa'o /
yuktaṃ tāvat pañcānāmindriyāṇāmarthavijñānābhyāṃ saṃnipātaḥ / sahajatvāt / manaindriyasya punarniruddhasyānāgatavarttamānābhyāṃ dharmamanovijñānābhyāṃ kathaṃ saṃnipātaḥ
# re zhig lhan cig skye ba'i phyir dbang po lnga ni don dang rnam par shes pa dag dang 'du bar yang rigs na / / yid kyi dbang po 'gags pa'i chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dag dang ji ltar 'du zhe na /
ayameva teṣāṃ saṃnipāto yaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ / ekakāryārtho vā saṃnipātārthaḥ / sarve ca te trayo 'pi sparśotpattau praguṇā bhavantīti
# rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po gang yin ba de nyid de dag gi 'du ba yin no / / yang na gsum po de dag thams cad kyang reg pa bskyed par bya ba la mthun pa yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu gcig pa'i don ni 'du ba'i don to /
atra punarācāryāṇāṃ bhedaṃ gatā buddhayaḥ
# 'di la slob dpon rnams kyi blo tha dad par gyur te /
keciddhi sakṛnnipātameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśaḥ iti / kecitpunaścittasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmāntarameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāyaḥ katamaḥ
# kha cig na re 'dus pa nyid reg pa yin no zhes zer te / / 'dir mdo'i khungs de ltar na chos gsum po 'di dag 'brel cing 'dus la tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa yin no zhes gsungs pa yang khyer te 'ong bar byed do / / kha cig na re sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos gzhan kho na zhig reg pa yin no zhes zer te /
ṣaḍādhyātmikānyāyatanāni / ṣaṭ bāhyānyāyatanāni
# 'dir mdo'i khungs chos kyi rnam grangs drug tshan drug gang zhe na /
ṣaṭ vijñānakāyāḥ / ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ / ṣaṭ vedanākāyāḥ / ṣaṭ tṛṣṇākāyā iti / atra hīndriyārthavijñānebhyaḥ sparśakāyāḥ pṛthag deśitāḥ / tatra ye saṃnipātameva sparśamāhusta evaṃ kparihāramāhuḥ / na vai pṛthignirdeśāt pṛthagbhāvo bhavati / mā bhūddharmāyatanādvedanātṛṣṇayoḥ pṛthagbhāva iti
# nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi'i yul drug dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug dang reg pa'i tshogs drug dang tshor ba'i tshogs drug dang sred pa'i tshogs drug go zhes gsungs pa yang khyer te 'ong bar byed do / / 'dir ni reg pa'i tshogs dbang po dang don dang rnam par shes pa dag las logs shig tu bstan to / / de la gang dag 'dus pa nyid reg pa yin no zhes zer ba de dag ni 'di skad du logs shig tu bstan pa'i phyir logs shig na yod pa kho na yang ma yin te / / tshor ba dang sred pa dag kyang chos kyi skye mched las logs shig na yod par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes lan 'debs par byed do /
naiṣa doṣastadvyatiriktasyāpi dharmāyatanasya bhāvāt / na caivaṃ sparśabhūtāttrayādanyattrayamasti yasya śeṣasyātra grahaṇaṃ syāt
# de ni nyes pa med pa de dag las ma gtogs pa'i chos kyi skye mched kyang yod pa'i phyir ro / / de lta bur 'dir lhag ma gang zhig smos su rung ba reg par gyur pa gsum las gzhan gsum ni med do /
yadyapi hīndriyārthau syātāmavijñānakau na tu punrvijñānamanindriyārthakam / tasmāttriṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu punaḥ sparśasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti
# gal te rnam par shes pa med pa'i dbang po dang don dag yod du zin kyang dbang po dang don med pa'i rnam par shes pa ni med do / / de lta bas na gsum bstan zin pas yang reg pa smos pa ni don med par 'gyur ro /
na khalu sarve cakṣurūpe sarvasya cakṣurvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi sarvaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvayoścakṣurūpayoḥ kāryam / ato yeṣāṃ kāryakāraṇābhāvaste sparśabhāve vyavasthāpitā ityeke / ye punaḥ saṃnipātādanyaṃ sparśamāhusta etatsūtra kathaṃ pariharanti iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśa iti
# kha cig na re mig dang gzugs thams cad kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu ma yin la / / mig gi rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang mig dang gzugs thams cad kyi 'bras bu ma yin pas de'i phyir gang dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yin pa de dag ni reg pa'i dngos por rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro / / gang de dag reg pa ni 'dus pa las gzhan no zhes zer ba de'i chos gsum po 'di dag 'brel zhing 'dus la tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'i mdo 'di la ji ltar lan 'debs she na /
na vā evaṃ paṭhanti / kiṃ tarhi / saṃgateḥ saṃnipātāt samavāyāditi paṭhanti kāraṇe va kāryopacāro 'yamiti bruvanti / ativahuvistaraprasāriṇī tveṣā kathetyalaṃ prasaṅgena
# de skad du mi 'don to / / yang na ni 'di rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa yin no zhes zer ro / / brjod pa 'di rgya che ba'i rnam pa ha cang mang por 'phro ba yin pas zhar la 'ongs pas chog go /
anyameva sparśaṃ varṇayantyābhidhārmikāḥ / teṣāṃ pnnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ sparśānāṃ
# chos mngon pa rnams na re reg pa gzhan kho na yin no zhes zer ro / / reg pa drug po de dag las /
pañcapratighasaṃsparśaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'dhivacanāhvaya / cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyasaṃsparśāḥ pañca pratigha saṃsparśa ityucyate / sapratighendriyāśrayatvāt / manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ so 'dhivacanasparśa ityucyate
# lnga ni thogs pa'i reg pa yin / / drug pa bla dags tshig ces bya / / mig dang; rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lnga ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang po la brten pa'i phyir thogs pa'i reg pa zhes bya'o / / drug pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni tshig bla dags kyi reg pa zhes bya'o /
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ adhivacanamucyate nāma
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / tshigs bla dags zhes bya ba ni ming yin no /
tatkilāsyādhikamālambanamato 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa iti
# de lhag par 'di'i dmigs pa yin pas / / de'i phyir tshig bla dags kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o zhes grag ste /
yathoktaṃ cakṣurvijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlaṃ manovijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti nīlamiti ca vijānātīti / eka āśrayiaprabhāito dvitīya ālambanaprabhāvitaḥ
# ji skad du mig gi rnam par shes pas ni sngon po rnam par shes kyi sngon po'o zhes bya bar ni rnam par mi shes so / / yid kyi rnam par shes pas ni sngon po yang rnam par shes la sngon po'o zhes bya bar yang rnam par shes so zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / / gcig ni rten gyis rab tu phye ba yin no /
apare punarāhuḥ / vacanamadhikṛtyārtheṣu manovijñānasya pravṛtti rna pañcānām / atastadevādhivacanam
# gnyis pa ni dmigs pas rab tu phye ba yin no / / gzhan dag na re yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni tshig gi dbang du byas nas don rnams la 'jug gi lnga po dag ni ma yin te / / de'i phyir de ni tshig bla dgas yin no /
tena saṃprayuktaḥ sparśo 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa ityeka āśrayaprabhāvito dvitīyaḥ saṃprayogaprabhāvitaḥ / punasta eva ṣaṭ sparśāstrayo bhavanti
# de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i reg pa ni tshig bla dgas kyi reg pa zhes bya bas gcig ni rten gyis rab tu phye ba yin no / / gnyis pa ni mtshungs par ldan pas rab tu phye ba yin no zhes zer ro / / yang reg pa drug po de dag nyid gsum du 'gyur te /
vidyāvidyetarasparśāḥ / vidyāsaṃsparśo 'vidyāsaṃsparśaḥ / tābhyāṃ cānyo naivavidyānāvidyāsaṃsparśa iti / ete punaryathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ
# rig dang ma rig dang gzhan reg / / rig pa'i reg pa dang ma rig pa'i reg pa dang de gnyis las gzhan pa rig pa yang ma yin ma rig pa yang ma yin pa'i reg pa'o / / de dag kyang go rims bzhin du / / dri med nyon mongs can lhag ma /
amalakliṣṭaśeṣitāḥ / anāsravaḥ sparśo vidyāsaṃsparśaḥ kliṣṭo 'vidyāsaṃsparśo vidyā 'vidyābhyāṃ saṃprayuktatvāt
# yin par rig par bya ste / / rig pa'i reg pa ni zag pa med pa'i reg pa'o / / ma rig pa'i reg pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi reg pa ste / / rig pa dang ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro /
śeṣo naivavidyānāvidyāsaṃsparśa ubhābhyāmasaṃprayogāt
# lhag ma ni gnyis ka dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir rig pa yang ma yin ma rig pa yang ma yin pa'i reg pa'o /
kaḥ puna śeṣaḥ / kuśalasāsravo 'nivṛtāvyākṛtaśca / punaravidyāsaṃsparśasyābhīkṣṇasamudācāriṇa ekadeśasya grahaṇāt dvau soparśau bhavataḥ / vyāpādānunayasparśau
# lag pa yang gang zhig ce na / / dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o / / ma rig pa'i reg pa yang dang yang du kun tu 'byung ba'i phyogs gcig smos pas reg pa gnyis su 'gyur te; gnod sems rjes su chags pa'i reg /
vyāpādānunayābhyāṃ saṃprayogāt / punaḥ sarvasaṃgraheṇa
# gnod sems dang rjes su chags pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro / / yang thams cad bsdu na /
sukhavedyādayastrayaḥ
# bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum /
sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo duḥkhavedanīyo 'duḥkhāsukhavedanīyaśca / sukhavedanādihitatvāt / athavā vedyate tadvedayituṃ vā śakyamiti vedanīyam
# bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba ste / / bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i phyir ro / / yang na de myong bar bya ba'am / / myong bar nus pa'i phyir myong bar 'gyur ba ste /
kiṃ tat / veditam
# de gang zhe na / / tshor ba yin no /
sukhaṃ vedanīyamasminniti sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo yatra sukhaṃ veditamasti
# 'di la bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yod pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa ste / / gang la bde ba'i tshor ba yod pa'o /
evaṃ duḥkhāduḥkhāsukhavedanīyāvapi yojyau / ta ete ṣoḍaśa sparśā bhavanti / uktaḥ sparśaḥ
# de bzhin du sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba dag la yang sbyar bar bya ste / / de dag ni reg pa bcu drug yin no / / reg pa bshad zin to /
vedanā vaktavyā
# tshor ba bshad par bya ste /
tatra yaḥ pūrvaṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ sparśa uktaḥ / tajjāḥ ṣaḍvedanāḥ / cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanāḥ
# de la reg pa rnam ba drug sdar bshad pa gang yin pa / / de las byung ba'i tshor ba drug / / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'o /
tāsāṃ punaḥ / pañca kāyikī caitasī parā / cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyasaṃsparśajāḥ pañccavedanāḥ kāyikī vedanetyucyate / rūpīndriyāśritatvāt / manaḥsaṃsparśajā punarvedanā caitasikītyucyate / cittamātrāśritatvāt
# de dag las / / lnga ni lus kyi'o sems kyi gzhan / / mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba lnga ni dbang po gzugs can la brten pa'i phyir lus kyi tshor ba zhes bya'o / / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sems tsam la brten pa'i phyir sems kyi zhes bya'o /
atha kiṃ sparśāduttarakālaṃ vedanā bhavatyāhosvit samānakālam
# yang ci tshor ba reg pa'i 'og tu 'byung ngam / / 'on te dus mnyam du 'byung zhe na /
samānakālamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ / anyonyaṃ sahabhūhetutvāt
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re phan tshun du lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dus mnyam mo zhes zer ro /
kathaṃ sahotpannayorjanyajanakabhāvaḥ sidhyati / kathaṃ ca na sidhyati
# ji ltar na lhan cig 'byung ba gnyis skyed par byed pa dang bskyed par bya ba'i dngos por 'grub / / ji ltar mi 'grub mthu med pa'i phyir te /
asāmarthyāt / jāte dharme dharmasyanāsti sāmarthayaṃ pratijñā 'viśiṣṭam / yadeva hīdaṃ sahotpannayorjanyajanakabhāvo nāstīti tadevedaṃ jāte dharme dharmasya nāstīti
# chos skyes zin pa la ni chos kyi nus pa med do / / lhan cig 'byung ba nyid skyed par byed pa dang bskyed par bya ba'i dngos po med do zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nyid chos skyes zin pa la ni chos kyi nus pa med do zhes bya ba yin pas dam bcas pa dang bye brag tu med pa yin no /
anyonyajanakaprasaṅgattarhi / iṣṭatvādadoṣaḥ
# 'o na ni phan tshun du skyes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / 'dod pa'i phyir nyes pa med de /
iṣṭameva hi sahabhūhetoranyonyaphalatvam / iṣṭamidaṃ sūtre tvaniṣṭaṃ sparśavedanayoranyonyaphalatvam / cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na tu cakṣuḥpaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītyotpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa iti vacanāt
# lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu la phan tshun gyi 'bras bu nyid du ma 'dod pa kho na'o; / / 'di ni 'dod mod kyi reg pa dang tshor ba dag phan tshun nam 'bras bu nyid du 'dod ba 'di ni mdo las mi bzhed de / / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la brten nas mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba skye'o / / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la brten nas mig gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
janakadharmātikramāvcāyuktam / yo hi dharmo yasya dharmasya janakaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tasmāt bhinnakālaḥ prasiddhaḥ
# skyed par byed pa'i chos dang 'gal ba'i phyir yang rigs pa ma yin te / / chos gang zhig chos gang gi skyed par byed par gnas pa de ni de dang dus tha dad par grags te /
tadyathā pūrvaṃ vījaṃ paścādaṅkuraḥ pūrvaṃ kṣīraṃ paścāddadhi pūrvamabhighātaḥ paścācchandaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ paścāt manovijñānamityevamādi
# dper nas bon snga la myu gu 'phyi ba dang 'o ma snga la zho 'phyi ba dang bsnun pa snga la sgra 'phyi ba dang yid snga la yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'phyi ba zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
anyathā paraṃparāpekṣatvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ sarvaṃ vā yugapadutpadyate na vā kadācit paścādviśeṣābhāvāt
# rgyu dang 'bras bu dag snga phyi'i dngos por ma grub pa yang ma yin mod kyi lhan cig pa'i dngos por yang 'grub ste /
nahi na siddhaḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ pūrvāparābhāvaḥ / sahabhāvo 'pi tu siddhaḥ / tadyathā cakṣurvajñānādīnāṃ cakṣurūpādibhirbhūtabhautikānāṃ ca tatrāpi pūrvamindriyārthau paścādvijñānam / pūrvakācca bhūtabhautikasamudāyāduttara utpadyata itīṣyamāṇe kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ / yathā tarhi cchāyāṅkurayorevaṃ sparśavedanayo riti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams dang mig dang gzugs dag dang 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams lta bu'o / / de la yang dbang po dang don dag snga la rnam par shes pa 'phyi ba dang 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur ba rgyu tshogs pa snga ma las phyi ma 'byung ngo zhes bya bar 'dod na dgag pa ci zhig yod / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re'o na ni myu gu dang grib ma dag ji lta bar reg pa dang tshor ba dag kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro /
sparśāduttarakālaṃ vedanetyapare
# gzhan dag na re reg pa'i 'og tu tshor ba 'byung ste /
indriyārthau hi pūrvānto vijñānam
# dbang po dang don dag ni snga la de'i 'og tu rnam par shes pa ste /
so 'sau trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayātpaścādvedanā tṛtīyakṣaṇa iti / evaṃ tarhi na sarvantravajñāne vedanā prāpnoti na ca sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ sparśaḥ
# gsum 'dus pa de ni reg pa yin no / / reg pa'i rkyen gyis skad cig ma gsum pa tshor ba 'byung ngo zhes zer ro / / de lta na ni rnam par shes pa thams cad la tshor ba yod par mi 'gyur la / / rnam par shes pa thams cad reg pa yin par yang mi 'gyur ro /
naiṣa doṣaḥ / pūrvasparśahetukā hyuttaratra sparśe vedanā sarve ca sparśāḥ sarvavedanakāḥ sarvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ sparśa iti
# de ni nyes pa med de; reg pa phyi ma la yod pa'i tshor ba reg pa snga ma'i rgyu las byung ba yin pas reg pa thams cad kyang tshor ba dang bcas pa yin no / / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang reg pa yin no /
idamayuktaṃ varttate
# 'di ni rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro /
kimatrāyuktam / yaduta bhinnālambanayorapi sparśayoḥ pūrvasparśaitukottarasya vedaneti / kathaṃ nāmānyajātīyālambanasparśasaṃbhūtā vedanā 'nyālambanā bhaviṣyati yena vā cittena saṃprayuktā tato bhinnālambaneti
# 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod ce na / / 'di lta ste reg pa dmigs pa tha dad pa dag reg pa phyi ma la yod pa'i tshor pa reg pa snga ma'i rgyu las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba ste / / ji lta zhe na / / rigs mi 'dra ba la dmigs pa'i reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzhan la dmigs par 'gyur ba 'am / / yang na sems gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de las gzhan pa la dmigs par 'gyur /
astu tarhi tasminkāle sparśabhūtaṃ vijñānamavedanakam
# 'o na ni de'i tshe reg pa ni gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa tshor ba med pa yin la /
tasmācca yat pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ savedanakaṃ tanna sparśaḥ
# de'i sngon rol gyi rnam par shes pa'i tshor ba dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin te rkyen ma tshang ba'i phyir ro /
pratyayavaidhuryādityevaṃ sati ko doṣaḥ / mahābhūmikaniyamo bhidyate / sarvatra citte daśamahābhūmikā iti / kva caiṣa niyamaḥ siddhaḥ
# de lta yin na nyes pa ci zhig yod / / sems can thams cad las mang po pa bcu yod do zhes bya ba sa mang bo pa'i nges pa nyams pa yin no / / nges pa 'di ga las grub /
śāstre / sūtrapramāṇakā vayaṃ na śāstrapramāṇakāḥ
# bstan bcos las so / / kho bo cag ni mdo tshad mar byed pa yin gyi /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā sūtrāntapratiśaraṇairbhavitavyami ti / na vā eṣa mahābhūmikārthaḥ sarvatra citte daśa mahābhūmikāḥ saṃbhavantīti
# kho bo cag bstan bcos tshad mar byed pa ni ma yin te / / bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde la brten par bya'o zhes gsungs so / / yang na sems thams cad la yod do zhes bya ba 'di sa mang po pa'i don ma yin no /
kastarhi mahābhūmikārthaḥ
# 'o nas mang po pa'i don gang yin zhe na /
tisro bhūmayaḥ
# sa ni gsum ste /
savitarkā savicārā bhumiḥ avitarkā vicāramātrā avitarkā vicārā bhūmiḥ / punaśtisra kusalā bhūmiḥ akuśalā 'vyākṛtā bhumiḥ
# rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa dang rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i sa dang dge ba'i sa dang mi dge ba'i sa dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sa dang yang gsum ste /
punastisraḥ / śaikṣī bhūmiraśaikṣī naivaśaikṣī bhumiḥ
# slob pa'i sa dang mi slob pa'i sa dang slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i sa'o /
tadya etasyāṃ sarvasyāṃ bhūmau bhavanti te mahābhūmikāḥ
# de la gang dag sa 'di dag thams cad ni yon pa de dag ni sa mang po pa yin no /
ye kukśalāyāmeva te kukśalamahābhūmikāḥ
# gang dag dge ba kho na la yod pa de dag ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa yin no /
ye kliṣṭāyāmeva te kleśamahābhūmikāḥ / te punaryathāsaṃbhavaṃ paryāyeṇanatu sarve yugapadityapare
# gang dag nyon mongs pa can kho na la yod pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa yin no / / gzhan dag na re de dag ni ci rigs par rnam grangs kyis yin gyi / / thams cad cig car ni ma yin no zhes zer ro /
akuśalamahābhūmikāstu pāṭhaprasaṅge nāsañjitāḥ
# mi dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams ni 'don pa'i zhar la de khong nas drangs kyi sngon ni ma bstan to /
idānīṃ pūrvaṃ na paṭhyante sma / yadi tarhi sparśāduttarakālalṃ vedanā sūtraṃ parihāryaṃ cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetaneti / sahajātā ityucyate na sparśasahajātā iti kimatra parihāryam
# gal te reg pa'i 'og tu tshor ba 'byung ngo zhe na / / mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa dang gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i lan gdab par bya dgos so / / lhan cig skyes pa zhes gsungs so / / reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa zhes ni ma gsungs na; 'di la lan gdab tu ci zhig yod /
samanantare 'pi cāyaṃ sahaśabdo dṛṣṭastadyathā maitrīsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃvodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayatī tyajñāpakametat / yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā yā ca cetanā yacca vijñānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā ime dharmā nāsaṃsṛṣṭā ityato nāsti vedanābhirasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vijñānam / saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetat ka eṣa samsṛṣṭārthaḥ
# lhan cig ces bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa la yang mthong ste / / dper na byams pa dang lhan cig par 'gyur ba'i dran pa yang dag par byang chub kyi yan lag sgom par byed do zhes bya ba lta bu yin pas 'di ni khungs su mi rung ngo / / 'o na mdo las tshor ba gang yin pa dang sems pa gang yin pa dang 'du shes gang yin pa dang rnam par shes ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag ni 'dres pa yin gyi ma 'dres pa ni ma yin no zhes gang gsungs pa ji ltar drang / / de lta bas na tshor ba la sogs pa dag kyang ma 'dres pa'i rnam par shes pa ni med do / / re zhig 'dres pa'i don ci yin pa 'di dpyad par bya ste / / mdo de nyid las 'di skad du / / gang myong bar byed pa de sems par byed do / / gang sems par byed pa de /
tatra hi sūtra evamuktaṃ yadvedayate taccetayate yaccetayate tastsaṃprajānīte yatsaṃprajānīte tadvijānātīti / tanna vijñāyate kim tāvadayameṣāmālambananiyama ukta utāho kṣaṇaniyama iti
# 'dus te shes par byed do / / gang 'dus te shes par byed pa de rnam par shes par byed do zhes gsungs na / / ci re zhig 'di de dag gis dmigs par nges par gsungs sam / / 'on te skad cig ma la nges par gsungs pa de mi shes so /
āyuruṣmaṇoḥ sāhabhāvye saṃsṛṣṭavacanāt siddhaḥ kṣaṇaniyamaḥ / yaccāpi sūtra uktaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ iti / tat kathaṃ vijñānaṃ cāsti na ca trayāṇāṃ saṃnipāto na ca sparśa iti / tasmādavaśyaṃ sarvatra vijñāne sparśaḥ sparśasahajā ca vedanaiṣṭavyā
# tshe dang drod dag lhan cig pa la 'dres pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir skad cig ma la nges pa yin par grub bo / / gang yang mdo las gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa zhes gsungs pas de yang ji ltar na rnam par shes pa ni yod la / / gsum 'dus pa ni ma yin pa 'am / / yang na 'dus pa yin la reg pa ma yin / / de lta bas na gdon mi za bar rnam par shes pa thams cad la reg pa dang reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba yang 'dod par bya'o /
alamatiprasaṅgiyā kathayā / prakṛtamevānukramyatām
# ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gyis chog gi dkyus ma kho na rim gyis brjod par bya'o /
uktā samāsena caitasikī vedanā / punaścāṣṭādaśavidhā sā manopavicārataḥ / saiva caitasikī vedanā punarāṣṭadaśa manopavicāravyavasthānādaṣṭādadhā bhidyate / punaḥ saṃdhikaraṇaṃ cātra draṣṭavyam
# sems las byung ba tshor ba mdor bshad zin to / / de yid nye bar rgyu ba las / / rnam pa dag ni yang bco brgyad / / yang sems las byung ba'i tshor ba de nyid yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bco brgyad rnam par gzhag pa las rnam pa bco brgyad du dbye'o /
aṣṭādaśamano pavicārāḥ katame
# yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bco brgyad gang zhe na /
ṣaṭ saumanasyopacirāḥ ṣaṭ daurmanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārāḥ / kathameṣāṃ vyavasthānam
# yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug dang yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug dang btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug go / / de dag ji ltar rnam par bzhag /
yadi svabhāvataḥ / trayo bhaviṣyanti
# gal te ngo bo nyid las na ni gsum du 'gyur te /
saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāvicārāḥ / atha saṃprayogataḥ / eko bhaviṣyati
# yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba dag yin no /
sarveṣāṃ manaḥ saṃprayuktatvāt / athālambanataḥ
# 'on te mtshungs par ldan pa las na ni yid dang mthun par ldan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'gyur ro /
ṣaṭ bhaviṣyanti / rūpādiṣaḍviṣayālambanatvat / tribhirapi sthāpanā / teṣāṃ pañcadaśa rūpādyupavicārā asaṃbhinnālambanāḥ pratiniyatarūpādyālambanatvāt
# 'on te dmigs pa las na ni gzugs la sogs pa yul drug la dmigs pa'i phyir drug tu 'gyur ro zhe na / / gsum kar yang gzhag ste / / de dag las bco lnga ni gzugs la sogs pa la nye bar rgyu ba yin te / / gzugs la sogs pa so sor nges pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no /
trayo dharmopavicārā ubhayathā
# chos la nye bar rgyu ba gsum ni rnam pa gnyi ga yin no /
manopavicārā iti ko 'rthaḥ
# yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i don ci ltar zhe na /
manaḥ kila pratītyaite saumanasyadayo viṣayānupavicarantīti
# yid la brten nas yid bde ba la sogs pa de dag yul la nye bar rgyu ba'i phyir ro zhes grag go /
viṣayeṣu vā mana upavicārayantītyapare
# gzhan dag na re / / yul dag la yid nye bar rgyu bar byed pa'i phyir te /
vedanāvaśena manaso viṣayeṣu punaḥ punarvicaraṇāt
# tshor ba'i dbang gis yid yul dag la yang dang yang du rnam par rgyu ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
kasmāt kāyikī vedanā na manopavicāraḥ / naiva hyasau mana evāśritā nāpyupavicārikā 'vikalpakatvādityayogaḥ / tṛtīyadhyānasukhasya kasmānmanopavicāreṣvagrahaṇam / āditaḥ kila kāmadhātau manobhūmikasukhendriyābhāvāttatpratidvandvena kuḥkhopavicārābhāvācceti
# lus kyi tshor ba ci'i phyir yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba ma yin zhe na / / 'di ni yid kho na la brten pa yang ma yin la / / rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir nye bar rgyu bar byed pa yang ma yin pas mi rung ngo / / bsam gtan gsum pa'i bde ba ci'i phyir yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba'i nang dag tu ma smos she na / / dang po 'dod pa'i khams na yid kyis pa'i bde ba'i dbang po med pa'i phyir dang de'i mi mthun pa sdug bsngal gyi yid nye bar rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go /
yadi manobhūmikā evaite
# gal te 'di dag yid kyi sa pa kho na zhig yin na /
yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarantītyevamādiḥ / katham
# 'o na mdo las / / mig gis gzugs dag mthong nas yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu'i gzugs rnams la nye bar rgyu'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gang gsungs pa de ji ltar drang /
pañcavijñānakāyābhinirhṛtatvamabhisaṃdhāyaitaduktaṃ manobhūmikā hyete / tadyathā 'śubhā cakṣurvijñānābhinirhṛtā ca manobhūmikā ceti
# de ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs ltas mngon par bsgrubs pa nyid la dgongs te gsungs par zad kyi / / 'di dag ni yid kyi sa pa yin te / / dper na mi sdug pa lta bu mig gi rnam par shes pas mngon par bsgrubs pa yang yin la /
api tu dṛṣṭvā yāvat spṛṣṭveti vacanāt / acodyamevaitat / ye 'pya dṛṣṭvā yāvadaspṛṣṭvopavicarnti te 'pi manopavicārāḥ / itrathā hi kāmadhātau rūpadhātvālambanā rūpādyupavicārā na syuḥ kāmadhātbalamvanāśca rūpadhātau gandharasaspraṣṭavyopavicārāḥ
# yid kyi sa pa yang yin pa bzhin no / / gzhan yang mthong nas zhes bya ba nas reg nas zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa'i phyir de ni klan kar mi rung ba nyid do / / gang gis ma mthong ba nas ma reg pa'i bar du nye bar rgyu ba de yang yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba yin no / / gzhan du na 'dod pa'i khams na gzugs kyi khams la dmigs pa dag kyang gzugs la sogs pa la nye bar rgyu ba yin par mi 'gyur la; gzugs kyi khams na 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa dag kyang dri dang ro dang reg bya la nye bar rgyu ba yin par mi 'gyur ro /
yathā tu yaktataraṃ tathoktaṃ yo 'pi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā śabdānupavicarati so 'pi manopavicāraḥ / yathā tvanākulaṃ tathoktamindriyārthasya vyavacchedataḥ / kimasti rūpaṃ yatsaumanasyasthānīyameva syāt yāvadupekṣāsthānīyameva
# ji ltar ches gsal ba de ltar bshad de / / gang gzugs dag mthong nas sgra rnams la nye bar rgyu ba de dag yang yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba yin mod kyi dbang po dang don rnam par chad pa'i sgo nas ji ltar mi 'chol ba de ltar bshad do / / ci gzugs gang yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu kho na yin pa nas btang snyoms kyi gnas lta bu kho na yin pa'i bar yod dam zhe na /
asti saṃtānaṃ niyamayya na tvbālambanam
# rgyud nges pas ni yod kyi dmigs pas ni ma yin no /
athaiṣāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ kati kāmapratisaṃyuktāsteṣāṃ ca kati kimālambanā evaṃ yāvadārūpyapratisaṃyuktā vaktavyāḥ
# yang yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba 'di dag las du zhig ni 'dod pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin de dag las kyang du zhig gi dmigs pa ni ci zhig yin / / de bzhin du gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i bar du brjod par bya zhe na /
āha / kāme svālambanāḥ sarve
# smras pa / / 'dod pa thams cad rang dmigs can /
āmadhātau sarve 'ṣṭādaśa santi sa ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāmālambanam
# 'dod pa'i khams na ni bco brgyad po thams cad yod la / / de dag thams cad kyi dmigs pa yang de yin no /
teṣāmeva
# de dag nyid kyi /
rūpī dvādaśagocaraḥ / rūpadhāturdvādaśānāmālambanaṃ ṣaṭ gandharasopavicārānapāsya
# spyod yul gzugs can bcu gnyis so / / gzugs kyi khams ni bcu gnyis kyi dmigs pa yin no / / dri dang ro la nye bar rgya ba drug ma gtogs pa ste /
tatra tayorabhāvāt / trayāṇāmuttaraḥ
# de lta na de gnyis med pa'i phyir; gong ma gsum gyi /
gocara iti vartate / ārupyadhātustrayāṇāṃ dharmopavicārāṇāmālambanam / tatra rūpādyabhāvāt
# spyod yul zhes bya bar sbyar te / / gzugs med pa ni chos la nye bar rgyu ba gsum gyi dmigs pa yin te / / de nas gzugs la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
uktāḥ kāmapratisaṃyukatāḥ
# 'dod pa dang ldan pa bshad zin to /
rūpapratisaṃyuktā vaktavyāḥ / tatra tāvat
# gzugs dang ldan pa brjod par bya ste / / de la re zhig /
dhyānadvaye dvādaśa
# bsam gtan ni / / gnyis na bcu gnyis /
daurmanasyopavicārānapāsya
# yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba rnams ma gtogs so /
te ca dvādaśa / kāmagāḥ / kāmān gacchantīti kāmagāḥ / kāmadhātumālabanta ityarthaḥ / dṛṣṭo hi viṣayāṇāṃ grahaṇārthe gamiprayogaḥ / kathametat gamyate
# bcu gnyis po de dag kyang 'dod par 'gro bas na 'dod 'gro rnams te / / 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / yul rnam par 'dzin pa'i don la yang 'gro ba sbyor ba mthong ste / / 'di ji ltar 'gro zhe na /
evametat gamyata iti / svo 'ṣṭālambanam / sa eva rūpadhātusteṣaṃ svaḥ / sa eva rūpadhātusteṣāṃ svaḥ
# 'di ni 'di ltar 'gro'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o / / rang la dmigs brgyad / / gzugs kyi khams de nyid ni de dag gi rang bzhin yin te /
svo 'ṣṭānāṃ manopavicārāṇāmālambanaṃ gandharasopavicārāṃścaturo hitvā
# de ni yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba brgyad kyi dmigs pa yin te / / dri dang ro la nye bar rgyu ba bzhi ma gtogs so /
ārūpyo dvayoḥ
# gzugs med pa gnyis kyi ste /
dharmopavicārayorālambanam / dhyānadvaye tu ṣaṭ
# chos la nye bar rgyu ba dag gi dmigs pa yin no / / bsam gtan gnyis na drug /
tṛtīyacaturthayordhyānyoḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārā eva santi nānye
# bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug kho na yod kyi gzhan dag ni med do /
teṣāṃ punarālambanaṃ / kāmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ / kāmadhātuḥ ṣaṇṇāmapyālambanam
# de dag drug gi / / dmigs pa ni 'dod pa'o / / 'dod pa'i khams ni drug car kyi yang dmigs pa yin no /
caturṇāṃ svaḥ
# rang gi bzhi'i /
rūpadhātuścaturṇāṃ tatra gandharasābhāvāt
# gzugs kyi khams ni bzhi yin te / / de na dri dang ro med pa'i phyir ro /
ekasyālambanaṃ paraḥ / ārupyadhāturekasyaiva dharmopavicārasyālambanam
# gong ma gcig gi dmigs pa yin / / gzugs med pa'i khams ni chos la nye bar rgyu ba gcig kho na'i dmigs pa yin no /
uktā rūpapratisaṃyuktāḥ
# gzugs dang ldan pa dag bshad zin to /
ārūpyapratisaṃyuktā idānīmucyante
# da ni gzugs med pa dang ldan pa brjod par bya ste /
catvāro 'rūpisāmante
# gzugs med nye bar bsdogs na bzhi /
ākāśānantyāyatanasāmantakamatrārūpisāmantakam / tatra catvāro rūpaśabdaspraṣṭavyadharmopavicārāḥ
# gzugs med pa'i nyi bar bsdogs ni 'dir nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nye bar bsdogs pa yin te / / de na ni gzugs dang sgra dang reg bya dang chos la nye bar rgyu ba bzhi'o /
te ca / rūpagāḥ / caturthaṃ hi dhyānameṣāmālambanam
# de dag kyang / / gzugs sgra'o / / de dag gi dmigs pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa yin te /
yeṣāṃ tat vyavacchinnālambanamasti yeṣāṃ punaḥ paripiṇḍitālambanaṃ teṣāṃ tatraika eva saṃbhinnālambano dharmopavicāraḥ / eka ūrdhvagaḥ
# gang dag gi ltar na de rnam par chad pa la dmigs pa yod pa yin no / / gang dag gi ltar na ni de dag bzlums te dmigs pa de dag gi ltar na ni de na chos la nye bar rgyu ba 'dres pa la dmigs pa gcig kho na yod do / / gong mar 'gro ba gcig /
eka eva dharmopavicārastatrārūpyadhātvālambanaḥ
# de na gzugs med pa'i khams la dmigs pa ni gcig kho na ste / / chos la nye bar rgyu ba'o /
eko maule / maule punarārūpye dharmopavicāra evaiko 'sti nānyaḥ / sa cāpi / svaviṣayaḥ / ārupyadhātvālambana eva
# dngos gzhi na gcig / / gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi na ne chos la nye bar rgyu ba gcig kho na yod kyi gzhan ni med do / / de yang / / rang yul can / / gzugs med pa'i khams kho na la dmigs pa yin te /
nahi maulānāmārupyāṇāmadharo dhāturālambanamiti paścāt prativedaviṣyāmaḥ
# gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi rnams kyi dmigs pa ni kha cig ma yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
ete ca manopavicārāḥ / sarve 'ṣṭādaśa sāsravāḥ / nāsti kaścidanāsravaḥ
# yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba de dag kyang; bco brgyad thams cad zag dang bcas / / zag pa med pa ni 'ga' yang med do /
kaḥ katibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ
# gang zhig du dag dang ldan zhe na /
kāmadhātūpapanno rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī kāmāvacaraiḥ sarvaiḥ prathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikairaṣṭābhiḥ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikaiścaturbhiḥ kliṣṭairgandharasālambanān paryudasya ārūpyāvacareṇaikena kliṣṭenaivālābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyā vitarāgaḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ prathamadhyānabhumikairdaśabhiḥ
# 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems ma thob pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa thams cad dang ldan no / / bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa pa ni dri dang ro la dmigs pa ma gtogs pa nyon mongs ba can brgyad brgyad dang ldan no / / bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i sa pa ni bzhi bzhi dang ldan no / / gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni nyon mongs pa can gcig kho na dang ldan no / / gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems thob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa thams cad dang ldan no /
caturbhiḥ saumanasyopavicāraiḥ kliṣṭairgandharasālambanau vyudasya ṣaḍbhirūpekṣopavicārairanāgamyabhūmikaiḥ / dvitīyadhyānabhūmikairaṣṭābhiḥ
# bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa ni bcu dang ldan te / / yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba dri dang ro la dmigs pa ma gtogs pa nyon mongs pa can bzhi dang mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa'i btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug dang ldan no /
tṛtīyacaturthadhyānārūpyabhūmikaiḥ pūrvavat / anayā varttanyā śeṣamanugantavyam / dhyānopapannastu kāmāvacareṇaikenopekṣādharmopavicāreṇa nirmāṇacittasaṃprayuktena samanvāgato veditavyaḥ / apara āha
# bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang gzugs med pa las skyes pa rnams dang ni snga ma bzhin te / / srol 'dis lhag ma yang khong du chud par bya'o / / bsam gtan du skyes pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i btang snyoms chos la nye bar rgyu ba sbrul pa'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa gcig dang ldan par rig par bya'o /
astyevaṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthaḥ / sūtrārthastvanyathā dṛśyate
# gzhan dag na re yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba rnams kyi don bye brag tu smra ba lta bu 'di yang yod mod kyi mdo'i don ni gzhan du snang ngo /
nahi yo yasmādvītarāgaḥ sa tadālambanamupavicaratīti yuktam
# gang zhig gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni dmigs pa de la nye bar rgyu bar rig pa ma yin no /
ataḥ sāsravā api na sarve saumanasyādayo manopavicārāḥ
# de lta bas na yid bde ba la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa dag kyang thams cad ni nye bar rgyu ba ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi
# 'o na ci zhe na /
sāṃkleśikā yairmano viṣayānupavicaratīti / kathaṃ copavicarati / anunīyate ca pratihanyate cāpratisṅkhyāya copekṣate yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ sātatā vihārā bhavanti / cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan evaṃ yāvanmanasā dharmān vijñāyeti / nahyarhato laukikaṃ nāsti kuśalaṃ dharmālambanaṃ saumanasyaṃ yattu tatsāṃkleśikaṃ manasa upavicārabhutaṃ tasyaiva pratiṣedho lakṣyata iti
# kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams yin te / / de dag gis yid yul rnams la nye bar rgyu bar byed pa'o / / ji ltar nye bar rgyu bar byed ce na / / rjes su chags par byed / / so sor ma brtags pa yang btang snyoms su byed pa ste / / gang dag gi gnyen por rtag tu yod pa drug gnas pa yin pa ste / / mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas yid bde bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / / yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur la / / dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas so zhes bya ba nas / / de bzhin du yid kyis chos rnams shes nas zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa lta bu'o / / dgra bcom pa la yang 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i yid bde ba med pa ma yin pas 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yid nye bar rgyu ba de dgag pa ma yin par bde bar mngon no zhes zer ro /
punasta eva saumanasyādayaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśacchāstṛpadāni bhavanti / gardhanaiṣkramyāśritabhedena
# yang yid bde ba la sogs pa de dag nyid zhen ba la brten pa dang nges par 'byung ba nyid la brten pa'i bye brag gis ston pa'i bka' sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur te /
tadbhedasya śāstrā gamitatvāt
# de dag gi bye brag ston pas bka' stsal ba'i phyir ro /
tatra gardhāśritāḥ kliṣṭā naiṣkramyāśritāḥ kuśalāḥ / evametadvedanākhyaṃ bhavāṅgamanekaprakārabhedaṃ veditavyam
# de la zhen pa la brten pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa can dag go / / nges par 'byung ba la brten pa rnams ni dge ba dag yin no / / de ltar na tshor ba dag ces bya bar sred pa'i yan lag 'di'i rab tu dbye ba ni du ma yod par rig par bya'o /
śeṣāṇyaṅgāni punarnocyante
# yan lag lhag ma rnams ni yang mi brjod do /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
yasmāt / uktaṃ ca vakṣyate cānyat
# bshad dang 'chad par 'gyur ba gzhan /
kiñcidatrāṅgamuktaṃ kiñcit paścadvakṣyate / tatra vijñānaṃ tāvaduktaṃ
# 'dir yan lag kha cig ni bshad zin / / kha cig ni 'og nas 'chad de / / de la re zhig rnam par shes pa ni /
vijñānaṃ prativijñaptirmana āyatanaṃ ca taditi / ṣaḍāyatanamapyuktaṃ
# rnam par shes pa so sor rnam rig pa / / yid kyi skye mched kyang de yin zhes bshad zin to / / skye mched drug kyang /
tadvijñānāśrayā rūpaprasādāścakṣurādaya iti / saṃskārā bhavaśca karmakośasthāne vyākhyāsyante
# de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten mig la sogs pa gzugs dang ba rnams zhes bshad zin to / / 'du byed dang srid pa ni las kyi mdzod kyi gnas nas 'chad par 'gyur ro /
tṛṣṇopādānāni kleśakośasthāne / sa caiṣa pratītyasamutpādaḥ samāsataḥ kleśakarmavastūnīti prāk jñāpitam / atra tu kleśa iṣyate
# sred pa dang len pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i gnas kyi mdzod kyi gnas nas 'chad par 'gyur ro / / sngar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de yang mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa dang las dang gzhi rnams so zhes bstan pa / / 'dir ni nyon mongs bon bzhin /
bījavannāgavanmūlavṛkṣavattuṣavattathā
# klu bzhin rtsva bzhin ljon shing bzhin / / de bzhin shun pa bzhin du 'dod /
kimasya vījādibhiḥ sādharmyam
# 'di'i sa bon la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
tadyathā vījādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādīnāṃ prabhavo bhavatyevaṃ kleśāt kleśakarmavastūnām
# dper na sa bon las sdong bu dang lo ma la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du / / nyon mongs pa las kyang nyon mongs pa dang las dang gzhi rnams skye bar 'gyur ro /
yathā nāgādhiṣṭitaṃ saro na śuṣyatyevaṃ kleśanāgādhiṣṭhitaṃ janmasaraḥ
# dper na klu gnas pa'i mtsho ni skam par mi 'gyur ba ltar / / nyon mongs pa'i klan ka gnas pa'i skye ba'i mtsho yang de dang 'dra'o /
yathā cānapoddhṛtamūlā vanaspatayaśchinnāśchinnāḥ punarapi prarohantyevamanapoddhṛtakleśamūlā gatayaḥ
# dper na nags tshal rtsa ba nas ma phyung ba rnams ni bcad kyang slar skye bar 'gyur pa ltar / / nyon mongs pa rtsa ba nas ma bton pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o /
yathā ca vṛkṣāḥ kālena kālalṃ puṣpaphalānāṃ prasotāro bhavantyevaṃ kleśā apyasakṛt kleśakarmavastūnāṃ heturbhavanti / yathā ca tuṣāvanaddhāstaṇḍulāḥ prarohaṇasamarthā bhavanti na kevalā evaṃ kleśaprāptatuṣāvanaddhaṃ karma janmāntaravirohaṇe samarthaṃ bhavati na kevalamityevaṃ tāvat kleśo bījādivadveditavyaḥ / tuṣitaṇḍulavat karma tathaivauṣadhipuṣpavat
# dper na shing ljon pa rnams dus dus su me tog dang 'bras bu rnams skyed par byed pa de bzhin du / / nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lan cig ma yin par nyon mongs pa dang las dang gzhi rnams kyi rgyu yin no / / dper na shun pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras thug po che rnams ni skye bar nus kyi 'ba' zhig dag ni ma yin pa de bzhin du / / nyon mongs pa'i thob pa'i shun pa dang bcas pa'i las skye ba gzhan du skye bar nus kyi 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no / / de ltar na re zhig nyon mongs pa sa bon la sogs pa dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o / / las ni shun bcas 'bras dang 'dra / / de bzhin sman dang me tog bzhin /
tuṣau 'syāstīti tuṣī / tuṣasthānīyaḥ kleśa uktaḥ
# 'di la shun pa yod pas na shun pa dang bcas pa ste / / shun pa lta bu'i nyon mongs pa ni bshad zin to /
idānīṃ tuṣitaṇḍulasthānīyaṃ karmmocyate
# da ni shun pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu lta bu'i las brjod par bya'o /
santyoṣadhayaḥ phalapākāntā evaṃ karmāṇi vipacya punarvipākānabhinirvarttayante
# dper na 'bru dang sman dag 'bras bu smin pa mthar phyin pa dang ldan pa de bzhin du las rnams kyang rnam par smin nas yang rnam par smin pa mngon par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro /
yathā ca puṣpaṃ phalotpattavāsannaṃ kāraṇamevaṃ karmāṇi vipākotpatto veditavyāni
# dper na me tog 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la nye ba'i rgyu yin pa ltar las rnams kyang rnam par smin pa bskyed par bya ba la de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
siddhānnapānavadvastu
# gzhi ni bza' btung grub pa bzhin /
pathā siddhamannaṃ pānaṃ ca kevalaṃ paribhogāya kalpyate na punarvirohāya evaṃ vipākākhyaṃ vastu
# dper na bza' ba dang btung ba grub zin pa yongs su longs spyad par bya ba 'ba' zhig yin gyi yang bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa ltar rnam par smin pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi yang de dang 'dra ste /
nahi punarvipākādvipākāntaraṃ janmāntareṣu pravarhate / yadi hi pravardheta mokṣo na syāt / na khalveṣa janmasaṃtāna evaṃ pratītyasamutpadyamāno bhavacatuṣṭayaṃ nātikrāmati / yadutāntarābhavamupapattibhavaṃ pūrvakālabhavaṃ maraṇabhavaṃ ca
# rnam par smin pa las tshe rabs gzhan dag tu rnam par smin pa gzhan dang 'brel pa ni med de / / gal te 'brel par 'gyur na ni thar par yang mi 'gyur ro / / yang tshe'i rgyun de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba na 'di lta ste srid pa bar ma dang skye ba'i srid pa dang dus snga ma'i srid pa dang 'chi ba'i srid pa dang srid pa bzhi las mi 'da' ste /
te ca vyākhyātāḥ
# de dag ni bshad zin to /
tasmin bhavacatuṣṭaye
# srid pa bzhi po de dag las gcig tu /
upapattibhavaḥ kliṣṭaḥ
# skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can /
ekāntena / katamena kleśena / sarvakleśai svabhūmikaiḥ
# nyon mongs pa gang gis she na / / rang gis ba'i nyon mongs kun /
yadbhamika upapattibhavastadbhūmikaīreva sarvakleśaiḥ / nahi sa kleśo 'sti yena pratisamdhibandhaḥ pratividyate ityābhidharmikāḥ
# chos mngon pa ba rnams na re skye ba'i srid pa sa gang yin pa de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yin pa nyid de / / gang gis nying mtshams sbyor bar dgag par bya ba'i nyon mongs pa de ni med do zhes zer ro /
kleśaireva tu na paryavasthānaiḥ svatantraīḥ
# nyon mongs pa can rnams kho nas yin gyi kun nas dkris pa chig rkya thub pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no /
yadyapi sā 'vasthā mandikā yastu yatrābhīkṣṇaṃ carita āsannaśca tasya tadānīṃ sa eva kleśa upatiṣṭhate
# gnas skabs de zhan pa yin mod kyi / / gang zhig gis gang la yang dang yang du dang nye bar dpyad pa de la ni de'i tshe nyon mongs pa de nyid nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
pūrvāvedhāt / antarabhavapratisaṃdhirapyevamavaśyaṃ kliṣṭo veditavyaḥ
# sngon 'phangs pa'i phyir ro / / srid pa bar ma nying mtshams sbyor ba yang de bzhin du gdon mi za bar nyon mongs pa can du rig par bya'o /
tridhā 'nye
# gzhan rnam gsum mo /
anye trayo bhavāstriprakārāḥ antarabhavādayaḥ kuśalakliṣṭāvyākṛtāḥ
# srid pa bar ma la sogs pa srid pa gzhan gsum ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa dang gsum char yin no /
athaiṣāṃ bhavānāṃ katamaḥ kiṃpratisaṃyuktaḥ
# yang srid pa 'di rnams las gang zhig gang dang ldan zhe na /
traya ārūpye
# gzugs med gsum /
antarābhavaṃ varjayitvā
# srid pa bar ma ma gtogs te /
nahyārūpyadhātuḥ sthānāntaraparicchinno yasya prāptyarthamantarābhavo 'bhinirvarteta
# gzugs med pa'i khams ni gang du phyin par bya ba'i phyir srid pa bar ma mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba nas gzhan du na yongs su chad pa ni med do /
kāmarūpadhātvoraparisaṃkhyānāt sarva eva catvāro bhavāḥ santītyanujñāpitaṃ bhavati
# 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams dag gis ni chad pa ma smos pas srid pa bzhi po thams cad yong do zhes bya bar gnas par byas pa yin no /
