# re zhig kha cig na re bzhi rnams kyis ni ri rab kyi rtse mo de tsam mo zhes zer ro /
dviguṇottaramityapare / prathamaṃ tu dhyānaṃ yāvāṃścāturdvīpakaḥ
# gzhan dag na re gong ma gnyis 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / / kha cig na re bsam gtan dang po'i ni gling bzhi pa tsam mo /
dvitīyaṃ yāvān sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ
# gnyis pa'i ni stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo /
tṛtīyaṃ yāvān dvisāhasraḥ
# gsum pa'i ni stong gnyis pa tsam mo /
caturthaṃ yāvāṃsrisāhasra ityeke
# bzhi pa'i ni stong gsum pa tsam mo zhes zer ro /
prathamādīni sāhasrādiparimāṇāni / caturthaṃ tvaparimāṇamityapare
# gzhan dag na re dang po la sogs pa ni stong la sogs pa'i tshad tsam mo; / / bzhi pa ni tshad med do zhes zer ro /
atha ko'yaṃ sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ ko dvisāhasrastrisāhasro vā
# yang stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ci / / stong gnyis pa 'am / / stong gsum pa ni ci zhe na /
caturdvīpakacandrārkamerukāmadivaukasām
# gling bzhi dang ni nyi zla dang / / ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang /
brahmalokasahasraṃ ca sāhasraścūḍiko mataḥ / sahasrañjaṃbūdvīpānāṃ pūrvavidehānāmaparagodānīyānāmuttarakuruṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryāṇāṃ candrāṇāṃ sumerūṇāṃ sahasraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sahasraṃ brahmalokānāmayamucyate sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ
# tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni / / stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod / / 'dzam bu'i gling dang shar gyi lus 'phags dang nub kyi ba lang spyod dang byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang nyi ma dang zla ba dang ri rab stong dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar stong dang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'di ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o /
tatsahasraṃ dvisāhasro lokadhātustu madhyamaḥ
# de stong la ni stong gnyis pa / / bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no /
teṣāṃ cūḍikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ / tatsahasraṃ trisāhasraḥ
# stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag stong ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams yin no / / de stong la ni stong gsum mo /
teṣāṃ dvisāhasrāṇāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ
# stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag stong ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yin te /
eṣa hi kṛtsnaḥ
# 'di thams cad ni /
samasaṃvartasaṃbhavaḥ / samaṃ saṃvartate samaṃ vivartate / saṃbhavo hi vivartaḥ ityuttaratra vyākhyāsyate / kiṃ khalu yathā bhājanānāṃ pramāṇabheda evaṃ tadvāsināmapi sattvānāṃ pramāṇabhedo'sti
# mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin / / mnyam du 'jig cing mnyam du 'byung ste / / 'byung ba ni chags pa yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o / / yang ji ltar snod rnams kyi tshad bye brag yod pa de bzhin du de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshad kyang / / bye brag yod dam zhe na /
astītyāha / tatra tāvat
# smras pa yod de / / de la re zhig /
jāmbūdvīpāḥ pramāṇena catuḥsārdhatrihastakāḥ
# 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams kyi tshad / / khru bzhi pa dang phyed dang bzhi /
jambūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ pramāṇārdhacaturhastakāḥ kecittu caturhastakāḥ
# 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni phal cher khru phyed dang bzhi pa'o / / kha cig ni khru bzhi pa dag yin no /
dviguṇottaravṛddhyā tu pūrvagodottarāhvayāḥ
# shar dang ba lang spyod dang ni / / byang zhes bya ba gnyis 'gyur bskyed /
pūrvavidehakā godānīkā uttarakauravāśca manuṣyā aṣṭaṣoḍaśadvātriṃśaddhastakā yathākramam / pādavṛddhyā tanuryāvatsārdhakrośo divaukasām / kāmināṃ / pādaḥ krośasya caturtho bhagaḥ / tanmātraṃ śarīraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ dvau pādau trāyastriṃśānāṃ trayo yāmānāṃ catvārastuṣitānāṃ pañca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ adhyardhaḥ krośaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām / rupiṇāṃ tvādau yojanārdhaṃ
# shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni rim bzhin du khru brgyad pa dang bcu drug pa dang sum cu rtsa gnyis pa dag yin no / / 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus / / bzhi cha nas ni rgyang grags dag / / phye dang gnyis kyi bar du bskyed / / bzhi cha zhes bya ba ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha ste / / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris ba rnams kyi lus ni de tsam mo / / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni bzhi cha gnyis so / / 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni bzhi cha gsum mo / / dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig go / / 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig dang bzhi cha gcig go / / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis so / / gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed /
rūpiṇāṃ devānāṃ prathame sthāne brahmakāyikānāmardhayojanamātraṃ śarīram
# gzugs can gyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi dang po ni tshangs ris pa rnams kyi lus ni dpag tshad phyed tsam mo /
tataḥ param / ardhārdhavṛddhiḥ / triṣu sthānesu brahmapurohitānāṃ yojanaṃ mahābrahmaṇo 'dhyardhaṃ parīttābhānāṃ dve yojane
# de yi gong ma phyed phyed bskyed / / gnas gsum dag na tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyi dpag tshad gcig go / / tshangs pa chen po'i ni phyed dang gnyis so /
urdhvaṃ tu parīttābhebhya āśrayaḥ / dviguṇadviguṇā hitvā 'nabhrakebhya'striyojanam
# 'od chung pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis so / / 'od chung rnams kyi lha yan chad / / lus ni nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur te / / sprin med dpag tshad gsum dor ro /
apramāṇābhānāṃ catvāri yojanāni
# tshad med 'od rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi'o /
ābhāsvarāṇāmaṣṭau
# 'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni brgyad de /
evaṃ dviguṇavṛddhyā yāvacchubhakṛtsnānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ
# de bzhin du dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni drug cu rtsa bzhi yin pa'i bar du nyis 'gyur du bskyed do /
anabhrakāṇāṃ tato yojanatrayeṇa hīnaṃ dviguṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatiyojana śatam
# sprin med pa rnams kyi ni nyis 'gyur du bsgyur nas de las dpag tshad gsum phri nas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o /
tasmāt pareṇa punaḥ puṇyaprasavānāṃ dviguṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśayojanasahasrāṇi śarīram / evaṃ pramāṇabhinnānāṃ kimāyuṣo'pyasti bhedaḥ
# de yan chad bsod nams skyes pa la sogs pa nas 'og min pa rnams kyi lus dpag tshad khri drug stong yin pa'i bar du nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur du bsgyur ro / / ci de ltar bod tshod tha dad pa rnams kyi tshe yang bye brag yod dam zhe na /
astītyāha
# smras pa yod de /
sahasramāyuḥ kuruṣu
# sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste /
varṣāṇām
# lo rnams so /
dvayorardhārdhavarjitam
# gnyis la phyed phyed spangs pa'o /
dvayordvipayorardhārdhaṃ varjayitvā pañca varṣaśatāni godānīyānām
# gnyis la ni phyed phyed spangs nas / / ba lang spyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ni lo lnga brgya'o /
ardhatṛtīye varṣaśate pūrvavidehānām
# shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams kyi ni nyis brgya lnga bcu'o /
ihāniyatam
# 'di na ma nges /
jambūdvīpe nāstyāyuṣo niyamaḥ kadācit bhūyo bhavati kadācidalpīyaḥ
# 'dzam bu gling 'di na ni tshe nges pa med de / / res 'ga' ni ring por 'gyur ro / / res 'ga' ni thung ngo /
ante tu daśābdāḥ
# tha mar ni / / lo bcu /
abdaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
# lo zhes bya ba ni lo skor yin te /
ante hīyamānaṃ daśa varṣāṇyāyurbhavati
# tha ma thung ngur gyur pa na tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro /
ādito'mitam
# dang po dpag tu med /
āditaḥ prāthamakalpikānaṃ manuṣyāṇāmaparimāṇamāyurbhavati / sahasrādisaṃkhyayā parimātuṃ na śakyate
# bskal pa dang po pa'i mi rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med pa yin to / / stong la sogs pa'i grangs kyis yongs su tshad gzung bar mi nus so /
uktaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ devānāṃ vaktavyam / taccāhorātraṃ vyavasthāpya śakyaṃ vaktumiti sa eva caiṣāṃ vyavasthāpyate
# mi rnams kyi bshad zin to / / lha rnams kyi brjod par bya ste / / de yang nyin zhag rnam par bzhag nas brjod par nus pas re zhig de dag gi de nyid rnam par gzhag par bya ste /
nṛṇāṃ varṣāṇi pañcāśadahorātro divaukasām
# mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la / / 'dod pa dag gi lha rnams las /
kāme'dharāṇāṃ / yāni manuṣyāṇāṃ pañcāśadvarṣāṇi tāni kāmadhātāvadharāṇāṃ devānāṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāmekaṃ rātrindivam
# 'og ma dag gi nyin zhag gcig / / mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go /
tenāyuḥ pañcavarṣaśatāni tu
# des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o /
tena tatastenāhorātreṇa teṣāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa divyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ pramāṇam
# de'i nyin zhag des na de rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go / / zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya'o /
dviguṇottaramūrdhvānāmubhayaṃ / ūrdhvānāṃ devānāmubhaya dviguṇottaramahorātraścāyuśca
# gong ma gnyi ga nyis 'gyur ro / / lnga po gong ma rnam sa ni nyin zhag dang tshe gnyi ga nyis 'gyur te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / yanmanuṣyāṇāṃ varṣaśataṃ tattrāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāmekaṃ rātrindivam
# ji lta zhe na / / mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la /
tena rātrindivena divyaṃ varṣasahasramāyuḥ
# nyin zhag des na tshe lha'i lo stong thub bo /
evaṃ yāmādīnāṃ yathākramam / mānuṣyakāṇi dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa varṣaśatānyekaṃ rātrindivam
# de bzhin du mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya dang bzhi brgya dang brgyad brgya dang stong drug brgya ni 'thab bral la sogs pa'i nyin zhag gcig yin la /
tena rātrindevena dve catvāryaṣṭau ṣoḍaśa divyāni varṣasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam
# nyin zhag des na tshe'i tshad lha'i lo nyis stong dang bzhi stong dang brgyad stong dang khri drug stong thub bo /
yugandharādūrvaṃ sūryācandramasorabhāvāt / kathaṃ devānāmahorātravyavasthānamālokakṛtyaṃ vā
# gnya' shing 'dzin yan chad na nyi ma dang zla ba med pa'i phyir lha rnams kyi nyin zhag rnam par gzhag pa dang snang ba'i bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsātkumudabandhu vat śakunīnāṃ kūjanākūjanāt middhāpagamāgamācca ālokakṛtyaṃ svayaṃprabhatvāt
# ku mu ta dang pad ma bzhin du me tog rnams kha 'dzums pa dang kha 'byed pa dang bya rnams skad 'byin pa dang skad mi 'byin pa dang gnyid sangs pa dang bro ba las so / / snang ba'i bya ba ni bdag nyid la 'od yod pa'i phyir ro /
uktamāyuḥ kāminām / rūpiṇāṃ punaḥ
# 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bshad zin to /
nāstyahorātramāyustu kalpaiḥ svāśrayasaṃmitaiḥ
# gzugs can nyin mtshan med tshe ni / / rang lus gzhal ba'i bskal pa yis /
yeṣāṃ rūpiṇāmardhayojanamāśrayaḥ teṣāmardhakalpamāyuḥ
# gzugs can gang dag gi lus dpag tshad phyed yin pa de dag gi tshe bskal pa phyed yin la /
yeṣāṃ yojanaṃ teṣāṃ kalpam / evaṃ yasya yāvadyojanamāśrayastasya tāvatkalpamāyuryavadakaniṣṭhānāṃ ṣoḍaśakalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥ pramāṇam
# gang dag gi dpag tshad gcig yin pa de dag gi ni bskal pa gcig yin pa nas / / de bzhin du 'og min pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bskal pa khri drug stong yod pa'i bar du gang gi lus dpag tshad ji snyed pa de'i tshe yang bskal pa de snyed do /
ārūpye viṃśatiḥ kalpasahasrāṇya dhikādhikam
# gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni / / nyi shu lhag pas lhag pa yin /
ākāśānantyāyatane viṃśatikalpasahasrāṇyāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam
# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched na ni tshe'i tshad bskal pa nyi khri'o /
vijñānānantyāyatane tasmādadhikaṃ viṃśatiḥ sahasrāṇi
# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni de las nyi khri lhag go /
ākiñcanyāyatane tasmādadhikaṃ viṃśatiḥ / bhavāgre tasmādadhikaṃ viṃśatiḥ / evaṃ teṣāṃ yathākramaṃ viṃśatiścatvāriṃśat ṣaṣṭiraśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam
# ci yang med pa'i skye mched na ni de las nyi khri lhag go / / srid pa'i rtse mon ni de las nyi khri lhag pa'o / / de ltar na de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni go rims bzhin du bskal pa nyi khri dang bzhi khri dang drug khri dang brgyad khri yin no /
katamo'tra kalpo veditavyaḥ kimantarakalpo'tha saṃvartakalpo'tha vivarttakalpo'tha mahākalpaḥ
# 'dir bskal pa gang zhig yin par rig par bya / / ci bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags pa dang gang yang chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu pa chen po zhig yin zhe na /
mahākalpaḥ parīttābhāt prabhṛtyardhamadhastataḥ
# 'od chung nas bzung bskal chen te / / de yi 'og ma phyed yin no /
parīttābhādeva nikāyāt prabhṛti mahākalpenāyuḥ veditavyam
# lha'i ris 'od chung nas bzung ba'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chen por rig par bya'o /
tasmādadho mahākalpasyārdha kalpīkṛtya mahābrahmādīnāmāyurvyavasthāpitam
# de'i 'og ma tshangs chen la sogs pa'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chen po phyed la bskal par byas nas rnam par bzhag go /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate yacca loko viṃśatimantarakalpānvivarta āste yacca viṃśatimantarakalpānsaṃvartate ime ṣaṣṭirantarakalpā mahābrahmaṇo'dhyardhaḥ kalpaḥ uktaḥ / evaṃ ca kṛtvā mahākalpasyārdhaṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpān kalpīkṛtya teṣāmāyuḥ pramāṇamuktam
# ji lta bu zhe na / / gang yang 'jig rten bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur chags pa dang gang yang chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nye shur 'dug pa dang gang yang bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig pa dang bar gyi bskal pa drug cu po de dag la tshangs pa chen po'i bskal pa phyed dang gnyis su bshad de / / de ltar byas na bskal pa chen po'i phyed bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu la bskal par byas nas de dag gis tshe'i chad du byas nas bshad pa yin no /
uktaṃ sugatāvāyuḥ pramāṇam
# bde 'gro'i tshe'i tshad bshad zin to /
durgatāvidānīṃ vaktavyam / tatra tāvat
# da ni ngan 'gro'i brjod par bya ste / / de la re zhig /
kāmadevāyuṣā tulyā ahorātrā yathākramam / saṃjīvādiṣu ṣaṭsu
# yang sos la sogs drug rim bzhin / / 'dod lha'i tshe dang nyin zhag mnyam /
yāvat ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devanikāyānāmāyuruktaṃ tena tulyā ahorātrāḥ ṣaṭṣu narakeṣu yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ / saṃjīve kālasūtre saṃghāte raurave mahāraurave tāpane ca
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po de dag gi tshe ji tsam par bshad pa de dang go rims bzhin du yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus 'joms dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba dang dmyal ba drug gi nyin zhag dang mnyam par rig par bya ste /
āyustaisteṣāṃ kāmadevavat
# des na de dag rnams kyi tshe /
tairidānīṃ svairahorātraisteṣāṃ yathā ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāmāyustathaiva yathākramaṃ veditavyam
# 'dod pa'i lha dang 'dra ba yin / / de ni rang gi nyin zhag de dag gis de dag tshe'i tshad 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po de dag gi tshe ji lta ba de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / yaddhi cāturmahārājakāyikānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tatsaṃjīvane mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivaṃ
# ji lta zhe na / / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gang yin pa de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la /
tena yāvat dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa tatratyāni pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ
# des na zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i los tshe de na yod pa'i lo lnga brgya zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no /
yattrāyastriṃśānāmāyuḥ pramāṇaṃ tat kālasūtre mahānarake ekaṃ rātrindivam
# sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gang yin pa de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi nyin zhag gcig yin la /
tena rātrindivena tasminvarṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇaṃ / evamanyeṣvapi yathāyogaṃ yojyaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināmāyuḥpramāṇaṃ tattulyenāhorātreṇa tāpane ṣoḍaśa varṣasahasrāṇyāyuḥpramāṇam / ardhaṃ pratāpane
# nyin zhag des na de'i tshe lo stong ste / / de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis dmyal ba chen po tsha ba na tshe'i tshad lo khri drug stong yin pa'i bar du gzhan dag la ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o / / rab tu tsha phyed /
pratāpane mahānarake'ntarakalpasyārdhamāyuḥ pramāṇam
# dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba na ni tshe'i tshad bar gyi bskal pa phyed do / / mnar med ni /
avīcāvantaḥkalpaṃ / tiraścāṃ tu niyamo nāsti
# bar gyi bskal pa'o / / dud 'gro rnams ni nges pa med do /
paraṃ punaḥ
# dud 'gro rnams /
kalpaṃ tiraścāṃ
# mchog ring bskal pa'o /
paramāyustiraścāmantarakalpaṃ tat punarnāgānāṃ nandopanandāśvatalīprabhṛtīnām
# dud 'gro'i tshe mchog tu ring ba ni bar gyi bskal pa gcig ste / / klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang rta mgo la sogs pa dag ste /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aṣṭāvime bhikṣavo nāgā mahānāgāḥ kalpasthā dharaṇidharā iti vistaraḥ / pretānāṃ māsāhnā śatapañcakam
# bcom ldan 'das kyis / / dge slong dag klu brgyad po 'di dag ni klu chen po ste / / bskal par gnas pa / / sa 'dzin pa'o zhes rgyas par gsungs so /
yo manuṣyāṇāṃ māsaḥ sa pretānāmahorātraḥ
# yi dvags rnams / / zla ba nyin zhag gi lnga brgya'o /
tenāhorātreṇa pañca varṣaśatānyāyuḥ / śītanarakeṣvāyuṣaḥ kiṃ pramāṇam / vāhādvarṣaśatenaikatiloddhārakṣayāyuṣaḥ / arvudādviṃśatiguṇaprativṛddhyāyuṣaḥ pare
# mi rnams kyi zla ba gcig gang yin pa de ni yi dvags rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / nyin zhag des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o yang grang ba'i dmyal ba dag na tshe'i tshad ji tsam zhe na / / ji srid du / / til sbyang nas ni lo brgya zhing / / til gcig phyung bas zad gyur pa / / chu bur can gyi tshe yin te / / gzhan gyi tshe ni nyi shur 'gyur /
upamānamātreṇa teṣvāyurākhyātaṃ bhagavatā tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ iha syādviṃśatikhārīko māgadhakastilavāhaḥ pūrṇastilānāṃ cūḍikāvaddhaḥ
# bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyi dpe tsam du dge slong dag dper na 'di na yul ma ga dh'a'i til gyi sbyang khal brgyad cu ba zhig til dag gis byur bur bkang ste /
tataḥ kaścideva varṣaśatasyātyayādekaṃ tilamapanayate kṣiprataraṃ bhikṣavaḥ saviṃśatikhārīko māgadhastilavāho'nenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet / na tvevāhamarvudopapannānāmāyuṣaḥ paryantaṃ vadāmi
# de nas la la zhig gis lo brgya brgya 'das shing til re re bor na dge slong dag rim pa des na yul ma ga dh'a'i til gyi sbyang khal brgyad cu pa de ma lus par yongs su zad par gyur pa ni tshes myur gyi chu bur can du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe yongs su gtugs par ni nga mi smra'o /
yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatirvudā evameko nirarvudo vistareṇa yathā khalu bhikṣavo viṃśatiḥ padyā evameko mahāpadma iti
# dge slong dag chu bur can nyi shu ji lta ba de bzhin du chu bur rdol pa gcig yin no zhes bya ba nas rgyas par yang dge slong dag padma ltar gas pa nyi shu ji lta ba de bzhin du padma ltar gas pa chen po gcig yin no zhes gsungs so; /
evameṣāmāyuṣmatāṃ sattvānāṃ kimastyaparipūrṇāyuṣāmantarā mṛtyurāhosvinna / sarvatrāsti
# de ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag tshe yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma ngor 'chi ba yod dam 'on te / / med ce na / / thams cad la yod de /
kurubāhyo'ntarāmṛtyuḥ
# sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par 'chi /
uttarakuruṣu niyatāyuṣaḥ sattvā avaśyaṃ kṛtsnamāyurjīvanti
# byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na ni sems can rnams tshe nges pa yin te /
anyeṣu nāvaśyam / pudgalānāṃ tu bahūnāṃ nāstyantareṇa kālakriyayā
# gdon mi za bar tshe rangs par 'tsho'o / / gzhan dag ni ma nges so / / gang zag rnams las bar ma dor 'chi ba med pa yang mang ste /
tuṣitastharsyakajātibaddhasya bodhisattvasya caramabhavikasattvasya jinādiṣṭasya jinabhutasya śraddhādharmānusāriṇo bodhisattvacakravarttimātrośca tadgarbhayorityevamādinām / yojanapramaṇena sthānāni śarīrāṇi cotkāni varṣapramāṇenāyuruktaṃ tayośca pramāṇaṃ noktamiti vaktavyaṃ nānā ca sarveṣāṃ vavasthānamatastasyāpi paryanto vaktavyaḥ
# byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dga' ldan na bzhugs pa dang sems can srid pa tha ma pa dang rgyal bas bstan pa dang rgyal ba'i thad du btang ba'i pho nya dang dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i yum de dag lhums na yod pa dang de lta bu la sogs pa'o / / dpag tshad kyi tshad kyis gnas rnams dang lus rnams kyang lo'i tshad kyis tshe yang bshad na / / de gnyis kyi tshad ni ma bshad pas brjod par bya la /
teṣāṃ samānākhyānārthamādiprakrama ārabhyate
# de dag thams cad kyi rnam par gzhag pa yang ming yin pas de'i mtha' yang brjod par bya ste /
paramāṇvakṣarakṣaṇāḥ / rūpanāmādhvaparyantāḥ / rūpasyāpacīyamānasya paryantaḥ paramāṇuḥ
# de rnams yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang po'i rim pa brtsam mo / / gzugs ming dus mtha' rdul yig dang / / skad cig / / gzugs 'grib pa'i mtha' ni rdul phra rab yin no / / dus kyi mtha' ni skad cig ma'o /
kālasya paryantaḥ kṣaṇo nāmnaḥ paryanto'kṣaraṃ tadyathā gauriti / kṣaṇasya punaḥ kiṃ pramāṇam
# ming gi mtha' ni yi ge ste / / dper na ba lang zhes bya ba lta bu'o / / yang skad cig ma'i tshad ji tsam zhe na /
samagreṣu pratyayeṣu yāvatā dharmasyātmalābhaḥ gacchanvā dharmo yāvatā paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantaraṃ gacchati
# rkyen rnams tshogs na ji srid du chos kyi bdag nyid thob ba'am / / chos 'gro phan ji srid du rdul phra rab nas rdul phra rab gzhan du 'gro ba yin no /
balavatpuruṣāddhaṭmātreṇa pañcaṣaṣṭiḥ kṣaṇā atikrāmantītyābhidhārmikāḥ / paramāṇuraṇustathā
# chos mngon pa rnams na re skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig ma drug cu rtsa lnga 'da'o zhes zer ro / / de la phra rab rdul dang ni / / rdul phran dang ni de bzhin du /
lohāpaśaśāvigocchidrarajolikṣāstadudbhavāḥ
# lcags chu ri bong lug dang glang / / nyi zer rdul dang sro ma dang /
yavastathāṅgulīparva jñeyaṃ saptaguṇottaram / etatparamāṇvādikaṃ saptaguṇottaraṃ veditavyam
# de las byung dang de bzhin du / / sor tshigs zhes bya gong bdun 'gyur / / rdul phra rab la sogs pa 'di dag ni gong nas gong du bdun 'gyur du rig par bya ste /
sapta paramāṇavo'ṇuḥ / saptāṇavo loharajaḥ
# rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phran no / / rdul phran bdun la ni lcags rdul lo /
tāni saptāvrajastāni sapta dāśarajastāni saptaiḍakarajaḥ
# de dag bdun la ni chu rdul lo / / de dag bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul lo /
tāni sapta gorajaḥ tāni sapta vātāyanacchidrarajaḥ
# de dag bdun la ni lug rdul lo / / de dag bdun la ni glang rdul lo / / de dag bdun la ni nyi zer rdul lo /
tāni sapta likṣāstadudbhavā yūketyarthaḥ / sapta yūkā yavaḥ / sapta yavā aṅgulīparva trīṇi parvāṇyaṅgurīti prasiddhameveti noktam / pārśvākṛtāstu
# de dag bdun la ni sro ma'o / / sro ma bdun la ni de las byung ba ste / / sro ma las byung ba ni shig cis bya ba'i tha tshig go / / shig bdun la ni nas so / / nas bdun la ni sor mo'i tshigs so / / sor mo'i tshigs gsum la ni sor mo zhes bya bar grags pa nyid pas ma bshad do / / ngos su bya ba ni /
caturviṃśatiraṅgulyo hasto hastacatuṣṭayam
# sor ni nyi shu bzhi la khru / / khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo /
dhanuḥ / vyāsenetyarthaḥ
# 'dom gang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
pañcaśatānyeṣāṃ krośo raṇyaṃ ca tanmatam
# de dag lnga brgya rnams la ni / / rgyang grags de la dgon par 'dod /
manuṣāṃ pañca śatāni krośaḥ / krośamātraṃ ca grāmādi raṇyamiṣṭam / te'ṣṭau yojanamityāhuḥ
# gzhu lnga brgya la ni rgyang grags te / / grong nas rgyang grags tsam gyi thag la ni dgon pa yin par 'dod do / / de brgyad dpag tshad ces bya'o / / rgyang grags de dag brgyad la dpag tshad ces bya'o /
uktaṃ yojanasya pramāṇam
# dpag tshad kyi tshad ni bshad zin to /
varṣasyedānīmucyate / viṃśaṃ kṣaṇaśataṃ punaḥ / tatkṣaṇaḥ
# da ni lo'i tshad brjod par bya ste / / skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la / / de yi skad cig /
kṣaṇānāṃ viṃśaṃ śatamekastatkṣaṇaḥ
# skad cig ma brgya nyi shul de'i skad cig go /
te punaḥ ṣaṣṭirlavaḥ / tatkṣaṇāḥ ṣaṣṭirlava ityucyate
# de dag kyang / / drug cu la ni thang cig go / / de'i skad cig drug cu la ni thang cig ces bya'o /
triṃśadguṇottarāḥ
# yud tsam nyin zhag zla gsum ni /
trayo muhūrttāhorātramāsāḥ
# gong nas gong du sum cur 'gyur /
triṃśallavā muhūrttastriśanmuhūrttā ahorātraḥ / kadācittu rātriradhikā bhavati kadācidūnā kadācitsamā
# thang cig sum cu la yud tsam mo / / yud tsam sum cu la ni nyin zhag gcig go / / res 'ga' ni mtshan mo ring ngo / / res 'ga' ni thung ngo / / res 'ga' ni mnyam mo /
tridaśāhorātrā māsaḥ
# nyin zhag sum cu la ni zla ba gcig go /
dvādaśamāsakaḥ
# zhag mi thub dang bcas pa yi /
saṃvatsaraḥ sonarātraḥ
# zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig go /
catvāro māsā hemantānāṃ catvāro grīṣmāṇāṃ catvāro varṣāṇāmityete dvādaśa māsā saṃvatsaraḥ sārdhamūnarātraiḥ
# dgun rnams kyi zla ba bzhi dang dpyid rnams kyi zla ba bzhi dang dbyar rnams kyi zla ba bzhi ste / / de dag zla ba bcu gnyis po de dag zhag mi thub dang bcas pa la lo gcig go /
saṃvatsareṇa hi ṣaḍūnarātrā nipātyante
# lo la ni zhag gcig gi shol drug dor te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā
# ji lta zhe na /
hemantagrīṣmavarṣāṇāmadhyardhe māsi nirgate
# dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar rnams kyi / / zla ba phyed dang gnyis 'das nas /
śeṣe'rdhamāse vidvadbhirūnarātro nipātyate / uktaṃ varṣapramāṇam
# zla ba phyed ni lus pa na / / mkhas pas zhag mi thub pa dor / / lo'i tshad bshad zin to /
kalpasyedānīṃ vaktavyam
# da ni bskal pa brjod par bya ste /
kalpo bahuvidhaḥ smṛtaḥ / antarakalpo saṃvarttakalpo vivartakalpo mahākalpaśceti / tatra tāvat
# bskal ba rnam pa mang bshad pa / / bar gyi bskal pa dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang bskal pa chen po'i / / de la re zhig /
saṃvarttakalpo narakāsaṃbhavāt bhājanakṣayaḥ
# 'jig pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi / / srid pa med nas snod zad pa /
narakeṣu hi sattvāsaṃbhavāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanasaṃkṣayaḥ
# dmyal ba dag nas sems can mi srid pa nas bzung ste snod zad pa'i bar ro / / ji lta bu zhe na /
dve hi saṃvarttanyau / gatisaṃvartanī dhātusaṃvartanī ca
# 'jig pa ni gnyis te / / 'gro ba 'jig pa dang khams 'jig pa'o /
punardve saṃvartanyau / sattvasaṃvartanī bhājanasaṃvartanī ca / bhavati sa kālo yannarakeṣu sattvāścyavante nopapadyante
# yang gnyis te / / sems can 'jig pa dang snod 'jig pa'o / / gang sems can rnams dmyal ba dag nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de /
sa ārambhaḥ saṃvartakalpasya
# da ni 'jig pa'i bskal pa mgo brtsam pa yin te /
yadayaṃ loko viṃśatyantarakalpān vivṛtto'sthāt tanniryātaṃ vaktavyam
# gang 'jig rten 'di chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'dug pa de las ni nges par 'byung ba zhes brjod par bya la /
yadviṃśatimantarakalpān saṃvartiṣyate tat pratipannaṃ vaktavyam
# gang bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig par 'gyur ba de la ni zhugs pa zhes brjod par bya ste /
yadā narakeṣvekasattvo nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā 'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati
# gang gi tshe dmyal ba dag na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur pa de tsam gyis 'di lta ste /
yaduta narakasaṃvarttanyā yasya tadānīṃ niyataṃ narakavedanīyaṃ karma ghriyate sa lokadhātvantaranarakeṣu kṣipyate
# dmyal ba 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no / / de'i tshe gang la nges par dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las yod pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu 'phen par 'gyur te /
evaṃ tiryaksaṃvarttanī pretasaṃvarttanī ca vaktavyā
# dud 'gro myong bar 'gyur ba dang yi dags myong bar 'gyur ba yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o /
mahāsamudragatāstiryañcaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃvartante / manuṣyasahacariṣṇavastu taireva sārdhaṃ bhavanti / sa kālo yanmanuṣyeṣvanyatamaḥ sattvaḥ svayamanācāryakaṃ dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sa tasmāt vyutthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ śāntaṃ vata vivekajaṃ prītisukhamiti / taṃ ca śabdaṃ śrutvā anye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante
# rgya mtsho chen po na 'khod pa'i dud 'gro rnams ni sngar 'jig go / / mi dang lhan cig rgyu ba rnams ni de dag mi dang lhan cig tu'o / / gang mi rnams dag gi nang na sems can gang yang rung ba bdag nyid kyis slob dpon med par chos nyid kyis thob pa'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu'i dus kyang yod de / / de de las langs nas tshig tu kye ma dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni bde ba yin no / / dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni zhi ba yin no zhes kyang smra la / / sgra de thos nas sems can de dag kyang snyoms par 'jug cing /
kālaṃ kṛtvā brahmaloka upapadyante
# shi nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te /
yadā jambūdvīpa ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta jambūdvīpasaṃvartanyā
# gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur na de tsam gyis 'di lta ste / / 'dzam bu'i gling 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no /
evaṃ pūrvavidehagodānīyottarakurusaṃvartanyo vaktavyāḥ
# shar gyi lus 'phags dang nub kyi ba lang spyod dang byang gi sgra mi snyan 'jig pa dag kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste /
yadā manuṣyeṣvekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta manuṣyagatisaṃvarttanyā
# gang gi tshe mi dag gi nang na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur pa de tsam gyis na 'di lta ste / / mi 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no /
auttarakauravāstu kālaṃ kṛtvā kāmāvacareṣu deveṣūpapadyante
# byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
tatra vairāgyābhāvāt / evaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikeṣvapi deveṣu prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya brahmaloka upapadyante
# de na 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa'i phyir ro / / de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag na / / yang bsam gtan dang po bskyed pa nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te /
yadā tatraikasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta cāturmahārājakāyikasaṃvartanyā / evaṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartisaṃvarttnyo vaktavyāḥ
# gang gi tshe de na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur na de tsam gyis 'di lta ste / / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no / / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'jig pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste /
yadaikasattvo'pi kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta kāmadhātusaṃvartanyā / brahmaloke'pyanyatamaḥ sattvo dharmatāprātilambhikaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyotthāya vācaṃ bhāṣate sukhaṃ vata samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ śāntaṃ vata samādhijaṃ prītisukhamiti
# gang gi tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dag gi nang na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur pa de tsam gyis na 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no / / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na yang sems can gang yang rung ba zhig chos nyid kyis thob pa'i bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs te / / langs nas tshig tu kye ma ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni bde ba yin no / / kye ma ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba ni zhi ba yin no zhes smra ba /
taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā'nye'pi sattvāḥ samāpadyante kālaṃ ca kṛtvā ābhāsvareṣu deveṣūpapadyante
# sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas snyoms par 'jug cing shi nas kyang 'od gsal gyi lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
yadā brahmaloka ekasattvo'pi nāvaśiṣṭo bhavati iyatā'yaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta sattvasaṃvartanyā / tataḥ śūnye bhājane ita eva sāmantakāt sattvānāṃ tadākṣepake karmaṇi parikṣīṇe sapta sūryāḥ prādurbhūya krameṇa yāvat pṛthivīṃ sumeruṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ dahanti
# gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na sems can 'ga' yang ma lus par gyur na de tsam gyis 'di lta ste / / sems can 'jig pas 'jig rten 'di zhig pa yin no / / de'i 'og tu sems can rnams kyi da 'phen pa'i las yongs su zad pa dang snod stong pas 'di nyid nas kun nas nyi ma bdun byung nas rim gyis sa dang ri rab kyi bar du ma lus par sreg par byed do /
tasmādevaṃ prajvalitādarcirvāyunā kṣiptaṃ śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ nirdahat paraiti / tacca tadbhūmikamevārcirveditavyam / nahi visabhāgā apakṣālāḥ kramante / tatsaṃbaddhasaṃbhūtatvāttasmāttadityuktam
# rab tu 'bar ba de nyid las me lce rlung gis khyer nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi bar du sreg par 'gyur ro / / me lce de dang de'i sa pa kho nar rig par bya ste; ris mi mthun pa'i skyon dag 'gro ba ni med de / / de dang 'brel pa las byung ba nyid kyi phyir de nyid las zhes bshad de /
kāmāvacaro hyagnī rūpāvacaramagniṃ saṃbadhnātīti
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i me ni gzugs na spyod pa dang 'brel par byed do /
evamanyasyāmapi saṃvartanyāṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyamiti
# de bzhin du 'jig pa gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o /
narakeṣu sattvānāṃ cyutyanutpādāt prabhṛti yāvat bhājanānāṃ saṃkṣaya eṣa kālaḥ / vivartakalpaḥ prāgvāyoryāvannarakasaṃbhavaḥ / thamādvāyoḥ prabhṛti yāvannarakeṣu sattvasambhavaḥ eṣa kālo vivartakalpa ityucyate / tathā saṃvṛte hi loka ākāśamātrāvaśeṣaścira kālaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvat punarapi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena bhājanānāṃ pūrvanimittabhūtā ākāśe mandamandā vāyavaḥ syandante
# de ltar na dmyal ba dag na sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang mi skye ba nas bzung ste / / snod rnams zad pa'i bar gyi dus de ni 'jig pa'i bskal pa zhes bya'o / / 'chags pa dang po'i rlung ni dmyal ba srid pa'i bar du'o / / dang po'i rlung nas bzung ste dmyal ba dag nas sems can srid pa'i bar te / / de ltar 'jig rten zhig pa ni nam mkha' tsam lus par yun ring du gnas so / / yang rim gyis sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis nam mkha' la snod rnams kyi snga ltas su gyur pa rlung 'jam po 'jam po dag ldang ste /
tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān saṃvṛtto'sthāttanniryātaṃ vaktavyam
# de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di zhig nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'dug pa gang yin pa de las ni nges par byung ba zhes brjod par bya la /
yadviṃśatimantarakalpān vivarttiṣyate tadupayātaṃ vaktavyam
# bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni nye bar 'ongs par brjod par bya'o /
tataste vāyavo vardhamānā yathoktaṃ vāyumaṇḍalaṃ jāyate / tataḥ śanairyathoktakramavidhānaṃ sarvaṃ jāyate apmaṇḍalaṃ kāñcanamayī mahāpṛthivī dvīpāḥ sumervādayaśca
# de nas rlung de dag skye ba na ji skad bshad pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro / / de'i 'og tu rim gyis chu'i dkyil 'khor dang gser gyi rang bzhin gyis gzhi chen po dang gling rnams dang ri rab la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa dang tshul du thams cad 'byung ngo /
prathamaṃ tu brāhma vimānamutpadyate
# dang por ni tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung ngo /
tato yāvat yāmīyaṃ tato vāyumaṇḍalādīni / iyatā'yaṃ loko vivṛtto bhavati yaduta bhājanavivartanyā
# de'i 'og tu ni 'thab bral pa'i bar du 'byung ngo / / de'i 'og tu ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ste / / de tsam gyis na 'di lta ste snod chags pas 'jig rten 'di chags pa yin no /
athānyataraḥ sattva ābhāsvarebhyaścyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna utpadyate
# de nas sems can gang yang rung ba zhig 'od gsal dag nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong par skye bar 'gyur la /
anye'pi sattvāstataścyutvā brahmapurohiteṣūpapadyante
# sems can gzhan dag kyang de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro /
tato brahmakāyikeṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu / krameṇa yāvaduttarakurau godānīye pūrvavidehe jambūdvīpe preteṣu tiryakṣu narakeṣūpapadyante / dharmatā hyeṣā yat paścāt saṃvartate tat pūrvaṃ vivarttate
# de'i 'og tu tshangs ris dag dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dag dang 'phrul dga' dag nas rim gyis byang gi sgra mi snyan pa dang ba lang spyod dang shar gyi lus 'phags po dang 'dzam bu'i gling dang yi dgas rnams dang dud 'gro rnams dang dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te / / gang mjug tu 'jig pa de dang por 'chags pa 'di ni chos nyid yin no /
yadā narakeṣvekaḥ sattvo'pi prādurbhūto bhavati tadā yadayaṃ loko viṃśatimantarakalpān vivartate tanniryātaṃ bhavati
# gang gi tshe dmyal ba dag na sems can 'ga' zhig skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'chags pa gang yin pa de las ni nges par byung ba yin la /
yadviṃśatimantaralpān vivarttaḥ sthāsyati tadupayātaṃ bhavati
# chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'dug par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni nye bar 'ongs pa yin no /
antaḥkalpo'mitāt yāvaddaśavarṣāyuṣaḥ
# bar gyi bskal pa dpag med nas / / tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du'o /
vivartamāne loke ekānna viṃśatirantarakalpā aparimitāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmatikrāmanti / aparimitāyuṣāmeva kramatāṃ yāvaddaśavarṣāyuṣo bhavanti
# 'jig rten chags pa na mi rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa la bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgur 'da' bar 'gyur ro / / tshe dpag tu med pa nas 'grib pa na tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du 'gyur te /
so'sau vivṛttānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ prathamo'ntarakalpaḥ
# 'di ni chags nas gnas pa rnams kyi bar gyi bskal pa dang po yin no /
tataḥ / utkarṣā apakarṣāśca kalpā aṣṭādaśāpare
# de nas yar skye mar 'bri ba'i / / bskal pa / / gzhan ni bco brgyad dang /
tasmādapare'ṣṭādaśotkarṣā apakarṣāścāṣṭādaśāntarakalpā bhavanti
# de nas yar skye ba dang mar 'bri ba gzhan bco brgyad de / / bar gyi bskal pa gzhan bco brgyad du 'gyur ro /
kathaṃ kṛtvā
# ji lta zhe na /
tebhyo hi daśavarṣāyuṣkebhya utkarṣaṃ gacchantaḥ krameṇāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavanti
# tshe lo bcu pa de dag kyang yar skye bar 'gyur ba na rim gyis tshe lo brgyad khri'i bar 'gyur /
punaścāpakarṣaṃ gacchanto daśavarṣāyuṣo bhavanti / evaṃ dvitīyo'ntarakalpaḥ
# yang mar 'bri bar 'gyur ba na tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ba 'di ni bar gyi bskal pa gnyis pa yin te /
evaṃ yāvadaṣṭādaśa / utkarṣa ekaḥ
# de lta bu bco brgyad kyi bar dang yar skye ba ni gcig yin te /
ekāntarakalpo viṃśatitama utkarṣa evamapakarṣaḥ
# bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu pa gcig ni yar skye ba kho na yin gyi mar 'grib pa ni ma yin no /
daśavarṣāyuṣkebhyo yāvadaśītivarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmiti varttate
# mi rnams kyi tshe lo bcu pa dag las tshe lo brgyad khri pa'i bar du 'gyur ro /
athaite utkarṣāḥ kiyantaṃ prakarṣaṃ gacchanti
# yang mar skye ba de dag ji tsam du yang skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
te'śītisahasrādyāvadāyuṣaḥ / nātaḥ pareṇa vardhante yāvāneva cānyeṣāmantarakalpānāmutkarṣāpakarṣakālastāvāneva prathamasyāpakarṣakālaḥ paścimasya cotkarṣakāla iti samānakālāḥ sarve bhavanti
# de dag tshe ni brgyad khri'i bar / / de las yar ni mi skye'o / / bar gyi bskal pa gzhan rnams kyi yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa'i dus ji srid par bar gyi bskal pa dang po'i mar 'grib pa dang tha ma'i yar skye ba'i dus kyang de srid pas thams cad dus mnyam pa yin no /
iti loko vivṛtto'yaṃ kalpāṃstiṣṭhati viṃśatim
# de ltar 'jig rten chags pa 'di / / bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas /
ityanenāntarakalpanyāyenāyaṃ viṃśatimantarakalpānvivṛttastiṣṭhati
# de ltar na bar gyi bskal pa'i tshul 'dis 'jig rten 'di bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur chags nas gnas so /
yāvantaṃ kālaṃ vivṛttastiṣṭhati tāvantameva kālaṃ
# dus ji srid du chags nas gnas pa'i dus de srid kho nar /
vivartate'tha saṃvṛtta āste samvartate samam
# 'chags pa dang ni 'jig pa dang / / zhig nas 'dug pa dag mnyam mo /
viṃśatimevāntarakalpān vivartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvartate viṃśatiṃ saṃvṛtta āste / yadyapi tadānīmutkarṣā apakarṣāśca na pravartante kālastu samānaḥ parisaṃkhyāyate
# bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu kho nar 'chags so / / nyi shur 'jig go / / nyi shur zhig nas 'dug go / / gal te yang de'i tshe yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa mi 'jug tu zin kyang dus ni mnyam par yongs su brtsi'o / / de la bar gyi bskal pa gcig tu snod rnams 'chags so /
tatraikenāntara kalpena bhājanānyabhinivartante ekānnaviṃśatyā 'ntarakalpairāvāsyante ekenāntarakalpena bhājanāni vidhvasyante ekānnaviṃśatyā śūnyī bhavanti / tā etā antarakalpānāṃ catasro viṃśatyo'śītirbhavanti / te hyaśītirmahākalpaḥ
# bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgur gnas par byed do / / bar gyi bskal pa gcig tu snod rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro / / bcu dgur stong par 'gyur ro / / bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu phrag bzhi po de dag ni brgyad cur 'gyur te / / de dag brgyad cu la bskal chen /
etanmahākalpasya pramāṇam
# bskal pa chen po'i tshad ni de yin no /
kalpaḥ kiṃsvabhāvaḥ / pañcaskandhasvabhāvaḥ
# bskal pa'i rang bzhin ci zhe na / / phung po lnga'i rang bzhin no /
yaducyate tribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpānāṃ budhatvaṃ prāpyata iti / tat katameṣāṃ kalpānām
# bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa de bskal pa de dag gang zhe na /
ya eva mahākalpo nirdiṣṭaḥ
# bskal pa chen por bshad pa gang yin pa /
tadasaṃkhyatrayodbhavam / buddhatvam
# de grangs med gsum la sangs rgyas 'byung ngo /
saṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāṃ trayeṇa / kathamasaṃkhyeyasyāsati saṃkhyeyāvasāne punastritvamucyate / naiadevaṃ veditavyaṃ
# bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis so / / grangs med pa la grangs kyi mtha' med na ji ltar gsum nyid du brjod ce na / / de ni de ltar rig par mi bya'o / / 'o na ci zhe na /
ṣaṣṭiḥ sthānāntarāṇyasaṃkhyeyamiti muktakasūtraṃ paṭhyate / katamāni ṣaṣṭiḥ / eko hyadvitīyaḥ prathamaṃ sthānāntaram / ekakānāṃ daśako dvitīyam / daśa daśakāni śataṃ tṛtīyam / daśa śatāni sahasram / daśa sahasrāṇi prabhedaḥ / daśa prabhedā lakṣam
# mdo sil bu las / / grangs ni gnas gzhan drug cu dag go zhes 'byung ngo / / drug cu gang zhe na / / gcig ste gnyis pa ma yin pa ni gnas gzhan dang po yin no / / gcig bcu ni gnyis pa yin no / / bcu phrag bcu la ni brgya ste gsum pa yin no / / brgya phrag bcu la ni stong ngo / / stong phrag bcu la ni khri'o / / khri phrag bcu la ni 'bum mo /
daśa lakṣā atilakṣaḥ / daśātilakṣāḥ kauṭiḥ
# 'bum phrag bcu la ni sa ya'o / / sa ya phrag bcu la ni bye ba'o /
daśa kauṭyo madhyaḥ
# bye ba phrag bcu la ni dung phyur ro /
daśa madhyā ayutam / śāyutā mahāyutam / daśa mahāyutā niyutam / daśa niyutā mahāniyutam / daśa mahāniyutāḥ prayutam
# dung phyur phrag bcu la ni ther 'bum mo / / ther 'bum phrag bcu la ni ther 'bum chen po'o / / ther 'bum chen po phrag bcu la ni khrag khrig go / / khrag khrig phrag bcu la ni khrag khrig chen po'o / / khrag khrig chen po phrag bcu la ni rab bkram mo /
daśa prayutā mahāprayutaḥ / daśa mahāprayutāḥ kaṅkaraḥ / daśa kaṅkarā mahākaṅkaraḥ / daśa mahākaṅkarā visvaraḥ / daśa visvarā mahāvisvaraḥ
# rab bkram phrag bcu la ni rab bkram chen po'o / / rab bkram chen po phrag bcu la ni gtams so / / gtams phrag bcu la ni gtams chen no; / / gtams chen phrag bcu la ni dkrigs so / / dkrigs phrag bcu la ni dkrigs chen no /
daśa mahāvisvarā akṣobhyaḥ
# dkrigs chen phrag bcu la ni mi 'khrugs pa'o /
daśākṣobhyā mahākṣobhyaḥ
# mi 'khrugs pa phrag bcu la ni mi 'khrugs pa chen po'o /
daśa mahākṣobhyā vivāhaḥ
# mi 'khrugs pa chen po phrag bcu la ni khyad phyin no /
daśa vivāhā mahāvivāhaḥ
# khyad phyin phrag bcu la ni khyad phyin chen po'o /
daśa mahāvivāhā utsaṅgaḥ
# khyad phyin chen po phrag bcu la ni pang steng ngo /
daśotsaṅgā mahotsaṅgaḥ
# pang steng phrag bcu la ni pang steng chen po'o /
daśa mahotsaṅgā vāhanaḥ
# pang steng chen po phrag bcu la ni ded 'dren no /
daśa vāhanāni mahāvāhanam
# ded 'dren phrag bcu la ni ded 'dren chen po'o /
daśa mahāvāhanāni taṭibhaḥ
# ded 'dren chen po phrag bcu la ni mtha' snang ngo /
daśa tiṭibhā mahātiṭibhaḥ
# mtha' snang phrag bcu la ni mtha' snang chen po'o /
daśa mahātiṭibhā hetuḥ
# mtha' snang chen po phrag bcu la ni rgyu rig go /
daśa hetavo mahāhetuḥ
# rgyu rig phrag bcu la ni rgyu rig chen po'o /
daśa mahāhetavaḥ karabhaḥ
# rgyu rig chen po phrag bcu la ni 'od mdzes so /
daśa karabhā mahākarabhaḥ / daśa mahākarabhā indraḥ / daśendrā mahendraḥ / daśa mahendrāḥ samāptam
# 'od mdzes phrag bcu la ni 'od mdzes chen po'o / / 'od mdzes chen po phrag bcu la ni dbang po'o / / dbang po phrag bcu la ni dbang chen no / / dbang chen phrag bcu la ni legs phyin no /
daśa samāptāni mahāsamāptam
# legs phyin phrag bcu la ni legs phyin chen po'o /
daśa mahāsamāptāni gatiḥ
# legs phyin chen po phrag bcu la ni rtogs 'gro'o /
daśa gatayo mahāgatiḥ / daśa mahāgatayo nimbarajaḥ
# rtogs 'gro phrag bcu la ni rtogs 'gro chen po'o / / rtogs 'gro chen po phrag bcu la 'bying rdul lo /
daśa nimbarajāṃsi mahānimbarajaḥ / daśa mahānimbarajāṃsi mudrā
# 'bying rdul phrag bcu la ni 'bying rdul chen po'o / / 'bying rdul chen po phrag bcu la ni rgya rtags so /
daśa mudrā mahāmudrā / daśa mahāmudrāḥ balam / daśa balāni mahābalam
# rgya rtags phrag bcu la ni rgya rtags chen po'o / / rgya rtags chen po phrag bcu la ni stobs 'khor ro / / stobs 'khor phrag bcu la ni stobs 'khor chen po'o /
daśa mahābalāni sajñā / daśa saṃjñā mahāsaṃjñā
# stobs 'khor chen po phrag bcu la ni brda shes so / / brda shes phrag bcu la ni brda shes chen po'o /
daśa mahāsaṃjñā vibhūtaḥ
# brda shes chen po phrag bcu la ni rnam 'byung ngo /
daśa vibhūtā mahāvibhūtaḥ / daśa mahāvibhūtā balākṣam / daśa balākṣā mahābalākṣam / daśa mahābalākṣāṇyasamkhyam
# rnam 'byung phrag bcu la ni rnam 'byung chen po'o / / rnam 'byung chen po phrag bcu la ni stobs mig go / / stobs mig phrag bcu la ni stobs mig chen po'o / / stobs mig chen po phrag bcu la ni grangs med pa ste /
aṣṭakaṃ madhyādvistṛtam
# bar gyi gnas brgyad ni ma rnyed do /
ityeteṣāṃ ṣaṣṭisthānāntaragatāṃ saṃkhyāmanuprāptāḥ kalpā asaṃkhyeyānityucyante / tato vyāvṛtya punargaṇyante
# de ltar na gnas gzhan drug cur phyin pa de dag tu phyin pa'i bskal pa ni / / bskal pa grangs med pa zhes bya'o / / de nas yang bzlog nas bgrang ste /
evaṃ trīṇi asaṃkhyeyānītyucyante / na tu naiva parisaṃkhyātuṃ śakyanta iti / kintu khalu kālaprakarṣeṇaiva kṛtapraṇidhānā bodhisattvā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyante / kimetadeva bhaviṣyati / mahatāṃ hi puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ bahubhirduṣkaraśatasahasraistribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante bodhisattvāḥ
# de ltar na grangs med pa gsum zhes bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad du yongs su bgrang bar mi nus pas ni ma yin no / / 'o na yang byang chub sems dpa' smon lam btab pa rnams dus ring po kho nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram zhe na / / ci de de ltar 'gyur ram / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong gis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro /
yadyapyanyathā'pyasti mokṣāvakāśaḥ kimarthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante
# gal te thar pa'i go skabs gzhan de lta ma yin pa yang yod na go / / de dag ci'i phyir 'bad pa 'di snyed cig rtsom par byed ce na /
parārthaṃ ta iyantaṃ yatnamārabhante kathaṃ parānapi mahato duḥkhaughāt paritrātuṃ śaknuyāmiti
# de dag ni ji ltar na gzhan dag kyang sdug bsngal gyi chu bo chen po las yongs su bskyab par nus par 'gyur snyam du gzhan gyi don du 'bad pa rtsom par byed do /
ka eṣāṃ parārthena svārthaḥ / eṣa eva teṣāṃ svārtho yaḥ parārthastasyābhimatatvāt
# 'di dag gi gzhan gyi don gyis bdag gi don du 'gyur ba gang yin zhe na / / de dag gi gzhan gyi don gang yin pa de nyid bdag gi don te / / de 'dod pa'i phyir ro /
idānīmetacchrāddhāsyate
# da ni su zhig 'di la dad par 'gyur zhe na /
satyaṃ duḥśraddhānametadātmaṃbharibhirniṣkaruṇaiḥ
# bdag gso bar byed pa'i snying rje med pa rnams kyis 'di la dad par dka' ba ni bden no /
kāruṇikaistu śraddhitamevaitat yathā ceha kecidabhyastanairdhṛṇyā asatyapi svārthe paravyasanābhiratā upalabhyante / tathā punarabhyastakāruṇyā asatyapi svārthe parahitakriyābhirāmāḥ santīti saṃbhāvyam
# snying rje can rnams kyis dad par byas zin pa yin te / / dper na 'di na snying rje med pa la goms pa kha cig rang gi don med bzhin du yang gzhan nyon mongs pa la mngon par dga' ba dmigs pa de bzhin du snying rje la goms pa dag rang gi don med bzhin du yang gzhan la phan par bya ba la mngon par dga' ba yod do snyam du yid ches par bya'o /
yathaiva cābhyāsavaśādanātmabhūteṣu saṃskāreṣu saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānabhijñā ātmasnehaṃ niveśya taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahanti evaṃ punarabhyāsavaśādātmasnehaṃ tebhyo nirvartya pareṣvapekṣāṃ vardhayitvā taddhetorduḥkhānyudvahantīti saṃbhāvyam
# yang dper na 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid mngon par mi shes pa dag goms pa'i dbang gis 'dus byas bdag med par gyur pa dag la bdag tu chags pa bskyed nas rgyu des sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong par 'gyur ba de bzhin du goms pa'i dbang gis de dag las bdag tu chags pa bzlog nas / / gzhan dag la lta ba bskyed de / / rgyu des sdug bsngal dag myong bar 'gyur ro snyam du yid ches par bya'o / / gang gzhan dag gi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing /
gotrāntarameva hi tattathājātīyaṃ nirvartate yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhena duḥkhāyate sukhena sukhāyate nātmana iti / na te punaḥ svārthamanyaṃ paśyanti / āha cātra
# gzhan dag gi bde bas bde bar 'gyur gyi / / bdag nyid kyi ni ma yin pa de lta bu'i rigs gzhan kho na yang 'grub ste / / de lta ni rang gi don du mi blta'o / / 'dir smras pa /
hīnaḥ prārthayate svasaṃtatigataṃ yaistairūpāyaḥ sukhaṃ
# dman pa de dang de'i thabs kyis rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i bde ba don du gnyer /
madhyo duḥkhanivṛttimeva na sukhaṃ duḥkhāspadaṃ tadyataḥ / śreṣṭhaḥ prārthayate svasaṃtatigatairduḥkhaiḥ pareṣāṃ sukhaṃ / duḥkhātyantanivṛttimeva ca yatastadduḥkhaduḥkhyeva saḥ / kiṃ punarutkarṣā buddhā utpayante āhosvidapakarṣāḥ
# 'bring po sdug bsngal ldog pa kho na'o / / bde min gang phyir de ni sdug bsngal gnas yin phyir / / dam pa rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis gzhan dag la ni bde ba dang / / sdug bsngal gtan ldog kho na don gnyer gang phyir de yi sdug bsngal gyis de sdug bsngal phyir / / yang ci sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yar skye ba'i tshe 'byung ngam /
apakarṣe hi śatādyāvattadudbhavaḥ
# 'on te mar 'grib pa'i tshe 'byung zhe na / / mar ni 'grib pa yi /
aśītivarṣaśatāyupi prajāyāmapakarṣe ārabdhe yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣo manuṣyā bhavantyetasminnantare buddhā utpadyante
# brgya yi bar la de dag 'byung / / skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri ba mar 'grib pa nas brtsams pa nas mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgya pa yin pa'i bar 'dir sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
kasmānnotkarṣakāle / tadā hi duḥsamudvejāḥ sattvā bhavanti
# ci'i phyir yang skye ba'i dus su ni ma yin zhe na / / de'i tshe sems can rnams skyo bar dka' ba'i phyir ro /
kasmānna śatāt / tadā hi pañca kaṣāyā abhyutsadā bhavanti
# ci'i phyir brgya las mar 'grib pa'i tshe ma yin zhe na / / de'i tshe snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste /
tadyathā'yuṣkaṣāyaḥ kalpakaṣāyaḥ kleśakaṣāyaḥ dṛṣṭikaṣāyaḥ sattvakaṣāyaśca
# tshe'i snyigs ma dang dus kyi snyigs ma dang nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang lta ba'i snyigs ma dang sems can gyi snyigs ma shin tu lhag pa yin te /
apakarṣasyādhastāt pratyavarā āyurādayaḥ kiṭabhūtatvāt kaṣāyā ucyante / dvābhyāṃ hi jīvitopakaraṇavipattī yathākramam
# mar 'grib pa'i 'og tu ni tshe la sogs pa tha chad yin no / / ngan snyigs su gyur pa'i phyir snyigs ma dag ces bya'o; / / gnyis kyis ni go rims bzhin du srog dang yo byad rgud par byed do /
dvābhyāṃ kuśalapakṣavīpattiḥ / kāmasukhallikā'tmaklamathānuyogādhikārāt gṛhipravrajitapakṣayorvā
# gnyis kyis ni 'dod pa'i bsod nyams dang bdag ngal ba la sogs pa'am / / yang na khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba'i phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas dge ba'i phyogs rkud par byed do /
ekenātmabhāvavīpattiḥ / pramāṇarūpārogyabalavṛddhismṛtivīryadhairyabhraṃsāt
# gcig gis ni lus rgud par byed do / / bong tshod dang gzugs dang nad med pa dang stobs dang blo dang dran pa dang brtson 'grus dang brtan pa nyams pa'i phyir ro /
atha pratyekabuddhānāṃ kasmin kāle utpādaḥ
# yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dus gang du 'byung zhe na /
dvayoḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ
# rang sangs rgyas rnams gnyi ga la /
utkarṣe'yapakarṣe'pi
# yar skye ba la yang 'byung /
dvividhā hi pratyekabuddhā vargacāriṇaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpāśca
# mar 'grib pa na yang 'byung ngo / / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rnam pa gnyis te / / tshogs shing spyod pa rnams dang bse ru lta bu rnams so /
tatra vargacāriṇaḥ śrāvakapūrviṇaḥ pratyekajinā ucyante
# de la tshogs shing spyod pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi rigs su gyur pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rang rgyal ba rnams zhes bya'o /
pṛthagjanapūrviṇo'pi santītyapare
# gzhan dag na re so so'i skye bo sngon du 'gro ba dag kyang yod de /
ye'nyatrotpāditanirvedhabhāgīyā iha svayaṃ mārgamabhisaṃbudhyante / tathāhi pūrvayogaṃ paṭhanti parvate kila pañcaśatāni tāpasānāṃ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyante sma yāvat pratyekabuddhasahoṣitena markaṭenāgamya tadīryāpathasaṃdarśanāt pratyekabodhimabhisaṃbanddhā iti
# gang dag gzhan du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams bskyed pa tshe 'di la bdag nyid kyis lam mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer zhing / / 'di skad du re zhig ri la dka' thub can lnga brgya zhig dka' thub drag po dag gis gdung bar byas pa na rang sangs rgyas dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa'i spre'u zhig dang phrad nas de'i spyod lam bstan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du grag go zhes sngon gyi gtam 'don par byed do /
nacāryāḥ santaḥ kaṣṭāni tapāṃsi tapyeran
# 'phags pa dag cig yin na ni dka' thub drag po dag gis gdung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe'o /
khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpāḥ punarekavihāriṇaḥ / teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ
# bse ru lta bu rnams ni re re gnas pa dag yin no / / rang sangs rgyas de dag las /
khaḍgaḥ kalpaśatānvayaḥ / mahākalpānāṃ śataṃ bodhisaṃbhāreṣu caritaḥ khaḍgaṃ viṣāṇakalpo bhavati
# bse ru bskal pa brgya'i rgyus bskal pa chen po brgyar byang chub kyi tshogs dag la spyod pas bse ru lta bur 'gyur ro /
vinopadeśenātmānamekaṃ pratibudhā iti pratyekabuddhāḥ
# lung med par bdag gcig pu'i phyir sangs rgyas pas rang sangs rgyas dag ste /
te hyekamātmānaṃ damayanti nānyān / kiṃ punaratra kāraṇam
# de dag ni bdag nyid 'dul bar byed kyi gzhan dag ni ma yin no / / 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod /
nahi tāvadaśaktā dharmaṃ deśayituṃ pratisaṃvitprāptatvāt
# re zhig so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i phyir chos ston par mi spyod pa yang ma yin la /
śakyaṃ ca taiḥ pūrvabuddhānāṃ śāsanamanusmṛtyāpi dharmaṃ deśayitum
# de dag gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa rjes su dran nas yang chos ston par spyod do /
nāpi niṣkaruṇāḥ / sattvānugrahārthamṛddherāviṣkaraṇāt
# thugs rje med par yang ma yin te / / sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du rdzu 'phrul ston pa'i phyir ro /
nāpi sattvānāmabhavyatvāt / tathā hi laukikamārga vītarāgāḥ saṃvidyante
# sems can rnams skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i phyir yang ma yin te / / 'di ltar 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba dag kyang yod do /
kiṃ tarhi / pūrvābhyāsavaśenālpotsukatā'dhimuktatvāt notsahante gambhīradharmagrahaṇāya pareṣāṃ vyāpartum
# 'o na ji lta zhe na / / sngon goms pa'i dbang gis bsod snyoms la mos pa'i phyir sems can rnams chos zab mo 'dzin du 'jug pa'i don du byed par mi spro ste /
anusroto gāminīnāṃ hi prajānāṃ duṣkaraṃ pratisroto nayanam
# skye dgu rgyun phyogs su 'gro ba rnams ni rgyun phyogs las bzlog par bkri bar dka'o /
gaṇaparikarṣaṇaprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ ca vyākṣepasaṃsargabhīrutvāt
# rnam par g yeng ba dang 'du 'dzis skrag pas 'khor yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba spang ba'i phyir ro /
atha cakravarttinaḥ kadotpadyante
# 'khor los sgyur ba rnams nam 'byung zhe na /
cakravartisamutpattirnādho'śītisahasrakāt
# 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba ni / / stong phrag brgyad cu las mi 'phyi /
amite cāyuṣi manuṣyāṇāṃ yāvadaśītisahasrake cotpattiścakravarttināṃ nādhaḥ
# mi rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa nas brgyad khri'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba rnams 'byung ngo / / 'og tu ni ma yin te /
tasyāḥ sasyasaṃpadastadūnāyuṣāmabhājanatvāt
# de bas thung ba'i tshe ni phun sum tshogs pa de'i snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
rājyaṃ cakreṇa vartayituṃ śīlameṣāmiti cakravarttinaḥ / te punaścaturvidhāḥ / suvarṇarūpyatāmrāyaścakriṇaḥ
# de dag ni rgyal srid 'khor los sgyur ba'i dang tshul can yin pas 'khor los sgyur ba rnams so / / de dag kyang rnam pa bzhi ste / / gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo can /
suvarṇarūpyatāmrāyaścakrkāṇi yeṣāṃ santi
# gang dag la gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags kyi 'khor lo dag yod pa ste /
prathama eṣāmuttamo dvitīya upottamaḥ tṛtīyo madhyamaścaturtho 'dhamaḥ
# de dag gi dang po ni mchog yin no / / gnyis pa ni nye ba'i mchog yin no / / gsum pa ni 'bring yin no /
te 'dharakramāt
# bzhi pa ni tha ma'o /
ekadvitricaturdvīpāḥ / yasyāyasaṃ cakraṃ sa ekadvīpādhipatiḥ / yasya tāmramayaṃ sa dvayoḥ
# de dag gling gcig gling gnyis dang / / gsum dang bzhi la mas rim bzhin / / gang la lcags kyi 'khor lo yod pa de ni gling gcig gi bdag po yin no / / gang la zangs kyi yod pa de ni gnyis kyi'o /
yasya rūpyamayaṃ sa trayāṇām / yasya suvarṇmayaṃ sa caturdvīpādhipatiḥ
# gang la dngul gyi yod pa de ni gsum gyi'o / / gang la gser gyi yod pa de ni gling bzhi la dbang ba yin te /
eṣa prājñaptiko nirdeśaḥ
# 'di ni btags pa las bstan pa yin no /
sūtre tu pradhānagrahaṇādekameva sauvarṇaṃ cakram / yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadaīva poṣadhe pañcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātasyopoṣadho poṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ śubhakarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ sa rājā bhavati cakravartīti
# mdo las ni gtso bo smos pa'i phyir rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba gang zhig tshes bco lnga la gso sbyong gi dus de kho nar mgo bkrus gso sbyong bsten nas khang bzangs kyi thog tu blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba la shar phyogs nas 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong pa / / lte ba dang bcas pa / / mu khyud dang bcas pa / / rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa / / mdzes pa / / mkhan bzos ma byas pa / / lha rdzas thams cad gser gyi rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal ba'i rgyal po yin no zhes gser gyi 'khor lo gcig kho nar gsungs so /
evaṃ caite cakravartina utpadyante / na ca dvau saha buddhavat
# 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag ni 'di ltar 'byung ste / / lhan cig gnyis min sangs rgyas bzhin /
sūtra ukta masthānamanavakāśo yadapūrvācaramau dvau tathāgatāvarhantau samyaksaṃbuddhau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate sthānametadvidyate yadaikastathāgataḥ
# mdo las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis snga phyi med par 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de / / 'di ni gnas med kyi /
yathā tathāgata evaṃ cakravarttināviti / idamatra saṃpradhāryam / kimatra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturloka iṣṭa utāho sarvalokadhātava iti
# gcig gang yin pa de ni gnas yod do / / de bzhin gshegs pa dag ji lta bar 'khor los sgyur ba dag kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs so / / 'dir ni 'di dpyad par bya ste / / ci 'dir stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jig rten du 'dod dam / / 'on te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yin zhe na /
nānyatra buddhā utpadyante ityeke
# kha cig na re gzhan du sangs rgyas dag mi 'byung ngo /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
mā bhūt bhagavataḥ śaktivyāghātaḥ iti / eka eva hi bhagavān sarvatra śaktaḥ / yatra buddha eko na śaktaḥ syād vineyān vinetuṃ tatrā'nyo'pi na śakta iti / uktaṃ ca sūtre sa cettvāṃ śāriputra kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet asti kaścidetarhi śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamaḥ śramaṇena gotamena yadutābhisaṃbodhāya / evaṃ ca pṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ vyākuryāḥ
# bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu thogs pa yod par 'gyur du 'ong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das gcig kho nas thams cad du yang spyod do / / gang du bcom ldan 'das gcig gis gdul bya rnams gdul bar mi spyod pa de ni gzhan gyis kyang mi spyod do / / mdo las kyang / / sh'a ri'i bu gal te la la zhig khyod kyi thang du 'ongs nas 'di skad du / / da ltar dge slong ngam / / bram ze gang yang rung / / dge sbyong goo ta ma dang 'di lta ste / / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la mnyam zhing mnyam pa 'ga' zhig yod dam zhes 'dri bar 'gyur na / / de skad du dris na ji skad du lan gdab / / bcun pa gal te la la zhig bdag gi thad du mchis nas 'di skad du 'dri bar 'gyur na / / de la bdag gis 'di skad ces da ltar dge slong ngam /
sa cenmāṃ bhadanta kaścidupasaṃkramyevaṃ pṛcchettasyāhaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākuryā nāsti kaścidetarhhi śṛamaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā samasamo bhagavatā yadutābhisaṃbodhāya / tatkasya hetoḥ / saṃmukhaṃ me bhagavato'ntikācchrutaṃ saṃmukhamudgṛhītaṃ asthānamanavakāso yadapūrvācaramau tathāgatau loka utpadyeyātāṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti
# bram ze yang rung / / bcom ldan 'das dang mnyam zhing mnyam pa ni 'ga' yang med do zhes dris pa'i lan gdab bar bgyi'o / / btsun pa de ci'i slad du zhe na / / gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis snga phyi med par 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de / / 'di ni gnas med do zhes bcom ldan 'das las thos shing mngon sum du bzung ba'i slad du'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro /
yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ brahmasūtre yāvattrisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko vaśe me'tra vartata iti
# 'o na gang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i mdo las / / nga ni stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar 'di la dbang bsgyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa ji ltar drang zhe na /
ābhiprāyika eṣa nirdeśaḥ
# bstan pa 'di ni dgongs pa can yin no /
ko'trābhiprāyaḥ tāvato'nabhisaṃskāreṇa vyavalokanāt
# 'di la dgongs pa gang yin zhe na / / mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar de srid du rnam par gzigs pa'i phyir ro /
abhisaṃskārena tvananto buddhānāṃ cakṣurviṣayaḥ / santyevānyalokadhātuṣu buddhā iti nikāyāntarīyāḥ
# mngon par 'du mdzad na ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan gyi yul mtha' yas pa yin no / / sde pa gzhan dag na re 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na yang sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs so /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
bahavo hi samaṃ saṃbhāreṣu pravartamānā dṛśyante
# mang po zhig mnyam du tshogs dag la zhugs par snang la /
na caikatra bahūnāṃ buddhānāṃ yugapat yoga utpattuṃ na cāsti tadut pattau kakścit pratibandhaḥ iti niyataṃ lokadhātvantareṣūtpadyante / anantā lokadhātava iti na śakyaṃ bhagavatā kalpamapyāyurvirbhratā yitheha tathā'nyeṣvapi ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu vyāpartuṃ kiṃ punaḥ puruṣāyuṣam / kathaṃ ceha buddho vyāpriyate
# gcig tu sangs rgyas mang po zhig cig car 'byung bar yang mi rung la / / 'byung ba la bgegs byed pa 'ga' yang med pas gdon mi za bar 'jig rten gzhan dag tu 'byung ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang mtha' yas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe bskal par bzhugs kyang / / 'dir ji lta bar mtha' yas pa gzhan dag tu mdzad par mi spyod na mi'i tshes lta smos kyang ci dgos / / 'dir bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mdzad ce na /
asya pudgalasyedamindriyam iyatā kālelāmuṣmin deśe amuṃ pudgalamāgamyāsya doṣasya parihārādasyāṅgasyopasaṃhārādanena prayogeṇānutpannaṃ votpatsyate aparipūrṇaṃ vā paripūrayiṣyatīti
# gang zag 'di'i dbang po 'di ni dus 'di srid kyis yul che ge mo zhig tu gang 'di la brten nas nyes pa 'di yongs su spangs shing yan lag 'di nye bar bsgrubs pa'i phyir sbyor ba 'dis nam skyes pa ni skye bar 'gyur ro / / ma rdzogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mkhyen pa lta bu yin no /
yattvidaṃ sūtramatropanīta masthānamanavakāśo yadpūrvācaramau dvī tathāgatāvekatra loka utpadyeyātāmiti tadevedaṃ saṃpradhāryate kimidamekaṃ lokadhātumadhikṛtyoktamāhosvit sarvāniti
# 'di la khungs su gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis snga phyi med par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di phyung ba gang yin pa de nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa zhig gam / / 'on te thams cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa zhig ces dpyad par bya'o /
cakravartino'pi cāsya lokaddhātau na syādutpādaḥ
# 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
sahotpattipratiṣedhāt buddhavat / athaitat kṣamyate idaṃ tu kasmānna kṣamyate puṇyastu buddhānāṃ loka utpāda iti
# lhan cig 'byung ba bkag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bzhin no / / 'on te bzod na ni sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni bsod nams kyi gzhi yin pas 'di yang ci'i phyir mi bzod de /
yadi bahūnāṃ bahuṣu syānna doṣaḥ syāt / bhūyasāṃ lokānāmabhyudayena yogaḥ syānniḥśreyasena ca / athaiṅkasminnapi kasmāt dvau tathāgatau na sahotpadyete / prayojanābhāvāt praṇidhānavaśācca
# gal te mang po zhig tu phal po che zhig 'byung bar gyur na yang skyon du mi 'gyur gyi 'jig rten phal cher mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro / / 'on te gcig tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis ci'i phyir 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhe na / / dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang smon lam gyi dbang gis te /
evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti aho vatāhamandhe loke 'pariṇāyake buddho loka utpadyeyamanāthānāṃ nātha iti
# byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di skad du kye ma bdag ni 'dren pa med pa ldongs pa'i 'jig rten du mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du sangs rgyas su 'byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par byed do /
ādarābhitvarārthaṃ ca / ekasminhi buddhe sutarāmādriyante durlabha īdṛśo'nya iti manyamānāḥ sutarāṃ cābhitvarante śāsanapratipattau mā'smin gate parinirvṛte vā 'nāthā bhūmeti
# gus pa dang rings par bya ba'i yang phyir ro zhes zer ro / / sangs rgyas gcig la ni shin tu yang gus par 'gyur la / / 'di lta bu gzhan la ni rnyed par dka'o snyam du sems pa ni 'di gshegs sam yongs su mya ngan las 'das na mgon med par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes bstan pa bsgrub pa la shin tu rings par yang byed do /
athaite cakravartinaḥ suvarṇādimayaiścakraiḥ pṛthivīṃ jayantaḥ kathaṃ jayanti
# yang 'khor lo ma sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag gser la sogs pa'i 'khor lo dag gis sa las rgyal bar byed pa na ji ltar rgyal par byed ce na /
yathākramaṃ
# go rims bzhin du /
pratyudyānasvayaṃyāna kalahāstrajitaḥ
# phas bsu rang 'gro g yul bshams dang / / mtshon brtsams pas rgyal /
yasya sauvarṇa cakraṃ bhavati taṃ koṭarājānaḥ svayaṃ pratyudgacchanti / ime devasya janapadāḥ ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca
# gang la gser gyi 'khor lo yod pa de la ni khams kyi rgyal phran rnams 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang gang lo legs pa dang skye bo dang mi phal po ches bltams pa'i ljongs 'di dag ni lha'i lags kyi lhas de dag rjes su bstan du gsol /
tān devaḥ samanuśāstu / vayaṃ devasyānuyātrikā bhaviṣyāma iti
# bdag cag ni lha'i zham 'bring 'tshal lo zhes phas bsu bar byed do /
yasya rūpyamayaṃ sa svayameva teṣāmantikaṃ yāti paścādasya prahvībhavanti
# gang la dngul gyi 'khor lo yod pa de la ni bdag nyid de dag gi thad du 'gro ste / / phyis 'dud par 'gyur ro /
yasya tāmramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gatvā kalahāyate paścāt prahvībhavanti
# gang la zangs kyi 'khor lo yod pa de ni de dag gi thad du song nas g yul shom par byed de / / phyis 'dud par 'gyur ro /
yasya śastramayaṃ sa teṣāmantikaṃ gacchati anyonyaṃ śastrāṇyāvahanti paścānnamanti
# gang la lcags kyi 'khor lo yod pa de ni de dag gi thad du song nas phan tshun mtshon brtsams pa las phyis 'dud par byed do /
sarve tu cakravartinaḥ
# 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyang /
avadhāḥ
# gnod pa med /
śastreṇāpi jayatāṃ badho na pravartate nirjitya ca sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti
# mtshon chas rgyal yang gsod du mi 'jug go / / rgyal nas yang sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la 'jog par byed do /
ata eva te niyataṃ deveṣūtpadyante / sūtra uktaṃ rājñaścakravartino loke prādurbhāvātsaptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati
# de gnyis kyi phyir de dag ni nges par lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro / / mdo las / / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag 'jig rten du byung bas 'jig rten du rin po che sna bdun po 'di lta ste /
tadyathā cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvaratnasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasyeti / kathaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātā hastyādayaḥ parakīyeṇa karmaṇotpadyante
# 'khor lo rin po che dang glang po rin po che dang rta rin po che dang nor bu rin po che dang bud med rin po che dang khyim bdag rin po che dang blon po rin po che 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ji ltar na sems can zhes bya ba glang po che la sogs pa gzhan gyi las kyi sa 'byung zhe na /
na vai kaścit parakīyeṇotpadyate / yena tu sattvena tatsaṃbandha saṃvartanīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ tasminnutpanne svānyevainaṃ karmāṇyutpādayanti
# gzhan gyi las kho nas 'byung ba ni ma yin gyi / / sems can gang dag gis de dang 'brel par 'gyur ba'i las brtsams pa de ni de byung na rang gi las de dag kho nas skyed par byed do /
kimeṣa evānyarājabhyaścakravartināṃ viśeṣaḥ / anyo'pi viśeṣo'sti
# ci 'khor los sgyur ba rnams rgyal po gzhan dag las khyad par de kho na yod dam zhe na / / khyad par gzhan yang yod de /
tadyathā dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānyeṣāṃ bhavanti tadyathā buddhānām / tatra tu
# de dag las skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang yod de / / dper na sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhin no / / de la /
deśasthottaptapūrṇatvairlakṣaṇātiśayo muneḥ
# thub mtshan yul na gnas pa dang / / gsal la rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin /
deśasthatarāṇi buddhānāṃ lakṣaṇāni / uttaptatarāṇi saṃpūrṇatarāṇi cetyeṣa teṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ
# sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan ni shin tu yul la gnas pa dang shin tu gsal ba dang shin tu kun rdzogs pa dag yin pas de dag gi khyad par ni de yin no /
kiṃ khalu prāthamakalpikā api manuṣyāḥ sarājakā āsan
# yang ci bskal ba dang po pa'i mi rnams kyang rgyal po dang bcas par gyur tam zhe na /
netyāha / kiṃ tarhi / prāgāsannupivat sattvāḥ / prathamakalpikā manuṣyā rūpāvacarā ivāsan / sūtra uktaṃ te bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā āvikalā ahīnendriyāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṃ prabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣaḥ prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣo dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantīti / rasarāgāttataḥ śanaiḥ
# smras pa ma yin no; / / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / sngar byung sems can gzugs can bzhin / / bskal pa dang po pa'i mi rnams ni gzugs na spyod pa bzhin du 'gyur te / / mdo las / / de dag ni gzugs dang ldan pa / / yid las byung ba / / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa / / dbang po ma tshang ba med pa / / ngan pa ma yin pa / / mdzes pa / / kha dog la gnas pa / / rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / / dga' ba za zhing zas su dga' ba za ba / / tshe ring ba / / yun ring por gnas pa yin no zhes gsungs so / / de nas rim gyis ro la chags /
ālasyātsamnidhim kṛtvā sāgrahaiḥ kṣetrapo bhṛtaḥ
# le los gsog 'jog byas nas ni / / 'dzin chags rnams kyis zhing dpon btab /
teṣāṃ tathābhūtānāṃ bhūmirasaḥ prādurbhūto madhusvādurasaḥ / tasyānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ sattvo gandhaṃ ghrātvā rasaṃ svāditavān bhakṣitavāṃśca
# de bzhin du 'byung ba de dag las sa'i ro sbrang rtsi'i ro bro ba zhig byung ba dang sems can brkam pa'i rang bzhin can gang yang rung ba zhig gis de'i dri bsnams nas ro myangs shing zos so /
tathā'nye'pi sattvāstathaivākārṣuḥ
# de nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du byed par 'gyur te /
sa ārambhaḥ kavaḍīkārāhārasya
# kham gyi zas za ba'i rtsom pa ni de yin no /
teṣāṃ tadāhārābhyāsāt kharatvaṃ gurutvaṃ ca kāye'vakrāntaṃ prabhāvā antarhitāḥ
# de dag zas de la goms pa'i phyir lus la rtsub pa nyid dang lci ba nyid ni zhugs / / 'od ni nub par gyur to /
tato'ndhakāra utpanne sūryācandramasau prādurbhūtau / so'pyeṣāṃ bhūmirasa āsvādagṛddhānāṃ krameṇāntarhito bhūmiparpaṭakaṃ prādurbhūtam
# de'i 'og tu mun pa 'byung ba dang nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang byung bar gyur / / ro la chags pa de dag las sa'i ro de yang rim gyis nub nas sa zhag cig byung bar gyur to /
tatrāpi gṛddhāstadapyantarhitam / vanalatā prādurbhūtā
# de la yang chags par gyur pa dang de yang nub nas myug gu'i tshal zhig byung bar gyur to /
tatrāpi gṛddhāḥ sā'pyantarhitā / akṛṣṭoptaḥ śālirutpannastaṃ prabhuktāḥ
# de la yang chags par gyur pa dang de yang nub nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras s'a lu zhig byung bar gyur to /
tasyedānīmaudārikatvānniḥsyandanirvāhārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mūtrapurīṣamārgau saha strīpuruṣendriyābhyāṃ prādurbhūtau saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnam
# de'i tshe de zos pa dang de ni ches rags pa yin pa'i phyir na rgyu mthun pa 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi gcin dang phyi sa'i lam dang pho mo'i dbang po dang bcas pa dang dbyibs tha dad pa yang byung bar gyur to /
teṣāmanyonyaṃ paśyatāṃ pūrvābhyāsavaśādayoniśomanaskāragrāhagrāsatāṃ gatānāṃ kāmarāga udīrṇo yato vipratipannāḥ
# de dag phan tshun mthong ba dang sngon goms pa'i dbang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa chu srin 'dzin khri'i kham du gyur pa rnams 'dod pa'i 'dod chags shas cher skyes nas de nas log par zhugs pa yin te /
eṣa ārambhaḥ kāmināṃ kāmabhūtagrahāveśasya
# 'dod pa can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i 'byung po'i gdon gyis rlom pa'i rtsom pa ni de yin no /
te ca khalu taṃ śāliṃ sāyaṃ ca sāyamāśārthaṃ prātaśca prātarāśārthaṃ praveśayanti sma
# yang de dag gi 'bras s'a lu de nang bza' bar bya ba de nang len / / nub bza' bar bya ba yang nub len pa las /
athānyatamaḥ sattvo'lasajātīyaḥ saṃnidhikāramakārṣīt / anye'pi ca sattvāḥ saṃnidhikāramakārṣuḥ / teṣāṃ tatra mamakāra utpanne sa śālirlūno lūno na punarjāyate sma
# yang sems can le lo'i rang bzhin can gang yang rung ba zhig gis gsog 'jog byas pa dang sems can gzhan dag kyang gsog 'jog byed par gyur to / / de dag de la bdag tu 'dzin pa skyes pa dang 'bras bu de brngas shing brngas pa dang yang mi skye bar gyur to /
tataḥ kṣetrāṇi pravibhajya sveṣvāgrahaṃ kṛtvā parakīyaṃ hartumārabdhāḥ
# de nas zhing rnams bgos te de bdag gis ni kun tu bzung nas gzhan gyi la ni dbrog par rtsom ste /
prathama ārambhaścauryasya
# chom rkun gyi rtsom pa dang po ni de yin no /
taisteṣāmaṅkuśārthaṃ sametyānyatamaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ kṣetrāṇi pālayituṃ ṣaṣṭhabhāgena bhṛtaḥ / tasya kṣetrāṇāmadhipatiḥ kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriya iti saṃjñotpannā
# de dag gis de dag dgag pa'i phyir 'dus nas mi'i khyad par gang yang rung ba zhig zhing rnams srung bar drug shas bstabs te / / de la zhing rnams kyi dpon po rgyal rigs rgyal zhes bya ba'i mid byung ngo /
mahājanakāyasya saṃmataḥ prajāṃ ca rañjayatīti mahāsaṃmato rājeti samjñotpannā / eṣa ārambho rājaparaṃparāyāḥ / tatra ye gṛhebhyo vahirmanasaḥ saṃvṛttāsteṣāṃ brāhmaṇā iti saṃjñotpannā
# skye bo'i tshogs phal po ches bkur ba dang skye dgu yang dga' bar byed pas rgyal po mang pos bkur ba zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste; rgyal po gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rtsom pa ni de yin no / / de la gang dag khyim dag nas yid phyir phyogs pa de dag la ni bram ze zhes bya ba'i ming byung ngo /
athānyatamasya rājño lobhāt samvibhāgamakurvantaḥ sattvānāṃ tāskaryaṃ prācuryamāpannaṃ sa tān śastreṇopasaṃkramate sma
# de nas gang yang rung ba'i rgyal po zhig gis chags pas sems can rnams la ma bgos pa dang rkun po mang du gyur te / / de dag la mtshon gyis 'debs par gyur to /
tato'nye naivaṅkārakāḥ sma iti mṛṣā vācaṃ vaktumārabdhāḥ iti
# de nas gzhan dag na re yang bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyis pa ma mchis so zhes brdzun du smra bar brtsams so /
tataḥ karmapathādhikyādapahrāse daśāyuṣaḥ
# de nas las kyi lam lhag pas / / tshe thung lo ni bcu yin no /
tata evaṃ karmapathānāṃ vṛddhau satyāṃ krameṇa hrasatāṃ manusyāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ saṃbhavanti / ato'sya kṛtsnasyānarthaughasya dvau dharmau mūlayoniḥ rasarāga ālasyaṃ ca
# de na de ltar las kyi lam rnams 'phel ba dang mi rnams kyi tshe khad kyis thung ngur gyur te / / tha mar mi tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro / / de'i phyir phung khrol gyi chu bo 'di mtha' dag gi rtsa ba'i skye gnas ni chos gnyis te /
daśavaṛṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmantarakalpasya niryaṇaṃ bhavati / kathaṃ bhavatītyāha
# ro la chags pa dang le lo'o / / mi rnams kyi tshe lo bcu pan bar gyi bskal ba tshar phyin pa yin no / / ji ltar yin zhe na /
kalpasya śastrarogābhyāṃ durbhikṣeṇa ca nirgamaḥ
# bskal pa mtshon dang nad dang ni / / mu ge dag gis tshar phyin to /
tribhirantarakalpasya niryāṇaṃ bhavati / śastreṇa rogeṇa durbhikṣeṇa ca
# bar gyi bskal pa ni mtshon dang nad dang mu ge dang gsum gyis tshar phyin to /
antarakalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣo manuṣyāḥ adharmarāgaraktā bhavanti viṣamalobhāvibhūtā mithyādharmaparītāḥ
# bar gyi bskal pa tshar phyin pa'i tshe mi rnams tshe lo bcu pa dang chos ma yin pa la 'dod chags kyis chags pa dang ya nga ba la chags pas zil gyis non pa dang log pa'i chos kyis kun nas dkris par 'gyur ro /
teṣāṃ vyāpāda utkarṣa gato'nyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvramāghātacittaṃ vadhakacittaṃ ca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati
# de dag gis gnod sems yongs su skye bar 'gyur ba na sems can gcig gis gcig mthong na dper na da ltar ri dags kyi rngon pas dgon pa'i ri dgas mthong ba bzhin du gnod pa mi bzang pa'i sems gnod pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur la /
tadyathedānīṃ mṛgalubdhakasyāraṇyakaṃ mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā te yadyadeva gṛhṇanti kāṣṭham vā loṣṭaṃ vā tatteṣāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ prādurbhavati
# de dag gis shing ngam thong ba yang rung gang dang gang blangs pa de dag gi mtshon cha rnon po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing de dag gcig la gcig srog gcod par byed do /
te'nyonyaṃ sattvaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayanti / punaḥ kalpasya niryāṇakāle daśavarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taireva doṣairamanuṣyā īti mutsṛjanti
# yang mi tshe lo bcu ba rnams la bar gyi bskal pa tshar phyin pa'i tshe nyes pa dag nyid kyis mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yams kyi nad dag gtong bar byed do /
teṣāmasādhyā vyādhyādayaḥ prādurbhavanti yato mriyante
# de dag la gang las 'chi bar 'gyur zhing gsor mi rung ba'i nad dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro /
punardaśavarṣāyuṣāṃ taireva doṣairdevā varṣaṃ notsṛjanti yato durbhikṣaṃ jāyate cañcaḥ śvetāsthi śalākāvṛttiḥ / kathaṃ ca cañcaḥ
# yang mi tshe lo bcu pa rnams la nyes pa dag nyid kyis lhas char pa mi 'bebs te / / des na mu ge gab tse zhes bya ba dang; rus gong dkar po zhes bya ba dang thur mas 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur ro / / ji ltar gab tse yin zhe na /
dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām
# rgyu gnyis kyis yin te /
ya idānīṃ samavāyaḥ sa tadānīṃ cañca ityucyate
# deng sang 'du ba gang yin pa de ni de'i tshe gab tse zhes bya ba /
samudgo'pi cañcaḥ / te ca manuṣyā jighatsādaurbalyaparītāḥ sametya kālaṃ kurvanti samudreṣu cānāgatajanatā'nugrahārthaṃ bījānyavasthāpayanti / atastaddurbhikṣaṃ cañcamityucyate
# gab tshe la yang gab tshe zhes bya ste / / bkres pa dang nyam chung bas bkres pa'i mi dag 'du zhing 'dus nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir gab tse dag gi nang du sa bon dag 'jog par byed de / / de'i phyir mu ge de ni gab tshe zhes bya'o /
kathaṃ śvetāsthi / dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām
# ji ltar na rus gong dkar po yin zhe na / / rgyu gnyis kyis yin te /
teṣāṃ hi śuṣkarukṣakāyānāṃ kālaṃ kurvatāmāśvevāsthīni śvetāni bhavanti bubhukṣāhatāśca śvetānyasthīni saṃhṛtya kvāthayitvā pivanti
# lus skams shing rtsub po de dag shi ba dang myur ba kho na rus pa dkar por gyur pa dang bkres pas nyen pa de rnams kyi rus gong dkar po de dag bsdus te bskol nas 'thung bar byed pa'o /
kathaṃ śalākāvṛttiḥ
# ji ltar na thur mas 'tsho ba yin zhe na /
dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām
# rgyu gnyis kyis yin te /
te hi sattvāḥ śalākoddeśikayā gṛheṣvāmirṣaṃ samvibhajante adya gṛhasvāmī bhokṣyate śvo gṛhasvāminītyevamādi dhānyasthānavivarebhyaśca śalākayā dhānyaphalāni niṣkṛṣya bahulodakena kvāthayitvā pivanti
# sems can de dag thur mas bsgo bas khyim dag tu de ring ni khyim bdag za ba'i res la bab bo / / sang ni khyim bdag mo zhes bya de lta bu la sogs pas zas 'gyed par byed pa dang 'bru'i gnas kyi gseb dag nas 'bru dag thur mas brus te /
evaṃ varṇayanti / yenaikāhamapi prāṇātīpātaviratiḥ samrakṣitā bhavati ekaharītakī vā saṃghāyaikapiṇḍapāto vā satkṛtyānupradatto bhavati sa teṣu śastrarogadurbhikṣāntarakalpeṣu notpadyata iti
# chu mang por bskol nas bskol ba de 'thung bar byed do / / 'di skad du gang gis nyi ma 'ga' zhig srog gcod pa spangs pa legs par bsrungs ba dang dge 'dun la aa ru ra 'ga' dang bsod snyoms 'ga' zhig gus par byas te / / phul ba de ni mtshon dang nad dang mu ge dang bar gyi bskal pa de dag tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod do /
atha kiyantaṃ kālametāni śastrāghātarogadurbhikṣāṇi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bhavanti
# yang sems can de dag la mtshon gyis gsod pa dang nad dang mu ge dag dus ji srid du 'du zhe na /
divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca ythākramam
# zhag rnams dang ni zla ba dang / / lo bdun dag tu go rims bzhin /
śastrakaḥ prāṇātipātaḥ sapta divasān bhavati / rogaḥ sapta māsāṃśca divasāṃśca / durbhikṣaṃ saptavarṣāṇi ca māsāṃśca divasāmśceti samuccayārthaścakāraḥ
# mtshon chas gsod pa zhag bdun du 'byung ngo / / nad ni zla ba bdun dang zhag bdun du'o / / mu ge ni lo bdun dang zla ba bdun dang zhag bdun du'o / / dang zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don to /
tadā ca dvayordvīpayosteṣāṃ pratirūpakāṇi bhavanti
# de'i tshe na gling gnyis su ni de dag dang 'dra ba dag 'byung ste /
vyāpāda udrekaprāpto bhavati vaivastryadaurbalye jighatsāpipāse ca
# gnod sems lhag par 'gyur ba yin / / kha dog dan pa dang nyam chung ba dang bkres pa dang skom par 'gyur ba yin no /
yaduktamevamanyasyāmapi saṃvartanyāṃ veditavyam yathāyogamiti / atha katīmāḥ saṃvartanyaḥ
# de bzhin du 'jig pa gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par bya'o zhes gang bshad pa 'jug pa de dag du zhe na /
saṃvartanyaḥ punastisro bhavantyagnyambuvāyubhiḥ
# me dang chu dang rlung dag gis / / 'jig pa dag ni yang gsum yin /
ekatra dhyāne sattvāḥ samaṃ saṃvartante etasyāmiti saṃvartanī
# de'i tshe sems can rnams bsam gtan gcig tu 'du bas na 'jig pa yin no / / nyi ma bdun gyis ni mes 'jig pa yin no /
saptabhiḥ sūryaistejaḥ saṃvartanī bhavati varṣodakenāpsaṃvartanī vāyuprakopādvāyusaṃvartanī / tābhiśca bhājanānāṃ sukṣmo'pyavayavo nāvaśiṣyate
# char gyi chus ni chus 'jig pa'o / / rlung rab tu 'khrugs pas ni rlung gis 'jig pa yin te / / de dag gis ni snod rnams kyi cha shas phra mo yang mi lus par byed do /
atra tu kecitīrthaṅkarā icchanti / paramāṇavo nityāste tadānīṃ śiṣyanta iti
# 'di la mu stegs byed kha cig ni rdul phra rab rnams ni rtag pa yin pas de'i tshe de dag lus so zhes bya bar 'dod do; /
kasmātta evamicchanti
# de dag ci'i phyir de ltar 'dod ce na /
mā bhūdabījakaḥ sthūlānāṃ prādurbhāva iti
# rags pa rnams rgyu med pa can du 'byung bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam mo /
nanu ca sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ prabhāvaviśiṣṭo vāyurbījamuktam
# sems can rnams kyi las las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag can gyis rlung gis khon yin no zhes ma bshad dam /
sarvartanīśīrṣavāyurvātasya nimittaṃ bhaviṣyati
# yang na 'jig pa'i rlung gi rtse mo ni de'i phyir rgyu yin par 'gyur ro /
vāyunā lokāntarebhyo bījānyāhriyanta iti mahīśāsakāḥ sūtre paṭhanti / evamapi na te bījādibhyo'ṅkurādīnāmutpattimicchanti
# sa ston pa'i sde'i mdo las ni rlung gis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas sa bon dag khyer te 'ong ngo zhes 'byung ngo / / de ltar yin yang de dag sa bon la sogs pa las myu gu la sogs pa skye bar ni mi 'dod do /
kiṃ tarhi / svebhya evāvayavebhyasteṣāmapi svebhyaḥ
# 'o na ji zhe na / / rang gi yan lag dag kho na las skye ba la / / de dag kyang rang gi kho na dag las skye ste /
evaṃ yāvat paramāṇubhyaḥ / kimidaṃ bījādīnāmaṅkurādiṣu sāmarthyam
# rdul phra rab dag las skye ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes so / / da ni myu gu la sogs pa dag las sa bon la sogs pa'i nus pa ci zhig yod ce na /
na kiñcidanyatra tatparamāṇūpasarpaṇāt / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ ta evamicchanti
# de'i rdal phra rab rnams phrad pa las ma gtogs par cung zad kyang med do / / yang ci'i phyir de dag de ltar 'dod ce na /
nahi vijātīyātsaṃbhavo yukta iti / kasmānna yuktaḥ
# rigs mi mthun pa las skye bar ni rigs pa ma yin no snyam mo / / ci'i phyir mi rigs she na /
aniyamo hi syāt
# nges pa med par 'gyur ro /
śaktiniyamānnaivaṃ bhaviṣyati
# nus pa med pa'i phyir de ltar mi 'gyur te /
śabdapākajotpattivat / citro hi guṇadharmo dravyaṃ tu naivam
# sgra dang chos byed las skye bar 'byung ba bzhin no / / yon tan gyi chos ni sna tshogs yin gyi rdzas kyi chos ni de ltam yin te /
samānajātīyebhyaḥ eva hi dravyebhyaḥ samānajātīyānāṃ dṛṣṭa utpādastadyathā vīraṇebhyaḥ kaṭasya tantubhyaḥ paṭasyeti
# rigs mthun pa dag kho na las rigs mthun pa rnams 'byung ba mthong ste / / dper na 'jag ma dge bas re lde dang skud pa dag las ras yug 'byung ba bzhin no /
