# mtshan gyur pa las sngon gyi sdom pa gtong ba'i rgyu yang yod pa ma yin la sngon med pa'i sdom pa 'thob pa'i rgyu yang yod pa ma yin no / / de lta bas na sdom pa bzhi po de dag ni gsum po las rang bzhin tha mi dad do / / gang gi dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa las dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs la / / de las yang dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par blangs na / / ci spong ba'i 'phel ba dang ldan pa'i phyir sdom pa de dag lnga dang bcu dang nyi shu zhes bya ba lta bu dang dong tse gcig dang gnyis zhes bya ba bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan zhes bya ba'am / / 'on te de dag thams cad tha dad pa nyid gcig tu skye zhe na /
āha / pṛthak
# smras pa / / tha dad /
avyāmiśrā eva te pṛthaglakṣaṇā upajāyante / triṣu saṃvareṣu tisraḥ prāṇātipātaviratayo yāvanmadyapānaviratayaḥ
# de dag ni ma 'dres pa nyid de / / sdom pa gsum dag la srog gcod pa spong ba gsum nas myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spong ba gsum gyi bar du mtshan nyid tha dad par skye ste /
evaṃ śeṣāḥ / ko nu tāsāṃ viśeṣaḥ / nidānaviśeṣādviśeṣaḥ
# lhag ma rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o / / de dag la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na / / gzhi'i khyad par las khyad par yod do /
kathaṃ kṛtvā
# ji ltar byas pas she na /
yathā yathā hi vahutarāṇi śikṣāpadāni samāditsate tathā tathā bahutarebhyo maddapramādapadebhyo nivartamāno bahutarebhyaḥ prāṇātipātādīnāṃ nidānebhyo nivartate viratīnāṃ ca nidāneṣu pravartata iti nidānaviśeṣādviratīnāṃ viśeṣaḥ / evaṃ cāsati bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ pratyācakṣāṇastrīnapi saṃvarānvijahyāddayorapi tatrāntarbhāvāt
# ji lta ji ltar bslab pa'i gzhi chos mang po dag yang dag par len par 'dod pa de lta de ltar rgyags pa dang bag med pa'i gnas ches mang po dag las ldog pa na srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i gzhi ches mang po dag las ldog par 'gyur zhing spong ba'i gzhi rnams la yang 'jug par 'gyur bas gzhi'i khyad par las spong ba rnams khyad par yod do / / de lta ma yin na gnyi ga yang der 'dus pa'i phyir dge slong gi sdom pa btang bas sdom pa gsum char yang btang bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni mi 'dod do /
na caitadiṣṭam / tasmāt pṛthageva te saṃvarāḥ
# de lta bas na sdom pa de dag ni tha dad pa kho na'o /
te cāvirodhinaḥ
# de dag 'gal ba med /
te ca trayo 'pi saha vartante / nottarasaṃvarasamādānāt purvakasya tyāgaḥ
# de gsum char yang lhan cig par 'gyur gyi / / sdom pa phyi ma yang dag par blangs pas snga ma gtong ba ni ma yin te /
mā bhūt bhikṣusaṃvaraparityāgādanupāsaka eveti / kathaṃ cāyamupāsako bhavati kathamupavāsastho yāvat bhikṣuḥ
# de lta ma yin na dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su btang bas dge bsnyen yang ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur du 'ong ngo / / 'di ji ltar na dge bsnyen yin / / ji ltar na bsnyen gnas pa nas dge slong gi bar du yin zhe na /
pañcāṣṭadaśasarvebhyo varjyebhyo viratigrahāt
# spang bya lnga brgyad bcu dang ni / / thams cad spong ba mnos pa las /
upāsakopavāsasthaśramaṇoddeśabhikṣutā
# dge bsnyen dang ni bsnyen gnas dang / / dge tshul ched dang dge slong nyid /
yathāsaṃkhyamanudeśo veditavyaḥ
# grangs bzhin du bstan par rig par bya ste /
pañccabhyo varjanīyebhyo dharmebhyo viratisamādānādupāsakasaṃvarastho bhavati / prāṇātipātādadattādānātkāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādātsurāmaireyamadyapānācca
# spang bar bya ba lnga po srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g yem pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la gnas pa yin no /
aṣṭābhyo viratisamādānādupavāsasthaḥ / prāṇātipātādattādānābrahmacaryamṛṣāvādamadyapānebhyo gandhamālyavilepananṛtyagītavāditrāduccaśayanamahāśayanādakālabhojanācca / daśabhyo viratisamādānācchrāmaṇero bhavati / ebhya eva jātarūparajatapratigrahācca / nṛtyagitavāditragandhamālyavilepanaṃ cātra dvayīkṛtya daśa bhavanti / sarvebhya eva varjanīyebhyaḥ kāyavākkarmabhyaḥ viratisamādānāt bhikṣurityucyate / sa eṣa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ / śīlaṃ sucaritaṃ karma saṃvaraścocyate
# brgyad po srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang mi tshangs par spyod pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba dag dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa dang gar dang glu dang rol mo dang khri stan mthon po dang khri stan chen po dang dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni bsnyen gnas la gnas pa yin no / / de dag nyid dang gser dang dngul 'dzin pa dang bcu spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni dge tshul yin te / / 'di gar dang glu dang rol mo dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byug pa gnyis su byas nas bcur 'gyur ro / / lus dang ngag gi las spang bar bya ba thams cad spong ba yang dag par blangs pas ni dge slong yin no / / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa de ni / / tshul khrims dang ni legs spyad dang / / las dang sdom pa zhes bya'o /
viṣamakarmaṇāṃ viratisamādānācchīlam
# las mi mnyam pa can rnams yang dag par 'jog par byed pas na tshul khrims se /
śītalatvāditi niruktiḥ / sukhaśīlasamādānaṃ kāyo na paridahyata iti
# nges pa'i tshig tu na bsil ba'i phyir te / / tshigs su bcad pa las / / lus las yongs su gdung med pas / / tshul khrims yang dag blangs pa bde /
gāthāvacanāt / vidvatpraśastatvātsucaritam / kriyāsvabhāvatvātkarma
# zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'i phyir legs par spyad pa'o / / bya ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir las so /
nanu cāvijñaptirakriyetyucyate / sā kathaṃ kriyā bhāti
# rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes mi bya'am de ji ltar na bya ba yin zhe na /
na kurvanti tayā samāttayā lajjinaḥ pāpamityakriyetyucyate
# ngo tsha shes pa rnams yang dag par blangs pa des sdig pa mi byed pas na bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya la /
sāpi tu vijñapticittābhyāṃ kriyata iti kriyā bhavati / kriyāhetutvāt kriyāphalatvāccetyapare
# de yang rnam par rig byed dang sems dag gis byed pas na bya ba yin no / / gzhan dag na re bya ba'i rgyu yin pa dang bya ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
saṃvara iti kāyavācoḥ saṃvaraṇāt / evaṃ tāvadaviśeṣeṇa prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ saṃśabdyate / punaḥ
# lus dang ngag sdom pa'i phyir so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes kyang bya'o / / de ltar re zhig bye brag med par so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang dag par bstan to / / yang /
ādye vijñaptyavijñaptī prātimokṣakiyāpathaḥ / saṃvarasamādānasya prathame vijñaptyavijñaptī prātimokṣa ityucyate / pāpasya tena prātimokṣaṇādutsarjanādityarthaḥ
# dang po'i rnam rig rnam rig min / / so sor thar dang bya ba'i lam / / sdom pa yang dag par blang pa'i rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang po dag ni so sor thar pa zhes bya ste / / des sdig pa las so sor thar pa'i phyir te /
svārthe vṛddhividhānādvaikṛtavaiśasavat / prātimokṣasaṃvara ityapi kāyavāksaṃvaraṇāt karmapatha ityucyate
# spang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes kyang bya ste / / lus dang ngag sdom pa'i phyir ro /
maulasaṃgṛhītatvāt
# las kyi lam zhes kyang bya'o /
dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣui prātimokṣasaṃvara eva na prātimokṣaḥ
# skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa kho na yin gyi so sor thar pa ni ma yin no /
pṛṣṭhaṃ ca na maulaḥ karmapathaḥ
# mjug yin gyi las kyi lam dngos ni ma yin no /
athaiṣāṃ saṃvarāṇāṃ kena kaḥ samanvāgataḥ
# yang sdom pa 'di rnams las gang zhig gang dang ldan zhe na /
prātimokṣānvitā aṣṭau / prātimokṣasaṃvareṇāṣṭau nikāyāḥ samanvāgatā bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī yāvadupavāsastho 'ṣṭamaḥ
# so sor thar dang ldan pa brgyad / / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang ni ris brgyad po dge slong dang dge slong ma dang brgyad pa bsnyen gnas pa'i bar dang ldan no /
kiṃ khalu bāhyakānāṃ samādānaśīlaṃ nāsti / asti natu prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ
# yang ci phyi rol pa rnams la yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims med dam zhe na / / yod mod kyi so sor thar ba'i sdom pa ni ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
nahi tadatyantaṃ pāpasya pratimokṣaṇāya saṃvartate / bhavasaṃniśritatvāt / dhyānajena tadanvitaḥ
# de ni srid pa la brten pa'i phyir gtan du sdig pa las so sor thar par byed pa ma yin no / / bsam gtan skyes dang de ldan pa /
dhyānāddhyāne vā jāto dhyānajaḥ
# bsam gtan las bsam gtan gyis bskyed pas na bsam gtan skyes te /
yo dhyānena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ dhyānasaṃvareṇa / sāmantakamapyatra dhyānaṃ kṛtvocyate / yathā grāmasāmantakamapi grāma ityucyate / astyasmin grāme śāleyaṃ kṣetramasti vraiheyamiti / anāsraveṇāryasattvāḥ
# gang bsam gtan dang ldan pa de gdon mi za bar bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang ldan no / / 'dir ni nyer bsdogs kyang bsam gtan du brjod nas bstan te / / dper na grong 'di na s'a lu'i zhing yod do / / 'bru'i zhing yod do zhes grong gi nye 'khor la yang grong zhes bya ba bzhin no / / zag med 'phags pa'i sems can dang /
āryapudgalā anāsraveṇa saṃvareṇa samanvāgatāḥ
# zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang / / 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ldan te /
te punaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāḥ
# de dag kyang slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams so /
yaduktaṃ sahabhūhetāvucyamāne dvau saṃvarau cittānuvartināviti / katamo tau
# lhan cig 'byung ba'i rkyen bshad par sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sdom pa gnyis zhes gang bshad pa de gnyis gang yin zhe na gsum po 'di dag nyid las /
eṣāmeva trayāṇām / antyau cittānuvartinau / dhyānasaṃvaro 'nāsravasaṃvaraśca
# tha ma gnyis ni sems rjes 'brang / / bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'o /
na prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ
# so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam / anyacittācittakasyāpyanuvṛtteḥ
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / sems gzhan dang ldan pa dang sems med pa la yang rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
punastāveva dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau prahāṇasaṃvarākhyāṃ labhete
# bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa de dag nyid spong ba'i sdom pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo /
kasyāmavasthāyāmityāha
# gang gi gnas skabs su zhe na / / smras pa /
anāgamye prahāṇākhyau tāvānantaryamārgajau
# bar chad med lam skyes de gnyis / / mi lcogs med la spong zhes bya /
anāgamye tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau navasvānantaryamārgeṣu prahāṇasaṃvarāvityucyete / tābhyāṃ dauḥśīlyasya tatsamutthāpakānāṃ ca kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt / ata eva syāddhyānasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate
# mi lcogs pa med pa la bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa de gnyis bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dag tu spong ba'i sdom pa zhes bya ste / / de gnyis kyis 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi sdom pa yin la / / spong ba'i sdom pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir bya ste /
prathamā koṭiranāgamyānantaryamārgavarjyaḥ sāsravo dhyānasaṃvaraḥ
# mu dang po ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ma gtogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan gyi sdom pa'o /
dvitīyā anāgamyānantaryamārgeṣvanāsravaḥ
# gnyis pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dag tu zag pa med pa'o /
tṛtīyā anāgamyānantaryamārgeṣu sāsravaḥ
# gsum pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dag tu zag pa dang bcas pa'o /
caturthī anāgamyānantaryamārgavarjyo 'nāsravasaṃvaraḥ / evaṃ syādanāsravasaṃvaro na prahāṇasaṃvara iti catuṣkoṭikaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyam
# bzhi pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ma gtogs pa dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'o / / de bzhin du zag pa med pa'i sdom pa yin la spong ba'i sdom pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir ci rigs par rig par bya'o /
yattarhi bhagavatoktaṃ
# 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācā 'tha saṃvaraḥ
# lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste / / ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin /
manasā saṃvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṃvaraḥ
# yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa ste / / thams cad du ni sdom pa legs /
yaccoktaṃ cakṣurindriyeṇa saṃvarasaṃvṛto viharatīti
# zhes gang gsungs pa dang gang yang mig gi dbang po 'di sdom pas bsdams te / / gnas so zhes gsungs pa /
etau manaindriyasaṃvarau kiṃsvabhāvau
# yid dang dbang po'i sdom pa 'di gnyis kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
naitāvavijñaptiśīlasvabhāvau / kiṃ tarhi
# 'di gnyis rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no / / 'o na ci zhe na /
saṃprajñānasmṛtī dve tu manaindriyasaṃvarau / pratyekaṃ dvisvabhāvajñapanārthaṃ punardvigrahaṇaṃ mā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ vijñāyīti manaḥsaṃvaro 'pi smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāva iti
# shes bzhin dang ni dran dag gnyis / / yid dang dbang po sdom pa yin / / grangs bzhin du shes par 'gyur du 'ong bas so sor gnyis kyi rang bzhin yin par bstan pa'i phyir yang gnyis zhes bya ba smos te / / yid kyi sdom pa yang dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin yin la /
indriyasaṃvaro 'pi / idaṃ vicāryate / kaḥ katamayā vijñaptyā 'vijñaptyā vā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samanvāgata iti / tatra
# dbang po'i sdom pa yang dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin no / / gang zhig rnam par rig byed dam / / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang zhig dang dus ji srid cig tu ldan zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya ste / / de la /
prātimmokṣasthito nityamatyāgādvartamānayā
# so sor thar gnas ji srid du / / ma btang bar rtag da ltar gyi /
avijñaptyā 'nvitaḥ
# rnam rig mi ldan /
yaḥ prātimokṣāsaṃvarasthaḥ pudgala uktaḥ sa yāvattāmavijñaptir na tyajati tāvattayā vartamānayā nityaṃ samanvāgataḥ
# so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pas bshad pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de ni ji srid du rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de mi gtong ba de srid du rtag tu da ltar gyi de dang ldan no / / skad cig ma /
pūrvāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā
# dang po phyin chad 'das pa dang; /
prathamāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā 'pi samanvāgataḥ
# skad cig ma dang po phyin chad ni 'das pa dang yang ldan te /
atyāgāditi sarvatrādhikṛtaṃ veditavyam / yathā prātimokṣasaṃvarastha uktaḥ / tathaivāsaṃvarastho 'pi / asaṃvarastho 'pi yāvadasaṃvaraṃ na tyajati tāvannityamavijñaptyā vartamānayā samanvāgataḥ
# thams cad du yang ji srid du ma btang bar zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas par rig par bya'o / / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa ji skad du bshad pa / / sdom min gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra / / sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa yang ji srid du sdom pa ma yin pa mi gtong ba de srid du rtag tu da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan no /
kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā 'pi / dhyānasaṃvaravān sadā
# skad cig ma gcig phyin chad ni 'das pa dang yang ldan no / / bsam gtan sdom dang ldan pa ni /
atītājātayā / dhyānasaṃvarasya lābhī nityamatītānāgatābhyāmavijñaptibhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ ātyāgāt / prathame hi kṣaṇe sa janmāntaratyaktaṃ dhyānasaṃvaramatītaṃ labhate / āryastu prathame nābhyatītayā
# rtag tu 'das dang ma 'ongs dang / / bsam gtan gyi sdom pa thob pa ni ji srid du ma btang gi bar du rtag tu 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan te / / des ni skad cig ma dang po la yang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu btang pa'i bsam gtan gyi sdom pa 'das pa thob bo / / 'phags ni dang po 'das dang min /
āryastu pudgalo 'pyevamanāsravyā / ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ / sa prathame kṣaṇe nātītayā samanvāgato mārgasya pūrvamanutpāditatvāt
# 'phags pa'i gang zag kyang zag pa med pa dang de bzhin du ldan la / / 'di ni khyad par yin te / / lam sngon ma bskyed pa'i phyir de skad cig ma dang po la 'das pa dang mi ldan no /
samāhitāryamārgasthau tau yuktau vartamānayā / tau dhyānānāsravasaṃvarānvitau samāhitaryamārgasamāpannau vartamānayā avijñaptyā samanvāgatau yathākramaṃ na tu vyutthitau
# mnyam gzhag 'phags lam gnas de gnyis / / da ltar dang ldan bsam gtan dang / / zag pa med med pa'i sdom pa dang / / ldan pa mnyam par gzhag pa dang / / 'phags pa'i lam la snyoms par zhugs pa de dag ni go rims bzhin du da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan gyi langs pa dag ni ma yin no /
saṃvarāsaṃvarasthānāṃ tāvadeṣa vṛttāntaḥ
# re zhig sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gtam ni de lta bu'o /
athedānīṃ madhyasthasya
# yang da ni bar ma la gnas pa brjod par bya ste /
madhyasthasyāsti cedādau madhyayā
# bar gnas la / / yod na dang po bar gyi dang /
yo naiva saṃvare nāsaṃvare sthitaḥ sa madhyasthaḥ
# gang sdom pa yang ma yin sdom pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa la gnas pa de ni bar ma la gnas pa ste /
tasya nāvaśyamavijñaptirasti / yasya tvasti dauḥśīlyaśīlāṅgādisaṃgṛhītā sa ādau madhyayā samanvāgataḥ / vartamānā hyavijñaptiratītānāgatayormadhyād
# de la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gdon mi za bar yod pa ni ma yin gyi gang la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang tshul khrims kyi yan lag la sogs pas bsdus pa yod pa de ni dang po bar gyi dang ldan no / / da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gnyis kyi bar ma yin no /
ūrdhvaṃ dvikālayā
# phyin chad dus ni gnyis dang ngo /
prathamāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamatītayā vartamānayā ca
# skad cig ma dang po byin chad ni 'das pa dang yang ldan / / da ltar gyi dang yang ldan te /
ātyāgāditi vartate / kimasaṃvarasthaḥ kadācitkuśalayā vijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati saṃvarastho vā punarakuśalayā bhavati
# ma btang gi bar du zhes bya bar sbyar ro / / ci res 'ga' sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa dge ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'am / / sdom pa la gnas pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la gnas par 'gyur ram zhe na / / 'gyur ro /
bhavan kadā kiyantaṃ vā kālamityāha
# nam zhig dus ji srid cig tu 'gyur zhe na / / smras pa /
asaṃvarasthaḥ śubhayā 'śubhayā saṃvare sthitaḥ
# sdom min gnas pa dge ba dang / / sdom la gnas pa mi dge ba'i /
avijñaptyānvito yāvat prasādakleśavegavān / yena prasādavegenāsaṃvarasthasya kuśalā 'vijñaptirutpadyate stavavandanādikriyāṃ kurvataḥ yena ca kleśavegena saṃvarasthasyākuśalā 'vijñaptirutpadyate vadhabandhanatāḍanādikriyāṃ kurvataḥ tau yāvadanuvartete tāvatte apyavijñaptī
# rnam rig mi ldan ji srid du / / rab dang nyon mongs shugs ldan par / / sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ni rab tu dang ba'i shugs gang gis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa na dag ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye la / / sdom pa la gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i shugs gang gis gsod pa dang 'ching ba dang brdeg pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa ni mi dge ba'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye ste / / de gnyis ji srid du rjes su 'brang ba de srid du rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang rjes su 'brang ngo /
sa ādye kṣaṇe vartamānayaivāvijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavatyanyeṣvatītayā 'pi
# de yang skad cig ma dang po la ni da ltar gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na dang ldan par 'gyur la / / gzhan dag tu ni 'das pa dang yang ldan no /
avijñaptyadhikāraḥ samāptaḥ
# rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i skabs rdzogs so /
vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ
# rnam rig byed ni thams cad la / / byed pa dag la da ltar ldan /
sarve saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthā yāvadijñaptiṃ kurvanti tāvattayā vartamānayā samanvāgatāḥ
# sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dang bar ma la gnas pa thams cad ji srid du rnam par rig byed byed pa de srid du da ltar gyi de dang ldan no /
atītayā kṣaṇādūrdhvamātyāgāt
# ma btang bar du skad cig ma /
prathamāt kṣaṇādūrdhvamātyāgādatītayā vijñaptyā samanvāgato bhavati / nāstyajātayā / anāgatayā tu vijñaptyā na kaścit samanvāgataḥ
# phyin chad 'das ldan / / skad cig ma dang po phyin chad ni ji srid ma btang gi bar du 'das pa'i rnam par rig byed dang yang ldan no / / ma 'ongs med / / ma 'ongs ba'i rnam par rig byed dang ni su dang yang mi ldan no /
nivṛtānivṛtābhyāṃ ca nātītābhyāṃ samanvitaḥ / atītābhyāmapi nivṛtānivṛtāvyākṛtābhyāṃ vijñaptibhyāṃ na kaścitsamanvāgataḥ / durbalasya hi dharmasya prāptirapi durbalā nānubandhībhavati
# bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa / / 'das pa dag dang ldan pa med / / bsgribs pa dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i rnam par rig byed 'das pa dag dang yang 'ga' yang ldan pa med de / / chos nyam chung ba'i thob pa yang nyam chung ba yin pas rjes su 'brel ba can ma yin no /
kiṅkṛtaṃ tasyā daurbalyam
# de cis nyam chung bar byas she na /
cittakṛtam
# sems kyis byas so /
cittasyāpi tarhi nivṛtāvyākṛtasya mā bhūt
# 'o na ni bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi dang yang mi ldan par 'gyur ro /
naitadevam / jaḍā hi vijñaptiḥ paratantrā ca
# de ni de lta ma yin te / / rnam par rig byed blun pa dang /
na caivaṃ cittam / sā hi vijñaptirdurbalenotthāpitā durbalatarā bhavati
# gzhan gyi dbang yin pa de ltar sems ni de lta ma yin la / / nyam chung du blangs pa de ni ches nyam chung bar 'gyur ro /
asaṃvarastha ityuktam / ko 'yamasaṃvaro nāma
# sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas pa zhes gang bshad pa / / sdom pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
asaṃvaro duścaritaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ karmaṃ tatpathaḥ
# sdom pa min dang nyes spyad dang / / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las de'i lam /
asaṃvarasyeme paryāyaśabdāḥ / tatra kāyavācorasaṃvaraṇādasaṃvaraḥ
# 'di dag ni sdom pa ma yin pa'i rnam grangs kyi sgra ste / / de la lus dang ngag mi sdom pa'i phyir sdom pa ma yin pa'o /
sadbhiḥ kutsitatvādaniṣṭaphalatvād duścaritam
# dam pa rnams kyis smad pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba'i phyir nyes par spyod pa yin no /
śīlavipakṣāddauḥśīlyam / kāyavākkarmatvātkarma / maulasaṃgṛhītatvātkarmapathaḥ
# tshul khrims kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yin no / / lus dang ngag gi las yin pa'i phyir las so / / dngos kyis bsdus pa'i phyir las kyi lam yin no /
syādvijñaptyā samanvāgato nāvijñaptyeti catuṣkoṭikam / tatra tāvat
# rnam par rig byed dang ldan la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang mi ldan pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhi ste / / de la re zhig /
vijñaptyaivānvitaḥ kurvanmadhyastho mṛducetanaḥ / mṛdvyā cetanayā kuśalamakukśalaṃ vā kurvannaivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasthito vijñaptyaiva samanvāgato bhavati nāvijñaptyā prāgevāvyākṛte anyatraupadhikapuṇyakriyāvastukarmapathebhyaḥ
# bar ma dor gnas sems zhan pas / / byed na rnam rig nyid dang ldan / / sdom pa yang ma yin sdom pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa la gnas pa zhig sems zhan pas dge ba'am mi dge ba zhig byed na rnam par rig byed kho na dang ldan gyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ni ma yin na / / lung du ma bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te / / rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang las kyi lam ni ma gtogs so /
tyaktānutpannavijñaptiravijñaptyāryapudgalaḥ
# rnam rig btang dang ma skyes pa'i / / 'phags pa'i gang zag rnam rig min /
avijñaptyaiva samanvāgato na vijñaptyā yenāryapudgalena janmāntaraparivṛttau na tāvadvijñaptaṃ vā punarvihīnam
# 'phags pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig tshe gzhan du yongs su gyur nas da dung du rnam par rig byed ma byung ba'am / / rnam par rig byed rnam par nyams na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na dang ldan gyi rnam par rig byed dang ni ma yin no /
uktaṃ saṃvarāsaṃvaramadhyasthānāṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisamanvāgamanavyavasthānam / athaite saṃvarāḥ kathaṃ labhyante
# sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dang bar ma la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang ldan pa rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to / / yang sdom pa de dag ji ltar 'thob ce na /
dhyānajo dhyanabhūmyaiva labhyate / yadā dhyānabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ pratilabhyate maulīyaṃ sāmantakīyaṃ vā sāsravaṃ tadā dhyānasaṃvaro 'pi sahabhūtatvāt
# bsam gtan las skyes bsam gtan gyi / / sa nyid kyis 'thob / / gang gi tshe bsam gtan gyi sa pa'i sems zag pa dang bcas pa dngos gzhi pa'am / / nyer bsdogs pa 'thob pa de'i tshe bsam gtan gyi sdom pa yang 'thob ste /
anāsravastayā / āryayā / tayaiva dhyānabhūmyā 'nāsravayā labhyamānayā 'nāsravaḥ saṃvaro labhyate / tatra ṣaṭ dhyānabhūmayo 'nāsravā bhavanti catvāri dhyānāni anāgamyasyānantaraṃ ceti paścātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ
# lhan cig 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / zag med ni / / 'phags des / / zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyis 'thob pa de nyid kyis zag pa med pa'i sdom pa yang 'thob bo / / de la zag pa med pa ni bsam gtan gyi sa drug po bsam gtan bzhi dang mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
prātimokṣākhyaḥ paravijñapanādibhiḥ
# so sor thar ces pa / / gzhan gyi rnam rig byed sogs kyis /
prātimokṣasaṃvarastu paravijñaptito labhyate
# so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni gal te / / 'di la gzhan gyis rnam par rig par byed la /
yadyenaṃ paro vijñapayati asau ca param
# 'di yang gzhan la rnam par rig par byed na gzhan gyi rnam par rig byed las 'thob bo /
sa punaḥ saṃghādvā pudgalādvā
# de yang de dge 'dun nam gang zag las te /
saṃdhādbhīkṣubhikṣuṇīśikṣamāṇāsaṃvarāḥ pudgalāddanye / daśavidhā upasaṃpaditi vinayavibhāṣikāḥ / tasya ūpasaṃgrahaṇārthamādiśabdaḥ / svayaṃbhūtvena buddhānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca niyāmāvakrāntyā pañcakānām ehibhikṣukayā yaśaḥprabhṛtīnām śāsturabhyupagamānmahākāśyapasya praśnārādhanena sodāyinaḥ gurudharmābhyupagamena mahāprajāpatyāḥ dūtena dharmadinnāyāḥ vinayaddharapañcamena pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu daśavargeṇa madhyeṣu janapadeṣu śaraṇagamanaṃ traivācikena ṣaṣṭibhadravargapūgopasaṃpāditānāmiti teṣāṃ nāvaśyaṃ vijñaptyadhīnaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ
# dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge slong ma'i sdom pa rnams ni dge 'dun las so / / gzhan dag ni gang zag las so / / bye brag tu smra ba 'dul ba pa rnams na re rnam pa bcus bsnyen par rdzogs so zhes zer ba bsdu ba'i phyir sogs pa'i sgra smos te / / rang 'byung gis ni sangs rgyas dang / / rang sangs rgyas rnams so / / nges par 'jug pas ni rten lnga po rnams so / / dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas ni grags pa la sogs pa rnams so / / ston par khas blangs pas ni 'od srungs chen po'o / / dri ba mnyes pas ni legs sbyin no / / bla ma'i chos khas blangs pas ni skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'o / / pho nyas ni chos sbyin no / / 'dul ba 'dzin par gtogs pa lngas ni mtha' 'khob kyi mi rnams so / / bcu'i tshogs kyis ni dbus kyi mi rnams so / / skyabs su 'gro ba lan gsum bzlas pas ni sde bzang drug cu'i tshogs kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa rnams te / / de dag gi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed la rag lus pa ma yin no /
sa punareṣa prātimokṣāsaṃvaraḥ samādīyamānaḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ samādātavyaḥ
# yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa de yang dag par blangs pa na dus ji srid cig gi bar du yang dag par blang bar bya zhe na /
yāvajjīvaṃ samādānamahorātraṃ ca saṃvṛteḥ / saptanaikāyikasya prātimokṣasaṃvarasya yāvajjīvaṃ samādānam upavāsasaṃvarasyāhorātramityeṣa niyamaḥ
# ji srid 'tsho dang nyin zhag tu / / sdom pa yang dag blang bar bya / / ris bdun gyi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni / / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang dag par blang bar bya'o / / bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa ni nyin zhag tu'o zhes bya ba de ltar nges so /
kiṃ kāraṇam / dvau hi kālaparyantau / ahorātraparyanto jīvitaparyantaśca
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / dus kyi mtha' ni gnyis te / / srog gi mtha' dang nyin zhag gi mtha'o /
ahārotrāṇāṃ paunaruktyena pakṣādayaḥ
# zla ba phyed la sogs pa ni nyin zhag bzlas pas so; /
kālo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ
# dus zhes bya ba'i chos de ci zhig ce na /
saṃskāraparidīpanādhivacanametat / ālokāvasthā hi dvīpeṣu divasa ityucyate
# de ni 'du byed yongs su ston pa'i tshig bla dags yin te / / snang ba'i gnas skabs la ni gling dag na nyin par zhes bya la /
tamo 'vasthā rātriḥ / yuktaṃ tāvajjīvitādūrdhvaṃ satyapi samādāne saṃvarasyānutpattiḥ / visabhāgatvādāśrayasya tena ca tatrāprayogādasmaraṇācca
# mun pa'i gnas skabs la ni mtshan mo zhes bya'o / / re zhig ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ni yang dag par blangs pa yod kyang lus skal ba mi 'dra ba'i phyir dang des kyang / / der sbyor ba ma byas pa'i phyir dang mi dran pa'i phyir dang sdom pa mi skye bar rigs na /
athāhorātrādūrdhvaṃ pañcarātraṃ daśarātraṃ vā upavāsasamādānasya kaḥ pratibandho bahūnāmupavāsasaṃvarāṇāmutpattau / itthamasti pratibandho yadbhagavānahorātrikamevopavāsaṃ sūtre śāstisma / idamidānīṃ saṃpradhāryam
# yang nyin zhag gi 'og zhag lnga 'am zhag bcu yang rung ste / / bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa'i bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa yang mang po skye ba la su zhig bgegs byed / / bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las gang nyin zhag gi bsnyen gnas kho na bstan pa 'dis na bgegs byed pa yod do / / da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
kiṃ tāvadahorātrādūrdhvaṃ saṃvarasyānutpartti paśyatā tathāgatenāhorātrika upavāso deśita utāho durbalendriyāṇāmahorātrake 'pi saṃvarasamādānena saṃniyojanārthamiti / kutastvetadevaṃ tarkyate
# re zhig ci bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nyin zhag gi 'og tu sdom pa mi skye bar gzigs nas nyin zhag pa'i bsnyen gnas bstan tam / / 'on te dbang po gdul dka' ba rnams nyin zhag pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'i ched gcig yin / / de de ltar brtag ga la nus /
ahorātrāt pareṇāpi saṃvarotpattau yuktyavirodhāt
# phyin chad sdom pa skye ba la yang rigs pa dang 'gal ba ni med pa'i phyir ro /
tadetatkasyacidapyahorātrādūrdhvamadeśanāṃ necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ / asaṃvarasyedānīṃ kaḥ kālaniyamaḥ / nāsaṃvaro 'styahorātraṃ / yāvajjīvaṃ pāpakarmābhyupagamādasaṃvara upajāyate nāhorātraṃ yathopavāsaḥ
# phyin chad po 'di su la yang ma bstan pas bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni mi 'dod do / / da ni sdom pa ma yin pa'i dus nges pa gang yin zhe na / / nyin zhag pa yi sdom min med / / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdig pa'i chos khas blangs pa las sdom pa ma yin pa skye'o ji ltar bsnyen gnas pa bzhin du nyin zhag pa ni med do /
kiṃ kāraṇam / na kilaivaṃ pragṛhyate / na kila kaścidevamasaṃvaraṃ samādatte yathopavāsaṃ kaccidahamahorātramasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / de de ltar nod med ces grag / / ji ltar bsnyen gnas pa ltar bdag ni nyin zhag gcig tu sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas par gyur cig ces sdom pa ma yin pa yang dag par len pa ni su yang med de /
kutsitatvātkarmaṇaḥ / evaṃ caiva na kaścidādatte kaccidahaṃ yāvajīvamasaṃvṛtaḥ syāmiti / yāvajjīvamapyasya lābho na syāt / yadyapi naivamādatte tathāpyatyantavipannenāśayena tāṃ kriyāṃ prakurvannasaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate na kālāntaravipannena
# las smad pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go / / de lta na bdag ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdom pa ma yin pa la gnas par gyur cig ces len pa ni su yang med pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang de 'thob par mi 'gyur ro / / gal te de ltar mi len mod kyi 'on kyang gtan du log par zhugs pa'i bsam pas bya ba de byed pa na sdom pa ma yin pa 'thob par 'gyur gyi dus gzhan gyi bar du log bar zhugs pas ni ma yin no /
upavāsasaṃvarastu samādānabalādhānādanātyantike 'pyāśaye labhyata eva / saṃvarārthitvāt
# bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa ni gtan du ba'i bsam pa ma yin yang sdom pa don du gnyer ba'i phyir yang dab par len pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'thob pa nyid do /
yadi punaḥ kaścidasaṃvareṇāpyarthī kālāntaramasaṃvaraṃ samādadīta so 'vaśyaṃ labheta / na tvedadṛṣṭamiti naivaṃ vyavasthāpyate
# gal te 'ga' zhig sdom pa ma yin pa don du gnyer zhing dus gzhan gyi bar du sdom pa ma yin pa yang dag par len par 'gyur na des kyang gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur ro / / de ni ma mthong bas de ltar rnam par mi gzhag go /
avijñaptivadasaṃvaro 'pi nāsti dravyata iti sautrāntikāḥ / sa eva tu pāpakriyābhisaṃdhirasaṃvaraḥ / sānubandho yataḥ kuśalacitto 'pi tadvānucyate / tasyānirākṛtatvāt / athāhorātraṃ gṛhyamāṇa upavāsaḥ kathaṃ grahītavyaḥ
# mdo sde pa rnams na re sdom pa ma yin pa yang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin du rdzas su ni med kyi sdig pa bya ba'i bsam pa rjes su 'brel pa dang bcas pa de nyid sdom pa ma yin pa yin te / / des na sems dge ba la yang de ma spangs pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa zhes bya'o / / yang bsnyen gnas nyin zhag tu nod na ci ltar mnod par bya zhe na /
kālyaṃ grāhyo 'nyato nīcaiḥ sthitenoktānuvāditā
# dma' bar 'dug smras bzlas pa yis / / mi brgyan nam ni nang par du /
upavāsaḥ samagrāṅgo nirbhuṣeṇāniśākṣayāt / kālyaṃ tāvatsūryodayakāle ahorātrikatvātsaṃvarasya / yastu pūrvakṛtasamādāno nityamaṣṭabhyāmupaceṣyāmīti sa bhuktvāpi gṛhṇīyāt
# bsnyen gnas yan lag tshang bar ni / / nang par gzhan las mnod par bya / / dma' bar 'dug pa ni tsog tsog por 'dug pa'am pus mo btsugs nas / / thal mo snol ba'am thal mo sbyar ba ste /
anyataśca grahītavyo na svayamevāparāpekṣayā satsvapi pratyayeṣvanatikramārtham / nīcaiḥ sthitenotkuṭṭakena vā jānupātena vā kapotakamañjaliṃ kṛtvā 'nyatra sthāsyāt / agauravasya hi saṃvaro notpadyate / dātuśca vacanamanubruvīta
# nad pa ni ma gtogs so / / ma gus pa ni sdom pa mi skye'o / / 'bogs pa pos tshig ma smras par sngar yang smra bar mi bya la kha bsnyams te smra bar yang mi bya ste / / de ltar na 'di gzhan las mnos pa yin gyi gzhan du 'bogs pa dang nod pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro /
na pūrvaṃ na yugapat / evaṃ hyasau parasmāt gṛhīto bhavati
# mi brgyan pa ni rgyan nar ma ma gtogs te rgyan nar ma ni mtshar gcig rgyags par mi byed do /
anyathā hi dānagrahaṇaṃ na sidhyet
# nam nangs kyi bar du mnod par bya ba ni nyi ma shar gyi bar du'o /
samagrāṅgaścāṣṭāṅga eva grahītavyo na vikalāṅgaḥ
# yan lag brgyad tshang bar mnod par bya ba'i yan lag ma tshang bar ni ma yin no /
nirbhūṣeṇa ca / ājasrikamabhyalaṅkāraṃ muktvā
# nang par ni re zhig nyi ma shar ba'i tshe ste / / nyin zhag pa'i sdom pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
ājasriko hyalaṅkāro nātyarthaṃ madamādadhāti / ārātriparikṣayācca grahītavyo yāvat punaḥ sūryodayāt / ato 'nyathā gṛhṇataḥ sucaritamātraṃ syānnatūpavāsasaṃvaraḥ
# gang gis tshes brgyad la rtag tu bsnyen gnas la gnas par bya'o zhes sngon yang dag par blang bar byas pa de ni zas zos nas kyang mnod par bya'o / / gzhan las mnod par bya'i bdag nyid las ni ma yin te / / gzhan la ltos pas ni rkyen yod kyang mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dang de las gzhan du mnos pa ni legs par spyad pa tsam du 'gyur gyi bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa ni ma yin no /
evaṃ ca kṛtvā aurabhrikapāradārikayo rātridivasopavāsakayoḥ sāphalyaṃ prayujyate
# de ltar byas na shan pa dang byi bo byed pa dag gis mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i bsnyen gnas dag kyang 'bras bu yod par rung ngo /
arhatāṃ samīpe vasantyanenetyupavāsasteṣāmanuśikṣaṇāt
# 'dis dgra bcom pa dag dang nye bar gnas par byed pas na bsnyen gnas te / / de dag gi rjes su slob pa'i phyir ro /
yāvajjīvikasaṃvarasamīpe vasantyanene tyapare / alpakuśalamūlānāṃ kuśalamūlapoṣaṇāt poṣadha iti vā
# gzhan dag na re 'dis ji srid 'tsho'i bar gyi sdom pa dang nye bar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / / yang na dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsos 'debs pa'i phyir te /
poṣaṃ dadhāti manasaḥ kuśalasya yasmāduktastato bhagavatā kila poṣadho 'yamiti
# gang phyir yid kyi dge ba gsos 'debs de yi phyir / / 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong bshad ces grag /
kimarthaṃ punaraṣṭāṅganyupādīyante
# zhes 'byung bas na gso sbyong yin no /
yasmāt / śīlāṅgānyapramādāṅgaṃ vratāṅgāni yathākramam / catvāryekaṃ tathā trīṇi / catvāri tāvacchīlāṅgāni yāvanmṛṣāvādaviratiḥ / prakṛtisāvadyaviratitvāt
# ci'i phyir yan lag brgyad nod ce na / / tshul khrims yan lag bag yod pa'i / / yan lag brtul zhugs yan lag ste / / bzhi gcig de bzhin gsum rim bzhin / / re zhig brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i bar bzhi ni rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba spong ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi yan lag yin no /
ekamapramādāṅga madyapānādviratiḥ / samāttaśīlo 'pi madyapaḥ pramādyeta
# myos par 'gyur ba'i btung ba spong ba gcig pu ni bag yod pa'i yan lag ste myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba ni tshul khrims rdzogs kyang bag med par 'gyur ro /
trīṇi vṛtāṅgāni yāvadakālabhojanādviratiḥ / saṃvegānuguṇatvāt
# dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba'i bar gsum ni skye bo'i rjes su mthun pa'i phyir brtul zhugs kyi yan lag yin no /
kiṃ punarebhirapramādāṅgavṛtāṅgairanupāttaiḥ syāt
# ci bag yod pa'i yan lag dang brtul zhugs kyi yan lag 'di dag ma mnos pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
smṛtināśo madaśca taiḥ
# de yis dran nyams dregs par 'gyur /
madyaṃ hi pivataḥ kāryā kāryasmṛtireva naśyet / uccaśayanamahāśayananṛttagītādikaṃ pratisevamānasya madaḥ saṃbhavet
# myos par 'gyur ba 'thungs pas ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa'i dran pa nyams pa nyid du 'gyur ro / / khri stan mthon po dang khri stan chen po dang gar dang glu la sogs pa bsten pas ni dregs par 'gyur la /
mattasya ca dauḥśīlyamadūraṃ bhavet
# dregs par gyur pa la ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims thag mi ring bar 'gyur ro /
kāle punarbhuñjānasyocitabhaktakālaparihārādupavāsasmṛtiḥ saṃvegaścopatiṣṭhet / tadabhāvādubhayaṃ na syāditi / kecittu khalvakālabhojanāt prativiratimevopavāsaṃ manyante
# dus su za zhing zas nar ma'i dus su yongs su spangs pa las ni bsnyen gnas kyi dran pa dang skyo ba'i dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / / de med na gnyi ga yang med do / / yang kha cig ni dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba kho na 'dir bsnyen gnas yin la /
tasya śeṣāṇyaṣṭāṅgānīti / nṛtyagotavāditraṃ gandhamālyavilepanaṃ ca dvayaṃ kṛtvā
# lhag ma rnams ni 'di'i yan lag yin te gar dang glu dang rol mo dang spos dang me tog phreng dang byung pa ni 'dir gnyis su bya'o snyam du sems so /
evaṃ tu sati sūtrapāṭho na yujyeta / akālabhojanādvirati muktvā anenāhamaṣṭamāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṃ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīya iti
# de ltar yin na ni dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba bka' stsal nas yan lag brgyad pa 'dis 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo / / rjes su bgyid do zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i tshig mi rung bar 'gyur ro /
kastarhi so 'nya upavāso yasyemānyaṅgāni / samudāyasyāvayavā aṅgāni / yathā sthasyāṅgāni caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ pañcāṅgaṃ tūryaṃ tathā 'ṣṭāṅga upavāso draṣṭavyaḥ / akālabhojanāt prativiratirūpavāsa upavāsāṅgaṃ ca yathā samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ca / dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ samādhirdhyānaṃ dhyānāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ / natu teṣāmeva samyagdṛṣṭyādīnāṃ ta evāṅgatvāya kalpanta iti
# 'o na yan lag brgyad po 'di dag gang gi yin pa'i bsnyen gnas gzhan de gang zhig yin bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dus pa'i yan lag rnams ni yan lag yin te / / shing rta'i yan lag dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang phye ma yan lag lnga pa ji lta bur bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o / / dus ma yin pa'i zas spong ba ni bsnyen gnas kyang yin la / / bsnyen gnas kyi yan lag kyang yin te / / dper na yang dag pa'i lta ba lam yang yin la lam gyi yan lag kyang yin pa dang chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag byang chub kyang yin la byang chub kyi yan lag kyang yin pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan kyang yin la bsam gtan gyi yan lag kyang yin pa bzhin no zhes zer ro / / de dag nyid yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi yan lag nyid du rung ba ni ma yin no /
pūrvakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭyādaya uttareṣāmaṅgaṃ yadi syuḥ prathamakṣaṇotpanna āryamārgo nāṣṭāṅgaḥ syāt
# gal te yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa snga ma rnams phyi ma rnams kyi yan lag tu 'gyur na ni skad cig ma dang po la skyes pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par mi 'gyur ro /
kiṃ khalvayamupavāsakasyaivopavāsa āhosvidanyasyāpi / anyasyāpyupavāso 'sti śaraṇaṃ tvagatasya na / anupavāsako 'pi yastamahorātraṃ buddhadharmasaṃghān śaraṇaṃ gatvopavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti tasyotpadyate upavāsasaṃvaro nānyathā
# yang ci bsnyen gnas 'di dge bsnyen kho na la yod dam / / 'on te gzhan la yang yod ce na / / gzhan la'ang bsnyen gnas yod mod kyi / / skyabs su ma song ba la med / / dge bsnyen ma yin pa la yang gang zhig nyin zhag de la sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ste / / bsnyen gnas nod pa de la bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa skye bar 'gyur te /
anyatrājñānāt / sūtra uktaṃ yataśca mahānāman gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati vācaṃ ca bhāṣate upavāsakaṃ ca māṃ dharaya
# gzhan du ni ma yin no / / mi shes ba ni ma gtogs so / / mdo las / / ming chen 'di ltar khyim pa gos dkar po bgos pa skyes pa po'i dbang po dang ldan pa zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing /
iyatā upāvāsako bhavatīti / tat kiṃ śaraṇagamanādevopavāsako bhavati / bhavatīti bahirdeśakāḥ / na vinā saṃvareṇeti kāśmīrāḥ / yattarhi sūtra uktam / nāstyatra virodhaḥ
# bdag la dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes tshig tu yang smra na 'di tsam gyis dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de ci skyabs su 'gro ba kho nas dge bsnyen du 'gyur ram zhe na / / nyi 'og pa rnams na re 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / / kha che ba rnams na re sdom pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / / 'o na gang mdo las gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na / / 'di la 'gal ba med de /
yasmādasyotpadyate tata eva / upāsakatvopagamātsaṃvṛt / upāsakatvābhyupagamādevāsyopāsakasaṃvaro jāyate / yadevābhyupagacchatyupāsakaṃ māṃ dhārayetyādyagreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇāpetamiti
# 'di ltar dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pa de kho na 'di'i sdom pa skye bar 'gyur te / / gang gi tshe bdag la dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol / / deng slan chad nam ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo zhes dge bsnyen du khas blangs pa kho na sa'i di'i dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa skye bar 'gyur ro /
prāṇātipātādyapetamityartho madhyapadalopāt / laghusaṃvarasyāpi vyutpādanārthaṃ śikṣāpadānām / uktistu bhikṣuvat / yathaivaṃ bhikṣurlabdhasaṃvaro 'pi punaḥ śikṣāpadāni grāhyate śrāmaṇeraśca vyutpādanārthamita ścāmutaśca te saṃvara iti tathopavāsako 'pi na tu vinā saṃvareṇopāsako 'sti
# srog gcod pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste / / bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir ro / / sdom pa thob kyang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa dge slong bzhin / / ji ltar dge slong dang dge sbyong gi sdom pa thob zin kyang shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi 'di dang 'di ltar du bsdam mo zhes bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang 'dzin du 'jug pa ltar dge bsnyen yang de dang 'dra bas sdom pa med pa'i dge bsnyen ni med do /
sarve cet saṃvṛtā ekadeśakāryādayaḥ katham
# gal te thams cad sdom yin na / / sna gcig spyod sogs ji lta bu /
yadi sarva evopāsakā upāsakasaṃvarasthāḥ kathaṃ bhagavatā ekadeśakārī pradeśakārī yadbhūyaḥkārī pūripūrṇakārī copāsaka uktaḥ
# gal te dge bsnyen thams cad dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la gnas pa yin na bcom ldan 'das kyis sna gcig spyod pa dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang phal cher spyod pa dang yongs su rdzogs par spyod pa'i dge bsnyen zhes gsungs pa ji lta bu yin /
tatpālanāt kila proktāḥ
# de bsrung ba la gsungs zhes grags /
yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ pālayati sa tatkārītyuktaḥ / sarve tu samaṃ saṃvarasthāḥ
# gang zhig bslab pa'i gzhi gang srung bar byed pa ni de spyod pa zhes gsungs par zad kyi thams cad kyang sdom pa la gnas par ni 'dra'o /
idamutsūtraṃ vartate / kimatrotsūtram / upāsakatvābhyupagamādeva saṃvaralābho yasmāt prāṇatipātamityāheti
# 'di ni mdo las 'das pa yin no / / 'dir ci zhig mdo las 'das / / 'di ltar srog gcod pa spong ngo zhes dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pa kho nas sdom pa 'thob par gsungs so zhes bya ba ste /
na hyevaṃ sūtrapāṭhaḥ ukto yathā mahānāmasūtre pāṭhaḥ / tatraiva copāsakalakṣaṇopadeśo nānyatra
# mdo'i tshig ni de lta ma yin no / / mdo'i tshig ji lta bu yin zhe na / / ji ltar ming chen gyi mdo las gsungs pa las 'byung ba bzhin te /
yatra tveṣa pāṭho yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇāpetaṃ śaraṇagatamabhiprasannamiti
# de nyid las dge bsnyen gyi mtshan nyid bstan gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
tatra te dṛṣṭasatyā avetyaprasādānvayaṃ prāṇairapi saddharmopagamanaṃ darśayanti sma / jīvitaheto rapyabhavyā vayamenaṃ dharmaṃ parityaktumiti / na tveṣa lakṣaṇopadeśaḥ saṃvarasya / prāṇāpetaṃ tu na kvacit paṭhyate
# gang las 'di skad du nam 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngo ba skyabs su song ba mngon par rab tu dang ba zhes 'byung ba der ni bden pa mthong ba de dag bdag cag gis srog la thug kyang chos 'di btang du mi rung ngo zhes shes nas dad pa'i rgyus srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos la khas 'che bar ston pa yin gyi de sdom pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa ni ma yin no / / srog gcod pa spong ba zhes ni gang nas kyang mi 'byung na su zhig yongs su mi gsal ba'i don 'di 'don par byed /
kaścaitadaparisphuṭārthaṃ paṭhet / ekadeśakāryādīṃstu khaṇḍitaśikṣānadhikṛtya praśna eva na yujyate / kuto visarjanamāveṇikadharmāṇām / ko hyapāsakasaṃvaraṃ jānan etanna jñāsyate yo hi yacchikṣāpadaṃ na khaṇḍayati sa tatkārī bhavatīti
# tshul khrims nyams pa'i dbang du byas nas ni sna gcig spyod pa la sogs pa zhu ba nyid kyang mi 'thad na lan lta smos kyang ci dgos te / / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa zhes pa su zhig gang zhig bslab pa'i gzhi gang nyams par mi byed pa de ni de spyod pa yin no zhes bya bar mi shes so /
upāsakasaṃvarasya tu parimāṇānabhijñāṃstanmātraśikṣākṣamān pratyeṣa praśno yujyate / kiyatā bhadantopāsaka ekadeśakārī bhavati yāvat paripūrṇakārī bhavati / yadi tarhi vinā saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ syādvikalena vā bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāvapi syātām / kathaṃ tāvadeṣāmupāsakasaṃvarādīnāmaṅgapratiniyamo bhavati / śāstṛprajñaptivaśāt / upāsakatvādipratiniyamo 'pi śāstṛprajñaptivaśādiṣyatām / vināpi hi saṃvareṇopāsakaḥ prajñaptito na tu bhikṣuśrāmaṇerāviti te tvetannecchanti kāśmīrāḥ / sarveṣāṃ tu saṃvarāṇām / mṛdvāditvaṃ yathā manaḥ
# dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'i tshang mi shes pas bslab pa'i gzhi de tsam zhig bzod pa la ni btsun pa ji tsam gyis na sna gcig spyod pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ba lags zhes bya ba nas yongs su rdzogs par spyod pha [*pa?] lags zhes bya ba'i bar du zhu ba 'di rung ngo / / gal te sdom pa med ba'am ma tshang bar yang dge bsnyen du 'gyur na dge slong dang dge sbyong dag tu yang 'gyur ro / / re zhig ji ltar na dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la sogs pa 'di dag gi yan lag nges pa yin / / ston pas btags pa'i dbang gis so / / dge bsnyen nyid la sogs pa yang ston pas btags pa'i dbang gis so sor nges par 'dod par gyis shig / / dge bsnyen ni sdom pa med par yang btags kyi dge slong dang dge sbyong dag ni ma yin no / / kha che ba rnams ni 'di mi 'dod do / / sdom pa thams cad kyang / / chung ngu la sogs yid ji bzhin /
mṛdumadhyādhimātratvaṃ sasaṃtānacittavaśāt
# chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po nyid ni yang dag par len pa'i sems kyi dbang gis te /
evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'rhato 'pi mṛduḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ syāt pṛthagjanasyādhimātraḥ / kiṃ punaḥ saṃvaragrahaṇādevopāsakaḥ syādvinā śaraṇagamanaiḥ
# de ltar byas na dgra bcom pa la yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa chung ngu yod la / / so so'i skye bo la yang chen po yod par 'gyur ro / / yang ci skyabs su 'gro ba med par yang sdom pa mnos pa kho nas dge bsnyen du 'gyur ram zhe na /
na syādanyatrājñānāt
# mi 'gyur te mi shes pa ni ma gtogs so /
yo buddhadharmasaṃghāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati kimasau śaraṇaṃ gacchati
# gang zhig sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba de ci la skyabs su 'gro zhe na / / gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro de /
buddhasaṃghakarāndharmānaśaikṣānubhayāṃśca saḥ / nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śāraṇatrayam
# sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos / / mi slob pa dang gnyi ga dang / / mya ngan 'das la skyabs su 'gro /
yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati aśaikṣānasau budhakarakāndharmāñcharaṇaṃ gacchati yeṣāṃ prādhānyena sa ātmabhāvo budhā ityucyate yeṣāṃ vā lābhena sarvāvabodhasāmarthyādbuddho bhavati
# gang zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba de ni sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos mi slob pa la skyabs su 'gro ba yin te / / gang dag gtso bor gyur pas sku de sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa'am / / yang na gang dag brnyes pas thams cad thugs su chud par spyod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas yin pa'o /
ke punaste / kṣayajñānādayaḥ saparivārāḥ
# de dag kyang gang zhe na / / zad pa shes pa la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa yin no /
rūpakāyasya pūrvaṃ paścāccāviśeṣāt
# gzugs kyi sku ni snga ma dang phyi mar yang bye brag med pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ sarvabuddhānathaikam / lakṣaṇataḥ sarvabudhān / mārgasyāvilakṣāṇatvāt
# ci sangs rgyas thams cad la'am / / 'on te gcig la zhe na / / mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas ni sangs rgyas thams cad la ste / / lam mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro /
yaḥ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati śaikṣāśaikṣānasausaṃghakarakānharmān gacchati yeṣāṃ lābhenāṣṭau pudgalāḥ saṃghībhavanti / abhedatvāt
# gang zhig dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba de ni dge 'dun du byed pa'i chos slob pa dang mi slob pa la skyabs su 'gro ba yin te / / gang dag thob pas gang zag brgyad po mi phyed pa'i phyir dge 'dun du 'gyur ba'o /
kiṃ sarvasaṃghānathaikam
# ci dge 'dun thams cad la'am / / 'on te gcig la zhe na /
lakṣaṇataḥ sarvasaṃghānmārgasyāvilakṣaṇatvāt / yattu sūtra uktaṃ yo 'pyasau bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani saṃgho nāma tamapi śaraṇaṃ gacchatami ti
# mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas ni thams cad la ste / / lam mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro / / gang mdo las gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la yang skyabs su song zhig zhes gsungs so zhe na /
tatpratyakṣabhāvinaḥ saṃvaratvasyodbhāvanārtham / yo dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati asau nirvāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati pratisaṃkhyānirodham / svaparasaṃtānaklelśānāṃ duḥkhasya ca śāntyekalakṣaṇātvāt
# de dag gi ni mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun dkon mchog brjod pa'i phyir ro / / gang zhig chos la skyabs su 'gro ba de ni mya ngan las 'das pa so sor brtags pas 'gog pa la skyabs su 'gro ba yin te / / bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa rnams dang sdug bsngal zhi bar mtshan nyid gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
yadyaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddhaḥ kathaṃ tathāgatasyāntike dukṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryaṃ bhavati
# gal te mi slob pa'i chos dag kho na sangs rgyas yin na ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung bas mtshams med par 'gyur / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
āśrayavipādanātte 'pi vipāditā bhavantīti vaibhāṣikāḥ / śāstraṃ tu naivaṃ vācakamaśaikṣā dharmā eva buddha iti
# rten la gnod pa byas pas de dag la yang gnod pa byas pa yin no zhes zer ro / / bstan bcos las ni mi slob pa'i chos kho na sangs rgyas yin no zhes de skad du mi 'byung ngo /
kiṃ tarhi / buddhakarakā iti / ata āśrayasya buddhatvāpratiṣedhādacodyamevaitat
# 'o na ji skad du 'byung zhe na / / sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos zhes 'byung ste / / de'i phyir rten sangs rgyas nyid du ma bkag pas de ni klan kar mi rung pa nyid do /
anyathā hi laukikacittastho na buddhaḥ syānna saṃghaḥ śīlameva ca bhikṣukarakaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt
# de lta ma yin na 'jig rten pa'i sems la gnas pa sangs rgyas kyang ma yin par 'gyur / / dgra bcom pa yang ma yin par 'gyur la dge slong du byed pa'i tshul khrims kho na yang dge slong du 'gyur ro /
yathā tu yo bhikṣūn pūjayati bhikṣukarakamasau śīlaṃ pūjayati
# ji ltar gang zhig dge slong la mchod pa byed pa de dge slong du byed pa'i tshul khrims la mchod pa byed pa yin pa de bzhin du /
evaṃ yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatyaśaikṣānasau buddhakarakāndharmān śaraṇaṃ gacchati
# gang zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba de yang mi slob pa sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos dag la skyabs su 'gro ba yin no /
yo buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati so 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikānbuddharmānityapare
# gzhan dag na re gang zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba de na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skyabs su 'gro ba yin no zhes zer ro /
kiṃsvabhāvāni śaraṇagamanāni
# skyabs su 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
vāgvijñaptisvabhāvāni / kaḥ punaḥ śaraṇārthaḥ / trāṇārthaḥ śaraṇārthaḥ / tadāśrayeṇa sarvaduḥkhātyantanirmokṣāt
# ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi ngo bo nyid dag yin no / / yang skyabs kyi don ci zhe na / / de la brten nas sdug bsngal thams cad las gtan du nges par thar pa'i phyir ro /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā
# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
bahavaḥ śaraṇaṃ yānti parvatāṃśca vanāni ca
# 'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni / / phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang /
ārāmānvṛkṣāṃścaityāṃśca manuṣyā bhayavarjitāḥ
# kun dga' dang ni mchod gnas kyi / / ljon shing rnams la skyabs 'gro ste /
na tvetaccharaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ naitaccharaṇamuttamam
# skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing / / skyabs de mchog gyur ma yin la /
naitaccharaṇamāgamya sarvaduḥkhātpramucyate / yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / catvāri cāryasatyāni paśyati prajñayā yadā
# skyabs de la ni brten nas kyang / / sdug bsngal kun las mi grol gyi / / gang tshe gang zhig sangs rgyas dang / / chos dang dge 'dun skyabs song la / / sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang /
duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamutpādaṃ duḥkhasya samatikramam / āryaṃ cāṣṭāṅgikaṃ mārgaṃ kṣemaṃ nirvāṇagāminam
# sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang / / 'phags lam yan lag brgyad bde ba / / mya ngan 'das par 'gro 'gyur dang / / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag / / shes rab kyis ni lta byed pa /
etaddhi śaraṇaṃ śreṣṭhametaccharaṇamuttamam
# skyabs de gtso bo yin pa ste / / skyabs de mchog tu gyur pa yin /
etaccharaṇamāgamya sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate
# skyabs de la ni brten nas kyang / / sdug bsngal kun las 'grol bar 'gyur / / zhes gsungs te /
eta eva śaraṇagamanāni sarvasaṃvarasamādāneṣu dvārabhūtāni / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanyeṣu saṃvareṣvabrahmacaryādviratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitam upāsakasya tu kāmamithyācārāt
# de nyid kyi phyir skyabs su 'gro ba rnams ni sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa thams cad la sgor gyur pa yin no / / yang ci'i phyir sdom pa gzhan dag las ni mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba bslab pa'i gzhir rnam par bzhag la /
mithyācārātigarhyatvātsaukaryādakriyāptitaḥ / kāmamithyācāro hi loke 'tyantaṃ garhitaḥ / pareṣāṃ dāropaghātādāpāyikatvācca
# dge bsnyen la ni 'dod pas log par g yem pa las spong ba bslab pa'i gzhir rnam par gzhag ce na / / log g yem shin tu smad phyir dang /
na tathā 'brahmacaryam
# sla phyir mi byed thob phyir ro /
sukarā ca kāmamithyācārādviratirgṛhānadhyāvasatāṃ duṣkarātvabrahmacaryāditi duṣkaraṃ karttuṃ notsaheran / āryāścākaraṇasaṃvaraṃ kāmamithyācārāt pratilabhante / janmāntareṣvapyanadhyācaraṇānnatvabrahmacryādityupāsakasyāpi tasmādeva viratiḥ śikṣāpadaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ mā bhūt parivṛttajanmāntaraḥ śaikṣa upāsakasaṃvarāṅgeṣvasaṃvṛta iti / akriyāniyamo hyakaraṇasaṃvaraḥ
# 'dod pas log par g yem pa ni gzhan dag gi chung ma sun 'byin pa'i phyir dang ngan song ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten na shin tu smad pa yin gyi mi tshangs par spyod pa ni de lta ma yin pa dang khyim na gnas pa 'dod pas log par g yem pa las bsdams bla'i mi tshangs par spyod pa las ni dka' ba'i phyir / / dka' ba byed par mi spra bar 'gyur ba dang 'phags pa rnams che rabs gzhan dag tu yang mi spyod pa'i phyir 'dod pas log par g yem pa mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob kyi mi tshangs par spyod pa ni de lta ma yin pas slob pa tshe rabs gzhan du gyur pa dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la gnas pa ma yin par 'gyur du 'ong bas dge bsnyen la yang de kho na las ldog pa sdom par rnam par gzhag go / / mi byed par nges pa ni mi byed pa'i sdom pa'o /
ya upāsakāḥ santo bhāryāḥ pariṇayanti kiṃ taistābhyo 'pi saṃvaraḥ pratilabdho 'tha na
# gang dag dge bsnyen yin bzhin du chung ma len par byed na ci de dag gis de las kyang sdom pa thob bam / / 'on te ma yin zhe na /
pratilabdho mā bhūt prādeśikasaṃvaralābha iti / kathaṃ saṃvarakṣobho na bhavati
# nyi tshe ba'i sdom pa thob par 'gyur du 'ong bas 'thob bo / / ji ltar na sdom pa nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na /
yasmāt
# 'di ltar /
yathābhyupagamaṃ lābhaḥ saṃvarasya na saṃtateḥ / yathā hyeṣāmabhyupagamastathā saṃvaralābhaḥ
# sdom pa ji ltar khas blangs bzhin / / 'thob kyi rgyud las ma yin no / / de dag gi sdom pa ni ji ltar khas len pa de bzhin 'thob bo /
kathaṃ caiṣāmabhyupagamaḥ / kāmamithyācārādviramāmīti / na tvatra saṃtāne mayā brahmacaryaṃ na kartavyamityata evaiṣāṃ tadadhiṣṭhātkāmamithyācārāṅgādeva saṃvaralābho nābrahmacaryāditi nāsti bhāryībhūtāyāṃ saṃvarakṣobhaḥ / atha kasmāt mṛṣāvādād viratirevopāsakasaṃvaraśikṣāpadaṃ na paiśunyādiviratiḥ
# de dag ji ltar khas len zhe na bdag 'dod pas log par g yem pa spong ngo zhes khas len gyi / / bdag gi rgyud 'di la mi tshangs par spyod par mi bya'o zhes ni ma yin te / / de'i phyir de dag gis gzhi de las 'dod pas log par g yem pa'i yan lag kho na sdom pa 'thob kyi mi tshangs par spyod pa ni ma yin pas chung mar gyur pa la sdom pa nyams pa med do / / yang ci'i phyir brdzun du smra ba spong ba kho na dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la bslab pa'i yan lag tu bzhag la phra ma la sogs pa las ni ma yin zhe na /
ebhireva ca tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ
# rgyu gsum pa de dag nyid kyi phyir te /
mṛṣāvādātigarhyatvāt saukaryādakriyāptitaḥ
# brdzun smra shin tu smad phyir dang / / sla phyir mi byed 'thob phyir ro /
mṛṣāvādaprasaṅgācca sarvaśikṣāvyatikrame / sarvatra hi śikṣātikrame samanuyujyamānasyopasthitamidaṃ bhavati nāhamevamahārṣamiti mṛṣāvādasya prasaṅgo bhavatyato mṛṣāvādādviratirvidhīyate kathaṃ kṛtātikramo 'pyātmani māviṣkuryāditi
# bslab pa thams cad 'das gyur na / / brdzun du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir / / bslab pa thams cad du 'das na dri bar bya ba la bdag gis de lta bu ma byas so zhes bya ba 'di nye bar gnas par 'gyur te / / brdzun du sma ba thal bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir ji ltar na 'das par byas kyang bdag nyid 'chags par 'gyur snyam nas brdzun du smra ba las zlog pa bshad do /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyācchikṣāpadasya na vyavasthāpitam
# yang ci'i phyir bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'dir bslab pa'i gzhir rnam par ma bzhag ce na / / bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba /
pratikṣepaṇasāvadyānmadyādeva
# myos 'gyur las / / rnam par gzhag go /
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ madyādeva nānyasmāt / anyaguptaye / madyaṃ pivato 'nyānyapyaṅgānyaguptāni syuḥ
# ci'i phyir myos par 'gyur ba kho na las yin gyi gzhan las ni ma yin zhe na gzhan srung phyir ro / / myos par 'gyur ba 'thungs na yan lag gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang mi srung bar 'gyur ro /
kathaṃ punarmadyapānaṃ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyaṃ gamyate
# ji ltar na myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba yin par shes she na /
prakṛtisāvadyalakṣaṇābhāvāt / prakṛtisāvadyaṃ hi kliṣṭenaiva cittenādhyācaryate / śakyaṃ tu madyaṃ pratīkārabuddhyaiva pātuṃ yāvanna madayet / kliṣṭameva taccittaṃ yanmadanīyaṃ jñātvā pibati
# rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir te / / rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ni sems nyon mongs pa can kho nas spyod pa yin na chang ni ji srid myos par mi 'gyur bar gnyen po'i blo kho nas btung bar nus so / / gang myos par 'gyur ba yin par shes nas 'thung ba'i sems de nyid nyon mongs pa can yin no /
na tat kliṣṭaṃ yadamadanīyamātrāṃ viditvā pibati
# gang myos par mi 'gyur ba'i drod rig nas 'thung ba de ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin no /
prakṛtisāvadyaṃ madyamiti vinayadharāḥ / kathaṃ bhadanta glāna upasthātavyaḥ
# 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams na re myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba yin te / / btsun pa ji ltar bro g yog bgyi /
prakṛtisāvadyamupālin sthāpayitvā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā
# nye ba 'khor rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma gtogs pa zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la /
śākyeṣu ca glāneṣu madyapānaṃ nābhyanujñātam
# sh'akya nad pa rnams la yang myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba ma gnang ngo /
idaṃ coktaṃ māṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśadbhiḥ kuśāgreṇāpi madyaṃ na pātavyami tyataḥ prakṛtisāvadyamiti jñāyate
# 'di skad du dge slong dag nga ston pa yin par smra ba rnams kyis myos par 'gyur ba rtsva'i rtse mos kyang btung bar mi bya'o zhes kyang gsungs te /
āryaiśca janmāntaragatairapyanadhyācārāt
# de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba yin par mngon no /
prāṇivadhādivat / kāyaduścaritavacanāddurgatigamanācceti / netyābhidhārmikāḥ / utsargavihitasyāpi glāneṣu prajñaptisāvadyasya punarmadyasyāpavādaḥ prasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ madnīyamātrānīyamanāt / ata eva kuśāgrapānapratiṣedhaḥ
# srog gcod pa la sogs pa bzhin du 'phags pa rnams tshe 'phos kyang mi spyod pa'i phyir dang lus kyi nyes par spyod pa zhes kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / / chos mngon pa pa rnams na re / / ma yin te / / nad pa rnams la bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba spyir bstan mod kyi / / yang myos par 'gyur ba'i drod ma nges par thal bar 'gyur ba yongs su spang ba'i phyir myos par 'gyur ba dmigs kyis bstan te / / de nyid kyi phyir rtsva'i rtse mos 'thung ba bkag pa yin no /
āryairanadhyācaraṇaṃ hrīmattvāttena ca smṛtināśāt / alpakasyāpyapānamaniyamādviṣavat
# 'phags pa rnams mi spyod pa ni ngo tsha dang ldan pa'i phyir dang des kyang dran pa nyams par byed pa'i phyir cung zad kyang mi gsol te / / dug bzhin du ma nges pa'i phyir ro /
duścaritavacanaṃ pramādasthānatvāt
# nyes par spyod pa zhes 'byung ba ni bag med pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir te /
ata evātra pramādasthānagrahaṇaṃ nānyeṣu teṣāṃ prakṛtisāvadyatvāt / atyāsevitena durgatigamanābhidhānam / tatprasaṅgenābhīkṣṇamakuśalasaṃtatipravṛtterāpāyikasya karmaṇa ākṣepādvṛttilābhādvā
# de nyid kyi phyir 'di la bag med pa'i gnas zhes smos kyi gzhen dag la ni ma yin te / / de dag la ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma thob yin pa'i phyir ro / / ha cang kun du bsten pas ngan 'gror 'gro bar gsungs pa ni de'i zhar la mi dge ba'i rgyun yang dang yang du 'jug pas ngan song ba'i las 'phen pa 'am 'jug pa thob pa'i phyir ro /
surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānamiti ko 'rthaḥ
# 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
surā anāsavaḥ / maireyaṃ dravāsavaḥ / te ca kadācidaprāptacyutamadyabhāve bhavataḥ ityato madyagrahaṇam
# 'bru'i chang ni zas las sbyar ba'i btung ba'o / / sbyar ba'i chang ni rdzas las sbyar ba'i btung ba'o / / de dag kyang res 'ga' myos par 'gyur ba'i dngos por ma red pa'am yal bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir myos par 'gyur ba zhes bya bar smos so /
pūgaphalakodravādayo 'pi madayantīti surāmaireyagrahaṇam
# gla gor zho sha dang khre rgod la sogs pa yang myos par byed pas 'bru'i chang dang sbyar ba'i chang zhes bya ba smos so /
prajñaptisāvadyasyāpyādareṇa praheyatve kāraṇajñāpanārthaṃ pramādasthānavacanam / sarvapramādāspadatvāditi
# bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba yin yang bag med pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas bsgrims te spang par bya ba nyid yin pa'i rgyu shes par bya ba'i phyir bag med pa'i gnas zhes smos so /
ya ime trayaḥ prātimokṣadhyānānāsravasaṃvarāḥ kimeṣāṃ yata eko labhyate tataḥ śeṣau
# ci so sor thar pa dang bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang gsum po 'di dag gang las gcig 'thob pa de las lhag ma dag thob pa'am zhe na /
netyāha
# ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / sarvobhayebhyaḥ kāmāpto vartamānebhya āpyate
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / 'dod gtogs thams cad gnyi ga dang /
vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatana dhātubhyaḥ kāmāpta iti prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ
# da ltar dag las 'thob par 'gyur / / 'dod gtogs zhes bya ba ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yin no /
sarvebhya iti maulaprayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ
# thams cad las zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba dang dngos dang mjug las so /
ubhayebhya iti sattvāsattvākhyebhyaḥ prakṛtipratikṣepaṇasāvadyebhyaśca vartamānebhya eva skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyate / sattvādhiṣṭānapravṛttatvāt nātītānāgatebhyaḥ
# gnyi ga las zhes bya ba ni sems can dang sems can ma yin par ston pa dang rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i kha na mtho ba las so / / sems can gyi rten la 'jug pa'i phyir da ltar gyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched kho na las 'thob kyi 'das pa dang ma 'das pa dag las ni ma yin te /
teṣāmasattvasaṃkhyātatvāt
# de dag ni sems can du mi bgrang ba'i phyir ro /
maulebhyaḥ sarvakālebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau / maulebhya eva karmapathebhyo dhyānānāsravasaṃvarau labhyete na prayogapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ kuta eva prajñaptisāvadyebhyaḥ sarvakālebhyaśca skandhāyatanadhātubhyo labhyete atītānāgatebhyo 'pi
# bsam gtan zag med sdom pa ni / / dngos dang dus ni thams cad la / / bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni las kyi lam dngos kho na las 'thob kyi sbyor ba dang mjug las kyang ma yin na bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba la lta smos kyang ci dgos / / dus thams cad kyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched las 'thob ste /
ata eva catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate / santi tāni skandha dhātvāyatanāti yebhyaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ eva labhyate na dhyānānāsravasaṃvarāviti vistaraḥ / prathamā koṭiḥ pratyutpannebhyaḥ sāmantakapṛṣṭhebhyaḥ pratikṣepaṇasāvadyācca / dvitīyā 'tītānāgatebhyo maulebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ / tṛtīyā pratyutpannebhyo maulebhyaḥ karmapathebhyaḥ / caturthyatītānāgatebhyaḥ sāmantakapṛṣṭhemyaḥ iti
# 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag las kyang 'thob bo / / de nyid kyi phyir gang dag las so sor thar pa'i sdom pa 'thob la bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dag ma yin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched de dag kyang yod ces bya ba rgyas par mu bzhir 'gyur te / / mu dang po ni da ltar byung ba'i nyer bsdogs dang mjug dag dang bcas pa'i kha na ma thob las so / / gnyis pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i las kyi lam dngos dag las so / / gsum pa ni da ltar byung ba'i las kyi lam dngos dag las so / / bzhi pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i nyer bsdogs dang mjug dag las so /
natu saṃvarakāle vartamānāḥ karmapathāḥ santīti vartamānādhiṣṭhānebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam
# sdom pa 'thob ba'i tshe na da ltar gyi las kyi lam rnams med pas da ltar gyi gzhi can las zhes brjod par bya'o /
anāgatānāmeva saṃvaraṇaṃ yujyate nātītavartamānānām
# ma 'ongs pa rnams kho na las sdom par rung gi 'das pa dang da ltar gyi rnams la ni ma yin no /
atha kiṃ saṃvarāsaṃvarau sarvasattvebhya eva labhyete sarvāṅgebhyaḥ sarvakāraṇaiśca āhosvidasti bhedaḥ / niyataṃ tāvat labhyate
# yang ci sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dag sems can thams cad dang yan lag thams cad dang rgyu thams cad kyis 'thob bam / / 'on te bye brag ci yod ce na / / re zhig nges par /
saṃvaraḥ sarvasattvebhyo vibhāṣā tvaṅgakāraṇaiḥ / sarvasattvebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate kebhyaścit aṅgebhyastu vibhāṣā
# sdom pa sems can thams cad las / / 'thob la / / yan lag rgyu la dbye ba yod / / sdom pa ni sems can thams cad las 'thob pa nyid de 'ga' las ma yin no; /
kaścit sarvebhyo labhyate
# yan lag las ni dbye ba ni yod de /
bhikṣusaṃvaraḥ / kaściccaturbhyaḥ
# la la ni thams cad las 'thob ste / / dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa'o /
tato 'nyaḥ / karmapathā hi saṃvarasyāṅgāni
# la la ni gzhi las te de las gzhan pa'o / / las kyi lam rnams ni sdom pa'i yan lag dag yin no /
kāraṇairapi kenacit paryāyeṇa sarvaiḥ kenacidekena
# rgyu las kyang rnam grangs la la las ni thams cad kyis so / / la la las ni gcig gis so /
kena tāvatsarvaiḥ / yadyalobhādveṣāmohāḥ kāraṇānīṣyante
# re zhig gang gis na thams cad kyis yin zhe na / / gal te ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa rgyur 'dod na'o /
kenai kena / yadi mkṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi cittāni kāraṇānīṣyante
# gang gis na gcig gis she na / / gal te sems chung du dang 'bring dang chen po dag rgyur 'dod na'o /
paścimaṃ paryāyaṃ niyamayyocyate asti saṃvarasthāyī sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛto na sarvāṅgaiḥ na sarvakāraṇaiḥ
# rnam grangs tha ma nges pa la brten te smras pa / / sdom pa la gnas pa sems can thams cad la bsdams la yan lag thams cad dang rgyu thams cad kyi ma yin pa yang yod de /
yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā upāsakovāsa śrāmaṇerasaṃvaraṃ samādatte / asti sarvasattveṣu saṃvṛtaḥ sarvaṅgaiśca na tu sarakāraṇaiḥ / yo mṛdunā cittena madhyenādhimātreṇa vā bhikṣusaṃvaraṃ samādatte / asti sarvasattveṣu sarvaṅgaiḥ sarvakāraṇaiśca
# gang zhig sems chung ngu 'am 'bring ngam chen pos dge bsnyen dang bsnyen gnas pa dang dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa'o / / sems can thams cad dang yan lag thams cad kyis bsdams la rgyu thams cad kyi ma yin pa yang yod de / / gang zhig sems chung ngu'am 'bring ngam chen pos dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa'o / / sems can thams cad dang yan lag thams cad dang rgyu thams cad kyis bsdams pa yang yod de /
yastrividhena cittena trīn saṃvarān samādatte / asti sarvasattveṣu sarvakāraṇaiśca na tu sarvāṅgaiḥ
# gang zhig sems rnam pa gsum gyis sngom pa rnam pa gsum yang dag par len pa'o / / sems can thams cad dang rgyu thams cad kyis bsdams pa la yan lag thams cad kyis ma yin pa yang yod do /
ya upāsakopavāsaśrāmaṇerasaṃvarānmṛdumadhyādhimātraiḥ samādatte
# gang zhig sems chung du dang 'bring dang chen po dag gis dge bsnyen dang bsnyen gnas dang dge sbyong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa'o /
yastu na sarvasattveṣu syādīdṛśo nāsti / yasmātsarvasattvānugate kalyāṇāśaye sthitaḥ saṃvaraṃ pratilabhate nānyathā pāpāśayasyānuparatatvāt / pañca niyamān kurvan prātimokṣasamvaraṃ pratilabhate / sattvāṅgadeśakālasamayaniyamāt
# gang zhig sems can thams cad la ma bsdams pa de lta bu ni med de / / 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems dge ba la gnas pas sdom pa 'thob kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te / / sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro / / nges pa lnga po sems can dang / / yan lag dang yul dang dus dang tshe nges pa mi byed na so sor thar pa'i sdom pa 'thob ste /
amuṣmātsattvādviramāmīti sattvaniyamaḥ
# sems can che ge mo zhig las spong ngo zhes bya ba ni sems can nges pa'o /
amuṣmādaṅgādityaṅaniyamaḥ / amusmina deśa iti deśaniyamaḥ / māsādyāvaditi kālaniyamaḥ
# yan lag che ge mo zhig las zhes bya ba ni yan lag nges pa'o / / yul che ge mo zhig tu zhes bya ba ni yul nges pa'o / / zla ba'i bar du zhes bya ba ni dus nges pa'o /
anyatra yuddhāditi samayaniyamaḥ
# 'thab mo ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni tshe nges pa ste /
sucaritamātraṃ tu syāttathā gṛhṇataḥ
# de ltar mnos na legs par spyad pa tsam du ni 'gyur ro /
kathamaśakyebhyaḥ saṃvaralābhaḥ / sarvasattvajīvitānupaghātādhyāśayenābhyupagamāt
# ji ltar na mi nus pa dag las sdom pa 'thob ce na / / sems can thams cad kyi srog la mi gnod pa'i bsam pas khas blang ba'i phyir ro /
yadi punaḥ śakyebhya eva saṃvaro labhyate cayāpacayayuktaḥ syāt / śakyāśakyānāmitaretarasaṃcārāt / evaṃ ca sati vināpi lābhatyāgakāraṇābhyāṃ saṃvarasya lābhatyāgau syātāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gal te nus pa dag kho na las sdom pa 'thob na ni sems can nus pa dang mi nus pa rnams ni phan tshun 'pho bas 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang ldan bar 'gyur te / / de ltar na 'thob pa dang gtong ba'i rgyu dag med par yang sdom pa 'thob pa dang gtong bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
naivaṃ bhavisyati / yathā hyapūrvatṛṇādyutpattau śoṣe vā saṃvarasya vṛddhihlāsau na bhavatastathā śakyāśakyasaṃcāre 'pi na syātām / na sattvānāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca bhāvāttṛṇādīnāṃ tvabhāvāt
# de ltar ni mi 'gyur te / / ji ltar sngon med pa'i rtsva la sogs pa skyes sam bskams na sdom pa 'phel ba dang 'grib par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du nus pa dang mi nus pa 'phos su zin kyang mi 'gyur ro / / sems can rnams ni sngon yang yod la phyis kyang yod pa'i phyir la rtsva la sogs pa ni med pa'i phyir ro /
ko nvatra viśeṣo na vā bhavedasatsu tṛṇādiṣu saṃvarastadvadaśakyo vā bhavet / yadā ca parinirvṛtā na bhavantyeva tadā kathaṃ saṃvarahlāso na syāditi naiṣa yuktaḥ parihāraḥ
# 'di la de ltar mi nus par gyur pa dang zad par ci zhig yod pa gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas med pa kho nar gyur pa de'i tshe ji ltar sdom pa 'grib par mi 'gyur te / / lan 'di ni mi rung ngo /
tasmātpūrvaka eva parihāraḥ sādhuḥ
# de lta bas na gtan tshigs snga ma nyid bzang ngo /
evaṃ tarhi pūrvabuddhaparinirvṛtebhya uttareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ pratimokṣasaṃvarasyā lābhātkathaṃ śīlanyūnatā na prasajyeta
# de ltar na 'o na ni sngon gyi sems can ni sangs rgyas su gyur nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams las sangs rgyas phyi ma rnams kyis so sor thar ba'i sdom pa ma thob pa'i phyir ji ltar tshul khrims nyung bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
sarveṣāṃ sattvebhyo lābhāt
# thams cad kyis sems can thams cad las 'thob pa'i phyir te /
yadi hi te 'pyabhaviṣyaṃ stebhyo 'pi te 'lapsyanta
# gal te de dag kyang yod na ni de rnams kyis de dag las kyang thob par 'gyur ro /
uktaṃ yataḥ saṃvaro labhyate
# sdom pa gang las 'thob pa bshad zin to /
asamvarastu sarvebhyaḥ sarvāṅgebhyo na kāraṇaiḥ / asaṃvarastu sarvasattvebhyo labhyate sarvakarmapathebhyaśca
# sdom pa min pas thams cad dang / / yan lag kun las rgyus min no / / sems can thams cad dang las kyi lam thams cad las 'thob ste / / sdom pa ma yin pa ma tshang ba'i sdom pa ma yin pa can ni med do zhes grag go /
nāsti hi vikalenāsaṃvareṇāsaṃvarikaḥ / na tu sarvakāraṇairyugapat mṛdvādicittāsaṃbhavāt / yo mṛdunā cittenāsaṃvaraṃ pratilabhate so 'dhimātreṇāpi cittena prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayanmṛdunaivā saṃvareṇa samanvāgato bhavatyadhimātrayā tu prāṇātipātavijñaptyā
# rgyu thams cad kyis ni ma yin te / / sems chung ngu la sogs pa cig car du mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / gang zhig sems chung ngus sdom pa ma yin pa 'thob ste / / sems chen pos srog chags kyi srog gcod par byed na yang sdom pa ma yin pa ni chung ngu kho na dang ldan la / / srog gcod pa'i rnam par rig byed ni chen po dang ldan no /
evaṃ madhyādhimātreṇa yojyam / tatreme āsaṃvarikāstadyathā aurabhrikāḥ kaukkuṭikāḥ saukarikāḥ śākunikā mātsikā mṛgalubdhakāścaurā vadhyaghātakā bandhanapālakā nāgabandhakāḥ śvapākā vāgurikāśca / rājāno daṇḍanetāro vyāvahārikāścārthata āsaṃvarikāḥ asaṃvare bhavatvāt tatrashatayā asaṃvara eṣāmastīti āsaṃvarikā vā
# de bzhin du 'bring dang chen po la yang sbyar bar bya'o / / de la 'di dag ni sdom pa ma yin pa can yin te / / 'di lta ste / / shan pa rnams dang bya gag gsod pa rnams dang phag gsod pa rnams dang bya pa rnams dang nya pa rnams dang ri dags 'chor ba rnams dang chom rkun pa rnams dang gshed ma rnams dang btson rdzi rnams dang glang po che 'chor ba rnams dang khyi 'chor ba rnams dang bku ri 'chor ba rnams so / / rgyal po dang blon po dang shags zin po rnams kyang don gyis na sdom pa ma yin no / / de la gnas pas sdom pa ma yin ba yod pa'i phyir ram / / 'di dag la sdom pa ma yin pa yod pas na sdom pa ma yin pa can rnams so /
urabhrān ghnantīti aurabhrikāḥ
# lug gsod pas na shan pa rnams te /
evamanye 'pi yojyāḥ
# gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro /
yuktastāvat saṃvarasya sarvasattvebhyo lābhaḥ / sarvasattvahitādhyāśayena grahaṇāt
# re zhig sdom pa ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pas zhes smos pas sems can thams cad las thob par yang rigs na /
aurabhrikādīnāṃ tu mātāpitṛputradārādiṣvavipannāśayānāṃ jīvitahetorapyahantukāmānāṃ kathamasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattvebhyo yujyate
# shan pa la sogs par pha dang ma dang bu dang bran la sogs pa la log par ma zhugs pa'i bsam pa can 'tsho ba'i phyir yang gsod par mi 'dad pa rnams go ji ltar sems can thams cad las sdom pa ma yin pa 'thob par rung /
mātrādīnapi hi ta urabhrībhūtān hanyuḥ / na hi tāvatte ta eva iti vidvāṃso hanyuḥ / āryībhūtānāṃ ca punaḥ paśu bhavituṃ nāstyavakāśa iti tebhyaḥ kathaṃ syāt
# de dag ni ma la sogs pa lug tu gyur pa yang gsod do / / re zhig de dag nyid yin par shes nas ni mi gsod do / / 'phags mar gyur pa rnams la yang phyugs su gyur pa'i go skabs med na ji ltar na de dag las sdom pa ma yin pa 'thob /
yadi cā nāgatātmabhāvāpekṣayā varttamānādasaṃvṛtaḥ syādurabhrādīnapi te putrībhūtāt sarvathā na hanyuriti ina syāttebhyyo 'saṃvaraḥ / kathaṃ hi nāma jighāṃsatāmeva tebhyo na syādasaṃvaraḥ
# gal te ma 'ongs pa'i lus la ltos te da ltar gyi las sdom pa ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur na ni de dag lug bur gyur pa rnams kyang gtan mi gsod pas de dag las sdom pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro / / ji ltar na gsod par 'dod bzhin du de dag las sdom pa ma yin par mi 'gyur /
etanmātrādiṣu samānam
# de ni ma la sogs pa la yang mtshungs te /
kathaṃ hi nāmājighāṃsatāmeva tebhyaḥ syādasaṃvara iti
# ji ltar na gsod par mi 'dod bzhin du de dag las sdom pa ma yin par 'gyur /
yaścaurabhriko janmanāpyādatte svadāraparituṣṭo mūkaśca
# shan pa gang zhig tsher yang ma byin par mi len / / rang gi chung mas kyang chog shes /
kathamasya pūrvaṅgebhyo 'saṃvaraḥ syāt / āśayasyāvipannatvāt / mūko 'pi ca vākprāpaṇīyamarthaṃ kāyena prāpayituṃ śakta iti
# lkugs pa yang yin na ji ltar na de yan lag thams cad las sdom pa ma yin par 'gyur; bsam pa log par zhugs pa'i phyir te / / lkugs bzhin du ngag gis thob par bya ba'i don lus kyis 'thob par nus so /
yastarhi dve trīṇi vā śikṣāpadāni samādatte
# 'o na gang zhig gis bslab pa'i gnas gnyis sam gsum zhig yang dag par blangs na ji lta bur 'gyur /
sarvathā nāsti vikalaḥ prādeśikaścāsaṃvarika iti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re sdom pa ma yin pa la ma tshang ba dang nyi tshe ba ni rnam pa thams cad du med do zhes zer ro /
yathā bhyupagamaṃ vikalo 'pi syāt prādeśiko 'pyasaṃvaraḥ saṃvaraścānyatrāṣṭavidhāditi sautrāntikāḥ / tanmātraśīla dauḥślīlyapratibandhāt
# mdo sde pa rnams na re ni ji ltar khas blangs pa bzhin du sdom pa ma yin pa dang rnam pa brgyad ma gtogs pa sdom pa yang ma tshang ba yod la nyi tshe ba yang yod de tshul khrims dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims de tsam gyis gegs byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
uktamidamasaṃvarasya yebhyo lābhaḥ
# sdom pa ma yin pa gang dag las 'thob pa de ni bshad zin to /
kathaṃ tu lābha iti noktam
# ji ltar 'thob pa ma bshad pas /
tata idamucyate / asaṃvarasya kriyayā lābho 'bhyupagamena vā
# de'i phyir 'di brjod par bya ste / / sdom pa min pa bya ba 'am / / khas len pa las 'thob par 'gyur /
dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmasaṃvaro labhyate
# sdom pa ma yin pa ni rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis 'thob ste /
vadhaprayogakriyayā tatkulīnaiḥ tatkarmābhyupagamāccānyatra kulīnaiḥ / vayamapyanayā jīvikayā jīviṣyāma iti
# de'i rigs su skyes pa rnams ni gsod par sbyor ba'i bya ba las so / / gzhan gyi rigs su skyes pa rnams ni bdag cag kyang 'tsho ba 'dis 'tsho bar bya'o zhes khas len pa las so /
śeṣāvijñaptilābhastu kṣetrādānādarehanāt
# lhag ma'i rnam rig min zhing dang / / len dang gus par byed pas 'thob /
kṣetraṃ vā tadrūpaṃ bhavati yatrārāmādipradānamātreṇāvijñaptirutpadyate
# gang du kun dga'i ra ba la sogs pa phul ba tsam gyis rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhing yang yod de / / 'di lta ste /
yathaupadhikeṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu
# rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dag lta bu'o /
athavā samādānamādatte buddhamavanditvā na bhokṣye tithimāsārdhamāsabhaktāni vā nityaṃ kariṣyāmītyādi
# yang na sangs rgyas la phyag ma 'tshal gyi bar du zas mi bza'o / / tshes sam zla ba gcig gam zla ba phyed cing rtag tu zas dag sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i yi dam bcas pa'am /
ādareṇa tadrūpeṇa kriyāmīhate kuśalāmakuśalāṃ vā yato 'syāvijñaptirutpadyate
# dge ba 'am mi dge ba gang las 'di'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gus pas las byed pa las so /
uktametadyathā saṃvarāsaṃvaretarāṇāṃ pratilambhaḥ / tyāga idānīṃ vaktavyaḥ / tatra tāvat
# sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa rnams ji ltar 'thob pa 'di ni bshad zin to / / da ni gtong ba brjod par bya ste / / de la re zhig /
prātimokṣadamatyāgaḥ śikṣānikṣepaṇāccyuteḥ
# bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang / / mtshan nyid dag ni byung ba dang /
ubhayavyañjanotpattermūlacchedānniśātyayāt
# rtsa ba chad dang mtshan 'das las / / so sor thar ba'i 'dul ba gtong /
dāmyantyaneneti damaḥ saṃvaro 'bhipretastenendriyadamanāt
# 'dis 'dul bar byed bas na 'dul ba ste / / des dbang po 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yin par dgongs pa'o /
caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarasya tyāgaḥ / sthāpayitvopavāsam
# bsnyen gnas ma gtogs pa'i so sor thar ba'i sdom pa ni rgyu rnam pa bzhis gtong bar 'gyur te /
śikṣāpadānāṃ vijñapuruṣasyāntike pratyākhyānadāśayataḥ nikāyasabhāgatyāgāt yugapadu bhayavyañjanaprādurbhāvāt kuśalamūlasamucchedācca / upavāsasaṃvarasya tvebhiścaturbhirārātrikṣayācca / tānyetānyabhisamasya pañca tyāgakāraṇāni bhavanti
# mi brda phrad pa'i drung du bslab ba'i gzhi rnams bsam pa thag pa nas slar phul ba dang ris mthun pa btang ba dang mtshan nyid cig car du 'byung ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa las so / / bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa ni rgyu de dag dang mtshan mo 'das pa las te / / de dag ni mdor bsdu na gtong ba'i rgyu lnga yin no /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamebhiḥ kāraṇaistyāgo bhavati / samādānaviruddhavijñaptyutpādādāśrayatyāgādāśrayavikopanānnidānacchedāttāvadevākṣepācca
# ci'i phyir rgyu de dag gis gtong bar gyur zhe na / / yang dag par blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i rnam par rig byed skyed pa dang rten bor ba dang rten nyams pa dang gzhi chad pa dang de srid du 'phangs pa'i phyir ro /
patanīyena cetyeke
# kha cig ltung bar 'gyur ba las smra /
anye punarāhuścaturṇāṃ patanīyānāmanyatamena bhikṣuśrāmaṇerasaṃvaratyāga iti
# gzhan dag na re ltung bar 'gyur ba bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig gis dge slong dang dge sbyong gi sdom pa gtong ngo zhes zer ro /
saddhamantirdhito 'pare
# gzhan dag dam chos nub pa las /
saddharmasyāntardhānādityapare
# gzhan dag na re dam pa'i chos nub pa las te /
yasmādantarhite saddharme sarvaśikṣāsīmākarmāntāḥ pratiprasrabhyanta iti
# 'di ltar dam pa'i chos nub na bslab pa'i mtshams thams cad dang las kyi mtha' rnams med par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
dhanarṇavattu kādmīrairāpannasyeṣyate dvayam
# kha che rnams ni byung ba la / / bu lon nor bzhin gnyis su 'dod /
kāśmīrāstu khalu vaibhāṣikāḥ evamicchanti / na maulīmadhyāpattimā pannasyāsti bhikṣusaṃvaratyāgaḥ
# kha che bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di ltar 'dod de / / rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung ba la yang sdom pa gtong ba med do /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
na hyekadeśakṣobhāt kṛtsna saṃvaratyāgo yukta iti / naiva cānyāmapyāpatti māpannasyāsti śīlacchedaḥ
# phyogs gcig nyams pas sdom pa zad par gtong ba ni mi rigs so / / ltung ba gzhan byung ba la yang tshul khrims 'chal pa med do /
kiṃ tarhi / dvayamasya bhavati śīlaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ ca
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / 'di la tshul khrims dang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims gnyi ga yang yod de /
yathā kasyaciddhanaṃ syādṛṇaṃ ca
# dper na mi 'ga' zhig la nor yang bdog bu lon yang chags pa bzhin no /
āviṣkṛtāyāṃ tu tasyāmāpattau śīlavānbhavati na duḥśīlo yathā ṛṇaṃ śodhayitvā dhanavānbhavati na tvṛṇavāniti
# ltung ba de bshags na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin gyi tshul khrims 'chal pa ni ma yin te / / dper na bu lon btsal nas nor dang ldan pa yin gyi bu lon chags pa ma yin pa bzhin no zhes bya bar 'dod do /
yattarhi bhagavatoktam bhikṣurbhavatyaśramaṇo 'śākyaputrīyo dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāt / katamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ patitaṃ parājitamiti
# 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma yin dge sbyong ma yin / / sh'akya'i bu ma yin / / dge sbyong gi dngos po las nyams par 'gyur te / / de'i dge sbyong gi tshul zhig par 'gyur / / nyams pa dang bcom pa dang ltung ba dang pham par 'gyur zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu /
paramārthabhikṣutvaṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktam
# de ni don dam pa'i dge slong nyid las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no /
idamabhisāhasaṃ vartate
# 'di ni ha cang thug thub ches par 'gyur ro /
kimatrābhisāhasam
# 'di la thug thub ci zhig bya zhe na /
yat bhagavatā nītārthaṃ punaranyathā nīyate
# bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'i don gang yin pa gzhan du 'dren pa'o /
dauḥśīlyāya ca bahukleśebhyaḥ pratyayā dīyante / kathameta nītārtham
# nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la 'chal pa'i thul khrims su bya ba'i phyir rkyen byed pa yang yin no /
eṣa hi vinaye nirdeṣaḥ
# de ji ltar na nges pa'i don yin zhe na /
caturvidho bhikṣuḥ / saṃjñābhikṣuḥ pratijñābhikṣurbhikṣata iti bhikṣurbhinnakleśatvāt bhikṣuḥ
# 'dul ba las 'di skad du dge slong ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / ming gi dge slong dang khas 'che ba'i dge slong dang slong bas na dge slong dang nyon mongs ba bcom pas na dge slong ngo /
