asmiṃstvarthe jñapticaturthakarmopasaṃpanno bhikṣuriti / na cāsau pūrvaṃ paramārthabhikṣurāsīdyataḥ paścādabhikṣurbhavet yaccoktamekadeśakṣobhāditi atra śāstraiva datto 'nuyoga stadyathā tālo mastakācchinno 'bhavyo 'ṅkuritatvāya abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāmāptu mityupamāṃ kurvatā
# don 'di la ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong yin no zhes gsungs te / / de sngon don dam pa'i dge slong du gyur la gang gis ni / / phyis dge slong ma yin par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no / / phyogs gcig nyams pas zhes gang smras pa de ni ston pa de nyid kyis / / dper na shing ta la'i mgo bcad na sngon por 'gyur du mi btub 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par mi btub pa bzhin no zhes bya ba dper mdzad pas lan btab pa yin no /
kaḥ punarūpamārthaḥ
# dpe'i don yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
evamekadeśa syāpi mūlabhūtasya cchedādabhavyaḥ saṃvaraśeṣo viroḍumiti
# rtsa bar gyur pa phyogs gcig chad pas kyang sdom pa lhag ma 'phel du mi btub zhes bya ba yin te /
sa ca gurvīṃ bhikṣubhāvamaryādābhedinīṃ maulīmāpattimāpadyamānastīvrānapatrāpyayogātsaṃvarasya mūlaṃ cchinattīti yuktaḥ kṛtsnasaṃvaratyāgaḥ / yasya caikagrāsaparibhogo 'pyekapāda pārṣṇirpradeśaparibhogo 'pi ca nābhyanujñāyate sāṃghikayorāhāravihārayoḥ sarvabhikṣusaṃbhogabahiṣkṛtaśca śāstrā yaṃ cādhikṛtyoktaṃ
# de yang dge slong gis dngos po'i mtshams 'jig par byed pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba lci ba byung na khrel med pa shas chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sdom pa'i rtsa ba 'chad pas sdom pa zad pas gtong bar rigs so / / ston pas gang la dge 'dun gyi zhal zas dang gtsug lag khang la kham gcig dang gom pa gcig 'dor ba'i phyogs longs spyad par yang ma gnang ba ni dge slong gi longs spyod thams cad las kyang bkar ro /
nāśayata kāraṇḍavakaṃ kaśambakamapakarṣata / athotplāvinaṃ vāhayata abhikṣuṃ bhikṣuvādinamiti
# gang gi dbang du mdzad nas / / dge slong min la dge slong du / / smra ba sre da [?] bsal bar gyis /
tasya kīdṛśo bhikṣubhāvaḥ
# shing rul dag ni spang bar gyis /
yādṛśastādṛśo 'stu
# snying po med pa dor bar gyis /
asti tu bhikṣubhāvaḥ / tathāhi catvāraḥ śramaṇā na pañcamo 'sti cundeti
# zhes gsungs pas de'i dge slong gi dngos po ci 'dra ba zhig yin ci 'dra yang rung dge slong gi dngos po ni yod de /
bhagavānavocat / mārgajino mārgadeśiko mārge jīvati yaśca mārgadūṣī astyetaduktam / sa tveṣa ākṛtimātrāvaśeṣatvācchamaṇa ukto dagdhakāṣṭhaśuṣkahladaśukanāśā pūtivījālātacakramṛtasattvavat
# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun de dge sbyong bzhi ste lnga pa med / / lam gyi rgyal dang lam ston dang / / lam phyir 'tsho dang lam sun 'byin / / zhes gsungs so / / de skad du gsungs pa yod mod kyi / / de ni sha tshugs tsam lus pa'i phyir dge sbyong zhes gsungs par zad de / / shing tshig pa dang mtshe'u skams pa dang ne tso'i mchu dang sa bon rul pa dang; mgal me'i 'khor lo dang sems can shi ba bzhin no /
yadi hi dauḥśīlyādabhikṣuḥ syāt śikṣādattako na syāt
# gal te 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las dge slong ma yin par 'gyur na bslab pa sbyin pa po med par 'gyur ro /
na vayaṃ brūmaḥ sahādhyāpattyā sarvaḥ pārājikaḥ iti
# thams cad ltung ba byung ba'i mdo las phas pham pa pa yin no zhes mi zer gyi /
yastu pārājikaḥ so 'vaśyamabhikṣuḥ
# gang phas pham ba pa de ni gdon mi za bar dge sbyong ma yin no /
kaścittu saṃtānaviśeṣānna pārājika ekacittenāpyapraticchādanāditi vyavasthāpitaṃ dharmasvāminā / yadi tarhi pārājiko na bhikṣuḥ kiṃ punarna pravrājyate
# la la rgyud kyi khyad par las phas pham pa pa ma yin te / / sems 'gas kyang mi 'chab pa'i phyir de ni chos kyi rjes su rnam par gzhag go / / gal te phas pham pa pa dge slong ma yin na ci ste yang rab tu mi 'byung /
tīvrānapatrāpyavipāditatvāt saṃtateḥ saṃvarābhavyatvānna tu khalu bhikṣubhāvāpekṣayā / tathā hyasau nikṣiptaśikṣo 'pi na pravrājyate
# rgyud khrel med pa shas chen bos nyams par byas pas sdom pa'i skal ba med pa'i phyir yin gyi / / dge slong gi dngos po la ltos te ma yin te / / 'di ltar de ni bslab pa phul yang rab tu mi 'byung ngo /
kaścāyamanarthe nirbandho yadyasau tathābhūto 'pi bhikṣurnamo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāya bhikṣutvāya
# don med pa 'di la ci zhig 'bad de / / gal te de lta bur gyur pa yang dge slong yin na dge slong nyid de 'dra ba de la phyag 'tshal lo /
saddharmāntardhāne bu vinayakarmābhāvādapūrvasaṃvaralābho nāsti / labdhasya tu nāsti tyāgaḥ
# dam pa'i chos nub na 'dul ba'i las mes pa'i phyir sngon med pa'i 'dul ba 'thob pa ni med kyi thob zin pa ni gtong ba med do /
atha dhyānānāsravasaṃvarayoḥ kathaṃ tyāgaḥ
# yang bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dag ji ltar gtong zhe na /
bhūmisaṃcārahānibhyāṃ dhyānāptaṃ tyajyate śubham
# bsam gtan gtogs pa'i dge ba ni; / / sa 'phos nyams pa dag gis gtong /
sarvameva dhyānāptaṃ kuśalaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parityajyate / upapattito vā bhūmisaṃcārādūrdhvaṃ cāvaśyaṃ parihāṇito vā samāpatternikāyasabhāgatvācca kiñcit
# bsam gtan du gtogs pa'i dge ba thams cad ni rgyu gnyis kyis gtong ste / / gong ma 'og tu skye ba ste sa 'phos pa las sam / / snyoms par 'jug pa la sa yongs su nyams pa las so / / ris mthun pa btang ba las kyang cung zad gtong bar 'gyur ro /
yathā ca rūpāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhūmisaṃcārahānibhyāṃ tyajyate
# ji ltar gzugs su gtogs pa'i dge bas 'pho ba dang yongs su nyams pa dag gis gtong ba ltar /
tathārūpyāptamāryaṃ tu phalāptyuttaptihānibhiḥ
# de bzhin gzugs med gtogs 'phags pa / / 'bras bu thob sbyangs nyams pa las /
anāsravaṃ tu kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ parityakṣyate / phalaprāptitaḥ pūrvako mārgaḥ parityakṣyate
# dge ba zag pa med pa ni rgyu gsum gyis gtong bar 'gyur te / / 'bras bu thob pa las ni lam snga ma gtong bar 'gyur ro /
indriyottāpanena mṛddhindriyamārgaḥ
# dbang po sbyangs pa las ni dbang po rtul po'i lam mo /
parihāṇita uttaro mārgaḥ / phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭo vā / evaṃ tāvat saṃvarāstyajyante
# yongs su nyams pa las ni lam gong ma 'bras bu 'am 'bras bu khyad par can te / / re zhig sdom pa rnams ni de ltar gtong ngo /
asaṃvaraḥ saṃvarāptimṛtyudvivyañjanodayaiḥ
# sdom min sdom pa thob pa dang / / shing dang mtshan nyid byung ba las /
tribhiḥ kāraṇairasaṃvaracchedaḥ / saṃvaraprāptitaḥ / yadi saṃvaraṃ samādatte dhyānasaṃvaraṃ vā labhate
# sdom pa ma yin pa ni rgyu gsum gyis 'chad de / / sdom pa thob pa las ni gal te sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa las sam /
hetupratyayabalena samādhilābhāt / tenāsaṃvaśchidyate / pratidvandvabalīyastvāt
# rgyu dang rkyen gyi stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin thob pas bsam gtan gyi sdom pa thob na gnyen po stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir des sdom pa ma yin pa 'chad par 'gyur ro /
maraṇenāśrayatyāgāt / dvivyañjanotpādenāśrayavikopanāditi
# lus bor ba'i phyir shi ba dang rten nyams pa'i phyir mtshan nyid byung ba las 'dor bar 'gyur ro /
śastrajālatyāge 'pyakaraṇāśayataḥ / saṃvaramantareṇāsaṃvaracchedo nāsti / nidānaparivarjane 'pyauṣadhamantareṇa pravṛddharogāvinivṛttivat / ya āsaṃvarika upavāsaṃ gṛhṇāti kimasau tasmātsaṃvarātpunarasaṃvaraṃ gacchatyāhosvinnaivasaṃvaraṃ nāsaṃvaram / asaṃvaramityeke
# mtshon dang rgyu mi bya ba'i bsam pa thag pa nas bor du zin kyang sdom pa med par sdom pa ma yin pa 'chad pa med de / / gzhi yongs su spangs kyang sman med par nad rnying mi bzlog pa bzhin no / / sdom pa ma yin pa can gang zhig bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa nod na ci 'di sdom pa de las yang sdom pa ma yin par 'gyur ram / / 'on te sdom pa yang ma yin sdom ba ma yin pa yang ma yin pa zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
tyāgāśayasyānātyantikatvāt / pradīptaivāyaḥpiṇḍaḥ punaḥ śyāmatāṃ nāprayujyamāno gacchatītyapare
# kha cig na re gtan du gtong ba'i bsam pa med pa'i phyir sdom pa ma yin par 'gyur te / / lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba yang sngon por 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes zer ro /
tallābhasya vijñaptyadhīnatvāt / atha saṃvarāsaṃvaravinirmuktā kathamavijñaptistyajyate / vegādānakriyārthāyurmūlacchedaistu madhyamā
# gzhan dag na re de thob pa ni rnam par rig byed la rab lus pa'i phyir sbyor ba mi byed na mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / / yang sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa ma gtogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ji ltar gtong zhe na / / bar ma shugs blangs bya ba dang / / don tshe rtsa ba chad pa las /
yena hyasau prasādakleśavegenāvijñaptirākṣiptā bhavati tasya cchedātsā 'pi cchidyate
# rab tu dang ba dang nyon mongs pa'i shugs gang gis rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'di 'phangs pa de chad pa de yang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur te /
kumbhakāracakreṣugativat
# rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo dang mda'i 'gros bzhin no /
ādānatyāgādapi cchidyate / yadi samādānaṃ tyajatyalaṃ samādāneneti
# gal te yang dag par blangs pa 'dis chog go zhes yang dag par len pa gtong na kun du blangs pa btang ba las kyang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur ro /
kriyāvicchedādapi vicchidyate yathāsamāttamakurvataḥ
# ji ltar blangs pa bzhin ma byas pa'i bya ba rnam par 'chad pa las kyang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur ro /
arthavicchedādapi vicchidyate / katamasyārthasya
# don rnam par 'chad pa las kyang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur ro / / don gang zhe na /
caityārāmavihāraśayanāsana yantrajālādino vastunaḥ / āyuṣo 'pi kuśalalmūlānāmapi cchedādvicchidyate / yadā kuśalamūlāni samucchettumārabhata ityebhiḥ ṣadbhiḥ kāraṇairavijñaptirmadhyamā tyajyate
# mchod rten dang kun dga' ra ba dang gtsug lag khang / / mal cha dang stan dang gos dang rgya la sogs pa'i dngos po'i / / tshe chad pa las kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro / / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'chad pa las kyang rnam par 'chad par 'gyur te / / gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod par rtsom pa na'o / / de ltar na rgyu de drug gis rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gtong bar 'gyur ro /
kāmāptaṃ kuśalārūpaṃ mūlacchedordhvajanmataḥ
# 'dod gtogs dge ba gzugs min ni / / rtsa chad gong du skyes pa las /
kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalamarūpasvabhāvaṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parityajyate / kuśalamūlasamucchedādrūpārūpyadhātūpapattito vā
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba gzugs can ma yin pa'i rang bzhin ni rgyu gnyis kyis gtong ste / / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa'am / / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba las so /
pratipakṣodayāt kliṣṭamarūpaṃ tu vihīyate
# nyon mongs pa can gzugs min ni / / gnyen po skyes pas rnam nyams 'gyur /
kliṣṭaṃ tvarūpasvabhāvaṃ sarvameva pratipakṣodayādvihīyate
# nyon mongs pa can gzugs can ma yin pa'i rang bzhin khams gsum pa thams cad ni gnyen po skyes pas rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
yasyopakleśaprakārasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenāsau saparivāraḥ parityajyate nānyathā
# nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gang gis spong ba'i lam gang yin pa des 'di 'khor dang bcas pa yongs su spong bar byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
atha keṣāṃ sattvānāmasaṃvaro bhavati keṣāṃ saṃvaraḥ
# yang sdom pa ma yin pa ni sems can gang dag la yod / / sdom pa ni gang dag la yod ce na /
nṛṇāmasaṃvaro hitvā śaṇḍapaṇḍadvidhākṛtīn
# za ma ma ning sgra mi snyan / / mtshan gnyis ma gtogs mi rnams la /
kuruṃśca
# sdom min /
manuṣyagatāvevāsaṃvaro nānyatra / tatrāpi śaṇḍhapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanānutarakauravāṃśca hitvā / saṃvaro 'pyevaṃ devānāṃ ca
# sdom pa ma yin pa ni mi'i 'gro ba kho na la yod kyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no / / de la yang za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni ma gtogs so / / sdom pa'ang de bzhin la /
saṃvaro hi manuṣyāṇāmeva yathoktaṃ hitvā devānāṃ ceti gatidvaye saṃvaraḥ / śaṇḍhādīnāṃ saṃvaro nāstīti kathaṃ gamyate / sūtrādvinayācca / sūtra uktaṃ yataśca mahānāma gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣendriyeṇa samanvāgato buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati yāvadvācaṃ bhāṣate upāsakaṃ māṃ dhāraya iyatā copāsako bhavatīti
# lha la'ang / / sdom pa yang ji skad bshad pa ma gtogs pa mi rnams dang lha rnams la yod pas 'gro ba gnyis na sdom pa yod do / / za ma la sogs pa la sdom pa med do zhes bya ba ji ltar shes she na / / mdo dang 'dul ba las te / / mdo las / / ming chen 'di ltar khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa skyes pa pho'i dbang po dang ldan pa zhig sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba nas bdag la dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes tshig tu smra ba'i bar du yang byed na 'di tsam gyis dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
vinaye 'pi tadrūpo nāśayitavya uktaḥ / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇameṣāṃ saṃvaro nāsti / ubhayāśrayakleśādhimātratayā pratisaṃkhyānākṣamatvāttīvrahrīvyapatrāpyābhāvācca / asaṃvarastarhi kasmānnāsti
# 'dul ba las kyang de lta bu gsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs so / / ci'i phyir de dag las sdom pa med ce na / / rten gnyi ga'i nyon mongs pa shas che ba'i phyir dang so sor rtog pa mi bzod pa'i phyir dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa shas chen po med pa'i phyir ro / / 'o na sdom pa ma yin pa ci'i phyir med ce na /
pāpe 'pyasthirāśayatvāt / yatraiava ca saṃvarastatrāsaṃvaro 'pi pratidvandvabhāvāt
# sdig pa la yang bsam pa mi brtan pa'i phyir dang gang la sdom pa yod pa de la sdom pa ma yin pa yang yod de / / gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro /
uttarakoravāṇāṃ samādānasamādhyabhāvāt pāpakriyāśayābhāvācca saṃvarāsaṃvarābhāvaḥ
# byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni yang dag par len pa dang ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir dang sdig pa bya ba'i bsam pa med pa'i phyir sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa med do /
āpāyikānāmapi tīvraṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ nāsti yadyogād yadvipādanācca saṃvarāsaṃvarau syātām / api khalvāśraya eva sa teṣāṃ tādṛśa ūṣarakṣetrabhūtaḥ śaṇḍapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanottarakauravāpāyikānāṃ yatrāśraye saṃvaro pi na virohatyasaṃvaro 'pyūṣara iva kṣetre sasyamapyatimātraṃ kakvamapīti
# ngan song ba rnams la yang gang dang ldan pa dang gang med pas sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa dag tu 'gyur ba ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa shas chen po med do / / gzhan yang za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa dang ngan song ba de dag gi lus nyid du lus gang la sdom pa yang mi skye sdom pa ma yin pa yang mi skye ba zhing tsha sgo can lta bur gyur pa yin te / / zhing tsha sgo can la 'bru yang tshar cig mi skye / / tsva yang tshar cig mi skye ba bzhin no /
yattarhi sūtra uktam aṇḍajo bhikṣavo nāgo 'ṣṭamyāṃ pakṣasya bhāvanādabhyudgamyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatamupavāsamupavasatīti / sucaritamātraṃ tatteṣāṃ na saṃvaraḥ / tasmādevamanuṣyāṇāmeva saṃvaraḥ
# 'o na mdo las; dge slong dag sgo nga las skyes pa'i klu ni zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la gnas nas byung nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas so zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na / / de ni de dag gis legs par spyad pa tsam yin gyi sdom pa ni ma yin no / / de lta bas na sdom pa ni lha dang mi rnams kho na la yod do /
tatra punaḥ / nṛṇāṃ trayaḥ / manuṣyāṇāṃ sarve trayaḥ prātimokṣādisaṃvarāḥ saṃvidyante
# de la yang mi rnams la gsum mo / / mi rnams la ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la sogs pa thams cad yod do /
kāmarūpajadevānāṃ dhyānajaḥ / dhyānasaṃvaraḥ kāmarūpadhātūpapannānāṃ devānāmurdhvaṃ nāsti
# 'dod dang gzugs skyes lha rnams la / / bsam gtan skyes yod / / bsam gtan gyi sdom pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams su skyes ba'i lha rnams la yod kyi gong na ni med do /
anāsravaḥ punaḥ / dhyānāntarāsaṃjñisattvavarjyānāmapyarūpiṇām
# zag med ni / / bsam gtan khyad par 'du shes med / / sems can ma gtogs gzugs med na'ang /
anāsravasaṃvarastu kāmarūpadhātūpapannānāmapyasti dhyānāntarikāsaṃjñisatvopapannānvarjayitvā / ārūpyopapannānāmapi teṣāṃ tu samanvāgamato 'sti na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ
# zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa rnams la yang yod la bsam gtan khyad par can dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can du skyes pa rnams ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa rnams la yang yod de / / de dag gis ni ldan pa'i sgo nas yod kyi mngon sum du gyur pa las ni ma yin no /
ataḥ paramidānīṃ karmanirdeśādhikārātsūtrīddiṣṭānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeṣa ārapsyate / trīṇi karmāṇi
# las bstan pa'i dbang du byas pa yin pas 'di man chad ni mdo las bstan pa'i las rnams bshad par brtsam mo / / las ni gsum ste /
kuśalaṃ karmākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ kameti / tatra
# las dge ba dang las mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa zhes 'byung ba de la /
kṣemākṣemetaratkarma kuśalākuśaletarat / idaṃ kuśalādīnāṃ lakṣaṇam
# las bde mi bde dang gzhan ni / / dge dang mi dge ni gzhan yin / / 'di ni dge ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
kṣemaṃ karma kuśalaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ nirvāṇaprāpakaṃ ca duḥkhaparitrāṇāt / tatkālamatyantaṃ ca akṣemamakuśalaṃ kṣemapratidvandvabhāvena yasyāniṣṭo vipākaḥ
# las bde ba ni dus re zhig dang gtan du sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob pa'i phyir dge ba yin te / / 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par byed pa yin no / / mi dge ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis mi dge ba yin te / / gang gis rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba'o /
tābhyāmitaratkarma naiva kṣemaṃ nākṣemaṃ yattatkuśalākuśalābhyāmitarat veditavyam
# de nyed [*nyid?] las gzhan pa bde ba yang ma yin mi bde ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba las gzhan pa yin par rig par bya ste /
avyākṛtamityarthaḥ / punaḥ
# lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / yang /
puṇyāpuṇyamaviñjaṃ ca sukhavedyādi ca trayam
# bsod nams bsod nams min mi g yo / / bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum /
trīṇī karmāṇi puṇyamapuṇyamāneñjaṃ ca / punaḥ trīṇi
# las ni gsum ste / / bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang mi g yo ba'o / / yang gsum ste /
sukhavedanīyaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyamaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ ca / tatra tāvat / kāmadhātau śubhaṃ karma puṇyamāneñjamūrdhvajam
# bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'o / / de la re zhig bsod nams 'dod khams dge ba'i las / / mi g yo gong ma las skyes pa'i /
śubhamiti vartate
# dge ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ karmāneñjam
# gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las dge ba ni mi g yo ba yin no /
nanu ca trīṇi dhyānāni señjitānyuktāni bhagavatā / yadatra vitarkitaṃ vicāritamidamatrāryā iñjitamityāhurityevamādi
# bcom ldan 'das kyis / / 'di la rnam par brtags pa dang rnam par dpyad pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'dir 'phags pa rnams kyis g yo ba'o zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa bsam gtan gsum po g yo ba dang bcas par gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na /
samādau sāpakṣālatāṃ teṣāmadhikṛtyaivamuktam
# de dag gi ting nge 'dzin skyon dang bcas pa las dgongs nas de skad du gsungs par zad kyi /
āniñjānyapi tu tānyuktānyāniñjasūtre / āniñjasaṃpreyagāminīṃ pratipadamārabhya
# de dag ni mi g yo ba'i mdo las mi g yo ba dang mthun par 'gro ba'i lam las brtsams te mi g yo bar gsungs so /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ señjitamevānyatrāniñjamuktam
# yang ci'i phyir g yo ba dang bcas pa kho na gzhan du mi g yo bar gsungs she na /
tadbhūmiṣu yataḥ karmavipākaṃ prati neñjati
# gang phyir sa ni de dag tu / / las rnams smin phyir mi g yo'i phyir /
kāmāvacaraṃ hi vipākaṃ prati kampate / kathaṃ kampate
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir g yo ba yin no /
avyavasthānāt / anyagati kamapi hyanyasyāṃ gatau vipacyate
# ji ltar g yo zhe na rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir 'gro ba gzhan yang 'gro ba gzhan du rnam par smin par 'gyur la /
anyadevanaikāyikaṃ cānya devanikāye
# lha'i ris gzhan pa yang lha'i ris gzhan du rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
yadeva hi pramāṇabalavarṇakarmānyabhūmika sukhabhogādi saṃvartanīyaṃ karma deveṣu vipacyate tadeva kadācidanyapratyayavaśānmanuṣyatiryakapreteṣu vipacyate / rūpārūpyāvacaraṃ tu karmānyabhūmikamanyasyāṃ bhūmau vipaktuṃ na jātūtsahate
# bong tshod dang stobs dang kha dog dang bde ba dang longs spyod la sogs par 'gyur ba'i las lha dag gi nang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de nyid res 'ga' rkyen gzhan gyi dbang gis mi dang dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi nang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ro / / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las ni sa gzhan las gzhan du rnam par smin par nam yang mi nus so /
tasmādvyavasthitavipākatvādāneñjamityucyate / apuṇyaṃ tu karmākuśalamiti prasiddhaṃ loke / yaśca lokato 'rthaḥ prasiddhaḥ kiṃ tatra yatnena / kṛtaḥ puṇyādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ nirdeśaḥ
# de lta bas na rnam par smin pa rnam par gnas pa'i phyir mi g yo ba zhes bya'o / / bsod nams ma yin pa'i las ni mi dge ba'o zhes 'jig rten na grags bas 'jig rten las grags pa gang yin pa de la 'bad pas ci zhig bya / / bsod nams la sogs pa'i las bstan zin to /
sukhavedanīyādīnāṃ kartavyaḥ / sa eṣa kriyate
# bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste de tsam mo / / bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba /
sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyāt / kuśalaṃ karma sukhavedanīyaṃ yāvat tṛtīyāddhyānāt / eṣā hi bhūmiḥ sukhāyā vedanāyā yaduta kāmadhātustrīṇi ca dhyānāni
# bde ba myong 'gyur / / bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar gyis las dge ba ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin pas bde ba'i tshor ba'i sa ni 'di yin te / / 'di lta ste / / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan gsum mo; /
ataḥ param
# de yan chad /
aduḥkhāsukhavedyaṃ tu
# sdug min bde min myong 'gyur ba /
śubhamiti vartate / tṛtīyadhyānāt pareṇa kuśalaṃ karmāduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ sukhaduḥkhavedanā 'bhāvāt
# bde ba zhes bya bar sbyar te / / bsam gtan gsum pa yan chad kyi las dge ba ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba yin te / / de na bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med pa'i phyir ro /
duḥkhavedyamihāśubham / akuśalaṃ karma duḥkhavedanīyam / ihagrahaṇaṃ kāmadhātāveva tadbhāvajñāpanārtham / na caiṣāṃ vedanaiva phalam
# sdug bsngal myong 'gyur 'di'i mi dge / / las mi dge ba ni sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'o / / 'di'i zhes smos pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kho na na de yod par bstan pa'i phyir ro / / 'di dag gi 'bras bu tshor ba 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad do /
kiṃ tarhi / sasaṃbhārā / adho 'pi madhyamastyeke
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / tshogs dang bcas pa yin no / / 'og na'ang bar ma yod do zhes /
anye punarāhuḥ tadetanmadhyamaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karmoktametaccaturthadhyānādadho 'pyasti
# kha cig zer te / / gzhan dag na re bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las su bshad pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi pa man chad na yang yod do zhes zer ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam / dhyānāntaravipākataḥ
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / gang gi phyir / / bsam gtan khyad par rnam smin las /
itarathā hi dhyānāntarakarmaṇo vipāko na syāddhyānāntaraṃ vā kasyacitkarmaṇaḥ
# de ltar ma yin na bsam gtan khyad par can gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'am / / las gang gis kyang bsam gtan khyad par can du rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te /
tatra sukhaduḥkhayorabhāvāt
# de na bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag med pa'i phyir ro /
dhyānāntarakarmaṇo dhyāna eva sukhendrīyaṃ vipāka ityeke / naiva tasya vedanā vipāka ityapare
# kha cig na re bsam gtan khyad par can gyis las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i dbang po kho na yin no zhes zer ro / / gzhan dag na re de'i rnam par smin pa tshor ba med pa nyid do zhes zer ro /
tadetaducchāstram / śāstre hi paṭhitaṃ syātkarmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta / syātkuśalasyāvitarkasya karmaṇa iti / apurvācaramaḥ pākastrayāṇāṃ ceṣyate yataḥ
# 'di ni bstan bcos dang 'gal ba yin te / / bstan bcos las ni / / las kyi rnam par smin pa sems kyi tshor ba kho na rnam par smin par 'gyur ba yod ngam [*dam?] zhe na / / yod do / / rtog pa med pa'i las dge ba yin no zhes 'byung ngo / / snga phyi med gsum smin 'dod phyir /
yataścoktaṃ sūtre syāttrayāṇāṃ karmaṇāmapūrvācaramo vipāko vipacyeta
# ji ltar las gsum po rnams kyi rnam par smin pa snga phyi med par smin par 'gyur ba yod ngam [*dam?] zhe na / / yod de /
syātsukhavedanīyasya rūpaṃ duḥkhavedanīyasya cittacaittā dharmāḥ
# bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ni gzugs so / / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so /
aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyasya cittaviprayuktā ityato 'pyastyaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ karmādhastāt / nahi kāmadhātoranyatrāsti yugapatkarmatrayasya vipāke saṃyogaḥ
# bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed rnams so zhes 'byung ste / / 'di'i phyir yang 'og na bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las yod de / / 'dod pa'i khams las gzhan na ni las gsum gyi rnam par smin pa dang cig car du ldan pa med do /
kimidānīṃ tatkukśalamāhosvidakuśalaṃ / durbalaṃ tu tat / evaṃ tarhi sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyā diṣṭavipākaṃ ca kuśala mityasya virodhaḥ
# da ni ci las de dge ba yin nam / / 'on te mi dge ba yin zhe na / / dge ba ste stobs chung du ni ma yin no / / de lta na ni 'o na / / bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba / / bde ba myong 'gyur zhes bya ba dang rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba ni dge ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di dang 'gal lo /
bāhulika eṣa nirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ
# de ni phal che ba bstan pa yin par blta bar bya'o /
kathaṃ punaravedanāsvabhāvaṃ karma sukhādivedinīyamityucyate
# ji ltar na tshor ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i las bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba zhes bya zhe na; bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'am /
sukhavedanāyai hitaṃ sukhavedanoyaṃ sukho 'sya vedanīya iti vā
# 'di'i bde ba myong bar bya ba yin pas na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin no / / myong bar 'gyur ba yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
kaśca vedanīyaḥ
# rnam par smin pa ste /
yo vipākaḥ / sa hyasau vidyate sukhasya vā vedanīyaṃ yena sukhaṃ vedayate
# de myong bar byed pa yin no / / yang na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba yin pas bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ste /
snānīyakapāyavat / evaṃ duḥkhavedanīyamaduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ ca draṣṭavyam / api ca / svabhāvasaṃprayogābhyāmālambanavipākataḥ
# gang gi bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba ni / / 'khru bar byed pa'i 'dag pa'i chal bzhin no / / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba la yang de bzhin du ba lta bar bya'o / / gzhan yang / / ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs ldan dang /
saṃmukhībhāvataśceti pañcadhā vedanīyatā
# dmigs pa dang ni rnam smin dang / / mngon sum du ni gyur ba las /
svabhāvavedanīyatā vedanānām
# myong 'gyur rnam pa lnga yin no /
svabhāvenaiva vedanīyatvāt / saṃprayogavedanīyatā sparśasya
# ngo bo nyid kyis myong bar 'gyur ba ni tshor ba rnams so / / mtshungs par ldan pas myong bar 'gyur ba ni reg pa ste /
sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśaḥ iti
# bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pa zhes bya ba'o /
ālambanavedanīyatā viṣayāṇām
# dmigs pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni yul rnams te /
yathoktaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rūpapratisaṃvedī bhavati notu rūparāgapratisaṃvedītyevamādi
# ji skad du / / mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas gzugs so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur gyi gzugs la 'dod chags so sor yang dag par myong ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
vedanayā hi tāmālambamānaḥ pratisaṃvedayate / vipākavedanīyatā karmaṇaḥ / dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karmeti vistaraḥ
# dmigs pa na tshor bas de dag so sor yang dag par myong bar byed do / / rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni las yin te / / mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o /
saṃmukhībhāvavedanīyatā / yathoktaṃ yasmin samaye sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate dve asya vedane tasminsamaye niruddhe bhavata iti
# mngon sum du gyur pa myong bar 'gyur ba ni ji skad du / / gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pa de'i tshe tshor ba gnyis 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste /
nahi yasminsamaye sukhā vedanā vartate tasminpunaranyā vedanā 'sti sa yāṃ tāṃ vedayate / saṃmukhīkurvastu tāṃ vedayata ityucyate / ato vipākasya vedanīyatvāt karmāpyucyate sukhavedanīyamityevamādi / niyatāniyataṃ tacca / taccaitatsukhavedanīyādi trividhaṃ karma niyataṃ cāniyataṃ ca veditavyam
# gang gi tshe bde ba'i tshor ba 'jug pa de'i tshe gang gis na de myong bar 'gyur ba gzhan ni med kyi des mngon sum du byed na ni de myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ste / / de'i phyir rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir las kyang bde ba myong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do / / de yang nges dang ma nges pa / / bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i las rnam pa gsum po de yang nges pa dang ma nges pa yin par rig par bya ste /
nāvaśyavedanīyamaniyatam
# gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no /
niyataṃ trividhaṃ punaḥ
# mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la /
dṛṣṭadharmādivedyatvāt / dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyamupapadyavedanīyamaparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ cetyetattrividhaṃ karma niyatamityetaccaturvidhaṃ karma bhavati sahāniyatavedanīyena
# myong 'gyur phyir na nges rnam gsum / / mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ste / / las rnam pa 'di gsum ni nges pa'o /
pañcadhā karma kecana / apare punaḥ pañcavidhaṃ karmecchanti
# de ltar na de ni myong bar 'gyur ba ma nges pa dang bcas pa ste las rnam pa bzhi yin no / / kha cig las rnam pa lnga zhes zer /
aniyatavedanīyaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā / vipākena niyatamaniyataṃ ceti / tatra dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ yatra janmani kṛtaṃ tatraiva vipacyate
# gzhan dag ni myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa la rnam par smin par nges pa dang ma nges pa rnam pa gnyis su phye nas las rnam pa lngar yod do / / de la mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ni skye ba gang du byas pa de nyid du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'o /
upapadyavedanīyaṃ dvitīye janmani
# skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba ni skye ba gnyis pa la'o; /
aparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ tasmātpareṇa
# lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ni de phan chad du'o /
janmāntare 'pyasti dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya karmaṇo vipāka ārambhavaśāttannāmavyavasthānamityapare / mā bhūdyadevamiṣṭakarma tasyālpiṣṭho vipākaḥ iti
# gzhan dag na re ches stobs dang ldan pa'i las gang yin pa de'i rnam par smin pa chung ches par 'gyur du 'ong bas mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa tshe rabs gzhan dag na yang yod mod kyi rtsom pa'i dbang gis ming de rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro /
tadevaṃ necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ / asti hi karma saṃnikṛṣṭaphalaṃ na viprakṛṣṭaphalamasti viparyayādbāhyabījavat
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni de mi 'dod do / / 'bras bu nye la 'bras bu ring ba ma yin pa'i las kyang yod / / bzlog pa yang yod de phyi'i sa bon bzhin no /
yathā tripakṣā suvarcalā tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ phalaṃ dadhāti yavagodhūmādayaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsairiti
# ji ltar lcam pa la sogs pa ni zla ba phyed dang gnyis kyis 'bras bu smin la / / nas dang gro la sogs pa ni zla ba drug gis 'bras bu smin pa bzhin no /
catuṣkoṭikamityanye
# gzhan dag mu ni bzhi zhes zer /
dārṣṭāntikāstu catuṣkoṭikaṃ kurvanti / asti karmāvasthāniyataṃ na vipāke niyatam / yatkarma dṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyaṃ vipāke 'nīyatam / asti vipāke niyataṃ nāvasthāyām
# dpes ston pa rnams ni gnas skabs nges la rnam par smin par ma nges pa yang yod de / / mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la myong bar 'gyur la rnam par smin pa ni ma nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o / / rnam par smin par nges la gnas skabs dag tu ma yin pa yang yod do /
yatkarmāniyatavedanīyaṃ vipāke niyatam / astyubhayaniyataṃ yadṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyaṃ vipāke niyatam / asti nobhayaniyataṃ yatkarmāniyatavedanīyaṃ vipāke aniyatam / teṣāṃ tatkarmāṣṭavidhaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ niyatamaniyataṃ ca / evaṃ yāvadaniyatavedanīyam / niyatameva tu dṛṣṭadharmādivedanīyamaniyataṃ caturthamiti varṇayanti
# rnam par smin pa ni nges la myong bar 'gyur ba ni ma nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o / / gnyi ga nges pa yang yod de / / mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la myong bar 'gyur la rnam par smin par yang nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o / / gnyi ga ma nges pa yang yod de / / myong bar 'gyur ba yang ma nges la rnam par smin par yang ma nges pa'i las gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba mu bzhir byed de de dag gi ltar na las rnam pa brgyad de / / mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang ma nges pa ni myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o / / mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa ni nges pa kho na yin no / / bzhi pa ni ma nges pa yin no zhes brjod do /
syādekasmin kṣaṇe caturvidhaṃ karmākṣipet
# skad cig ma gcig la las rnam pa bzhi 'phen par 'gyur ba lta yod dam zhe na / / yod de /
syāttriṣu paraṃ prayojya kāmamithyācāre svayaṃ prayuktasteṣāṃ yugapatsamāptau / eṣāṃ ca punaścaturṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ
# pha rol po gsum la sbyar nas bdag nyid 'dod pas log par g yem pa la zhugs te / / de dag cig car mthar phyin par 'gyur na'o / / las bzhi po de dag las /
nikāyākṣepaṇaṃ tribhiḥ / nahi dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyena karmaṇā nikāyasabhāga ākṣipyate
# gsum gyis ris ni 'phen par byed / / mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis ni ris mthun pa 'phen par mi byed do /
katamasmindhātau katividhaṃ karmākṣipyate kasyāṃ vā gatau
# khams gang ngam / / 'gro ba gang na las kyi 'phen pa rnam pa du zhig yod ce na /
sarvatra caturākṣepaḥ
# thams cad na ni 'phen pa bzhi /
sarveṣu triṣu dhātuṣu sarvāsu ca gatiṣu caturṇāṃ karmaṇāmākṣepaḥ kuśalānāmakuśalānāṃ ca yathāsaṃbhavam
# khams gsum po thams cad dang 'gro ba thams cad na dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams ci rigs par las bzhi'i 'phen pa yod de /
asyotsargasyāyamapavādaḥ / śubhasya narake tridhā / narakeṣu kuśalasya karmaṇastrividhasyā kṣepo na dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyasya
# spyir bstan pa 'di'i dmigs kyis bstan pa ni 'di yin te / / dmyal ba na ni dge ba'i gsum / / dmyal ba dag na ni las dge ba rnam pa gsum gyis 'phen pa yod kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ni med de /
tatreṣṭavipākābhāvāt / yadviraktaḥ sthiro bālastatra notpadyavedyakṛt / yato bhūmeḥ vītarāgapṛthagjano bhavatyasau ca sthiro bhavatyaparihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyavedanīyaṃ karma na karoti
# de na rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba med pa'i phyir ro / / gang las 'dod chags bral brtan pa'i / / byis pa der skyes myong mi byed / / so so'i skye bo yin pa de yang brtan pa yin te / / yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can zhig na de ni sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba der skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las mi byed do /
kimanyatkaroti / nānyavedyakṛdapyāryaḥ
# gzhan dag rnam pa gsum ni byed do / / 'phags pa gzhan du'ang myong mi byed /
thara iti vartate / āryapudgalastu yato vītarāgo na ca parihāṇadharmā sa tatropapadyadanīyaṃ cāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ ca karma na karoti
# brtan pa zhes bya bar sbyar te / / 'phags pa'i gang zag yin la yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can yang yin nas gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba der skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang mi byed de /
na hyasau bhavyaḥ punarādhastanīṃ bhūmimāyātumaniyataṃ kuryāddṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ cātropapannaḥ
# 'di na yangs 'og mar 'ong bar rung ba ma yin no / / gang du skyes par ma nges pa dang mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ni byed do /
kāme 'gre vā 'sthiro 'pi na
# 'dod rtse'i mi brtan pa yang min /
parihāṇadharmāpi tvāryapudgalaḥ kāmadhātorbhavāgrā dvītarāgaḥ tayorūpapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyaṃ karmābhavyaḥ karttum
# 'dod pa'i khams sam / / srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag tu yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yin yang skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las byed par rung ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam / phalāddhi sa parihīṇo bhavati / na cāsti laparihīṇasya kālakriyeti paścātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / de ni 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa las ni 'chi ba med do zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
kimantarābhave 'pyasti karmaṇa ākṣepaḥ / astītyāha
# ci srid pa bar ma na yang las kyi 'phen pa yod dam zhe na smras pa / / yod de /
dvāviṃśatividhaṃ kāmeṣvākṣipatyantarābhavaḥ
# srid pa bar ma 'dod khams su / / 'phen pa rnam pa nyi shu gnyis /
gāmāvacaro hyantarābhavo dvāviṃśatividhaṃ karmākṣipati
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i srid pa bar ma ni las rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'phen te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / pañca hi garbhāvasthāḥ
# ji ltar byas pas she na / / mngal gyi gnas skabs lnga ste /
kalalārvudapeśīghanapraśākhāvasthāḥ / pañca jātāvasthāḥ / bālakumāravamadhyavṛddhāvasthāḥ / tatrāntarābhavaḥ kalalavedanīyaṃ karmākṣipatyaniyataṃ niyataṃ ca / evaṃ yāvadvṛddhavedanīyamantarābhavavedanīyaṃ ca / dṛṣṭadharma phalaṃ tacca / taccaitadantarābhavikaṃ karma yanniyatamekādaśavidhamuktaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ tadveditavyam
# nur nur po dang mer mer po dang nar nar po dang gor gor po dang rkang lag 'gyus pa'i gnas skabs rnams so / / skyes pa'i gnas skabs rnam pa lnga ste / / byis pa dang gzhon nu dang dar la bab pa dang dar yol ba dang rgan po'i gnas skabs rnams so / / de la srid pa bar ma ni nur nur po myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang ma nges pa'i las kyang 'phen par byed pa nas / / de bzhin du rgan po myong bar 'gyur ba dang srid pa bar ma myong bar 'gyur ba'i bar du 'phen par byed do / / de ni mthong chos 'bras bu yin / / srid pa bar ma'i las nges pa rnam pa bcu gcig bshad pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba yin par rig par bya'o /
kiṃ kāraṇam / nikāyo hyeka eva saḥ / eka eva hyasau nikāyasabhāga ekakarmākṣipto yaścāntarābhavo yāśca tadanvayā daśāvasthāḥ / ata evānyadantarābhavavedanīyaṃ karma noktam
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / de ni ris gcig kho na yin / / de ni ris mthun pa gcig kho na yin te / / srid pa bar ma gang yin pa dang de'i rgyu las byung ba gnas skabs bcu po gang dag yin pa de ni las gcig gis 'phangs pa yin no / / de nyid kyi phyir srid pa bar ma myong bar 'gyur ba'i las gzhan ma bshad de /
upapadyavedanīyena ca tasyākṣepāt
# de ni skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba kho nas 'phangs pa'i phyir ro /
kīdṛśaṃ karma niyataṃ veditavyam / tīvrakleśaprasādena sātatyena ca yatkṛtam
# yang nges pa'i las ci 'dra bar rig par bya zhe na / / nyon mongs rab dang drag po dang /
guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat
# yon tan zhing dang rgyun chags su / / byas pa gang zhig yin pa dang /
yaddhi karma tīvreṇa kleśena kṛtaṃ yacca tīvreṇa prasādena yacca sātatyena gunakṣetre ca tanniyataṃ veditavyam
# pha ma gsod gang de nges so / / nyon mongs pa drag pos byas pa'i las gang yin pa dang rab tu dang ba drag pos byas pa gang yin pa dang rgyun du byed pa gang yin pa dang yon tan gyi zhing la byed pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa yin par rig par bya ste /
tatra guṇakṣetraṃ trīṇi ratnāni / pudgalaviśeṣo vā kaścitphalasamāpattiviśeṣaprāptaḥ / tatra hyantareṇāpi tīvrakleśaprasādānāṃ sātatyaṃ ca kuśalamakuśalaṃ ca karma niyataṃ saṃpadyate / pitarau punarmātā ca pitā ca / tayoścāpi yatra ghātikaṃ karma yathā tathā vā tanniyataṃ saṃpadyate nānyat / atha dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma kīdṛśaṃ veditavyam
# de la yon tan gyi zhing ni dkon mchog gsum mam / / 'ga' zhig gis 'bras bu dang snyoms par 'jug pa khyad par can thob pa'i gang zag khyad par can te / / de la ni nyon mongs pa dang rab tu dang ba drag po dang rgyun du byed pa med par yang dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las nges par 'gyur ro / / pha ma ni pha dang ma ste / / pha dang ma gnyis gsod pa'i las de ni ci 'dra yang rung ste / / nges par 'gyur ro / / gzhan ni ma yin no / / yang mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ci 'dra bar rig par bya zhe na /
dṛṣṭadharmaphalaṃ karma kṣetrāśayaviśeṣataḥ
# mthong chos 'bras bu can gyi las / / zhing dang bsam pa'i khyad par las /
dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma kṣetraviśeṣādvā bhavati / yathā saṃghastrīvādasamudācārādvyañjanaparivṛttiḥ śrūyate
# mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las / / zhing gi khyad par las 'gyur ba ni dper na dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun la bud med do zhes thab mo brgal ba las mtshan gyur to zhes grags pa lta bu'o /
āśayaviśeṣādvā / yathā śaṇḍhasya gavāmapuṃstvapratimokṣaṇātpumbhāvaḥ
# bsam pa'i khyad par las ni dper na nyung rum zhig gis glang zhig rlig pa dbyung ba las thar bar byas pas skyes pa nyid du gyur pa lta bu'o /
athavā / tadbhūmyatyantavairāgyāt / tasya vā karmaṇo yā bhūmiḥ kuśalasyākuśalasya vā tato 'tyantavairāgyāttatkarma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate
# yang na / / sa de'i 'dod chags gtan bral phyir / / yang na las dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las gang yin de las gtan du 'dod chags dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir las de mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ro /
tasyāṃ bhūmau jātasya kīdṛśaṃ karmetyāha
# las ji lta bu zhig ce na / / rnam smin nges pa gang yin pa'o /
vipāke niyataṃ hi yat / yaddhi karma niyataṃ vipāke na tvavasthāyāṃ nāpyaniyataṃ tatyaiṣa niyamaḥ / yatpunaravasthāntaraniyataṃ tasya tatraiva niyato vipākastadvato 'tyantavairāgyāsaṃbhavāt
# las gang rnam par smin par nges la / / gnas skabs su yang ma yin / / ma nges pa yang ma yin pa de ni de ltar nges kyi gnas skabs gzhan du nges pa gang yin pa de ni de dang ldan bzhin du gtan du 'dod chags dang bral mi srid pas de nyid du rnam par smin par 'gyur ro /
yaccāniyataṃ tasyāvipāka evātyantavairāgyāt / kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kṣetraṃ yatrāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma saṃpadyate
# ma nges pa gang yin pa de ni gtan du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi smin pa nyid do / / gang du gdon mi za bar mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ba'i zhing de ji lta bu zhig ce na /
āha / buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ pudgalāstu pañca
# smras pa sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang gang zag lnga po /
ye nirodhāraṇāmaitrīdarśanārhatphalotthitāḥ
# gang dag 'gog byams nyon mongs med / / mthong dang dgra bcom 'bras langs pa /
teṣu kārāpakārasya phalaṃ sadyo 'nubhūyate / nirodhasamāpattivyutthitaḥ parāṃ cittaśāntiṃ labhate / nirvāṇasadṛśatvātsamāpatteḥ
# de la phan gnod byas pa yis / / 'bras bu 'phral du myong bar 'gyur / / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir sems mchog tu zhi ba 'thob ste /
sa hi gatapratyāgata eva nirvāṇādbhavati
# de ni mya ngan las 'das par son pa las slar log pa dang 'dra ba yin no /
araṇāvyutthitasyāpramāṇasattvāraṇāhitādhyāśayānugatātyudagrāpramāṇapuṇyaparibhāvanānugatā ca saṃtatirvartate / maitrīvyutthitasyāpramāṇasattvasukhādhyāśayānugatātyudagrāpramāṇapuṇyaparibhāvanānugatā ca saṃtativartate / darśanamārgavyutthitasyāśeṣadarśanaprahātavyaprahāṇāt pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttinirmalā saṃtatirvartate
# nyon mongs pa med pa la langs pa'i rgyud ni sems can tshad med pa la nyon mongs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su 'brel ba dang shin tu gsal ba'i bsod nams tshad med pas yongs su bsgos pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yin no / / byams pa las langs pa'i rgyud ni sems can tshad med pa la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su 'brel ba dang shin tu gsal ba'i bsod nams tshad med pas yongs su bsgos pa dang rjes su 'brel ba yin no / / mthong ba'i lam las langs pa'i rgyud ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir gnas yongs su gyur pa sar pa yin pa dri ma med pa yin no /
arhatphalavyutthitasyāśeṣabhāvanāprahātavyaprahāṇātpratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhā saṃtatirvartate
# dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu las langs pa'i rgyud ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir gnas yongs su gyur pa sar pa yin pas dri ma med pa yin no /
ata eteṣu kṛtānāṃ kārāpakārāṇāṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme niyataṃ prāpyate / śeṣasya tu bhāvanāmārgasyāparipūrṇasvabhāvaphalatvācca tadvyutthitānāṃ na tathā pratyagrāśrayaparivṛttiśuddhāśayasaṃtatirvartata iti na te tathā puṇyakṣetraṃ bhavati
# de nyid kyi phyir de dag las phan pa dang gnod pa byas pa rnams kyi 'bras bu mthong ba'i chos kho na la nges pa 'thob par 'gyur ro / / lhag ma bsgom pa'i lam ni rang bzhin dang 'bras bu yongs su ma rdzogs pa can nyid kyi phyir de las langs pa rnams kyi rgyud de ltar gnas yongs su gyur pa sar pa dang dag pa ma yin pas de dag ni de ltar bsod nams kyi zhing ma yin no /
vipākaḥ punarvedanāpradhānaḥ / tadidānīṃ vicāryate / syāt karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipāko vipacyeta na kāyikī
# rnam par smin pa'i gtso bo ni tshor ba yin pas de'i phyir 'di dpyad par bya ste / / las kyi rnam par smin pa sems kyi tshor ba kho na yin la lus kyi ma yin pa yod dam /
syāt kāyikyeva na caitasikī syādityāha
# lus kyi kho na yin la sems kyi ma yin pa yang yod dam zhe na / / smras pa / / yod de /
kukśalasyāvitarkasya karmaṇo vedanā matā
# rnam par rtog pa med pa yi / / dge ba'i las kyi rnam smin ni /
vipākaścaitasikyeva
# sems kyi tshor ba kho nar 'dod /
avitarkaṃ karma dhyānāntarāt prabhṛti yāvat bhavāgre / tasyāvitarkasya kuśalasya karmaṇaścaitasikyeva vedanā vipākaḥ
# rnam par rtog pa med pa'i las ni bsam gtan khyad par can nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar dag na yod de / / dge ba'i las rnam par rtog pa med pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni sems kyi tshor ba kho na yin no /
kasmānna kāyikī / tasyā avaśyaṃ savitarkavicāratvāt
# ci'i phyir lus kyi ma yin zhe na / / de ni gdon mi za bar rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dpyad pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
kāyikyevāśubhasya tu
# mi dge ba ni lus kyi yin /
akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kāyikyeva vedanā vipākaḥ
# mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni lus kyi tshor ba kho na yin no /
kasmānna caitasikī / tasya hi duḥkhā vedanā vipākaścaitasikī ca duḥkhā vedanā daurmanasyaṃ na ca daurmanasyaṃ vipāka iti vyākhyātametat
# ci'i phyir sems kyi ma yin zhe na / / de'i rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yin la / / sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ni yid mi bde ba yin te /
yattarhi sattvānāṃ cittakṣepo bhavati
# yid mi bde ba ni rnam par smin pa ma yin no zhes de ni bshad zin to /
katamasminnasau citte bhavati kena vā kāraṇena / cittakṣepo manaścitte / manovijñāna ityarthaḥ / nahi pañcasu vijñānakāyeṣu cittaṃ kṣipyate
# 'o na sems can rnams kyi sems g yeng bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni sems gang zhig la gnas pa yin / / rgyu ni ci zhig gis 'gyur zhe na / / g yeng ba'i sems ni yid sems las / / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga la gnas pa la ni g yeng ba med de /
avikalpakatvāt / sa ca karmavipākajaḥ
# rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro / / de ni las kyi rnam smin skyes /
sa caiṣa cittakṣepaḥ sattvānāṃ karmajaḥ / ye hi dravyamantraprayogeṇa vā pareṣāṃ cittaṃ kṣepayanti akāmakaṃ vā viṣaṃ madyaṃ vā pāyayanti trāsayanti vā mṛgayādiṣvagnim vā dāveṣutsṛjanti prapātādvā pātayantyanyena vā kenacitpareṣāṃ smṛtiṃ bhraṃśayanti teṣāṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāyatyāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate
# g yeng ba'i sems de ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin te / / rdzas dang gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas pha rol gyi sems g yeng bar byed pa'am / / mi 'dod bzhin du dug dang myos par 'gyur ba ldud pa'am / / ri dags la sogs pa skrag par byed pa'am / / nags mes gtong ba 'am / / g yang du 'dor bar byed pa 'am / / gzhan gang yang rung bas pha rol po dag gi sems nyams par byed pa de dag las de'i rnam par smin pas che phyi ma la sems g yeng bar 'gyur ro /
bhayopaghātavaiṣamyaśokaiśca
# skrag gnod ma mnyam mya ngan gyis /
kathaṃ tāvadbhayena
# re zhig skrag pas ji lta bu zhe na /
amanuṣyādayo manuṣyānvirūpeṇa rūpeṇopasaṃkrāmanti / tebhyo bhītānāṃ cittaṃ kṣīpyate
# mi ma yin pa gzugs mi sdug pas mi'i gan du nye bar 'ongs la de dag gis skrag pa rnams sems g yeng bar 'gyur ro /
kathamupaghātena
# gnod pas ji lta bu zhe na /
amanuṣyā eva kupitā manuṣyāṇāṃ marmasu praharanti
# mi ma yin pa de dag nyid du 'khrugs nas gnad du snun par byed pas so /
kathaṃ mahābhūtavaiṣamyeṇa
# 'byung ba chen po ma mnyam pas ji lta bu zhe na /
vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ prakopamāpadyante
# rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dag 'khrugs par gyur pa'o /
kathaṃ śokena / yathā vāsiṣṭhīprabhṛtīnām
# mya ngan gyis ji lta bu zhe na / / dper na gnas byed kyi bu la sogs pa lta bu'o /
yadi mano vikṣipyate karmavipākajaśca cittakṣepaḥ / kathaṃ na caitasikī vedanā vipākaḥ prāpnoti
# gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa g yeng bar 'gyur la / / sems g yengs pa yang las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yin pa yin na go / / ji ltar na sems kyi tshor ba rnam par smin pa ma yin par 'gyur zhe na /
nahi brūmastadeva cittavipāka ityapi tu yo mahābhūtānāṃ prakopaḥ sa vipākaḥ / tasmājjātamato vipākajam
# sems de nyid rnam par smin pa yin no zhes ni mi zer ro / / de lta mod kyi 'byung ba chen po rnams 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de rnam par smin pa yin la de las skyes pas de'i phyir rnam par smin pa yin te /
karmajena hi dhātunā vaiṣamyeṇa vyākulamavaśaṃ bhraṣṭasmṛtikaṃ cittaṃ vartata iti kṣiptamityucyate / evaṃ cedaṃ catuṣkoṭikaṃ yujyate / asti cittaṃ kṣiptaṃ na vikṣiptamiti vistaraḥ
# las las skyes pa'i khams rnams 'khrugs pas sems 'khrugs pa dang dbang med pa dang dran pa nyams par 'gyur bas na sems g yengs pa zhes bya'o / / de ltar na de ni sems g yengs la rnam par ma g yengs pa yang yod ces bya bar mu bzhir rung ste /
kṣiptaṃ tāvanna kṣiptaṃ vikṣiptacittasya
# re zhig g yengs la rnam par ma g yengs pa ni sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o /
kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ na kṣiptaṃ svasthacittasya kliṣṭam
# rnam par g yengs la sems ma g yengs pa ni sems rnal du 'dug pa'i nyon mongs pa can no /
ubhayaṃ kṣiptacittasya kliṣṭam
# gnyi ga yin pa ni sems g yengs pa'i nyon mongs pa can no /
nobhayaṃ svasthacittasyākliṣṭam / katameṣāṃ punaḥ sattvānāṃ cittaṃ kṣipyate
# gnyi ga ma yin pa ni sems rnal du 'dug pa'i nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o / / sems can gang dag gi sems g yengs par 'gyur zhe na /
akurukāminām / akuruṇāṃ kāminām
# sgra mi snyan min 'dod ldan rnams /
deveṣvapi hi deva / unmattāḥ santi prāgeva manuṣyatiryakpreteṣu / nārakāstu nityaṃ kṣiptacittā eva
# sgra mi snyan ma yin pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ni lha dag gi nang na yang lha smyon pa yod na mi dang dud 'gro dang li dags kyi nang na lta smos kyang ci dgos / / dmyal ba rnams ni rtag tu sems g yengs pa kho na yin te /
te hi vividhayātanāsahasravyatibhinnamarmāṇastīrvābhirvedanābhirabhitunnā ātmānamapi tāvannābhicetayanti kiṃ punaḥ kāryamakāryaṃ vā / hācittaparidevakaścātra nāraka udāhāryaḥ
# gnod pa sna tshogs stong phrag dag gis gnad gcod pa'i tshor ba drag po dag gis mngon par nyen pa de dag ni re zhig bdag nyid kyang mi dran na bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te / / 'dir kyi hung sems zhes smre sngags 'don pa'i dmyal ba dper bya'o /
āryāṇāmapi cittaṃ kṣipyate bhūtavaiṣamyeṇānyatra buddhāt
# sangs rgyas ma gtogs pa'i 'phags pa rnams la yang 'byung ba ma mnyam pas sems g yeng ba yod do / / las kyis ni ma yin te /
na karmaṇā niyatasya pūrvaṃ vipākādaniyatasyāvipākāt
# nges pa ni sngon rnam par smin zin pa'i phyir ro / / ma nges pa ni rnam par mi smin pa'i phyir ro /
na bhayena / pañcabhayasamatikramāt / nopaghātena
# 'jigs pas kyang ma yin te / / 'jigs pa lnga las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro / / gnod pas kyang ma yin te /
manuṣyaprakopakāraṇasyāprāsādikasyākaraṇāt
# mi ma yin pa 'khrugs pa'i rgyu mi mdzes pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro /
na śokena / dharmatābhijñatvāt / punastrayo vaṅkā uktāḥ sūtre / kāyavaṅkok vāgvaṅko manovaṅkaḥ
# mya ngan gyis kyang ma yin te / / chos nyid mngon par shes pa'i phyir ro / / mdo las / / yon po gsum gsungs te / / lus kyi yon po dang ngag gi yon po dang yid kyi yon po'o /
trayo doṣāḥ
# nyes pa gsum ste /
kāyadoṣo vāgdoṣo manodoṣaḥ / trayaḥ kaṣāyāḥ
# lus kyi nyes pa dang ngag gi nyes pa dang yid kyi nyes pa'o / / snyigs ma gsum ste /
kāyakaṣāyo vākkaṣāyo manaḥ kaṣāyaḥ iti
# lus kyi snyigs ma dang ngag gi snyigs ma dang yid kyi snyigs ma'o / / de la /
tatra yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ
# yon po snyigs mar gsungs pa ni /
vaṅkadoṣakaṣāyoktiḥ śāṭhyadveṣajarāgaje
# de dag kyang rim bzhin du / / g yo dang zhe sdang 'dod chags skyes /
śaṭhyajaṃ kāyakarma kāyavaṅka ityuktam / kuṭilānvayatvāt / evaṃ vāṅmanovaṅkau / dveṣajaṃ kāyakarma kāyadoṣa ityuktam
# lus kyi g yo las skyes pa ni gya gyu'i rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lus kyi yon po zhes bshad de ngag dang yid kyi yon po yang de dang 'dra'o / / lus kyi las zhe sdang las skyes pa ni sdang ba'i rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lus kyi nyes pa zhes bshad de /
cittapradoṣānvayatvāt / evaṃ vāṅmanodoṣau
# ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
rāgajaṃ kāyakarma kāyakaṣāya ityuktam / rāñjanānvayatvāt
# lus kyi las 'dod chags las skyes pa ni chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin pa'i phyir lus kyi snyigs ma zhes bshad de /
evaṃ vāṅmanaḥkaṣāyau / kṛṣṇaśuklādibhedena punaḥḥ karma caturvidham
# ngag dang yid kyi snyigs ma yang de dang 'dra'o / / dkar nag la sogs bye brag gis / / las ni rnam pa bzhi yin no /
asti karma kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇavipākam / asti karma śuklaṃ śuklavipākam / asti karma kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklavipākam / asti karmākṛṣṇamaśuklamavipākam / yattatkarma karmakṣayāya saṃvartata iti / tatra
# gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa'i las kyang yod; dkar la rnam par smin pa dkar ba'i las kyang yod / / dkar gnag la rnam par smin pa dkar gnag pa'i las kyang yod / / mi dkar mi gnag cing rnam par smin pa med pa las zad par byed pa'i las kyang yod de / / de la /
aśubhaṃ rūpakāmāptaṃ śubhaṃ caiva yathākramam
# mi dge gzugs dang 'dod gtogs pa'i / / dge ba nyid ni rim bzhin du /
kṛṣṇaśuklobhayaṃ karma tatkṣayāya nirāsravam
# gnag dang dkar dang gnyi ga'i las / / de zad byed pa zag med yin /
aśubhaṃ karma ekāntena kṛṣṇaṃ kliṣṭatvāt kṛṣṇavipākaṃ cāmanojñavipākatvāt
# las mi dge ba ni nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir gcig tu gnag pa yin la / / rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa yang gnag pa yin no /
rūpāptaṃ śubhamekāntena śuklamakuśalenāvyatibhedāt / śuklavipākaṃ ca manojñavipākatvāt / ārupyāptaṃ kasmānnocyate
# gzugs su gtogs pa'i dge ba ni / / mi dge ba dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir gcig tu dkar ba yin la / / rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa yang dkar ba yin no / / ci'i phyir gzugs med par gtogs pa ma bshad ce na /
yatra kila dvividho 'sti vipāka āntarābhavika aupapattibhavikaśca / trividhasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo yatraiva saṃbhavastatraivoktamiti / tadapi tūktaṃ sūtrāntare
# gang na rnam par smin pa rnam pa gnyis po srid pa bar ma pa dang skye ba'i srid pa yang yod pa dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnam pa gsum char gyi yod pa de kho nar bshad do zhes grag ste / / mdo gzhan las de yang bshad do /
kāmāptaṃ śubhaṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklamakuśalavyavakīrṇatvat kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ vyavakīrṇavipākatvāt
# 'dod par gtogs pa'i dge ba ni mi dge ba dang 'dres pa'i phyir dkar gnag yin la / / rnam par smin pa 'dres pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa yang dkar gnag yin no /
saṃtānata etadvyavasthāpitaṃ na svabhāvataḥ / na hyevañjātīyakamekaṃ karmāsti vipāko vā yat kṛṣṇaṃ ca syāt śuklaṃ cānyonyavirodhāt / nanu caivamakuśalasyāpi karmaṇaḥ kuśalavyavakīrṇatvāt kṛṣṇaśuklatvaṃ prāpnoti
# 'di ni rgyud kyi sgo nas rnam par gzhag gi ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas ni ma yin te / / las sam rnam par smin pa gcig la dkar po yang yin / / nag po yang yin pas de lta bu ni med do / / phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir ro / / de lta na mi dge ba yang dge ba dang 'dres pa'i phyir / / dkar gnag tu 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
nāvaśyamakuśalaṃ kuśalena vyavakīryate / kāmadhātau tasya balavattvāt
# 'dod pa'i khams ni mi dge ba gdon mi za bar dge ba dang 'dre ba ni ma yin te / / de stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
kukśalaṃ tu vyavakīryate / durbalatvāditi / anasravaṃ karmaiṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayāya prahāṇāya saṃvartate
# dge ba ni stobs chung ba'i phyir 'dre bar 'gyur ro / / zag pa med pa'i las ni las gsum po de dag zad par byed cing spong bar byed pa yin no /
taddhyakṛṣṇamakliṣṭatvādaśuklaṃ vipākaśuklatā 'bhāvāt
# de ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir mi gnag pa'o / / rnam par smin pa dkar po nyid med pa'i phyir mi dkar ba'o /
ābhiprāyiko hyeṣo 'śukla śabdaḥ
# mi dkar ba zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni dgongs pa can yin te /
uktaṃ tu bhagavatā mahatyāṃ śunyatāyā maśaikṣān dharmānārabhya ime te ānanda dharmā ekāntakuśalā ekāntānavadyā iti
# bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa chen po'i mdo las mi slob pa'i chos las brtsams te / / kun dga' bo chos 'di dag ni gcig tu dkar ba gcig tu dge ba / / gcig tu kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no zhes gsungs so /
śāstre ca / śuklā dharmāḥ katame
# bstan bcos las kyang / / chos dkar po rnams gang zhe na /
kuśalā dharmā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśceti / avipākaṃ dhātvapatitatvāt pravṛttivirodhācca
# dge ba'i chos rnams dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnams yin no zhes 'byung ngo / / 'jug pa dang 'gal bas khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa med pa yin no /
kiṃ punaḥ sarvamanāsravaṃ karma sarvasyāsya trividhasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāya saṃvartate
# ci zag pa med pa'i las dang las thams cad las rnam pa gsum po 'di dag thams cad zad par byed pa yin nam zhe na /
netyucyate
# smras pa /
kiṃ tarhi / dharmakṣāntiṣu vairāgye cānantaryapathāṣṭake
# ma yin no / / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / chos bzod 'dod chags bral ba yi / / bar chad med lam brgyad kyi gang /
yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat
# sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis de / / nag po zad par byed pa'i las /
darśanamārge catasṛṣu dharmajñānakṣāntiṣu kāmavairāgye cāṣṭāsvānantaryamārgeṣu yā cetanā seyaṃ dvādaśavidhā cetanā kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya karma
# mthong ba'i lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa bzhi dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba las bar chad med pa'i lam brgyad kyi sems pa gang yin pa ste / / sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis po de ni nag po'i las zad par byed pa'i las yin no /
navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca / navame kāmavairāgyānantaryamārge yā cetanā sā kṛṣṇaśuklasya kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇasya cākuśalasya navamasya prakārasya prahāṇāya
# dgu pa'i sems pa gang yin pa / / de ni dkar nag zad byed yin / / 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba las bar chad med pa'i lam dgu pa'i sems pa gang yin pa de ni dkar gnag ste dge ba dang mi dge ba nag po rnam pa dgu po spong bar byed pa yin no /
śuklasya dhyānavairāgyeṣvantyānantaryamārgajā
# dkar po bsam gtan chags bral la / / bar chad med lam skyes tha mas /
dhyānādvyānādvairāgyaṃ kurvato yo 'ntyo navama ānantaryamārgastatra yā cetanā iyaṃ caturvidhā cetanā śuklasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇāya / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamantyenaivānantaryamārgeṇa kuśalasya karmaṇaḥ prahāṇaṃ nānyena
# bsam gtan dang bsam gtan las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam tha ma dgu pa de'i sems pa gang yin pa ste / / sems pa rnam pa bzhi po de ni dkar po'i las spong bar byed pa yin no / / ci'i phyir bar chad med pa'i phyir lam tha ma kho nas spong bar byed la gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhe na /
nahhi tasya svabhāvaprahāṇaṃ prahīṇasyāpi saṃmukhībhāvāt
# de'i rang gi ngo bo ni spong ba ma yin te / / spangs kyang mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ tarhi / tadālambanakleśaprahāṇāt / ato yāvadeko 'pi tadālambanakleśaprakāra āste tāvadasya prahāṇaṃ nopapadyate
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir te / / de'i phyir ji srid du de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gcig yod pa de srid du de mi spong ba mi 'thad do /
anye narakavedyānyakāmavedyaṃ dvayaṃ viduḥ / anye punarācāryāḥ paśyanti narakavedanīyaṃ narakāccānyakāmadhātuvedanīyaṃ karma yathākrama kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklaṃ ceti / narake hyakuśalasyaiva karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇamityucyate ato 'nya kāmadhātau kuśalākuśalasya karmaṇo vipākastena tadvedanīyaṃ kṛṣṇaśuklamityuktam
# gzhan ni dmyal ba myong 'gyur dang / / 'dod gzhan myong 'gyur gnyis su rigs / / slob dpon gzhan dag ni dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang dmyal ba las gzhan pa'i 'dod pa'i khams myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni rim bzhin du nag po dang dkar nag yin te / / dmyal ba na ni las mi dge ba kho na'i rnam par smin pa yod pas de'i phyir de myong bar 'gyur ba ni nag po zhes bya'o / / de las gzhan pa'i 'dod pa'i khams na ni las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par smin pa yod pas de'i phyir de myong bar 'gyur ba ni dkar nag ces bya bar lta'o /
dṛgdheyaṃ kṛṣṇamanye
# gzhan ni mthong bas spang bya gnag /
anye punarāhurdarśanaprahātavyaṃ karma kṛṣṇa kuśalenāmiśratvāt
# gzhan dag na re mthong bas sdang bar bya ba'i las ni dge ba dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir nag po yin no zhes zer ro /
anyatkṛṣṇaśuklaṃ tu kāmajam / anyattu kāmāvacaraṃ karma kṛṣṇaśuklam
# 'dod pa las skyes gzhan dkar gnag / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las gzhan ni dkar gnag yin no /
kiṃ tadanyat / bhāvanāprahātavyam / taddhi kuśalaṃ cākuśalaṃ ceti
# de las gzhan pa ci zhig ce na / / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ste / / de ni dge ba yang yin la mi dge ba yang yin no /
sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi mauneyāni kāyamauneyaṃ vāṅmauneyaṃ manomauneyaṃ ca / tatra / aśaikṣaṃ kāyavākkarma manaścaiva yathākramam
# mdo las thub pa'i ni gsum ste / / thub pa'i lus dang thub pa'i ngag dang thub pa'i yid yod do zhes gsungs pa de la / / mi slob lus ngag las yid nyid / / thub pa'i gsum ste go rims bzhin /
maunatrayam / aśaikṣe kāyavākkarmaṇī kāyavāṅmauneye / aśaikṣaṃ tu mana eva manomauneyaṃ na manaskarmeti
# mi slob pa'i lus dang ngag gi las dag ni thub pa'i lus dang dag yin no / / mi slob pa'i yid kho na yid kyi thub pa yin te / / yid kyi las ni ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam / cittaṃ hi paramārthamuniḥ
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / sems ni don dam par thub pa yin la /
tat kila kāyavākkarmabhyāmanumīyata iti
# de ni lus dang ngag gi las dag gi sgo nas rjes su dpag par bya ba yin no zhes grag go /
api khalu kāyavākkarmaṇī viratisvabhāvena na manaskarma / cittā vijñaptyabhāvāt
# gzhan yang lus dang ngag gi las dag ni spong ba'i rang bzhin yin gyi sems la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med pa'i phyir yid kyi las ni ma yin no /
viramārthena ca maunam
# thub pa'i yang spong ba'i don gyis yin te /
ato mana eva virataṃ maunamityucyate / kasmādaśaikṣameva nānyat / arhataḥ parmārthamunitvāt / sarvakleśajalpoparateḥ / trīṇi śauceyāni uktāni sūtre / kāyaśauceyaṃ vākśauceyaṃ manaḥsauceyaṃ ca
# de'i phyir yid nyid spong ba la thub pa zhes bya'o / / ci'i phyir mi slob pa kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin zhe na; dgra bcom pa ni nyon mongs pa'i brjod pa thams cad med pas don dam par thub pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / mdo las lus gtsang byed dang ngag gtsang byed dang yid gtsang byed dang gtsang byed gsum gsungs pa de ni /
tadetat / tridhā śaucaṃ sarvaṃ sucaritatrayam
# legs spyad gsum po thams cad ni / / gtsang byed rnam pa gsum yin no /
sarvaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ kāyaśaucam
# lus kyi legs par spyad pa thams cad ni lus gtsang byed yin no /
sarvaṃ vāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ vāṅmanaḥ śaucam
# ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyad pa thams cad ni ngag dang yid kyi gtsang byed yin te /
duścaritamalāpakarṣaṇāttāvatkālamatyantaṃ vā / eṣā ca deśanā mithyāmauna śaucādhimuktikānāṃ vivecānārtham
# dus re zhig dang gtan du nyes par spyad pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma spongs pa'i phyir ro / / de ltar bstan pa 'di ni log pa'i thub pa dang gtsang sbra la mos pa rnams dkar ba'i phyir ro /
trīṇi duścaritānyuktāni
# nyes par spyad pa gsum gsungs pa de la /
tatra / aśubhaṃ kāyakarmādi mataṃ duścarita trayam / akuśalaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma yathākramaṃ kāyavāṅmanoduścaritam / akarmāpi tvabhidhyādimanoduścaritaṃ tridhā
# lus kyi la sogs mi dge ba / / nyes par spyad pa gsum du 'dod / / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba ni rim pa bzhin du lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no / / brnab sems la sogs las min yang / / yid kyi nyes spyad rnam gsum mo /
akarmasvabhāvamapyasti trividhaṃ manoduścaritaṃ cetanārthāntarabhūtamabhidhyā vyāpādo mithyādṛṣṭiśca
# las kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa yang yid kyi nyes par spyad pa rnam pa gsum yod de / / sems pa las don gzhan du gyur pa brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba'o /
abhidhyādaya eva manaskarmeti dārṣṭāntikāḥ / saṃcetanīyasūtre vacanāt / evaṃ tu sati karmakleśayoraikyaṃ syāt / kim syādyadi kaścit kleśo 'pi karma syāt
# dpes ston pa rnams na re ched du bsam par bya ba'i mdo las gsungs pa'i phyir brnab sems la sogs pa kho na yid kyi las yin no zhes zer ro / / de lta na ni las dang nyon mongs pa dag gcig tu 'gyur ro / / gal te nyon mongs pa 'ga' zhig las su gyur na yang cir 'gyur /
naitadasti / sūtraṃ viruddhaṃ syāt / sūtre tu cetanāyāstanmukhena pravṛttestaistāṃ darśayatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re mdo dang 'gal ba'i phyir de ni med de / / mdo las ni de'i sgo nas sems pa zhugs pa'i phyir de dag gis de ston par byed do zhes zer ro /
aniṣṭaphalatvātkuṭsitaḥ kāyavāṅmanaścāro duścaritam
# lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa smad pa ni 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba yin pa'i phyir nyes par spyad pa yin no /
viparyayātsucaritam / iṣṭaṃ kuśalaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarmānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭayaśca / parānugrahopaghātābhisaṃdhyabhāve kathaṃ samyagdṛṣṭimithyādṛṣṭavyoḥ kuśalākuśalatvam / tanmūlatvāt
# bzlog pa legs par spyad pa yin / / nyes par spyad pa las bzlog pa ni legs par spyad pa yin par 'dod de / / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dge ba dang brnab sems med pa dang gnod sems med pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba rnams so / / pha rol la phan 'dogs pa dang gnod pa bya ba'i bsam pa med par na ji ltar na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang log pa'i lta ba dag dge ba dang mi dge ba nyid yin zhe na / / de'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
yāni caitāni duścaritasucaritānyuktāni / tadaudārikasaṃgrahāt
# nyes par spyad pa dang legs par spyad par bshad pa gang dag yin pa / / de las che long bsdus nas ni /
daśa karmapathā uktā yathāyogaṃ śubhāśubhāḥ
# dge dang mi dge ci rigs par / / las kyi lam ni bcur gsungs so /
teṣāmeva sucaritaduścaritānāṃ caudārikasaṃgraheṇa daśa karmapathāḥ sūtra uktāḥ yathāyogaṃ kuśalāḥ sucaritebhyo 'kuśalā duścaritebhyaḥ
# nyes par spyad pa dang legs par spyad pa de dag nyid bas che long bsdus te ci rigs par mdo las las kyi lam bcur gsungs te / / dge ba rnams ni legs par spyad pa dag las so / / mi dge ba rnams ni nyes par spyad pa dag las so /
kimatra duścaritamasaṃgṛhītaṃ kiṃ vā sucaritam / akukśaleṣu tatkarmapathesu kāyaduścaritasya pradeśo na saṃgṛhītaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhabhūtaḥ kliṣṭaścānyo 'pi bandhānādiḥ / tasya nātyaudārikatvāt
# 'dir nyes par spyad pa ci zhig gam / / legs par spyad pa ci zhig ma bsdus she na / / re zhig mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams su ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'i phyogs sbyor ba dang mjug dang nyon mongs pa can gzhan yang ma bsdus te / / de ni shin tu rags pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
yaddhi kāyaduścaritaṃ pareṣāṃ jīvitabhogadārebhyaścyāvakaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tato vivecanārtham / vāgduścaritamapi yadeva praśādaṃ tatkarmapatha uktaṃ tadarthameva
# lus kyi nyes par spyad pa gzhan dag 'tsho ba dang longs spyod dang chung ma rnams dang 'bral bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni de dang 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir las kyi lam du bshad do / / ngag gi nyes par spyad pa yang tshabs po che gang yin pa de kho na nyid kyi phyir las kyi lam du bshad do /
manoduścaritasya ca pradeśacetanā
# yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i phyogs sems pa yang ma bsdus so /
kuśaleṣvapi kāyasucaritasya pradeśaḥ prayogapṛṣṭhamadyādiviratidānejyādiko vāksucaritasya priyavacanādiko manaḥ sucaritasya cetanā / eṣāṃ ca karmapathānām
# dge ba la yang lus kyi legs par spyad pa'i phyogs sbyor ba dang mjug dang myos par 'gyur ba la sogs pa spong ba dang sbyin pa dang mchod sbyin la sogs pa ma bsdus so / / ngag gi legs par spyad pa'i yang snyan par smra ba la sogs pa ma bsdus so / / yid kyi legs par spyad pa'i yang sems pa ma bsdus so / / las kyi lam de rnams las /
aśubhāḥ ṣaḍavijñaptiḥ
# mi dge drug ni rnam rig min /
akuśalāḥ ṣaṭ karmapathā avaśyamavijñaptisvabhāvāḥ prāṇātipātādattādānamṛṣāvādapaiśunyapārupyasaṃbhinnapralāpāḥ / pareṇa kārayato maulavijñaptyabhāvāt
# mi dge ba'i las kyi lam drug po srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang ngag kyal pa rnams ni gzhan byed du 'jug pa la dngos kyi rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no /
dvidhaikaḥ
# gcig rnam gnyis so /
kāmamithyācāro nityaṃ vijñaptyavijñaptisvabhāvastasya svayeva niṣṭhāpanāt / nahi taṃ pareṇa kārayatastādṛśī prītirbhavatīti
# 'dod pas log par g yem pa de ni bdag nyid kyis mthar phyin par byed pa la ni dus de'i tshe shi na rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin te / / de gzhan byed du bcug pa ni de dang 'dra bar dga' ba ma yin no /
te 'pi kurvataḥ
# de dag kyang byed na /
te 'pi ṣaṭ karmapathāḥ svayaṃ kurvato dvividhā bhavanti vijñaptiravijñaptiśca tatkālamaraṇe paścāt maraṇe tvavijñaptireva
# las kyi lam drug po de dag kyang bdag nyid byed pa la ni dus de'i tshe shi na rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro / / phyis shi na ni rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na yin no /
kuśalānāṃ punaḥ karmapathānāṃ / dvividhāḥ sapta kuśalāḥ
# dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams las ni / / dge ba bdun rnam gnyis /
kuśalāḥ sapta rūpiṇaḥ karmapathā avaśyaṃ dviprakārā vijñaptiravijñaptiśca / vijñaptyadhīnatvātsamādānaśīlasya
# yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims ni rnam par rig byed la rag lus pa'i phyir las kyi lam gzugs can bdun ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga yin no /
avijñaptiḥ samādhijāḥ
# ting 'dzin las skyes rnam rig min /
dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītāḥ samādhijāḥ ucyante / te hyavijñaptireva cittamātrādhīnatvāt
# bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pas bsdus pa rnams ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa zhes bya ste / / de dag ni sems tsam la rag lus pa'i phyir / / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na yin no /
sāmantakāstu vijñaptiḥ
# nyer bsdogs rnams ni rnam rig byed /
karmapathasāmantakāstu vijñaptisvabhāvā avaśyam
# las kyi lam nyer bsdogs rnams ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed kyi rang bzhin yin no; /
avijñaptirbhavenna vā
# rnam rig byed min 'gyur ba'am / / ma yin /
yadi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena pramādena vā ghanarasena prayogamārabheta syādavijñaptiranyathā na syāt
# gal te kun nas dkris pa drag po'am / / rab tu dang ba lhur len pa chen pos sbyor ba rtsom pa rnam par rig byed ma yin par 'gyur gyi /
viparyayeṇa pṛṣṭhāni
# gzhan du ni ma yin no /
sāmantakebhyo viparyayeṇa karmapathānāṃ pṛṣṭhāni veditavyāti
# bzlog pa mjug yin no / / nyer bsdogs las bzlog pa ni las kyi lam rnams kyi mjug yin par blta bar bya ste /
tāni avaśyamavijñaptisvabhāvāni / vijñaptistu bhavenna vā
# de dag ni gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed kyi rang bzhin ni ma yin no / / rnam par rig byed du ni 'gyur ba'am /
yadi karmapathaṃ kṛṭvā punastasyānudharmaṃ ceṣṭeta tasya syāt vijñaptiranyathā na syāt
# yang na ma yin te / / gal te las kyi lam byas nas de'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos spyod na ni rnam par rig byed du 'gyur gyi /
atha kuto yāvadeṣāṃ prayogamaulapṛṣṭhānāṃ vyavasthānam / yadā tāvadiha kaścit paśuṃ hantukāmo mañcakāduttiṣṭhati mūlyaṃ gṛhlāti gacchatyāmṛśati paśuṃ krīṇātyānayati puṣṇāti praveśayati nihantuṃ śāstramādatte prahāramekaṃ dadāti dvau vā yāvanna jīvitā dvacyaparopayati tāvat prayogaḥ / yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ
# gzhan du ni ma yin no / / yang ji tsam gyis na sbyor ba dang dngos dang mjug 'di dag rnam par bzhag ce na / / 'di ltar re zhig 'di na kha cig phyugs gsod par 'dod la / / khri la sogs pa las ldang bar byed / / rin len par byed / / 'gro bar byed / / nom par byed; phyugs nyo bar byed / / 'khrid par byed / / dran par byed / / 'dzud par byed / / gnod par byed / / mtshon len par byed / / mtshon len gcig gam lan gnyis 'debs par byed pa nas ji srid du srog gcod par mi byed pa de srid du ni sbyor ba yin no / / bsnun pa gang gis srog gcod par byed pa de'i tshe'i rnam par rig byed dang de'i skad cig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni las kyi lam dngos yin no /
dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate prayogataḥ mṛte sati phalaparipūritaśca
# rgyu gnyis kyis ni srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur te / / sbyor ba dang 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pas so /
tata ūrdhvamavijñaptikṣaṇāḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti / yāvacca taṃ paśuṃ kuṣṇāti śodhayati vikrīṇīte pacati khādayatyanukīrtayati vā tāvadasya vijñaptikṣaṇā api pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavanti
# de phyin chad kyi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i skad cig ma rnams ni mjug yin no / / ji srid du phyugs de'i pags pa 'chu ba'am / / bkru bshal byed pa 'am / / 'tshong ba'am / / 'tshed pa'am / / za ba'am rjes su sgrogs pa de srid du ni de'i rnam par rig byed kyi skad cig ma dag kyang mjug yin no /
evamanyeṣvapi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyam / abhidhyādīnāṃ nāsti prayogo na pṛṣṭhaṃ saṃmukhībhāvamātrātkarmapathaḥ
# de bzhin du gzhan drug la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o / / brnab sems la sogs pa ni mngon du gyur pa tsam gyis las kyi lam du 'gyur ba'i phyir sbyor ba yang med la mjug kyang med do /
idamatra vaktavyam / kiṃ tāvat maraṇabhavasthe tasmin prāṇini ye vijñaptyavijñaptī te karmapatha āhosvinmṛte / kiṃ cātaḥ
# 'dir ci re zhig srog chags de 'chi ba'i srid pa la gnas pa de'i tshe rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang dag las kyi lam yin nam 'on te shi ba'i srid pa la gnas pa de'i tshe yin pa zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya'o / / de las cir 'gyur /
yadi tāvanmaraṇabhavasthe sahamṛṭasyāpio anturghātayiturvā prāṇātipātāvadyena yogaḥ prāpnoti
# re zhig gal te 'chi ba'i srid pa la gnas pa yin na ni gsod pa'am / / gsod du 'jug pa lhan cig shi ba yang srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang ldan par 'gyur te /
na ceṣa siddhāntaḥ / atha mṛte
# grub pa'i mtha' las ni de skad du mi 'byung ngo /
yaduktaṃ yena tu prahāreṇa jīvitādvacyaparopayati tatra yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā vā 'vijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapatha iti tanā vaktavyam / yaccāpīdaṃ śāstra uktaṃ syāt prāṇī hataḥ prāṇātipātaścāniruddhaḥ / syādyathā hi tatprāṇī jīvitādvyaparopito bhavati prayogaścāpratiprasragdha ityatra pṛṣṭhaṃ prayogaśabdenoktamiti vaibhāṣikīyo 'rthavirodho maulasyaiva tadānīmaniruddhatvāt
# 'on te shi ba yin na ni bsnun pa gang gis srog gcod par byed pa de'i tshe'i rnam par rig byed dang de'i skad cig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni las kyi lam dngos yin no zhes gang smras pa de brjod par mi bya'o / / gang yang bstan bcos las 'di skad du / / srog chags bsad la srog gcod pa ma 'gags pa yod dam zhe na / / yod de / / 'di lta ste / / dper na srog chags kyi srog gcod la sbyor ba med par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa 'dir mjug sbyor ba'i sgrar gsungs so zhes bya ba bye brag tu smra ba'i don ni 'gal te /
yathā na doṣastathā 'stu
# de'i tshe dngos kho na ma 'gags pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ ca na doṣaḥ / maula evātra prayogaśabdenokta iti
# ji ltar nyes pa med pa de lta bu yin no / / ji ltar na nyes pa med pa de dngos kho na sbyor ba'i sgrar gsungs zhes bya ba'o; /
vijñaptistarhi tadā kathaṃ maulaḥ karmapatho bhavati / kathaṃ ca na bhavitavyam
# 'o na de'i tshe rnam par rig byed ji ltar las kyi lam dngos su 'gyur / / ji ltar na mi 'gyur /
asāmarthyat
# mi nus pa'i phyir ro /
avijñaptiridānīṃ kathaṃ bhavati
# de ni rnam par rig byed ma yin par ji ltar 'gyur te /
tasmāt prayogaphalaparipūrikāle tadubhayaṃ karmapathaḥ syāt karmatpatho 'pyanyasya prayogaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ ca bhavati
# de'i phyir sbyor ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshe gnyi ga las kyi lam yin no / / las kyi lam gzhan gyi sbyor ba'am mjug las kyi lam gzhan yin pa yang yod dam zhe na /
prāṇātipātasya daśāpi karmapathāḥ prayogaḥ / yathā ca śatrorvadhārthaṃ kṛtyaṃ samupasthāpayan paśunā valiṃ kuryāt parakīyaṃ kṛtvā dāreṣu cāsya vipratipadyeta taireva tadghātanārtham anṛtapiśunaparuṣasāntavaiścāsya mitrabhedaṃ kuryādyānyasya paritrāṇāya kalperan abhidhyāṃ ca tatsva kuryāttatraiva ca vyāpādaṃ tadvadhārthaṃ ca mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vṛṃhayediti
# yod de / / srog gcod pa'i sbyor ba las kyi lam bcu tshar yang yin te / / dper na dgra gsad pa'i phyir gshed byed gsad bar gzhan gyi nor 'grogs nas phyugs kyis gtor ma / / byed pa dang de nyid kyis de gsod du gzhug pa'i phyir de'i chung ma la nyal po byed pa dang de la gang dag yongs su skyob par 'gyur ba de'i mdza' bo la brdzun dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang kyal pa dag gis dbyen byed pa dang de'i nor la brnab sems byed pa dang de nyid la gnod sems byed pa dang de gsad pa'i phyir log pa'i lta ba 'phel bar byed pa lta bu ste /
evamanyeṣvapi yathāyogaṃ yojyam / na tvabhidhyādayaḥ prayogā yujyante
# de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o / / brnab sems la sogs pa ni sbyor ba yin par mi rung ste /
nahi cittotpādamātreṇa prayukto bhavati
# bya ba ma brtsams pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa tsam gyis ni sbyor ba byas pa ma yin no /
kriyānārambhāt / sūtra uktaṃ prāṇātipāto bhikṣavastrividho lobhajo dveṣajo mohajo yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiriti / tatra kīdṛśaḥ prāṇātipāto lobhaja ityevamādi vaktavyam
# mdo las dge slong dag srog gcod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste / / chags pa las skyes pa dang zhe sdang las skyes pa dang / / gti mug las skyes pa'o zhes bya ba nas log par lta ba'i bar du gsungs pa de la srog gcod pa chags pa las skyes pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig ces bya ba de la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
nātra sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhā / prayogastu trimūlajaḥ
# 'di la las kyi lam thams cad chags pa la sogs pas mthar phyin par byed pa ni ma yin gyi / / sbyor ba rtsa pa gsum las skyes /
prayogasteṣāmakuśalamūlatrayājjāta ityādisamutthānavacanādevamuktaḥ / tatra lobhajapraṇātipāto yathā taccharīrāvayavārthamarthārthaṃ krītārthaṃ ca prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopayati ātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya
# de dag gi sbyor ba ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum las skyes pa yin pas na dang po kun nas slong ba'i tshig las de skad bshad do / / de la srog gcod pa chags pa las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste / / de'i lus kyi yan lag gi phyir ram / / nor gyi phyir ram / / rtsed mo'i phyir ram / / bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir srog gcod par byed pa'o / / zhe sdang las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste /
dveṣajo yathā vairanipīḍanārtham
# kho na las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir gsod par byed pa'o /
mohajo yathā yājñikānāṃ dharmabuddhyā rājñāṃ ca dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāddhiṃsatām
# gti mug las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste / / mchod sbyin byed pa rnams dang rgyal pos chos 'don pa tshad mar byas nas chos kyi blos gsod pa dag ste /
duṣṭānāṃ kila nigrahaṃ kurvanto rājānaḥ puṇyabhājo bhavantīti / pārasīkānāṃ ca
# mi bsgrungs pa rnams chad pas bcad na; rgyal po bsod nams kyi snod du 'gyur ro zhas grags pa lta bu dang par sig pa rnams kyi lta bu ste /
te hyevamāhuḥ
# de dag ni 'di skad du /
mātāpitarau jīrṇau vā glānau vā hantavyāviti
# pha dang ma rgas sam nad tshabs chen pos thebs na gsod par bya'o zhes zer ro /
ye cānye 'pyevamāhurahivṛścikatryamvukādayo manuṣyāṇāmupaghātāpakā hantavyāḥ mṛgapaśupakṣimahiṣādayaścopabhogārthatvāditi / yaśca mithyādṛṣṭipravartitaḥ prāṇātipātaḥ / lobhajamadattādānaṃ yo yenārthi sa tadvarati anyalābhasatkārayaśo 'rthaṃ vā ātmasukṛtaparitrāṇāya vā
# gang yang 'di skad du sbrul dang sdig pa dang sbrang bu trya [?] ma bu ka la sogs pa rnams ni mi rnams la gdung bar byed pa yin pas gsad par bya'o / / ri dags dang phyugs dang bya dang ma he la sogs pa rnams ni longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir gsad par bya'o zhes zer ba dang gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i srog gcod pa'o / / ma byin par len pa chags pa las skyes pa ni gang zhig gang don du gnyer ba des 'phrog pa'am / / gzhan gyi rnyed pa'am bkur sti'am grags pa'i phyir ram / / bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'phrog pa'o /
dveṣajaṃ yadvairanipīḍanārtham / mohajaṃ yathā rājñāṃ dharmapāṭhakaprāmāṇyāt / duṣṭanigrahārthaṃ yathā brāhmaṇā āhuḥ sarvamidaṃ brahmaṇā brāhmaṇebhyo dattaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ daurbalyādvṛṣlāḥ paribhuñjate / tasmādapaharan brāhmaṇaḥ sumādatte svameva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ce ti
# zhe sdang las skyes pa ni kho na las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir 'phrog pa gang yin pa'o / / gti mug las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste rgyal pos chos 'don pa tshad mar byas nas mi bsgrungs pa chad pas bcad pa'i phyir 'phrog pa lta bu dang 'di lta ste / / bram ze rnams na re 'di thams cad ni tshangs pas bram ze rnams la byin pa yin na bram ze rnams dmas pas dmangs rigs rnams yongs su spyod par zad de / / de lta bas na bram ze 'phrog pa na bram ze bdag nyid kyis len pa yin / / bdag nyid kyis za ba yin / / bdag nyis kyis gyon pa yin / / bdag nyid kyis sbyin pa yin no zhes zer ba lta bu'o /
na caiśāmaparasvasaṃjñā bhavati
# de dag la bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes mi 'byung ba ni ma yin no /
yacca mithyādṛṣṭipravarttitam / lobhajaḥ kāmamithyācāraḥ dārādiṣu tatsaṃrāgādabrahmacaryaṃ lābhasatkārārthamātmasuhṛtparitrāṇāya / dveṣajo vairanipīḍanārtham / mohajo yathā pārasīkānāṃ mātrādigamanaṃ gosave ca yajñe / yothoktaṃ brāhmaṇo gosaveneṣṭyā saṃvatsaragovratī bhavati
# gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i ma byin par len pa'o / / 'dod pas log par g yem pa chags pa las skyes pa ni gzhan gyi chung ma la sogs pa la de la chags pa'am / / rnyed pa 'am bkur sti'i phyir ram / / bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir mi tshangs par spyod pa 'o / / zhe sdang las skyes pa ni kho na las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir nyal po byed pa gang yin pa'o / / gti mug las skyes pa ni 'di lta ste / / par sig la sogs pa ma la sogs pa la nyal ba dang ba lang 'bring gi mchod sbyin la cho ga can gyi chu btung ngo / / rtsva bcad do / / ma'i gan du nyal po la 'gro'o / / sring mo'i gan du 'gro'o /
upahā udakaṃ cūṣati tṛṇāni cchinatti upaiti mātaramupasvasāramupa sagotrāmiti
# rus gcig pa'i gan du 'gro'o zhes bya ba dang gang dang gang na 'di dag rnyed pa de dang der 'gro bar bya ste /
ye cāhu rudūkhalapuṇyaphalapakvānnatīrthamārgaprakhyo mātṛgrāma iti / mṛṣāvādādayo lobhajā dveṣajāścapūrvavat / mohajo mṛṣāvādo yathāha / na narmayuktamanṛtaṃ hi nāsti / na strīṣu rājanna vivāhakāle / prāṇātyaye sarvadhanāpahāre
# de lta bas na ba lang dang 'jig rten las rgyal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu dang gang dag bud med ni gtun dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang zas smin pa dang ngogs dang lam dang 'dra'o zhes zer ba lta bu'o / / brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa chags pa las skyes pa dang zhe sdang las skyes pa ni snga ma bzhin no / / brdzun du smra ba gti mug las skyes pa ni ji skad du / / rgyal po bzhad gad ldan dang bud med dang / / bag ma len pa'i tshe dang gsod pa dang / / nor kun 'phrog tshe brdzun byas gnod med de /
pañcānṛtānyāhurapātakānīti
# brdzun lnga ltung bar byed pa min zhes bshad /
yaṣca mithyādṛṣṭipravartito mṛṣāvādaḥ / paiśunyādayastu mithyādṛṣṭipravartitā mohajāḥ / yaṣcaca vedādyasacchāstrapralāpaḥ
# zhes smras pa lta bu dang gang yang log par lta bas rab tu bcug pa'i brdzun du smra ba'o / / phra ma la sogs pa gti mug las skyes pa ni log pa'i lta bas rab tu bcug pa dang gang yang rig byed la sogs pa bstan bcos ngan pa rdol ba'o /
abhidhyādayaḥ kathaṃ lobhajāḥ / tadanantarasaṃbhūterabhidhyādyāstrimūlajāḥ
# ji ltar na brnab sems la sogs pa chags pa la sogs pa las skyes pa yin zhe na / / de yi mjug thogs las byung phyir / / brnab sems sogs rtsa gsum las skyes /
lobhādanantaramutpannā lobhajāḥ dveṣādanantaraṃ dveṣajā mohādanantaraṃ mohajāḥ
