# chags pa'i mjug thogs su byung ba ni chags pa las skyes pa dag yin no / / zhe sdang gi mjug thogs su byung ba ni zhe sdang las skyes pa dag yin no /
uktā kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ / kuśalāḥ kathamityāha / kuśalāḥ saprayogāntā alobhadveṣamohajāḥ
# gti mug gi mjug thogs su byung ba ni gti mug las skyes pa dag yin no / / mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams bshad zin to / / dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams ji lta bu zhe na /
saprayogapṛṣṭhāḥ kuśalāḥ karmapathā alobhadveṣamohajāḥ
# dge ba sbyor dang mjug bcas rnams / / chags sdang gti mug med las skyes /
kuṣalacittasamutthitatvāt / tasya ca avaśya malobhādibhiḥ saṃprayogāt tatrākuśala karmapathaprayogādviratiḥ kuśalakarmapathaprayogaḥ / maulādviratiḥ maulaḥ / pṛṣṭhād viratiḥ pṛṣṭhaḥ / tadyathā śrāmaṇera upasaṃpādyamāno nānāvāsaṃ praviśati bhikṣūnvandate upādhyāyaṃ yācate yāvadekaṃ karmavācanaṃ kriyate dvitīyaṃ ca / ayaṃ prayogaḥ
# dge ba'i las kyi lam sbyor ba dang mjug dang bcas pa rnams ni dge ba'i sems kyis kun nas bslang ba'i phyir dang de yang gdon mi za bar ma chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa las skyes pa dag yin no / / de la mi dge ba'i las kyi lam ni sbyor ba spong ba ni dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi sbyor ba yin no / / dngos spong ba ni dngos yin no / / mjug spong ba ni mug yin te / / 'di sta [*lta?] ste dge tshul bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa gnas sna tshogs par 'jug par byed / / dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar byed / / mkhan po la gsol ba 'debs par byed pa nas las lan gcig brjod pa dang lan gnyis brjod pa'i bar 'di ni sbyor ba yin no /
tṛtīya karmavācane yā vijñaptistatkṣaṇikā cāvijñaptirayaṃ maulaḥ karmapathaḥ
# lan gsum pa brjod pa'i che rnam par rig byed dang de'i skad cig gi rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gang yin pa 'di ni las kyi lam dngos yin no /
tata ūrdhvaṃ yāvanniśrayā ārocyante tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vijñapayati avijñaptica yāvadatuvartate idaṃ pṛṣṭham
# de'i 'og tu ji srid du gnas bsgo ba'am / / de'i rten rnam par rig par byed pa dang ji srid du rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pa rjes su 'brang ba 'di ni mjug yin no /
yaduktaṃ na sarveṣāṃ karmapathānāṃ lobhādibhirniṣṭhetyatha kasya kena niṣṭhā
# las kyi lam thams cad chags pa la sogs pas mthar phyin par byed pa ni ma yin no zhes gang bshad na / / 'o na gang zhig gang gis mthar phyin par byed ce na /
vadhavyāpādapāruṣyaniṣṭhā dveṣeṇa
# gsod dang gnod sems tshig rtsub po / / zhe sdang gis ni mthar phyin byed /
eṣāṃ prāṇātipātavyāpādapāruṣpāṇāṃ dveṣeṇa samāptiḥ
# srog gcod pa dang gnod sems dang tshig rtsub po dang 'di dag ni zhe sdang gis mthar phyin par byed de /
parityāgaparuṣacittasaṃmukhī bhāvāt
# yongs su 'dor ba dang rtsub pa'i sems mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro /
lobhataḥ / parastrīgamanābhidhyā 'dattādānasamāpanam
# log g yem brnab sems ma byin len / / chags pa sems ni rdzogs par byed /
lobhena kāmamithyācārābhidhyā 'dattādānānāṃ samāptiḥ
# 'dod pas log par g yem pa dang brnab sems dang ma byin par len pa rnams ni chags pas rdzogs par byed do /
mithyādṛṣṭestu mohena
# log par lta ba gti mug gis /
adhimātrabhūto hi tāṃ niṣṭhāpayati
# cher rmongs par gyur na mthar phyin par byed do /
śeṣāṇāṃ tribhiriṣyate
# lhag ma gsum gyis rdzogs par 'dod /
ke punaḥ śeṣāḥ / mṛṣāvādapaiśunyasaṃbhinnapralāpāḥ
# lhag ma yang gang dag ce na / / brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang tshig kyal pa ste / / de dag ni chags pa'am /
eṣāṃ tribhirapi niṣṭhā lobhena dveṣeṇa mohena vā
# zhe sdang ngam / / gti mug gsum kas kyang mthar phyin par byed do; /
ya ete karmapathāścaturbhiḥ kāṇḍairuktāstrayastraya ekastrayaśca eṣāṃ yathākramaṃ
# gang 'di las kyi lam cha bzhir bshad pa de dag ni gsum dang gsum dang gcig dang gsum dang go rims bzhin te /
sattvabhogāvadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca
# gzhi ni sems can longs spyod dang / / ming dang gzugs dang ming yin no /
sattvādhiṣṭhānā vadhādayaḥ
# srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i gzhi ni sems can yin no; /
bhogādhiṣṭhānāṃ parastrīgamanādayaḥ
# gzhan gyi bud med kyi gan du 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gzhi ni longs spyod yin no /
nāmarūpādhiṣṭhāmithyādṛṣṭiḥ
# log par lta ba'i gzhi ni ming dang gzugs yin no /
nāmakāyādhiṣṭhānā mṛṣāvādādayaḥ
# brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa'i gzhi ni ming gi tshogs yin no /
yaḥ paraṃ maraṇānniyamayya samaṃ tena pūrvaṃ vā mriyate kimasya maulaḥ karmapatho bhavatyutāho na
# gang zhig gi pha rol po 'chi bar nges par byas nas de dang mgo mnyam du 'am sngar shin ci de la las kyi lam dngos yod dam 'on te med ce na /
samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ / ata evocyate syāt prayogaṃ kuryāt phalaṃ ca paripūrayenna ca prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate
# snga dang mnyam du shi ba la / / dngos po med de nyid kyi phyir / / sbyor ba yang byas la 'bras bu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur kyang srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis sam /
āha / syāt yathāpi tadvyaparopavaḥ pūrvaṃ saha vā kālaṃ kuryāditi kiṃ punastatkāraṇam nahi vadhye jīvati hantuḥ prāṇātipātāvadyenāsti yogo nāpi sahamṛtasya hantuḥ / anyāśrayodayāt / thenāśrayeṇa tatprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ sa ucchinno 'nya evāśrayo nikāyasabhāgabhinna utpannaḥ
# bka' stsal pa yod de / / 'di lta ste gsod pa po sngar ram mnyam du shi bar gyur pa lta bu'o zhes gsungs so / / de la rgyu ci zhig yod ce na / / gsad par bya ba gson bzhin du gsod pa po la kha na ma tho ba dang ldan pa yang med la / / gsod pa po shi ba la yang ma yin te / / lus gzhan skyes phyir ro / / lus gang gis de la sbyor ba byas pa de ni chad la ris mthun pa tha dad pa gzhan gyi lus kho na zhig byung ste /
tasya prayoktṛtvāt karmapathena yogo na yuktaḥ
# de ni sbyor ba po ma yin pa'i phyir las kyi lam dang ldan par rig pa ma yin no /
yatsenāpātamṛgayāvaskandheṣu pareṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bahavaḥ samagrāḥ patantyekaśca prāṇātipātaṃ karoti kastena samanvāgato bhavati
# gang dmag gis gdab pa dang lings 'debs pa dang ma 'phrigs par gdab pa dag tu pha rol po gsad par bya ba'i phyir mang po tshogs pas btab la gcig cig gis srog gcod na de dang su zhig ldan par 'gyur zhe na /
senādiṣvekakāryatvāt sarve kattṛvadanvitāḥ / yathaiva hi karttā tathā sarve samanvāgatā bhavantyekakāryatvāt
# dmag la sogs par don gcig phyir / / thams cad byed pa blo bzhin ldan / / don gcig pa'i phyir thams cad byed pa po ji lta ba bzhin ldan par 'gyur te /
arthato hi te 'yonyaṃ payoktāro bhavanti / yastarhi balānnīyate so'pi samanvāgato bhavatyanyatra ya evaṃ naścitya yāyāt yāvajjīvitahetorapi prāṇinaṃ na haniṣyāmīti
# de dag ni don gyis na phan tshun du sbyor bar byed pa yin no / / 'o na gang zhig nan gyis khrid pa de ji lta bu zhe na / / de yang ldan par 'gyur ba ste / / gang zhig 'di snyam du sog gi phyir yang srog chags mi gsod de zhes bya bar nges bar byas te 'gro ba ni ma gtogs so /
kiyatā punaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ svayaṃ kurvataḥ karmapatho bhavati kiyatā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ karmapathaḥ iti lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ taducyate
# rang gi srog gcod par byed pa la ji tsam gyis las kyi lam du 'gyur zhes bya ba nas ji tsam gyis na log par lta ba'i las kyi lam du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste / / de brjod do /
prāṇātipātaḥ saṃcintya parasyābhrāntimāraṇam
# srog gcod pa ni bsams bzhin du ma nor ba ni gzhan gsad pa'o /
yadi mārayiṣyāmyenamiti saṃjñāya paraṃ mārayati tameva ca mārayati nānyaṃ bhramitvā
# gal te 'di bsad do snyam du bsams nas gsod par byed la / / gzhan dang ma nor bar de nyid kyang gsod par byed na de tsam gyis srog gcod pa yin no /
iyatā prāṇātipāto bhavati
# 'o na gang zhig 'di ci srog chags sam srog chags ma yin /
yastarhi saṃdigdho mārayati kimayaṃ prāṇī na prāṇīti sa evānyo veti so 'pyavaśyametaṃ niścayaṃ labdhvā tatra praharati / yo 'stu so 'stviti kṛtamevānena tyāgacittaṃ bhavati
# de 'am gzhan zhig yin snyam du the tsom zos nas gsod par byed pa de ji lta bu zhe na / / de yang gdon mi za bar gang yin pa yin zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di rnyed nas de la snun par byed pas des na 'dor ba'i sems su byas pa kho na yin no /
kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu skandheṣu prāṇātipāto bhavati / prāṇo nāma vāyuḥ kāyacittasaṃniśrito vartate
# phung po skad cig ma rnams la ji ltar srog gcod pa yin zhe na / / srog zhes bya ba ni lus dang sems la brten nas 'jug pa'i rlung yin te /
tamabhipātayati
# de gcod par byed do /
yathā pradīpaṃ nirodhayati ghaṇṭāsvanaṃ vā
# dper na mar me 'am / / dril bu'i skad 'gag par byed pa dang 'dra'o /
jīvitendriyaṃ vā prāṇāstannirodhayati / yadyekasyāpi jīvitakṣaṇasyotpadyamānasyāntarāyaṃ karoti prāṇātipātāvadyena spṛśyate nānyathā
# yang na srog gi dbang po srog yin te / / de 'gag par byed do / / gal te srog gi dbang po'i skad cig ma gcig skye ba la bar chad byed na yang srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
kasya tajjīvitaṃ yastadabhāvānmṛto bhavati
# de med pas gang zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i srog de gang yin zhe na /
kasyeti ṣaṣṭhīṃ pudgalavāde vicārayiṣyāmaḥ
# gang gi zhes bya ba'i drug pa ni gang zag tu smra ba dgag par dpyad par bya'o /
uktaṃ tu bhagavatā
# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
āyuruṣmā 'tha vijñānaṃ yadā kāyaṃ jahatyamī
# gang tshe tshe dang drod rnams shes / / 'di dag gis ni lus 'dor zhing /
apaviddhastadā śete yathā kāṣṭhamacetana / tasmātsendriyaḥ kāyo jīvatītyucyate anindriyo mṛta iti
# bor na de tshe 'dug pa ni / / ji ltar shing la sems med bzhin / / zhes gsungs te / / de lta bas na dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus ni gson po zhes bya la / / dbang po med pa ni shi ba zhes bya'o /
abuddhipūrvādapi prāṇivadhāt karturadharmo yathā 'gnisaṃyogāddāha iti nirgranthāḥ
# gcer bu pa rnams na re blo sngar ma btang ba'i srog gcod pas kyang byed pa po chos ma yin pa dang ldan par 'gyur te / / dper na me dang reg pa las tshig par 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes zer ro /
teṣāṃ paradāradarśane 'pyeṣa prasaṅgaḥ / nirgranthaśiroluñcane ca kaṣṭatapodeśane ca śāstuḥ tadvisūcikāmaraṇe ca dāturvaidyānāṃ cāturapīḍane maraṇe ca mātṛgabhasthayoścānyonyaṃ duḥkhanimittatvāt
# de dag gi ltar na gzhan gyi chung ma mthong ba dang reg pa la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro / / gcer bu pa skra 'bal ba dang dka' thub drag po'i lung 'bogs pa dang de dag gsad de shin yang sbyin pa po la de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro / / ma dang bu lto na yod pa dag kyang phun tshun sdug bsngal gyi rgyu mtshan du gyur pa'i phyir de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro /
vadhyasyāpi ca tatkriyāsaṃbandhādagnisvāśrayadāhavat / kāryataścāprasaṅgastadasambandhāt
# gsod par bya ba yang de'i bya ba dang 'brel ba'i phyir de ltar thal bar 'gyur te / / mes rang gi rten sreg pa bzhin no / / byed du 'jug pa la yang thal par mi 'gyur te /
pareṇāgnim sparśayatastenādāhavat
# gzhan me la reg tu 'jug pa me des mi 'tshig pa bzhin no /
acetanānāṃ ca kāṣṭhādīnāṃ gṛhapāte prāṇivadhāt pāpaprasaṅgo na vā dṛṣṭāntamātrātsiddhiriti / uktaḥ prāṇātipātaḥ / adattādānamanyasvasvīkriyā balacauryataḥ
# khyim rdib na srog chags dag 'chi ba'i phyir shing la sogs pa med pa rnams kyang sdig pa dang ldan par thal bar 'gyur ro / / nad pa la gnod pa dang shi ba na sman pa rnams la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro / / yang na dpe tsam gyis ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro / / srog gcod pa bshad zin to / / ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor / / mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed /
abhrāntyeti vartate
# ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yadi balādvā cauryeṇa vā parasvaṃ svīkaroti yatraiva ca balacauryābhiprāyeṇānyatra saṃjñāvibhramāt iyatā 'dattādānaṃ bhavati
# gal te gzhan gyis bdag gir byas pa la mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed cing / / gang du mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir bya bar bsams pa de las gzhan du 'du shes kyang ma 'khrul na de tsam gyis ma byin par len pa yin no /
stūpādapaharato buddhāda dattādānam
# mchod rten las phrogs pa ni sangs rgyas las ma byin par blangs pa yin te /
sarvaṃ hi tadbhagavatā parinirvāṇakāle parigṛthītamiti
# bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i che de dag thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro /
yeṣāṃ samrakṣyamityapare / asvāmikaṃ ca nidhimuddharato viṣayasvāmikāt parivartakaṃ harataḥ kṛte karmaṇi sīmāprāptebhyaḥ akṛte sarvabuddhaśaikṣyebhyaḥ
# gzhan dag na re srung ma gang dag yin pa las so zhes zer ro / / bdag po med pa'i gter brus na ni yul gyi bdag po las so / / shi ba'i nor phrogs na las byas pa zhig yin na ni mtshams kyi nang du gtogs pa rnams las so / / ma byas pa zhig yin na ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad las so /
agamyagamanaṃ kāmamithyācāraścaturvidhaḥ
# bgrod mi ma 'gro ba 'dod pa yis / / log par g yem pa rnam pa bzhi /
catuṣprakāramagamyagamanaṃ kāmamithyācāraḥ / agamyāṃ gacchati paraparigṛhītāṃ vā mātaraṃ duhitaraṃ vā mātṛpitṛsaṃbandhinīṃ vā
# bgrod par bya ba ma yin par 'gro ba 'dod pas log par g yem pa rnam pa bzhi ste / / bgrod pa bya ba ma yin pa gzhan gyis yongs su gzung ba 'am / / ma 'am / / bu mo 'am pha dang ma dang 'brel ba'i gan du 'gro'am /
anaṅge vā gacchati svāmapi bhāryām apāne mukhe vā
# rang gi chung ma yin yang yan lag ma yin par 'gro ba ste / / kha'am rkub tu 'jug pa'am /
adeśe vā gacchati prakāśe caitye vihāre vā
# yul ma yin par 'gro ba'am / / snang ba'am mchod rten nam /
akāle vā gacchati / kaḥ punaḥ akālaḥ / garbhiṇīṃ vā gacchati pāyayantīṃ vā saniyamāṃ vā
# gtsug lag khang ngam / / dus ma yin par 'gro ba ste / / dus ma yin pa gang zhe na / / sbrum ma'am / / nu zho 'thung ba'am / / nges pa dang bcas pa'i gan du 'gro ba'o /
yadi bharturanujñayā saniyamā bhavatītyeke
# kha cig na re gal te khyos gnang na nges pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes zer ro /
abhrāntyeti vartate
# ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yadi svasaṃjñī parastriyaṃ yāyāt na syāt karmapathaḥ
# gal te bdag gi yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du song na las kyi lam du mi 'gyur ro /
yadyanyaḥ parastrīsaṃjñayā 'nyāmabhigacchet paradāraprayogādvastuparibhogācca syādityeke / anyatra prayogānna syāt prāṇāti pātavadityapare / bhikṣuṇīṃ gacchataḥ kasyāntikāt kāmamithyācāraḥ
# gal te gzhan gyi chung ma ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gzhan zhig gi gan du song na / / kha cig na re gzhan gyi chung ma la sbyar bar byas pa'i phyir dang dngos po yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir 'gyur ro zhes zer ro / / gzhan dag na re sbyor ba gzhan du byas pa'i phyir mi 'gyur te / / srog gcod pa bzhan [*bzhin?] no zhes zer ro / / dge slong ma'i gan du 'gro ba su las 'dod pa la log par g yem pa yin zhe na /
viṣayasvāminaḥ / tasya hi tanna marṣaṇīyam / tasyāpi saniyamā svabhāryeva tu sā na gamyā / kumārīṃ gacchato yasya nisṛṣṭā no cedyasya rakṣā 'ntato rājñaḥ
# yul gyi bdag po las te des ni de mi bzod par bya ba yin no / / des ni rang gi chung ma nges pa dang bcas pa bzhin du bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa yang yin no / / gzhon nu ma'i gan du 'gro ba ni gang la byin pa las so / / gal te sbyin pa med na srung ba gang yin pa dang tha na rgyal po las so /
anyathāsaṃjñino vākyamarthābhijñe mṛṣāvacaḥ / yadi yamarthaṃ bravīti tasminnanyathāsamjñī bhavati yaṃ cādhikṛtya bravīti sa tasya vākyasyārthābhijño bhavati tadvākyaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ
# brdzun tshig 'du shes gzhan bsgyur ba'i / / tshig don mngon par go ba'o / / don smra ba gang yin pa de la 'du shes gzhan du bsgyur la des gang gi dbang du byas nas smras pa'i tshig de'i don yang go na tshig de ni brdzun du smra ba'i yin no /
anabhijñe kiṃ syāt / saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ syāt
# mngon par ma go na cir 'gyur zhe na / / tshig kyal par 'gyur ro /
vākyamityucyate / kadācicca bahavo varṇā vākyaṃ bhavantīti katamaḥ tatra karmapathaḥ
# tshig ces bya ba ni res 'ga' yi ge mang po zhig las tshig tu 'gyur na de la las kyi lam gang zhig yin zhe na /
paścimaḥ sahāvijñaptyā yatra cārthābhijño bhavati / pūrve tu varṇāḥ prayogaḥ
# tha ma rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang bcas pa'o / / yang na gang las don go bar 'gyur ba ste / / yi ge snga ma rnams ni sbyor ba yin no /
arthābhijña ityucyate / ki tāvadabhijñātārthe śrotari āhosvit abhijñātuṃ samarthe / kiṃ cātaḥ / yadyabhijñātārthe manovijñānaviṣayatvādvākyārthasya śrotravijñānena saha nirodhācca vāgvijñapteravijñaptireva syāt karmapathaḥ
# don mngon par go ba zhes bya ba ci re zhig nyan pa pos don mngon par go ba yin nam / / 'on te mngon par go bar nus pa zhig yin / / de las cir 'gyur / / gal te don mngon par go ba yin na ni tshig gi don yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'gags pa'i phyir /
athābhijñātuṃ samarthe / evaṃ doṣo na bhavati / kathaṃ cābhijñātuṃ samartho 'pyutpannabhāva utpanne śrotravijñāne
# rnam par rig byed ma yan pa kho na las kyi lam du 'gyur ro / / 'on te mngon par go bar nus pa ma yin na ni de lta ni nyes par mi 'gyur te / / ji ltar na mngon par go bar nus pa yin zhe na / / skad byang ba dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'o /
yathā na doṣastathā 'stu
# ji ltar nyes pa med pa de lta bu yin no /
ṣodaśa vyavahārāḥ sūtra uktāḥ / adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā aśrute 'mate 'vijñāte vijñātavāditā dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭavāditā yāvad vijñāte 'vijñātavāditā itīme 'nāryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ
# mdo las tha snyad bcu drug gsungs pa la ma mthong ba la mthong zhes smras pa dang ma thos pa dang ma rtogs pa dang rnam par ma shes pa la rnam par shes so zhes smra ba dang mthong ba la ma mthong ngo zhes smra ba dang rnam par shes pa'i bar la rnam par ma shes so zhes smra ba dang brgyad po 'di ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i tha snyad dag yin no /
dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadvijñāte vijñātavāditā adṛṣṭ 'dṛṣṭavāditā yāvadavijñāte avijñātavāditā itīme āryā aṣṭau vyavahārāḥ / tatraiṣāṃ dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātānāṃ kiṃ lakṣaṇam
# mthong ba la mthong ngo zhes smra ba nas rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes so zhes smra ba'i bar dang; ma mthong ba la ma mthong ngo zhes smra ba nas rnam par ma shes so zhes smra ba'i bar brgyad po 'di ni 'phags pa'i tha snyad dag yin no / / de la mthong ba dang thos pa dang rtogs pa dang rnam par shes pa de dag gi mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
cakṣuḥ śrotramanaścittairanubhūtaṃ tribhiśca yat
# mig rna yid kyi rnam shes dang / / gsum gyis nyams su myong gang des /
taddṛṣṭaśrutavijñātaṃ mataṃ coktaṃ yathākramam / yaccakṣurvijñānenānubhūtaṃ taddṛṣṭamityuktam
# mthong thos rnam par shes pa dang / / rtogs pa yin te go rims bshad / / mig gi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni mthong ba zhes bshad do /
yacchrotravijñānena tacchrutam / yanmano vijñānena tat vijñātam / yat ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñānaistanmatam / kiṃ kāraṇam / gandharasaspraṣṭavyānyavyākṛtatvānmṛtakalpāni / ata eteṣu matākhyeti vaibhāṣikāḥ / kimatra jñāpakam / sūtraṃ yuktiśca / sūtraṃ tāvat tatkiṃ manyase māhakīmātaḥ yāni tvayā cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi na dṛṣṭāni na dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi na paśyasi nāpi te evaṃ bhavati paśyeyamiti / api nu te tannidānamutpannaśchando vā rāgo vā sneho vā yena vā ālayo vā nīyatiradhyavasānaṃ vā
# rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni thos pa zhes bshad do / / yid kyi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bshad do / / sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shes pas nyams su myong ba gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa zhes bshad do / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / / dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir shi ba dang 'dra ste / / de'i phyir de dag la ni rtogs pa zhes zer ro / / de'i phyir de dag la ni rtogs pa zhes zer ro / / 'di la khungs ci zhig yod ce na / / mdo dang rigs pa yod de / / re zhig mdo ni mchod byed kyi ma can 'di ji snyam du sems / / gzugs gang dag khyod kyi mig gis ma mthong ste sngon ma mthong zhing mi lta la / / khyod 'di snyam du blta bar bya'o snyam du yang mi sems na / / gzhi de las khyod 'dun pa'am / / 'dod chags sam 'dod pa'am dga' ba'am /
no bhadanta / ye tvayā śrotreṇa śabdā na śrutā na śrutapūrvā vistareṇa yāvanmanasā dharmā na vijñātā vistareṇa yāvanno bhadanta
# chags pa'am / / 'chums pa'am / / lhag par chags pa skye ba'am / / btsun pa ma lags so / / sgra gang dag khyod kyi rna bas ma thos te / / sngon ma thos zhes bya ba dang rgyas par yid kyis chos rnams rnam par ma shes te zhes bya ba nas rgyas par btsun pa ma lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
atra ca te māhakīmātardṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhaviṣyati śrute mate vijñāte vijñātapātramityuktam
# mchod byed kyi ma can khyod 'di la mthong na yang mthong ba tsam du 'gyur la / / thos pa dang rtogs pa dang; rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa tsam du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs ba yin te /
atastriṣu viṣayeṣu dṛṣṭaśrutavijñātaśabdāpadeśādgandhādiṣu matākhyā amyate / ata evaṃ cāniṣyamāṇe dṛṣṭādibhāvabāhyatvāt gandhādiṣu vyavahāro na syādityeṣā yuktiḥ / sūtraṃ tāvajjñāpakamanyārthatvāt
# de'i phyir yul gsum la mthong ba dang thos pa dang rnam par shes pa'i sgras bstan pa'i phyir dri la sogs pa la rtogs zhes bya bar go 'o / / de ltar mi 'dod na mthong ba la sogs pa'i dngos po'i nang du ma gtogs pa'i phyir dri la sogs pa la tha snyad 'dogs par yang mi 'gyur te / / 'di ni rigs pa yin no / / re zhig mdo 'di don gzhan yin pa'i phyir / / khungs ma yin te /
na hyatra sūtre bhagavān vyavahārānāṃ lakṣāṇaṃ śāsti sma
# bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di la tha snyad rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa de ni ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / atra ca te ṣaḍvidhe viṣaye caturṣu vyavahāreṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāramātraṃ bhaviṣyati na priyāpriyanimittādhyāropa ityayamatra sūtrārtho dṛśyate
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / 'dir ni khyod yul rnam pa drug po 'di la mthong ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad bzhi la mthong ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad tsam du 'gyur gyi sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i mtshan mar sgro 'dogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni mdo'i don yin par snang ngo /
kiṃ punarḍṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ ca yāvadvijñātam / kecittāvadāhuḥ / yat pañcabhirindriyaiḥ pratyakṣaṃ taddṛṣṭam
# yang mthong ba ni ci zhig yin / / rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang ci zhig yin zhe na / / re zhig kha cig na re dbang bo lngas mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'o /
yat parata āgamitaṃ tacchrutam
# pha rol las 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa'o /
yat svayaṃ yuktyanumānato rucitaṃ tanmatam
# bdag nyid kyi rigs pas rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa'o /
yanmanaḥpratyakṣabhāvenādhiṣṭitaṃ pratyātmavedyaṃ tadvijñātamiti / ete ca pañca viṣayāḥ pratyekaṃ dṛṣṭā iti vā kṛtvā vyavahrilyante
# yid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa bsgoms na sa rtogs pa so so rang gis rig par bya ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o / / yang yul lnga po 'di dag re re la yang mthong ba'am thos pa'am /
śrutā matā vijñātā iti vā / ṣaṣṭho 'nyatra dṛṣṭāditi nāsti gandhādiṣu vyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ
# rtogs pa'am / / rnam par shes pa yin no zhes tha snyad gdags la / / drug pa la ni mthong ba ma gtogs te / / de ltar na dri la sogs pa la tha snyad 'dogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba yang med de /
tasmādyuktiṃrapyeṣā yuktirna bhavati / pūrvācāryā evamāhuḥ / yad dṛṣṭaṃ yat pratyakṣīkṛtaṃ cakṣuṣā / śrutaṃ yac chrotreṇa parataścākharitam
# de lta bas na rigs pa de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes zer ro / / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams ni 'di skad du / / mig gis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'o / / rna bas thos pa dang pha rol las 'ongs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa'o /
mataṃ yat svayaṃ cintitam
# bdag nyid kyis bsam pa gang yin pa de ni rtogs pa'o /
vijñātaṃ yat pratyātmapratisaṃveditamadhigataṃ cotpannam
# bdag nyid kyis so sor yang dag par rig pa dang rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes zer ro /
prasaṅgena śāstraṃ pravartayatām
# zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so / / bstan bcos la 'jug par bya ste /
yaḥ kāyenānyathātvaṃ prāpyetsyānmṛṣāvādaḥ
# gang zhig lus kyi don gzhan go par byed na brdzun du smra par 'gyur ram zhe na /
syāt / ata evocyate / syiānna kāyena parākrameta prāṇātipātāvadyena ca spṛśyeta
# 'gyur ro / / de nyid kyi phyir / / lus kyis mi byed na srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho pa'i reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na yod do /
syādvācā parākrameta syānna vācā parākrameta mṛṣāvādāvadyena ca spṛśyeta / syāt kāyena parākrameta syānna kāyena na vācā parākrakmeta ubhayāvadyena ca spṛśyeta
# ngag gis byed par 'gyur na'o / / ngag gis mi byed na brdzun gyi kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na yod do / / lus kyis byed par 'gyur na'o / / lus kyis kyang mi byed / / ngag gis kyang mi byed na / / kha na ma tho ba gnyi gas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
syāt ṛśīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣeṇa poṣadhanidarśanaṃ cātreti / yadyubhayathā 'pi na parākrameta na cāvijñaptikāstyavijñaptiḥ kāmāvacarī kathaṃ tayoḥ karmapathaḥ siddhyati / kartavyo 'tra yatnaḥ
# yod de / / 'dir drang srong rnams yid rab tu khros pa dang gso sbyong dper bya'o zhes gsungs so / / gnyi gas yang mi byed na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rnam par rig byed med pa can yang med pas ji ltar na de gnyis kyis las kyi lam du 'grub ste / / 'di la 'bad par bya'o /
gato mṛṣāvādaḥ
# brdzun du smra ba rdzogs so /
paiśunyaṃ kliṣṭacittasya vacanaṃ parabhedane
# phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir / / nyon mongs can gyi sems kyi tshig /
yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāṃ bhedāya vacanamaprītaye tat paiśunyam
# pha rol po dag dbye zhing mi mdza' bar bya ba'i phyir sems kyi nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig gang yin pa de ni phra ma yin te /
arthabhijña iti vartate abhrāntyeti ca
# don mngon par go ba dang ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
pāruṣyamapriyaṃ / vacanat
# tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa /
kliṣṭacittasyeti vartate / arthābhijñe abhrāntyeti ca
# sems nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig dang don mngon par go ba dang ma nor ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yat kliṣṭacittasya pareṣāmapriyavacanamarthābhijñe tatraiva ca yat vivakṣitaṃ tat pāruṣyam
# sems nyon mongs pa can gyis ci'i tshig mi snyan pa pha rol po la smras shing don mngon par go la gang la smra bar 'dod pa de nyid la smra ba gang yin pa de ni tshig rtsub po yin no /
sarvaṃ kliṣṭaṃ bhinna pralāpitā
# nyon mongs can kun kyal pa nyid /
vākyamityadhikāro vartate
# tshig ces bya ba'i dbang du byas par sbyar te /
sarvaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ
# nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig thams cad ni tshig kyal pa yin no /
saiva saṃbhinnapralāpitā / tadyogena hi saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati
# de nyid na ni kyal pa nyid yin te / / de dang ldan pa ni tshig kyal pa can yin no /
ato 'nyat kliṣṭamityanye
# gzhan ni de las gzhan nyon mongs /
ato mṛṣāvādādikādvākkarmaṇo yadanyat kliṣṭaṃ vacanaṃ tatsaṃbhinnapralāpa ityapare
# gzhan dag na re ngag gi las brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa de dag las gzhan pa nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig gang yin pa de ni tshig kyal pa yin no zhes zer te /
lapanāgītanāṭyavat
# kha gsag glu dang zlos gar bzhin /
kuśāstravacca
# bstan bcos ngan bzhin /
tadyathā bhikṣurmithyājīvī lapanāṃ karoti raktāśca kecit gāyanti nāṭacye ca naṭāḥ pareṣāṃ rañjanārthaṃ pralapanti / kukśāstrāṇi ca taddṛṣṭayo 'pi gadanti / evaṃ paridevasaṃgaṇikādikamapi yadanyanmṛṣāvādādibhyaḥ kliṣṭaṃ vākkarma tatsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ
# dper na dge slong log pas 'tsho ba can kha gsag byed pa dang chags pas kha cig glu len pa dang zlos gar mkhan rnams zlos gar gyi tshe gzhan dag mgu bar bya ba'i phyir 'khyal pa dang de'i lta bar gyur nas bstan bcos ngan pa dag gdon pa dang de bzhin du smre sngags 'don pa dang 'du 'dzi'i gtam la sogs pa brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa las gzhan pa nyon mongs pa can gyi tshig gang yin pa de yang tshig kyal pa yin no / / ji ltar na 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe glu yang yod la tshig kyal pa yang ma yin zhe na /
kathaṃ cakravartikāle gītaṃ cāsti na ca saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ / naiṣkramyopasaṃhitāni hi tadānīṃ giyante sma na grāmyarasopasaṃhitāni / tadāpyāvāhavivāhadyabhilāpasadbhāvādasti saṃbhinnapralāpo na karmapatha ityapare
# de'i tshe nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i glu dag blangs kyi stegs sngags dang ldan pa dag ni ma yin no / / gzhan dag na re de'i tshe yang bag ma len pa dang / / bag ma gtong ba la sogs pa'i mngon par brjod pa yod pas tshig kyal pa ni yod mod kyi las kyi lam ni ma yin no zhes zer ro /
abhidhyā tu parasvaviṣamaspṛhā
# brnab sems ni / / log pas gzhan gyi nor la chags /
aho vata yat pareṣāṃ tanmama syāditi parasvebhyo yā viṣameṇānyāyena spṛhā svīkaranecchā balādvā copāyādvā sā 'bhidhyā karmapathaḥ / sarvaiva kāmāvacarī tṛṣṇābhidhyetyapare
# pha rol po dag gi gang yin pa de bdag gi yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam nas gzhan gyi nor dag la mthu'am 'jab bu 'ang rung log par mi rigs pas bdag gi ra byed 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni brnab sems kyi las kyi lam yin no / / gzhan dag na re 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sred pa thams cad brnab sems yin te /
tathā hi nivaraṇādhikāre kāmacchandamadhikṛtyoktaṃ sūtre so 'bhidhyāṃ loke prahāye tyevamādi / yadyapi sarvābhidhyā natu sarvā karmapatha audārikaduṣcaritasaṃgrahādityapare
# 'di ltar sgrib pa'i skabs su 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i dbang du mdzad nas mdo las de 'jig rten na brnab sems spangs te zhes bya ba de la sogs pa gsungs so zhes zer ro / / gzhan dag na re 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang brnab sems kyi las kyi lam yod par 'gyur du 'ong bas /
mā bhūccakravartināmapyuttarakauravānāṃ pābhidhyā karmapatha iti / vyāpādaḥ sattvavidveṣaḥ / sattveṣu vidveṣo vyāpādaḥ parapīḍākārapravṛttaḥ
# gal te thams cad brnab sems yin na yang thams cad las kyi lam ni ma yin te / / nyes par spyad pa che long bsdus pa'i phyir zhes zer ro / / gnod sems sems can la sdang ba / / sems can dag la zhe sdang ba pha rol la gnod pa'i rnam par zhugs pa ni gnod sems yin no /
nāstidṛṣṭiḥ śubhāśubhe
# dge dang mi dge med lta ba /
mithyādṛṣṭiḥ / śubhe cāśubhe ca karmaṇi yā nāstīti dṛṣṭiḥ sā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ / tadyathā nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutaṃ nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamityevamādi yāvanna santi loke 'hanta iti / saiṣā sākalyena karmaphalāryāpavādikā mithyādṛṣṭirbhavati
# log par lta ba yin / / las dge ba dang mi dge ba med do zhes lta ba de ni log par lta ba yin te / / 'di lta ste sbyin pa med do / / mchod sbyin med do / / sbyin sreg med do / / legs par spyad pa med do / / nyes par spyad pa med do zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa nas 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa med do zhes bya ba'i bar las dang 'bras bu dang 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ni ril gyis log par lta ba yin no /
ādimātraṃ tu śloke darśitam
# tshigs su bcad par ni dang po tsam zhig bstan par zad do /
evaṃlakṣaṇā ete daśa karmapathāḥ
# las kyi lam bcu po de dag gi mtshan nyid ni de lta bu yin no /
karmapathā iti ko'rthaḥ / trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca
# las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na / / 'di la / / gsum mam bdun ni las kyang yin /
abhidhyādayo hi trayaḥ karmaṇaḥ panthāna iti karmapathāḥ
# brnab sems la sogs pa gsum ni las kyi lam yin pas las kyi lam dag yin no /
tatsaṃprayogiṇī hi cetanā teṣāṃ vāhena vahati teṣāṃ gatyā gacchati / tadvaśena tathābhisaṃskaraṇāt / sapta tu prāṇātipātādayaḥ karma ca kāyavākkarmatvāt karmaṇaśca panthāna iti karmapathāstatsamutthānacetanāyāstānadhiṣṭhāya pravṛtteriti / karmapathāścakarma ca karmapathāśceti karmapathāḥ
# de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa can gyi sems pa ni de dag gi rgyu bas rgyu ste / / de dag gi dbang gis de bzhin du mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir de dag gi 'gros kyis 'gro'o / / srog gcod pa la sogs pa bdun ni lus dang ngag gi las yin pa'i phyir las kyang yin la las kyi lam yin pas las kyi lam yang yin te / / de dag kun nas slong ba'i sems pa ni de dag la brten nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro / / de ltar na las kyi lam dang las dang las kyi lam yin pas na las kyi lam ste /
asarūpāṇāmapyekaśeṣasiddheḥ
# mi 'dra ba rnams la yang gcig bsdus par 'grub pa'i phyir ro /
evamanabhidhyādayaḥ prāṇātipātaviratyādayaśca jñeyāḥ
# brnab sems med pa la sogs pa dang srog gcod pa spong ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o /
prayogapṛṣṭāni karmāṇi karmapathāḥ yasmāttadarthaṃ tanmūlikā ca teṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ
# ci'i phyir sbyor ba dang mjug dag las kyi lam ma yin zhe na / / 'di ltar de dag gi de'i don dang de'i rtsa ba can du 'jug pa yin no /
yathaudārikaṃ ca grahaṇādityuktaṃ prāk
# sngar yang che long bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bshad pa yang yin no /
yeṣāṃ cotkarṣāpakarṣeṇādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmutkarṣāpakarṣau loke bhavataḥ
# 'jig rten na gang dag 'phel ba dang 'grib pas phyi nang gi dngos pa rnams 'phel ba dang 'grib pa yang yin no /
ye tarhi dārṣṭāntikā abhidhyādīneva manaskarmecchanti teṣāṃ te kathaṃ karmapathāḥ
# 'o na mdo sde pa gang dag brnab sems pa la sogs pa kho na yid kyi las su 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na de dag ji ltar las kyi lam yin zhe na /
ta eva hi praṣṭavyāḥ
# de dag nyid la dris shig /
api tu śakyaṃ vaktuṃ karma ca te panthānaśca sugatidurgatīnāmiti karmapathāḥ
# de lta mod kyi brjod par nus te / / de dag ni bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro rnams kyi las kyang yin la lam yang yin pas las kyi lam yin pa'am /
itaretarāvāhanādvā / ya ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ sarve ete kuśalānāṃ karmaṇāṃ samudācāravirodhinaḥ
# yang na gcig gis gcig 'dren pas na las kyi lam yin no / / mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dge pa'i chos rnams kun tu spyod pa dang 'gal ba yin la /
mūlacchedastvasaddṛṣṭyā / kuśalamūlacchedastu mithyādṛṣṭyā bhavatyadhimātraparipūrṇayā
# med par lta bas rtsa ba gcod / / dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa ni log par lta ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par gcod do /
yattarhi śāstra uktaṃ katamānyadhimātrāṇyakuśalamūlāni
# 'o na ci'i phyir bstan bcos la mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rnams gang dag yin zhe na /
yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kāmavairāgyaṃ cānuprāpnuvan yāni tatprathamata upalikhatīti
# mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod par byed pa dang 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par byed pa na dang po nyid du spong ba dag yin pa'o zhes bshad ce na /
akuśalamūlādhyāhṛtatvāt mithyādṛṣṭesteṣveva tatkarmāpadeśa eṣa kriyate tadyathāgnireva grāmaṃ dahani caurāstu tasyādhyāhārakā iti caurairgrāmo dagdha ityucyate
# log par lta ba mi dge ba'i rtsa bas drangs pa'i phyir de dag kho na la las kyi lam de bstan par mdzad de / / dper na me kho nas grong sreg par byed na rkun po rnams me de 'dren pa byed pa yin pas rkun po rnams kyis grong bsregs so zhes bya ba bzhin no /
katameṣāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ samucchedo bhavati
# dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gcig kun du 'chad par 'gyur zhe na /
kāmāptotpattilābhinām
# 'dod gtogs skyes nas thob pa rnams /
kāmāvacarāṇi kuśalamūlāni samuchidyante
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du 'chad par 'gyur te /
rūpārūpyāvacarairasamanvāgatatvāt / prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ tarhi kathaṃ nīyate / iyatā 'nena pudgalena traidhātukāni kuśalamūlāli samucchinnāni bhavantīti / tatprāptidūrīkaraṇamabhisaṃdhāyaitaduktam / saṃtatestadabhājanatvāpādanāt
# gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dag dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro / / 'o na btags pa las 'di tsam gyis na gang zag 'dis khams gsum pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcad pa yin no zhes ba shad pa ji ltar grangs de ni de'i thob pa thag sring par byed pa las dgongs nas gsungs pa yin te / / rgyud de'i snod ma yin pa nyid du byed pa'i phyir ro /
upapattipratilābhikānyeva ca samucchidyante
# skyes nas thob pa kho na dag kun du chad par 'gyur te /
prāyogikebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ parihīṇatvāt
# sbyor ba las byung ba dag las ni sngar yongs su nyams zin pa'i phyir ro /
kimālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā samucchidyante / phalahetvapavādinyā / yā ca hetumapavadate nāsti sucaritaṃ nāsti duścaritamiti yā ca phalaṃ nāsti sucaritaduścaritānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti
# ci la dmigs pa'i log par lta bas kun du gcod par byed ce na / / rgyu dang 'bras la skur 'debs pa / / legs par spyad pa med do / / nyes par spyad pa med do zhes rgyu la skur pa 'debs pa gang dag yin pa dang legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa med do zhes 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa gang dag yin pa'o /
ānantaryavimuktimārgasthānīye ete ityapare / sāsravālambanayaiva nānāsravālambanayā sabhāgadhātvālambanayaiva ca na visabhāgadhātvālambanayā
# gzhan dag na re de dag ni bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam lta bu yin no zhes zer ro / / kha cig na re zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa kho nas yin gyi zag pa med pa la dmigs pas ni ma yin no / / skal ba mnyam pa'i khams la dmigs pa kho nas yin gyi skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams la ni dmigs pas ni ma yin te /
saṃprayogamātrānuśāyitvena durbalatvādityeke / evaṃ tu varṇayanti
# mtshungs par ldan pa tsam gyi sgo nas rgyas pas nyam chung ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
sarvathā / navaprakārāṇyapi kuśalamūlāni sakṛtsamucchidyante
# 'di skad du kun gyis kha cig na re dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa dgu char yang cig car du 'chad de /
darśanaprahātavyavadityeke
# mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag bzhin no zhes zer ro /
evaṃ tu varṇayanti / kramaśaḥ
# 'di skad du rim gyis zhes brjod de /
navaprakārayā mithyādṛṣṭyā navaprakārāṇi kuśalamūlāni samucchidyante / bhāvanā heyakleśavat yāvadadhimātrādhimātrayā mṛdumṛdūnīti / evamayaṃ granthaḥ pālito bhavati / katamānyaṇusahagatāni kuśalamūlāni / āha
# bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du chen po'i chen pos chung ngu'i chung ngu gcod par byed pa'i bar du log par lta ba rnam pa dgus dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa dgu gcod par byed de / / de ltar na phra mo dang lhan cig tu gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gang zhe na /
yairakuśalamūlaiḥ kuśalāni samucchinnāni sarvapaścāt vijahāti yaiḥ vikīrṇaiḥ samucchinna kuśalamūla iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatīti / asya tarhi granthasya ko nayaḥ / katamānyadhiṃmātrādhimātrāṇyakuśalamūlāni
# dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod par byed pa na thams cad kyi tha mar 'dor ba gang dag yin pa ste / / gang dag med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du 'chad pa zhes bya ba'i grang su 'gro ba yin no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di bskyab pa yin no / / 'o na mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po gang dag yin zhe na /
yairakukśalamūlaiḥ kuśalamūlāni samucchinattīti / samāptimetat saṃdhāyoktam / tainiravaśeṣacchedāt / eko 'pi hi prakāra steṣāmasamucchinnaḥ sarveṣāṃ punarutpattau hetuḥ syāditi
# mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di'i tshul ji lta bu yin zhe na; de dag gis ma lus par gcod pa'i phyir de ni rdzogs pa las dgongs te gsungs pa yin te / / de dag las rnam pa gcig ma chad na yang thams cad skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro /
darśanamārgavadabhyutthānena cchinattītyeke
# kha cig na re mthong ba'i lam bzhin du ma langs par gcod par byed do zhes zer ro /
evaṃ tu varṇayantyubhayatheti / pūrvaṃ saṃvaraṃ vijahāti paścāt kuśalamūlāni samucchinattītyeke / evaṃ tu varṇayanti / yasya cittasya phalasaṃvarastattyāgāttasya tyāga iti
# 'di skad du gnyi gar gcod par byed do zhes brjod do / / kha cig na re sngar sdom pa spangs la phyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod do zhes zer ro / / 'di skad du sdom pa sems gang gi 'bras bu yin pa de gtong ba de yang gtong ngo zhes brjod do /
atha kuśalamūlāni samucchidyante / nṛṣu
# gang du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du gcod ce na /
manuṣyeṣveva nāpāyeṣu / kliṣṭākliṣṭayoḥ prajñayoradṛḍhatvāt / na deveṣu karmaphala pratyakṣatvāt / triṣu dvīpeṣu nottarakurau / apāpāśayatvāt jambūdvīpa evetyapare
# mi'i nang du mi'i nang kho na dag tu gcod kyi ngan song dag na ni ma yin te; shes rab nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dag mi bstan pa'i phyir ro / / lha dag gi nang na yang med de / / las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / gling gsum dag na yod kyi byang gi sgra mi snyan dag na yang med de / / sdig pa'i bsam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
teṣāmayaṃ grantho virudhyate / jāmbūdvīpakaḥ sarvālpairaṣṭābhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ
# gzhan dag na re 'dzam bu'i gling kho na na yod do zhes zer te / / 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad pas nyung na dbang po brgyad dang ldan pa yin te /
evaṃ pūrvavidehako godānīyaka iti / tāni punaḥ / chinatti strī pumān / stri ca samucchinatti puruṣaśca mandacchandavīryaprajñatvāt / na strītyapare
# shar gyi lus 'phags po dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro / / de dag kyang / / skyes pa bud med kyis gcod do / / skyes pa dang bud med kyis kun du gcod par byed de / / gzhan dag na re 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus zhen pa'i phyir bud med kyis ni ma yin no zhes zer te /
ayaṃ grantho virudhyeta / yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgato niyatamasāvaṣṭābhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgata iti / teṣāmapi tṛṣṇācarito na samucchinatti
# gong ma'i dbang po dang ldan pa de dag gdon mi za bar dbang po brgyad dang ldan no zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro / / de dag las kyang sred pa spyad pas ni kun du gcod par mi byed de /
calāśayatvāt / kastarhi / dṛṣṭicaritaḥ
# bsam pa g yo ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'o na ci zhe na / / lta spyad /
dṛḍhagūḍhapāpāśayatvāt / ata eva na śaṇḍādayastṛṣṇācarite pakṣyatvāt
# sdig pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang / / mkhyud pa can yin pa'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir ma ning la sogs pas kyang ma yin te /
āpāyikavacca / kiṃsvabhāvaḥ kuśalamūlasamucchedaḥ / so 'samanvayaḥ / yadā hi kuśalamūlānāṃ prāptirna punarutpadyate aprāptirapyutpadyate
# sred pa'i spyad pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyir dang ngan song bzhin no dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du 'chad pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na / / de ni mi ldan pa'o / / gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thob pa yang mi skye la ma thob pa skye ba ste /
tasminnasamanvāgama utpanne samucchinnāni kuśalamūlānyucyante / teṣāṃ samucchinnānāṃ kathaṃ punaḥ pratisaṃdhiḥ
# mi ldan pa de skyes na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun du chad pa zhes bya'o / / kun du chad pa de dag ji ltar na yang nyid mtshams sbyor zhe na /
saṃdhiḥ kāṅkṣāstidṛṣṭibhyāṃ
# mtshams ni the tshom yod lta bas /
yadā 'sya hetuphale vicikitsā cotpadyate / aṣṭidṛṣṭirvā samyak dṛṣṭirityarthaḥ
# nam zhig 'di la rgyu dang 'bras bu la the tshom skyes pa'am / / yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba'i don te /
tadā punaḥ tatprāptisamutpādāt pratisaṃdhitāni kuśalamūlānyucyante
# yod par lta ba skyes pa de'i tshe yang de'i thob pa kun du spyod pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nying mtshams sbyor zhes bya'o /
navaprakārāṇāṃ yugapat pratisaṃdhānaṃ krameṇa tu saṃmukhībhāva ārogyabalalābhavat
# nying mtshams ni rnam pa dgu cig car du sbyar ba la / / mngon sum du ni rim gyis 'gyur te / / nad med nas stobs rnyed pa bzhin no /
sa punasteṣāṃ pratisaṃdhiḥ
# yang de dag gi nying mtshams sbyor ba ni /
nehānantaryakāriṇaḥ / anyasyaiveha syādānantaryakāriṇastu neha syāt
# mtshams med byed pa 'di las min / / gzhan gyis ni 'di nyid la 'gyur gyi mtshams med par byed pa ni ma yin te /
tameva saṃdhāyoktam abhavyo'yaṃ pudgalo dṛṣṭa eva dharme kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhātuṃ niyatamayaṃ navakebhyaścyavamāno vā upapadyamāno vā kuśalamūlāni pratisaṃdhāsyati iti
# de nyid la dgongs nas / / gang zag 'di ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nying mtshams sbyor ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa ma yin gyi 'di ni nges par dmyal ba dag na 'chi 'pho ba 'am skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te / / skye ba ni srid pa bar ma la gnas pa'o / / 'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho ba la mngon du phyogs pa'o /
upapadyamāno 'ntarābhavasthaścyavamānaścyutyabhimukhastatra punaryo hetubalena samucchinatti sa cyavamānaḥ pratisaṃdadhāti yaḥ pratyayabalena sa upapadyamānaḥ
# de la gang zhig rgyu'i stobs kyis kun du gcod pa de ni 'chi 'pho ba na nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro / / gang zhig rkyen gyi stobs kyis kun du gcod pa de ni skye ba na nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te /
evaṃ yaḥ svabalena parabalena / punarāha / ya āśayavipannaḥ samucchinatti sa dṛṣṭe dharme pratisaṃdadhāti
# rang gi stobs kyis gcod pa gang yin pa dang gzhan gyi stobs kyis gcod pa gang yin pa de dang 'dra'o / / yang smras pa / / gang zhig bsam pa nyams pas kun du gcod par byed pa de ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro /
ya āśayaprayogavipannaḥ sa bhedātkāyasyeti / evaṃ yo dṛṣṭivipanno dṛṣṭi śīlavipanna iti / syātsamucchinna kuśalamūlo na mithyātvaniyata iti / catuṣkoṭikam
# gang zhig bsam pa dang sbyor ba nyams pas gcod par byed pa de ni lus zhig nas nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te / / lta ba nyams pa gang yin pa dang lta ba dang tshul khrims nyams pa gang yin pa de yang de dang 'dra'o / / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du 'chad pa yin la log pa nyid du nges pa ma yin pa yang yod ces bya ba mu bzhi ste /
prathamā koṭiḥ pūraṇādayaḥ
# mu dang po ni rdzogs byed la sogs pa'o /
dvitīyā 'jātaśatruḥ
# gnyis pa ni ma skyes dgra'o /
tṛtīyā devadattaḥ
# gsum pa ni lha sbyin no /
caturthyetānākārān sthāpayitvā / kuśalamūlasamucchedikāyā mithyādṛṣṭeravīcau vipākaḥ / ānantaryakāriṇāṃ tu tatra vā 'nyatra vā narake
# bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o / / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du gcod par byed pa'i log par lta ba'i rnam par smin pa ni mnar med pa yin no /
karmapathaprasaṅga evāyaṃ vartate
# mtshams med par byed pa rnams kyis ni der ram gzhan gyi nang du'o /
tatra vaktavyaṃ katibhiḥ karmapathaiḥ saha cetanā yugapadutpannā vartata iti
# 'di ni las kyi skabs yin pas de la las kyi lam du zhig dang sems pa lhan cig tu 'byung bar 'gyur par brjod par bya ste /
yugapadyāvadaṣṭābhiraśubhaiḥ saha vartate / cetanā / ekena tāvatsaha vartate / vinā 'nyenābhidhyādisaṃmukhībhāve akliṣṭacetaso vā tatprayogeṇa rūpiṇāmanyatamaniṣṭhāgamane
# mi dge brgyad kyi bar dag dang / / sems pa cig car lhan cig 'byung / / re zhig sems pa gcig dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni gzhan med par brnab sems la sogs par mngon du 'gyur ba'am /
dvabhyāṃ saha vartate / vyāpannacittasya prāṇivadhe abhidhyāviṣṭasya vā 'dattādāne kāmamithyācāre saṃbhinnapralāpe vā
# sems pa nyon mongs pa can / / de'i sbyor bas gzugs can rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig mthar phyin par byed na'o / / gnyis dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba ni gnod sems su 'gyur ba srog gcod pa dang brnab sems dang ldan pa ma byin par len pa'am / / 'dod pas log par g yem pa'am /
tribhiḥ saha vartate
# tshig kyal pa smra na'o /
vyāpannacittasya parakīya prāṇimāraṇāpaharaṇe yugapat
# gsum dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba na brnab sems dang ldan pa cag car du gzhan gyis srog chags bsad pas 'phrog na'o /
na tarhīdānīmadattādānasya lobhenaiva niṣṭā sidhyati
# 'o na ni de chags pa kho nas ma byin par len pa mthar phyin par byed pa mi 'grub pa ma yin nam zhe na /
ananyacittasya tatsamāptau sa niyamo jñeyaḥ
# nges pa de ni sems gzhan dang mi ldan pa'i de rdzogs pa la shes par bya'o /
abhidhyādyāviṣṭasya ca tatprayogeṇa rūpidvayaniṣṭhāgamane tribhireva
# brnab sems mngon sum du gyur pa de'i sbyor bas gzugs can gnyis mthar phyin par byed na yang gsum kho na dang lhan cig 'byung ngo /
caturbhiḥ saha vartate / bhedābhiprāyasyānṛta vacane paruṣavacane vā / tatra himānasa eko bhavati vācikāstrayaḥ
# bzhi dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dbye na bya ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa brdzun gyi tshig gam tshig rtsub po smra na ste / / de la ni yid kyi gcig yin la ngag gi gsum yin no /
abhidhyādigatasya vā tatprayogeṇā nyarūpitraya niṣṭhāgamane / evaṃ paṇcaṣaṭsaptabhiryo jayitavyā
# yang na brnab sems la sogs par gyur pa de'i sbyor bas gzhan gsum mthar phyin par byed na ste / / lnga dang drug dang bdun dang yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o /
aṣṭābhiḥ saha vartate / ṣaṭsu prayoggaṃ kṛtvā svayaṃ kāmabhithyācāraṃ kurvataḥ samaṃ niṣṭhāgamane
# brgyad dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni brnab sems la sogs pa mngon du gyur pa kho na drug la sbyor ba byas nas 'dod pas log par g yem pa dag nyid kyis byed la mnyam du mthar phyin par 'gyur na'o /
evaṃ tāvadakuśalaiḥ / daśabhiryāvacchubhaiḥ
# re zhig mi dge ba dag dang ni de lta bu yin no / / dge ba bcu yi bar dag dang /
kuśalaiḥ punaḥ karmapatharyāvat daśabhiḥ saha cetanā vartata ityutsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti
# dge ba'i las kyi lam dag ni bcu'i bar dang sems pa lhan cig 'byung ngo zhes spyir bstan nas dmigs kyis ston par byed de /
naikāṣṭapañcabhiḥ / ekenāṣṭābhi pañcabhiśca karmapathaiḥ saha na vartate
# gcig dang brgyad dang lnga dang min / / las kyi lam gcig dang brgyad dang lnga dang lhan cig tu mi 'byung ngo /
tatra dvābhyāṃ saha vartate / kuśaleṣu pañcasu vijñāneṣu / ārūpyasamāpattau ca kṣayānutpādajñānayoḥ
# de la gnyis dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni de dag rnam par shes pa lnga la gnas pa ni / / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i gnas pa'o /
tribhiḥ samyagdṛṣṭisaṃprayukte manovijñāne / caturbhirakuśalāvyākṛtacittasyo pāsakaśrāmaṇerasaṃvarasamādāne / ṣaḍbhiḥ kuśaleṣu pañcaṣu vijñānakāyeṣu tatsamādāne / saptabhiḥ kuśale manovijñāne tatsamādāna eva akuśalāvyākṛtacittasya ca bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāne
# gsum dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'o / / bzhi dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge tshul gyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa na'o / / drug dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba'i rnam par shes pa lnga la gnas pa de yang dag par len pa na'o /
navabhiḥ kuśaleṣu pañcaṣu vijñāneṣu / tatsamādāne kṣayānutpādajñānasaṃprayukte ca manovijñāne tasminneva ca dhyānasaṃgṛhīte / daśabhistato 'nyatra kuśale manovijñāne bhikṣusaṃvarasamādāna eva / sarvā ca dhyānānāsrava saṃvarasahavartinī cetanā 'nyatra kṣayānutpādajñānābhyām saṃvaranirmuktena tvekenāpi saha syādanya cittasyaikāṅgaviratisamādāne / pañcāṣṭābhirapi syātkuśale manovijñāne dvipañcāṅgasamādāne yugapat / kasyāṃ gatau kati karmapathā akuśalā kuśalā vā saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamato vā
# bdun dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas te de kho na yang dag par len pa dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa na'o / / dgu dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni dge ba'i rnam par shes pa lnga la gnas pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa de yang dag par len pa dang de nyid bsam gtan gyis bsdus pa la gnas pa bcu dang lhan cig 'byung ba ni de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas pa dge slong gi sdom pa yang dag par len pa kho na dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag kho na ma gtogs pa bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i sems pa thams cad yin no / / sdom pa ma gtogs par ni gcig dang lhan cig 'byung ba yang yod de / / sems gzhan dang ldan pa spong ba'i yan lag gcig yang dag par len pa na'o / / lnga dang brgyad dang lhan cig 'byung ba yang yod de / / dge ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa cig car du yan lag gnyis dang lnga yang dag par len pa na'o / / 'gro ba gang na dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las kyi lam du zhig mngon sum du gyur pa'am ldan pa'i sgo nas yod ce na /
bhinnapralāpapāruṣyavyāpādā narake dvidhā
# dmyal ba na ni kyal pa dang / / tshig rtsub gnod sems rnam gnyis so /
ityete trayaḥ karmapathā narake dvābhyāṃ saprakārābhyāṃ santi / saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamabhāvataśca
# dmyal ba na ni las kyi lam 'di gsum mngon sum du gyur pa dang ldan pa dang rnam pa gnyi ga'i sgo nas yod de /
paridevanātsaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ
# smre sngags 'don pa'i phyir tshig kyal pa yin no /
parasparaparitāpanātpāruṣyaṃ rukṣasaṃtānatayā
# phan tshun brgyad gags byed pa'i phyir tshig rtsub po yin no /
parasparadveṣādvyāpādaḥ / samanvāgamato 'bhidhyāmithyādṛṣṭī
# gcig la gcig sems kyi rgyud rtsub pos zhe sdang ba'i phyir gnod sems yin no / / brnab sems log lta ldan pas so /
na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ / rañjanīyavastvabhāvātkarmaphalapratyakṣatvācca
# chags par bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i phyir dang las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur ba'i phyir mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas ni med do /
karmakṣayeṇa maraṇānna prāṇātipātaḥ / dravyastrīparigrahābhāvānnadattādānakāmamithyācārau prayojanābhāvānna mṛṣāvādaḥ / ata eva na paiśunyaṃ nityabhinnatvācca
# las zad nas 'chi ba'i phyir dang rdzas dang bud med yongs su gzung ba med pa'i phyir srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g yem pa dag med do / / dgos pa med pa'i phyir brdzun du smra ba med do / / de nyid kyi phyir dang rtag tu byed zin pa'i phyir phra ma med do /
kurau trayaḥ / samanvāgamata iti vartate
# sgra mi snyan na gsum yod do / / brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba dag ste /
abhidhyāvyāpādamithyādṛṣṭayo na saṃmukhībhāvataḥ / amamāparigrahatvāt snigdha saṃtānatvādāghātavastvabhāvādapāpāśayatvācca
# ldan pa'i sgo nas yod par sbyar gyi nga yir 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir dang rgyud 'jam pa'i phyir dang kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir dang sdig pa can gyi bsam pa ma yin pa'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas ni med do /
saptamaḥ svayamapyatra / asaṃbhinnapralāpaḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pyasti
# de na bdun pa dngos su yang / / de na tshig kyal pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas yang yod de /
te hi kliṣṭacittāḥ kadācit gāyanti / apāpāśayatvāt na prāṇatipātādayaḥ / niyatāyuṣkatvāddravyastrīparigrahābhāvāt prayojanābhāvācca
# nyon mongs pa can gyi sems su gyur pa de dag ni res 'ga' glu dag len to / / sdig pa can gyi bsam pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang tshe nges pa'i phyir dang rdzas dang bud med yongs su gzung ba med pa'i phyir dang dgos pa med pa'i phyir srog gcod pa la sogs pa med do /
kathameṣāmabrahmacaryam
# ji ltar 'di dag mi tshangs par spyod pa yin zhe na /
te khalu yayā striyā sārdhaṃ rantukāmā bhavanti tāṃ bāhau gṛhītvā vṛkṣamūlamupasarpanti
# de dag ni bud med gang dag lhan cig dga' bar 'dod pa de'i lag nas gzung nas zhing gi drung du 'gro ste /
gamyā cet vṛkṣaśchādayati tāṃ te gacchanti
# gal te bgrod par bya ba zhig yin na ni shing gis sgrib par byed pas de dag de la nyal po byed do /
agamyā cenna chādayati tāṃ te na gacchanti / kāme 'nyatra daśāśubhāḥ
# ci ste bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa zhig yin na ni sgrib par mi byed pas ni de dag de la nyal po mi byed do / / 'dod pa gzhan na mi dge bcu /
svayamapīti vartate / narakottarakurubhyāmanyatra kāmadhātau daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi vidyante
# dngos su yang yod ces bya bar sbyar te / / dmyal ba dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dag las gzhan pa'i 'dod pa'i khams na ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu mngon sum du 'gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang yod de /
tiryakpretadeveṣvasaṃvaranirmuktāḥ / manuṣyeṣvasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītā api / yadyapi devo devaṃ na mārayati anyagatisthaṃ tu mārayati / devā api śiromadhyacchedāt bhriyanta ityapare
# dud 'gro dang yi dags dang lha dag gi nang na ni sdom pa ma yin pa ma gtogs so / / mi dag gi nang na ni sdom pa ma yin pas bsdus pa yang yod do / / gal te yang lhas lha mi gsod kyang 'gro ba gzhan na gnas na ni gsod par byed do / / gzhan dag na re lha yang mgo dang rked pa bcad na 'chi'o zhes zer ro /
uktā aśubhāḥ / śubhāstrayastu sarvatra saṃmukhībhāva lābhataḥ
# mi dge ba rnams bshad zin to / / dge ba gsum ni thams cad na / / rnyed dang mngon du gyur sgo nas /
pañcasu gatiṣu traidhātuke sarvatrānabhidhyā 'vyāpādasamyagdṛṣṭyaḥ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ samanvāgamataśca vidyante
# brnab sems med pa dang gnod sems med pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba rnams ni khams gsum po thams cad na / / 'gro ba lnga char du ni mngon du gyur pa dang ldan pa'i sgo nas yod do /
ārupyāsaṃjñisattveṣu lābhataḥ sapta / kāyikavācikāḥ sapta kuśalā ārūpyeṣvasaṃjñisattveṣu samanvāgamata eva / ārūpyoopapannānāmāryāṇāmatītānāgatānāsravasaṃvarasamanvāgamāt / asaṃjñisattvānāṃ ca dhyānasaṃvarasamanvāgamāt
# gzugs med 'du shes med sems can / / rnyed pa bdun yod / / gzugs med pa dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dag na ni lus dang ngag gi dge ba'i las kyi lam bdun ldan pa'i sgo kho na nas yod de / / gzugs med par skyes pa'i 'phags pa rnams la zag pa med pa'i sdom pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang ldan pa'i phyir dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
yadbhūmyā śrayamāryeṇānāsravaṃ śīlamutpāditaṃ nirodhitaṃ bhavati tenārūpyeṣvatītena samanvāgato bhavati
# gzugs med pa dag na 'phags pas gang la brten pa can gyi zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bskyed de 'gag pa ni 'das pa de dang ldan no /
pañca bhūmyāśrayeṇa tvanāgatena / śeṣite / saṃmukhībhāvataścāpi hitvā sanarakān kurun
# sa lnga char la brten pa can dang ma 'das pa dang ldan no / / lhag par byas na mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang /
śesaḥ kṛtaḥ śeṣitaḥ
# dmyal bcas sgra mi snyan ma gtogs /
yo 'nyo dhātuḥ śeṣito gatirvā / tatraite sapta kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃmukhībhāvato 'pi saṃvidyante 'nyatra narakottarakurubhyaḥ
# lhag mar byas pas na lhag byas te lhag mar byas pas ni khams sam 'gro ba gzhan gang yin pa'o / / dmyal ba dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa dag ma gtogs pa de na ni dge ba'i las kyi lam bdun po 'di dag mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang yod de /
te punastiryakpreteṣu saṃvaranirmuktā rūpadhātau tu saṃvarasaṃgṛhītā anyatrobhayathā / ta ete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ kuśalāśca
# de dag kyang dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi nang dag na ni sdom pas bsdus pa ma gtogs pa rnams so / / gzugs kyi khams na ni sdom pas bsdus pa rnams so / / gzhan na ni gnyis ga yod do / / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po 'di dag ni /
sarve 'dhipatiniṣyandavipākaphaladā matāḥ
# thams cad bdag po rgyu mthun dang / / rnam smin 'bras bu 'byin par 'dod /
akuśalaistāvatsarvairevāsevitabhāvitabahulīkṛtaiḥ narakeṣrapapadyate / tadeṣāṃ vipākaphalam
# re zhig mi dge ba kun du bstan pa dang goms par byas pa dang lan mang du byas pa thams cad kyis ni dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur te / / 'di ni de dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yin no /
sa ceditthaṃ tvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ praṇātipātenālpāyurbhavati adattādānena bhogavyasanī bhavatikāmamithyācārena sa saṃpannadāraḥ mṛṣāvādenābhyākhyānabahulaḥ paiśunyena mitrabhedo 'sya bhavati pāruṣyeṇāmanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpenānādeyavākyaḥ abhidhyayā tīvrarāgaḥ vyāpādena tīvradveṣaḥ mithyādṛṣṭyā tīvramohaḥ
# brgya la 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'ongs na yang srog gcod pas ni tshe thung bar 'gyur ro / / ma byin par len pas ni longs spyod kyis phongs par 'gyur ro / / 'dod pas log par g yem pas ni dgra dang bcas pa'i chung ma can du 'gyur ro / / brdzun du smra bas ni skur ba mang por 'gyur ro / / phra mas ni de mdza' bo dang 'byed par 'gyur ro / / tshig rtsub pos ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro / / tshig kyal pas ni tshig gzung bar mi 'os par 'gyur ro / / brnab sems kyis ni 'dod chags shas che bar 'gyur ro / / gnod sems kyas ni zhe sdang shas che bar 'gyur ro / / log par lta bas ni gti mug shas che bar 'gyur te /
tasyā mohabhūyastvāt
# de la ni gti mug mang po'i phyir ro /
idameṣāṃ niḥṣyandaphalam
# 'di ni de dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no /
alpamapyāyurmanuṣyeṣu kuśalaphalam / tat kathaṃ prāṇātipātasya niḥṣyandaphalaṃ bhavati / nocyate tadevāyustasya phalam
# ma dag gi nang na tshe thung ba yang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yin na de ji ltar srog gcod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin zhe na / / tshe de nyid de'i 'bras bu yin no zhes ni mi zer ro /
kiṃ tarhi
# 'o na ci zhe na /
tenālpāyurbhavatīti / ato 'ntarāyahetuḥ prāṇāti pātastasyāyuṣo bhavatīti veditavyam
# des tshe thung ngur 'gyur bas de'i phyir srog gcod pa ni tshe de'i bar chad byed pa'i phyir rgyu yin par rig par bya'o /
prāṇātīpātenātyāsevitena bāhyā bhāvā alpaujaso bhavantīti / adattādānenāśanirajobahulāḥ kāmamithyācāreṇa rajo 'vakīrṇāḥ mṛṣāvādena durgandhāḥ paiśunyenotkūlanikūlāḥ pāruṣyeṇoparajāṅgalā pratikuṣṭāḥ pāpabhūmayaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpena viṣamartupariṇāmāḥ abhidhyayā śuṣkaphalāḥ vyāpādena kaṭukaphalā mithyādṛṣṭyā 'lpaphalā aphalā vā / idameṣāmadhipatiphalam
# srog gcod pa ha cang kun du bsten pas ni phyi'i dngos po rnams gzi mthu chung bar 'gyur ro / / ma byin par len pas ni ser ba dang char ba mang bar 'gyur ro / / 'dod pas log par g yem pas ni rngul gyis 'khrig par 'gyur ro / / brdzun du smra bas ni dring bar 'gyur ro / / phra mas ni mthon dman can du 'gyur ro / / tshig rtsub pos ni sa tshva sgo can dang dgon dung dang tha chad dang sdig pa can gyi sar 'gyur ro / / tshig kyal pas ni dus log pa can du 'gyur ro / / brnab sems kyis ni 'bras bu phra mor 'gyur ro / / gnod sems kyis ni 'bras bu kha bar 'gyur ro / / log par lta bas ni 'bras bu chung ngu'am 'bras bu med par 'gyur te / / 'di ni de dag gi bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no /
kiṃ tenaiva karmaṇā 'yamihālpāyurbhavatyathānyena
# ci las de kho nas de 'dir tshe thung ngur 'gyur ram / / 'on te gzhan zhig gis she na /
tenevetyeke / tadvipākaphalamidaṃ niṣyandaphalamiti / tatra prayogeṇeha maulelnetyeke
# kha cig na re de kho nas te / / de ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yin la 'di ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes zer ro / / gzhan dag na re der ni sbyor bas yin la /
pare saparivāragrahaṇāttu prāṇātipātenetyuktamiti / yadapyetanniḥṣyandaphalamuktaṃ naitaddvayamativartate vipākaphalamadhipatiphalaṃ ca
# 'dir ni dngos kyis yin te / / 'khor dang bcas pa smos pa'i phyir srog gcod pas zhes gsungs par zad do zhes zer ro / / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur bshad pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dang gnyis po 'di las ni mi 'da'i /
sādṛśyaviśeṣāttu tathoktam / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇameṣāṃ karmapathānāmetattrividhaphalamabhinivartate
# 'dra ba'i khyad par las de skad du bshad par zad do / / yang ci'i phyir las kyi lam 'di dag gis 'bras bu rnam pa gsum mngon par 'grub ce na /
prāṇātipātaṃ hi tāvatkurvatā māryamāṇasya duḥkhamutpāditaṃ māritamojo nāśimato 'sya
# re zhig srog gcod par byed pas ni gsad par bya ba sdug bsngal bskyed pa dang gsad pa dang gzi byin med par bya bas yin te / / de nyid kyi phyir 'di /
duḥkhanānmāraṇādojonāśanāttrividhaṃ phalam
# sdug bsngal phyir dang gsad phyir dang / / gzi byin med phyir 'bras rnam gsum /
parasya duḥkhanādvipākaphalena narake duḥkhito bhavati
# pha rol po sdug bsngal bar byas pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bus dmyal ba dag tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro /
māraṇanniḥṣyandaphalenālpāyurbhavati
# gsad pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus tshe thung ngur 'gyur ro /
ojonāśanādadhipati phalenālpaujaso bāhyā auṣadhayo bhavanti
# gzi byin med par byas pa'i phyir bdag po'i 'bras bus phyi'i sman rnams gzi mthu chung bar 'gyur te /
evamanyeṣvapi yojyam / evaṃ kuśalānāmapi karmapathānāṃ phalatrayaṃ veditavyam prāṇātipātaviratyā āsevitayā bhāvitayā bahulīkṛtayā deveṣupapadyate
# gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o / / dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi 'bras bu gsum yang de bzhin du rig par bya ste / / srog gcod pa spong ba kun tu bsten pa dang goms par byas pa dang lan mang du byas pas ni lha dag gi nang du skyes par 'gyur ro /
sa ceditthantvamāgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāṃ dīrghāyurbhavatītyakuśalaviparyayeṇa sarvaṃ yojayitavyam
# brgya la 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'ongs na yang tshe ring por 'gyur te / / thams cad mi dge ba las bzlog ste sbyar bar bya'o /
yadbhagavatā mithyāvāṃimathyākarmānto mithyājīva ityuktaṃ ko 'yamanyastābhyāṃ mithyājīvaḥ / nāyamanyo 'sti / tadeva tu / lobhajaṃ kāyavākkarma mithyājīvaḥ
# bcom ldan 'das kyis log pa'i ngag dang log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang log pa'i 'tsho ba zhes gang gsungs pa de gnyis las gzhan pa'i log pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhig yin zhe na / / 'di gzhan ni med kyi de nyid yin te / / lus dang ngag las chags las skyes / / log 'tsho /
dveṣamohajau tu kāyavākkarmāntau / sa caiṣa tābhyāṃ / pṛthak kṛtaḥ / duḥśodhatvāt / hārī hi lobhadharmaḥ / tatsamutthāt karmaṇaścittaṃ na surakṣyam
# lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' zhe sdang las skyes pa dang gti mug las skyes pa ni log pa'i ngag dang log pa'i las kyi mtha' yin no / / de ni sbyang dka'i phyir / / de gnyis las logs shig tu bstan to / / chags pa'i chos ni 'phrog par byed pa yin pas des kun nas bslang ba'i las las sems bsrung bar sla ba ma yin te /
ata ājīvo duḥkhaśodha ityādarotpādanārthaṃ tatrāsau pṛthagnirdiṣṭaḥ / āha cātra
# de'i phyir ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sbyang dka' bas bsgrim par bya ba'i phyir de ni der logs shig tu bstan to / / 'dir smras pa /
duḥśodhā gṛhiṇāṃ dṛṣṭirnityaṃ vividhadṛṣṭinā
# rtag tu lta ba sna tshogs kyis / / khyim pas lta ba sbyang bar dka' /
ājīvo bhikṣuṇā caiva pareṣvāyattadṛṣṭineti
# gzhan la 'tsho ba rag lus pa'i / / dge slong gis ni 'tsho bar dka' /
pariṣkāralobhotthaṃ cet
# gal te yo byad la / / chags bslang /
yo manyate jīvitpariṣkāralobhotthameva kāyavākkarma mithyājīvonānyat
# gang zhig 'tsho ba'i yo byad la / / chags pas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las kho na log pa'i 'tsho ba yin gyi / / gzhan ni ma yin te /
nahyātmaratinimittaṃ nṛttagītādi ājīvayoga iti tat / na sūtrataḥ / śīlaskandhikāyāṃ hi bhagavatā hastiyuddha darśanādīnyapi mithyājīve nyastāni
# bdag dga' bar bya ba'i ched du gar dang glu len pa la sogs pa ni log pa'i 'tsho ba yin par mi rigs so snyam du sems pa de ni / / mdo dang 'gal phyir min / / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po'i mdo las glang po che 'thab pa la lta ba la sogs pa la yang log pa'i 'tsho ba gzhag ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
kiṃ kāraṇam / mithyaviṣayaparibhogāt / gatametat
# log pa'i yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ro / / 'di ni rdzogs so /
yāni pūrvaṃ pañca phalānyuktāni teṣāṃ katamat karma katibhiḥ phalaiḥ prahāṇam
# gong du 'bras bu lnga bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag las las gang zhig 'bras bu du zhig 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin zhe na /
prahāṇamārge samale saphalaṃ karma pañcabhiḥ / prahāṇārthaṃ mārgaḥ prahīyante vā 'nena kleśā iti prahāṇamārgaḥ ānantaryamārgaḥ
# drir bcas spong ba'i lam dag gis / / las ni lnga yi 'bras bur bcas / / spong ba'i phyir lam yin pa'am / / 'dis nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pas spong ba'i lam ste / / bar chad med pa'i lam yin no /
tasminsāsrave yat karma tat pañcabhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalam
# zag pa dang bcas pa de'i las gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu lngas 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te /
tasya hi vipākaphalaṃ svabhūmāviṣṭo vipākaḥ / niḥṣyandaphalaṃ samādhijā uttare sadṛśā dharmāḥ
# de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rang gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba yin no / / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i chos 'dra ba phyi ma rnams so /
visaṃyogaphalaṃ visaṃyoga eva
# bral ba'i 'bras bu ni bral ba kho na yin te /
yattat prahāṇam
# spangs pa gang yin pa de yin no /
puruṣakāraphalaṃ tadākṛṣṭā dharmastadyathā 'dhimuktimārgastatsahabhuvaśca / yaccānāgataṃ bhāvyate tacca prahāṇam / adhipatiphalaṃ svabhāvādanye sarvasaṃskārāḥ pūrvotpannavarjyāḥ / caturbhiramale
# skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni des drang pa'i chos 'di lta ste / / rnam par grol ba'i lam dang de dag lhan cig 'byung ba dang gang yang ma 'ongs pa thob pa dang spangs pa de yang yin no / / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba rnams ma gtogs pa rang gi ngo bo las gzhan pa'i 'du byed thams cad do / / dri med bzhi yis /
anāsrave prahāṇamārge yatkarma taccaturbhiḥ phalaiḥ saphalaṃ vipākaphalaṃ hitvā
# spong ba'i lam zag pa med pa'i las gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu bzhis 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te / / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
anyacca sāsravaṃ yacchubhāśubham
# zag bcas gzhan / / dge dang mi dge gang yin pa'ang /
yaccānyat prahāṇamārgātsāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karmaṃ yaccākuśalaṃ tadapi caturbhirvisaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā / anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣāṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat
# spong ba'i lam las gzhan pa'i las dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa dang mi dge ba gang yin pa de yang 'bras bu bzhis 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te / / bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so / / zag pa med pa lhag ma dang lung stan min gang gsum gyis so /
prahāṇamārgādanyadanāsravaṃ karma avyākṛtaṃ ca karma tribhirvipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā / catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ
# spong pa'i lam las gzhan pa'i las zag pa med pa dang lung du ma bstan pa'i las gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu gsum gyi 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te / / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / / dge ba'i dge la sogs pa ni / / bzhi dang gnyis dang de bzhin gsum /
anukramamiti paścādvakṣyati
# rim pa bzhin no zhes 'og nas 'chad do; /
kuśalsya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmāścatvāri phalāni vipākaphalaṃ hitvā
# las dge ba'i 'bras bu chos dge ba ni bzhi ste / / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
akuśalā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale / avyākṛtā strīṇi niḥṣyandavisaṃyogaphale hitvā
# mi dge ba gnyis te / / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dang lung du ma bstan pa gsum ste / / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
aśubhasya śubhādyā dve trīṇi catvāryanukramam
# mi dge'i dge sogs gnyis dang ni / / gsum dang bzhi ste rim pa bzhin /
yathākramamityarthaḥ / akuśalasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale
# go rims ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i tha tsheg ste / / las mi dge ba'i 'bras bu chos dge ba gnyis te / / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
akuśalāstrīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā
# mi dge ba ni gsum ste / / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
avyākṛtāścatvāri visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā
# lung du ma bstan pa ni bzhi ste bral ba ma gtogs so /
avyākṛte hi satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī akuśalānāṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ duḥkhadarśana heyānāṃ ca niḥṣyandaphalam
# lung du ma bstan pa 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dag ni mi dge ba kun tu 'gro ba rnams dang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no /
avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇi caite śubhādayaḥ
# lung bstan min gyi dge la sogs / / de dag gnyis dang gsum dang gsum /
avyākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kuśalā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphalel
# las lung du ma bstan pa'i 'bras bu chos dge ba gnyis te / / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
akuśalāḥ trīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā
# mi dge ba ni gsum ste / / bral ba dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bum gtogs so /
akuśalā hi duḥkhadarśanādiheyā avyākṛtayordṛṣṭyoniḥrṣyandaphalam / avyākṛtā dharmā etānyeva trīṇi
# sdug bsngal la sogs pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i mi dge ba rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i lta ba gnyis kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no / / lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni gsum ste / / rgyu de dag kho na yin no /
sarve 'tītasya catvāri
# 'das pa'i thams cad bzhi yin no /
sarva iti traiyadhvikāḥ / atītasya karmaṇastraiyadvikāḥ dharmāścatvāri phalāni
# thams cad ces bya ba ni dus gsum pa rnams te / / 'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu dus gsum pa'i chos ni bzhi ste /
visaṃyogaphalalṃ hitvā / madhyamasyāpyanāgatāḥ / pratyutpannasyāpi karmaṇo 'nāgatā dharmāścatvāti phalānyetānyeva / madhyamā dve
# bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so / / bar ma yi ni ma 'ongs pa'ang / / da ltar byung ba'i las kyi 'bras bu chos ma 'ongs pa yang bzhi ste / / de dag nyid do / / bar ma gnyis so /
pratyutpannā dharmāḥ pratyupannasya dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale
# da ltar byung ba'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba'i chos ni gnyis te / / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
ajātasya phalāni triṇyanāgatāḥ / anāgatasyānāgatāni trīṇi phalāni
# ma skyes pa'i / / 'bras bu ma 'ongs gsum yin no / / ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa'i chos ni gsum ste /
niḥṣyandavisaṃyogaphale hitvā / svabhūmidharmāścatvāri / svabhūmikasya karmaṇaḥ svabhūmikā dharmāścatvāri phalāni visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā / trīṇi dve vā 'nyabhūmikāḥ / anyabhūmikā dharmā anāsravāścet trīṇi phalāni
# rgyu mthun pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / / rang gi sa pa yin no / / rang gi sa pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rang gi sa ba'i chos ni bzhi ste / / bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so / / gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang gnyis / / gal te gzhan gyi sa pa'i chos zag pa med pa zhig yin na ni 'bras bu gsum ste /
vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā
# rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
dhātvapatitatvāt
# khams gsum ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro /
sāsravāścet dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale / śaikṣasya trīṇi śaikṣādyāḥ
# gal te zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na ni gnyis te / / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go / / slob pa'i slob pa sogs pa gsum /
śaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā / aśaikṣā apyevam
# slob pa'i las kyi 'bras bu slob pa'i chos ni gsum ste / / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / / mi slob pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā api vipākaniḥṣyandaphale hitvā / aśaikṣasya tu karmaṇaḥ / dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam
# slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa yang gsum ste / / rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / / mi slob las kyi 'bras bu ni / / slob pa yi ni chos la sogs / / gcig dang gsum dang gnyis yin no /
aśaikṣasya karmaṇaḥ śaikṣā dharmāḥ ekamadhipatiphalam
# mi slob pa'i las kyi 'bras bu slob pa'i chos ni gcig ste / / bdag po'i 'bras bu'o /
aśaikṣāstrīṇi vipākavisaṃyogaphale hitvā
# mi slob pa ni gsum ste / / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale / tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca
# slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa ni gnyis te / / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go / / de las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu ni / / slob sogs gnyis dang gnyis dang lnga /
śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāmanyasya karmaṇo naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣasya śaikṣā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale / aśaikṣā apyevam
# slob pa dang mi slob pa dag las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / / slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i las kyi 'bras bu slob pa'i chos ni gnyis te; skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go / / mi slob pa'ang de dang 'dra'o /
naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣāḥ pañca phalāni / trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛgdheyasya tadādayaḥ
# slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa ni 'bras bu lnga char yin no / / mthong bas spang bya'i de la sogs / / gsum dang bzhi dang gcig yin no /
darśanaheyasya karmaṇodarśanaheyā dharmāstrīṇi phalāni vipākavisaṃyogaphalehitvā
# mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos ni gsum ste / / rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
bhāvanāheyāścatvāri visaṃyogaphalaṃ hitvā
# bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni bzhi ste / / bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so /
apraheyā ekamadhipatiphalam / te dve catvāryatha trīṇi bhāvanāheyakarmaṇaḥ
# spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni gcig ste / / bdag po'i 'bras bu'o / / bsgom pas spang bar bya las kyi / / de dag gnyis dang bzhi dang gsum /
bhāvanāheyasya karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale
# bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni gnyis te / / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go /
bhāvanāheyāścatvāri visaṃyogaphalaṃ muktvā / apraheyāstrīṇi vipākaniḥṣyandaphale muktvā
# bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni bzhi ste / / bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so / / spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni gsum ste / / rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dag ma gtogs so /
apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam
# spang bya min pa'i de dag gcig / / gnyis dang bzhi ste go rims bzhin /
apraheyasya karmaṇo darśanaheyā dharmā ekamadhipatiphalam
# spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'i las kyi 'bras bu mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni gcig ste bdag po'i 'bras bu'o /
bhāvanāheyā dve puruṣakārādhipatiphale
# bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni gnyis te / / skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu'o /
apraheyāścatvāri vipākaphalaṃ muktvā / punaryathākramagrahaṇamādyantavanmadhye 'pi jñāpanārtham
# spang bar bya ba ma yin pa ni bzhi ste / / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so / / yang go rims bzhin zhes smos pa ni dbus su yang thog ma dang tha ma bzhin shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
eṣa hi peyāladharmaḥ
# de ni mthun par sbyor ba'i chos yin no /
karmanirdeśaprasaṅgenedamapi paripraśnyate
# las bstan pa'i skabs su 'di yang yongs su bri bar bya ste / / bstan bcos dag las /
śāstreṣu ayogavihitaṃ yogavihitam naivayogavihitaṃ nāyogavihitaṃ ca karmoktam / tasya kiṃ lakṣaṇam
# rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa dang rigs pas bskyed pa dang rigs pas bskyed pa yang ma yin rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa yang ma yin pa'i las zhes gsungs pa de'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
ayogavihitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vidhibhraṣṭaṃ ca kecana
# rigs min bskyed pa nyon mongs can / / kha cig cho ga nyams pa zhe'o /
kliṣṭaṃ karmāyogavihitamayoniśomanaskārasaṃbhūtatvādityeke / vidhibhraṣṭamapītyapare / yena yathā gantavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ bhoktavyaṃ pravicaritavyamityevamādi / taccānyathā vidadhāti / tadayuktavidhānādayogavihitamiti
# kha cig na re rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa ni las nyon mongs pa can yin te / / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid las byung ba las byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes zer ro / / gzhan dag na re cho ga nyams pa yang yin te / / gang gis ji ltar 'gro bar bya ba dang gnas par bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba dang bgo bar bya ba dang de la sogs pa de gzhan du byed na de ni rigs pa ma yin pas byed pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin pas skyes pa zhes bya'o / / rigs pas bskyed pa ni las dge ba yin no /
kuśalaṃ karmaṃ yogavihitamavidhibhraṣṭaṃ cetyapare
# gzhan dag na re cho ga ma nyams pa yang yin no zhes zer ro /
ubhābhyāmanyannobhayathā / naivayogavihitaṃ nāyogavihitam / kimekaṃ karma ekameva janmākṣipati atha naikamapi
# de gnyis las gzhan pa ni gnyi ga ma yin pa'o / / ci las gcig gis skye ba gcig kho na 'phen tam 'on te du ma yang 'phen /
tathā kimekamapi karmaikaṃ janmākṣipatyathānekam
# de bzhin du las du mas kyang skye ba gcig 'phen tam / / 'on te du ma kho na zhig 'phen zhe na /
eṣa hi siddhāntaḥ
# 'di ni grub pa'i mtha' yin te /
ekaṃ janmākṣīpatyekam
# gcig gis skye ba gcig 'phen to /
ekameva janmākṣipatyekameva ca karma nānekaṃ janmeti nikāyasabhāgasyākhyā / tatra hi labdhe jāta ityucyate
# las gcig kho nas skye ba gcig kho na 'phen gyi du ma ni ma yin no / / skye ba zhes bya ba ni ris mthun pa la bya ste / / der phyin nas skye ba zhes brjod do /
yattarhi sthavirāniruddhenoktaṃ so 'haṃ tasyaikapiṇḍapātasya vipākena saptakṛtvastrayastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapanno yāvadetahyrādye śākyakule jāta iti
# 'o na gnas brtan ma 'gags pas bdag ni bsod snyoms gcig po de'i rnam par smin pas lan bdun gyi bar du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa nas da ltar sh'akya phyug po'i rigs su skyes pa'i bar du yin no zhes gang smras pa de ji lta bu zhe na /
tena hyasau samṛdviṃ labdvā jātismaraḥ punaranyat puṇyaṃ kṛtavān / tata utthānaṃ darśayati sma
# 'di des 'byor pa rnyed nas tshe rabs dran pa dang yang bsod nams gzhan byas pas de'i phyir slob pa ston par byed pa yin te /
yathā manuṣyo dīnārottho 'nena sahasraṃ nirviśyāha ekena dīnāreṇāhamaita dīśvaryaṃ prāpta iti / apare tvāhuḥ
# dper na mi zhig gis dong tse gcig gis stong du bsgyur te bdag ni dong tse gcig gis dbang phyug 'di thob par gyur to zhes smra ba lta bu'o / / yang smras pa /
tasya taṃ piṇḍapātamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā dānacetanānāṃ pravāho mahānutpannaḥ kayācit kiñcitphalaṃ parigṛhītamiti
# de bsod snyoms de la brten te sems pa rnams kyi rgyun mang po byung nas 'ga' zhig gi 'bras bu 'ga' yongs su gzung ba yin no /
anekenāpyekamākṣipyate mā bhūt khaṇḍaśo nikāyasabhāgasyākṣepa iti / ekena tu karmaṇā kliṣṭasya nikāyasabhāgasyeṣyate karma
# ris mthun pa dum bur 'phen pa 'gyur du 'ongs bas du mas kyang gcig 'phen pa ma yin gyi las gcig gis 'phangs pa'i ris mthun pa la las yongs rdzogs byed pa du ma yin par 'dod de / / dper na ri mo mkhan gyi ri lu gcig gis gzugs kyi sa bcad nas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang 'dra ste /
anekaṃ paripūrakam
# 'di ltar mir mtshungs mod kyi /
yathā citrakara ekayā vartyā rūpamālikhya vahvībhiḥ paripūrayati
# kha cig dbang po dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad tshang bar 'gyur zhing /
tathā hi tulye mānuṣye kaścit sakalendriyāṅgapratyaṅgo bhavativarṇakṛtipramāṇabalasaṃpadā vibhrājamānaḥ kaścideṣāṃ kenacidvikalaḥ / na ca kevalaṃ karmaivākṣepakaṃ janmanaḥ
# kha dog dang sha tshugs dang bong tshod dang nyams stobs phun sum tshogs pas rnam par mdzes pa yin la / / kha cig ni de dag las la lam tshang ba yin no / / las 'ba' zhig tshe 'phen par byed pa yang ma yin te /
kiṃ tarhi / anyadapi savipākam / sarvathā tu
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa gzhan yang yin no / / rnam pa thams cad du /
nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca
# sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dang / / 'phen byed ma yin thob pa'ang yin /
avipākābhyāmapyacittasamāpattibhyāṃ nikāyasabhāgo nākṣipyate
# rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis kyang ris mthun pa 'phen par mi byed de /
karmāsahabhūtatvāt / prāptibhiśca karmaṇo 'nekaphalatvāt
# las dang lhan cig mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro; / / thob pa rnams kyis kyang ma yin te /
triṇyāvaraṇānyuktāni bhagavatā
# las dang 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇaṃ ca / teṣāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ / ānantaryāṇi karmāṇi tīvrakleśo 'tha durgatiḥ
# bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang sgrib pa gsum gsungs pa de dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na / / mtshams med pa yi las rnams dang /
kauravāsaṃjñisattvāśca matamāvaraṇatrayam / pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇam
# nyon mongs shas chen ngan 'gro dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang sgra mi snyan sgrib gsum du 'dod / / mtshams med pa'i las rnams ni las kyi sgrib pa yin te /
tadyathā mātṛvadhaḥ pitṛvadho 'rhadvadhaḥ saṃghabhedaḥ tathāgataśrīre duṣṭacittarudhirotpādanam
# 'di lta ste / / ma gsod pa dang pha gsod pa dang dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa'o /
tīvrakleśatā kleśāvaraṇam / dvividho hi kleśaḥ / tivraśca ya abhikṣṇikaḥ tīkṣṇaśca yo 'dhimātraḥ / tatra yastīvraḥ sa āvaraṇam
# nyon mongs pa shas chen po ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'o / / nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / / nyon mongs pa shas che ba dang rno ba'o / / de la shas che ba ni rgyun du 'byung ba gang yin pa'o / / rno ba ni chen po gang yin pa'o / / de la shas che ba gang yin pa de ni sgrib pa yin te /
yathā śaṇṭhādīnām / śakto hyadhimatravego 'pi kleśaḥ kādācitko nihantuṃ natu samūho 'pyājasrikaḥ
# dper na za ma la sogs pa rnams kyi lta bu'o / / nyon mongs pa res 'ga' 'byung ba ni shugs drag kyang gzhom par nus kyis rgyun du 'byung ba ni dpal yang ma yin te /
ājasrike he kleśe tannirghātāya parākramakālaṃ na labhate
# nyon mongs pa rgyun du 'byung ba ni de nges par gzhom pa'i phyir rtsol ba'i dus mi rnyed do /
tasya mṛduṃ pratītya madhya upajāyate
# de ni chung ngu la brten nas 'bring skye'o /
madhyaṃ pratītyādhimātraḥ / tasmāt evāvaraṇaṃ trividhā durgatiḥ vipākāvaraṇaṃ sugateśca pradeśaḥ auttarakauravā asaṃjñisattvāśca
