# 'bring la brten nas chen po skye ste / / de lta bas na de nyid sgrib pa yin no / / ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum dang bde 'gro'i phyogs byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa yin no /
kasyaitānyāvaraṇāni
# 'di dag gang la sgrib ce na /
āryamārgasyāryamārgaprāyogikāṇāṃ ca kuśalamūlānām anyānyapi hyapāyādiniyatāni aṇḍajasaṃsvedajastrītvāṣṭamabhavayatāni karmāṇi vaktavyāni syuḥ / yānyeva tu pañcabhiḥkāraṇaiḥ sudarśakāni pajñakāni adhiṣṭhānataḥ phalato gatitaḥ upapattitaḥ pudgalataśca tānyevoktāni nānyāni / kleśāvaraṇaṃ caiṣāṃ sarvajaghanyam
# 'phags pa'i lam dang 'phags pa'i lam la sbyor bar byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la sgrib bo / / ngan song la sogs par nges par 'gyur ba dang sgo nga las skye bar 'gyur ba dang drod gsher las skye bar 'gyur ba dang bud med nyid du 'gyur ba dang srid pa brgyad par nges par 'gyur ba'i las gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na / / gang dag gzhi dang 'bras bu dang 'gro ba dang skye ba dang gang zag dang rgyu lngas bstan par sla zhing gdags par bya ba de dag kho na bshad kyis gzhan dag ni ma yin no / / de dag las nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni thams cad kyi tha shal yin no /
tataḥ karmāvaraṇam
# de'i 'og tu ni las kyi sgrib pa ste /
tāmyāṃ hi dvitīye 'pi janmanyacikitso bhavatyuttarottarāvāhanāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ
# de gnyis kyis ni tshe phyi ma la yang gsor mi rung bar 'gyur ro / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re phyi ma phyi ma 'dren pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
ānantaryāṇīti ko 'rthaḥ
# mtshams med pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
nāntarāyituṃ śakyāni vipākaṃ prati janmāntaraphalena karmāntareṇetyānantaryāṇi
# tshe rabs gzhan gyi 'bras bu can gyi las dag gi rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bar du gcod par mi nus pas mtshams med pa rnams te /
na tiraskartumityarthaḥ
# zil gyis mi gnon zhes bya pa'i tha tshig go /
na vā tatkāriṇaḥ pudgalasyetaścyutasyāntaramasti narakopapattigamanaṃ pratītyanantaraḥ
# yang na de byed pa'i gang zag 'di nas shi 'phos pa dang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba la bar chad med pas de ni bar chad med pa'o /
tadbhāva ānantaryam
# de'i dngos po ni bar chad med pa nyid de /
yasya dharmasya yogātso 'nantaro bhavati
# chos gang dang ldan pa'i phyir de bar chad med pa yin te /
śrāmaṇyavat / athaiṣāmāvaraṇānāṃ katamat kasyāṃ gatau veditavyam / ekāntena tāvat
# dge sbyong gi tshul bzhin no / / yang sgrib pa 'di dag las gang zhig khams gang na yod par rig par bya zhe na / / re zhig gcig tu /
triṣu dvīpeṣvānantarya
# mtshams med gling gsum dag na yod /
nottarakurau nānyāsu gatiṣu / kuta evānyatra dhātau
# byang gi sgra mi snyan dang 'gro ba gzhan dag na yang med na khams gzhan na lta smos kyang ci dgos /
tetṣvapi stripuruṣāṇāmeva / śaṇḍā dīnāṃ tu neṣyate
# de dag na yang skyes pa dang bud med rnams kho na la yod kyi / / zam la sogs pa mi 'dod do /
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
tadevāsaṃvarābhāve kāraṇamuddiṣṭam
# sdom pa med pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa de nyid kyi phyir ro /
api ca / alpopakārālajjitvāt / yathākramaṃ mātāpitrosteṣāṃ ca / alpopakārau kilaiṣāṃ mātāpitarau / vikalātmabhāvādhipatitvādalpasnehatvācca / teṣāmapi na tīvraṃ hyapatrāpyaṃ mātāpitrorantike pratyupasthitaṃ yadvipādanādānantaryeṇa spṛśyeran
# gzhan yang / / phan dang ngo tsha chung ba'i phyir / / pha ma dang de dag dang go rims bzhin te / / pha ma ni de dag gi lus ma tshangs ba'i bdag por 'gyur ba'i phyir dang byams pa chung pa'i phyir phan pa chung ba yin no / / de dag kyang pha ma la gang dag med par byas pas mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i shas ches po nye bar mi gnas te /
ata eva tiryavapretānāmapi neṣyate / paṭubuddhīnāṃ syādaśvājāneyavaditi bhadantaḥ / manuṣyasyāpyamānuṣau mātāpitarau mārayato na syādānantaryam
# de nyid kyi phyir yi dags dang dud 'gro rnams la yang mi 'dod do zhes grag go / / btsun pa na re blo gsal ba rnams la 'gyur te rta cang shes bzhin no zhes zer ro / / mi'i yang pha ma mi ma yin pa bsad na mtshams med par mi 'gyur ro /
uktaṃ karmāvaraṇam
# las kyi sgrib pa bshad zin to /
śeṣe gatiṣu pañcasu
# lhag ma 'gro ba lnga dag na /
ke punaḥ śeṣe / kleśavipākāvaraṇe / manuṣyeṣu vipākāvaraṇam / kauravā deveṣvasaṃjñisattvāḥ / kiṃsvabhāvānyānantaryāṇi / catvāri kāyakarma ekaṃ vākkarma trīṇi prāṇātipāta ekaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ ekaṃ prāṇātipātaprayogaḥ
# lhag ma gang dag ci yin zhe na / / nyon mongs pa dang rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa ste / / mi dag gi nang na ni sgra mi snyan pa rnam par sman pa'i sgrib pa yin no / / lha dag gi nang na ni 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams so / / mtshams med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na / / bzhi ni lus kyi las yin la / / gcig ni ngag gi las yin te / / gsum ni srog gcod pa yin no / / gcig ni brdzun du smra ba yin no / / gcig ni srog gcod pa'i sbyor ba ste /
anupakramadharmāṇo hi tathāgatāḥ
# de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nye bar mi brdzi ba'i chos can yin no /
hetau phalopacārātsaṃghabheda ānantaryamuktam / bhidyate vā 'neneti kṛtvā
# rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa'am / / 'dis 'byed par byed pas na dge 'dun gyi dbyen la mtshams med pa zhes bshad kyi /
saṃghabhedastvasāmagrīsvabhāvo viprayuktakaḥ
# dge 'dun dbyen ni mi 'phrod pa'i / / rang bzhin ldan pas ma yin chos /
akliṣṭāvyākṛto dharmaḥ
# nyon mongs can min lung bstan min /
asāmagrī nāna cittaviprayuktaḥ saṃskāro 'nivṛtāvyākṛtaḥ saṃghabhedaḥ / sa kimānantaryaṃ bhaviṣyati naiva ca tena bhettā samanvāgataḥ
# dge 'dun gyi dbyen ni mi 'phrod pa zhes bya ba sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed de / / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin na de ji ltar mtshams med par 'gyur / / de dang byed pa por yang mi ldan pa kho na yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / saṃghastena samanvitaḥ
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / de dang dge 'dun yang dag ldan /
yo hi bhinnastasya bhedo na bhettuḥ
# gang bye ba de dbyen dang ldan gyi / / 'byed pa po la ni ma yin no /
atha bhettā kena samanvāgataḥ
# 'o na 'byed pa po ci dang ldan zhe na /
sadavadyamṛṣāvādastena bhettā samanvitaḥ
# de yi kha na ma tho brdzun / / de dang byed po yang dag ldan /
saṃghabhedāvadyena bhettā samanvāgataḥ / tat punarmṛṣāvādaḥ
# 'byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi dbyen gyi kha na ma tho ba dang ldan te / / de ni brdzun yin no /
sa punaḥ saṃghabhedasahaje vāgvijñaptyavijñaptī / sa ca tenāvadyena samanvāgato bhettā
# de yang dge 'dun gyi dbyen dang lhan cig skyes pa'i ngag gi rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dag yin no / / kha na ma tho ba de dang ldan pa'i byed pa po de ni /
avīcau pacyate kalpan
# bskal par mnar med par smin 'gyur /
antarakalpamavīcau mahānarake vipacyate / anyaistu nāvaśyamavīcau
# bar gyi bskal par mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por smin par 'gyur ro / / gzhan gyis ni mnar med par ma nges so /
atha yena bahunyānantaryāṇi kṛtāni bhavanti anantarameva tāni vipacyante / kiṃ tu taistasya bhavati
# yang gang zhig gis mtshams med pa mang po byas pa yin la / / de dag bar chad med pa kho na smin par 'gyur na de la de dag gis ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
adhhikairadhikā rujaḥ / sahi bhūyobhirānantaryaistasminnavīcau ghanataraṃ sukumārataraṃ cāśrayaṃ labhate kāraṇāśca bahutarāstīvratarāśca yena dvitricatuṣpañcaguṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate
# lhag pas gnod pa lhag par 'gyur / / de mtshams med pa mang pos mnar med pa der gang gis na gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lngar 'gyur gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i lus chen po dang shin tu gzhon sha can gyi lus 'thob cing /
kaḥ punareṣa saṃghaṃ bhanatti / bhikṣurdu kvacarito vṛttī bhinatti / bhikṣurbhinatti na gṛhī na bhikṣuṇyādayaḥ / sa ca dṛṣṭicarita eva na tṛṣṇācaritaḥ
# gnod pa yang rab tu mang ba dang shin tu mi bzad par 'gyur ro / / dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa de su zhig yin zhe na / / dge slong dka' spyod tshul ldan pas / / 'byed do / / dge slong gis 'byed kyi khyim pa yang ma yin la / / dge slong ma la sogs pa yang ma yin no / / de yang lta ba spyod pa kho nas 'byed kyi sred pa spyod pas ni ma yin no /
ṛtastho na bhinnavṛttastasyānādeyavākyatvāt
# tshul dang ldan pas 'byed kyi tshul nyams pas ni ma yin te / / de'i tshig mi btsan pa'i phyir ro /
kva bhinatti
# gang du 'byed ce na /
atra bhagavān saṃnihitastataḥ
# gang na bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa de las /
anyatra
# gzhan du'o /
nahi śāstureva saṃnidhau śakyo bhettum / tathāgatānāṃ duṣprasahatvādādeyavākyatvācca
# de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bzod par dka' ba'i phyir dang bka' stsal ba'i phyir ston pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa nyid du dbye par mi nus so /
kān bhinatti
# su dag cig 'byed ce na /
bāliśān / pṛthagjanāneva nāryān pratyakṣadharmatvāt
# byis pa rnams / / byis pa rnams kho na yin gyi 'phags pa rnams ni ma yin te / / chos mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir ro /
tānapi na kṣāntilābhina ityapare / kiyatā bhinnaḥ saṃgho bhavati
# kha cig na re de dag las kyang bzod pa thob pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes zer ro / / ji tsam gyis na dge 'dun bye ba yin zhe na /
śāstṛmārgāntarakṣāntau bhinnaḥ
# ston dang lam gzhan la bzod pa / / bye ba'o /
yadā tebhyastathāgatādanyaḥ śāstā kṣamate tadupadiṣṭācca mārgādanyo mārga iyatā bhinnaḥ saṃgho vaktavyaḥ
# gang gi tshe de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan pa'i ston pa dang des bstan pa'i lam las gzhan pa'i lam la bzod na de tsam gyis dge 'dun bye ba zhes brjod do /
kiyantaṃ kālaṃ bhinna āste
# bye nas dus ji srid du cig tu 'dug ce na /
tāmeva rātriṃ / na vivasatyasau / aparyuṣita eva hi saṃghabhede saṃgho 'vaśyaṃ pratisaṃdhīyate
# de nyid kyi nub gcig tu de ni mi gnas so / / dge 'dun dbye na gdon mi za bar nam ma langs pa nyid du dge 'dun slar 'dum par 'gyur ro /
yo 'yaṃ saṃghabheda uktaḥ
# dge 'dun gyi dbyen du bshad pa gang yin pa /
cakrabhedaḥ sa ca mataḥ
# de ni 'khor lo'i dbyen du 'dod /
dharmacakraṃ hi tadā bhagavato bhinnaṃ bhavati / mārgapravṛttiviṣṭhāpanāt / ata eva cakrādaścocyate saṃghabhedaśca
# de'i tshe lam du 'jug pa'i bgegs su gyur pa'i phyir de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang phye ba yin te / / de nyid kyi phyir 'khor lo'i dbyen zhes kyang bya la / / dge 'dun gyi dbyen zhes kyang bya'o /
kva punaścakrabhedo bhavati
# 'khor lo'i dbyen yang gang na yod ce na /
jambūdvīpe / nānyeṣu dvīpeṣu
# 'dzam bu'i gling na'o / / gling gzhan dag na ni med do /
katibhirbhikṣubhiḥ
# dge slong du zhig gis she na /
navādibhiḥ / navādiṃ kṛtvā / pareṇāniyamaḥ / aṣṭau bhikṣayaḥ saṃgho bhavati
# dgu sogs kyis dgu la sogs pa smos pas yan chad ni ma nges so / / dge slong brgyad ni dge 'dun yin no /
navamo bhettā / avaśyaṃ hi saṃghena dvayoḥpakṣayoḥ sthātavyam / evaṃ bhinno bhavati / anyastu saṃghabhedaḥ karmabhedād bhavati / yadyekasīmāyāṃ vyagrāḥ karma kurvanti
# dgu pa ni 'byed pa po yin te / / gdon mi za bar dge 'dun phyogs gnyis su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni bye ba yin no / / dge 'dun gyi dbyen gzhan ni las kyi dbyen las 'gyur te / / gal te mtshams gcig gi nang du mi mthun pas las dag byed na'o /
sa caiṣa / karmabhedastriṣu dvīpeṣu
# las kyi dbyen ni gling gsum na yod de /
yeṣveva śāsanam / katibhirbhikṣubhiḥ
# gang dag na bstan pa yod pa kho na na'o / / dge slong du zhig gis she na /
aṣṭābhiradhikaiśca saḥ / cakrabhedastu ṣaṭsu kāleṣu na bhavati
# de ni brgya da dag yan chad kyis 'khor lo'i dbye na ni dus drug dag tu mi 'byung ste /
katameṣu / ādāvante 'rbudāt pūrvaṃ yugāccoparate munau
# gang dag tu zhe na / / dang po mtha' skyon zung gcig gi / / snga rol thub pa nongs pa dang /
sīmāyāṃ cāpyabaddhāyāṃ cakrabhedo na jāyate / ādāvacirapravartite dharmacakre / ante parinirvāṇakāle bhagavataḥ / etayorhi dvayoravasthayoḥ saṃgha ekaraso bhavati
# mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang / / 'khor lo'i dbyen ni mi 'byung ngo / / dang po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ring po ma lon pa dang tha ma bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe dang gnas skabs de gnyis su ni dge 'dun sha gcig ma yin no /
madhye 'pyarbudāt pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchāsane śīlārbudaṃ dṛṣṭyarbudaṃ ca notpannaṃ bhavati
# bar du yang skyon ma byung ba'i sngon rol du 'byed par mi 'gyur te / / ji srid du bstan pa la tshul khrims kyi skyon dang lta ba'i skyon ma byung gi bar du'o /
yugācca pūrvaṃ na bhidyate yāvacchrāvakāgrayugaṃ notpannaṃ bhavati
# zung gcig ma byung ba'i sngon rol du yang dbye bar mi 'gyur te / / ji srid du nyan thos kyi mchog zung gcig ma byung gi bar du ste /
bhinnanyāyaparivāsāttena ca pratisaṃdhānīyatvāt / uparate munau śāstari parinirvṛte pratidvandvābhāvāt / sīmāyāmabaddhāyāṃ yāvat sīmā na baddhā bhavati
# bye ba yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir dang des phyir sdum par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / thub pa nongs na yang mi 'byung ste / / ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na 'gran zla med pa'i phyir ro / / mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang ste / / ji srid du mtshams ma bcad par mi 'byung ste /
ekasīmāyāṃ hi pakṣadvayāvasthānātsaṃghabheda ityeṣu kālesu cakrabhedona bhavati
# mtshams gcig gi nang du phyogs gnyis su gnas pa'i phyir bye ba zhes bya'o / / de ltar na dus drug po de dag tu 'khor lo'i dbyen mi 'byung ngo /
na ca punaḥ sarveṣāṃ baddhānāṃ cakrabhedaḥ / karmādhīnatvāt
# las la rag lus pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo la yang dbyen mi 'byung ngo /
kasmāt mātṛvadhādiṣvānantaryaṃ nānyatra
# ci'i phyir ma bsad pa la sogs pa mtshams med pa yin la gzhan ni ma yin zhe na; /
upakāriyuṇakṣetranirākṛtivipādanāt
# phan 'dogs pa dang yon tan zhing / / spangs dang med par byas phyir ro /
mātāpitṛvadhe tāvadupakāriṇo nirākaraṇāt
# re zhig pa ma gsad pa ni phan 'dogs pa med par byas pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ tāvupakāriṇau / ātmabhāvasya tatprabhavatvāt
# ji ltar de gnyis phan 'dogs pa yin zhe na / / de dag las lus skyes pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ tayornirākaraṇam
# de dag spangs ba ji lta bu zhe na /
parityāgaḥ
# yongs su bor ba'o /
guṇakṣetratvādarhadvadhād ānantaryam / yadi punarmāturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāt piturvā tatraikasminnāmnāyo
# yon tan gyi zhing yin pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa gsad pa la sogs pa yang mtshams med pa yin no / / gal te pha'am ma mtshan gyur pa na yang lus gcig pa de la ni /
vyañjanāntarito 'pi syāt
# mtshan ni gzhan du gyur kyang 'gyur /
ata evocyate syāt puruṣaṃ jīvitādvacyaparopayenna pitaraṃ nārhantam / ānantaryāvadyena ca spṛśyeta
# de nyid kyi phyir pha yang ma yin dgra bcom pa yang ma yin pa'i skyes pa zhig bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na / / yod de /
syānmāturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāditi
# ma mtshan gyur pas bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ro /
syāt strīṃ jīvitādvyaparopayenna mātaraṃ nārhantīm ānantaryāvadyena ca spṛśyeta
# ma yang ma yin dgra bcom pa yang ma yin pa'i bud med gcig bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na / / yod de /
syāt piturvyañjanaṃ parivṛttaṃ syāditi / anyasyāḥ striyāḥ kalalaṃ prasrutamanyayā yonyā pītam / katarā tasya mātā yāṃ ghnataḥ syādānantaryam / mātā yacchoṇitodbhavaḥ
# pha mtshan gyur pas bsad na mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas reg par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do / / bud med gzhan las nur nur po zags nas bud med gzhan gyi mang la du blugs na gang zhig bsad na mtshams med par 'gyur ba de'i ma gang yin zhe na / / gang gi zla mtshan las byung ma /
yasyāḥ śoṇitādasāvudbhūtaḥ sattvaḥ sā 'sya mātā dvitīyā tu sarvakṛtyeṣvavalokyā
# sems can de gang gi zla mtshan las byung ba de ni de'i ma yin no / / gnyis pa yang bya ba thams cad khu par bya ba yin te /
sā hyāpāyikā poṣikā saṃvardhikā ca / yadi mātari prayogaṃ kṛtvā 'nyāṃ mārayenna syādānantaryam / amātṛprayogeṇa mārayettathāpi na syāt / mañcatalāvalīnamātṛmāraṇaṃ cātrodāhārya dhāvakasya ca putreṇa masaka prayogeṇa piturmāraṇaṃ ca
# de ni nu zho ldud par byed pa dang gso bar byed pa dang skyed par byed pa yin no / / gal te ma la sbyor ba byas nas gzhan bsad na yang mtshams med par mi 'gyur la ma ma yin pa la sbyor ba byas nas ma bsad na yang mtshams med par 'gyur te / / ma khri'u 'i 'og na 'dug pa bsad pa dang khrus pa'i bus sbrang bu la sbyor ba byas pas pha bsad pa dper bya'o /
ekena prahāreṇa mātaramanyāṃ ca mārayato dve avijñaptī bhavataḥ / vijñaptistvānantaryameva
# mtshon thabs gcig gis ma dang gzhan zhig kyang bsad na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni gnyis yin la / / rnam par rig byed ni mtshams med pa kho na yin te /
tasya karmaṇo balīyastvāt
# las de stobs che ba'i phyir ro /
paramāṇusaṃcitatvādvijñaptirapi dvidheti bhadantaghoṣakaḥ
# btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs na re rdul phra rab bsags pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed kyang rnam pa gnyis so zhes zer ro /
anarhatsaṃjñayā 'pi arhadghāte bhavatyānantaryam aham hanmītyāśrayāvadhāraṇāt / yaḥ pitaramarhantaṃ hiṃsyāttasyāpyekameva syādānantaryamāśrayaikatvāt
# dgra bcom pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis dgra bcom pa bsad na yang mtshams med par 'gyur te / / 'di gsad do snyam du rten nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro / / gang zhig gis pha dgra bcom pa bsad na yang de la mtshams med pa ni gcig kho nar 'gyur te / / rten gcig pa'i phyir ro /
idamavadānaṃ kathaṃ nīyate gaccha śikhaṇḍinaṃ brūhi dve ānantarye bhavatā kṛte / yacca pitā jīvitādvyaparopito yaccārhanniti
# song la skra can la khyod kyis ni mtshams med pa gnyis byas te / / pha gsad pa gang yin pa dang gang yang dgra bcom pa gsad pa'o zhes smros shig ces bya ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa 'di ji lta bu zhe na /
dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmiti vaktavyam
# rgyu gnyis kyis zhes brjod par bya'o /
dvābhyāṃ vā mukhābhyāṃ paribhāṣitaḥ
# yang na sgo gnyis nas spyos pa yin no /
kimavaśyaṃ tathāgatasyāsti kuṭuṣṭacittarudhirotpādanādānantaryam / vadhābhiprāyasya syāt
# de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung bas gdon mi za bar mtshams med par 'gyur ram zhe na /
buddhe na tāḍanecchasya
# bgrod par sems pa la ni 'gyur gyi /
yadi tāḍanābhitrāya utpādayenna syāt
# sangs rgyas brdeg par sems pa la'ang min /
yadyanarhati praharetsa ca prahārādūrdhvamarhan syāt
# gal te dgra ma choms pa'i tshe bsnun la bsnun pa'i 'og tu dgra bcom par gyur na /
prahārānnordhvamarhati
# bsnun 'og dgra bcom pa la min /
syādānantaryamiti vartate / nahi tena tatra prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ
# mtshams med par 'gyur bzhes bya bar sbyar te / / des ni de la sbyor ba ma byas so /
kimānantarye prayogaṃ kṛtvā tasminnavyāvartite vairāgyaṃ phalaṃ vā na prāpnuyāt
# ci mtshams med pa'i sbyor ba byas te / / de yang ma bzlog par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur zhe na /
nānantaryaprayuktasya vairāgyaphalasaṃbhavaḥ / anyakarmaphalapathaprayogaṃ tu kṛtvāryamārgotpattau na punaḥ karmapathotpattirāśrayasyātyantaṃ tadviruddhatvāt
# mtshams med sbyor ba byas pa la / / 'dod chags bral 'bras mi srid do / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / bsam pa shin tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro / / las kyi lam gzhan gyi sbyor ba byas nas 'phags pa'i lam skyes pa la ni yang las kyi lam mi skye ste / / rten de dang shin tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro /
eṣāmānantaryāṇāṃ katamat mahāsāvadyam / saṃghamede mṛṣāvādo mahāvadyatamo mataḥ
# mtshams med pa'i las 'di dag las thams cad kyi nang na kha na ma thob dang bcas pa chen po gang yin zhe na / / dge 'dun dbye phyir brdzun smra ba / / kha na ma tho bar cher 'dod /
yaḥ saṃghabhedanimittaṃ mṛṣāvādo dharmādharmajñasya viparyayadyotanāt sa sarveṣāṃ duścaritānāṃ mahāvadyatamaḥ
# gang zhig chos dang chos ma yin pa shes bzhin du dge 'dun dbye ba'i phyir brdzun du smra na log par ston pa'i phyir nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi nang na kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rab tu che ba yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam / tathāgatadharmaśarīraprahāritatvāt lokānāṃ ca svargāpavargamārgāntarāyakatvāt / saṃghe hi bhinne lokasya niyāmāvakrantiphalaprāptivairāgyāsravakṣayāḥ pratibadhyante dhyānādhyayanasvādhyāyacintākarmāṇyapi na pravartante sadevanāgamanuṣyaṃ jagaccākulaṃ vimanaskaṃ vartate yāvat punarna pratisaṃdhito bhavatiyasmāccāvicau kalpaṃ vipākaḥ / śeṣāṇāmānantaryāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ pañcamatṛtīyaprathamāni gurutarāṇi sarvalaghuḥ pitṛvadhaḥ
# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bsnun pa'i phyir dang 'jig rten rnams kyi mtho ris dang byang grol gyi lam gyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i phyir te / / dge 'dun dbye na ji srid du slar ma dum gyi bar du 'jig rten nges pa la 'jug pa dang 'bras bu 'thob pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang bag [*zag?] pa zad par bya ba rnams la bgegs su gyur pa yin zhing / / bsam gtan dang klog pa dang kha ton dang sems pa'i las rnams kyang mi 'jug cing / / lha dang klu dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba yang 'khrugs pa dang yid mi bde ba dang rang dbang med pa dang dran pa nyams par 'gyur la / / 'di ltar 'di'i rnam par smin pa yang bskal pa gcig tu mnar med par skye ba yin no / / mtshams med pa lhag ma rnams las ni go rims bzhin du lnga ba dang gsum pa dang dang po rnams ches lci ba yin te / / pha gsod pa ni thams cad kyi nang na yang ba yin no /
yattarhi bhagavatā trayāṇāṃ daṇḍānāṃ manodaṇḍo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ punarmithyādṛṣṭiḥ paramavadyānāmityuktam ānantaryāṇi niyamasya saṃghabhedo mahāsāvadya uktaḥ
# 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis nyes pa gsum gyi nang na yid kyi nyes pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chen por gsungs pa dang yang log par lta ba ni kha na ma tho ba dam pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na / / mtshams med pa rnams nges par mdzad nas ni dge 'dun gyi dbye na kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chen por gsungs la /
trīṇi karmāṇi niyamayya manodaṇdaḥ dṛṣṭīrniyamayya mithyādṛṣṭiḥ
# las gsum nges par mdzad nas ni yid kyi nyes pa gsungs / / lta ba rnams nges par mdzad nas ni log par lta ba gsungs pa'am /
athavā vipākavistaraṃ mahājanavyāpādanaṃ kuśalamūlasamucchedaṃ cādhikṛtya yathākramam
# yang na rnam par smin pa rgya che ba dang skye bo phal po che 'chi ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du gcod pa'i dbang du mdzad nas go rims bzhin du gsungs pa yin no /
sucaritānāṃ punaḥ katamat mahāphalatamam
# legs par spyad pa rnams las 'bras bu rab tu che ba gang yin zhe na /
bhavāgracetanā loke mahāphalatamā śubhe
# 'jig rten pa'i dge ba la / / srid rtse'i sems pa 'bras rab che /
kuśale punaḥ karmaṇi bhavāgracetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalatamā
# las dge ba la ni thams cad kyi nang na srid pa'i rtse mo'i sems pa 'bras bu rab tu che ba yin te /
tasyā aśītikalpasahasrāṇyatipraśānto vipākaḥ / vipākaphalaṃ cādhikṛtyaitaduktam
# de'i rnam par smin pa ni bskal pa brgyad khrir rab tu zhi ba yin no / / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas de skad bshad kyi /
visaṃyogaphalaṃ tvadhikṛtya vajropamasamādhicetanā sarveṣāṃ mahāphalā sarvasamyojanaparyādānaphalatvāt
# bral ba'i 'bras bu'i dbang du byas nas ni thams cad kyi nang na rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems pa 'bras bu che ba yin te / / kun du sbyor ba thams cad gtan du gtugs pa 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro /
ata eva loka ityuktam / kimānantaryairevāvaśyaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate / ānantaryasabhāgairapyavaśyamupapadyate / natvanantaramevetyapare / katamāni tānītyāha / dūṣaṇaṃ māturarhantyā niyatisthasya māraṇam
# de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten pa'i zhes bshad do / / ci mtshams med pa rnams kho nas dmyal ba dag tu gdon mi za bar skye bar 'gyur ram / / 'on te gzhan dag gis kyang skye bar 'gyur zhe na / / mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang gdon mi za bar skye bar 'gyur ro / / gzhan dag na re bar chad med pa kho nar ni ma yin no zhes zer ro / / de dag kyang gang zhe na / / smras pa / / ma dgra bcom ma sun byas dang /
bodhisattvasya śaikṣasya saṃghāyadvārahārikā / ānantaryasabhāgāni pañcamaṃ stūpabhedanam / etāni pañca pañcānāmānatnaryāṇāṃ yathākramam sabhāgāni
# byang chub sems dpa' des [*nges] gnas dang / / slob pa gsod dang dge 'dun gyi / / 'du ba'i sgo ni 'phrogs pa dag / / mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ste / / lnga pa mchod rten 'jig pa yin / / lnga po 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du mtshams med pa lnga dang cha 'dra pa yin te /
yadi mātaramarhantīṃ dūṣayatyabrahmacaryakaraṇāt niyatipatītaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mārayati śaikṣaṃ mārayati saṃghasya sukhāyadvārikaṃ harati stūpabhedaṃ karoti
# gal te mi tshangs par spyod pas ma dgra bcom ma sun par byed pa dang nges par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsod pa dang slob pa gsod pa dang dge 'dun gyi zhal du 'du pa'i sgo 'phrogs pa dang mchod rten 'jig par byed pa'o /
anyadapi tu karma savipākaṃ triṣu kāleṣvatyarthaṃ vighnayati
# rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa'i las gzhan yang dus gsum po dag tu shin tu bgegs byed de /
katameṣu trisu / kṣāntyanāgāmitārhattvaprāptau karmātivighnakṛt
# gsum po gang dag tu zhe na / / bzod dang phyir mi 'ong dgra bcom / / 'thob pa las bgegs shin tu byed /
mūrdhabhyaḥ kṣāntimākirata āpāyikāni karmāṇi vighnāyopatiṣṭhante / tadvipākabhūmyatikramāt
# rtse mo las bzod pa thob pa la ni de'i rnam par smin pa'i sa las 'da' ba'i phyir ngan song ba'i las rnams bgegs bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas te /
yathā puruṣasya deśatyāgaṃ kurvato dhanikā upatiṣṭhante / anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnuvataḥ kāmāvacarāṇi vighnāyopatiṣṭhante tathaiva sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma
# dper na mi zhig yul 'dor bar byed pa la bu lon pa dag ldang ba bzhin no / / de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa la ni / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las rnams bgegs bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas te / / mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ni ma gtogs so /
arhattvaṃ prāpnuvato rūpārūpyāvacarāṇi tathaiva / yaduktaṃ bodhisattvasya māraṇamiti
# de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa la ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las rnams bgegs bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas so / / byang chub sems dpa' gsad pa zhes bshad pa gang yin pa /
bodhisattvaḥ kuto yāvat
# gang nas byang chub sems dpa' yin /
kuta upādāya bodhisattvovaktavyaḥ
# gang na gzung ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod par bya /
yato lakṣaṇa karmakṛt / yataḥ prabhṛti lakṣaṇavipākāni karmāṇyārabhate kartuṃ sa hi tadānīṃ niyatipatito bhavati
# gang nas mtshan gyi las byed pa gang phan chad nas mtshan rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i las rnams byed par rtsom ba de'i tshe nges par rtogs pa yin no /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / sa hi tasmāt kālāt prabhṛti nityaṃ bhavati / sugatiḥ kulajo 'vyakṣaḥ pumān jātismaro 'nivṛt
# ji lta zhe na / / de ni dus de phan chad rtag tu yang / / bde 'gror rigs mthor skye dbang tshang / / phor 'gyur tshe rabs dran mi ldog /
praśastā gatirasyeti sugatirdevamanuṣyopapatteḥ / tasyāṃ ca sugatau kṣatriyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatimahāśālakulajo bhavati nānyaḥ kulīnaḥ / vikalānyakṣāṇyasyeti vyakṣaḥ / na vyakṣo 'vyakṣaḥ avikalendriyaḥ ityarthaḥ
# pa yin no / / 'di'i 'gro ba rab tu bsngags pa yin pas na bde 'gro ste / / lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba'i phyir ro / / 'gro ba de dag tu yang rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skye ba yin gyi rigs dma' bar ni mi skye'o / / 'di'i dbang po rnams ma tshang bas na dbang po ma tshang ba'o / / dbang po tshang bas na dbang po tshang ba ste / / dbang po ma tshang ba med ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
puruṣa eva na strī kuta eva śaṇḍhādiḥ / jātismaraśca bhavati / sarvasyāṃ jātau nivartata iti nivṛt
# pho kho nar 'gyur gyi mor yang mi 'gyur na za ma la sogs par lta smos kyang ci dgos / / skye ba thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro / / nur bas na ldog pa'o / / nur ba med pas na mi ldog pa ste /
na nivṛdanivṛt / anivartaka ityarthaḥ / sattvahitārthaṃ sarvaduḥkhaprakāraiḥ sarvasattvavipratipattibhiścākheditatvāt
# ldog pa med ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste / / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa thams cad dang log par sgrub pa thams cad kyis skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro /
yattalloka ucyate apaṇakrīto dāsa iti / bodhisattvāste te hi mahātmānaḥ sarvasaṃpatprakarṣaviśeṣaprāptā api santo niṣkāraṇakaruṇāpāratantryātsarvasattveṣu caṇḍālakumārakasadṛśamātmānaṃ nirmānatayā vyavasthāpya sattvebhyaḥ sarvakadarthānāṃ soḍhāro bhavanti sarvaśramayantraṇānāṃ codvoḍhāraḥ / yaccaitallakṣaṇavipākaṃ karmetyuktam
# 'jig rten na zong gis ma nyos pa'i bran zhes brjod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag yin te / / bdag nyid chen po de dag ni; / / 'byor pa'i mchog khyad par can thams cad brnyas kyang thugs rje'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi drung du khyi dang 'dra bar nga rgyal med par gnas te / / sems can thams cad kyis brnyas gnod byas pa thams cad bzod cing ngal ba dang mnags pa thams cad kyang nyams su len pa yin no / / mtshan rnam par smin pa can gyi las su bshad pa gang yin pa /
jambūdvīpe pumāneva saṃmukhaṃ buddhacetanaḥ
# de ni 'dzam gling phor gyur nyid / / mngon sum sangs rgyas la sems pa /
cintāmayaṃ kalpaśate śeṣa ākṣipate hi tat
# bsams pa las byung bskal pa brgya / / lus pa dag tu 'phen par byed /
jambūdvīpa eva bodhisattvo lakṣaṇavipākaṃ karmākṣipati / nānyatra
# byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dzam bu gling kho nar mtshan rnam par smin pa can gyi las 'phen par byed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ tīkṣṇabuddhitvāt
# 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams blo rno ba'i phyir ro /
puruṣa eva na strī / saṃmukhībhūta eva śāstari buddhālambanayaiva cetanayā cintāmayaṃ tatkarma na śrutamayaṃ na bhāvanāmayam / kalpaśate ca śeṣa ākṣipati na bahubhavesu / bhagavatā tu śākyamuninottaptavīryatayā nava kalpā apāvartitā ekanavatyā kalpairākṣiptam / ata eva cokta mito 'haṃ grāmaṇīrekanavataṃ kalpamupādāya na samanusmarāmi nābhijānāmi yadekakulamapi pakṣabhikṣāpradānahetoḥ kṣataṃ vā syādupahataṃ veti / tataḥ prabhṛti prakṛtijātismaratvāt prathamakalpāsaṃkhyeyaniryāta eva bodhisattva etāṃścaturo doṣān vyāvartayati dvau ca guṇo pratilabhata iti pūrvācāryāḥ
# pho lo nas 'phen gyi mos ni ma yin no / / ston pa mngon sum du gyur pa dang sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems pa kho nas bskal pa brgya lus pa'i tshe 'phen gyi mang po lus pa'i tshe ni ma yin no / / las de yang bsams pa las byung ba yin gyi thos pa las byung ba yang ma yin la bsgoms pa las byung ba yang ma yin no / / bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas ni brtson 'grus spyad pas bskal pa dgu bsdums te / / bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig lus pa'i tshe 'phangs so / / de nyid kyi phyir grong dpon ngas 'di nas bzung ste / / bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du yang dag par rjes su dran te / / zas smin pa ster bar bya ba'i phyir khyim 'ga' la yang mi 'di ba 'am / / gnod par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par mi mkhyen to zhes gsungs te / / de tshun chad rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa'i phyir ro / / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re bskal pa dang po tshar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kho nas skyon bzhi po 'di dag ni bzlog par byed pa /
teṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇānām
# yon tan gnyis po ni 'thab bo zhes zer ro /
ekaikaṃ puṇyaśatajam / kiṃ puṇyasya parimāṇam / saṃnikṛṣṭabodhisattvaṃ sthāpayitvā yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ bhogaphalamityeke / yāvat sarvasattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena trisāhasramahāsāhasrako loko 'bhinivartata ityapare / buddhā eva ca tatparimāṇajñā ityapare
# mtshan de dag kyang re re 'ang bsod nams brgya las skyes / / bsod nams kyi ni tshad ji tsam zhe na / / kha cig na re byang chub sems dpa' nye ba ma gtogs pa sems can thams cad kyi longs spyod kyi 'bras bu can ji snyed pa de tsam mo zhes zer ro / / gzhan dag na re sems can thams cad kyi las kyi dbang gis stong gsum 'chags pa ji snyed tsam mo zhes zer ro / / gzhan dag na re de'i tshad ni sangs rgyas kho nas mkhyen par zad do zhes zer ro / / yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas she na /
atha bodhisattvabhūto bhagavān kiyato buddhān paryupāsayāmāsa
# bskal pa grangs med pa dang po la ni sangs rgyas bdun khri lnga stong la bsnyen bkur byas so /
pratheme kalpāsaṃkhyeye pañcasaptatisahasrāṇi dvitīye ṣaṭsaptatiṃ tṛtīye saptasaptatim
# gnyis pa la ni bdun khri drug stong la bsnyen bkur byas so / / gsum pa la ni bdun khri bdun stong la bsnyen bkur byas so /
atha kasya kalpāsaṃkhyeyasyānte katamo buddha āsīt
# bskal pa grangs med pa gang gi tha mar sangs rgyas gang zhig byung bar gyur zhe na /
pratilomānukrameṇa yathākramam
# bzlog pa'i go rims kyis go rims bzhin du /
asaṃkhyeyatrayāntyajāḥ
# rnam gzigs mar me rin chen gtsug /
vipaśyī dīpakṛdratnaśikhī
# grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung /
ratnaśikhini samyaksaṃbuddhe prathamo 'saṃkhyeyaḥ samāptaḥ
# yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi tshe ni bskal pa grangs med pa dang po rdzogs so /
dīpaṅkare bhagavati dvitīyaḥ
# bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi tshe ni gnyis pa rdzogs so /
vipaśyini tathāgate tṛtīyaḥ / sarveṣāṃ tu teṣāṃ / śāsyamuniḥ purā
# de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi tshe ni gsum pa rdzogs so / / de dag thams cad kyi dang po sh'akya thub pa yin /
śākyamunirnāma samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ vabhūva / yatra bhagavatā bodhisattvabhūtenādyaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam evaṃprakāra evāhaṃ buddho bhaveyamiti no 'pyevaṃ kaliyuga evotpannavānāryavattasyāpyevaṃ varṣa sahasrāntaṃ śāsanaṃ babhūva
# sngon sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rnam pa kho nar sangs rgyas par shog shig ces dang por smon lam btab pa byung ste / / de yang 'di bzhin du rtsod pa'i dus kho na la byung la / / de'i bstan pa yang la stong gi mtha'i bar du gnas par gyur to /
atha kasyāmavasthāvāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāṃ pāramitāṃ paripūrayate
# yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas skabs gang dag tu pha rol tu phyin pa gang yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na /
sarvatra sarvaṃ dadataḥ kāruṇyāddānapūraṇam
# kun la thams cad snying rje yis / / sbyin par byed pas sbyin pa rdzogs /
yadā sarvasmai sarvaṃ dadāti ā akṣṇaḥ ā majjāyāḥ kāruṇyānnābhyudayaviśeṣaṃ lipsamānaḥ iyatā dānapāramitā paripūrṇā bhavati
# gang gi cha gang la kun la ni mig gi bar dang rkang gi bar thams cad mngon par mtho ba'i khyad par la mi re bar snying rjes sbyin par byed na de tsam gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no /
aṅgacchede 'pyakopāttu rāgiṇaḥ kṣāntiśīlayoḥ
# chags bcas yan lag bcad kyang ni / / mi 'khrug bzod dang tshul khrims kyi /
yadā 'yamavītarāgo 'pi cchidyamāneṣvaṅgeṣu nālpamapi kupyati tadā 'sya kṣāntiśīlapāramite paripūrṇe bhavataḥ
# gang gi tshe 'dod chags dang ma bral bzhin du yan lag bcad kyang cung zad kyang mi 'khrug pa de'i tshe 'di'i tshul khrims dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag yongs su rdzogs pa yin no /
tiṣyastotreṇa vīryasya
# skar rgyal bstod pas brtson 'grus kyi /
tiṣyaṃ tathāgataratnaguhāyāṃ tejodhātusamāpannadṛṣṭyā bhagavān bodhisattvabhūta ekena pādena sthitvā sapta divasān stutavānekagāthayā
# bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal ri'i phug cig na me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa mthong nas rkang pa gcig gis 'grengs te zhag bdun gyi bar du /
na divi bhuvi vā nāsmin loke na vaiśravaṇālaye / na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā / caratu vasudhāṃ sphītāṃ kṛtsnāṃ saparvatakānanām
# skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dri'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul pa la med / / 'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang yod ma yin / / lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang yod min phyogs sam phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med / / ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas par kun tu yul gcig ga la yod /
puruṣavṛṣabhastvattulyo 'nyo mahāśramaṇaḥ kuta iti / tadā kila vīryapāramitā paripūrṇā nava ca kalpāḥ pratyudāvartitāḥ
# ces bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa de'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs la /
dhīsamādhyoranantaram / bodheḥ pūrvasamanantaraṃ dhyānaprajñāpāramitayoḥ paripūrirvajropamasamādhau svasyāḥ saṃpadaḥ pāragamanāt pāramitāḥ
# bskal pa dgu yang bsdums so zhes grag go de ma thag la ting nge 'dzin blo'i byang chub pa'i sngon rol gyi de ma thag rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bdag yongs su rdzogs te / / rang rang gi phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dag yin no /
sūtra uktaṃ trīṇi puṇyakriyāvastūni / dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayamiti / kathametattrayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
# mdo las sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi dang bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum gsungs pa / / ji ltar na gsum po 'di dag bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi yin zhe na /
puṇyaṃ kriyā 'tha tadvastu trayaṃ karmapathā yathā / puṇyamapyetattrayaṃ kriyā 'pi vastvapi yathāyogamiti puṇyakriyāvastu / tadyathā karma ca te panthānaśca panthāna eva ca karmaṇa iti karmaṃpathā uktāḥ
# gsum po bsod nams bya ba dang / / de'i gzhi dper na las lam bzhin / / gsum po 'di dag ni ci rigs par bsod nams kyang yin / / bya ba yang yin / / gzhi yang yin pas bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ste / / dper na de dag ni las kyang yin la las kyi lam yang yin pa dang las kyi lam kho na yin pas las kyi lam mo zhes bshad pa bzhin no /
tatra dānamaye tāvat puṇyakriyāvastuni kāyavākkarma tridhā bhavati / tatsamutthāpikā cetanā puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca
# de la re zhig sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi la lus dang ngag gi las ni rnam pa gsum char yin no / / de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems pa ni bsod nams kyang yin la bya ba yang yin no /
tatsahabhuvo dharmāḥ puṇyameva
# de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni bsod nams kho na yin no /
śīlamayaṃ tu kāyavākkarmaiveti tridhā bhavati
# tshul khrims las byung ba ni lus dang ngag gi las kho na yin pas rnam pa gsum char yin no /
bhāvanāmayo maitrī puṇyaṃ ca puṇyakriyāyāśca vastu / tatsaṃprayuktāyāścetanāyā maitrīmukhenābhisaṃskaraṇāt tatsahabhuvaścetanā śīlaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca kriyā ca / anye tatsahabhuvaḥ puṇyameva puṇyasya vā kāraṇaṃ puṇyakriyā puṇyaprayogastasyā etāni trīṇi vastūni
# bsgom pa las byung ba la byas pa ni bsod nams kyang yin la bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi yang yin te / / byams pa'i sgo nas de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ro / / de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i sems pa dang tshul khrims ni bsod nams kyang yin la bya ba yang yin no / / de dang lhan cig 'byung ba gzhan ni bsod nams kho na yin no / / yang na bsod nams byed pa ni bsod nams bya ba ste /
eṣāṃ saṃpādanārthaṃ puṇyaprayogārambhāditi / kuśalacetanāparamārthena puṇyakriyā / tasyā etāni vastūnītyapare / kimidaṃ dānaṃ nāma
# sbyor ba'o / / 'di dag sgrub pa'i ched du bsod nams kyi 'byor ba rtsom pa'i phyir gsum po 'di dag ni de'i gzhi yin no / / gzhan dag na re bsod nams bya ba ni don dam par na sems pa dge ba yin la / / 'di dag ni de'i gzhi yin no zhes zer ro / / sbyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na /
yadapi dīyate daddānam / iha tu
# gang sbyin par bya ba de yang sbyin pa yin mod kyi 'dir ni /
dīyate yena daddānaṃ
# gang gis sbyin byed de sbyin pa /
bhavati sma / rāgādibhirapi dīyate / na cātra tadiṣṭam / ato viśeṣaṇārthamāha / pūjānugrahakāmyayā
# 'jigs pa dang lan la re ba dang 'dod chags pa la sogs pas kyang sbyin par byed mod kyi / / de ni 'dir mi 'dod pas de'i phyir khyad par du bya ba'i phyir / / mchod dang phan gdags 'dod pa yis / / zhes bya ba smos te /
pareṣāṃ pūjānugrahakāmatābhyāṃ yena dīyate
# gang gis gzhan dag la mchod pa dang phan gdags par 'dod pa dag gis sbyin par byed pa'o /
kiṃ punastatsyādyena dīyate / kāyavākkarma sotthānaṃ
# gang gis sbyin par byed pa de yang gang zhig ce na / / lus dang ngag la slong dang bcas /
kiṃ punastadutthānam
# slong ba yang gang zhig ce na /
yena kalāpena tadutthāpyate / āha cātra
# tshogs gang gis de slong bar byed pa'o / / 'dir smras pa /
śubhena manasā dravyaṃ svaṃ dadāti yadā pumān
# gang tshe skyes bu dge yid kyis / / rang gi rdzas ngag sbyin byed pa /
tat kṣaṇaṃ kuśalāḥ skandhāḥ dānamityabhidhīyate / mahābhogyaphalaṃ ca tat / taccaitaddānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu mahābhogyaphalam
# de tshe dge ba'i phung po rnams / / sbyin pa zhes ni brjod pa yin / / zhes bya ba'o / / de 'bras longs spyod chen po can / / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu longs spyod chen po yin no /
svabhāve caiṣa mayaḍveditavyaḥ
# 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin yin par rig par bya ste /
tadyathā tṛṇamayaṃ gṛhaṃ parṇamayaṃ bhājanamiti / tat khalvetaddānaṃ / svaparārthobhayārthāya nobhayārthāya dīyate
# dper na rtsa las byung ba'i khyim dang lo ma las byung ba'i snod ces bya ba bzhin no / / yang sbyin pa de ni / / bdag gzhan don phyir gnyis don phyir / / gnyi ga'i don du min phyir sbyin /
tatra yadavītarāgaḥ āryaḥ pṛthagjano vā vītarāgaścaitye dānaṃ dadāti tadasyātmana evārthāya / pareṣāṃ tenānugrahābhāvāt
# de la 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'am / / so so'i skye bo 'dod chags dang ma bral bas mchod rten la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa des pha rol po dag la phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid kho na'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa yin no /
yadāryo vītarāgaḥ parasattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ tatra dānaṃ pareṣāmarthāya / tena teṣāmanugrahāt / nātmano 'rthāya / tadvipākabhūmeratyantasamatikrāntatvāt
# 'phags pa 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can pha rol po dag la sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par des de dag la phan btags pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don gyi phyir yin gyi bdag gi don gyi phyir ni ma yin te / / de'i rnam par smin pa'i sa las shin tu yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro /
yadavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjano vā vītarāgaḥ parasattvebhyo dadāti taddānamubhayeṣāmarthāya
# 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'am / / so so'i skye bo'i 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can pha rol po dag la sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga'i don gyi phyir yin no /
yadāryo vītarāgaścaitye dadāti sthāpayitvā dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ taddānamubhayeṣāṃ nārthāya / taddhi kevalaṃ gauravaṃ kṛtjñābhyāṃ dīyate
# 'phags pa 'dod chags dang bral bas mchod rten la 'bul bar byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par gnyi ga'i don gyi phyir yang ma yin te de ni bkur sti dang byas pa gzo ba 'ba' zhig gis 'bul bar zad do /
sāmānyena dānaṃ mahābhogyaphalamuktam
# sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod chen po can zhes spyir bstan pa /
tadviśeṣaḥ punardātṛvastukṣetraviśeṣataḥ / tatra tāvat
# de'i khyad par sbyin bdag dang / / dngos dang zhing gi khyad par las / / de la re zhig /
dātā viśiṣṭaḥ śraddhādyaiḥ
# sbyin bdag khyad 'phags dad sogs kyis /
śraddhāśīlaśrutādiguṇayukto dātā viśiṣṭo bhavati / tasya taddānadātṛviśeṣeṇa phaladānaṃ prativiśiṣyate / sa ca tādṛśo dātā
# dad pa dang tshul khrims dang thos pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sbyin bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin no / / sbyin bdag de'i sbyin pa de ni sbyin bdag gi khyad par gyis 'bras bu 'byin pa la khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur te / / sbyin bdag de lta bu de ni /
satkṛtyādi dadāti
# gus pa la sogs pas sbyin par byed /
satkṛtya svahastaṃ kāle parānupahatya dadāti
# gus pa dang rang gi lag dang dus su dang gzhan la mi gnod par sbyin par byed de /
ataḥ / satkārodārarucitā kālānācchedyalābhitā / ato 'sya dātustattādṛśaṃ dānaṃ dattvā yathākramaṃ catvāro viśeṣā bhavanti
# de phyir bkur sti rgya chen dang / / dus dang bar chad med par rnyed / / de'i phyir sbyin bdag 'di'i sbyin pa de lta bur byin pas go rims bzhin du khyad par bzhir 'gyur te /
satkāralābhī bhavati
# bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur /
udāreṣu ca bhogeṣu ruciṃ labhate
# longs spyod rgya chen po la dad pa rnyed par 'gyur /
kālelna ca bhogān labhate nātikrāntikālena
# longs spyod dus las mi yol bar dus su rnyed par 'gyur /
anācchedyāṃśca bhogān labhate
# longs spyod bar chad med par 'gyur te /
nāsya bhogāḥ parairācchādyante nāpyagnyādibhirvināśyante
# 'di'i longs spyod gzhan dag gis bar du mi chod cing / / me la sogs pas med par mi 'gyur ro /
uktaṃ yathā dātā viśiṣyate tadviśeṣācca dānaviśeṣaḥ
# ji ltar na sbyin bdag khyad par du 'phags pa yin pa dang de'i khyad par gyis sbyin pa'i khyad par yang bshad zin to /
atha vastu kathaṃ viśiṣyate / varṇādisampadā vastu
# ji ltar na dngos po khyad par du 'phags pa yin zhe na / / kha dog la sogs phun sum dngos /
viśiṣṭamiti vartate / yadi yaddīyate dadvarṇagandharasasparśānāmanyatamenāpi saṃpannaṃ bhavati
# khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya bar sbyar te / / gal te gang sbyin par bya ba de kha dog dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig gis phun sum tshogs pa yin na /
evaṃ vastu viśiṣyate / tādṛśaṃ vastu dattvā kiṃ bhavati
# de lta bu ni dngos po khyad par du 'phags pa yin no / / dngos po de lta bu byin pas ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
yathākramam
# rim pa bzhin du /
surūptvaṃ yaśasvi vā
# de las gzugs bzang grags ldan dang /
priyatā sukumārartusukhasparśāṅtā tataḥ
# dga' dang shin tu gzhon sha can / / dus su reg na bde lus 'gyur /
varṇasampannaṃ dattvā surūpo bhavati
# reg bya phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni gzugs bzang por 'gyur ro /
gandhasaṃpannaṃ dattvā yaśasvī bhavati / gandhavadyaśaso dikṣu vidhāraṇāt
# dri phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni dri bzhin du grags pas phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro /
rasasaṃpannaṃ dattvā priyo bhavati / rasa iva svāduḥ / sparśasaṃpannaṃ dattvā sukumārāṅgāśca bhavati ṛtusukhasparśāni cāsyāṅgāni bhavanti yathā strīratnasya
# ro phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni ro zhim po bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur ro / / reg bya phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni lus shin tu gzhon sha can dang; bud med rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du 'di'i dus su reg na bde ba'i lus su 'gyur ro /
atha kṣetraṃ kathaṃ viśipyate
# yang ji ltar na zhing khyad du 'phags pa yin zhe na /
gatiduḥkhopakāritvaguṇaiḥ kṣetraṃ viśiṣyate
# 'gro dang sdug bsngal phan 'dogs dang / / yon tan rnams kyis zhing khyad 'phags /
gativiśeṣātāvadviśiṣyate / tathā hyuktaṃ bhagavatā tiryagyonigatāya dānaṃ dattvā śataguṇo vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ
# re zhig 'gro ba'i khyad par gyis khyad du 'phags pa 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la sbyin pa byin na slar rnam par smin pa brgya 'gyur du re bar bya'o /
duḥśīlāya manuṣyabhūtāya dānaṃ dattvā sahasraguṇa iti / duḥkhaviśeṣā dviśiṣyate
# tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur pa'i mi la sbyin pa byin na stong 'gyur du re bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
tathā hyaupadhikeṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu / glāne dānaṃ glānopasthāpake dānam / śītalikādiṣu ca dānamuktvoktame bhiḥ saptabhiḥ auṣadhikaiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥsamanvāgatasya śrāddhasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na labhyaṃ puṇyānāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītumiti
# sdug bsngal gyi khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'di ltar rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dag tu nad pa la sbyin pa dang nad g yog la sbyin pa dang grang ba la sogs pa la sbyin par gsungs nas / / rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di bdun dang ldan pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am / / rigs kyi bu mo'i bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
upakāritvaviśeṣādyathā mātāpitroranyeṣāṃ copakāriṇām ṛṣyamṛgajātakādyudāharaṇāt
# phan 'dogs pa'i khyad par las ni 'di lta ste pha ma dang phan 'dogs pa gzhan rnams la sbyin pa byin pa ste / / dom dang ri dvags la sogs pa'i skyes pa'i rabs dper bya'o /
guṇaviśeṣādyathā śīlavate dattvā śatasahasraguṇo vipāka ityevamādi
# yon tan gyi khyad par las ni 'di lta ste / / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byin na rnam par smin pa 'bum 'gyur zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
sarveṣāṃ tu dānānām
# sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na /
agraṃ muktasya muktāya
# mchog ni grol bas grol ba la'ang /
yadvītarāgo vītarāgāya dattvā 'tidānamidaṃ śreṣṭhamāmiṣadāneṣu dānamityuktaṃ bhagavatā / bodhisattvasya ca
# 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba la byin pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zang zing gi sbyin pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog yin no zhes gsungs so / / byang chub sems dpa' yis /
yadvā dānaṃ bodhisattve dadāti sarvasattvahitahetostadamuktasyāpyamukte 'bhyādānamagram
# yang na byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni grol ba ma yin pas ma grol ba rnams la yang byin na mchog yin no /
tat sthāpayitvā yāni bhagavato 'nyānyaṣṭau dānānyuktāni teṣām / aṣṭamam
# de ma gtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dag sbyin pa brgyad gsungs pa de dag gi nang na ni brgyad pa mchog yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
agramiti vartate / katamānyaṣṭau / āsādya dānaṃ bhayadānam adānme dānaṃ dāsyati me dānaṃ dattpūrvaṃ me dānaṃ pitṛbhiśca pitāmahaiśceti dānaṃ dadāti svargārthaṃ dānaṃ kīrtyarthaṃ dānaṃ cittālaṅkārārthaṃ dānaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yiogasaṃbhārārthamuttamārthasya prāptaye dānaṃ dadāti
# brgyad gang zhe na / / nye ba la sbyin pa dang 'jigs pas sbyin pa dang bdag la byin pas sbyin pa dang bdag la sbyin par 'gyur bas sbyin pa dang sngon bdag gi pha dang mes po dag gis sbyin pa byin pas sbyin pa byin pa dang mtho ris kyi don du sbyin pa dang grags pa'i don du sbyin pa dang sems kyi rgyan gyi don dang sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi don dang don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin pa'o /
tatrāsādya dānaṃ yat āsannebhya upagatebhyo dānaṃ dadātīti paurāṇāḥ
# de la nye ba la sbyin pa ni snga ma dag na re nam nye bar gyur cing nye bar lhags pa dag la sbyin par byed pa'o zhes zer ro /
bhayadānaṃ yadvināśābhimukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā varaṃ dadāmīti dadāti
# 'jigs pas sbyin pa ni med par byed pa mngon sum du mthong nas dam pa sbyin no zhes sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa'o /
śeṣaṃ sugamatvānna vibhaktam
# lhag ma ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o /
srota āpattiphalapratipannakāya dānaṃ dattvā 'prameyavipākaḥ
# mdo las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa la sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa gzhal du med do /
tato 'prameyataraḥ srota āpannāyeti vistareṇoktaṃ sūtre
# rgyun du zhugs pa la byin na de bas kyang ches gzhal du med do zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs mod kyi /
apitu / mātṛpitṛglānadhārmakathikebhyo 'ntyajanmane
# gzhan yang; 'phags pa min yang pha ma dang / / nad pa dang ni chos smra dang /
bodhisattvāya cāmeyā anāryebhyo 'pi dakṣiṇā
# skye mtha'i byang chub sems dpa' la / / yon ni gzhal du med pa yin /
ebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ pṛthagjanabhūtebhyo 'pyaprameyā phalato dakṣiṇā bhavati
# lnga po 'di dag la ni so so'i skye bor gyur pa yin yang 'bras bu'i sgo nas yon gzhal du med pa yin no /
tatrāntyajanmā bodhisattvaścaramabhavikaḥ / dharmakathikaścaturvidhe kṣetraviśeṣe katamasmin pakṣe dikṣeptavyaḥ
# de la skye ba tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni srid pa tha ma pa yin no / / chos smra ba zhing gi khyad par rnam pa bzhi po'i phyogs gang du gtogs par bya zhe na /
upakāripakṣe / sa hi mahākalyāṇamitram avidyāndhāyāṃ prajāyāṃ prajñācakṣuṣo dātā samaviṣamasya prakāśayitā anāsravasya dharmakāyasyātinivartayitā samāsato buddhakṛtyasya kartā
# phan 'dogs pa'i phyogs su gtogs te / / de ni skye dgu ma rig pas ldongs pa rnams la shes rab kyi mig sbyin par byed pa dang mthun pa dang mi mthun pa rab tu ston par byed pa dang chos kyi sku zag pa med pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang mdor na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed pa yin pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po yin no /
karmaṇāṃ tu gurulaghutvaṃ jñātukāmena samāsataḥ ṣaṭ kāraṇāni jñeyāni
# las rnams kyi lci ba dang yang ba nyid shes par 'dod pas mdor na rgyu drug shes par bya ste /
tadyathā
# 'di lta ste /
pṛṣṭhaṃ kṣetramadhiṣṭhānaṃ prayiogaścetanāśayaḥ / eṣāṃ mṛdvadhimātratvāt karmamṛdvadhimātratā
# mjug dang zhing dang gzhi dang ni / / sbyor dang sems pa bsam pa ste / / de dag chung dang che ba las / / las kyang chung dang che ba nyid /
pṛṣṭhaṃ nāma yatkṛtasya punaranukriyā
# mjug ces bya ba ni byas pa'i rjes la byed pa gang yin pa'o /
kṣetraṃ nāma yatra kārāpakārāḥ kriyante / adhiṣṭhānaṃ karmapathaḥ / prayogastadarthaṃ kāyavākkarma
# zhing zhes bya ba ni gang du phan pa dang gnod pa dag byed pa'o gzhi ni las kyi lam mo / / sbyor ba ni de'i don du lus dang ngag gis las byed pa'o /
cetanā yayā karmapathaṃ niṣṭhāpayati / āśayastadabhiprāya evaṃ caivaṃ ca kuryāmevaṃ caivaṃ ca na kariṣyāmīti / kasyacit pṛṣṭhaparigraheṇaiva tatkarma guru saṃpadyate
# sems pa ni gang gis las kyi lam mthar phyin par byed pa'o / / bsam pa ni de dag la de dang 'di lta bu zhig ni bya'o / / de dang 'di lta bu zhig ni phyis bya'o snyam du sems pa ste / / la la'i mjug yongs su bzung ba kho na las de lci bar 'gyur te /
vipākanaiyamyenāvasthānāt
# rnam par smin par nges par gnas pa'i phyir ro /
kasyacit kṣetravaśenaiva / tatraiva kṣetre punaradhiṣṭhānavaśāt guru saṃpadyate nānyathā
# la la'i ni zhing gi dbang kho nas so / / zhing de nyid la gzhi'i dbang gis lci bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
yathā mātāitroḥ prāṇātipātāt na tvevamadattādānādikāt
# ji ltar pha dang ma la srog gcad pas lci bar 'gyur ba ltar ma byin par blangs pa la sogs pas ni de lta ma yin no /
evamanyadapi yojyam / yasya tu sarvāṇyadhimātrāṇi bhavanti tasyātyarthamadhimātraṃ guru karma veditavyam / yasya mṛdūni tasyātyarthaṃ mṛdu veditavyam / kṛtaṃ copacitaṃ ca karmocyate / kathaṃ karmopacitaṃ bhavati
# de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o / / gang gi thams cad che ba yin pa de ni las kyang shin tu ches lci ba yin par rig par bya'o / / gang gi chung ngu yin pa de ni shin tu chung ba yin par rig par bya'o / / las byas pa dang bsags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar na las bsags pa yin zhe na /
pañcabhiḥ karaṇaiḥ
# bsams bzhin pa dang rdzogs pa dang /
saṃcetanasamāptibhyāṃ niṣkaukṛtya vipakṣataḥ / parivārādvipākācca karmopacitamucyate
# mi 'gyod gnyen po med pa dang / / 'khor dang rnam par smin pa las / / bsags pa'i las zhes bya ba bzhin /
kathaṃ saṃcenataḥ
# bsams bzhin pa las ji lta bu zhe na /
saṃcintya kṛtaṃ bhavati nābuddhipūrvaṃ na sahasā kṛtam
# ched du bsams nas byas pa yin gyi blo sngon du ma btang ba yang ma yin la bab col du byas pa yang ma yin pa'o /
kathaṃ samāpattitaḥ
# rdzogs pas ji lta bu zhe na /
kaścidekena duścaritenāpāyānyātikaścidyāvattribhiḥ
# kha cig ni nyes par spyad pa gcig gis ngan song du 'gro la /
kaścidekena karmapathena kaścidyāvaddaśabhiḥ
# kha cig ni gsum gyi bar gyis 'gro ba dang kha cig ni las kyi lam gcig gis ngan song du 'gro la /
tatra yo yāvatā gacchati tasminnasamāpte kṛtaṃ tatkarma nopacitam samāpte tūpacitam
# kha cig ni bcu'i bar gyis 'gro ba de gang zhig gis ji tsam gyis der 'gro bar 'gyur ba rdzogs par ma byas na yang las de byas pa yin gyi bsags pa ni ma yin no / / rdzogs na ni bsags pa yin no /
kathaṃ niṣkaukṛtyavipakṣataḥ / nirvipratisāraṃ ca tat karma bhavati niṣpratipakṣaṃ ca
# mi 'gyod pa dang gnyen po med pas ji lta bu zhe na / / las de la yid la gcags pa med pa dang gnyen po med pa yin no /
kathaṃ parivārataḥ / akuśalaṃ cākuśalaparivāraṃ ca bhavati
# 'khor las ji lta bu zhe na / / mi dge ba la 'khor yang mi dge ba ma yin no /
kathaṃ vipākataḥ / vipākadāna niyataṃ bhavati
# rnam par smin pa las ji lta bu zhe na / / rnam par smin pa 'byin par nges pa yin no /
evaṃ kuśalamapi yojyam
# de bzhin du dge ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
ato 'nyathā karma kṛtaṃ bhavati nopacitam
# de las gzhan du byas pa'i las ni ma bsags pa yin no /
caitye sarāgasyātmārthaṃ dānamityuktam / tatrāsatyupabhoktari kathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati / dvividhaṃ hi puṇyaṃ tyāgānvayaṃ tyāgādeva yadupapadyate paribhogānvayaṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogādyadutpadyate
# 'dod chags dang bcas pas mchod rten la sbyin pa byin pa ni bdag gi don du'o zhes bshad pa / / de la longs spyod par byed pa med na ji ltar bsod nams su 'gyur zhe na / / bsod nams ni rnam pa gnyis te / / btang ba'i rgyu las byung ba ni btang ba kho na las byung ba gang yin pa'o / / yongs su longs spyod pa las byung ba ni sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su longs spyod pa las byung ba gang yin pa'o /
caitye tyāgānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ / paribhogānvyaṃ puṇyaṃ nāsti
# de la mchod rten la btang rgyus byung ba'i bsod nams yongs su longs spyod pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni med do /
kathaṃ tatrāpratigṛhṇati kasmiṃścit puṇyam
# de la len pa su yang med na ji ltar bsod nams yin zhe na /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sati pratigrahītari bhavitavyaṃ nāsatīti
# len par byed pa yod na ni bsod nams su 'gyur la / / med na ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la yang rgyu ci zhig yod /
kasyacidapyanugrahābhāvāt
# su la yang phan btags pa med pa'i phyir ro /
idamakāraṇam
# 'di ni rgyu ma yin te /
yadi hi puṇyaṃ parānugrahādeva syāt maitryādyapramāṇasamyagdṛṣṭibhāvanāyāṃ na syāt
# gal te phan btags pa kho nas bsod nams su gyur na ni / / byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgoms pa rnams bsod nams su mi 'gyur te /
tasmādeṣṭavyaṃ caityai 'pi puṇyam
# de lta bas na mchod rten la yang bsod nams su 'dod par bya'o /
maitryādivadagṛhṇati
# len med byams sogs bzhin /
yathā maitryādiṣvantareṇāpi pratigrāhakaṃ parānugrahaṃ vā puṇyaṃ bhavati svacittaprabhavaṃ tathābhyatīte 'pi guṇavati tadbhaktikṛtaṃ svacittāt puṇyaṃ bhavati
# ji ltar byams pa la sogs pa la len par byed pa 'am / / gzhan la phan 'dogs par med kyang rang gi sems kyi mthus bsod nams su 'gyur ba de bzhin du yon tan dang ldan pa 'das kyang de la dad pa byas pa rang gi sems las bsod nams su 'gyur ro /
dānamānakriyā tarhi vyarthā prāpnoti
# 'o na ni sbyin pa dang mchod par bya ba don med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
na / tatkarmasamutthāpikāyā bhakteḥ prakṛṣṭataratvāt
# ma yin te / / las de kun nas slong bar byed pa'i dad pa ni ches mchog yin pa'i phyir te /
yathā hi śatruvadhābhiprāyasya tatsamutthāpitaṃ kāyavākkarma / śatrusaṃjñayā tasminmṛte 'pi kurvato bahutaramapuṇyaṃ jāyate
# ji ltar dgra gsang pa'i bsam pa can des kun nas bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las de shi bzhin du dgra'i 'du shes kyis byed na bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi bsams pa tsam gyis ni ma yin pa de bzhin du /
nābhiprāyamātreṇa / tathābhyatīte śāstari tadbhaktisamutthāṃ dānamānakriyāṃ kurvato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ jāyate
# ston pa 'das kyang de la dad pas kun nas bslang ba'i sbyin pa dang mchod pa'i bya ba byed na bsod nams ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi dad pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no /
na bhaktimātreṇa / yadi svakṣetre dānakriyāvījamiṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati tatkṣetre tarhyaniṣṭaphalaṃ bhaviṣyati
# gal te zhing bzang po la sbyin par bya ba'i sa bon 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba can yin no / / 'o na zhing ngan pa la byin na 'bras bu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
kukṣetre 'pīṣṭaphalatā phalabījāviparyayāt
# rgyu las 'bras bu mi 'khrul phyir / / ngan pa'i zhing la'ang 'bras yid 'ong /
kukṣetre 'pi phalasya bījādaviparyayo dṛṣṭo mṛdvīkābījānmṛdvīkāphalamevotpadyate madhuraṃ nimbavījānnimbameva tiktam
# zhing ngan pa la yang sa bon las 'bras bu mi 'khrul ba mthong ste / / rgun 'brum gyi sa bon las ni rgun 'brum gyi 'bras bu mngar ba kho na skye la; nim pa'i sa bon las ni nim pa'i 'bras bu kha ba kho na skye'o /
evaṃ kukṣetre 'pi parahitādhyāśayapravṛttasya dānabījasyeṣṭameva phalaṃ nirvartate nāniṣṭam
# de bzhin du zhing ngan pa la yang gzhan la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa'i sbyin pa'i sa bon gyi 'bras bu yang yid du 'ong ba kho na 'grub kyi yid du mi 'ong ba ni ma yin no /
kṣetradoṣāttu tadvījamalpaphalaṃ vā bhavatyaphalaṃ vā
# zhing gi skyon gyis ni sa bon de'i 'bras bu chung ba 'am / / 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro /
gataṃ dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastu saprasaṅgam
# sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi zhar la 'ongs pa dang bcas te rdzogs so /
śīlamayaṃ vaktavyam / taducyate
# tshul khrims las byung ba brjod par bya ste / / des smras pa /
dauḥśītlamaśubhaṃ rūpaṃ śīlaṃ tadviratiḥ
# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims mi dge'i gzugs / / de spang tshul khrims /
akuśalaṃ hi rūpaṃ dauḥśīlyamucyate
# gzugs mi dge ba ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o /
tasmādviratiḥ śīlam
# de spong ba ni tshul khrims yin no /
sā punarviratiḥ / dvidhā / yayā ca viramyate vijñaptyā yacca tadviramaṇam avijñaptiḥ / na ca kevalaṃ dauḥśīlyādviratiḥ śīlam
# spong ba de yang rnam pa gnyis so / / rnam par rig byed gang gis spong bar byed pa dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa spong ba gang yin pa'o / / tshul khrims ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims las spong ba 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / pratikṣiptācca buddhena / yadapi na prakṛtyā dauḥśīlayaṃ bhagavatā ca buddhena pratikṣiptamakālabhojanādikaṃ tasmādapi dvidhā viratiḥ śīlam
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / sangs rgyas kyis ni bcad pa yang / / rang bzhin gyis 'chal ba'i tshul khrims ma yin yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcad pa dus ma yin pa'i zas la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag spong ba rnam pa gnyis kyang tshul khrims yin te /
samāttaśikṣasya tu tadadhyācārāddauḥśīlyaṃ jāyate
# slab pa mnos pas de dag spyad na 'chal ba'i tshul khrims su 'gyur ro /
uktaṃ tamāsena śīlam
# tshul khrims mdor bshad zin to /
viśuddhaṃ tu caturguṇam
# rnam dag yon tan bzhi ldan no /
tattu śīlaṃ caturguṇaṃ bhavati / viparyayādaviśuddham
# yon tan bzhi dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims de ni rnam par dag pa yin no / / bzlog pa ni rnam par ma dag pa yin no /
atha kathaṃ caturguṇamityāha
# ji ltar na yon tan bzhi dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
dauḥśīlyataddhetvahataṃ tadvipakṣaśamāśritam
# tshul khrims de rgyus 'phen ma byung / / de yi gnyen po zhi la brten /
dauḥśītyena tāvadanupahataṃ bhavati yathoktena dauḥśīlyena
# re zhig 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis 'phen ma byung ba ni ji skad du bshad pas 'phen ma byung ba yin no; /
hetunā 'pyanupahataṃ bhavati / lobhādibhiḥ kleśopakleśaiḥ dauḥśīlyavipakṣāśritaṃ ca bhavati
# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi rgyus 'phen ma byung ba ni chags pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'phen ma byung ba'i phyir ro /
smṛtyupasthānasaṃniśritatvāt samāśritaṃ ca bhavati
# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po la brten pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la brten pa'i phyir ro /
nopapattiviśeṣāśritam / nirvāṇapariṇāmitavāt / pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ ityapare
# zhi ba la brten pa ni skye ba'i khyad par la mi brten gyi mya ngan las 'das par yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro / / gzhan dag na re rgyu lnga ste /
maulaiḥ karmapathairviśuddhaṃ bhavati sāmantakairviśuddhaṃ vitarkairanupahataṃ smṛtyā 'nuparigahītaṃ nirvāṇapariṇāmitaṃ ceti
# las kyi lam dngos kyis rnam par dag pa yin pa dang nyer bsdogs dag gis rnam par dag pa dang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis 'phen ma byung ba dang; dran pas yongs su bzung ba dang mya ngan las 'das par yongs su bsngos pa yin no zhes zer ro /
caturvidhaṃ śīlamityapare
# gzhan dag na re tshul khrims ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
bhayaśīlaṃ yadā jīvikāślokadaṇḍadurgatibhayāt pālyate / āśāstiśīlaṃ yadbhavabhogasatkāratṛṣṇākṛtam / bodhyaṅgānulomaṃ śīlaṃ yanmokṣārthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭikāṇām / pariśuddhaṃ śīlamanāsravaśīlaṃ nirmalatvāditi / gataṃ śīlam / samāhitaṃ tu kuśalaṃ bhāvanā
# 'jigs pa'i tshul khrims ni 'tsho ba med pa dang tshigs su bcad pa med pa dang chad pa dang ngan 'gros 'jigs nas srung ba gang yin pa'o / / legs su smon pa'i tshul khrims ni srid pa dang longs spyod dang bkur sti la chags nas srung ba gang yin pa'o / / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rjes su mthun pa'i tshul khrims ni yang dag pa'i lta ba can rnams thar pa'i don du srung ba gang yin pa'o / / yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims ni dri ma med pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims yin no zhes zer ro / / tshul khrims rdzogs so / / mnyam par gzhag pa'i dge ba ni sgom pa'o /
kimidaṃ samāhitaṃ nāma
# mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na /
samādhisvabhāvaṃ sahabhū yat / kimarthametat bhāvanetyucyate
# ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dang de dang lhan cig 'byung ba gang yin pa'o / / 'di ci'i phyir bsgom pa zhes bya zhe na /
cittavāsanāt
# sems la sgo phyir ro /
taddhi samāhitaṃ kuśalamatyarthaṃ cittaṃ vāsayati / guṇaistanmayīkaraṇātsaṃtateḥ
# mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i dge ba de ni rgyud yon tan rnams kyis de'i bdag nyid du byed pa'i phyir sems la shin tu sgo bar byed pa yin te /
puṣpaistilabhāvanāvat / dānaṃ tāvanmahābhogatāyai saṃvartata ityuktam
# me tog rnams kyis til la bsgos pa bzhin no / / re zhig sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro zhes bshad na /
atha śīlaṃ bhāvanā ca / svargāya śīlaṃ prādhānyāt visaṃyogāya bhāvanā
# yang na tshul khrims dang bsgom pas cir 'gyur zhe na / / mtho ris don du tshul khrims dang / / 'bral ba'i don du bsgom gtso'i phyir /
dānamapi svargāya śīlaṃ prādhānyāt / śīlamapi visaṃyogāya / bhāvanā tu prādhānyāt / sutra uktaṃ catvāraḥ pudgalā brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantīti
# sbyin pa yang mtho ris kyi don du ni 'gyur mod kyi tshul khrims ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro / / tshul khrims kyis kyang 'bral bar mi 'gyur mod kyi bsgom pa ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro / / mdo las gang zag bzhi ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed do zhes gsungs pa /
katamat tad brāhmapuṇyam / yattallakṣaṇavipākasya karmaṇaḥ parimāṇajñāpanāyoktam iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / pūrvācāryās tu vyācakṣate
# tshangs pa'i bsod nams gang zhig yin zhe na / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / / mtshan ma rnam par smin pa can gyi las kyi tshad shes par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa gang yin pa'o zhes zer ro / / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re / / bskal par mtho ris dag gnas phyir /
caturṇāṃ brāhmapuṇyatvaṃ kalpaṃ svargeṣu modanāt
# bzhi yi tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin / / zhes zer te /
yāvatā puṇyena kalpaṃ svargeṣu modate idaṃ brāhmaṃ puṇyam
# bsod nams ji tsam gyis na bskal par mtho ris su dga' bar gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin te /
brahmapurohitānāṃ kalpāyuṣkatvāt / nikāyāntare gāthāṃ paṭhanti
# tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams kyi tshe bskal par thub pa'i phyir ro / / sde pa gzhan las kyang / / tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa ni /
brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati kalpaṃ svargeṣu modata iti
# bskal par mtho ris dga' bar gnas / / zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ngo /
āmiṣadānamuktam / dharmadānaṃ vaktavyam
# zang zing gi sbyin pa bshad zin to / / chos kyi sbyin pa brjod par bya ste /
tadidamucyate
# des smras pa /
dharmadānaṃ yathābhūta sūtrādyakliṣṭadeśanā
# chos sbyin nyon mongs can min pas / / mdo sogs yang dag ji bzhin ston /
sūtrādīnāṃ yathābhūtamakliṣṭadeśanā dharmadānam
# chos kyi sbyin pa ni mdo la sogs pa nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ston pa'o /
ato mahatīṃ ta ātmanaḥ puṇyajyāniṃ kurvanti ye viparītadharmaṃ deśayanti / kliṣṭacittā vā lābhasatkāra yaśāṃsi vāñchantaḥ
# de'i phyir gang dag chos log par 'chad par byed pa'am / / sems nyon mongs pa can rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa 'dod pas chad pa de dag ni bdag nyid kyi bsod nams chen po nyams par byed pa yin no /
uktaṃ puṇyakriyāvastubhedena trividhaṃ kuśalaṃ punaḥ
# bsod nams bya ba'i gzhir bye brag gis dge ba rnam pa gsum bshad zin to /
puṇyanirvāṇanirvedhabhāgīyaṃ kuśalaṃ tridhā
# bsod nams mya ngan 'das pa dang / / nges 'byed cha mthun dge rnams gsum /
puṇyabhāgīyaṃ yadiṣṭavipākaṃ mokṣabhāgīyaṃ yasminnutpanne niyataṃ parinirvāṇadharmā bhavati
# bsod nams kyi cha dang mthun pa ni rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba can gang yin pa'o / / thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni gang skyes na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos su nam 'gyur ba ste /
yasya saṃsārādīnavanairātmyanirvāṇaguṇadyotikāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā romaharṣāśrūpātau bhavatastasyāsti mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlamityavaseyaṃ pravṛṣīvāṅkuraprarohāt khalavileṣu bījāstitvam
# gang la 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang bdag med pa dang dmyal ba las 'das pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i gtam thos nas sgu zing zhes byed pa dang mchi ma 'khrug ces byed pa de la ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yod par shes par bya ste / / dbyar myu gu skye ba las na g yul gyi gseb na sa bon yod par shes pa bzhin no /
nirvedhabhāgīyamuṣmādi caturvidhaṃ paścādvyākhyāsyāmaḥ / yadidaṃ loka ucyate lipimudrāgaṇanā kāvyaṃ saṃkhyeti ka eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ
# des par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi yin te / / 'og nas bshad par bya'o / / 'jig rten yig 'bru dang rgya dang bgrang ba dang snyan ngag dang grangs zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
yogapravartitaṃ karma sasamutthāpakaṃ tridhā
# rigs pa'i rab tu bcug pa'i las / / rnam gsum kun slong bcas pa ni /
lipimudre sagaṇanaṃ kāvyaṃ saṃkhyā yathākramam
# yig 'bru rgya dang grangs bcas pa'i / / snyan ngag grangs te go rims bzhin; /
yogapravartitamiti upāyaviśeṣapravartitam / tridhā karmeti kāyavāṅmanaskarma
# rigs pas bcug pa zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi bye brag gis bcug pa'o / / las rnam pa gsum zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so /
tatra lipimudre tāvadyogapravartitaṃ kāyakarma samutthāpanam / gaṇanā kāvyaṃ ca vākkarma
# de la re zhig yig 'bru dang rgya ni lus kyi las rigs pas rab tu bcug pa kun nas slong ba dang bcas pa yin no / / bgrang ba dang snyan ngag ni ngag gi las te /
ityetāni pañcaskandhasvabhāvāni / saṃkhyā manaskarma / yanmanasā saṃkalanaṃ dharmāṇām
# de ltar na de dag ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin no / / grangs ni yid kyi las te / / yid kyi chos rnams sdom par byed pa gang yin pa'o /
dharmāṇāmidānīṃ kecit paryāyā ucyante
# da ni rnam grangs kha cig brjod par bya ste /
sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnāḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ
# sgrab ngan kha na ma tho bcas / / nyon mongs can ches /
kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnā iti paryāyāḥ / śubhāmalāḥ
# kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang bsgribs pa dang ngan pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams kyi rnam grangs dag yin no / / dri med dge /
praṇītāḥ
# gya nom /
kuśalānāsravāṇāṃ praṇītā iti paryāyaḥ
# gya nom pa zhes bya ba ni dge ba zag pa med pa rnams kyi rnam grangs yin no /
hīnapraṇītebhyo 'nye madhyā iti siddhaṃ bhavati / saṃskṛtaśubhāḥ sevyāḥ
# ngan pa dang gya nom pa dag las gzhan pa ni bar ma zhes bya bar grub pa yin no / / 'dus byas dge bsten bya /
kusalasaṃskṛtānāṃ sevitavyā iti paryāyaḥ
# bsten par bya zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas kyi chos dge ba rnams kyi rnam grangs yin no /
śeṣā asevitavyā iti siddhaṃ bhavati
# lhag ma rnams ni bsten par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no /
kasmādasaṃskṛtaṃ na sevyam
# ci'i phyir 'dus ma byas bsten par bya ba ma yin zhe na /
anabhyasanīyatvādaphalatvācca / phalarthaṃ hi sevā bhavati
# goms par byar mi rung ba'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i don du bsten par bya ba yin na 'bras bu yang med pa'i phyir ro /
sottarā anye sarvadharmāḥ / mokṣastvanuttaraḥ
# chos gzhan thams cad ni bla ma dang bcas pa yin gyi / / thar pa bla na med pa yin /
nahi nirvāṇādviśiṣṭataramasti / tacca sarvebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ kuśalanityatvāt / abhidharmakośabhāṣye karmanirddeśo nāma caturthaṃ kośasthānamiti
# mya ngan las 'das pa las ches khyad par du 'phags pa ni med kyi / / de ni dge ba dang rtag pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad pas khyad par du 'phags pa yin no / / chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las las bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas bzhi pa'o /
pañcamaṃ kośasthānam
# las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes /
oṃ namo buddhāya
# zhes bshad pa /
karmajaṃ lokavaicitrya mityuktam / tāni karmāṇyanuśayavaśādupacayaṃ gacchanti antareṇa cānuśayān bhavābhinirvarttane na samarthāni bhavanti / ato veditavyāḥ
# las de dag kyang phra rgyas kyi dbang gis bsags par 'gyur gyi; phra rgyas med par ni srid pa mngon par 'grub par mi nus pa de'i phyir / / srid pa'i rtsa ba phra rgyas yin par rig par bya ste /
mūlaṃ bhavasyānuśayāḥ / kleśo hi pravartamāno daśa kṛtyāni karoti / mūlaṃ ca dṛḍhīkaroti saṃtatimavasthāpayati kṣetramāpādayati niḥṣyandaṃ nirvartayati karmabhavamabhinirharati svasaṃbhāraṃ arigṛhṇāti ālambane saṃmohayati vijñānasroto namayati kuśalapakṣādvyutkrāmati pandhanārthaṃ ca spharati dhātvanatikramayogeneti
# nyon mongs pa 'jug pa na bya ba bcu byed de / / rtsa ba brtan par byed do / / rgyud gnas par byed do / / zhing du sgrub par byed do / / rgyu mthun par sgrub par byed do; / / las kyi srid pa mngon par sgrub par byed do / / rang gi tshogs yongs su 'dzin par byed do / / dmigs pa la kun du rmongs par byed do / / rnam par shes pa'i rgyun 'khrid par byed do / / dge ba'i phyogs las g yo bar byed do / / khams las mi 'da' ba'i tshul gyis 'ching ba'i don du khyab par byed do /
kati ceme 'nuśayāḥ / samāsena ṣaṭ
# phra rgyas de dag kyang du zhig ce na / / mdor bsdus na /
katame / ṣaḍrāgaḥ pratighastathā / māno 'vidyā ca dṛṣṭiśca vicikitsā ca
# drug drug gang zhe na / / 'dod chags de bzhin khong khro dang / / nga rgyal ma rig lta ba dang / / the tshom yin te /
athāgrahaṇaṃ rāgavaśenānyeṣāmālambanānuśāyitajñāpanārtham
# de bzhin zhes smos pa ni 'dod chags kyi dbang gis gzhan dag dmigs pa las rgyas par gyur pa nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir te /
etacca paścāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ
# de ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
te punaḥ
# de drug kyang /
ṣaḍrāgabhedātsaptoktāḥ
# 'dod chags dbye bas bdun du bshad /
ta ete ṣaḍnuśayāḥ sūtre rāgasya dvidhā bhedaṃ kṛtvā saptoktāḥ
# phra rgyas drug po de dag kyang mdo las 'dod chags phye nas bdun du bshad de /
kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayo bhavarāgānuśayo mānānuśyaḥ avidyānuśayo dṛṣṭyanuśayo vicikitsānuśaya iti / kathamidaṃ jñātavyaṃ kāmarāga evānuśayaḥ kāmarāgānuśayaḥ āhosvit kāmarāgasyānuśayaḥ kāmarāganuśayaḥ / kiṃ cātaḥ
# 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas dang khong khro ba'i phra rgyas dang srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas dang nga rgyal gyi phra rgyas dang ma rig pa'i phra rgyas dang lta ba'i phra rgyas dang the tshom gyi phra rgyas so / / ji ltar shes par bya / / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid phra rgyas yin pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin nam / / 'on te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin / / de las cir 'gyur /
kāmarāga evānuśayaścet sūtravirodhaḥ
# gal te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid phra rgyas yin na ni /
ihaikatyo na kāmarāgaparyavasthitena cetasā bahulaṃ viharati
# 'di na la las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyi las mang du mi gnas la /
utpannasya kāmarāgaparyavasthānasyottari niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
# 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa byung na yang phyis nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes shing /
tasya tatkāmarāgaparyavasthānaṃ sthāmaśaḥ samyaktvasamavahataṃ sānuśayaṃ prahīyataiti / kāmarāgasyānuśayaścedviprayuktānuśayaprasaṅgādabhidharmavirodhaḥ kāmarāgānuśayastribhirindriyaiḥ saṃprayukta iti
# de'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa de'i mthus yang dag par shin tu kun nas 'joms shing phra rgyas dang bcas par spong bar byed do zhas gsungs pa'i mdo dang 'gal lo; / / gal te de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin na ni phra rgyas ldan par ma yin par thal bar 'gyur bas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ni dbang po gsum dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no zhas 'byung ba'i chos mngon pa dang 'gal lo /
kāmarāga evānuśya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / evaṃ yāvadvicikitsaivānuśaya iti / nanu coktamevaṃ sūtravirodha iti / nāsti virodhaḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid phra rgyas yin te / / the tshom nyid phra rgyas yin pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro / / de lta na mdo dang 'gal lo zhes bshad pa ma yin nam / / 'gal ba med de /
sānuśayaṃ sānubandhamityarthaḥ / aupacāriko vā sūtre 'nuśayaśabdaḥ prāptau / yathā duḥkho 'gniriti / lākṣaṇikastvabhidharme kleśa evānuśayaśabdaḥ / tasmātsaṃyuktā evānuśayāḥ / kathamidaṃ gamyate
# phra rgyas dang bcas pa ni rjes su 'bral ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don yin pa'i phyir ro; / / yang na mdo las phra rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba ni thob pa la nye bar btags pa yin te / / dper na me sdug bsngal zhes bya ba bzhin no / / chos mngon pa las phra rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba ni nyon mongs pa kho na la mtshan nyid pa yin te / / de lta bas na phra rgyas rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pa kho na yin no / / 'di ji ltar shes she na /
anuśayānāṃ / cittakleśakaratvādāvaraṇatvācchubhairviruddhatvāt / yasmādanuśayaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ bhavatyapūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyate utpannācca parihīyate tasmānna viprayuktāḥ / atha viprayuktairapyevaṃ syāt
# phra rgyas rnams ni / / sems ni nyon mongs byed phyir dang / / sgrib phyir dge dang 'gal phyir dang / / gang gi phyir phra rgyas rnams kyi sems nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ba dang sngon med pa'i dge ba mi skye ba dang skyes pa las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ldan pa ma yin no /
kuśalaṃ na kadācidupalabhyeta / teṣāṃ nityaṃ saṃnihitatvāt / upalabhyate ca / ataḥ / kuśalasya copalambhādaviprayuktāḥ atha ihānuśayāḥ iti
# 'on te ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang de ltar 'gyur na ni de dag rtag tu nye ba'i phyir dge ba nam yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba zhig na dmigs te / / de lta bas na dge ba 'ang dmigs pa'i phyir na 'dir / / phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin min / / 'di ni gtan tshigs su mi rung ste /
tadidamajñāpakaṃ yasmādyo viprayuktamanuśayamicchati sa etatsarvamanuśayakṛtaṃ necchati
# 'di ltar gang zhig phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin par 'dod pa de yang 'di thams cad phra rgyas kyis byas par ni mi 'dod kyi nyon mongs pas byas pa kho nar 'dod do /
kleśakṛtamevecchati / evaṃ tu sādhu yathā sautrāntikānām
# mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta ba de lta bu ni legs pa yin no /
kathaṃ ca sautrāntikānām
# mdo sde pa rnams kyi ji lta bu yin zhe na /
kāmarāgasyānuśayaḥ kāmarāgānuśaya iti / na cānuśayaḥ saṃprayukto na viprayuktastasyādravyāntaratvāt
# 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas yin la / / de rdzas gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir phra rgyas ni mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin la /
prasupto hi kleśo 'nuśaya ucyate / prabuddhaḥ paryavasthānam / kā ca tasya prasuptiḥ
# ldan pa ma yin pa yang ma yin gyi / / nyon mongs pa nyal ba la ni phra rgyas zhes bya la / / sang pa la ni kun nas dkris pa zhes bya'o / / de la nyal ba gang yin zhe na /
asaṃmukhībhūtasya bījabhāvānubandhaḥ
# mngon sum du ma gyur par sa bon gyi dngos pos rjes su 'brel lo /
kaḥ prabodhaḥ
# sad pa gang yin zhe na /
saṃmukhībhāvaḥ
# mngon sum du 'gyur ba'o /
ko 'yaṃ vījabhāvo nāma / ātmabhāvasya kleśajā kleśotpādanaśaktiḥ / yathānubhavajñānajā smṛtyutpādanaśaktiryathā cāṅkurādīnāṃ śāliphalajā śāliphalotpādanaśaktiriti / yastu kleśānāṃ bījārthamarthāntaraṃ vīprayuktamanuśayaṃ kalpayati tena smṛtibījamapyarthāntaraṃ kalpayitavyaṃ jāyate
# sa bon gyi dngos po zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / / lus kyi nyon mongs pa las skyes pa nyon mongs pa bskyed pa'i mthu yin te / / dper na nyams su myong ba'i shes pa las skyes pa dran pa bskyed pa'i mthu dang yang dper na myu gu la sogs pa s'a lu'i 'bras bu las bskyed pa'i mthu dang 'dra'o / / gang zhig nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa bon gyi don du phra rgyas ldan pa ma yin pa don gzhan du rtog par byed pa des na dran pa'i sa bon yang don gzhan du brtag par bya bar 'gyur ro /
yattarhi sūtre kleśa evānuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke so 'sya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti
# 'o na mdo las nyon mongs pa nyid phra rgyas su gang gsungs pa de ji lta bu ste / / drug tshan drug pa las 'di'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags de bde ba'i tshor ba la rgyas par 'gyur ro /
bhavatīti vacanānnāsau tadaivānuśayaḥ / kadā tarhi bhavati
# rgyas par gsungs so she na / / 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir / / de kho na ni phra rgyas ma yin no / / 'o na nam 'gyur zhe na /
yadā prasupto bhavati
# gang gi tshe nyal ba na 'gyur ro /
hetau vā tadupacāra eṣa draṣṭavyaḥ
# yang na 'di ni rgyu las de nye bar btags pa yin par blta bar bya'o /
tiṣṭhatu prasaṅgaḥ / śāstraṃ pravarttatām / ya eṣa sūtre rāgasya bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti
# zhar la 'ongs pa bzhag nas bstan bcos la 'jug par bya ste / / mdo las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes 'dod chags che ba gang yin pa /
ko 'yaṃ bhavarāgaḥ / bhavarāgo dvidhātujaḥ
# srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / / khams gnyis las skyes srid 'dod chags /
rūpārūpyadhātujo rāgo bhavarāgaḥ kṛṭaḥ / kiṃ kāraṇamevaṃ kṛtaḥ
# gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams las skyes pa'i 'dod chags ni srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do / / ci'i phyir de skad du bshad ce na /
antarmukhatvāttanmokṣasaṃjñāvyāvṛttaye kṛtaḥ
# kha ni nang du bltas phyir der / / thar ba'i 'du shes bzlog phyir bshad /
samāpattirāgo hi teṣāṃ prāyeṇa / sa cāntarmukhapravṛttastasmāt bhavarāgaḥ
# de dag ni phal cher snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'dod chags pa yin la / / de yang kha nang du bltas pa yin te /
uktastayoḥ kila dhātvormokṣasaṃjñāvyāvyavarttanārthamekeṣāmiti
# de lta bas na kha cig khams de gnyis las thar pa yin no snyam pa'i 'du shes bzlog pa'i phyir srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do zhes grag go /
ātmabhāva eva tu bhavaḥ / te ca sattvāḥ samāpattiṃ sāśrayā māsvādayanta ātmabhāvamevāsvādayanti kāmavītarāgatvāt / ataḥ sa rāgo bhavarāga ityuktaḥ
# lus kho na srid pa yin la sems can de dag kyang snyoms par 'jug pa rten dang bcas pa ro myong bar byed pa na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir lus kho na ro myong bar byed pa yin te / / de'i phyir 'dod chags de ni srid pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do /
punarete ṣaḍanuśayā abhidharme daśa kriyante
# yang chos mngon pa las phra rgyas drug po de las bcur yang 'chad de /
kathaṃ kṛtvā
# ji ltar byas pas she na /
dṛṣṭayaḥ pañca satkāyamithyāntagrāhadṛṣṭayaḥ
# lta ba lnga ste 'jig tshogs dang / / log dang mthar 'dzin lta ba dang /
dṛṣṭiśīlavṛtaparāmarśāviti punardaśa / ṣaṇṇāmanuśayānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pañcadhā kṛtvā daśa bhavanti / pañca dṛṣṭisvabhāvāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrahadṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭirdṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavṛtaparāmarśaśca
# lta ba dang ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin dang bcu / / phra rgyas drug las lta ba rnam pa lngar byas na bcur 'gyur te / / lta ba'i rang bzhin lnga ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang log par lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o /
yathā dṛṣṭisvabhāvāḥ rāgahpratidhho māno 'vidyā vicikitsā
# lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa lnga ni 'dod chags dang / / khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dang the tshom mo /
ete punarete daśānuśayā abhidharme 'ṣṭānavatiḥ kriyante / kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśat ārūpyāvacarā ekatriṃśat
# yang chos mngon pa las phra rgyas bcu po de dag las 'dod pa na spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug dang gzugs na spyod pa sum cu rtsa gcig dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa sum cu rtsa gcig ste / / dgu bcu rtsa brgyad du yang 'chad do /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / samāsato hyete 'nuśayāstraidhātukā darśanaprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyāśca / tatra tāvat kāmāvacarā darśanaprahātavyā dvātriṃśat
# ji ltar byas pas she na / / phra rgyas de dag ni mdor bsdu na khams gsum pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no / / de la re zhig 'dod pa'i khams na spyod pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so /
katame ta ityāha / daśaite saptasaptāṣṭau tridvidṛṣṭivivarjitāḥ
