# de dag gang zhe na / / de dag bcu dang bdun bdun brgyad / / lta ba gsum gnyis ma gtogs par /
yathākramaṃ prahīyante kāme duḥkhādidarśanaiḥ
# 'dod na sdug bsngal la sogs pa / / mthong bas rim bzhin spong bar byed / / zhes bya ba smos te /
ya ete daśānuśayā uktā ete kāmadhātau daśāpi duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ santi
# phra rgyas bcur bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag 'dod pa'i khams na sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni bcu yod do /
ebhya eva sapta samudayadarśanapraheyāḥ / sapta nirodhadarśanaheyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ ca varjayitvā / aṣṭau mārgadarśanaheyāḥ / satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ ca varjayitvā
# de dag nyid la kun 'byung 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba bdun dang; 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba bdun te / / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ma gtogs so / / lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni brgyad de / / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba ma gtogs so /
ityete kāmāvacarā dvātriṃśadanuśayā darśanaprahātavyāḥ / satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa prahāṇāt
# de ltar na phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gnyis so / / de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag yin te / / bden pa rnams mthong ba tsam gyis spong ba'i phyir ro /
catvāro bhāvanāheyāḥ
# bzhi ni bsgom pas spang bya yin /
tadyathā rāgaḥ pratigho māno 'vidyā ca / dṛṣṭasatyasya paścāt mārgābhyāsena prahāṇāt / tadevaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭirekaprakārā bhavati duḥkhadarśanaheyā
# 'di lta ste / / 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang ma rig pa dang nga rgyal dang / / den pa mthong bas phyis lam goms par byas pas spong ba'i phyir ro / / de ltar na 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni rnam pa gcig ste / / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la /
evamantagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ mithyādṛṣṭiścatuṣprakārā bhavati / duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyā / evaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vicikitsā ca
# mthar 'dzin par lta ba yang de dang 'dra'o / / log par lta ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la / / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the tshom yang de dang 'dra'o /
śīlavrataparāmaṛśo dviprakāraḥ duḥkhamārgadarśanaheyaḥ / rāgapratighamānāvidyāḥ pañcaprakārāścatuḥsatyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca
# tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mtshog tu 'dzin pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / / sdug bsngal dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no / / 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa rnams ni rnam pa lnga ste / / bden pa bzhi mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no /
kīdṛśā ete duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kīdṛśā yāvad bhāvanāheyāḥ / ye yaddarśanaheyālambanāste taddarśanaheyā avaśiṣṭā bhāvanāheyāḥ / tā eva dvādaśa dṛṣṭayo bhavanti catasro vicikitsāḥ pañca rāgāḥ pañca pratighāḥ pañca mānāṃ pañcāvidyā ityete kāmāvacarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti
# sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba de dag ni ci lta bu yin / / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bar du ni ji lta bu yin zhe na / / gang dag gang zhig mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i dmigs pa can de dag ni de mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la lhag ma ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no / / de dag la lta ba ni bcu gnyis yin no / / the tshom ni bzhi yin no / / 'dod chags ni lnga yin no / / khong khro ba ni lnga yin no / / nga rgyal ni lnga yin no / / ma rig pa rnams ni lnga yin te / / de ltar na phra rgyas sum cu rtsa drug po de dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa yin no /
ta evāpratighāḥ punaḥ
# khod khrom gtogs de dag nyid /
rūpadhātau
# gzugs khams /
pañcaprakāraṃ pratighamapahāya ta eva rūpāvacarā ekatriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti
# khong khro ba lnga bor nas gzugs na spyod pa'i phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gcig po de dag nyid yin no /
yathā rūpadhātau / tathārūpye
# gzugs kyi khams na ji lta bar gzugs med pa yang de dang 'dra /
ekatriṃśadanuśayā bhavanti / ityaṣṭānavatirmatāḥ
# phra rgyas sum cu rtsa gcig ste / / de ltar dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'dod /
ta evamete ṣaḍanuśayā ākāraprakāradhātubhedairaṣṭānavatirmatāḥ āmidhārmikāṇām
# de ltar na chos mngon pa dag na re phra rgyas drug po de dag rnam pa dang bye brag dang khams kyi dbye pas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad du 'dod do /
ya ime darśanaprahātavyānuśayā uktāḥ kimete niyataṃ darśanenaiva prahīyante
# ci mthong ste spang bar bya ba'i chos phra rgyas su bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag nges par mthong ba kho nas spong ngam zhe na / / smras pa /
netyāha
# ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / bhavāgrajāḥ kṣāntivadhyā dṛggheyā eva
# 'o na ci lta bu zhe na / / srid rtse las skyes bzod pa yis / / gzhom bya mthong bas spang bya nyid /
ye bhavāgrabhūmijā anvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayāste darśanaheyā eva na bhāvanāheyāḥ / śeṣajāḥ / dṛgbhāvanābhyām
# srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa las skyes pa'i phra rgyas gang dag rjes su shes pa'i bzod pas gzhom par bya ba de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba kho na yin gyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag ni ma yin no / / lhag skyes mthong dang bsgom gnyis kyis /
kṣāntivadhyā iti vartate
# bzod pas gzhom par bya ba zhes bya bar sbyar te /
śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu yathāyogaṃ dharmānvayajñānakṣāntiheyā anuśayā āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyāḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ
# sa lhag ma dag na chos dang rjes su shes pas bzod pa spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas yod pa rnams ni ci rigs par 'phags pa rnams kyis ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin la / / so so'i skye bo rnams kyis ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no; /
akṣāntivadhyā bhāvanayaiva tu
# bzod pas gzhom min bsgom kho nas /
sarvāsu bhūmiṣu ye 'nuśayā jñānavadhyāste ubhayeṣāṃ nityaṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ
# sa thams cad na phra rgyas gang dag shes pas gzhom par bya ba yod pa de dag ni gnyi ga'i yang rtag tu bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no /
naiva hi bāhyakānāṃ darśanaprahātavyāḥ prahīyanta ityapare / tathāhi mahākarmavibhāgasūtre pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ ca śāśvatavādināmekatyaśāśvatikānām ahetusamutpattikānāṃ ca vītarāgāṇāṃ ca kāmadhātvālambanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ
# gzhan dag na re phyi rol pa rnams kyis ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams ni spong ba kho na ste / / 'di ltar las rnam par 'byed pa chen po'i mdo dang sngon gyi mtha' las rtog pa spong ba rnams las rtag par smra pa rnams dang la la rtag par smra ba rnams dang rgyu med pa las kun du 'byung bar smra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la 'dod pa'i khams las dmigs pa'i lta ba kun du 'byung bar gsungs te /
na ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ kāmadhāturālambanaṃ vītarāgatvāt
# gzugs na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa ni ma yin te / / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ro /
tasmāt kāmapratisaṃyuktā eva tā aprahīṇā iti
# de lta bas na 'dod pa dang ldan pa de dag kho na ma spangs pe yin no zhes zer ro /
dṛṣṭyutpādasamakālaṃ te parihīṇā devadatta iveti vaibhāṣikāḥ / dṛṣṭayaḥ paṇca nāmato nirdiṣṭā na tu svabhāvatastat kastāsāṃ svabhāvaḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de dag kyang lta ba bskyed pa dang dus mnyam du yongs su nyams pa'i phyir te / / lha sbyin bzhin no zhes zer ro / / lta ba lnga ming gi sgo nas bstan gyi rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas ni ma bstan pas 'di dag gi rang gi ngo bo ci zhe na /
ātmātmīyadruvocchedanāstihīnā gradṛṣṭayaḥ
# bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang / / me dang sman la mchog lta dang /
ahetvamārge taddṛṣṭiretāstāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayaḥ
# rgyu min lam min der lta ba / / de dag lta ba lnga yin no /
ātmadṛṣṭirātmīyadṛṣṭirvā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ
# bdag gam bdag gir lta ba ni / / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'o /
sīdatīti sat / cayaḥ kāyaḥ saṃghātaḥ skandha ityarthaḥ
# 'jig pas na 'jig pa'o / / bsags pas na tshogs pa ste / / mang po dang phung po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
saccāyaṃ kāyaśceti satkāyaḥ pañcopādānaskandhāḥ
# 'di ni 'jig pa yang yin la tshogs kyang yin pas 'jig tshogs te / / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o /
nityasaṃjñāṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ ca tyājayitumevaṃ dyotitā
# rtag par 'du shes pa dang ril por 'du shes pa spang ba'i phyir / / de skad du bshad de /
etatpūrvako hi teṣvātmagrahaḥ
# de dag la bdag tu 'dzin pa ni de dag sngon du 'gro ba can yin no /
satkāye dṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ
# 'jig tshogs la lta bas na 'jig tshogs la lta ba'o /
sarvaiva sāsravālambanā dṛṣṭiḥ satkāye
# zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa thams cad kyang 'jig tshogs la lta ba yin mod kyi /
ātmātmīyadṛṣṭireva tu satkāyadṛṣṭiruktā
# ci nas kyang 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yin gyi / / bdag gam bdag gi la ni ma yin no /
yathā gamyeta satkāyadṛṣṭiriyaṃ nātmani nātmīye veti
# zhes rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bdag dang bdag gir lta ba kho na 'jig tshogs ji lta bar bshad de /
yathoktaṃ ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāniti / tasyaivātmābhimatasya vastuno dhruvadṛṣṭirucchedadṛṣṭirvā 'ntagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ / śāśvatocchedāntagrahaṇāt / sati duḥkhādisatye nāstīti dṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiḥ
# ji skad du dge slong dag dge sbyong ngam / / bram ze gang la la bdag go snyam du yang dag par rjes su lta ba na yang dag par rjes su lta ba de dag thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la lta ba kho nar zad do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o / / bdag tu mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po de nyid la rtag par lta ba'am / / chad par lta ba ni mthar 'dzin par lta ba ste / / rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro / / sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i bden pa yod na med do zhes bya ba ni log par lta ba'o /
sarvaiva hi viparītasvabhāvapravṛṭtā dṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiḥ ekaiva tūktā
# log par zhugs pa'i lta ba thams cad log par lta ba yin pa las mar drang ba bzhin du ha cang chabs chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir gcig kho na bshad de /
atiśayavattvāt durgandhakṣatavat / eṣā hyapavādikā anyāstu samāropikāḥ
# 'di ni skur pa 'debs par byed pa yin la / / gzhan dag ni sgro 'dogs par byed pa yin no /
hīne agradṛṣṭirdṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ
# dman pa la mchog tu 'dzin par lta ba ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa'o /
kiṃ hīnam / sarvaṃ sāsravam / āryaiḥ prahīṇatvāt / tasyāgrato grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ
# dman pa yang ci zhig yin zhe na / / zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad de / / 'phags pa rnams kyis spang ba'i phyir ro / / de la mchog tu 'dzin pa ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te /
dṛṣṭyādiparāmarśa iti vaktavye ādiśabdalopaḥ kṛtaḥ
# lta ba la sogs pa mchog tu 'dzin pa zhes brjod par bya ba'i rigs pa la sogs pa'i sgra mi mngon par byed do /
ahetau hetudṛṣṭiramārge mārgadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavṛtaparāmarśaḥ
# rgyu ma yin pa la rgyur lta ba dang lam ma yin pa la lam du lta ba ni tshul khrims dang brdul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te /
tadyathā maheśvaro na heturlokānām
# 'di lta ste / / dbang phyug chen po'am /
taṃ ca hetuṃ paśyati prajāpatimanyaṃ vā
# skye dgu'i bdag po'am / / gzhan yang rung ste /
agnijalapraveśādayaśca na hetuḥ svargasya tāṃśca hetuṃ paśyati / śīlavratamātrakaṃ sāṃkhyayogajñānādayaśca na mārgo mokṣāsya tāṃśca mārgaṃ paśyati
# 'jig rten rnams kyi rgyu ma yin na de la yang rgyur lta ba dang me dang chur 'jug pa la sogs pa mtho ris kyi rgyu ma yin na de dag la yang rgyur lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs tsam dang grangs can dang rnal 'byor gyi shes pa la sogs pa thar pa'i lam ma yin na de dag la yang lam du lta ba lta bu ste /
atrāpi kilādiśabdalopaḥ kṛta ityetāstāḥ pañca dṛṣṭayo veditavyāḥ
# 'dir yang sogs pa'i sgra mi mngon par byas so zhes grag go / / de ltar na de dag ni lta ba lnga yin par rig par bya'o /
satyakāraṇe kāraṇadṛṣṭiḥ śilavrataparāmarśaḥ
# gal te rgyu yin pa las rgyur lta ba tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yin na /
kasmādayaṃ na samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ
# ci'i phyir kun 'byung bas mthong bas spang bar bya pa ma yin zhe na /
yo hi kaścidīśvaraḥ prajāpatimanyaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ paśyati sa tannityamekaṃ cātmānaṃ kartāramabhiniviśya / tadyasmāt sa
# gang la la dbang phyug gam / / skye dgu'i bdag po la rgyur lta ba de ni de la rtag pa gcig pu dang bdag dang byed pa por mngon par zhen nas lta ste / / de lta bas na 'di ltar /
īśvarādiṣu nityātmaviparyāsāt pravartate
# dbang phyug sogs rgyur mngon zhen pa / / de ni rtag bdag phyin ci log pa yis /
kāraṇābhiniveśo 'to duḥkhadṛggheya eva saḥ
# rab tu 'jug pas de phyir de / / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bya nyid /
duḥkhadarśanādeva hi teṣu tau nityātmagrāhau prahīyete / tasmāttatkṛto 'pi kāraṇābhiniveśastata eva prahīyate / yastarhi jalāgnipraveśādibhiḥ svargopapattiṃ paśyati śīlavṛtena vā śuddhiṃ so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya eva
# de dag la rtag pa dang bdag tu 'dzin pa de gnyis ni sdug bsngal mthong ba kho nas spong bar 'gyur te / / de lta bas na des byas pa rgyur mngon par zhen pa yang de nyid kyis spong bar 'gyur ro / / 'o na gang me dang chur 'jug pa la sogs pas mtho ris su skye ba'am / / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyis 'dag par lta ba ji lta bu yin / / de yang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin te /
eṣa hi śāstrapāṭhaḥ / ye caivaṃ dṛṣṭaya evaṃvādino yadayaṃ puruṣapudgalo gośīlaṃ samādāya vartate mṛgaśīlaṃ kukkuraśīlaṃ sa tena śudhyati mucyate sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti / akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyeti śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ iti vistaraḥ / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamasau duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ / duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt
# bstan bcos las 'di skad du / / gang dag skyes bu gang zag gang zhig ba lang gi tshul khrims dang rid gas kyi tshul khrims dang bya gag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas pa ste / / des dag par 'gyur / / grol bar 'gyur / / nges par 'byung bar 'gyur / / bde ba dang sdug bsngal las rnam par 'da' bar 'gyur zhing bde ba dang sdug bsngal las rnam par 'das pa yang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad du smra ba ni rgyu ma yin pa la rgyur mngon par yid ches pas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste / / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo / / de ci'i phyir sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin / / sdug bsngal la log par zhugs pa'i phyir ro /
sarveṣāṃ sāsravālambanānāṃ duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt
# zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa thams cad sdug bsngal la log par zhugs pa'i phyir ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro /
kīdṛśo vā 'nyaḥ śīlavṛtaparāmarśo mārgedarśanaprahātvyaḥ
# yang na tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa la mthong bas spang bar bya ba gzhan ji lta bu zhig yong [*yod?] /
yo mārgadarśanaprahātavyālambanaḥ / so 'pi hi nāma duḥkhe vipratipannaḥ / yasya ca mārgālambanā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā vā 'sti sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati
# lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba la dmigs pa gang yin pa'o / / de yang sdug bsngal la logs par zhugs pa yin no / / yang gang la lam la dmigs pa log par lta ba'am / / the tshom yod pa de thar pa'i lam med do zhes lta ba'am /
athānyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ parāmṛśya eṣa mokṣamārgo nāstītyāha / so 'pi tenaivānyena śuddhiṃ pratyeti na tayā mithyādṛṣṭyeti / tasyāpyasau mārgadarśanaprahātavyālambano na sidhyati
# the tshom za ba na ji ltar dpe dag par yid ches par 'gyur / / 'on te thar pa'i lam gzhan mchog tu bzung nas 'di ni thar pa yin gyi lam ni med do zhes smra'o zhe na / / de yang gzhan de kho nas dag par yid ches kyi log par lta ba de ni ma yin pas de'i de yang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba la dmigs par mi 'grub bo /
yaścāpi samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyālambanayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti sa kasmānna taddarśanaheyaḥ
# yang gang zhig kun 'byung dang 'gog pa mthong pas spang bar bya ba la dmigs pa'i log par lta bas yang dag par yid ches par 'gyur ba de yang / / ci'i phyir de dag mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma yin /
tasmāt parīkṣya eṣo 'rthaḥ
# de lta bas na don 'di ni rtag par bya ba yin no /
yaduktaṃ nityātmaviparyāsāditi / kimetāveva dvau viparyāsau / catvāro viparyāsāḥ
# bdag rtag phyin ci log pa yis / / zhes gang bshad pa / / ci phyin ci log de gnyis kho nar zad dam zhe na /
anitye nityamiti
# phyin ci log ni bzhi ste /
duḥkhe sukhamiti / aśucau śucīti / anātmanyātmeti / athaitadviparyāsacatuṣkaṃ kiṃsvabhāvam
# mi rtag pa la rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba la bde ba dang mi gcang ba la gtsang ba dang bdag med pa la bdag tu phyin ci log pa'o / / yang phyin ci log bzhi chan 'di'i rang bzhin ci zhe na /
dṛṣṭitrayādviparyāsacatuṣkaṃ
# lta ba gsum las phyin ci log / / bzhi tshan /
antagrāhadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭirnityaviparyāsaḥ
# mthar 'dzin par lta ba las rtag par lta ba ni / / rtag par ni phyin ci log go /
dṛṣṭiparāmarśātsukhaśuciviparyāsau / satkāyadṛṣṭerātmadṛṣṭirātmaviparyāsaḥ
# lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa las ni bde ba dang gtsang bar phyin ci log go / / 'jig tshogs su lta ba las ni bdag tu lta ba phyin ci log go /
sakaletyapare / kathamātmīyadṛṣṭirviparyāsaḥ / kathaṃ ca na viparyāsaḥ
# gzhan dag na re thams cad yin no zhes zer ro / / ci ltar na bdag gir lta ba phyin ci log ma yin / / ci ltar na phyin ci log ma yin /
viparyāsasūtrād / ātmānameva tatra vaśinaṃ paśyennātmīyaṃ paśyatītyātmadṛṣṭirevāsau dvimukhī athāhamityetasmāt mameti dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt / mayā mahyamityetadapi syāt / kasmādanye kleśā na viparyāsāḥ
# phyin ci log gi mdo las mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / de las ni bdag kho na dbang byed par lta ba na / / bdag gir lta bar 'gyur bar bshad pa yin pas / / bdag tu lta ba 'di nyid sgo gnyis pa can yin no / / 'on te bdag ces bya ba 'di las bdag gi zhes bya ba lta pa gzhan zhig yin na ni bdag gis zhes bya ba dang bdag gi phyir zhes bya ba 'dir yang 'gyur ro / / ci'i phyir nyon mongs pa gzhan dag phyin ci log ma yin zhe na /
yasmāt tribhiḥ kāraṇairviparyāsānāṃ vyavasthānam katamaistribhiḥ / vīparītataḥ
# 'di ltar rgyu gsum gyis rten phyin ci log rnam par bzhag ste / / gsum gang zhe na /
nitīraṇāt samāropāt / ekāntaviparyastatvādālambane nitīrakatvātsamāropaṇācca / ucchedadṛṣṭirmithyādṛṣṭiśca na samāropike / abhāvamukhapravṛttatvāt
# phyin ci log phyir dang nges rtog phyir dang sgro 'dogs phyir / / dmigs pa la gcig tu phyin ci log pa'i phyir dang nges par rtog pa'i phyir dang sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir te / / chad par lta ba dang log par lta ba ni med pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i phyir dang sgro 'dogs par byed pa ma yin no /
śīlavrataparāmarśo naikāntaviparyastastanmātraśuddhyālambanatvāt
# tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ni de tsam zhig gis / / 'dag par dmigs pa'i phyir gcig tu phyin ci log pa ma yin no /
anye kleśā na santīrakā ato na viparyāsāḥ / yattarhi sūtre ukta manitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa iti / dṛṣṭirevātra viparyāsaḥ / saṃjñācitte tu tadvaśāt / dṛṣṭiviparyāsavaśādeva tatsaṃprayukte saṃjñācitte viparyāsāvuktau / vedanādayo 'pi kasmānnoktāḥ
# nyon mongs pa gzhan dag ni des par rtog par byed pa ma yin pas de'i phyir phyin ci log dag ma yin no / / 'o na mdo las mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang; lta ba phyin ci log pa zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na / / 'dir ni lta ba kho na phyin ci log yin la / / sems dang 'du shes de'i dbang gis lta ba phyin ci log gi dbang gis de dang mtshungs par ldan pa 'du shes dang sems phyin ci log tu bshad do / / tshor ba la sogs pa yang ci'i phyir ma bshad ce na /
lokaprasiddhyā / loke hi viparyastasaṃjño viparyastacitta iti prasiddhaṃ na punarviparyastavedana iti
# 'jig rten na grags pa'i phyir te / / 'jig rten na ni 'du shes phyin ci log / / sems phyin ci log ces grags kyi tshor ba phyin ci log ces ni ma grags so /
ta ete viparyāsāḥ sarve 'pi srota āpannasya prahīṇā bhavanti
# phyin ci log de dag thams cad kyang / / rgyun du zhugs pas spang ba yin te /
darśanapraheyatvāt dṛṣṭīnāṃ sasaṃprayogāṇām
# lta ba mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa rnams ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
dvādaśa viparyāsāḥ / anitye nityamiti saṃjñādṛṣṭicittaviparyāsāstrayaḥ / evaṃ yāvadanātmanyātmeti / tatrāṣṭau darśanaprahātavyāścatvāro bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ / duḥkhe ca saṃjñā cittaviparyāsāvaśucau ceti nikāyāntarīyāḥ
# sde pa gzhan dag na re mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam pa'i 'du shes dang sems dang lta ba phyin ci log gsum nas de bzhin du bdag med pa la bdag go snyam pa'i bar gsum ste / / phyin ci log ni bcu gnyis yin no / / de la brgyad ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no / / sdug bsngal ba dang mi gtsang ba la 'du shes dang sems phyin ci log pa bzhi ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no /
itarathā hi kathamantareṇa sukhaśucisaṃjñāmavītarāgasyāryasya kāmarāgaḥ saṃbhavediti / tadetannecchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ / yadi hi sukhaśucisaṃjñācittasamudācārādāryasya tadviparyāsāvīkṣyete / sattvasaṃjñācittasamudācārāttadviparyāsāvapi kiṃ neṣyete / na hi striyāmātmani ca vinā sattvasaṃjñāyā kāmarāgo yukta iti / sūtre 'pi coktaṃ yataśca śrutavānāryaśrāvaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
# de lta ma yin na bde ba dang gtsang ba'i 'du shes dag mid par ji ltar na / / 'phags pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyes par 'gyur zhes zer ro / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di mi 'dod de gal te 'phags pa la bde ba dang gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang sems kun du 'byung ba dang de dag gi phyin ci log dag tu 'dod na ni / / sems can gyi 'du shes dang sems kun du 'byung bas de dag gi phyin ci log dag tu yang ci'i phyir mi 'dod / / bud med dang bdag la sems can du 'du shes pa med par mi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skye bar rigs pa ma yin no / / mdo las kyang 'di ltar 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba nas /
yāvat tasya tasmin samaye yo 'nitye nityamiti saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭivīparyāsaḥ sa prahīyata iti vistaraḥ
# de'i tshe de'i mi rtag pa la rtag go snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log pa gang yin pa de spong bar byed do zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs so /
tasmād dṛṣṭisamutye eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye tatkāla bhrāntimātratvādalātacakracitra yakṣabhrāntivat
# de lta bas na lta bas kun nas bslang ba'i 'du shes dang sems kho na phyin ci log yin gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin te / / de'i dus su 'khrul pa tsam yin pa'i phyir mgal me'i 'khor lo dang ri mo'i gnod sbyin la 'khrul pa bzhin no zhes zer ro /
yattarhi sthavirānandenārthaṃ vāgīśamadhikṛtyoktaṃ
# gzhan dag na re 'o na gnas brtan kun dga' bos / / 'phags pa ngag gi dbang phyug gi dbang du byas nas /
viparyāse ca saṃjñānāṃ cittaṃ te paridahyate / nimittaṃ varjyatāṃ tasmācchubhaṃ rāgopasaṃhitam / tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ityapare / te 'pi cāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtaparijñānāt prahīyante
# 'du shes phyin ci log pa yis / / khyod kyi sems ni yongs su gdung / / zhes gang smras pa ji lta bu / / de'i phyir slob pas 'du shes dang sems phyin ci log brgyad po thams cad ma spangs pa kho na'o / / de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pas spang bar 'gyur gyi /
na vinā tenetyupāyasamā khyānānnāsti sūtravirodhaḥ
# de med par ni ma yin no zhes thabs yang dag par bstan pa yin pa'i phyir mdo dang 'gal ba med do zhes zer ro /
atha kiṃ dṛṣṭyanuśayasya eva bhedo nānyasya / mānasyāpyasti
# yang ji lta ba'i phra rgyas kho na la dbye ba yod kyi gzhan la med dam zhe na / / nga rgyal la yang yod de /
kathamityāha / sapta mānāḥ
# ji lta zhe na / / nga rgyal bdun / / zhes bya ba smos te /
māno 'timāno mānātimāno 'smimāno 'bhimāna ūnamāno mithyāmānaśca / abhedena cittasyonnatirmāna uktāḥ / sa pravṛttibhedāt saptadhā bhavati
# nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang log pa'i nga rgyal lo / / bye brag med par sems khengs pa la nga rgyal zhes bshad do / / de la 'jug pa'i bye brag las ni rnam pa bdun yin te /
hīnādviśiṣṭaḥ samena vā samo 'smīti manyamānasyonnatirmānaḥ
# chung ngu bas bdag khyad par du 'phags pa'am / / mnyam pa dang mnyam mo snyam du sems khengs pa ni nga rgyal lo /
samādviśiṣṭo 'smītyabhimānaḥ / viśiṣṭādviśiṣṭo 'smīti mānātimānaḥ / pañcopādānaskandhānātmata ātmīyato vā manyamānasyāsmimānaḥ
# mnyam pa bas bdag khyad par du 'phags so snyam pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal lo / / khyad par du 'phags pa bas kyang bdag khyad par du 'phags so snyam pa ni nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal lo / / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la bdag gam bdag gis sems pa ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo /
aprāpte viśeṣādhigame prāpto mayetyabhimānaḥ
# khyad par thob par bya ba ma thob par bdag gis thob po snyam pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo /
bahvantaraviśiṣṭādalpāntarahīno 'smītyūnamānaḥ / aguṇavato guṇavānasmīti mithyāmānaḥ / yattarhi śāstre nava mānavidhā uktāḥ / śreyānasmīti mānavidhā / sadṛśo 'smīti mānavidhā / hīno 'smīti mānavidhā / asti me śreyānasti me sadṛśo 'sti me hīnaḥ
# ches khyad par du 'phags pa bas bdag cung zad cig gis dman no snyam pa ni cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo / / yon tan ma yin pa dang ldan pa la bdag yon tan dang ldan no snyam pa ni log pa'i nga rgyal lo / / 'o na bstan bcos las nga rgyal rnam pa dgu ste / / bdag mchog yin no snyam pa nga rgyal gyi rnam pa dang bdag dang 'dra'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi rnam pa dang bdag dman no snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi rnam pa dang bdag pas mchog yod do / / bdag dang mnyam pa yod do / / bdag pas dman pa yod do / / bdag pas mchog med do / / bdag dang mnyam pa med do /
nāsti me śreyānnāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna iti
# bdag pas dman pa med do snyam pa nga rgyal gyi rnam pa zhes gang bshad pa ji lta bu zhe na /
ebhya eva mānebhya etāḥ / navavidhāstribhyaḥ
# rnam pa dgu pa de dag ni gsum po 'di dag nyid las byung ba ste / / gsum gang las she na /
katamebhyastribhyaḥ mānātimānonamānebhyaḥ / tatra prathamaṃ trayaṃ dṛṣṭisaṃniśritāstrayo mānāḥ
# nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dag las so / / de la dang po'i gsum ni lta ba la brten pa'i nga rgyal gsum ste /
atimānamānonamānāḥ / dvitīyaṃ trayamūnamānamānātimānāḥ / tṛtīyaṃ trayaṃ mānātimānonamānāḥ / yuktastāvad bahvantaraviśiṣṭādalpāntarahīno 'smītyūnamāna unnatisthānatvāt / nāsti me hīna ityatra kimunnati sthānam / asti sadṛśo yo 'bhiprete vare sattvarāśau nihīnamapyātmānaṃ bahu manyate
# lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal rnams so / / gnyis pa'i gsum ni cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnams so / / gsum pa'i gsum ni nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal rnams so / / re zhig ches khyad par du 'phags pa bas bdag cung zad cig gis dman no snyam pa ni sems khengs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal du rigs na / / bdag pas dman pa med do snyam pa 'di la go khengs pa'i gnas ci zhig yod ce na / / gang zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can gyi tshogs dam pa'i nang na bdag nyid dman yang tha gi'o snyam du sems pa de lta bu de yod do /
api cāstyeva jñānaprasthānavihito vidhiḥ / prākaraṇaṃ tu nirdeśaṃ parigṛhya śreyānasmītyekeṣu māno 'pi syādati māno 'pi mānātimāno 'pi hīnasamaviśiṣṭāpekṣayā
# gzhan yang 'di ni ye shes la 'jug pa las bshad pa'i lugs yin gyi rab tu byed pa las bstan pa yongs su bzung ste / / bdag mchog yin no snyam pa 'di ni dman pa dang mnyam pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa la ltos nas nga rgyal yang yin la / / lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang yin / / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yang yin no /
athaite sapta mānāḥ kiṃprahātavyā ityāha
# yang na nga rgyal bdun po 'di dag ci zhig gis spang bar bya ba yin zhe na / / smras pa /
dṛgbhāvanākṣyāḥ / dṛgbhāvanābhyāmeṣāṃ kṣayaḥ
# mthong dang bsgom pas zad bya ba / / de dag ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa dag gis zad par bya ba ste /
etaduktaṃ bhavati sarve darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā iti yadbhāvanāheyamaprahīṇaṃ kimavaśyaṃ tadāryāṇāṃ samudācarati
# de nas 'di skad du thams cad mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro / / ci 'phags pa rnams bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma spangs pa gang yin pa de kun du spyod dam zhe na /
nāvaśyaṃ tadyathā / vadhādiparyavasthānaṃ heyaṃ bhāvanayā
# nges pa med de 'di ltar bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni / / gsod sogs kun nas dkris pa'o /
yena kleśaparyavasthānena saṃcintya prāṇivadhaṃ kuryādyāvanmṛṣāvādaṃ tad bhāvanāheyaṃ bhāvanāheyadharmālambanatvāt
# nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa gang gi ched du bsams te / / srog chags kyi srog gcod par byed pha nas brdzun du smra bar byed pa'i bar de ni bsgos pas spang bar bya ba yin te bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i chos la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
tathā / vibhavecchā / vibhavatṛṣṇā 'pi bhāvanāheyā
# de bzhin 'jig sred / / 'jig pa'i sred pa yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no /
vibhavo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ / traidhātukī anityatā / tatra prarthanā vibhavatṛṣṇā
# 'jig pa'i sred pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhig yin zhe na / / khams gsum pa'i mi rtag pa ste / / de la don du gnyer ba ni 'jig pa'i sred pa'o /
tathāśabdena bhavatṛṣṇāyāḥ pradeśo gṛhyate / aho vatāhamairāvaṇaḥ syāṃ nāgarāja ityevamādi / mānavidhā api bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ santītyuktamasmimamānaśca
# de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras ni skye ba'i sred pa'i phyogs bdag ni glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bur gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa bzung ngo / / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni nga rgyal gyi rnam pa rnams kyang yod do zhes bshad la /
na cāryasya saṃbhavanti vidhādayaḥ
# nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal yang yod mod kyi / / 'phags pa la /
nāsmitā / ādigrahaṇena yāvadvibhavatṛṣṇāyā grahaṇam / kiṃ kāraṇamaprahīṇā apyete na samudācaranti
# rnam sogs pa'o snyam mi 'byung / / sogs pa smos pas ni 'jig pa'i sred pa'i bar du bzung ngo / / ci'i phyir de dag ma spangs kyang mi 'byung zhe na /
dṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt / satkāyadṛṣṭipuṣṭā hi mānavidhā asmimānaśca / ato bhagnapṛṣṭhatvāt notthātum punarutsahante
# lta bas rgyas par 'gyur phyir ro / / nga rgyal gyi rnam pa rnams dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni 'jig tshogs la lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba yin no / / de'i phyir rked pa bcag pa'i phyir yang ldan par mi nus so /
vadhādiparyavasthānaṃ mithyādṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt
# gsod pa la sogs pa'i kun nas dkris pa ni log par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
vibhavatṛṣṇā uccheddṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt
# 'jig pa'i sred pa ni chad par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
bhavatṛṣṇāyāḥ pradeśaḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭipuṣṭatvāt / kaukṛtyaṃ nāpi cāśubham / akukśalaṃ cāpi kaukṛtyaṃ bhāvanāprahātavyam / na cāryasya tatsaṃbhavati vicikitsā samutthitatvāt
# skye ba'i srid pa'i phyogs ni rtag par lta bas rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / mi dge ba'i 'gyod pa'am ma yin no / / 'gyod pa mi dge ba yang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin na 'phags pa la ni mi 'byung ste / / de the tshom gyis kun nas bslang ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
athaiṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ kati sarvatragāḥ katyasarvatragāḥ
# yang phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni kun du 'gro ba dag yin /
sarvatragā duḥkhahetudṛggheyā dṛṣṭayastathā
# du ni kun du 'gro ba ma yin zhe na / / sdug bsngal rgyu mthong spang bya ba /
vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yā 'vidyā 'veṇikī ca yā / duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyā dṛṣṭayo vicikitsā ca tābhiśca saṃprayuktā avidyā āveṇikī ca duḥkhasamudayaprahātavye cāvidyā
# lta dang de bzhin the tshom dang gang de lhan cig ma 'dres pa'i / / ma rig gang yin kun du 'gro / / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i lta ba rnams dang the tshom dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa dang sdug bsngal pa dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i ma rig pa ma 'dres pa kho na ste /
itīme ekādaśānuśayāḥ sabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ / sapta dṛṣṭayo dve vicikitse dve avidye sakalasvadhātvālambanatvāt
# de ltar na lta ba bdun dang the tshom gnyis dang ma rig pa gnyis dang phra rgyas bcu gcig po de dag ni rang gi khams mtha' dag la dmigs pa'i phyir / / skal ba mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba yin no /
kimebhiryugapadālambate āhosvit krameṇa / yadi krameṇa anyeṣāmapi prasaṅga
# ci re zhig rim gyis sam 'on te cig car yang dmigs gal te rim gyis na ni gzhan dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro / / 'on te cig car ro zhe na ni /
atha yugapat kaḥ sakalena kāmadhātunā śuddhiṃ pratyetyakāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ / sakalaṃ nocyate sakalaṃ yugapadālambanta iti / api tu pañcaprakāramapi sarvaṃ yugapat / evamapi yatrātmadṛṣṭistatrātmatṛṣṇā yatrāgraśuddhidṛṣṭī tatra tatprārthanā tena ca māna iti tṛṣṇāmānayorapi sarvatragatvaṃ prāpnoti / evaṃ sati darśanabhāvanāheyālambanatvādetadubhayaṃ kiṃprahātavyaṃ syāt / bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ vyāmiśrālambanatvāt / athavā punarastu darśanaprahātavyaṃ dṛṣṭibalādhānavartitvāt
# su zhig 'dod pa'i khams mtha' dag gis 'dag par yid ches par 'gyur ba'am / / mtha' dag rgyu ma yin pa las rgyur yid ches par 'gyur / / mtha' dag la ni cig car du dmigs so zhes ni mi zer ro / / 'on kyang rnam pa lnga po thams cad kyang cig car du dmigs so / / de lta na yang gang la bdag tu lta ba yod pa de la bdag la sred pa yod la / / gang la mchog dang dag par lta ba yod pa de la de'i don du gnyer ba yod cing / / des kyang nga rgyal du 'gyur bas sred pa dang nga rgyal dag kyang rung kun du 'gro ba yin par 'gyur ro / / de lta yin na de gnyi ga mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba la dmigs pa'i phyir ci zhig gis spang bar bya ba yin zhe na / / 'dren ma la dmigs pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no / / yang na lta ba'i stobs bskyed pas bcu pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin no /
svalakṣaṇakleśāvetau na sāmānyakleśau / tasmānna sarvatragāviti vaibhāṣikāḥ / va ete sabhāgadhātusarvatragā ekādaśānuśayā uktāḥ / navodhrvālambanā eṣāṃ dṛṣṭidvayavivarjitāḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re nyon mongs pa 'di gnyis rang gi mtshan nyid pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa spyi pa 'di ni ma yin te / / de lta bas na kun tu 'gro ba dag ma yin no zhes zer ro / / yang skal ba mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dag tu phra rgyas bcu gcig bshad pa gang dag yin pa de dag las dgu gang du dmigs / / lta ba gnyis po ma gtogs so /
satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ ca varjayitvā 'nye navānuśayā visabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ
# 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba las ma gtogs pa phra rgyas gzhan dgu ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dag yin no /
kadācittu visabhāgamekaṃ dhātumālambante kadācit dvau / ye 'nuśayāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ / kāmapratisaṃyuktā ārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanāḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktā rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktālambanā iti vacanāt / yadā kāmadhātau sthito brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiṃ nityadṛṣṭiṃ cojtpādayati tadā kathaṃ satkāyānta grāhadṛṣṭī visabhāgadhātvālambane na bhavataḥ / ātmātmīyatvenāgrahaṇādantagrāhadṛṣṭiśca tatsamutthitatvāt
# res 'ga' ni skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams gcig la dmigs so / / res 'ga' ni gnyis la dmigs te / / 'dod pa dang ldan pa gzugs dang ldan pa la dmigs pa rnams la / / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa la dmigs pa rnams dang 'dod pa dang ldan pa gzugs med pa dang ldan pa la dmigs pa'i phra rgyas gang dag yin pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa tshangs pa la sems can du lta ba dang rtag par lta ba skyed par byed pa de'i tshe ji ltar 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta bskal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams la dmigs pa dag ma yin zhe na / / bdag dang bdag gir mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang mthar 'dzin par lta pa yang des kun nas bslang ba'i phyir ro /
kā tarhīyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ / neyaṃ dṛṣṭirmithyājñānaṃ punaḥ etadityābhidhārmikāḥ / kuto nu khalvetadanyā tadālambanā dṛṣṭireṣā na dṛṣṭiriti siddhāntastu pramāṇayitayaḥ
# 'o na 'di lta ba gang zhig yin zhe na / / chos mngon pa pa rnams na re 'di ni lta ba ma yin gyi 'di ni log pa'i shes pa yin no zhes zer ro / / yang de la dmigs pa gzhan dag ni lta ba yin gyi 'di ni lta ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na / / grub pa'i mtha' ni tshad mar bya dgos so /
kiṃ khalvanuśayāḥ eva sarvatragāḥ
# yang ci phra rgyas kho na kun du 'gro ba dag yin nam zhe na / / smras pa /
netyāha
# ma yin te /
prāptivarjyāḥ sahabhuvo ye'pyebhiste 'pi sarvagāḥ / sarvatragairanuśayaiḥ sahabhuvo ye 'pyanye dharmāste 'pi sarvatragāḥ prāptayastu naivam
# de dag dang ni lhan cig gang / / 'byung de 'ang kun 'gro thob ma gtogs / / chos gzhan phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams dang lhan cig 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang kun du 'gro ba yin no /
aneka phalatvāt / ata eva syuḥ sarvatragānuśayā na sarvatrahetunā heturiti catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate
# thob pa rnams ni 'bras bu du ma'i phyir de lta ma yin no / / de nyid kyi phyir phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba dag yin la phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba'i rgyus rgyu ma yin pa dag kyang yod ces bya ba mu bzhir bya ste /
prathamā koṭiranāgatāḥ sarvatragā anuśayāḥ / dvitīyā 'tītapratyupannāstatsahabhuvaḥ
# mu dang po 'di ma 'ongs pa'i phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams so / / gnyis pa ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i lhan cig 'byung ba rnams so /
tṛtīyācatuthau yojye
# gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag ni sbyar bar bya'o /
eṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ kati sāsravālambanāḥ katyanāsravālambanāḥ
# phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni zag pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa dag yin no /
mithyādṛgvimatī tābhyāṃ yuktā 'vidyā 'tha kevalā
# du ni zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dag yin zhe na /
nirodhamārgadṛggheyāḥ ṣaḍanāsravagocarāḥ / nirodhadarśanaprahātavyāstrayo 'nuśayā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā 'vidyā ca tābhyāṃ saṃprayuktā ’ 'veṇikī ca / mārgadarśanaprahātavyā apyeta eva trayaḥ
# 'gog dang lam mthong spang bya ba / / log lta the tshom de dag dang / / ldan dang 'ba' zhig ma rig pa / / drug ni zag med spyod yul can; / / 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas gsum po log par lta ba dang the tshom dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang ma 'dres pa'i ma rig pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba yang gsum po de dag nyid de /
ityete ṣaḍanāsravālambanāḥ / śeṣāṃ sāsravālambanā iti siddham / tatra punaḥ
# de ltar na drug po de dag ni zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dag yin no / / lhag ma rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar grub po / / de la yang /
svabhūmyuparamo mārgaḥ ṣaḍbhūminavabhūmikaḥ
# rang gi sa pa'i 'gog pa dang / / lam ni phan tshun rgyu yin pas /
tadgocarāṇāṃ viṣayo mārgo hyanyo 'nyahetukaḥ / nirodhālambanānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ svabhūminirodha evālambanaṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kāmadhātoreva yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikānāṃ bhavāgrasyaiva / mārgālambanānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ sarva evālambanam / yo 'pi rūpārūpyapratipakṣaḥ rūpārupyāvacarāṇāmapyadṛṣṭabhūmikānāṃ navabhūmikaḥ / sa evānvayajñānapakṣyo mārga ālambanaṃ mārgasyānyo 'nyahetukatvāt / yadyapi dharmajñānānvayajñāne apyanyonyahetuke natvanvayajñānaṃ kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti / na kāmāvacarā mārgālambanā anvayajñānapakṣānālambante / dharmajñānaṃ tarhi rūpārūpyapratipakṣatvāttadbhūmikānāṃ mārgalambanānāmālambanaṃ bhaviṣyati / na tat sakalaṃ pratipakṣo duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayoratatpratipakṣatvāt
# sa drug sa dgu'i lam ni de'o / / spyod yul can gyi yul yin no / / 'gog pa la dmigs pa log par lta ba la sogs pa'i dmigs pa ni rang gi sa pa'i 'gog pa kho na yin te / / 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi kho na yin la / / srid pa'i rtse mo'i pa rnams kyi bar du yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i kho na yin no / / lam la dmigs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni sa drug gi chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam thams cad yin te / / gang yang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po yang yin no / / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pas brgyad po rnams kyi dmigs pa yangs dgu pa'i rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam thams cad yin te / / lam ni phan tshun rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro / / gal te chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dag kyang phan tshun rgyu yin mod kyi rjes su shes pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po ni ma yin pas lam la dmigs pas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam la ni mi dmigs so / / 'o na ni chos shes pa gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po yin pa nyid kyi phyir lam la dmigs pa de'i sa pa rnams kyi dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na / / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa dag de dag gi gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir dang mtha' dag kyang gnyen po ma yin la /
nāpi sakalayo rūpārūpyayyordarśanaprahātavyānāmapratipakṣatvādityādyābhāvānna bhavatyālambanam
# mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa mtha' dag gi yang ma yin te / / de lta bas na dang po med pa'i phyir dang dang po rnams kyi ma yin pa'i phyir dmigs pa ma yin no /
atha kasmādrāgapratighamānā dṛṣṭiśīlavṛataparāmarśau cānāsravālambanā neṣyante / na rāgastasya varjyatvāt / varjanīyo hi rāgaḥ yadi cānāsravālambanaḥ syānna varjanīyaḥ syātkuśaladharmacchandavat / na dveṣo 'napakārataḥ / apakāravastuni hi pratigha utpadyate / na caivaṃ nirodhamāgauṃ
# yang ci'i phyir 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dag zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dag tu mi 'dod ce na / / 'dod chags min te spang bya'i phyir / / 'dod chags ni spang bar bya ba yin na gal te zag pa med pa la dmigs pa yin na go spang bar bya ba ma yin par 'gyur te / / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa bzhin no / / gnod mi byed phyir zhe sdang min / / gnod par byed pa'i dngos po la ni khong khro ba skye na 'gog pa dang lam dang ni de lta ma yin no /
na māno na parāmarśau śāntaśuddhayagrabhāvataḥ
# zhi dang dag dang mchog gyur phyir / / nga rgyal ma yin mchog 'dzin min /
nirodhamārgayoḥ śāntatvānna tābhyāmunnatirbhavitumarhati
# 'gog pa dang lam dag ni zhi ba yin pa'i phyir de dag gis khengs par 'gyur ba 'ongs ba yang ma yin la /
bhūtārthaśuddhitvānna tayoḥ śuddhigrāhaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ
# yang dag pa'i don du dag pa yin pa'i phyir de gnyis la dag par 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yang ma yin no /
agrau ca tau / hīne cāgragrāho dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ / tasmādayuktameṣāmanāsravālambanatvam
# dman pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin na de gnyis ni mchog kyang yin te / / de lta bas na de dag gi dmigs pa zag pa med pa yin par rigs pa ma yin no /
eṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ katyālambanato 'nuśerate kati saṃprayogata eva
# phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur; du ni mtshungs par ldan pa kho na'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
sarvatragā anuśayāḥ sakalāmanuśerate
# phra rgyas kun du 'gro rnams ni / / dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sa /
svabhūmimālambanataḥ svanikāyamasarvagāḥ
# thams cad du ni rgyas par 'gyur / / kun 'gro ma yin rang ris so /
ye sarvatragā anuśayāste sakalāṃ pañcaprakārāmapi svāṃ bhūmimālambanato 'nuśerate
# phra rgyas gang dag kun du 'gro ba de dag ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sa pa'i rnam pa lnga po thams cad la yang rgyas par 'gyur ro /
asarvatragāstu svasyāṃ bhūmau svameva nikāyamālambanato 'nuśerate nānyam / tadyathā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyameva nikāyam / evaṃ yāvadbhāvanāprahātavyā bhāvanāprahātavyameva nānyam
# thams cad du ni 'gro ba ma yin pa rnams ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sar rang gi ris kho na la rgyas par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te / / 'di lta ste / / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i ris kho na la rgyas par 'gyur la / / de bzhin du bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba kho na la rgyas pa'i bar du 'gyur gyi / / gzhan du ni ma yin no /
utsargaṃ kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti
# spyir btang bar byas nas dmigs kyis ston par byed de /
nānāsravordhvaviṣayāḥ
# zag med gong ma'i yul can min /
anāsravālambanā anuśayā naivālambanato 'nuśerate
# zag pa med pa la dmigs pa'i phra rgyas rnams ni dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par mi 'gyur ba kho na yin la /
nāpyūrdhvabhūmyālambanāḥ
# sa gong ma la dmigs pa rnams kyang ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
tadālambanasya vastunaḥ
# de dag gi dmigs pa'i dngos po ni /
asvīkārādvipakṣataḥ / yaddhi vastvātmadṛṣṭitṛṣṇābhyāṃ svīkṛtaṃ bhavati tatrānye 'pyanuśayā anugamayitumutsahante
# bdag gir ma byas gnyen po'i phyir / / dngos po gang zhig bdag tu lta ba dang sred pa dag gis bdag gir byas pa de la phra rgyas gzhan dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur bar nus te /
ārdra iva paṭe rajāṃsi saṃsthātum / na caivamanāsravā nāpyevamūrdhvā bhūmiḥ
# snam bu gsher ba la rdul chags pa bzhin no / / zag pa med pa yang de lta ma yin la /
ato na tadālambanāsteṣvanuśerate / yastvihasthastāṃ bhūmiṃ prārthayate / kuśalo 'sau dharmmacchandaḥ vipakṣabhūtau ca nirvāṇamārgau tadālambanānāṃ kleśānāmūrdhvā ca bhūmiradharāṇām / ato na teṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ labhante
# sa 'og ma la yang ma yin pas de'i phyir de dag la dmigs pa rnams ni de dag la rgyas par mi 'gyur ro / / gang zhig 'di na gnas pa las de don du gnyer bar byed pa de ni mi dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yin no / / mya ngan las 'das pa dang lam ni de dag la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa yin la / / sa gong ma yang 'og ma rnams kyi gnyen po yin pas de'i phyir yang de dag tu gnas mi mthong ste /
tapta ivopale talāni pādānām
# rdo bsreg pa la rkang mthil dag gi gnas mi mthong ba bzhin no /
ānuguṇyārtho 'trānuśayārthaḥ / na ca te tadanuguṇā ityapare
# gzhan dag na re phra rgyas kyi don ni rjes su mthun pa'i don yin de dag ni de rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa ma yin te /
vātikasya rukṣānanuśayanavat / ata uktā ālambanato 'nuśerate / yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ
# rlung nad can la kha zas rtsub po rgyas par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes zer ro / / dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bshad zin to / / gang zhig gang dang mtshungs ldan pa / / de ni der mtshungs ldan sgo nas /
anuśareta iti vartate
# rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yo 'nuśayo yena dharmeṇa saṃprayuktastasmin saṃprayogato 'nuśete / yāvadaprahīṇa iti viśeṣaṇārthastuśabdaḥ
# phra rgyas gang zhig chos gang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de ni der mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro / / ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ji srid du ma spangs ba zhes bya ba khyad par du bya ba'i phyir ro /
syuranuśayā nānāsravālambanā na visabhāgadhātusarvatragāḥ
# zag pa med pa la dmigs pa de dag kyang ma yin skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams kun tu 'gro ba dag kyang ma yin la /
te cānuśayāḥ saṃprayogato 'nuśayīrannālambanataḥ na syurvisabhāgabhūmisarvatragā anuśayāḥ / eṣāmaṣṭānavateranuśayānāṃ katyakuśalāḥ katyavyākṛtāḥ
# phra rgyas de dag kyang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur gyi dmigs pa'i sgo nas ni ma yin pa'i phra rgyas dag lta yod dam zhe na / / yod de / / skal pa mi mnyam pa'i sa la kun du 'gro ba'i phra rgyas rnams so / / phra rgyas dgu bcu rtsa brgyad po de dag las du ni mi dge ba yin / / du ni lung du ma bstan pa yin zhe na /
ūrdhvamavyākṛtāḥ sarve
# gong ma thams cad lung ma bstan /
rūpārupyāvacarāstāvatsarva evāvyākṛtāḥ / kiṃ kāraṇam / kliṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ duḥkhavipākaḥ syāt
# re zhig gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no / / chos nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni sdug bsngal yin na de yang de gnyis na med de /
tacca tayoirnāsti paravyābādhahetvabhāvāt
# pha rol po la yang gnod pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro /
kāme satkāyadarśanam / antagrāhaḥ sahābhyāṃ ca mohaḥ
# 'dod na 'jig tshogs lta ba dang / / mthar 'dzin lhan cig ma rig pa /
kāmadhātau satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭī tatsaṃprayuktā cāvidyā avyākṛtāḥ
# 'dod pa'i khams na ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
dānādibhiraviruddhatvāt / ahaṃ pretya sukhī bhaviṣyāmīti dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati / ucchedadṛṣṭirapi mokṣānukūlā / ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā etadagraṃ bāhyakānāṃ dṛṣṭigatānāṃ yaduta no ca syāṃ no ca me syāt na bhaviṣyāmi na me bhaviṣyatīti / api cānayordṛṣṭyoḥ svadravyasaṃmūḍhatvādaparapīḍāpravṛttatvācca
# sbyin pa la sogs pa dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir dang bdag 'jig rten pha rol du bde bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sbyin par byed / / tshul khrims srung bar byed do / / chad par lta ba yang thar ba'i rjes su mthun pa dag yin te / / de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis / / phyi rol pa'i lta bar gyur pa rnams kyi nang na ni 'di lta ste / / bdag med par gyur cig / / bdag gi med par gyur cig / / bdag 'byung bar ma gyur cig / / bdag gi 'byung bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i lta ba 'di mchog yin no zhes gsungs so / / gzhan yang lta ba 'di gnyis ni rang gi rdzas la kun du rmongs pa'i phyir dang pha rol po la gnod pa'i rnam par zhugs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
svargatṛṣṇā 'smimānayorapyevaṃ prasaṅgaḥ / sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭiravyākṛtā / yā mṛgapakṣiṇāmapi varttate / vikalpitā tvakuśaleti pūrvācāryāḥ
# mtho ris la sred pa dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dag kyang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ro / / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re / / lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba ri dags dang bya rnams la yang yod pa gang yin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no / / rnam par brtag pa ni mi dge ba yin no zhes zer ro /
śeṣastvihāśubhāḥ
# lhag ma rnams 'dir mi dge ba'o /
śeṣās tvaśubhā anuśayāḥ kāmadhātāvakuśalāḥ
# phra rgyas lhag ma rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams na mi dge ba dag yin no /
katyakuśalamūlāni kati na / kāme 'kuśalamūlāni rāgapratighamūḍhayaḥ
# du ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yin / / du ni ma yin zhe na / / 'dod na 'dod chags khong khro dang / / rmongs rnams mi dge'i rtsa ba yin /
kāmadhātau sarvarāgaḥ sarvapratighaḥ sarvo moho 'nyatra satkāyāntagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktādyathākramam / trīṇyakuśalamūlāni / lobho 'kuśalamūlaṃ dveṣo moho 'kuśalamūlam / yaddhyakuśalaṃ cākuśalasya ca mūlaṃ tadevākuśalamūlamiṣṭam
# 'dod pa'i khams na 'dod chags thams cad dang khong khro ba thams cad dang 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma gtogs pa'i rmongs pa thams cad ni go rims bzhin du mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa chags pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang zhe sdang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang gti mug mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin te / / gang zhig mi dge ba yang yin la mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yin pa de kho na mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin par 'dod do /
śeṣā anuśayā nākuśalamūlānīti siddham
# phra rgyas lhag ma rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
katyavyākṛtamūlāni kati na / trīṇyavyākṛta mūlāni / katamāni trīṇi
# du ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba dag yin / / du ni ma yin zhe na / / lung ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba gsum / / gsum po gang dag ce na /
tṛṣṇā 'vidyā matiśca sā / setyavyākṛtatāṃ darśayati yā kācidavyākṛtā tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā cāntato vipākajā api sarvā 'sāvavyākṛtamūlamiti kāśmīrāḥ
# de ni sred dang ma rig blo / / de zhes bya ba ni lung du ma bstan pa yin par ston te / / kha che ba rnams na re sred pa dang ma rig pa dang shes rab tha na rnam par smin pa las skyes pa yang rung ste / / gang cung zad lung du ma bstan pa de thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa de rtsa ba dag kyang yin no zhes zer ro /
dvaidhordhvavṛtternāto 'nyau
# rnam gnyis mthor 'jug phyir de las / / gzhan min /
vicikitsā kila dvaidhavṛtterna mūlaṃ bhavitumarhati
# the tshom ni rnam pa gnyis nyid du 'jug pa'i phyir rtsa bar 'ong ba ma yin te /
calatvāt / unnatilakṣaṇenordhvavṛtterna māno mūlam / vividhasmṛtimūlāni hi sthirāṇyadhovṛttīni ca loke dṛṣṭānnīti / catvāryeveti bāhyakāḥ
# g yo ba'i phyir ro / / nga rgyal ni khengs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mthon por 'jug pa'i phyir ma yin te / / rtsa ba dang chos mi mthun pa'i phyir ro / / 'jig rten na rtsa ba rnams ni brtan pa dang 'og na gnas pa dag yin par mthong ngo zhes grag go / / bzhi zhes nyi 'og pa /
bāhyakā ścatvāryavyākṛtamūlānīcchanti
# nyi 'og pa rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba bzhir 'dod de /
tṛṣṇādṛṅ mānamohāste
# de dag sred lta nga rgyal rmongs /
sa ityavyākṛtā iti darśayati / avyākṛtā tṛṣṇā dṛṣṭirmāno 'vidyā ca
# de dag ces bya ba ni lung du ma bstan pa dag ces bya bar ston te / / lung du ma bstan pa'i sred pa dang lta ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa'o /
kiṃ kāraṇametānyavyākṛtamūlānīcchanti
# ci'i phyir de dag kho na lung du ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba rnams su 'dod ce na /
dhyāyitritvādavidyayā
# bsam gtan pa gsum ma rig las /
yasmāttrayo dhyāyinaḥ
# 'di ltar bsam gtan pa ni gsum ste /
tṛṣṇādṛṣṭimānottaradhyāyinaḥ / te cāvidyāvaśādbhavantīti
# sred pa dang lta ba dang nga rgyal shas che ba'i bsam gtan pa dag yin la / / de dag kyang ma rig pa'i dbang gis 'gyur ro /
yāni sūtre caturdaśāvyākṛtavastūni kiṃ tāni avyākṛtatvāt
# mdo las lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po bcu bzhi gsungs pa ci de dag lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir yin nam /
netyāha / kiṃ tarhi / sthāpanīyaḥ praśno 'vyākṛta ityuktam / caturvidho hi praśnaḥ
# smras pa ma yin no / / 'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na / / gzhag par bya ba'i dri ba la lung du ma bstan pa zhes bshad do / / 'dri ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyo vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ paripṛcchayya vyākaraṇīyaḥ sthāpanīyaśca / tatra yathākramaṃ veditavyam
# mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba dang rnam par phye nas lung bstan par bya ba dang; dris nas lung bstan par bya ba dang gzhag par bya ba'o / / de la go rims bzhin du /
ekāṃśato vyākaraṇaṃ vibhajya paripṛcchaya ca / sthāpyaṃ ca maraṇotpatti viśiṣṭātmā 'nyatādivat
# mgo gcig dang ni rnam phye dang / / dri dang gzhag par lung bstan pa / / 'chi dang skye dang khyad par 'phags / / bdag gzhan la sogs lta bu yin /
kiṃ sarvasattvā mariṣyantītyekāṃśena vyākarttavyaṃ mariṣyantīti
# bar rig par bya ste; ci sems can thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ram zhes 'dri na / / 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya'o /
kiṃ sarve janiṣyanta iti vibhajya vyākarttavyaṃ saṃkleśā janiṣyante na niḥkleśā iti / kiṃ manuṣyo viśiṣṭo hīna iti paripṛcchayya vyākattevyam
# ci sems can thams cad skye bar 'gyur ram zhes 'dri na / / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams ni skye bar 'gyur gyi nyon mongs pa med pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya'o / / ci mi 'di khyad par du 'phags pa yin nam dman pa yin zhes 'dri na /
kānadhikṛtya praśnayasīti / yadi brūyād devāniti / hīna iti vyākarttavyam
# gang las ltos te 'dri zhes dris nas lung bstan par bya ste / / gal te lha rnams la ltos te'o zhes zer na ni dman no zhes lung bstan par bya'o /
atha brūyādapāyāniti / viśiṣṭa iti vyākarttavyam / kimanyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ sattvo 'nanya iti sthāpanīyaḥ / sattvadravyasyābhāvāt vandhyāputraśyāmagauratādivat
# 'on te ngan song rnams las ltos te'o zhes zer na ni khyad par du 'phags so zhes lung bstan par bya'o / / ci phung po rnams las sems can gzhan nam gzhan ma yin zhes 'dri na / / sems can gyi rdzas med pa'i phyir gzhag par bya ste /
kathametadvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati avyākṛtametaditi / evaṃ vyākaraṇāt / apara āha / idamapyekāṃśavyākaraṇaṃ yanna sarve janiṣyanta iti / yastu pṛcchedye mariṣyanti kiṃ te janiṣyanta ityetadvibhajyavyākaraṇīyaṃ syāt
# mo gsham gyi bu sngo bsangs sam dkar sham zhes bya ba bzhin no / / 'di ji ltar na lung ma bstan pa yin zhe na / / de ni lung ma bstan no zhes de lta bur lung du bstan pa'i phyir ro / / gzhan dag na re thams cad skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro / / gang zhig ci gang dag 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag skye bar 'gyur ram zhes 'dri ba de la ni rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya ba yin no /
manuṣyeṣu cobhayamasti hīnatvaṃ viśiṣṭatvaṃ cāpekṣikamityubhayamekāṃśena vyākarttavyam
# mi la yang dman pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa gnyi ga yod de / / ltos pa yin pas mgo gcig tu gnyis kar lung bstan par bya dgos te /
tadyathā vijñānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ceti ekāntena tu pṛcchato naikāntavyākaraṇāt vibhajyavyākaraṇaṃ yujyate
# dper na rnam par shes pa ni rgyu yang yin la 'bras bu yang yin pa bzhin no / / gcig tu 'dri ba la gcig tu lung bstan du mi rung bas rnam par phye ste lung bstan par rigs so /
skandhebhyo 'nyaḥ sattva ityetadavyākṛtameva
# phung po dag las sems can gzhan nam zhes 'dri ba 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin te /
na cāvyākaraṇameva vyākaraṇaṃ yujyata iti
# lung du ma bstan pa kho na ni lung bstan par mi rung ba'o /
yastu sthāpanīyaḥ praśnaḥ sthāpanīyatvena vyākriyate / kathaṃ na vyākṛto bhavati
# gzhag par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang yin pa gzhag par bya ba nyid du lung ston pa de ji ltar na lung du ma bstan pa yin /
ābhidharmikā āhuḥ / tathāgato bhagavānarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svākhyāto 'sya dharmaḥ supratipannaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ rūpamanityaṃ yāvadvijñāna duḥkhaprajñaptiryāvanmārgaprajñaptirekāṃśena vyākarttavyamarthopasaṃhitatvāt
# chos mngon pa rnams na re bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang; de'i legs par bshad pa'i chos dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa dang gzugs mi rtag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal gdags pa nas lam gdags pa'i bar ni don dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir / / mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya'o /
vibhajjavyākaraṇaṃ nāma yadi kaścid brūyāddharmān vadeti sa vaktavyo bahavo dharmā atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannāḥ katamān vadāmīti
# rnam par phye ste lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ni gal te 'ga' zhig chos dag smros shig ces zer na / / de la 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang da ltar byung ba dag dang chos mang po zhig yod na gang dag smra bar bya zhes brjod par bya'o /
yadi brū yādatītāniti / sa vyaktavyo 'tītā api bahavo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti
# gal te 'das pa dag smros shig ces zer na / / de la 'das pa rnams la yang gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du mang du yod na zhes brjod par bya'o /
athaṃ brūyādrūpamiti
# 'on te gzugs smros shig ces zer na /
sa vaktavyo rūpamapi trividhaṃ kuśalamakuśalamavyākṛtaṃ ca
# gzugs la yang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnam pa gsum yod na zhes brjod par bya'o /
yadyāha kuśalamiti / tadapi saptaprakāraṃ prāṇātipātādviratiryāvatsaṃbhinnapralāpāditi / yadyāha prāṇātipātādviratimiti
# gal te dge ba smros shig ces zer na / / de la yang srog gcod pa spong ba nas tshig kyal pa las spong ba'i bar du rnam pa bdun yod do zhes brjod par bya'o /
sā 'pi triprakārā alobhajā 'dveṣajā 'mohajā
# gal te srog gcod pa las spong ba smros shig zer na /
yadyāhālobhajāmiti / alobhajā 'pi dvividhā vijñāptyavijñaptibhedādityevaṃ vibhajya vaktavyamiti / etadeva ca śaṭhasya paripṛcchya vyākaraṇam / tasya vaktavyaṃ dharmā bahava iti / na tu vibhaktavyā yāvattūṣṇim vā tiṣṭhati svayaṃ vā vyākarotīti / yadā tau na kiñcit pṛcchataḥ kevalamadhyeṣayataḥ tayośca na kiñcit vyākriyate kevalaṃ paripraśnyete tat kathamanayoḥ praśno bhavati kathaṃ vā vyākaraṇam
# de la yang ma chags pa dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa las skyes pa dang rnam pa gsum yod la ma chags pa las skyes pa la yang rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis yod na zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa rnam par phye ste brjod par bya ba yin no / / g yon can gyi 'dri ba la lung bstan pa yang de nyid yin te / / de la ni chos mang po zhig yod na zhes brjod par bya'i rnam par dbye bar ni mi bya ste / / cang mi smra ba'am / / bdag nyid lung ston du gzhug ces bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes zer ro / / gang gi tshe de gnyis cung zad kyang mi 'dra ba'i gsol ba 'debs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad la / / de gnyis la yang cung zad kyang lung mi ston gyi 'dri ba 'ba' zhig zad na de ji ltar na de gnyis kyi 'dri ba yin / / ji ltar na lung du ston pa yin /
yo hhi panthānaṃ brūhītyāha kim tena panthā na pṛṣṭo bhavati / paripṛcchayaiva vyākaraṇāt kathaṃ na paripṛcchāvyākaraṇaṃ bhavati
# gang zhig lam smros shig ces zer na / / ci des lam ma dris pa yin nam / / dri ba nyid kyis de lung bstan pa'i phyir ji ltar dris nas lung bstan pa ma yin / / gzhag par bya ba ni dper na 'jig rten mtha' yod pa zhig gam /
sthāpanīyastu yathā antavān loko 'nantavānityevamādi sūtrāntādeva tu praśnavyākaraṇānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam
# mtha' med pa zhig ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o / / dri ba lung bstan pa rnams kyi mtshan 'di ni mdo kho na las blta bar bya ste /
bhadantamahāsāṅghikāḥ sūtraṃ paṭhanti / catvārīmāni bhikṣavaḥ praśnavyākaraṇānīti / katamāni catvāri
# btsun pa dge 'dun phal chen sde pa rnams dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni / / dri ba lung du bstan pa dag yin te / / bzhi gang zhe na /
asti bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
# dge slong dag mgo gcig tu lung du bstan par bya ba'i dri ba yang yod /
asti yāvat sthāpanīyaḥ
# gzhag par bya ba'i bar du yang yod de /
katamaśca bhikṣavaḥ ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
# dge slong dag mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang zhe na /
sarve saṃskārā anityā ityayaṃ bhikṣava ekāṃśavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
# 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa yin nam zhes 'dri ba 'di ni / / dge slong dag mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bya ba'i dri ba yin no /
katamaśca bhikṣavo vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
# dge slong dag rnam par phye ste / / lung bstan par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang zhe na /
saṃcetanīyaṃ karma kṛtvā kiṃ prativedayata ityayam vibhajyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
# ched du bsam par bya ba'i las byas nas ci zhig so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur zhe na / / 'dri ba 'di ni dge slong dag mgo rnam par phye ste /
katamaśca bhikṣavaḥ paripṛcchyavyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ / saṃjñāsu puruṣasyātmā utāho 'nyāsaṃjñā anya ātmeti pṛṣṭena satā paripraṣṭavyaḥ katamaṃ punarāyuṣmānātmānaṃ pratyeti
# lung bstan par bya ba'i 'dri ba yin no / / dge slong dag dris nas lung bstan par bya ba'i dri ba gang zhe na / / 'du shes skyes bu bdag nyid yin nam / / 'on te 'du shes kyang gzhan zhig la / / bdag kyang gzhan zhig yin zhes dris na / / tshe dang ldan pa bdag gang yin par yid ches zhes 'dri bar bya'o /
sa cedevaṃ vadedau dārikaṃ khalvahayāyuṣmannātmānaṃ pratyemi / evaṃ satyanyā saṃjñā anya ātmetyevaṃ vacanīyaḥ
# gal te 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis ni rig pa bdag yin par shes so zhes zer na / / de lta yin na 'di skad du 'du shes kyang gzhan la bdag kyang gzhan yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
ayaṃ hi paripṛcchya vyākaraṇīyaḥ praśnaḥ
# 'di ni dge slong dag dris nas lung bstan par bya ba'i dri ba 'di yin no /
katamaśca bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśnaḥ
# dge slong dag gzhag par bya ba'i 'dri ba gang zhe na /
tadyathā śāśvato loko 'śāśvataḥ
# dper na 'jig rten rtag pa zhig gam / / mi rtag pa zhig gam /
śāśvataścāśāśvataśca / naiva śāśvato nāśāśvataḥ / antavānantataḥ / antavāṃścānantaśca
# rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag pa zhig gam / / rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa zhig gam / / mtha' yod pa zhig gam / / mtha' yod pa ma yin pa zhig gam /
naivāntavānnānantavān / bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇānna bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt yāvadanyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramityayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sthāpanīyaḥ praśna iti / yasya pudgalasya yo 'nuśayo yasminnālambane 'nuśete sa tena tasmin saṃprayuktaḥ
# mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med pa zhig gam / / mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin pa zhig gam / / de bzhin 'ongs pa shi nas yod pa zhig gam zhes bya ba nas srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan zhig gam zhes bya ba'i bar du 'dri ba lta bu ste / / 'di ni dge slong dag gzhag par bya ba'i 'dri ba yin no zhes 'don to / / gang zag gang gi phra rgyas gang zhig dmigs pa gang la rgyas par 'gyur ba 'di ni des de dang ldan pa yin no /
idaṃ tu vaktavyamatīte na kasmin yāvat pratyupanne na kasminniti
# 'das pas ni gang dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas da ltar byung bas ni gang dang ldan zhes bya ba'i bar 'di brjod par bya ste /
samāsata ime dvividhāḥ kleśāḥ
# mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa 'di gnyis te /
svalakṣaṇakleśāśca rāgaprativamānāḥ / sāmānyakleśāśca dṛṣṭivicikitsāda 'vidyāḥ / tatra tāvat
# rang gi mtshan nyid pa'i nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal rnams so / / nyon mongs pa spyi pa ni lta ba dang the tshom dang ma rig pa rnams so / / de la re zhig /
rāgapratighamānaiḥ syādatītapratyupasthitaiḥ
# 'das dang nyer gnas 'dod chags dang / / khong khro nga rgyal dag gis ni /
yatrotpannā 'prahīṇāste tasmin vastuni saṃyutaḥ / atītāḥ pratyutpannāśca rāgapratighamānā yasmin vastunyutpannā na ca prahīṇāstasmin vastuni taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ
# gang la de skyes ma spangs pa'i / / dngos po da dang ldan pa yin / / dngos po gang la 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal rnams skyes la ma spangs pa de dag gi dngos po de dang ldan te /
ete hi svalakṣaṇakleśatvānna sarvasyāvaśyaṃ sarvatrotpadyante
# de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid pa'i nyon mongs pa yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar thams cad la thams cad du 'byung ba ma yin no /
sarvatrānāgatairebhirmānasaiḥ
# nyid kyis de dag ma 'ongs pas /
yatrāprahīṇāste iti varttate / anāgatairebhireva rāgapratighamānairmanobhūmikaiḥ sarvatra vastuni saṃyutastraiyadhvike
# kun dang gang la ma spangs pa de dag ces bya bar sbyar te / / yid kyi sa pa'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal ma 'ongs pa de dag nyid kyis dus gsum pa'i dngos po thams cad dang ldan te /
mānasānāṃ tryadhvaviṣayatvāt
# yid dag gi yul ni dus gsum pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
svādhvike paraiḥ
# gzhan gyis rang dus pa /
anyai rāgapratighairanāgatairanāgata eva vastuni saṃyuktaḥ
# 'dod chags dang khong khro ba gzhan dag gis ni ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po kho na dang ldan no /
ke punaranye / ye pañca vijñānakāyikā rāgāśca pratighāśca
# gzhan yang gang dag yin zhe na / / gang gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po'i 'dod chags dang khong khro ba ste /
utpattidharmabhireva / taireva tu
# skye ba'i chos can rnams kyi ni de lta bu yin no / / de dag nyid /
ajaiḥ sarvatra / anutpattidharmabhiḥ pañcavijñānakāyikairapi sarvatra vastuni saṃyuktaḥ / traiyadhvike 'pi
# mi skye rnams kyis thams cad dang / / mi skye ba'i chos can rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga po dag gis kyang dus gsum pa'i dngos po thams cad dang ldan no /
śeṣaistu sarvaiḥ sarvatra saṃyutaḥ / ke punaḥ śeṣāḥ / dṛṣṭivicikitsā 'vidyāstraiyadhvikāḥ
# lhag ma kun gyi kun dang ldan / / lhag ma yang gang dag cig yin zhe na / / lta ba dang the tshom dang ma rig pa rnams te /
taiḥ sarvairapi sarvasminvastuni saṃyuktaḥ / sāmānyakleśatvāt
# nyon mongs pa spyi dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir dus gsum pa'i dngos po med pa'i dngos po thams cad ldan no /
yāvadaprahīṇā ityadhikāro 'nuvarttata eva / kiṃ punaridamatītānāgatamucyate 'styatha na / yadyasti sarvakālāstitvātsaṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ prāpnoti
# ji srid du ma spangs pa zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa kho na yin no / / ci 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po rdzas su yod dam / / 'on te med / / gal te yod na ni dus thams cad du yod pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
atha nāsti / kathaṃ tatra tena vā saṃyukto bhavati visaṃyukto vā / na saṃskārāṇāṃ śāśvatatvaṃ pratijñāyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogāt / pratijñāyate tu viśadaṃ / sarvakālāstitā
# 'on te med na ni ji ltar na de dang ngam / / des ldan pa'am bral ba yin zhe na / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir 'dus byas rnams rtag pa nyid du dam mi 'cha'o / / dus rnams kun du yod par ni gsal bar dam 'cha'o /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
uktatvāt / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā 'tītaṃ ced bhikṣavo rūpaṃ nābhaviṣyanna śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo 'bhaviṣyat / yasmāttarhyastyatītaṃ rūpaṃ tasmācchrutavānāryaśrāvako 'tīte rūpe 'napekṣo bhavati
# gsungs phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gal te 'das pa'i gzugs shig yod par ma gyur na 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'das pa'i gzugs la mi lta bar yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang gi phyir 'das pa'i gzugs yod pa de'i phyir 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'das pa'i gzugs la mi lta ba yin no /
anāgataṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyat na śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat / yasmāttarhyastyanāgataṃ rūpamiti vistaraḥ
# gal te ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs shig yod par ma gyur na 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs la mngon par dga' ba med par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang gi phyir ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs yod pa zhes rgyas par gsungs so /
dvayāt / dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpāda ityuktam / dvayaṃ katamat / cakṣū rūpāṇi yāvat mano dharmā iti / asati vā 'tītānāgate tadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya na syāt
# gnyis phyir / / rnam par shes pa ni gnyis la brten nas skye'o zhes gsungs pa / / gnyis gang zhe na / / mig dang gzugs rnams nas yid dang chos rnams kyi bar yin te / / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag med na de la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa gnyis la brten par mi 'gyur ro /
evaṃ tāvadāgamato 'styatītānāgataṃ yuktito 'pi
# re zhig lung las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod pa ni de lta bu yin no / / rigs pas kyang /
sadviṣayāt
# yul yod phyir /
sati viṣaye vijñānaṃ pravartate nāsati / yadi cātītānāgataṃ na syādasadālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ syāt / tato vijñānameva na syādālambanābhāvāt
# yul yod na rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur gyi med par ni ma yin no / / gal te 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa med na ni dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par 'gyur te / / de bas na dmigs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro /
phalāt / yadi cātītaṃ na syāt śubhāśubhasya karmaṇaḥ phalamāyatyāṃ kathaṃ syāt / na hi phalotpattikāle varttamāno vipākaheturastīti
# 'bras phyir / / gal te 'das pa zhag med na tshe phyi ma la las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bur yang ji ltar 'gyur te / / 'bras bu bskyed pa'i tshe ni da ltar gyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu ni med do; /
tasmādastyevātītānāgatamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ / avaśyaṃ ca kilaitatsarvāstivādena satā 'bhyupagantavyam
# de lta bas na bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro / / thams cad yod par smra ba yin phan chad gdon mi za bar 'di khas blang bar bya dgos so zhes grags te /
yasmāt
# 'di ltar /
tadastivādāt sarvāstivādā iṣṭāḥ
# de yod smra ba'i phyir thams cad / / yod par smra bar 'dod /
ye he sarvamastīti vadanti atītamanāmataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca te sarvāstivādāḥ
# gang dag 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad yod par smra ba de dag gi thams cad yod par smra ba yin gyi /
ye tu kecidasti yat pratyutpannamadattaphalaṃ cātītaṃ karma kiñcinnāsti yaddattaphalamatītamanāgataṃ ceti vibhajya vadanti te vibhajyavādinaḥ
# gang dag da ltar byung ba dang 'bras bu ma bskyed pa'i las 'das pa gang yin pa cung zad cig ni yod / / ma 'ongs pa dang 'bras bu bskyed zin pa'i 'das pa gang yin pa cung zad cig ni med do zhes rnam par phye ste smra ba de dag ni rnam par phye ste smra ba dag yin no /
kati caite sarvāstivādā ityāha
# thams cad yod par smra ba de dag kyang du zhig ce na /
caturvidhāḥ
# smras pa / / de dag /
te bhāvalakṣaṇāvasthā 'nyathā 'nyathikasaṃjñitāḥ
# rnam bzhi dngos dang mtshan nyid dang / / gnas skabs gzhan gzhan 'gyur zhes bya /
bhāvānyathiko bhadantadharmatrātaḥ
# dngos po gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ni /
sa kilāha / dharmasyādhvasu pravartamānasya bhāvānyathātvaṃ bhavati na dravyānyathātvam
# btsun pa chos skyob yin te / / de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na dngos po gzhan du 'gyur gyi rdzas gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā 'nyathā kriyamāṇasya saṃsthānānyathātvaṃ bhavati na varṇānyathātvam / yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam
# dper na gser gyi snod bcom nas gzhan du byed pa na / / dbyibs gzhan du 'gyur gyi kha dog gzhan du 'gyur ba ni ma yin pa dang yang dper na 'o ma zho nyid du 'gyur ba na ro dang mthu dang smin par byed pa dag /
evaṃ dharmo 'pyanāgatādadhvanaḥ pratyutpannamadhvānamāgacchannanāgatabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvam
# yongs su 'dor gyi kha dog ni ma yin pa de bzhin du chos kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas da ltar byung ba'i dus su 'ongs pa na ma 'ongs pa'i dngos po 'dor gyi rdzas kyi dngos po ni ma yin no /
evaṃ pratyutpannādatītamadhvānaṃ gacchan pratyutpannabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvamiti
# de bzhin du da ltar byung ba nas 'das pa'i dus su 'gro ba na da ltar byung ba'i dngos po 'dor gyi / / rdzas kyi dngos po ni ma yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
lakṣāṇānyathiko bhadantaghoṣakaḥ / sa kilāha
# mtshan nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ni btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs yin te /
dharmo 'dhvasu pravarttamāno 'tīto 'tītalakṣaṇayukto 'nāgatapratyutpannābhyāṃ lakṣaṇābhyāmaviyuktaḥ
# de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na 'das pa na 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i mtshan nyid dag ni mi ldan pa ma yin no /
anāgato 'nāgatalakṣaṇayukto 'tītapratyutpannābhyāmaviyuktaḥ
# ma 'ongs pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la 'das pa da ltar byung ba dag ni mi ldan pa ma yin no /
evaṃ pratyutpanno 'pyatītānāgatābhyāmaviyuktaḥ
# de bzhin du da ltar byung ba yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag dang mi ldan pa ma yin te /
tadyathā puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ śeṣāsvavirakta iti
# dper na skyes bu bud med dag cig la chags pa lhag ma rnams la 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa bzhin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
avasthā 'nyathiko bhadantavasumitraḥ / sa kilāha / dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamāno 'vasthāmavasthāṃ prāpyānyo 'nyo nidiśyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ
# gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur ba pa ni btsun pa dbyig bshes yin te / / de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na gnas skabs dang gnas skabs su phyin nas gnas skabs gzhan gyi sgo nas gzhan dang gzhan zhes ston gyi rdzas gzhan gyi sgo nas ni ma yin te / / dper na ri lu gcig gcig gi shad mig tu gzhag na gcig ces bya /
yathaikā vartikā ekāṅke nikṣiptā ekamityucyate śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti
# brgya'i shod mig tu gzhag na brgya / / stong gi shod mig tu gzhag na stong zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
anyathānyathiko bhadantabuddhadevaḥ / sa kilāha / dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamānaḥ pūrvāparamapekṣyānyo 'nya ucyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ / yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā veti
# gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur ba ni btsun pa sangs rgyas lha yin te / / de na re chos dus rnams su 'jug pa na snga ma dang phyi ma la ltos nas gzhan dang gzhan zhes brjod de / / dper na bud med gcig la ma zhes kyang bya; bu mo zhes kyang bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro zhes grag ste /
ityete catvāraḥ sarvāstivādāḥ / eṣāṃ tu prathamaḥ pariṇāmavāditvāt sāṃkhyapakṣe nikṣeptavyaḥ
# de ltar na bzhi po de dag ni thams cad yod par smra ba dag yin no / / de dag las dang po ni yongs su 'gyur bar smra ba'i phyir grangs can gyi phyogs la bslan par bya'o /
dvitīyasyādhvasaṃkaraḥ prāpnoti / sarvasya sarvakṣaṇayogāt / puruṣasya tu kasyāñcit striyāṃ rāgaḥ samudācarati kasyāñcit kevalaṃ samanvāgama iti kimatra sāmyam / caturthasyāpyekasminnevādhvani trayo 'dhvānaḥ prāpnuvanti
# gnyis pa'i yang thams cad la mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir dus 'chol bar 'gyur te / / skyes bu zhig bud med la la la ni 'dod chags kun du 'byung la / / la la la ni ldan pa 'ba' zhig go zhes bya ba 'dir ci zhig mtshungs / / bzhi pa'i yang dus gcig la dus gsum char du 'gyur te /
atīte 'dhvani pūrvapaścimau kṣaṇāvatītānāgatau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratyutpanna iti
# 'das pa'i dus la snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig ma dag ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yin la /
evamanāgate 'pi / ata eṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ / tṛtīyaḥ śobhanaḥ
# dbus kyi skad cig ma ni da ltar byung bar 'gyur ro / / de lta bas na de dag thams cad kyi nang na / / gsum pa bzang ste /
yo 'yamavasthā 'nyathikaḥ
# gnas skabs gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o /
tasya kila
# de yis ni /
adhvānaḥ kāritreṇa vyavasthitāḥ / yadā sa dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti tadā 'nāgataḥ
# bya ba yis / / dus rnams rnam gzhag gang gi tshe chos de bya ba mi byed pa de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa yin la /
yadā karoti tadā pratyutpannaḥ / yadā kṛtvā niruddhastadā 'tīta iti / parigatametatsarvam
# gang gi tshe byed pa de'i tshe ni da ltar byung ba yin / / gang gi tshe byas nas 'gags pa de'i tshe ni 'das pa yin no zhes grag go /
idaṃ tu vaktavyam / yadyatītamapi dravyato 'styanāgatamiti / kasmāttadatītamityucyate 'nāgatamiti vā
# de dag thams cad ni yongs su go na gal te 'das pa yang rdzas su yod la ma 'ongs pa yang rdzas su yod na / / ci'i phyir 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya dgos so /
nanu coktamadhvānaḥ kāritreṇa vyavasthitā iti / yadyevaṃ pratyutpannasya tatsabhāgasya cakṣuṣaḥ kiṃ kāritram
# bya ba yis / / dus rnams rnam gzhag ces bshad pa ma yin nam / / gal te khyim de lta na da ltar byung ba'i mig de dang 'dra ba'i bya ba gang zhig yin /
phaladānapratigrahaṇam
# 'bras bu 'byin pa dang 'dzin pa yin no /
atītānāmapi tarhi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phaladānāt kāritraprasaṅgo 'rdhakāritrasya veti lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ / idaṃ ca vaktavyam
# 'o na ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu la sogs pa 'das pa rnams kyang 'bras bu 'byin pa'i phyir bya ba'am bya ba byed du thal bar 'gyur bas mtshan nyid 'chol bar 'gyur ro / / 'di yang brjod par bya dgos te /
tenaivātmanā sato dharmasya nityaṃ kāritrakaraṇe / kiṃ vighnaṃ / yena kadācit kāritraṃ karoti kadācinneti
# gal te chos de'i bdag nyid kho nar yod na rtag tu bya ba byed pa la / / bgegs su byed / / gang gis na res 'ga' ni bya ba byed la res 'ga' ni ma yin zhes bya /
pratyayānāmasāmagrayamiti cet
# gal te rkyen rnams ma tshogs pa yin no zhe na /
na / nityamāstitvābhyupagamāt / yacca tat kāritramatītānāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ cocyate / tatkathaṃ / kiṃ kāritrasyāpyanyadasti kāritram / atha tannaivātītaṃ nāpyanāgataṃ na pratyutpannamasti ca
# mi rung ste / / rtag tu yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro / / bya ba 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa / / de yang ji ltar / / bya ba la yang bya ba gzhan zhig yod dam ci / / 'on te de 'das pa yang ma yin / / ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin da ltar byung ba yang ma yin la /
tenāsaṃskṛtatvānnityamastīti prāptam / ato na vaktavyaṃ yadā karitraṃ na karoti dharmastadā 'nāgata iti
# yod pa yang yin na ni des na 'dus ma byas yin pas rtag tu yod do zhes bya bar 'gyur te / / de'i phyir gang gi tshe chos bya ba mi byed pa de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes brjod par mi bya'o /
syādeṣa doṣo yadi dharmāt kāritramanyatsyāt / tattu khalu
# gal te chos las bya ba gzhan zhig yin na ni skyon der yang 'gyur ba zhig na de ni gzhan ma yin te /
nānyat / ato na bhavatyeṣa doṣaḥ
# de'i phyir skyon der mi 'gyur ro /
evaṃ tahi sa eva / adhvāyogaḥ / yadi dharma eva kāritraṃ kasmātsa eva dharmastenaivātmanā vidyamānaḥ kadācidatīta ityucyate kadācidanāgata ityadhvanāṃ vyavasthā na sidhyati
# de lta na ni 'o na de nyid dus su mi rung ste / / gal te chos kho na bya ba yin na chos de de'i bdag nyid kho nar yod bzhin du ci'i phyir res 'ga' ni 'das pa zhes bya / / res 'ga' ni ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ste /
kimatra na sidhyati / yo hyajāto dharmaḥ so 'nāgataḥ
# dus rnam par gzhag pa mi 'grub bo / / chos gang ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa yin no /
yo jāto bhavati na ca vinaṣṭaḥ sa varttamānaḥ
# gang skyes la ma zhig pa de ni da ltar byung ba yin no /
yo vinaṣṭaḥ so 'tītaḥ iti / etadevātra vaktavyam / yadi yathā varttamānaṃ dravyato 'sti tathā 'tītamanāgataṃ cāsti / tasya / tathā sataḥ
# gang zhig pa de ni 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la mi 'grub pa ci zhig yod / / 'dir de nyid brjod par bya dgos te / / gal te ji ltar da ltar gyi rdzas su yod pa de bzhin du / / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la yang yod na ni / / de bzhin du /
ajātanaṣṭatā kena
# yod na ci'i phyir ma skyes shig /
tenaiva svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamidaṃ sidhyatyajāta iti yo vinaṣṭaḥ iti veti
# chos de'i rang gi ngo bo kho nar yod na ni ji ltar na ma skyes pa zhes bya ba'am / / zhig pa zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par 'gyur /
kimasya pūrvaṃ nāsīdyasyābhāvādajāta ityucyate / kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvā dvinaṣṭa ityucyate / tasmānna sidhyati sarvathā 'pyatrādhvatrayam / yadyabhutvā bhavatīti neṣyate bhūtvā ca punarna bhavatīti
# gang zhig med pas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba ni sngon ci zhig ma byung bar 'gyur / / gang zhig med pas zhig pa zhes bya ba yang phyis ci zhig med de / / de lta bas na gal te ma byung ba las byung ba dang byung nas kyang yang mi 'byung bar mi 'dod phan chad dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du mi 'grub bo /
yadapyuktaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇayogānna śāśvatatvaprasaṅga iti / tadidaṃ kevalaṃ vāṅmātramutpādavināśayorayogāt
# gang yang 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa de yang skye ba dang 'jig pa dag mi rung ba'i phyir tshig tsam ste /
nityaṃ ca nāmāsti sa dharmo na ca nitya ityapūrvaiṣā vāco yuktiḥ / āha khalvapi / svabhāvaḥ sarvadā cāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate / na ca svabhāvād bhāvo 'nyo vyaktamīśvaraceṣṭitam / yattūktamuktatvāditi / vayamapi brūmo 'styatītānāgatamiti / atītaṃ tu yad bhūtapūrvam / anāgataṃ yatsati hetau bhaviṣyati / evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'stītyucyate na tu punardravyataḥ
# chos de rtag pa yang yod la mi rtag pa yang yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lugs 'di ni sngon ma byung ba yin no / / yang smras pa / / rang bzhin yang ni rtag tu yod / / dngos po yang ni rtag mi 'dod / / rang bzhin las kyang dngos mi gzhan / / dbang phyug tha snyad yin par gsal / / gang yang gsungs phyir zhes smras pa / / kho bo cag kyang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yod do zhes smras te / / sngon byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yin la / / rkyen yod na 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni ma 'ongs pa yin no zhes de ltar byas nas yod de zhes bya'i /
kaścaivamāha / vartamānavattadastīti / kathamanyathā 'sti
# rdzas su ni ma yin no / / da ltar bzhin du yod do zhes de skad du zer / / gzhan du na ji ltar yod /
atītā nāgatātmanā / idaṃ punastavopasthitam / kathaṃ tadatītamanāgataṃ cocyate yadi nityamastīti / tasmāt bhūtapūrvasya ca hetorbhāvinaśca phalasya bhūtapūratāṃ bhāvitāṃ ca jñāpayituṃ hetuphalāpavādadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ bhagavatā astyatītamastyanāgatamiti
# 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i bdag nyid du yod mod / / gal te rtag tu yod na de ji ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba de nyid nye bar gnas so / / de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa'i lta ba dgag pa'i phyir sngon byung ba'i rgyu dang phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu sngon byung ba nyid dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid du shes par bya bar 'das pa yod do / / ma 'ongs pa yod do zhes gsungs par zad do /
astiśabdasya nipātatvāt / yathā 'sti dīpasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva iti vaktāro bhavanti yathā cāsti niruddhaḥ sa dīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti / evamatītānāgatamapyastītyuktam / anyathā hyatītānāgatabhāva eva na sidhyet
