vipakṣadūratā yathā śīlasya dauḥśīlyam / deśavicchedadūratā yathā viprakṛṣṭadeśānāṃ deśavicchedāt pūrvapaścimasamudravat / kāladūratā yathā atītānāgatadūramucyate
# gnyen pos ring ba nyid ni dper na 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las tshul khrims lta bu'o / / yul gyis ring ba nyid ni dper na bskal pa'i yul rnam par chad pas te / / shar dang nub kyi rgya mtsho bzhin no / / dus kyis ring ba nyid ni dper na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa lta bu'o /
dutastaddūram / vartamānāt / yadanantarātamutpadyamānaṃ vā tat kathaṃ dūram
# ring ba zhes bya ba de gang las ring ba yin / / de ltar las so / / 'das ma thag pa dang skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ji ltar na ring ba yin /
adhvanānātvena taddūraṃ na cirabhūtabhāvitvena / vartamānamapyevaṃ dūraṃ prāpnoti
# de ni dus tha dad pa nyid kyis ring ba yin gyi yun ring mo zhig na byung ba dang 'byung ba nyid kyis ni ma yin no / / de ltar yang de bzhin du ring bar 'gyur ro /
akāritrā ttarhi taddūram / asaṃskṛtasya kathamantikatvaṃ sidhyati / sarvatra tatprāpteḥ
# 'o na ni byed pas ring ba nyid yin no / / 'dus ma byas ji ltar na nye ba nyid du 'grub / / de thams cad du thob pa'i phyir ro /
atītānāgate 'pi tatprasaṅgaḥ / ākāśaṃ ca katham
# 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro / / nam mkha' yang ji ltar nye ba yin /
evaṃ tarhyatītānāgatamanyo 'nyaṃ varttamānavyavahitatvād dūram
# de lta na 'o na ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni da ltar gyis chod pa'i phyir phan tshun du ring ba nyid yin no /
varttamānamubhayo rāsannatvādantikam / asaṃskṛtaṃ cāpyavyavahitatvāditi
# de ltar ni gnyi ga dang nye ba'i phyir nye ba yin la / / 'dus ma byas kyang chod pa med pa'i phyir nye ba yin no /
evamapyatītānāgataṃ varttamānasyāntikatvādubhayaṃ prāpnoti / evaṃ tu yuktaṃ syāt / dharmasvalakṣaṇādanāgataṃ dūramasaṃprāptatvāt
# de lta na yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang nye ba'i phyir gnyi gar 'gyur ro / / 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob pa'i phyir chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid las ring ba yin la /
atītaṃ ca pracyutatvāditi / kim mārgaviśeṣagamanāt kleśānāṃ punaḥ prahāṇaviśeṣo bhavati / naitadasti
# 'das pa ni zhig pa'i phyir ring ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs par 'gyur ro / / ci lam khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams kyi spangs pa yang dang yang du khyad par du 'gyur ram zhe na /
sarveṣāṃ hi kleśānāṃ / sakṛt kṣayaḥ / yasya yaḥ prahāṇamārgastenaiva tasya kṣayaḥ
# de ni med de nyon mongs pa thams cad ni lan cig tu zad / / gang gi spong ba'i lam gang yin pa de kho nas de zad pa yin no /
visaṃyogalābhasteṣāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
# de dag gi dral ba'i thob pa yang dang yang /
katiṣu kāleṣvityāha ṣaṭsu kāleṣu
# dus du zhig tu zhe na / / smras pa /
pratipakṣodayaphalaprāptīndriyavivṛddhiṣu
# dus drug tu ste / / gnyen po skyes dang 'bras thob dang dbang po rnam par 'phel rnams su /
pratipakṣo vimuktimārga etasminnabhipretaḥ
# 'di ni gnyen po'i rnam par grol ba'i lam min par bsams pa'o /
phalāni catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalāni
# 'bras bu dag ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhi'o /
indriyavivṛddhirindriyasaṃcāraḥ / eteṣu kāleṣu kleśasya visaṃyogalābhaḥ
# dbang po rnam par 'phel ba ni dbang po lnga po 'pho ba'o / / dus de dag tu nyon mongs pa'i bral ba 'thob bo /
sa punareṣa yathāyogaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ / keṣāñcit ṣaṭsu kāleṣu keṣāñcid yāvaddvayoḥ
# de yang ci rigs par kha cig gis dus drug tu 'thob pa nas kha cig gis ni dus gnyis kyi bar du 'thob par blta bar bya'o /
sa eva visaṃyogastāsu tāsvavasthāsu parijñāsaṃjñāṃ labhate / dve hi parijñe jñānaparijñā prahāṇaparijñā ca / tatra jñānaparijñā sāsravaṃ jñānam / prahāṇaparijñā tu prahāṇameva
# bral ba de nyid gnas skabs de dang de dag tu yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo / / yongs su shes pa ni gnyis te / / ye shes kyi yongs su shes pa dang spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa'o / / de la ye shes kyi yongs su shes pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes pa'o / / spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa ni spang ba kho na ste /
phale hetūpacārāt / kimekaiva parijñā sarvaprahāṇam
# 'bras bu la rgyu btags pa'i phyir ro / / ci spangs pa thams cad yongs su shes pa gcig kho na yin nam zhe na; smras pa /
netyāha
# ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / parijñā nava
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / yongs su shes dgu /
tatra tāvat / kāmādyaprakāradvayasaṃkṣayaḥ / ekā
# de la re zhig 'dod pa na / / dang po'i rnam gnyis zad la gcig /
kāmadhātāvādyasya prakāradvayasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyasya prahāṇamekā parijñā
# 'dod pa'i khams na dang po'i rnam pa gnyis te / / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pa ni yongs su shes pa gcig yin no /
dvayoḥ kṣaye dve te / kāmadhātāveva nirodhadarśanaheyasya prakārasyaprahāṇamekā parijñā
# gnyis zad pa ni de gnyis so / / 'dod pa'i khams kho na na 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa spangs ba ni yongs su shes pa gcig yin la /
mārgadarśanaheyasyaikā / yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tisraḥ parijñāḥ / tathordhvaṃ nisra eva tāḥ / rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tathaiva tisraḥ parijñā bhavanti / duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇamekā nirodhadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ dvitīyā mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ tṛtīyeti traidhātukānāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ ṣaṭ parijñā bhavanti
# lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa spangs pa yang gcig yin no / / ji ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs ba yongs su shes pa gsum yin pa ltar / / de bzhin gong ma'i de gsum nyid / / de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rnam pa spangs pa yang yongs su shes pa gsum yin te / / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni gcig yin no / / 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni gnyis yin no / / lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni gsum yin no / / de ltar na khams gsum pa'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa ni yongs su shes pa drug yin no /
anyā avarabhāgīyarūpasarvāsravakṣayāḥ / tisraḥ parijñāḥ
# yongs su shes pa gzhan gsum ste tha ma'i cha dang mthun gzugs dang zag pa kun zad /
avarabhāgīyaprahāṇamekā parijñā / rūpāsravaprahāṇamekā rūparāgakṣayaparijñā / ārūpyāptānāṃ sarvāsravaprahāṇamekā sarvasaṃyojanaparyādāna parijñā
# tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa yang / / yongs su shes pa gcig yin no; / / gzugs kyi zag pa spangs pa yang gcig yin te / / gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa'o / / zag pa thams cad spangs pa yang gcig yin te / / kun du sbyor ba thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'i yongs su shes pa'o /
kasmādrūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ pṛthak parijñā na darśanaheyānām
# ci'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa ni tha dad par bstan la mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi ni ma yin zhe na /
bhāvanāheyānāmatulyapratipakṣatvāt / ityetā nava parijñāḥ
# bsgom pas spong bar bya ba rnams kyi gnyen po mi 'dra pa'i phyir ro; / / de ltar na yongs su shes pa ni de dgu yin no /
āsāṃ pūrvikāḥ
# de dag las /
ṣaṭ kṣāntiphalaṃ / yā eva darśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvāḥ
# snga ma drug bzod 'bras / / mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pa'i rang bzhin gang dag yin pa'o /
jñānasya śeṣitāḥ
# lhag ma rnams ni shes pa yis /
avarabhāgīyaprahāṇādiparijñā bhāvanāmārgaphalatvāt / kathaṃ kṣāntiphalaṃ parijñā bhavanti
# tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa la sogs pa'i yongs su shes pa ste / / bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro / / ji ltar yongs su shes pa bzod pa'i 'bras bu yin zhe na /
kṣāntīnāṃ jñānaparivāratvāt
# bzod pa rnams ni shes pa'i 'khor can yin pa'i phyir te /
rājaparivāre rājopacāravat / jñānaikaphalatvācca
# rgyal po'i 'khor la rgyal po nye bar btags pa bzhin pa dang shes pa dang 'bras bu gcig pa'i phyir ro /
anāgamyaphalaṃ sarvā dhyānānāṃ pañca vāthavā / aṣṭau
# mi lcogs med 'bras thams cad do / / bsam gtan rnams kyi lnga'am brgyad /
vaibhāṣikamatena mauladhyānaphalaṃ pañca parijñā yā rūpārūpyāvacarakleśaprahāṇa svabhāvāḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba'i lugs kyis ni bsam gtan kyi [*gyi?] dngos gzhi'i 'bras bu yongs su shes pa lnga ste / / gzugs dang gzugs med pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spongs pa'i rang bzhin gang dag yin pa'o /
kāmāvacarakleśaprahāṇasyānāgamyaphalatvāt bhadantaghoṣakasya matenāṣṭau
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro / / btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs kyi lugs kyis ni brgyad de /
sa hi vītarāgasyāpi kāmāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ darśanamārgaphalamicchanti / anāsravavisaṃyogaprāptilābhāt
# de ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams spangs pa yang bral ba'i thob pa zad pa med pa rnyed pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam gyi 'bras bur 'dod do /
avarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñā tvanāgamyaphalameva
# tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu kho na yin no /
dhyānāntaraṃ dhyānavaddraṣṭavyam
# bsam gtan khyad par can yang bsam gtan bzhin du blta bar bya'o /
ārupyāṇāṃ tu / sāmantakasyaikā
# gzugs med pa rnams kyis ni nye bar bsdogs pa gcig yin te /
ākāśānantyāyatanasāmantakasyaikā rūparāgakṣayaparijñā phalam / maulārūpyatrayasya ca
# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyi 'bras bu ni gcig yin te / / gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa'o / / gzugs med dngos gzhi gsum gyi yang /
maulānāṃ ca trayāṇāmārūpyāṇāmekaiva sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñā phalam
# gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi gsum gyi 'bras bu yang gcig kho na ste / / kun du sbyor ba thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'i yongs su shes pa yin no /
āryamārgasya sarvāḥ / nava parijñāḥ phalam / dve laukikasya
# yongs su shes pa dgu po thams cad 'phags pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu yin no / / gnyis / / 'jig rten pa yi /
laukisya mārgasya dve avarabhāgīyarūparāgakṣayaparijñe phalam / anvayasya ca
# lam gyi 'bras bu ni gnyis te / / tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa dag go / / rjes su yang /
anvayajñānasyāpi dveparijñe phalaṃ paścime
# rjes su shes pa'i 'bras bu yang yongs su shes pa gnyis te tha ma dag go /
dharmajñānasya tisrastu / paścimā eva tridhātukabhāvanāheya pratipakṣatvāt / ṣaṭ tatpakṣasya pañca ca
# chos shes pa ni gsum yin no / / tha ma dag kho na ste / / khams gsum pa'i bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro / / de'i phyogs mthun gyi drug dang lnga /
dharmajñānapakṣasya ṣaṭ parijñāḥ phalaṃ yā eva dharmajñāna kṣantijñānānām
# chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni yongs su shes pa drug ste / / chos kyi bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu gang dag yin pa kho na'o /
anvayajñānapakṣasya pañca yā evānvayakṣāntijñānānām / pakṣagrahaṇena hi kṣāntijñānāni gṛhyante / kasmānnaikaikaṃ prahāṇaṃ parijñā vyavasthāpyate / yasmāt kṣāntiphalaṃ tāvat prahāṇaṃ vyavasthāpyate
# rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa ni lnga yin te / / rjes kyi bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu gang dag yin pa kho na'o / / phyogs dang mthun pa smos pas ni bzod pa dang shes pa rnams bzung ngo / / ci'i phyir spangs pa re re yongs su shes par rnam par mi gzhag ce na / / 'di ltar re zhig bzod pa'i 'bras bu bral ba ni /
anāsravaviyogāpterbhavāgravikalīkṛteḥ / hetudvayasamudghātāt parijñā / yatraitāni trīṇi kāraṇāni bhavanti tat prahāṇaṃ parijñocyate / pṛthagjanasya tāvadanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirnāsti bhavāgravikalīkaraṇaṃ ceti nāsya prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate / āryasyāpi yat kṣāntiphalaṃ tāvat prahāṇam / tatra yāvat duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntāvanāsravā visaṃyogaprāptirasti na tu bhavāgravikalīkṛṭam
# bral ba'i thob pa zag med dang / / srid rtse nyams par byas pa dang / / rgyu gnyis kun du bcom pa'i phyir / / yongs shes su rnam par gzhag go / / gang la rgyu 'di gsum yod pa de spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa zhes bya zhe na / / re zhig so so'i skye bo la ni bral ba'i thob pa zag pa med pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo nyams par byed pa med pas 'di'i spangs pa yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba'i ming mi thob bo / / 'phags pa la yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu spangs pa gang yin pa de ni / / de la ji srid du sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa la gnas pa / / de srid du bral ba'i thob pa zag pa med pa yod mod kyi / / srid pa'i rtse mo mnyam par byas pa ni ma yin no /
duḥkhe 'nvayajñāne ubhayamasti na tu hetudvayasamudghātaḥ
# sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa la ni gnyis yod mod kyi / / rgyu gnyis kun du bcom pa ni ma yin te /
samudayadarśanaprahātavyasya sarvatragahetoraprahīṇatvāt
# rgyu kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'i phyir ro /
anyeṣu dharmānvayajñāneṣu sarvaṃ trayamasti
# chos dang rjes su shes pa gzhan dag la ni gsum po thams cad yod pas /
atastāsvavasthāsu prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate
# de'i phyir gnas skabs de dang de dag tu de spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa'i ming 'thob po /
jñānaphalaṃ tu prahāṇam / ataśca kāraṇatrayāt parijñākhyāṃ labhate
# shes pa'i 'bras bu spangs pa ni rgyu gsum po de dang bzhi pa khams las 'das pa las / / yongs su shes pa'i ming 'thob ste /
caturthācca / dhātvatikramāt
# khams mtha' dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir /
yadā dhātuṃ samatikrāmati
# gang gi tshe khams las yang dag par 'da' ba na'o /
kṛtsnadhātuverāgyāt ubhayasaṃyogaviyogaṃ pañcamaṃ kāraṇamāhurapare / yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇo yadi tatrānyena tadālambanena kleśena visaṃyukto bhavatīti / sa tu nāsya ubhayahetusamudghātāt dhātusamatikramācceti na brūmaḥ
# gnyis pa kun du sbyor ba dang bral ba rgyu lnga pa de smras pa / / rnam pa gang zhig spangs la gal te de la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa gzhan dang bral bar gyur na'o zhes bya ba ni / / de ni rgyu gnyi ga yang dag par bcom pa dang khams las yang dag par 'das pa las gzhan ma yin par mi brjod do /
kaḥ katibhiḥ parijñābhiḥ samanvāgataḥ
# gang zhig yongs su shes pa du zhig dang ldan zhe na /
naikayā pañcabhiryāvaddarśanasthaḥ samanvitaḥ / pṛthagjanastāvannaiva samanvāgataḥ
# gcig la gnas min mthong la gnas pa ni / / lnga pa'i bar dang yang dag ldan / / re zhig so so'i skye bo mi ldan pa kho na'o /
āryo 'pi darśanamārgastho yāvatsamudayadharmajñānakṣāntiṃ naiva samanvāgataḥ / samudaye dharmajñāna ekayā samanvāgataḥ
# 'phags pa mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa yang / / kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa'i bzod pa la gnas pa'i bar du mi ldan pa nyid do / / kun 'byung ba la chos shes pa ni gcig dang ldan no / / kun 'byung ba la rjes su shes pa ni gnyis dang ldan no /
samudaye 'nvayajñāne dvābhyām
# 'gog pa la chos shes pa ni gsum dang ldan no /
nirodhe dharmajñāne tisṛbhhirnirodhānvayajñāne catasṛbhirmārgadharmajñāne pañcabhiḥ
# 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa ni bzhi dang ldan no / / lam la chos shes pa ni lnga dang ldan no /
bhavanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaṅbhirekayā vā dvayena vā
# bsgom pa la gnas pa drug gam ni / / gcig gam yang na gnyis dang ngo /
bhāvanāmārgasthaḥ punarāryapudgalo mārgānvayajñāne ṣaḍibhiḥ parijñābhiḥ samanvāgato yāvat kāmavairāgyaṃ na prāptaḥ
# 'phags pa'i gang zag bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa lam la rjes su shes pa la gnas pa ji srid du / / 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba ma 'thob pa'am /
parihīṇo vā tataḥ kāmavairāgyaṃ prāptaḥ pūrvaṃ paścād vā ekayā 'varabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā
# de las yongs su nyams pa ni yongs su shes pa drug dang ldan no / / sngon nam phyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa ni / / tha ma'i cha dang mthun pas spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa gcig pu dang ldan no /
arhattvaṃ prāpta ekayaiva sarvasaṃyojanaparyādānaparijñayā
# dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa ni / / kun du sbyor ba thams cad yongs su gtugs pa'i yongs su shes pa gcig kho na dang ldan no /
parihīṇo 'pi rūpāvacareṇa paryavasthānenaikayā 'varabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñayā
# gzugs kyi spyod pas kun nas dkris pas yongs su nyams nas / / yang tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa gcig dang ldan no /
rūpavairāgyaṃ prāpto dvabhyāmavarabhāgīyaprahāṇarūparāgakṣayaparijñābhyām
# gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba thob pa ni; tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags zad pa'i yongs su shes pa gnyis dang ldan no /
prahīṇo 'pyārūpyāvacareṇa paryavasthānenābhyāmeva
# gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i kun nas dkris pas yongs su nyams pa yang gnyis po de dag dang ldan no; /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamanāgāmyarhatorekaiva parijñā vyavasthāpyate na bhūyasyaḥ
# ci'i phyir / / phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dag gi yongs su shes pa gcig kho nar rnam par gzhag gi /
yasmāt / tāsāṃ saṃkalanaṃ dhātuvairāgyaphalalābhataḥ / dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ parijñānāṃ saṃkalanaṃ bhavatyekatvena vyavasthāpanaṃ dhātuvairāgyāt phalaprāptitaśca
# mang du ni ma yin zhe na / / 'di ltar khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'bras bu thob phyir de dag bsdoms / / yongs su shes pa rnams sdom zhing / / gcig tu rnam par 'jog pa ni / / khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'bras bu thob pa dang rgyu gnyis kyis yin la /
tayoścāvasthayoretadubhayaṃ bhavati
# de gnyi ga yang gnas skabs de gnyis na srid pas /
ataḥ sarvaṃ prahāṇaṃ saṃkalayyaikā parijñocyate
# de'i phyir spang pa thams cad bsdoms te yongs su shes pa gcig shes bya'o /
atha kaḥ kati parijñāstyajati labhate vā
# yang gang zhig gis yongs su shes pa du zhig yongs su gtong ngam / / 'thob ce na /
ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na / ekāṃ tyajati arhattvāt kāmavairāgyād vā parihīyamāṇaḥ
# la la gcig gnyis lnga dang drug / / gtong ste thob pa lnga min no / / dgra bcom pa nyid dam / / 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba las / / yongs su nyams na gcig gtong ngo / / phyir mi 'ong ba gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig /
dve parijñe tyajatyanāgāmī rūpavītarāgaḥ kāmavairāgyāt parihīyamāṇaḥ
# 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams na / / yongs su shes pa nyid gtong ngo /
pañca tyajati vītarāgapūrvī mārgānvayajñāne / sa hyavarabhāgīyaprahāṇaparijñālābhe pūrvikāḥ pañca parijñāstyajati
# 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro ba / / lam la rjes su shes pa la gnas pa la ni lnga stong ste / / de ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa spangs pa'i yongs su shes pa 'thob pa na / / yongs su shes pa snga ma lnga gtong ngo /
ṣaṭ parijñāstyajatyānupoūrvikaḥ kāmavairāgyāt
# mthar gyis pa la 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pas ni / / yongs su shes pa drug gtong ngo /
lābhe 'pyevameva / kaścidekāṃ parijñāṃ labhate
# de bzhin du thob pa yang la las ni yongs su shes pa gcig kho na 'thob ste /
yaḥ kaścidapūrvā labhate / kaścid dve yaḥ kevalādārūpyadhātuvairāgyāt parihīyate
# gang la la zhig gis sngon med pa 'thob bo / / la las ni gnyis te / / gang zhig gzugs med pa'i khams las / / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'ba' zhig las yongs su nyams pas so /
kaścit ṣaṭ yo 'nāgāmiphalāt parihīyate / pañca tu nai kaścillabhate
# kha cig gis ni drug ste / / gang zhig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa'o / / lnga 'thob pa ni 'ga' yang med pa nyid do /
samāptaḥ parijñāprasaṅgaḥ
# yongs su shes pa'i skabs rdzogs so /
abhidharmakośabhāṣye 'nuśayanirddeśo nāma / pañcamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptmiti
# chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las; phra rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas lnga pa'o /
śrīlāmāvākasya yadatra puṇyam / ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānam / namo buddhāya / uktaṃ yathā prahāṇaṃ parijñākhyāṃ labhate / tadapi ca / kleśaprahāṇamākhyātaṃ satyadarśanabhāvanāt
# sarba mangg'a lam / / # / / ji skad du spangs pa ni yongs su shes pa'i ming 'thob po zhes bshad pa de yang / / bden pa mthong dang bsgom pa las / / nyon mongs spangs pa zhes bshad pa /
darśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca kleśā iti vistareṇākhyātam
# nyon [dd] mongs pa rnams mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no zhes rgyas par bshad pa /
tāvidānīṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgau kimanāsravau sāsravāviti vaktavyam / ata idamucyate
# da ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam de dag ci zag pa med pa'am / / zag pa dang bcas pa zhes brjod par bya zhe na / / de'i phyir 'di dag brjod de /
dvividho bhāvanāmārgo darśanakhyastvanāsravaḥ
# bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam gnyis te / / mthong ba zhes bya zag pa med /
dvidho bhavanāmārgo laukikok lokottaraśca / darśanamārgastu lokottara eva traidhātukapratipakṣatvāt / navaprakārāṇāṃ darśana heyānāṃ sakṛtprahāṇācca / na hi laukikasya eṣā śaktirasti / satyadarśanādityuktam
# bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam gnyis te / / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o / / mthong ba'i lam ni khams gsum pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnam pa dgu cig car du sprang ba'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa kho na yin te; 'jig rten pa la ni de 'dra ba'i mthu med do / / bden pa mthong ba las zhes bshad pa / / bden pa de dag kyang gang zhig tu / / bden pa dag ni bzhir bshad do /
kānīmāni satyāni kati ca / satyānyuktāni catvāri / vavoktāni / sāsravānāsravadharmanirdeśe / anāsravā mārgasatyamiti svaśabdena pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyoga iti nirodhasatyaṃ duḥkhaṃ samudayo loka ityatra duḥkhasamudayasatye
# gang du bshad ce na / / chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa bstan par zag med lam gyi bden pa dang zhes lam gyi bden ba rang gi ming gis bstan to / / so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gang / / bral ba'o zhes 'gog pa'i bden ba bstan to / / sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang / / zhes bya ba der sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden bdag bstan to / / ci 'di dag gi rim pa 'di kho na yin nam zhe na /
kimeṣa evaiṣāmanukramaḥ / netyāha / kiṃ tarhi / duḥkhaṃ samudayastathā / nirodhamārga iti
# smras pa / / ma yin no / / 'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na / / sdug bsngal kun 'byung de bzhin du / / 'gog dang lam ste de ltar na /
eṣa eṣāmanukramaḥ / svabhāvastu yathā pūrvamuktastayaivetipradarśanārthastathāśabdaḥ
# de dag gi rim ba ni 'di yin no / / de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rang gi ngo bo ni sngar ji skad bshad ba de kho na bzhin no zhes rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro /
sa punarayam / eṣāṃ yathā 'bhisamayaṃ kramaḥ / yasya hi satyasyābhisamayaḥ pūrvasya pūrvanirdeśaḥ / itarathā hi pūrvaṃ hetunirdeśo 'bhaviṣyat paścāt phalanirdeśaḥ
# de ni / / de dag ji ltar mngon rtogs rim / / bden pa gang zhig sngar mngon par rtogs pa de sngar bstan to / / de lta ma yin na rgyu ni sngar bstan la 'bras bu ni phyis bstan par 'gyur ro /
keṣāñcidutpattyanukūlā deśanāḥ
# kha cig ni skye ba dang mthun pa bstan te /
yathā smṛtyupasthānadhyānādīnām
# dper na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang; bsam gtan la sogs pa lta bu'o /
deṣāñcitprarūpaṇānukūlā deśanā yathā samyak prahāṇānām / na hyeṣa niyamo yat pūrvamutpannānāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayati
# kha cig ni rab tu brtag pa dang mthun par bstan te / / dper na yang dag par spong ba rnams lta bu ste / / gang sngar ni skyes pa rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed la /
paścādanutpannānāmanutpādāyeti / satyānāṃ tvabhisamayānukūlā deśanā / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamevameṣāṃ satyānāmabhisamayaḥ
# phyis ni ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun bskyed pa'i nges pa 'di ni med do / / bden pa rnams ni mngon bar rtogs pa dang mthun par bstan pa yin no / / ci'i phyir bden pa rnams de ltar mngon par rtogs she na /
yatra hi satto yena ca vādhyate yataśca mokṣaṃ prarthayate tadevādau vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ parīkṣyate
# gang la chags pa dang gang gis gnod pa byed pa dang gang las thar pa don du gnyer ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bden bde nyid la dang por rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs na yongs su rtog la / / phyis 'di'i rgyu ni gang zhig yin zhes kun 'byung gi bden pa la yongs su rtog go /
paścātko 'sya heturiti samudayasatyaṃ ko 'sya nirodha iti nirodhasatyaṃ ko 'sya mārga iti mārgasatyam / vyādhiṃ dṛṣṭvā tannidānakṣayameṣajānveṣāṇavat / sūtre 'pyeṣa eva satyānāṃ dṛṣṭānto darśitaḥ / katamasmin sūtre / caturbhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bhiṣaktalpasarttetyatra
# 'di'i 'gog pa ni gang zhig yin zhes 'gog pa'i bden ba la yongs su rtog go / / 'di'i lam ni gang zhig yin zhes lam gyi bden pa la yongs su rtog ste / / nad mthong bas de'i gzhi dang zad pa dang sman tshol ba bzhin no / / bden pa rnams kyi dpe 'di ni mdo las kyang bshad do / / mdo gang las she na / / yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i sman pas zug rdu 'byin pa zhes gsungs pa de las bstan to /
yathā ca vyavacāraṇāvasthāyāṃ satyaparīkṣā tathābhisamayāvasthāyāṃ satyābhisamayaḥ / pūrvavedhāt
# sngar 'phangs pa'i phyir ji ltar rnam par dpyod pa'i gnas skabs na bden ba la yongs su rtog pa de kho na bzhin du mngon par rtogs pa'i gnas skabs na yang bden pa mngon par rtogs te /
dṛṣṭabhūminiḥsaṃgāśvadhāvanavat
# dkyus sa bstan pa'i rta thags thogs med par rgyug pa bzhin no /
abhisamaya iti ko 'rthaḥ
# mngon bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i don ni ci zhe na /
abhisaṃbodha iṇo bodhanārthatvāt
# mngon par yang dag par rtogs pa'o /
karamādanāsrava eva na sāsravaḥ / sa hi nirvāṇābhimukhaḥ samyakbodhaḥ
# ci'i phyir zag ba med pa kho na yin gyi zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin zhe na / / de ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par yang dag par rtog pa ste /
samyagiti tattvena / tatra phalabhūtā upādānaskandhā duḥkhasatyam / hetubhūtāḥ samudayasatyam / samudetyasmāditi kṛtvā / ata eva tayoḥ phalahetubhāvānnāmato bhedo na dravyataḥ / nirodhamārgayostu dravyato 'pi
# yang dag pa zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid du'o / / de la nye bar len pa'i phung po 'bras bur gyur pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yin no / / rgyur gyur pa rnams ni kun 'byung gi bden ba yin te / / 'di las kun 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir 'di gnyis ni rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pas ming gi sgo nas bye brag yod kyi rdzas su ni ma yin no / / 'gog pa dang lam ni rdzas su yang bye brag yod do /
āryasatyānīti sūtra ucyante / ko 'syārthaḥ / āryāṇāmetānisatyāni tasmādāryasatyānīti sūtra evoktam
# mdo las 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes 'byung ba de'i don ci zhe na / / 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams la bden pas / / de lta bas na mdo kho na las /
kimanyeṣāmetāni mṛṣā
# 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bshad do /
sarveṣāmetāni satyānyaviparītatvāt
# ci 'di dag gzhan rnams la brdzun nam zhe na /
āryaistu yathaitāni tathā dṛṣṭāni nānyaiḥ / ata āryāṇāmetāni satyānyucyante na tvanāryāṇāṃ vīparītadarśanāt / yadāryāḥ sukhataḥ prāhustat pare duḥkhato biduḥ / yatpare sukhatḥ prāhustadāryā duḥkhato biduḥ
# 'di dag ni phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir thams cad la bden na 'phags pa rnams kyis ni 'di dag ji lta bde kho na bzhin du gzigs kyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin pas de'i phyir 'di dag ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa zhes bya ba'i phyin ci log tu mthong ba'i phyir 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi ni ma yin te / / tshigs su bcad pa las / / 'phags pas bde bar gang gsungs pa / / de ni gzhan gyis sdug bsngal rig / / gzhan gyis bde bar gang smras pa / / de ni 'phags pas sdug bsngal rig /
iti gāthā
# ces 'byung ngo /
dve āryāṇāṃ satye dve ārye cāryāṇāṃ ca satye ityapare / yathā vedanaikadeśo duḥkhasvabhāvaḥ / kathaṃ sarve sāsravāḥ saṃskārā duḥkhamityucyante / duḥkhāstriduḥkhatāyogādyathāyogamaśeṣataḥ
# gzhan dag na re gnyis ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin la / / gnyis ni 'phags pa yang yin 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yang yin no zhes zer ro / / gang gi tshe tshor ba'i phyogs gcig sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe ji ltar na 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal zhes brjod ce na / / yid 'ong yid du mi 'ong dang / / de las gzhan zag bcas rnams nyid / / sdug bsngal nyid gsum ldan pa'i phyir /
manāṣā amanāpāśca tadanye caiva sāsravāḥ / tisro hi duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā ca / tābhiryathāyogamaśeṣataḥ sarva sāsravāḥ saṃskārā duḥkhāḥ
# ci rigs ma lus sdug bsngal lo / / sdug bsngal nyid ni gsum ste / / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid dang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid do / / de dag gis ci rigs par 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ma lus par sdug bsngal ba yin te /
tatra manāṣā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā / amanāṣā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā / tebhyo 'nye saṃskāraduḥkhatayā / ke punarmanāpāḥ ke 'manāṣāḥ ke knobhayathā / tisro vedanā yathākramaṃ tadvaśena sukhavedanīyādayo 'pi saṃskārā manāpādisaṃjñāṃ labhante
# de la yid du 'ong ba rnams ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid do / / yid du mi 'ong ba rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid do / / de dag las gzhan pa rnams ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba nyid do / / yid du 'ong ba ni gang dag yin / / yid du mi 'ong ba ni gang dag yin / / gnyi ga ma yin pa ni gang dag yin zhe na / / tshor ba gsum dang go rims bzhin te / / de'i dbang gis bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i 'du byed rnams kyang yid du 'ong ba la sogs pa'i ming 'thob po /
sukhāyā hi vedanāyā vipariṇāmena duḥkhatā
# bde ba'i tshor ba ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid de / / mdo las /
sūtra uktaṃ sukhā vedanā utpādamukhā sthitisukhā vipariṇāmaduḥkhti
# bde ba'i tshor ba ni skye ba na yang bde / / gnas pa na yang bde la / / 'gyur ba na sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so /
duḥkhāyāḥ duḥkhasvabhāvenaiva duḥkhatā / duḥkhā vedanā utpādaduḥkhā sthitiduḥkhā iti sūtre
# sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gyi rang gi ngo bo kho nas sdug bsngal ba nyid de / / mdo las / / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ni skye ba na yang sdug bsngal la / / gnas pa na yang sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so /
aduḥkhāsukhāvedanāyāḥ saṃskāreṇaiva duḥkhatā / pratyayābhisaṃskaraṇādyadanityaṃ tadduḥkhamiti / vedanāvattadvedanīyā api saṃskārā ucyante
# bde ba yang ma yin; sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba ni rkyen gyis mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed kho nas sdug bsngal ba nyid de / / gang mi rtag pa de ni sdug bsngal ba yin no zhes 'byung ngo / / de myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'du byed rnams kyang tshor ba dang 'dra bar brjod do /
duḥkhameva duḥkhatā duḥkhaduḥkhatā / evaṃ yāvat saṃskārā eva duḥkhatetyapare
# gzhan dag na re sdug bsngal nyid sdug bsngal nyid yin pas sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid yin la / / 'du byed nyid sdug bsngal yin pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro /
asādhāraṇatvāt manāṣā 'manāpānāṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhaduḥkhate ukte
# 'gyur ba yang sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dag ni yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir bshad do /
sarve tusaṃskārāḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatayā duḥkhāḥ / tāṃstvāryā eva paśyanti / āha cātra
# 'du byed thams cad ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal ba nyid la de dag kyang 'phags pa rnams kho nas gzigs so / / 'dir smras pa /
ūrṇāpakṣma yathaiva hi karatalasaṃsthaṃ na vedyate pumbhiḥ
# lag mthil sbu nyag gcig 'dug pa / / mi rnams kyis ni mi rtogs la /
akṣigataṃ tu tathaiva hi janayatyaratiṃ ca pīḍaṃ ca / karatalasadṛśo bālo na vetti saṃskāraduḥkhatāpakṣma
# de nyid mig tu song na ni / / mi bde ba dang gnod skyed ltar / / byis pa lag mthil 'dab yis; / / 'du byed sdug bsngal spu mi rtogs /
akṣisadṛśastu vidvāṃstenaivodvijyate gāḍhamiti
# 'phags pa mig dang 'dra ba ni / / de yis shin tu yid kyang 'byung /
na hi bālānāmāvīcikeṣvapi skandheṣu tathā duḥkhabuddhiḥ pravartate yathāryāṇāṃ bhāvāgrikeṣvapīti / evaṃ tarhi mārgasyāpi saṃskāraduḥkhatāprasaṅgaḥ / saṃskṛtatvāt
# ji ltar 'phags pa rnams srid pa'i rtse mo pa dag la yang sdug bsngal gyi blo 'jug pa ltar byis pa rnams ni mnar med pa'i phung po rnams la yang de ltar sdug bsngal gyi blo mi 'jug go / / de lta na 'o na ni lam yang 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
pratikūlaṃ hi duḥkhamiti lakṣaṇānna mārgo duḥkham / na hi tasyotpāda āryāṇāṃ pratikūlaḥ sarvaduḥkhakṣayāvāhanāt / yadāpi te nirvāṇaṃ śāntataḥ paśyanti tadāpi yadeva duḥkhato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaiva nirodhaṃ śāntataḥ paśyantina mārgasya
# sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir lam ni sdug bsngal ba ma yin te / / de skye ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa 'dren pa'i 'phags pa rnams dang mi mthun pa med do / / gang gi tshe de dag mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar lta ba de'i tshe yang / / sdug bsngal du mthong ba gang yin pa de kho na'i 'gog pa la zhi bar lta'o /
yadāpi duḥkhamapyatrāsti tasmāt duḥkhamevāryasatyamucyate
# gang gi tshe 'di dag la bde ba yang yod pa de'i tshe ci'i phyir sdug bsngal kho na 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya zhe na /
sukhasyālpatvāt mūdgādibhāve 'pi māṣarāśyapadeśavadityeke
# kha cig na re bde ba myong ba'i phyir te / / mon sran sde'u la sogs pa yod bzhin du mon sran gre'u'i phung bo zhes ston pa bzhin te /
ko hi vidvān pariṣekasukhāṇukena gaṇḍasukhamiti vyavasyet / āha khalvapi / duḥkhasya ca hetutvāt duḥkhaiścānalpakaiḥ samuditatvāt / duḥkhe ca sati tadiṣṭerduḥkhaṃ sukhamiti vyavasyanti iti
# mkhas pa su zhig chus btab pa'i bde ba chung dus 'bras bu bde ba yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur / / yang smras pa / / sdug bsngal gyi ni rgyu phyir dang / / sdug bsngal mang pos bskyed phyir dang sdug bsngal yod na bde 'dod phyir /
sahaiva tu sukhena sarvaṃ bhavamāryā duḥkhataḥ paśyanti / saṃskāraduḥkhataikarasatvāt
# bde ba sdug bsngal zhes rtog go / / srid pa thams cad ni bde ba dang bcas te 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal du ro gcig ba'i 'phags ba rnams kyis sdug bsngal du gzigs te /
ato duḥkhamevāryāsatyaṃ vyavasthāpyate na sukham / kathamidānīṃ sukhasvabhāvāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhataḥ paśyanti
# de'i phyir sdug bsngal kho na 'phags pa'i bden bar rnam par gzhag gi bden ba ni ma yin no / / da ni ji ltar bde ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshor ba rnams la sdug bsngal du lta zhe na /
anityatayā pratikūlatvāt / yathā rūpasaṃjñādīnyapi duḥkhataḥ paśyanti
# mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mi mthun pa'i phyir te / / dper na gzugs dang 'du shes la sogs pa la yang sdug bsngal du lta mod kyi /
na catānyevaṃ duḥkhāni yathā duḥkhavedaneti
# de dag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no /
yastu manyate duḥkhahetutvāditi / tasyāsau samudayākāraḥ syānna duḥkhakāraḥ
# gang zhig sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa de'i de ni kun 'byung gi rnam pa yin gyi sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa ni ma yin no /
āryāṇāṃ carūpārupyopapattau kathaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pravarteta / na hi punasteṣāṃ duḥkhavedanāhetuḥ skandhā bhavanti / saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sūtre kimarthaṃ pṛthaguktā bhavet
# gzugs dang gzugs med par skyes pa dag gis 'phags pa rnams la yang ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes 'jug par 'gyur te / / de dag gi phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyu ma yin no / / mdo las 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyang ci'i phyir gsungs par gyur /
yadi tarhyanityatvāt duḥkhataḥpaśyanti / anityaduḥkhākārayoḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ
# gal te mi rtag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal nyid du lta na 'o na mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa dag la khyad par ci zhig yod /
udayavyayadharmitvādanityaṃ paśyanti
# skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag par lta la /
pratikūlatvāt duḥkham / anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatītyanityākāro duḥkhākāramākarṣati / nāstyeva sukha vedanetyekīyā duḥkhaiva tu sarvā
# mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du lta ste / / mi rtag par mthong na mi mthun par 'gyur bas mi rtag pa'i rnam pas sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa 'dren par byed do / / kha cig na re bde ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba ni med pa nyid de /
kathamidaṃ gamyate
# thams cad sdug bsngal kho na yin no /
sūtrādyuktitaśca
# 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
kathaṃ tāvatsūtrāt
# mdo dang rigs pa las te /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti / duḥkhā vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyeti / duḥkhe sukhamiti saṃjñāviparyāsa iti / evaṃ tāvatsūtrāt
# re zhig mdo las ji lta bu zhe na bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bde ba'i tshor ba ni sdug bsngal du blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal la bde ba'o snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log go zhes gsungs te / / re zhig mdo las ni de lta bu'o /
kathaṃ yuktitaḥ
# rigs pa las ji lta bu zhe na /
sukhahetvavyavasthānāt / ya eva hi kecitpānabhojanaśītoṣṇādaya iṣyante sukhahetavasta evātyupayuktā akālopayuktāśca punarduḥkhahetavaḥ saṃpadyante
# bde ba'i rgyu rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir te / / kha cig bde ba'i rgyu btung ba dang bza' ba dang grang ba dang dro ba la sogs par 'dod pa gang dag yin pa de dag kho na ha cang spyad pa dang dus ma yin par spyad pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dag tu 'gyur ro /
na ca yuktā sukhahetubṛddhacyā samena vā 'nyasminkāle duḥkhotpattirityādita eva te duḥkhahetavo na sukhasya / ante tu tadduḥkhaṃ vṛddhimāpannaṃ vyaktimāpadyata iti
# bde ba'i rgyu 'phel ba'am mnyam pas ni dus gzhan na sdug bsngal skyed par rigs pa ma yin pas de dag ni dang po kho na nas sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dag yin zhing bde ba'i rgyu ni ma yin la / / mjug tu ni sdug bsngal de 'phel bar 'gyur bas bsal bar 'gyur bar zad de /
evamīryāpathavikalpe 'pi vaktavyam
# spyod lam gyi bye brag la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o /
duḥkhapratikāre ca sukhabuddherduḥkhavikalpe ca / na hi tāvat sukhamiti vedyate kiñcidyāvanna duḥkhāntareṇopadruto bhavati kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇaśramakāmarāgaprabhaveṇa
# sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po dang sdug bsngal gyi bye brag la bde ba'i blo skye ba'i yang phyir te / / ji srid du bkres pa dang skom pa dang grang ba dang tsha ba dang ngal ba dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gtses par ma gyur ba de srid du bde ba'o snyam du tshor ba cung zad kyang med do /
tasmāt pratīkāra evāviduṣāṃ sukhabuddhirnasukhe duḥkhavikalpe ca vālaḥ sukhabuddhimutpādaynti yathāṃśādaṃśaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayantaḥ / tasmānnāstyeva sukhamiti / astyevetyābhivārmikāḥ
# de lta bas na mi mkhas pa rnams ni gnyen po kho na la bde ba'i blo 'jug gi bde ba la ni ma yin no / / byis pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi bye brag la yang bde ba'i blo skyed par byed de / / dper na phrag pa nas phrag par khur yod par byed pa lta bu'o / / de lta bas na bde ba ni med pa kho na'o zhes zer ro / / chos mngon pa pa rnams na re / / yod pa nyid do zhes zer te /
eṣa eva canyāyaḥ
# 'di nyid rigs pa yin no /
kathaṃ kṛtvā
# ji ltar byas pas she na /
idaṃ hi tāvadayaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ sukhāpavādī / kimidaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāma
# re zhig bde ba la skur ba 'debs pa de la 'di dri bar bya ste / / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin /
yadvādhanātmakaṃ cet / kathamiti vaktavyam
# gal te gnod pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa'o zhes zer na ni ji lta bu yin zhes brjod par bya'o /
upaghātakaṃ cet / anugrāhakaṃ sukhamiti siddham
# gal te gnod par byed pa yin no zhes zer na ni phan par byed pa bde ba yin no zhes bya bar grub po /
anabhipretaṃ cet / abhipretaṃ sukhamiti siddham / tadeva hyabhipretaṃ punaranabhipretaṃ bhavatyāryāṇāṃ naivālpakāle
# gal te mi 'dod pa yin no zhes zer na ni 'dod pa bde ba yin no zhes bya bar grub po / / gal te 'dod pa de nyid 'phags pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshe mi bzhed pa yin te /
tasmādaniṣpanamabhipretatvaṃ cet / na
# de lta bas na 'dod pa nyid yongs su ma grub pa yin no zhes zer na ni ma yin te /
anyathā 'nabhipretatvāt / yā hi vedanā svena lakṣaṇenābhipretā nāsau pouonastenaiva jātvanabhipretā bhavati
# mi 'dod pa ni gzhan du yin pa'i phyir ro / / tshor ba gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid kyis 'dod pa de ni nam yang de kho nas mi 'dod par mi 'gyur te /
tathā hyenāmākārāntareṇa vidūṣayantyāryāḥ pramādapadaṃ caināṃ paśyanti mahābhisaṃskārasādhyāṃ ca vipariṇāminīṃ cānityāṃ cayenānabhipretā bhavati / na tu khalu svalakṣaṇākāreṇa
# 'di ltar 'phags pa rnams ni 'di gang gis na mi bzhed par 'gyur ba rnam pa gzhan gyis rnam par sun 'byin par byed cing / / 'di la bag med pa'i gnas dang mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos bsgrub par bya ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba can dang mi rtag par lta'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pas ni ma yin no /
yadi cāsau svenātmanānabhipretā bhavennaiva tasyāṃ kasyacidrāgo bhavedyato vairāgyārthaṃ prakārāntareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ / tasmādastyeva svalakṣaṇataḥ sukha vedanā / yattu bhagavatoktaṃ yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti tadbhagavataiva nītārthaṃ saṃskārānityatāmānanda mayā saṃghāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāraviopariṇāmatāṃ ca yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti
# gal te 'di rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mi 'dod pa zhig yin bar gyur na ni de la su yang 'dod chags skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na / / gang gi phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ched du rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang skyon can du lta bar 'gyur te / / de lta bas na bde ba'i tshor ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis yod pa kho na'o / / bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kho nas kun dga' bo gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba ni ngas 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid dang 'du byed rnam par 'gyur ba nyid la dgongs nas gsungs so zhes don nges par mdzad pa yin no /
ato na duḥkhadukhatāṃ saṃdhāyaitaduktamiti siddhaṃ bhavati
# de lta bas na 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid las dgongs te gsungs pa ma yin par grub pa yin no /
yadica svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditavyaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyatkimarthamāryānanda evaṃ bhagavantamaprakṣyat / tisra ime vedanā uktā bhagavatā sukhā duḥkhā 'duḥkhāsukhā ca / uktaṃ cedaṃ bhagavatā yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti / kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitam yatkiñcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyeti
# gal te tshor ba thams cad rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba zhig yin par gyur na ni ci'i phyir 'phags pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma lags sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags ba dang tshor ba 'di gsum yang gsungs la / / bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes kyang gsungs na / / bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bka' stsal zhes zhus par gyur te /
evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti / bhagavānaṣyeva vyākariṣyat / idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti / na tvevamāha / tasmātsantyeva svabhāvatastisro vedanāḥ / idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkimcidveditamidamatra duḥkhasyetyābhīprāyikametadvākyaṃ darśayati / yadaṣyuktaṃ sukhā vedanā duḥkheti draṣṭavyeti / ubhayaṃ tasyāmasti
# des kyang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas tshor ba gsum zhes bka' stsal zhes zhus par 'gyur la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du tshor ba gsum zhes bya ba 'di ni ngas dgongs nas bshad pa yin no zhes lung bstan par 'gyur ba zhig na de skad kyang bka' stsal te / / de lta bas na tshor ba gsum ni rang gi ngo bos yod la / / gang ci tshor yang rung de ni 'dir sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba 'di ngas dgongs nas bshad pa yin no zhes tshig 'di ni dgongs pa can du ston par mdzad pa yin no / / gang yang bde ba'i tshor ba ni sdug bsngal du blta bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yang de la gnyi ga yod do /
sukhatvaṃ ca svabhāvatomanāpatvād duḥkhatvaṃ ca paryāyato vipariṇāmānityadharmatvāt
# rang gi ngo bos yid du 'ong ba'i phyir ni bde ba nyid yin la rnam par 'gyur ba dang mi rtag pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir rnam grangs kyis ni sdug bsngal nyid yin no /
sā tu sukhato dṛśyamānā bandhāya kalpate tadāsvādanāt / duḥkhato dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate
# de la bde bar mthong na ni 'dod chags can rnams de'i ro myong bar byed pa'i phyir 'ching bar 'gyur la /
tadvairāgyāditi / yathā dṛśyamānā mokṣāya kalpate tathaināṃ draṣṭumājñāpayanti buddhāḥ / kathamidaṃ gamyate svabhāvataḥ sā sukheti
# sdug bsngal du mthong na ni de la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir thar bar 'gyur bas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ji ltar mthong na thar bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du blta bar bka' stsal pa yin no / / de rang gi ngo bos bde zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
ya dāha / saṃskārānityatāṃ jñātvā atho vipariṇāmatām / vedanā duḥkhataḥ proktā saṃbuddhena prajānaneti / yadapi coktaṃ duḥkhe sukhamiti saṃjñāviparyāsa iti / ābhiprāyika eṣa nirdeśaḥ
# 'di ltar / / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab mkhyen gyis / / 'du byed mi rtag nyid dang ni / / rnam par 'gyur ba nyid mkhyen nas / / tshor ba sdug bsngal bar gsungs so / / zhes bya ba smos so / / gang yang sdug bsngal la bde ba'o snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log go zhes gsungs pa yang bstan ba 'di ni dgongs pa can yin te /
lokasya hi sukhasaṃjñā vedanāyāṃ kāmaguṇeṣūpapattau ca
# 'jig rten ni tshor ba dang 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang skye ba la bde bar 'du shes so /
tatra sūkhaṃ vedanāṃ paryāyeṇa duḥkhaṃ satīmekāntasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ / evamupapattim / tasmānnātaḥ sukhavedanā 'bhāvasiddhiḥ / yadi tu svabhāvata eva sarvaṃ veditaṃ duḥkhamabhaviṣyat tisro vedanā iti vacane koguṇo 'bhaviṣyat
# de la bde ba'i tshor ba la ni rnam grangs kyis sdug bsngal yang yod na gcig tu bde bar lta ba ni phyin ci log yin la / / 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la yang bde ba ni chung la sdug bsngal ni mang ba yin na gcig tu bde bar lta ba ni phyin ci log pa yin te / / skye ba la de dang 'dra'o / / de lta bas na bde ba'i tshor ba med par mi 'grub po / / gal te tshor ba thams cad rang gi ngo bo kho nas sdug bsngal ba yin par 'gyur na tshor ba gsum zhes gsungs pa la yon tan ci zhig yod par 'gyur /
lokānuvṛttyeti cet na / sarvaveditaduḥkhatvasya saṃskāravipariṇāmānityatāṃ saṃdhāya bhāṣitavacanāt yathābhūtavacanācca / yacca sukhendriyaṃ yacca saumanasyendriyaṃ sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavye ti vistareṇoktvā yenemāni pañcendriyāṇyevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā dṛṣṭāni trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni prahīṇāni bhavantī tyevamādi
# gal te 'jig rten dang mthun par gsungs pa yin no zhe na ma yin te / / tshor ba thams cad sdug bsngal ba nyid ni ngas dgongs nas gsungs so zhes bka' stsal pa'i phyir ro / / yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin zhes gsungs pa'i yang phyir te / / bde ba'i dbang po gang yin pa dang yid bde ba'i dbang po gang yin pa 'di ni bde ba'i tshor ba yin par blta bar bya'o zhes rgyas par gsungs nas gang gis dbang po lnga po 'di dag de ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong zhing /
loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ vyavasyet / mṛdvadhimātramadhyāsu yathākramaṃ sukhādibuddhiriti cet / na / sukhasyāpi trividhatvāt mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣvadhimātrā disukhabuddhiḥ syāt / yadā ca gandharasaspraṣṭavyaviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā katamat duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhirbhavati
# de'i kun du sbyor ba gsum yang sbangs pa yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs so / / 'jig rten yang ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la rnam pa gsum du rtog par 'gyur gal te chung ngu dang chen po dang 'bring dag la go rims bzhin du bde ba la sogs pa'i blo skye'o zhe na ni bde ba la yang rnam pa gsum yod pas sdug bsngal chung ngu la sogs pa la bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ro / / gang gi tshe dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khyad par las skyes pa'i bde ba sang ba de'i tshe gang la 'di bde ba'i blor 'gyur ba sdug bsngal chung ngur gyur pa yang gang zhig yin /
anutpannavinaṣṭe catasminmṛduni duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukabuddhiḥ syāt / aśeṣaduḥkhāpagamāt / evaṃ kāmasukhasaṃmukhībhāve 'pi vaktavyam / kathaṃ ca nāmedaṃ yojyate yanmṛdunivedite suvyaktastīvro 'nubhavo gṛhyate madhye punaravyakta iti
# sdug bsngal chung ngu de ma skyes pa dang 'gags pa na sdug bsngal ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir bde ba'i blo shin tu ches skye bar 'gyur te / / 'dod pa'i bde ba mngon sum du gyur pa la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o / / tshor ba chung du la ni nyams su myong ba shin tu gsal ba dang shas chen por 'dzin la / / 'bring la ni mi gsal bar 'dzin zhes bya ba gang yin ba 'di yang ji ltar rung /
triṣu ca dhyāneṣu sukhavacanāt mṛdu duḥkhaṃ syāt
# bsam gtan gsum na bde ba yod do zhes 'byung bas sdug bsngal chung dur yang 'gyur la /
ūrdhvamaduḥkhasukhavacanānmadhyaṃ duḥkhamiti na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānam
# gang na bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yod do zhes 'byung bas sdug bsngal 'bring du yang 'gyur te / / de lta bas na sdug bsngal chung ngu la sogs pa la bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba rnam par gzhag tu mi rung ngo /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā rūpaṃ cenmahānāmannekāntaduḥkhamabhaviṣyanna sukhaṃ na sukhānugatamityevamādi / tasmādapyasti kiñcitsukham / evaṃ tāvanna sūtrātsukhavedanā 'bhāvaḥ sidhyati / yatpunaḥ sukhahetvavyavasthānādityuktam
# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ming chen gal te gzugs gcig tu sdug bsngal ba zhig yin par gyur na ni bde ba yang med / / bde ba dang rjes su 'brel pa yang med ces bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs pas de'i phyir yang bde ba cung zad cig yod de / / re zhig de lta na mdo las bde ba'i tshor ba med par mi 'grub bo / / gang yang bde ba'i rgyu rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa /
hetvaparijñānādidamucyate / āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hi viṣayaḥ sukhaheturvā bhavati duḥkhaheturvā / na kevalo viṣayaḥ
# de yang rgyu yongs su ma shes pa'i phyir smra bar zad de / / rten gyi khyad par la ltos pa'i yul bde ba'i rgyu 'am / / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin gyi yul 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no /
sa yāṃ kāmavasthāṃ prāpya sukhaheturbhavati na tāṃ punaḥ prāpya kadācinna bhavatīti vyavasthita eva sukhahetuḥ
# de lus kyi gnas skabs gang zhig dang phrad na bde ba'i rgyu yin pa de ni de dang phrad na ma yin pa ni nam yang ma yin pas bde ba'i rgyu rnam par gnas pa kho na yin te /
tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣāpekṣaḥ svādupākaheturbhavati sa evāsvādapākahetuḥ na tu yāṃ pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svadupākahetustāṃ punaḥ prāpya na heturityeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ / dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetuḥ
# dper na btso bar bya ba'i 'byung ba'i khyad par la ltos pa'i me de nyid zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang yin zhing / / de nyid mi zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yang yin la btso bar bya ba'i 'byung ba'i gnas skabs gang dang phrad nas zhim par tshos pa'i rgyu yin pa de dang phrad nas rgyu ma yin pa ni ma yin pa bzhin te 'di ni dpe yin no / / bsam gtan dag na yang bde ba'i rgyu ji ltar rnam par mi gnas pa yin /
yattu punaḥ duḥkhapratikāre sukhabuddhirityuktaṃ tatra vihitaḥ pratīkāraḥ / yadā gandhādiviśeṣajaṃ sukhaṃ vedayate tadā kasya pratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhirbhavatyanutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin duḥkhe sutarāṃ sukhabuddhiḥ syāt
# gang yang gnyen po la bde ba'i blo skye zhes smras pa de la yang gang gi tshe dril la sogs pa'i khyad par las skyes pa'i bde ba myong ba de'i tshe gang gis gnyen po la bde ba'i blor 'gyur / / sdug bsngal de ma skyes pa dang 'gags nas bde ba'i blo shin tu ches skye bar yang 'gyur ro /
dhyānaje sukhe kaḥ kasya pratīkāra ityevamādi / bhāvasaṃcāre 'pi cāvasthāntarajaṃ sukhamevotpadyate / yāvadasau tādṛśī kāyāvasthā 'ntarghīyate
# bsam gtan las skyes pa'i bde ba la yang gang gi gnyen po yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa lan bshad zin to / / khur sbed pa la yang ji srid du lus kyi gnas skabs de lta bu med par ma gyur gyi bar du gnas skabs gzhan las skyes pa'i bde ba khon skye bar 'gyur ro /
anyathā hi paścādbhūyasī sukhabuddhiḥ syāt
# de lta ma yin na phyis bde ba'i blo rje mang du skye bar 'gyur te /
evaṃ śrāntasyeryāpathavikalpeṣu veditavyam
# ngal ba'i spyod lam gyi rnam pa dag la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o /
ante kuto duḥkhabuddhirārambho yadi nādita iti / cet
# gal te dang po nas rtsom pa zhig med na mjug tu sdug bsngal gyi blor ga la 'gyur zhe na /
kāyapariṇāmaviśeṣānmadyādīnāmante mādhuryaśuktatāvat
# lus yongs su 'gyur pa'i khyad par las te / / chang la sogs pa mngar ba la mjug tu skyur por 'gyur ba bzhin no /
tasmādastyeva sukhā vedaneti siddham
# de lta bas na bde ba'i tshor ba yod pa kho na'o zhes bya ba yang grub la /
triduḥkhatāyogādvā sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ duḥkhamiti / yattu samudayasatyaṃ tadevocyate / idamutsūtram sūtre hi tṛṣṇaivoktā / pradhānyādasau sūtra uktā / anye 'pi tu samudayaḥ
# sdug bsngal nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba yang grub pa yin no / / kun 'byung gi bden pa gang yin pa de nyid sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yin no zhes bya ba de ni mdo las thal ba yin te / / mdo las ni sred pa kho na yin par bshad do / / de ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir mdo las bshad kyi gzhan dag kyang kun 'byung ni yin no /
kathamidaṃ pratyetavyam
# 'di ji ltar khong du chud par bya zhe na /
anyatrānyasyāpi vacanāt
# gzhan las gzhan yang yin par gsungs pa'i phyir te /
uktaṃ hi bhagavatā / karma ca tṛṣṇā ca atho avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ heturabhisaṃparāya iti
# bcom ldan 'das kyis / / las dang srid pa dang ni ma rig pa / / phyi ma'i tshe la 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu /
punaścoktaṃ pañca bījajātānīti sopādānasya vijñānasyaitadadhivacanam
# zhes gsungs la yang sa bon gyi rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba / / 'di ni nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dags yin no /
pṛthivīdhāturiti catasṛṇāṃ vijñānasthitīnāmetadadhivacanamiti
# sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bzhi'i tshig bla dags yin no zhes kyang gsungs te /
tasmādābhiprāyikaḥ sūtreṣu nirdeśo lākṣaṇikastvabhidharme / api tvabhinirvṛttihetuṃ brūvatā samudayasatyaṃ tṛṣṇaivoktā
# de lta bas na mdo las bstan pa ni dgongs pa can yin la / / chos mngon pa las bstan pa ni mtshan nyid pa yin no / / gzhan yang mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu bka' stsol pa na ni kun 'byung gi bden pa sred pa kho na yin par gsungs la / / skye ba dang mngon bar 'grub pa'i rgyu /
upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ brūvatā gāthāyāṃ karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyoktā
# rgyu dang bcas par bka' stsol pa ni tshigs su bcad pa las / / las dang sred pa dang ma rig pa yin par gsungs te / / mdo las / / las ni skye ba'i rgyu yin la /
karmaheturūpapattaye tṛṣṇāheturabhinirvṛttaya iti sūtre vacanāt
# srid pa ni mngon bar 'grub pa'i rgyu yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / yang na mdo las rgyu dang bcas / / rkyen dang bcas /
sahetusapratyayasanidānasūtrakrameṇa vā bījakṣetrabhāvaṃ pratipādayatā vijñānādayo 'ṣyuktāḥ
# gzhi dang bcas zhes 'byung ba'i rim par bstan pa yin no / / sa bon dang zhing gi dngos por ston par mdzad pas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la yang gsungs so /
kā punaruṣapattiḥ kā cābhinirvṛttiḥ / dhātugatiyonyādiprakārabhedenātmabhāvasyoṣapadanamupapattiḥ
# skye ba ni gang yin / / mngon par 'grub ba ni gang yin zhe na / / khams dang 'gro ba dang skye gnas la sogs pa'i bye brag gis lus skye ba ni skye ba yin la /
abhedena punarbhavapratisaṃdhānamabhinirvṛttiḥ / tayoryathākramaṃ karma ca bhavatṛṣṇā ca hetuḥ / tadyathā bījaṃ śālivādijātiprakārabhedenāṅkuroopapadanasya hetuḥ / āpaḥ punarabhedena sarvaṅkuraprarohamātrasyetyeva dṛṣṭāntaḥ
# bye brag med par yang srid par nyid mtshams sbyor ba ni mngon par 'grub pa yin no / / de gnyis kyi rgyu ni go rims bzhin du las dang sred pa yin te / / dper na sa bon s'a lu dang nas la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag gis myu gu skye ba'i rgyu yin la / / chu ni bye brag med par myu gu thams cad skye ba tsam gyi rgyu yin ba lta bu ste 'di ni dpe yin no /
tṛṣṇā 'bhinirvṛttiheturiti kā 'tra yuktiḥ / vītatṛṣṇasya janmābhāvāt
# mngon bar grub pa'i rgyu sred pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod ce na /
ubhaye 'pi briyante / satṛṣṇā vītatṛṣṇāśca
# sred pa dang bral ba skye ba med pa'i phyir te /
satṛṣṇā eva jātā dṛśyante na vītatṛṣṇā iti / vinā tṛṣṇayā janmābhāvāt / bhavasyābhinirvṛttau tṛṣṇāhetuṃ pratīmaḥ / saṃtatinamanācca / yatra ca satṛṣṇā tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namantīṃ paśyāmaḥ / tasmāt punarbhave 'ṣyevamiti vyavasyāmaḥ
# sred pa dang bcas pa dang sred pa dang bral ba gnyi ga yang 'chi ba las sred pa dag kho na skye bar snang gi sred pa dang bral ba rnams ni ma yin pas sred pa med na skye ba med pa'i phyir sred pa mngon par 'grub par bya ba la sred pa rgyu yin par shes so / / rgyud gzhol ba'i yang phyir te / / gang la sred pa dang bcas pa der sems kyi rgyud yang dang yang du gzhol bar mthong bas / / de lta bas na yang sred pa la yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya bar shes so /
na cātmabhāva evaṃ kenacidāgṛhīto yathā tṛṣṇayā
# ji ltar sred pas 'dag pa'i chal sran chung gi phye ma'i lde gu bskams pas lus bzung ba bzhin du lus /
śuṣkamasūropasnānalepāṅgavat / na cānyo heturevamanuṣatto yathātmasneha ityeṣā yuktiḥ / catvāryapi satyānyuktāni bhagavatā
# kun du bzung ba de ltar ni gang gis kyang lus kun du ma bzung ste / / rgyu gzhan ni ji ltar bdag la chags pa de ltar rjes su 'brel ba ma yin te / / 'di ni rigs pa yin no / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa bzhi zhes kyang gsungs /
dve api satye saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ca
# kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang don dam pa'i bden pa dang bden ba gnyis zhes kyang gsungs la /
tayoḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇam / yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat
# de gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ci zhe na / / gang la bcom dang blo yis gzhan / / bsal na de blo mi 'jug pa /
ghaṭārthavatsaṃvṛtisat paramārthasadanyathā / yasminnavayavaśo bhinne na tadbuddhirbhavati tat saṃvṛtisat
# bum chu bzhin du kun rdzob tu / / yod de don dam yod gzhan no / / gang la cha shas su bcom na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de ni kun rdzob tu yod pa ste /
tadyathā ghaṭaḥ / tatra hi kapālaśo bhinne ghaṭabuddhirna bhavati / tatra cānyānapohya dharmān buddhacyā tadbuddhirna bhavati taccāpi saṃvṛtisadveditavyam
# dper na bum pa lta bu'o / / de la ni gyo mor bcom na bum pa'i blo mi 'jug go / / gang la blos chos gzhan bsal na de'i blo mi 'jug pa de yang kun rdzob tu yod pa yin par khong du chud par bya ste /
tadyathāmbu / tatra hi buddhacyā rūpādīndharmānaṣohyāmbubuddhirna bhavati / teṣveva tu saṃvṛtisaṃjñā kṛteti saṃvṛtivaśāt ghaṭaścāmbu cāstīti brūbantaḥ satyamevāhurna mṛṣetyetatsaṃvṛtisatyam
# dper na chu lta bu'o / / de la ni blos gzugs la sogs pa'i chos bsal na / / chu'i blo mi 'jug go / / de dag kho na la kun rdzob tu de'i ming du btags pa yin pas kun rdzob kyi dbang gis bum pa dang chu yod do zhes brjod pa ni bden pa kho na smras pa yin gyi / / brdzun pa ni ma yin pas de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin no /
atonyathā paramārtha satyam
# de las gzhan pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
tatra bhinne 'poi tadbudhirbhavatyeva / anyadharmāpohe 'pi buddhacyā tat paramārthasat
# gang la bcom yang de'i blo 'jug pa kho na yin la / / blos chos gzhan bsal yang de'i blo 'jug pa de ni don dam par yod pa yin te /
tadyathā rūpam / tatra hi paramāṇuśo bhinne vastuni rasārhānapi ca dharmānapohya buddhacyā rūpasya svabhāvabuddhirbhavatyeva / evaṃ vedanādayo 'pi draṣṭavyāḥ
# dper na gzugs lta bu'o / / de la rdul phra bar tu bcom yang rung / / blos ro la sogs pa'i chos bsal kyang rung gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi blo 'jug pa nyid de / / tshor ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o /
etat paramārthena bhāvāt paramārthasatyamiti
# de ni don dam par yod pa'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o / / sngon gyi slob dpon rnams na re /
yathā lokottarena jñānena gṛhyate tat pṛṣṭhalabdhena vā laukikena tathā paramārthasatyam
# ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa'am / / de'i rjes la thob pa 'jig rten pas 'dzin pa de ltar ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin no /
yathānyena tathā saṃvṛtisatyam iti pūrvācāryāḥ
# ji ltar gzhan gyis 'dzin pa de ltar ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin no zhes zer ro /
uktāni satyāni
# bden pa rnams bshad zin to /
kathaṃ punasteṣāṃ darśanaṃ bhavati
# ji ltar na de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste /
vaktavyam / ata ādiprāthānamārabhyocyate
# de'i phyir dang po 'jug pa las brtsams te brjod par bya'o /
vṛttasthaḥ śrutacintāvānbhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate
# tshul gnas thos dang bsam gtan pa / / bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor /
satyāni ha draṣṭukāma ādita eva śīlaṃ pālayati
# bden pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa ni dang po kho nar tshul khrims srung bar byed do /
tataḥ satyadarśanasyānulomaṃ śrutamudgṛhlātyarthaṃ vā śruṇeni
# de'i 'og tu bden pa mthong ba dang mthun pa'i thos pa 'dzin pa'am / / don nyan par byed do /
śrutvā cintayati aviparītaṃ cintayitvā bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate
# thos nas phyin ci ma log par sems par byed do / / bsams nas ting nge 'dzin sgom pa la rab tu sbyor bar byed do /
samādhau tasya śrutamayīṃ prajñāṃ niśritya cintāmayī jāyate
# de thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab la brten nas bsam pa las byung ba skye'o /
cintāmayīṃ niśritya bhāvanāmayī jāyate / kiṃ punarāsāṃ prajñānāṃ lakṣaṇam / nāmobhayārthaviṣayā śrutamayyādikā dhiyaḥ
# bsam pa las byung ba la brten nas bsgom pa las byung ba skye'o / / shes rab 'di dag gi mtshan nyid ci zhe na / / thos sogs las byung blo rnams ni / / ming dang gnyi ga don yul tsan /
nāmālambanā kila śrutamayī prajñā / nāmārthālambanā cintāmayī / kadācidvacyañjanenārthamākarṣati kadācidarthena vyañjanam
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni ming la dmigs pa yin la / / bsam pa las byung ba ni ming dang don la dmigs pa yin te / / res 'ga' ni yi ges don 'dren par byed do /
arthalamvanaiva bhāvanāmayī / sā hi vyañjananirapekṣā arthe pravartate
# bsgom pa las byung ba ni don la dmigs pa kho na yin te / / de ni yi ge la mi ltos par don la 'jug go /
tadyathā 'mbhasi plotumaśikṣitaḥ plavanneva muñcati / kiyacchikṣitaḥ kadācit muñcet kadācidālamvate
# dper na stong rkyal legs par ma lobs pa chu'i nang du 'ju bar bya ba mi gtong ba kho na yin la; cung zad lo bas pa ni res 'ga' ni gtong res 'ga' ni 'ju bar byed do /
suśikṣitā plavan nirapekṣastaratītyeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# legs par lobs pa ni 'ju par bya ba la mi ltos bar rgal ba lta bu ste 'di ni dpe yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ cintāmayī prajñā na siddhacyatītyapare / yāhi nāmālambanā śrutamayī prāpnoti yā 'rthālambanā bhāvanāmayīti
# gzhan dag na re rtog pa 'di la ni ming la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa las byung ba yin par 'gyur la / / don la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsgom pa las byung ba yin par 'gyur bas bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi /
idaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ nāniravadyaṃ vidyate / āptavacanaprāmāṇyajātaniścayaḥ śrutamayī
# thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab ni yid ches pa'i lung tshad ma nyid las skyes pa'i nges pa yin no /
yuktinidhyānajaścintāmayī / samādhijjo bhāvanāmayīti
# bsam pa las byung ba ni rigs pas nges par brtags pa la skyes pa yin no /
hetau mayaṭvidhānāt / yadyathā 'nnamayāḥ prāṇāḥ tṛṇamayyo gāyaḥ iti / tasya punarevaṃ bhāvanāyāṃ prayuktasya kathaṃ bhāvanā saṃpadyata ityāha
# bsgom pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'di dag gi mtshan nyid kha na mtho ba med par snang ngo zhes zer ro / / de ltar bsgom pa la rab tu brtson pa de ji ltar na sgom pa rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na /
vyapakarṣadvayavataḥ
# bsrings gnyis ldan zhes bya ba smos te /
yadi hi kāyacittābhyāṃ vyapakṛṣṭo bhavati / saṃsargākuśalavitarkadūrīkaraṇāt
# gal te 'du 'dzi dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thag bsrings pa'i phyir lus dang sems dag gis bsrings pa yin na rdzogs par 'gyur ro /
tattarhi vyapakarṣadvayaṃ kasya sukaraṃ bhavati / yo 'lpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaśca
# 'o na bsrings pa de gnyis su la sla zhe na / / 'dod pa chung ba dang chog shes pa la sla'i /
nāsaṃtuṣṭamahecchayoḥ / kā punariyamasaṃtuṣṭiḥ
# chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can la ma yin no / / chog mi shes pa 'di ni gang zhig yin no /
kā ca mahecchatā / labdhe bhūyaḥspṛhā 'tuṣṭiralabdhecchā mahecchātā
# 'dod chen can ni gang zhig yin zhe na / / rnyed la yang sred chog mi shes / / ma rnyed la 'dod 'dod chen can /
labdheṣu kila praṇīteṣu cīvarādiṣu bhūyaskāmata 'saṃtuṣṭiḥ
# chos mngon pa pa rnams na re chos gos la sogs pa gya nom pa rnyed pa la yang dang yang du 'dod pa ni chog mi shes pa yin la /
alabdheṣu tatkāmatā mahecchatetyābhidhārmikāḥ
# ma rnyed pa dag la de 'dod pa ni 'dod chen can yin no zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
nanu ca sā 'tibhūyaskāmatā 'labdha eva na labdhe bhavatīti ko 'nayorviśeṣa iti vaktavyametad / evaṃ tu yujyate
# yang dang yang du 'dod pa de yang ma rnyed pa kho na la yin gyi rnyed pa la ni ma yin pa ma yin nam / / 'di gnyis la khyad bar ci zhig yod de 'di ni brjod par bya dgos so / / 'di ltar ni rung ste /
labdhenāpraṇītenāprabhūtena paritāpo 'saṃtuṣṭiḥ
# gya nom pa ma yin pa dang mang po ma yin pa rnyed pas yid mi bde ba ni chog mi shes pa yin no /
alabdhapraṇītaprabhūtecchā mahecchatā
# gya nom pa dang mang po ma rnyed pas 'dod pa ni 'dod chen can yin no /
viparyāsāttadvipakṣau
# bzlog pa de yi gnyen po dag /
asaṃtuṣṭimahecchatāviparyayeṇa tatpratipakṣau veditavyau / saṃtuṣṭiścālpecchatā ceti
# chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can las bzlog pa ni de dag gi gnyen po chog shes pa dang 'dod chen chung ba yin par rig par bya'o /
tridhātvāptāmalau ca tau / tadvipakṣāviti vartate
# de gnyis khams gsum gtogs dri med / / de'i gnyen po zhes bya bar sbyar te /
tridhātukau ca poratisaṃyuktau ca
# khams gsum pa dag dang mi ldan pa dag kyang yin no /
sāsravānāsravatvāt / asaṃtuṣṭimahecchate ca kāmāvacaryāveva
# chog mi shes pa dang 'dod chen can ni 'dod pa na spyod pa dag kho na yin no /
kaḥ punaranayoralpecchatāsaṃtuṣṭacyoḥ svabhāva ityāha
# 'dod chen chung ba dang chog shes pa 'di gnyis kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
alobhaḥ / alobhasvabhāve hyete / āryavaṃśāśca / alobha iti vartate
# ma chags zhes bya ba smos te / / 'di dag ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no / / 'phags rigs ma chags pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
āryāṇāmebhyaḥ prasavādāryavaṃśāścatvāraḥ / te 'pyalobhasvabhāvāḥ
# 'di dag las 'phags pa rnams skye bas na 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi ste / / de dag kyang ma chags pa'i rang bzhin no /
teṣāṃ tuṣṭacyātmakāstrayaḥ
# de dag las gsum ni chog shes bdag nyid do /
jsaṃtuṣṭisvabhāvāḥ / cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanasaṃtuṣṭayaḥ
# dang po gsum po chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang stan gyis chog shes pa rnams ni chog shes pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no /
prahāṇabhāvanārāmatā caturtha āryavaṃśaḥ kathamalobhasvabhāvaḥ
# 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi pa ni spong ba dang bsgom pa dag la dga' ba nyid yin no; / / ji ltar na ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin zhe na /
bhavakāmarāgavaimukhyāt / atha caturbhirāryavaṃśaiḥ kiṃ darśitaṃ bhagavatā
# srid pa dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro / / yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis ci zhig bstan ce na /
karmāntena tribhirvṛttiḥ
# gsum gyis tshul bstan thams cad las /
dharmasvāminā hi bhagavatā parityaktasvavṛttikarmāntebhyaḥ śiṣyebhyo mokṣārthamabhyupagatebhyo dvayaṃ prajñaptaṃ vṛttiśca karma ca
# chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das kyis / / rang gi tshul dang las kyi mtha' yongs su spangs shing thar pa don du gnyer bar khas 'che ba'i slob ma rnams la tshul dang las gnyis bcas te /
tribhirāryavaṃśairvṛttiścaturyena karma / anayā vṛttyedaṃ karma kurvāṇā bhavantī na cirānmokṣaṃ prāpsyantīti / kasmātpunariyamīdṛśī vṛttiridaṃ ca karma prajñaptam
# 'phags pa'i rigs gsum gyis ni tshul bcas so / / bzhi pas ni las bcas te / / khyed tshul 'dis las 'di byed na ring por mi thogs par thar pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so / / ci'i phyir tshul 'di lta bu dang las 'di lta bu bcas she na /
tṛṣṇotpādavipakṣataḥ / catvārastṛṣṇotpādāḥ sūtra uktāḥ
# sred pa skye ba'i gnyen po'i phyir / / mdo las sred pa skye ba bzhi gsungs te /
cīvarahetorbhikṣostṛṣṇotpadyamānā utpadyate pratitiṣṭhanti pratitiṣṭhati abhiniviśamānā 'bhiniviśate
# dge slong sred pa skye ba na chos gos kyi phyir dang bsod snyoms kyi phyir dang; mal cha dang stan gyi phyir skye'o / / gnas pa na gnas so /
piṇḍapātahetoḥ śayyāsanahetoriti / bhavavibhavahetorbhikṣostṛṣṇotpadyamānā utpadyata iti vistaraḥ / eṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāra āryavaṃśā deśitāḥ
# mngon par zhen pa na mngon par zhen to / / dge slong sred pa skye ba na 'byung ba dang 'jig pa de lta bu'i phyir skye'o zhes rgyas par gsungs te / / de dag gi gnyen por 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi bstan to /
mamāha kāravastvicchātatkālātyantaśāntaye / sa evārthaḥ punaḥ pariśeṣeṇocyate
# bdag gi bdag 'dzin dngos 'dod pa / / de yi dus dang gtan zhi phyir / / don de nyid rnam grangs kyis ston pa ste /
mamakāravastu cīvarādayo 'haṃ kāravastvātmabhāvaḥ / tatrecchā tṛṣṇā
# bdag gir 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni chos gos la sogs pa'o / / bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni lus so / / de dag la 'dod pa ni sred pa'o /
tatra mamakāravastvicchāyāstatkālaśāntaye traya āryavaṃśā bhavanti / ubhayecchātyantaśāntaye caturtha iti
# de la 'phags pa'i rigs gsum ni bdag gir 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'dod pa de'i dus su zhi bar byed pa yin no / / bzhi pa ni gnyi ga 'dod pa gtan du zhi bar byed pa yin no /
uktāmidaṃ yathā bhūtasya bhāvanā saṃpadyate / tasya tvevaṃ pātrobhūtasya katham tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavatāro bhavati
# ji lta bu'i bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba 'di ni bshad zin to / / de ltar snod du gyur pa de ji ltar na bsgom pa de la 'jug pa yin zhe na /
tatrāvatāro 'śubhayā cānāpānasmṛtena ca / smṛtireva smṛtam
# de la 'jug pa mi sdug dang / / dbugs rngub 'byung ba dran pa yis / / dran pa nyid dran pa yin no / / gang dag ni mi sdug pas 'jug /
keṣāṃ punaraśubhayā keṣāmānāpānasmṛtyā
# gang dag ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pas 'jug ce na /
yathākramam
# go rims bzhin du /
adhirāgavitarkāṇām
# 'dod chags rnam rtog lhag rnams so /
adhiko rāgo vitarkaścaiṣāṃ ta ime adhirāgavitarkāḥ / yo hi pratyāsannamatyarthaṃ rāgacaritastasyāśubhayā
# 'di dag la 'dod chags dang rnam par rtog pa lhag pa yod pas / / 'di dag ni 'dod chags dang rnam par rtog pa lhag pa dag ste / / gang zhig 'dod chags nye ba dang shin tu spyad pa de ni mi sdug pas 'jug go /
yo hi vitarkacaritastasyānāpānasmṛtyeti
# gang zhig rnam par rtog pa spyad pa de ni dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pas 'jug go /
avicitrālambanatvādeṣāṃ vitarkopacchedāya saṃvartata ityeke / aśubhā tu yatra saṃsthānaviśeṣālambanatvādvitarkamāvahatīti
# kha cig na re 'di ni sna tshogs la mi dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa gcod par byed pa yin gyi / / mi sdug pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bye brag la dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa 'dren par byed do zhes zer ro /
avahimukhatvādityapare
# gzhan dag na re kha phyir ma bltas pa'i phyir te /
aśubhā hi cakṣurvijñānavadbahirmukhī
# mi sdug pa ni mig gi rnam bar shes pa bzhin du kha phyir bltas pa yin te /
tadviṣayopanidhyānāt / tatra punaścaturvidho rāgaḥ varṇarāgaḥ saṃsthānarāgaḥ sparśarāga upacārarāgaśca
# de'i yul la nye bar rtog pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / / de la 'dod chags ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / kha dog gi 'dod chags dang dbyibs kyi 'dod chags dang reg ba'i 'dod chags dang bsnyen bkur gyi 'dod chags so /
prathamasya pratipakṣeṇa vinolakādyālambanāmaśubhāṃ varjayanti
# dang po'i gnyen por ni rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i mi sdug pa rjod par byed do /
dvitiyasya vikhāditakavikṣiptālambanāṃ tṛtīyasya vipaṭumnā pūyanibaddhāsthyālambanāṃ caturthasya niśceṣṭamṛtkāyālambanām / abhadena tu śasyate
# gnyis pa'i ni rnam par zos pa dang rnam par 'thor ba la dmigs pa'o / / gsum pa'i ni rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang rgyus pas brang breng du sbrel ba'i keng rus la dmigs pa'o / / bzhi pa'i ni shi ba'i ro g yo ba med pa la dmigs pa'o / / bye brag med par ni /
śaṅkalā sarvarāgiṇām / asthisaṃkaklāyāṃ hi sarvametaccaturvidhaṃ rāgastu nāstīti adhimuktiprādeśikamanaskāratvādaśubhayā na kleśaprahāṇam viṣkambhaṇaṃ tu / sa punar ayam aśubhāṃ bhāvayan yogācāras trividha ucyate / ādikārmikaḥ kṛtaparijayo 'tikrāntamanaskāraś ca / tatra / āsamudrāsthivistārasaṃkṣepād ādikarmikaḥ
# keng rus chags bcas thams cad la / / shis te / / rus pa'i keng rus la ni chags pa'i gzhi rnam ba bzhi po 'di dag thams cad med do / / mos pa dang nyi tshe ba yid la byed pa yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pas nyon mongs pa spong ba ni ma yin gyi rnam par gnon pa ni yin no / / mi sdug ba bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa de ni rnam pa gsum du brjod de / / las dang po ba dang yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang yid la byed pa rdzogs pa'o / / de la rus pa rgya mtsho'i bar du ni /
aśubhāṃ bhāvayitukāma ādito yogācāraḥ / svāṅgāvayave cittaṃ nibadhnāti pādāṅguṣṭhe lalāṭe yatra cāsyābhiratiḥ
# spro zhing sdud pa las dang po / / mi sdug pa bsgom par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa ni dang po nyid du rang gi lus kyi yan lag rkang pa'i mthe bo'am / / dpral ba'i dbyes sam / / yang na de gar dga' bar sems gtod par byed cing /
sa tatra māṃsakledapītā dhimokṣakrameṇāsthiviśodhayan sakalāmasthisaṃkalāṃ paśyati / tathaiva ca punardvitīyāmadhimucyate yāvadvihārārāmakṣetrakrameṇa samudraparyantām pṛthivīmasthisaṃkalāṃ pūrṇāmadhimucyate 'dhimokṣābhivardhanārtham / punaśca saṃkṣipanyāvadekāmeva svamasthisaṃkalāmadhimucyate cittasaṃkṣepārtham
# des der sha myags shing zag par mos pas rim gyis rus pa rnam par spyod bar byed ba na thams cad rus pa'i keng rus su lta zhing / / de bzhin du mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir gnyis ba la mos par byed pa nas gtsug lag khang dang kun dga'i rab dang grong dang zhing dang rim gyis rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i bar gyis gzhi rus pa'i keng rus kyis gang bar mos par byed do / / yang sdud pa na sems bsdu ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu kho na la rus pa'i keng rus su mos pa'i bar du sdud de /
iyatā kila kālenāśubhā opariniṣpannā bhavati
# 'di tsam gyis na mi sdug pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no zhes grag ste /
ayam ādikarmiko yogācāraḥ
# 'di ni las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa yin no /
pādāsthna ākapālārthatyāgāt kṛtajayaḥ smṛtaḥ / sa punaḥ cittasaṃkṣepaviśeṣārtha tasyāmasthiśaṅkalāyāṃ pādāsthīni hitvā śeṣaṃ manasi karoti / evaṃ krameṇa yāvat kapālasyārdhaṃ hitvā 'rdhaṃ manasi karoti kṣayakṛtaparijayaḥ
# rkang rus nas ni thod phyed par / / btang bas sbyang ba byas par bshad / / de sems bsdu ba khyad par can du bya ba'i phyir rus pa'i keng rus de las rkang pa'i rus ba rnams bor nas lhag ma yid la byed cing / / de bzhin du thod pa'i byed bor nas thod ba phyed kyi bar yid la byed ba 'di ni yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin no /
atikrāntamanaskāro brūmadhye cittadhāraṇāt
# smin ma'i bar du sems 'dzin pas / / yid la byed pa rdzogs pa yin /
so 'rdhamapi kapālasya muktvā brūvormadhye cittaṃ dhārayati / ayaṃ kilāśubhāyāmatikrāntamanaskāro yogācāraḥ / astyaśubhā ālalmbanaparīttatayā parīttā na vaśitāparīttatayā parītteti catuṣkoṭikam
# de thod pa'i phyed kyang bor nas smin ma gnyis kyi bar du sems 'dzin par byed ba 'di ni mi sdug pa yid la byed pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa yin no zhes grag go / / dmigs pa chung bas chung la dbang chung bas ma yin pas yang mi sdug pa yang yod de zhes bya ba mu bzhi ste /
jitājitamanaskārayorajitajitamanaskārayośca svakāyasamudraparyantālambanāt / atha kiṃsvabhāveyamaśubhā katibhūmikā kimālambanā kva cotpadyate
# yid la byed pa sbyang pa byas pa dang sbyang ba ma byas pa dang yid la byed pa sbyang ba ma byas pa dang sbyang ba byas pa dag rang gi lus dang rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / yang mi sdug pa 'di'i rang bzhin ci zhig yin / / sa ni du zhig yin / / dmigs pa ni ci zhig yin / / gang du skyed bar byed ce na /
yathākramam / alobho daśabhūḥ kāmadṛśyālambā nṛjā 'śubhā / alobhasvabhāvā daśabhūmikā sasāmantakadhyānāntareṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣui kāmadhātau ca kāmāvacara dṛṣyālambanā kiṃ poounrdṛśyavastusaṃsthāne / atha evārthālamvaneti siddham / manuṣyeṣvevotpadyate
# go rims bzhin du / / mi sdug ma chags sa bcu dang dmigs ba 'dod snang mis skyed do / / rang bzhin ni ma chags pa'o / / sa ni bcu pa ste / / bsam gtan bzhi nyer bsdogs dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bcas pa dang 'dod pa'i khams na yod do / / dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i snang ba yin no / / snang ba zhes bya ba ci zhe na / / kha dog dang dbyibs te /
nānyasyāṃ gatau / kuta eva dhātau / tatrāpi nottarakurau / nāmnaiva siddhamaśubhākāreti / yadadhvikā tadadhvālambanā / anutpattidharmiṇī tu vyadhvālambanā / adhimuktimanaskāratvātsāsravā
# de nyid kyi phyir don la dmigs pa zhes bya bar grub bo / / mi rnams kyi nang kho nar skyed kyi 'gro ba gzhan du yang ma yin na khams gzhan du lta smos kyang ci dgos / / der yang byang gi sgra mi snyan du ni ma yin no / / mi nyid kyis mi sdug pa'i rnam ba zhes bya bar grub bo / / dus gang yin pa de'i dus la dmigs so / / mi skye ba'i chos can gyi yul ni dus gsum yin no / / mos pa yid la byed ba yin pa'i phyir zag ba dang bcas pa yin no /
vairāgyalābhikī ca prāyogikī ca / ucitānucitatvāt
# 'dris pa dang ma 'dris pa yin pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bas thob ba dang sbyor ba las byung ba yin no /
uktamaśubhāyāḥ saprabhedaṃ lakṣaṇam
# mi sdug pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba dang bcas te bshad zin to /
ānāpānasmṛtiḥ prajñā pañcabhūrvāyurgīcarā / kāmāśrayā
# dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung dran pa ni / / shes rab sa lnga spyod yul rlung / / 'dod rten /
ānanamāna āśvāso yo vāyuḥ praviśati
# dbugs rngub pa ni dbugs rngub pa ste rlung 'jug pa gang yin pa'o /
apānanamapānaḥ praśvāso yo vāyuḥ niṣkrāmati
# dbugs 'byung ba ni dbugs 'byin pa ste rlung 'byung ba gang yin pa'o /
tayoḥ smṛtirānāpānasmṛtiḥ / saiva prajñāsvabhāvā
# de gnyis dran pa ni dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dran pa ste / / de ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin no /
smṛtivacanaṃ tu smṛtyupasthānavattadvalādhānavṛttitvāt
# dran pa zhes smos pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste / / de'i stobs bskyed pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
pañcasu bhūmisu triṣu sāmantakeṣu dhyānāntare kāmadhātau copekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt / vitarkānuguṇatvāt kila lsukhaduḥkhayostatpratipakṣasya tābhyāmasaṃprayogaḥ
# sa lnga po nyer ba sngogs gsum dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang 'dod pa'i khams na yod do / / btang snyoms dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro / / bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag ni rnam par rtog pa dang mthun pa'i phyir de'i gnyen po ni de dag dang mtshungs par mi ldan no; /
sukhasaumanasyayoścāvadhānaparipanthitvāt tasyāścāvadhāne sādhyatvāditi
# bde ba dang yid bde bdag kyang gtod pa la bar chad byed pa'i phyir la / / de yang gtad pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go /
ye tu mauleṣvapi dhyāneṣu samāpannasyopekṣāmicchanti neṣāmaṣṭabhūmikā
# gang dag bsam gtan dngos gzhi dag na yang snyoms par zhugs pa la btang snyoms kyi dbang po yod par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar nas brgyad pa yin no /
pareṇāśvāsapraśvāsānamabhūmitvāt / vāyvālambanā caiṣā kāmadhātvāśrayā / devamanuṣyeṣu prāyogikī vairāgyalābhiko ca
# yan chad ni dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba'i sa ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / de'i dmigs pa ni rlung yin no / / 'dod pa'i khams kyi rten can yin no / / lha dang mi dag gi nang nas skyed do / / sbyor ba las byung ba dang 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yin no /
tatvamanaskāraścaiṣā / idaṃ dharmāṇāmeva
# 'di ni de kho na yid la byed pa yin no / / chos 'di pa rnams kho na'i yin gyi /
na bāhyānām
# phyi ba'i ma yin no /
upadeśābhāvāt / svayaṃ ca sūkṣmadharmānabhisaṃbodhāt
# lung med pa'i phyir dang bdag nyid kyis chos zab mo mngon par mi rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
sā ceyaṃ / ṣaḍvidhā gaṇanādibhiḥ
# de yang bgrang ba la sogs pa rnam pa drug /
ṣaṭkāraṇayuktā caiṣā paripūrṇā bhavati / gaṇanayā 'nugamena sthāpanayā upalakṣaṇayā vivarttena pariśūddhacyā ca / tatra ca gaṇanā nāma āśvāsapraśvāseṣu cittaṃ dattvā 'nabhisamskāreṇa kāyaṃ cittaṃ cādhyupekṣya smṛtimātreṇa gaṇayatyekaṃ dvau yāvaddaśa
# de ni bgrang ba dang rjes su 'gro ba dang 'jog pa dang nye bar rtogs pa dang bsgyur ba dang yongs su dag pa ste / / rgyu drug dang ldan na yongs su rdzogs pa yin no / / de la bgrang ba zhes bya ba'i dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dag la sems gtad nas mngon par 'du bya ba med par lus dang sems rnal du gzhag ste dran pa tsam gyis gcig dang gnyis nas bcu'i bar du bgrang bar byed pa'o /
cittābhisaṃkṣepa vikṣepabhayānnālpavahutarā / tasyāṃ tu trayo doṣāḥ
# sems mngon par sdud pa dang rnam par g yeng bar dogs pas ha cang mang ba dang nyung ngur ni ma yin no / / de la skyon ni gsum yod de /
ūnagaṇanā yadi dvāvekaṃ gṛhlāti
# gal te gnyis la gcig tu 'dzin nam tshang bar bgrang ba'i skyon no /
adhikagaṇanā yadyekaṃ dvāviti
# gal te gcig la gnyis su 'dzin na lhag par bgrang ba'i skyon no /
saṃkaro yadyāśvāsaṃ praśvāsato gṛhlāti viparyayādvā / ato 'nyathā samyaggaṇanā / antaravikṣepe punarādito gaṇayitavyaṃ tāvadyāvatsamādhi labhate
# gal te dbugs rngub pa la dbugs 'byin par 'dzin tam / / dbugs 'byin pa la dbugs rngub par 'dzin na 'chol bar bgrang ba'i skyon no / / de las gzhan pa ni yang dag pa'i bgrang ba yin no / / bar skabs su sems rnam par g yeng na yang mgo nas ji srid du ting nge 'dzin ma thob kyi bar du bgrang bar bya'o /
anugamo nāma anabhisaṃskāreṇāśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ gatimanugacchati
# rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'di dag thag ni ji srid gcig tu 'byung zhing 'jug /
kiyaddūramete praviśanti vā niṣkrāmanti vā kimete sarvaśarīravyāopina ekadeśacāriṇa iti
# ci 'di dag lus thams cad la khyab pa dag cig gam / / phyogs 'ga' zhig na rgyu ba dag yin zhes mngon par 'du bya ba med par dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba'i 'gros kyis rjes su 'gro ba ste /
tān praviśataḥ kaṇṭhahṛdayanābhikaṭyurujaṅghāpraveśakram yāvat pādāvanugacchati
# de 'jug pa na lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte ba dang rked pa dang brla dang byin par 'jug pa'i rim gyis rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du rjes su 'gro la /
niṣkrāmato vitastivyāmāntaraṃ yāvadvāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairambhāśca vāyava ityapare
# 'byung ba na mtho gang dang 'dom gang gi bar du 'byung ngo / / gzhan dag na re rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'thor byed kyi rlung gi bar du'o zhes zer te /
tadetattatvamanasikāratvānna yuktam
# 'di ni kho na yid la byed pa yin pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin no /
sthāpanā nāma nāsikāgre yāvat pādanṅguṣṭhe sthitāṃ paśyati / maṇisūtravat / kimanugrāhakā ete upadhātakāḥ śītā uṣṇā iti
# 'jog pa zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i thag pa bzhin du sna'i rtse mo nas rkang pa'i mthe bong gi bar du gnas par lta zhing / / ci 'di dag phan 'dogs par byed pa zhig gam / / gnod par byed pa zhig gam / / grang ngam / / dro ba dag cig ces rtog pa'o /
upalakṣaṇā nāma naite kevalā vāyava eva / catvāryetāni mahābhūtāni mahābhūtābhinirvṛttamupādāyarūpaṃ tadāśritāścittacaittā iti pañcaskandhānupalakṣayati
# nye bar rtog pa ni 'di dag ni rlung 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang 'byung ba dag las mngon par grub pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang de dag la brten pa sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyang yod do zhes phung po lnga la nye bar rtog par byed pa'o /
vivarto nāma vāyvālambanāṃ vṛddhiṃ vivarttyottareṣu kuśalamūleṣu saṃniyojanaṃ yāvadagradharmeṣu / pariśuddhirdarśanamārgādiṣvavatāraḥ / smṛtyupasthānādivajropamasamādhyantā vivarta ityapare
# bsgyur ba zhes bya ba ni rlung la dmigs pa'i blo bsgyur te chos kyi mchog gi bar du gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la yang dag par sbyor ba'o / / yongs su dag pa ni mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa la 'jug pa'o / / gzhan dag na re bsgyur ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar yin la /
kṣayajñānādiśuddhiriti / gaṇanānugamaḥ sthānaṃ lakṣaṇārthavivarttnā
# rnam par dag pa ni zad pa shes pa la sogs pa yin no zhes zer ro / / dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung dran pa ni / / bgrang dang rjes 'gro 'jog pa dang /
