pariśuddhiśca ṣoḍheyamānāpānasmṛtirmatā iti saṃgrahaślokāḥ
# rtog pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang / / yang dag rnam ba drug tu 'dod /
tatra punarveditavyau / ānāpātau yataḥ kāyaḥ
# ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa yin no / / de la / / dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung gang las lus /
yadbhūmiko hi kāyaḥ tadbhūmikāvetai / kāyaikadeśatvāt / kāyacittaviśeṣasaṃniśritā āśvāsapraśvāsā vartante / ārupyakalalādigatānāmabhāvāt acittacaturthadhyānasamāpannānāṃ ca / yadi hi kāyaḥ śuṣiro bhavati āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmikaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtamevaṃ te varttante / jāyamānasya caturthadhyānādvyuttiṣṭhamānasya ca praviśanti bhiyamāṇasya caturthaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya niṣkrāmanti
# 'di gnyis ni lus kyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir lus sa pa gang yin pa de'i sa pa dag yin par rig bar bya'o / / dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba ni gzugs med pa dang nur nur po la sogs par gyur pa rnams dang sems med pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams la med pa'i phyir lus dang sems khyad par can la brten nas 'jug pa yin te / / gal te lus kyang sbubs yod pa yin la dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung pa'i sa pa'i sems kyang mngon sum du gyur na de lta na 'jug go / / skye ba dang bsam gtan bzhi pa las ldang ba la ni 'jug la / / 'chi ba dang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa la ni 'byung ngo /
etau cānāpānau / sattvākhyau / nāsattvasaṃkhyātau / anupāttakau / indriyavinirbhāgitvāt
# dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba 'di gnyis ni / / sems can zhes bya / / sems can du mi bgrang ba dag ni ma yin no / / ma zin pa'o / / dbang po dang tha dad pa'i phyir ro /
naiḥṣyandikau
# rgyu mthun las byung /
naupacayikavipākajau / kāyopacayanānupacayāt chhinnānāṃ punaḥ pratisaṃdhānācca
# lus rgyas pas 'grib par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang chad nas yang nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i phyir rgyas pa las byung ba dang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma yin te /
nahyetadvipākarūpasyāsti
# rnam par smin pa'i gzugs la ni de lta bu med do /
nādhareṇa lakṣayete manasā ca tau / svabhūmyuparibhūmikena ca tayościttenopalakṣaṇam
# 'og ma yi / / yid kyis de gnyis mi rtogs so / / de gnyis ni rang gi sa pa dang sa gong ma pa'i sems kyis rtogs kyi /
nāvareṇeryāpathika nairmāṇikena
# 'og ma pa spyod lam pa dang sbrul pa'i sems kyis mi rtogs so /
ukte dve avatāramukhe
# 'jug pa'i sgo gnyis bshad zin to /
tābhyāṃ tu samādhilabdhā
# de gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas /
niṣpannaśamathaḥ kuryāt smṛtyupasthānabhāvanām
# lhag mthong bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir / / zhi gnas grub par gyur pa yis /
vipaśyanāyāḥ saṃpādanārtham / kathaṃ ca punaḥ kuryāt
# dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom par bya / / ji ltar bya zhe na /
kāyaviccittadharmāṇāṃ dvilakṣaṇaparīkṣaṇāt
# lus tshor sems dang chos rnams la / / mtshan nyid gnyis su yongs brtags pas /
kāyaṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhyāṃ parīkṣate / vedanāṃ cittaṃ dharmāśca / svabhāva evaiṣāṃ svalakṣaṇam / sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu anityatā saṃskṛtānāṃ duḥkhatā sāsravāṇāṃ śunyatā 'nātmate sarvadharmāṇām
# lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos rnams la rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dag tu yongs su brtags pa ste / / de dag gi rang gi mtshan nyid ni rang gi ngo bo'o / / spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dus byas rnams ni mi rtag pa nyid dang zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sdug bsngal ba nyid dang chos thams cad stong pa dang bdag med pa nyid dag go /
kāyasya punaḥ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ / dharmāstribhyo 'nye / sāmāhitasya kila kāyaṃ paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇikataśca paśyataḥ kāyasmṛtyupasthāṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati
# lus kyi rang gi ngo bo ci zhe na / / 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid do / / gsum las gzhan pa dag ni chos so / / mnyam par gzhag pas lus la rdul phra rab dang skad cig mar mthong bas lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa grub pa yin no / / zhes grag go /
atha smṛtyupasthānānāṃ kaḥ svabhāvaḥ
# yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
vividhasmṛtyupasthānaṃ svabhāvasaṃsrgālambanasmṛtyupasthānam / tatra svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānam
# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni rnam pa gsum ste / / rang bzhin dang 'brel pa dang dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o / / de la rang bzhin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
prajñā / kīdṛśī prajñā / śrutādimayī
# shes rab bo / / shes rab ji lta bu zhig ce na / / thos sogs las byung ba'o /
śrutamayī cintāmayī bhāvanāmayī ca / trividhāni smṛtyupasthānāni śrutacintābhāvanāmayāni
# thos pa las byung ba dang bsam pa las byung ba dang bsgom pa las byung ba'o / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag kyang rnam pa gsum ste / / thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa las byung ba dag go /
anye saṃsargālambanāḥ / anye tatsahabhuvo dharmāḥ saṃsargasmṛtyupasthānam
# gzhan ni 'brel dang dmigs pa las / / gzhan de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams ni 'brel ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no /
tadālambanā ālambanasmṛtyupasthānam / svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānaṃ prajñeti / kuta eva tat
# de dag gi dmigs pa ni dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o / / rang bzhin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes rab yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
kāme kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānamiti vacanāt
# lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
kā punaranupaśyanā
# rjes su lta ba zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
prajñā / tayā hi tadvānanupaśyaḥ kriyate / yataścokta madhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī viharatīti
# shes rab ste / / des de dang ldan pa rjes su lta bar byed do / / 'di ltar nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so zhes kyang gsungs te /
anupaśyamasyāsti darśanamityanupaśyī
# 'di la rjes su lta ba ste lta ba yod pas na rjes su lta ba'o /
kāye 'nupaśyī kāyānupaśyī / kasmāt prajñā smṛtyupasthānamityuktā bhagavatā
# lus la rjes su lta ba ni lus kyi rjes su lta ba'o / / ci'i phyir shes rab la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bshad ce na /
smṛtyudrekatvāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re dran pa shas che ba'i phyir te /
smṛtivalādhānavṛttitvāditi yo 'rthaḥ / dārūpāṭana kīlasaṃdhāraṇavat / evaṃ tu yujyate
# shing gshegs pa'i khye'u dag gis 'dzin pa ltar dran pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes zer ro / / 'di ltar ni rung ste /
smṛtiranayopatiṣṭhata iti smṛtyupasthānaṃ prajñā yathādṛṣṭasyābhilapanāt
# 'dis dran pa nye bar 'jog pas na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni shes rab yin te / / ji ltar mthong ba mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro /
tadyathā hyuktamāyuṣmatā aniruddhena tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharataḥ kāyālalmbanānusmṛtistiṣṭhati saṃtiṣṭhata iti vistaraḥ / bhagāvatā 'pi coktaṃ tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharata upasthitā smṛtirbhavatyasaṃmūḍheti / yatra tūktaṃ kathaṃ bhikṣavaścaturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaśca bhavatyastaṅgamaśca / āharasamudayātkāyasya samudayo bhavatyāhāranirodhātkāyasyāstaṅgamaityatrālambanameva smṛtyupasthānamuktam / smṛtiratropatiṣṭhata iti kṛtvā / yathālambanaṃ caiṣāṃ nāma svaparobhayasaṃtatyālambanatvāt pratyekameṣāṃ traividhyam
# 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas kyang / / lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de'i lus la dmigs pa'i dran pa gnas pa yang dag par gnas zhes rgyas par bshad do / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de'i dran pa nye bar gnas shing kun tu mi rmongs pa yin zhes gsungs so / / gang las dge slong dag ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kun 'byung ba dang nub pa yin zhe na / / zas kun 'byung bas ni lus kun 'byung pa yin la / / zas 'gags pas ni lus nub pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de las ni dmigs pa khon dran pa nye bar gzhag par gsungs pa yin te / / 'di la dran pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro / / 'di dag gi ming ni dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin no / / 'di dag rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i rgyud la dmigs pa'i phyir re re zhing rnam pa gsum gsum yin no /
kramaḥ / yathotpatti / kasmātpunarevamutpattiḥ / audārikasya pūrvaṃ darśanāt / yato vā kāmarāgasya kāyo 'dhaṣṭhānaṃ sa ca vedanā 'bhilāṣātsa ca cittasyādāntatvāt tatkleśāprahāṇāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ
# rim ni ji ltar skye ba bzhin ci'i phyir de ltar skye zhe na / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / / sngar rags pa mthong ba'i phyir ro / / yang na 'di ltar 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa'i rten ni lus yin la / / de yang tshor ba mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro / / de yang sems ma zhi ba'i phyir ro /
catuṣkaṃ tu viparyāsavipakṣataḥ / śucisukhanityātmaviparyāsanāṃ caturṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāri smṛtyupasthā nānyuktāni yathākramaṃ nādhikanyūnāni evaṃ ca trīṇyasaṃbhinnālambanāni caturthamubhayathā / yadidharmāneva paśyatyasaṃbhinnālambanam / atha kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyati saṃbhinnālambanam
# de yang nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro; / / phyin ci log gi gnyen por bzhi / / gtsang ba dang bde ba dang rtag pa dang bdag tu phyin ci log rnam pa bzhi'i gnyen por dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi go rims bzhin du bstan te mi mang mi nyung ngo / / de dag las gsum ni ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no / / bzhi pa ni gnyi ga yin te / / gal te chos kho na la lta na ma 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no / / 'on te lus la sogs pa gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi po spyi la lta na 'dres pa la dmigs pa yin no /
evaṃ kāyādyālambanāni smṛtyupasthānānyabhyasya / sa dharmasmṛtyupasthāne samastālambane sthitaḥ
# de ltar lus la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams goms par byas nas; de ni chos dran nye gzhag pa / / spyi la dmigs pa la gnas te /
ānatyaduḥkhataḥ śūnyānātmatastānvipaśyati
# de dag la ni mi rtag dang / / sdug bsngal stong bdag med par lta /
saṃbhinnalambane dharmasmṛtyupasthāne sthitastān kāyādīn sarvānabhisamasya caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyati
# chos dran pa nye bar gzhag par 'dres pa la dmigs pa la gnas te / / lus la sogs pa de dag thams cad spyir bsdus te /
anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataśca
# mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o /
tat ūṣmagatotpattiḥ / tasmāddharmasmṛtyupasthānādevamabhyastāt krameṇeṣmagataṃ nāma kuśāmūlamutpadyate
# de las dro bar gyur pa 'byung / / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la de ltar goms pa las rim gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba do bar gyur ba zhes bya ba skye'o /
ūṣmagatamivoṣmagatam / kleśendhanadahanasyāryamārgāgneḥ pūrvarūpatvāt / taccatuḥsatyagocaram / tadūṣmagataṃ prākarṣikatvāccatuḥsatyālambanam
# dro bar gyur pa dang 'dra bas na dro bar gyur pa ste / / nyon mongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi me'i snga ltas yin pa'i phyir ro / / de ni bden bzhi spyod yul can / / dro bar gyur pa de ni rgyun chags pa yin pa'i phyir bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa yin no /
ṣoḍaśākāram / duḥkhaṃ caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyatyanityato duḥkhatḥ śūnyato 'nātmataśca
# rnam pa bcu drug / / sdug bsngal la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o /
samudayaṃ caturbhirhetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataśca
# kun 'byung la rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o /
nirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataśca
# 'gog pa la 'gog pa dang zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba dang rnam pa bzhir lta'o /
mārgaṃ caturbhirmārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataśca
# lam la lam dang rigs pa dang sgrub pa dang nges par 'byin pa dang rnam pa bzhir lta ste 'di dag gi bye brag ni /
eṣāṃ tu viśeṣaṇam paścādvakṣayāmaḥ / ūṣmabhyo mūrdhānaḥ / te 'pi tādṛśāḥ / yādṛśā ūṣmāṇaścatuḥsatyālambanāḥ ṣoḍaśākārāśca
# 'og nas bshad par bya'o / / dro ba las / / rtse mo / / dro ba chung ngu dang 'phring dang chen po'i rim gyis mngon par 'phel ba las rtse mo dag kyang skye ste / / de yang de dang 'dra / / ji ltar dro bar gyur pa rnams bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa dang rnam pa bcu drug yin pa bzhin te /
utkṛṣṭataratvāttu nāmāntaraṃ cala kuśalamūlamūrdhatvāt mūrdhānaḥ
# ches mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir na ming gzhan du btags so / / dge ba'i rtsa ba g yo ba'i rtse mo yin pa'i phyir rtse mo rnams te /
ebhyo hi pāto 'tikramo vā
# de dag las ltung ba'am 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
ubhayākaraṇaṃ dharmeṇa
# gnyi ga chos kyi rnam pa gtod /
eṣāṃ punarubhayeṣamūṣmagatamūrdhnāṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānenākaraṇam
# dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mo gnyis ka chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pas rnam pa gtod par byed do /
kimidamākaraṇam / satyeṣvakārāṇāṃ prathamatovinyasanam
# rnam pa gtod ces bya ba 'di ci zhe na / / dang po nyid du bden pa rnams la rnam pa dag 'god pa'o /
anyairapi tu vardhanam / caturbhirapi smṛtyupasthānaireṣāṃ vardhanam
# gzhan dag gis kyang 'phel bar byed / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char gyis kyang de dag 'phel bar byed do /
vivardhayataḥ pūrvapratilabdhānāmaṃsaṃmukhībhābo 'vahumānatvāt / mṛdumadhyādhimātrakramābhivṛddhebhyaḥ punarutpadyate / tebhyaḥ kṣāntiḥ
# rnam par 'phel bar byed pa na sngon thob pa rnams mngon sum du mi byed de / / dga' ba chen po med pa'i phyir ro / / de las bzod pa yang skye ste / / de chung ngu dang 'breng dang chen po'i rim gyis mngon par 'phel ba dag las yang / / bzod pa skye ste /
adhimātrasya kṣamaṇādaparihāṇitaḥ
# yongs su mi nyams pa'i sgo nas bden pa la cher bzod pa'i phyir ro /
sā 'pi triprakārā mṛdvī madhyā 'dhimātrā ca
# de yang rnam pa gsum ste / / chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o /
dvidhā tadvat / yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ evaṃ mṛdumadhye kṣāntī tathaivākaraṇāt / vivardhane tvayaṃ viśeṣaḥ
# de la rnam pa gnyis de bzhin / / rtse mo rnams ji skad bshad pa ltar bzod pa chung du dang 'bring dag kyang de dang 'dra ste / / de kho na bzhin du rnam pa gtong ba'i phyir ro / / rnam par 'phel ba la ni khyad par 'di yod de /
sarvasyāḥ
# bzod pa ni /
kṣāntyā dharmeṇa vardhanam / smṛtyupasthānenaiva nānyena / kāmāptaduḥkhaviṣayā tvadhimātrā / kṣāntiriti varttate / apradharmasaṃśleṣādasau kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanaiva / ata evoṣmagatādīnāṃ traidhātukaduḥkhadyālambanatvasiddhirniyamāvacanāt / yadā kila rūpārupyapratipakṣādyekaikasatyālambanāpahlāsena yāvat kāvāvacarameva dukhaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasi karotyeṣā sarvaiva madhyā kṣāntiryadaikameva kṣaṇaṃ tadadhimātreti
# thams cad chos kyis 'phel bar byed chos dran pa nye bar gzhag ba kho nas 'phel bar byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no / / chen po 'dod gtogs sdug bsngal yul / / bzod pa zhes bya bar sbyar te / / de ni chos kyi mchog dang nye ba'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la dmigs pa kho na'o / / de nyid kyi phyir dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa'i nges pa ma smos pa'i phyir khams gsum pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa la dmigs pa nyid du grub po / / gang gi tshe gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i gnyen po la sogs pa bden pa'i rnam pa dmigs pa re re nas phri nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal kho na la skad cig ma gnyis su yid la byed pa'i bar de thams cad ni bzod pa 'bring yin la / / gang gi tshe skad cig ma gcig khon yin pa de'i tshe na chen po yin no zhes grag go /
kṣaṇaṃ ca sā
# de ni skad cig gcig /
kṣaṇikā cāsau na prākarṣikī
# de ni skad cig ma gcig yin gyi rgyun chags pa ni ma yin no /
tathāgradharmāḥ / yathaivādhimātrā kṣāntiḥ / te 'pi hi kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanāḥ kṣaṇikāśca laukikāścaite 'grāśca dharmāḥ
# de bzhin du chos mchog / / de dag kyang bzod pa chen po ji lta ba bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dmigs pa dang skad cig ma gcig pa dag yin no / / de dag ni 'jig rten pa yang yin la chos kyi mchog kyang yin zhing /
sarvalaukikaśreṣṭhatvāditi laukikāgradharmāḥ
# 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams te /
vinā sabhāgahetunā mārgasya tatpuruṣakāreṇākarṣaṇāt
# skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu med par de'i rtsal gyis lam 'dren par byed pa'i phyir ro /
ta eta ūṣmagatādayaḥ smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvatvāt prajñātmakā ucyante / sarve tu pañcaskandhāḥ
# dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'o / / thams cad phung po lnga /
saparivāragrahaṇāt
# 'khor dang bcas te smos pa'i phyir ro /
vināptibhiḥ
# thob pa ma gtogs /
prāptayo noṣmagatādibhiḥ saṃgṛhyante
# thob ba rnams ni dro bar gyur ba la sogs pas ma bsdus te /
mā bhūdāryasya tatsaṃmukhībhāvādūṣmagatādīnāṃ saṃmukhībhāva iti / tatra trisatyālambanoṣmagatākaraṇe dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannamanāgatāni catvāri bhāvyante / nirodhasatyālambane tadevobhayathā
# 'phags pa la de mngon sum du gyur pas dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur du 'ongs pas so / / de la bden pa gsum la dmigs pa'i dro bar gyur pa rnam pa gtod pa la ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa da ltar byung ba yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char 'thob bo / / 'gog pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa la ni de kho na gnyi ga yin no /
sarvatrākārāḥ sabhāgāḥ
# rnam pa dag ni thams cad du 'dra ba yin no /
vivardhane caturṇāmanyatamadanāgatāni catvāri
# rnam par 'phel ba la ni bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro /
tatraiva nirodhālambane 'ntyamanāgatānicatvāri ākārāḥ sarve
# 'gog pa la dmigs pa de kho na la ni tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro / / rnam pa ni thams cad do /
labdhatvādgotrāṇām / mūrdhākaraṇe catuḥsatyālambane 'pi nirodhālambanavardhane cāntyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve / trisatyālambanavardhane caturṇāmanyatamadanāgatānicatvāri ākārāḥ sarve / kṣāntīnāṃ sarvatra cāntyam
# rigs rnams tho ba zin pa'i phyir ro / / rtse mo bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa rnam pa gtod pa dang 'gog pa la dmigs pa 'phel ba la ni tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro / / rnam pa ni thams cad do / / bden pa gsum la dmigs pa rnam par 'phel ba la ni bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro / / rnam pa ni thams cad do /
anāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve / agradharmeṣvantyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāścatvāra eva
# bzod pa rnams la ni thams cad du tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro / / rnam pa ni thams cad do / / chos kyi mchog dag la ni tha ma yin la ma 'ongs pa ni bzhi char ro /
anyābhāvāddarśanamārgasādṛśyācca / iti nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ caturdhā
# rnam pa ni bzhi kho na ste / / gzhan med pa'i phyir dang mthong ba'i lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro /
ityetāni catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni yadutoṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo 'gradharmāśca
# de lta na nges 'byed cha mthun rnam pa bzhi bzhi po 'di dag ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yin te / / 'di lta ste /
eṣāṃ dve mṛdūnī calatvāt parihāṇitaḥ kṣāntayo madhyamagradharmā adhimātram / nirvedhabhāgīyānīti ko 'rthaḥ / vidha vibhāge / niścito vedhā nirvedhaḥ āryamārgastena vicikitsā prahāṇāt satyānāṃ ca vibhajanādidaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ yāvat mārga iti
# dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mo rnams dang bzod pa rnams dang chos kyi mchog rnams so / / de dag las gnyis ni yongs su nyams pa'i sgo nas g yo ba'i phyir chung ngu dag yin no / / bzod pa rnams ni 'bring yin no / / chos kyi mchog rnams ni chen po yin no / / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na / / nges par 'byed pas na nges par 'byed pa ste / / 'phags pa'i lam mo / / des the tshom spong ba'i phyir dang bden pa rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba nas 'di ni lam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par 'byed pa'i phyir ro /
tasya bhāgo darśanamārgaikadeśaḥ
# de'i cha ni mthong ba'i lam gyi phyogs gcig yin te /
tasyāvāhakatvena hitatvānnirvedhabhāgīyāni / taccaitaccaturvidhamapoi nirvedhabhāgīyam / bhāvanāmayam
# de 'dren par byed pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams so / / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni rnam pa 'di bzhi char yang / / bsgoms byung /
na śrutacintāmayam / anāgamyāntaradhyānabhūmikam / anāgamyaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ catvāri ca dhyānānyasya bhūmistatsaṃgṛhītatvāt / nordhva darśanamārgaparivāratvāt
# thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba ni ma yin no / / mi lcogs med pa dang khyad par bsam gtan sa pa'o / / 'di'i sa pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi yin te / / de dag gis bsdus pa'i phyir ro / / mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir gong na med do /
tadabhāvaḥ kāmadhātvālambanatvāt / tasya ca pūrvaparijñeyapraheyatvāt
# de med pa ni 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / de yang sngar yongs su shes par bya zhing spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
teṣāṃ rūpadhātau pañcaskandhako vipākaḥ
# de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni gzugs kyi khams kyi phung po lnga yin no; /
pūripūrakāṇyevanākṣepakāṇi / bhavadveṣitvāt / dve tvadho 'pi vā / vāśabdo matavikalpārthaḥ / bhadantaghoṣakasya tu dve prathame nirvedhabhāgīye saptabhūmike kāmāvacare api taḥ
# yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dag kho na yin gyi 'phen par byed pa dag ni ma yin te / / srid pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro / / gnyis ni 'og na'ang yod pa'am / / 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni lugs tha dad pa'i don te / / btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs kyi ltar na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang po gnyis sa bdun pa yin te /
sarvāṇyapi tvetāni catvāri / kāmāśrayāṇi
# 'dod pa'i khams na yang yod do / / bzhi po de dag thams cad kyang /
trīṇi manuṣyeṣvevotpadyante / triṣu dvīpeṣu
# 'dod rten gsum ni mi dag gi nang kho na dang gling gsum du skyed par byed do /
utpāditapūrvāṇāṃ tu deveṣu saṃmukhībhāvaḥ
# sngon bskyed pa rnams ni lha dag gi nang du mngon sum du byed do /
caturthaṃ deveṣvapi / trīṇi strīpuruṣā ubhayāśrayāṇi labhante
# bzhi pa ni lha dag gi nang du yang skyed bar byed do / / gsum ni skyes pa dang bud med kyi gnyi ga'i rten can dag 'thob bo /
agradharmān dvacyāśrayān labhate 'ṅganā / agradharmāstu stryeva dvacyāśrayān labhate
# chos mchog bud med kyis gnyi ga'i rten can 'thob par 'gyur / / chos kyi mchog ni bud med kho nas gnyi ga'i rten can 'thob bo /
puruṣaḥ puruṣāśrayāneva / strītva syāpratisaṃkhyānirodhalābhāt
# skyes pa ni skyes pa'i rten can 'ba' zhig 'thob ste / / bud med nyid ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa thob pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyānāṃ tyāgaḥ
# nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams ji ltar stong zhe na /
bhūmityāgāttyajatyāryastāni / yadbhūmikānyanena pratilabdhānibhavanti tāṃ bhūmi tyajannāryastānyapi tyajati nānyathā bhūmityāgaḥ punarbhūmisaṃcārāt
# 'phags pas de dag sa bor nas / / stong ngo / / 'phags pa ni sa gang dag thob par gyur pa'i sa de dag 'dor ba na de dag kyang gtong gi gzhan du ni ma yin no / / sa 'dor ba ni sa 'phos pa'i phyir ro /
anāryastu mṛtyunā / pṛthagjanastu nikāyasabhāgatyāgenaiva tyajatisatyasati vā bhūmisaṃcāre
# 'phags min 'chi bas so / / so so'i skye bo ni sa 'pho yang rung mi 'pho yang rung ste ris mthun pa btang ba kho nas gtong ngo /
ādye dveparihāṇyā ca / tyajati mṛtyunā ca pṛthagjana eva
# dang po gnyis yongs nyams pas kyang / / gtong la 'chi bas kyang gtong ste /
āryasya tu nāsti tābhyāṃ parihāṇiḥ / kṣāntyagradharmābhyāṃ tu pṛthagjanasyāpi nāsti parihāṇiḥ / maulestatraiva satyadṛk
# so so'i skye bo kho na yin gyi 'phags pa ni de gnyis las yongs su nyams pa med do / / bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog dag las ni so so'i skye bo yang yongs su nyams pa med do / / dngos gzhis de nyid la bden mthong /
yo mauladhyānabhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayati satatraiva janmāti satyānyavaśyaṃ paśyati
# gang zhig bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i sa ba'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed pa des ni tshe 'di nyid la gdon mi za bar bden pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur te /
tīvrasaṃvegatvāt / apūrvāptirvihīneṣu
# yid 'byung ba shas che ba'i phyir ro / / rnam par nyams na dngos med 'thob /
yadā vihineṣu punarlābhobhavatyapūrvāṇyeva tadā labhyante na pūrvaṃ tyaktāni / pratimokṣasaṃvaravadanucitayatnasādhyatvāt
# gang gi tshe rnam par nyams pa dag gis yang thob pa de'i tshe so sor thar pa'i sdom pa bzhin du sngon med pa dag kho na 'thob kyi sngon btang ba dag ni ma yin te ma 'dris pa dang 'bad de bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
sati pratisīmādaiśike pareṇotpādayatyasati mūlādeva
# mtshams ston par byed pa zhig yod na ni gong ma skyed par byed do / / med na ni gzhi kho nas skyed par byed do /
ete punarvihīniparihāṇī kiṃsvabhāve
# rnam par nyams pa dang yongs su nyams pa 'di dag gi rang bzhin ci zhe na /
hānī dve asamanvitiḥ
# nyams pa gnyis ni mi ldan pa /
ubhe apyete asamanvāgamasvabhāve
# nyams pa gnyi g yang mi ldan pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
parihāṇistu doṣakṛtā nāvaśyaṃ vihāniḥ / guṇaviśeṣakṛtā ca sā
# yongs su nyams pa ni nyes pas byas pa yin gyi rnam par nyams pa ni gdon mi za ba yin no /
parihīṇo 'pyūṣmagatalābhī niyataṃ parinirvāṇadharmā bhavati
# dro bar gyur pa thob pa ni yongs su nyams kyang nges par mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yin no /
mokṣabhāgīyātko viśeṣaḥ / satyadarśanāsannataratvamasatyantarāye
# thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang khyad par ci yang ce na / / bar chad byed pa med na bden ba mthong ba la ches nye ba nyid yin no /
mūrdhalābhī na mūlacchit
# rtse mo thob pa rtsa mi 'chad /
parihīṇo 'pi mūrdhalābhī kuśalamūlāni na samucchinatti / apāyāṃstu pāpādānantaryāṇyapi kuryāt
# rtse mo thob pa ni yongs su nyams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun tu mi 'chad kyi ngan song du yang 'gro la mtshams med pa dag kyang byed do /
kṣāntilābhyanapāyagaḥ / vihīnāyāmapi kṣāntau na punarapāyānyāti tadbhūmikakarmakleśadūrīkaraṇāt / kṣāntilābhādeva hi gatiyonyupapattyāśrayāṣṭamādibhavakleśānāṃ keṣāñcidanutpattidharmatā pratilabhate
# bzod thob ngan song mi 'gro'o / / bzod pa las ni rnam par nyams kyang ngan song du mi 'gro ste / / der 'gro ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro / / bzod pa thob pa kho nas 'gro ba dang skye gnas dang skye ba dang lus dang srid pa dang nyon mongs pa rnams las kha cig gis mi skye ba'i chos nyid thob ste /
apāyagatīnāmaṇḍajasaṃsvedajayonyorasaṃjñisattvottarakurumahābrahmopapattināṃ śaṇḍhapaṇḍakobhayavyañjanāśrayāṇāmaṣṭamādibhavānāṃ darśanaheyakleśānāṃ ca / tāṃ tu yathāyogaṃ mṛdvadhimātrāyāṃ ca
# ngan song gi 'gro ba rnams dang sgo nga las skyes pa dang drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas dag dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dag dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dang tshangs pa chen por skye ba rnams dang zam dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa'i lus rnams dang brgyad pa la sogs pa'i srid pa rnams dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos nyid 'thob bo / / de dag ni ci rigs par te /
mṛdvacyāmapāyagatīnām / adhimātrāyāmitareṣām
# chung ngus ni ngan song gi 'gro ba rnams kyi mi skye ba 'thob la / / chen pos ni gzhan dag gi'o /
nirvedhabhāgīyāni trigotrāṇi śrāvakādigotrabhedāt / tatra
# nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs tha dad pa'i phyir nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams rigs gsum yin te; de la /
śiṣyagotrā nnivartya dve buddhaḥ syāt / ūṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaṃ ca śrāvakagotrādutpannaṃ vyāvartya punarbuddhaḥ syādityasti saṃbhavaḥ / kṣāntau tu labdhāyāṃ nāstyeva saṃbhavaḥ
# gnyis slob rigs las bzlog nas ni / / sangs rgyas su 'gyur / / dro bar gyur pa dang rtse mor skyes pa nyan thos kyi rigs las bzlog nas yang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba ni srid kyi bzod pa thob pa la ni de lta bu mi srid do /
kiṃ kāraṇam / apāyānāṃ kila vyāvṛttatvāt
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir te /
bodhisattvāśca parahitkriyāpāratantryādapāyānapyavagāhanta iti
# byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang gis ngan song du yang 'gro'o zhes grag go /
tasyaiva tu gotrasyāvivartyatvādasaṃbhavaḥ / trīṇyapītaraḥ
# rigs de nyid bzlog tu mi rung ba'i phyir mi srid do / / gzhan gsum yang /
vivartya syāditi vartate / trīṇyapi nirvedhabhāgīyāni śrāvakagotrādvacyāvartya buddhādibhavaḥ syāt pratyekabuddha ityarthaḥ
# bzlog nas 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar te / / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa gsum yang nyan thos kyi rigs las ldog nas sangs rgyas las gzhan par 'gyur te rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
pratyekabuddhagotrāṇi tu vyāvartayitumaśakyāni
# rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnams ni bzlog par mi nus te / / 'di ltar /
ābodheḥ sarvamekatra dhyānāntye śāstṛkhaḍgayoḥ
# ston dang bse ru byang chub par / / bsam gtan mtha' rten gcig la kun /
śāstā budhaḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ / tayorekatraivāsane caturthameva dhyānaṃ niśrityaniñjyapaṭusamādhitvānnirvedhabhāgīyānyārabhya yāvadbodhirutpadyate / kṣayānutpādajñāne hi bodhiriti paścādupapādayiṣyāmaḥ / aśubhāmārabhya yāvadvodhirityapare
# ston pa ni sangs rgyas so / / bse ru lta bu ni rang sangs rgyas te / / de gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin mi g yo ba dang gsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi ba kho na la kha rten te stan gcig kho na la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams nas bzung ste / / byang chub kyi bar du skyed par byed do / / byang chub ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i ye shes yin no zhes 'og nas bshad par bya'o; / / gzhan dag na re mi sdug pa nas bzung ste / / byang chub kyi bar du'o zhes zer ro /
yeṣāṃ tu khaḍgādanyo 'pi pratyekabuddho 'stitadgotrāṇāṃ vyāvartanāpratiṣeṣaḥ / kiṃ punaḥ prathama eva janmani kṛtaprayogo nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayet
# gang dag bse ru lta bu las gzhan pa'i rang sangs rgyas yod par 'dod pa de'i rigs rnams ni bzlog par dgag pa med do / / ci tshe dang po kho na la sbyor ba byas te nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed dam zhe na /
naitadasti avaśyaṃ hi / prāktebhyo mokṣabhāgīyaṃ
# de lta bu ni med kyi nges par de'i sngon du thar pa'i cha mthun bskyed par bya dgos so /
utpādayitavyam / sarvasvalpaṃ hi / kṣipraṃ mokṣastribhirbhavaiḥ / ekasmin janmani mokṣabhāgīyaṃ kuśalamūlamutpādayet
# thams cad pas shin tu / / myur ba'i srid pa gsum gyis thar / / sa bon 'debs pa dang 'bru skye ba dang 'bras bu chags pa bzhin du tshe gcig la ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed do /
dvitīye nirvedhabhāgīyāni / tṛtīye āryamārgam
# gnyis pa la ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams skyed par byed do /
bījaviropaṇa sasyābhivṛddhiphalotpattikramavat / krameṇa hi saṃtānasyāsyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatāraparipākavimuktayo bhavantīti
# gsum pa la ni 'phags pa'i lam skyed par byed de / / chos nyid 'di la ni rgyud rim gyis 'jug pa dang yongs su smin pa dang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro /
tacca punarmokṣabhāgīyaṃ varṇayanti / śrutacintāmayaṃ
# thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa de yang thos bsam las byung ba yin par brjod de /
na bhāvanāmayam / kati karmāṇi / trīṇi karmāṇi
# bsgom pa las byung ba ni ma yin no / / las du dag cig ce na / / las gsum mo /
prādhānyena tu manaskarmma
# gtso bor ni yid kyi las yin no /
tatpraṇidhanaparigrahāttu kāyavākkarmāpi mokṣabhāgoyaṃ bhavati
# de'i smon lam gyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir lus dang ngag gi las kyang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa yin te /
kaścidekabhikṣāmapi dattvaika śikṣāmapi cādāya mokṣābhilāṣavalādhānānmokṣabhāgīyānyākṣipati
# la la zhig gis zas 'ga' tsam byin nas sam bslab pa 'ga' tsam yang mnos nas thar pa 'dod pa'i stobs bskyed pas thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i 'phen par 'gyur ro /
tattvetat
# de yang /
ākṣipyate nṛṣu
# mi yi nang nas 'phen par byed /
manuṣyeṣveva triṣu dvīpeṣu / nānyatra
# mi rnams kyi nang kho na dang gling gsum nas 'phen gyi gzhan nas ni ma yin te /
prajñānirvedayorabhāvādyathāyogam
# ci rigs par shes rab dang skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro /
uktaṃ prasaṅgena mokṣabhāgīyam / abhisamayakramastu vaktumārabdhaḥ / tatra ca yāvadagradharmā uktāḥ
# thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhar las 'ongs pa bshad zin to / / mngon par rtogs pa'i rim ba bshad par brtsams pa de la chos kyi mchog gi bar rnams ni bshad zin to /
śeṣaṃ vaktavyam / ata idamucyate
# lhag ma brjod par bya ste / / de'i phyir /
laukikebhyo 'gradharmebhyo dharmakṣāntiranāsravā
# 'jig rten pa yi chos mchog las / / chos kyi bzod pa zag pa med /
laukikāgradharmānantaramanāsrava dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyate
# ces bya ba 'di smos te / / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog gi mjug thogs su chos shes pa'i bzod pa zag pa med pa skye'o /
kasminnālambane
# dmigs pa gang la zhe na /
kāmaduḥkhe / kāmāvacaraduḥkhamasyā ālambanam / seyaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirityucyate
# 'dod sdug bsngal la / / de'i dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal yin te / / de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o /
anāsravajñānārthaṃ niḥṣyandena viśeṣaṇam
# zag pa med pa nyid yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyu mthun pas bye brag tu byas te /
karmajñānārthaṃ kṣāntiḥ / puṣpaphalavṛkṣavat / saiva ca niyāmāvakrāntirityucyate
# chos shes pa'i phyir bzod pa ni chos shes pa'i bzod pa ste me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing bzhin no / / de nyid nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ste /
samyaktvaniyāmāvakramaṇāt
# yang dag pa nyid du nges par zhugs pa'i phyir ro /
samyaktvaṃ nirvāṇamuktaṃ sūtre / tatra niyamo niyāma ekāntībhāvaḥ
# yang dag pa nyid ni mdo las mya ngan las 'das pa yin par bshad do / / der nges pa ni nges pa ste gcig tu gyur pa'o /
tasyābhigamanamavakramaṇam / tasyāṃ cotpannāyāmāryapudgala ucyate
# der 'jug pa ni mngon par 'gro ba ste / / de skyes na 'phags pa'i gang zag ces bya'o /
anāgatayā pṛthagjanatvaṃ vyāvartyate / etadeva tasyāḥ kāritramanāgatāyāmabhyupagamyate nānyat / pradīpajātivat
# ma 'ongs pas ni so so'i skye bo nyid zlog par byed do / / ma 'ongs pa de'i bya ba ni de kho na yin par khas len gyi gzhan ni ma yin te / / mar me dang skye ba bzhin no /
laukikāgradharmairityapare / na taddharmatvāttadvirodhitvādadoṣaḥ / śatruskandhāruḍhatadghātanavat / ubhayairityapare
# gzhan dag na re 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams kyis bzlog go zhes zer ro / / ma yin te / / de'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro / / de dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med de / / dgra bo'i phrag pa la zhon nas de la 'tshog pa bzhin no / / gzhan dag na re gnyi gas bzlog ste /
ānantaryavimuktimārgasādhrmyāditi / tato 'traiva dharmajñānaṃ / tataḥ punarduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteranantaramatraia kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpadyate
# bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / / de nas ni de nyid la chos she na / / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal ba de kho na la chos shes pa skye ste /
tat duḥkhe dharmajñānamityucyate
# de ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa zhes bya'o /
anāsravādhikāraḥ sarvatra veditavyaḥ / yathā ca kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānaṃ cotpadyate / tathā punaḥ / śeṣe duḥkhe 'nvayakṣāntijñāne / duḥkhe dharmajñānānantaraṃ rūpārupyāvacare duḥkhe samastālambanānvayajñānakṣāntirutpadyate
# thams cad du yang zag pa med pa'i gnas skabs yin par rig par bya'o / / ji ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang chos shes pa skye ba de bzhin du / / sdug bsngal lhag la rjes bzod shes / / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa spyi la dmigs pa skye ste /
sā duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntirityucyate
# de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o /
tato 'nvayajñānamutpadyate
# de nas ni rjes su shes pa skye ste /
tat duḥkhe 'nvaya jñānamityucyate
# de ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa zhes bya'o /
prathamatodharmatattvajñānāddharmajñānam
# dang po nyid du chos kyi de kho na nyid shes pa'i phyir chos shes pa yin no /
tadanvayādūrdhvaṃ duḥkhālambanamanvayajñānam / tathaivānugamanāt / yathā caitāni duḥkhasatye catvāri kṣāntijñānānyutpadyante
# de'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir gong ma'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa la dmigs pa ni rjes su shes pa ste / / de bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro / / ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la bzod pa dang shes pa bzhi po de dag skye ba ltar /
satyatraye tathā / duḥkhānvayajñānādanantaraṃ kāmāvacare samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyate / tataḥ samudaye dharmajñānam / evaṃ samanantarotpattikrameṇa śeṣe samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ samudaye 'nvayajñānam kāmāvacaraduḥkhanirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntirnirodhe dharmajñānaṃ śeṣe nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntirnirodhe 'nvayajñānaṃ kāmavacaraduḥkhapratipakṣamārge dharmajñānakṣāntirmārge dharmajñānaṃ śeṣe mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntirmārge 'nvayajñānam
# bden pa gsum la de bzhin no / / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i mjug thogs su 'dod pa ni spyod pa'i kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa skye zhing / / de nas kun 'byung la chos shes pa skye la / / de bzhin du mjug thogs su skye ba'i rim gyis kun 'byung lhag ma la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa skye'o / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang 'gog pa la chos shes pa skye'o / / 'gog pa lhag ma rnams la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa skye'o / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang lam la chos shes pa skye'o / / lam lhag ma rnams la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang lam la rjes su shes pa skye ste /
iti ṣoḍaśacitto 'yaṃ satyābhisamayaḥ / ityanena krameṇāyaṃ satyānāmabhisamayaḥ ṣoḍaśacittako bhavati
# de ltar bden pa mngon rtogs 'di / / sems bcu drug go / / de ltar na rim pa 'dis na bden pa mngon par rtogs pa 'di ni sems bcu drug yin no /
ye tarhi nikāyāntarīyāḥ satyānāmekābhisamayaṃ varṇayanti / abhiprāya eṣa draṣṭavyaḥ
# sde ba gzhan gang dag bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa 'di ni gcig go zhes brjod pa de dag gi bsam pa ltar bya ste /
abhedena hyabhisamaya ucyate satyeṣu
# bye brag med par ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o /
tridhā / darśanālambakāryākhyaḥ
# de ni rnam gsum ste / / mthong dmigs bya ba zhes bya'o /
darśanābhisamayo 'nāsravayā prajñayā satyānām / ālambanābhisamayastatsaṃprayuktairvedanādibhirapi
# mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa ni zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa'o / / dmigs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams kyis kyang mngon par rtogs pa'o /
kāryābhisamayo viprayuktairapi śīlajātyādibhiḥ / duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ samudayādīnāṃ kāryābhisamayaḥ
# bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa ni ldan pa ma yin pa tshul khrims dang skye ba la sogs pas kyang mngon par rtogs pa'o / / sdug bsngal mthong na de'i mngon par rtogs pa ni gsum mo / / kun 'byung la sogs pa ni bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yin te /
prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇabhāvanāt
# spong ba dang mngon gsum du byed pa dang sgom pa'i phyir ro /
tadyadi satyānāṃ darśanābhisamayaṃ pratyekābhisamayaṃ brūyāt / ayuktaṃ brūyādākārabhedāt / athāpyanātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ darśanamiti brūyāt
# de lta bas na gal te bden pa rnams mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa gcig go zhes smra ni rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir mi rigs par smra ba yin no / / 'on te thams cad bdag med pa'i rnam par mthong ngo zhes zer na ni /
na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt
# 'o na ni bden pa rnams la sdug bsngal la sogs par mthong bar mi 'gyur bas de lta bas na /
evaṃ ca sūtravirodhaḥ / ihāryaśravakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasi kūrvataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato yāvat mārga vā mārgato manasi kurvato 'nāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto yo dharmāṇo pravicaya iti
# 'phags pa nyan thos sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du yid la byed pa'am / / kun 'byung la kun 'byung du yid la byed pa'am / / lam la lam gyi bar du yid la byed pa'i zag pa med pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa zhes gsungs pa'i mdo dang 'gal lo /
bhāvanāmārga evamiti cet
# gal te de lta bu ni bsgom pa'i lam ma yin no zhe na /
na / yathādarśanaṃ bhāvanāt
# ma yin te / / ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bsgom pa'i phyir ro /
athāpyekasya darśanāccheṣeṣu va brūyānna doṣaḥ syāt / antarā tu vyutthānamasti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syāt
# 'on te gcig mthong bas lhag ma rnams lnga dbang thob pa'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa gcig kho na zhes zer na ni nyes pa med de bar skabs su ldan pa yod dam med ces dpyad par bya ba yin no /
atha punarbrūyāt duḥkhameva parijānansamudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣāt karoti mārgaṃ bhāvayati / ata ikābhisamaya iti / evamapi na doṣaḥ syādekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanāt / darśanābhisamayaṃ tu prati sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamaya ukto lakṣyate / nahaiva gṛhapate satyānāmekābhisamayo 'pi pūrvābhisayaya iti vistareṇa sadṛṣṭāntāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi
# 'on te sdug bsngal kho na yongs su shes na kun 'byung yang spongs la 'gog pa yang mngon sum du byed cing lam yang sgom par byed pas de'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa gcig go zhes zer na de lta na yang nyes pa med de; gcig mthong na lhag ma rnams kyang bya ba'i mngon par rtogs pa yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / mdo las mthong ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir bden pa rnams rim gyis mngon par rtogs par gsungs par mngon te / / khyim bdag bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs pa gcig pa ni med pa nyid de / / 'on kyang mthar gyis mngon par rtogs so zhes rgyas par gsungs pa dpe dang bcas pa'i mdo gsum khungs su yod do / / gal te mdo las /
yo duḥkhe niṣkāṅkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa iti sūtrādekābhisamaya iti cet
# gang zhig sdug bsngal la ne ma nur med cing the tshom med pa de ni sangs rgyas la yang zhes gsungs pas mngon bar rtogs pa gcig go zhes zer na /
na / asaṃmudācārāvaśyaṃprahāṇābhisaṃdhivacanāt
# ma yin te / / kun du mi 'byung ba dang gdon mi za bar spong ba las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
ya eṣauktaḥ ṣoḍhaśacittako 'bhisamayaḥ / so 'gradharmaikabhūmikaḥ
# mngon par rtogs pa sems bcu drug par bshad pa gang yin pa de ni chos mchog dang sa gcig /
yadbhūmiko 'gradharmastadbhūmikānyetāni ṣoḍaśa cittāni
# chos kyi mchog sa gang yin ba sems bcu drug po 'di dag kyang de'i sa pa ste /
ta punaḥ ṣaḍbhūmikā ityuktaṃ prāk
# de dag ni sa drug pa'o zhes sngar bshad zin to /
kasmāt punaḥ kṣāntayo jñānāni cavaśyaṃ bhavanti
# ci'i phyir gdon mi za bar bzod pa dag dang shes pa dag yin zhe na /
yasmāt / kṣāntijñānānyanantarya muktimārgā yathākramam
# bzod dang shes pa go rims bzhin / / bar chad med dang rnam grol lam /
anantaryamārgāḥ kṣāntayaḥ kleśaprāptivicchedaṃ pratyantarayitumaśakyatvāt
# bzod pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i thob pa rnam par gcod pa la bar chad bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir bar chad med pa'i lam dag yin no /
vimuktimārgāstu jñānāni / kleśaprāptivimuktānāṃ visaṃyogaprāptisahotpādāt
# shes pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i thob pa las rnam par grol ba rnams la bral ba'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam dag yin te /
ata ubhayairavaśyaṃ bhavitavyam
# de'i phyir gnyi ga yang yin par 'gyur te /
dvābhyāṃ cauraniṣkāsanakapāṭapidhānavat / yadi punardvitīyenānantaryamārgeṇaiva saha visaṃyogaprāptirutpadyeta kiṃ syāt / prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivālambane notpannaṃ syāt
# gnyis kyis rkun po 'byin pa dang sbo gcod pa bzhin no / / gal te bar chad med pa'i lam gnyis pa kho na bral ba'i thob ba dang lhan cig skye bar gyur na ni dmigs pa de kho na la the tshom spangs ba'i shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro /
kṣāntibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇānnava saṃyojananikāyā jñānavadhyā iti śāstravirodha iti cet
# gal te brjod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir bstan bcos las kun du sbyor ba'i ris dgu zhes 'byung ba dang 'gal lo zhe na /
na / kṣāntīnāṃ jñānaparivāratvāt / rājaparivārakṛtasya rājakṛtavyapadeśavat / kiṃ punaḥ sarvāṇi ṣoḍaśacittāni satyadarśanāddarśanamārgaḥ
# ma yin te / / bzod pa rnams ni shes pa'i 'khor yin pa'i phyir rgyal bo'i 'khor gyis byas pa las rgyal pos byas so zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa bzhin no / / ci sems bcu drug po thams cad bden pa ma mthong ba mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam yin nam zhe na /
netyāha
# smras pa /
kiṃ tarhi / adṛṣṭadṛṣṭerdṛṇṭṅmārgastatra pañcadaśa kṣaṇāḥ / duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntimārabhya yāvat mārge 'nvayajñāna kṣāntirete pañcadaśa kṣāṇā darśanamārgaḥ
# ma yin no / / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / de las skad cig bco lnga ni / / ma mthong mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam / / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa nas bzung ste lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i bar gyi skad cig ma bco lnga po de dag ni mthong ba'i lam yin no /
ki kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
adṛṣṭasatyadarśanāt
# bden pa ma mthong ba mthong ba'i phyir ro /
ṣoḍaśe tu nāstyapoūrvaṃ dravyamiti / yathādraṣṭābhyasanādbhāvanāmārga eva / nanu ca tenāṣyadṛṣṭaṃ paśyati mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntim
# bcu drug pa la ni sngon ma mthong ba blta bar bya ba med kyi ji ltar mthong ba ni goms par byed pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam kho na yin no / / des kyang lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa ma mthong ba mthong ba ma yin nam zhe na /
satyaṃ prati cintā na kṣaṇam
# bden pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi skad cig ma la ni ma yin no /
na hi kṣaṇenādṛṣṭena satyamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati
# skad cig ma gcig ma mthong bas ni bden ba ma mthong ba ma yin te /
yathā naikena luṅgenālūnena dedāramalūnaṃ bhavati / phalatvādaṣṭajñānaṣoḍaśākārabhāvanāt pūrvamārgavihāneḥ pravandhikatvācca mārgānvayajñānaṃ bhāvanāmārgaḥ
# dper na nyag ma gcig ma brngas pas zhing ma brngas pa ma yin pa bzhin no / / 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir dang shes pa brgyad dang rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'i phyir dang lam snga ma rnam par nyams pa'i phyir dang rgyun chags pa yin pa'i phyir lam la rjes su shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin no /
aparihāṇistudarśanaheyakleśaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇāt / ata eva darśanamārga iti cet
# yongs su ma nyams pa ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i spangs pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro / / gal te de nyid kyi phyir mthong ba'i lam yin zhe na /
na / atiprasaṅgāt / sapta jñānāni kasmāddarśanamārgaḥ / darśanasyāsamāptatvāt / na hi sarvaṃ satyadarśanaṃ samāptamiti tadantarālatvāttanyappi darśanamārgaḥ / uktaṃ yathā darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārga ścotpadyate / yathedānīmutpannāryamārgāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ tathā vakṣyāmaḥ
# ma yin te / / ha cang thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro / / ci'i phyir shes pa bdun mthong ba'i lam yin zhe na / / mthong ba ma rdzogs pa'i phyir te / / bden pa mthong ba thams cad ma rdzogs pas de'i bar mar gyur pa'i phyir de dag kyang mthong ba'i lam yin no / / mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam ji ltar skye ba bshad zin to / / da ni ji ltar na 'phags pa'i lam skyes pa'i gang zag rnams rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
ya ete darśanamārgasvabhāvāḥ pañcādaśa kṣaṇa uktā veditavyau
# mthong ba'i lam gyi rang bzhin gyi skad cig ma bco lngar bshad pa gang dag yin pa /
mṛdutīkṣṇendriyau teṣu śraddhādharmānusariṇau
# dbang po rno rtul de dag tu / / dad dang chos kyis rjes 'brang ba / / yin par rig par bya ste /
mṛddhindriyastesu vartamānaḥ śraddhānusārītyucyate
# dbang po rtul po de dag la gnas pa ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o /
tīkṣṇendriyo dharmānusārīti
# dbang po rnon po ni chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya'o /
śraddhayānusāraḥ śraddhānusāraḥ
# dad bas rjes su 'brang bas na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o /
so 'syāstīti śraddhānusārī / śraddhayānusartuṃ śīlamasyeti vā
# de 'di la yod pas sam / / 'di dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i dang tshul can yin pas na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ste /
pūrvaṃ parasaṃpratyayenārthānusaraṇāt
# sngon gzhan gyi dring gis don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro /
evaṃ dharmānusārī / pūrvaṃ svayameva sūtrādibhirdharmairarthānusaraṇāt
# chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba yang de dang 'dra ste; sngon bdag nyid kho nas mdo la sogs pa'i chos kyi don gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro /
tau punaḥ
# de gnyis ni /
ahīnabhāvanāheyau phalādyapratipannakau / phalānāmādyaṃ srota āpattiphalaṃ sarvaphalaprāptau tasya prathamatvāt
# bsgom pas spang bya ma spangs na / / 'bras bu dang po la zhugs pa / / 'bras bu rnams kyi dang po ni 'bras bu dang po ste / / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o / / de ni 'bras bu thob par bya ba thams cad kyi dang po yin pa'i phyir ro /
tāveva śraddhādharmānusāriṇau yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇāprahīṇabhāvanāheyau bhavataḥ sakalavandhanau to srota āpattiphalapratipannakāvucyete / yāvat pañcaprakāraghnau
# dad pa dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba de dag nyid gal te sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ma spangs pa 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa zhig yin na ni de gnyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes bya'o / / rnam lnga'i bar bcom /
yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarāṇaṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ yāvat pañca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti / tathaiva prathamaphalapratīpannakāvucyete
# gal te sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsgoms te spang bar bya ba 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams las rnam pa lnga'i bar du spangs pa zhig yin na yang de kho na bzhin du dang po'i 'bras bul zhugs pa dag ces bya'o / / gnyis pa la /
dvitīye 'rvāṅnavakṣayāt
# dgu pa tshun chad zad pa yin /
dvītīyanimittaṃ dvitīye
# gnyis pa la zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i phyir te /
yadi tayostasmāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaprahīṇā bhavanti / dvau tau dvitīyaphalapratipannakāvucyete / katamacca dvitīyam
# gal te de gnyis kyis de yan chad rnam pa drug gam / / bdun nam brgyad dag cig sngon spangs ba yin na ni de gnyis 'bras bu gnyis pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ste / / gnyis pa gang zhe na /
sakṛdāgāmiphalam
# lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
kāmādviraktāburdhva vā tṛtīyapratipannakau
# 'dod pa'am yang na gong ma las / / chags bral gsum pa la zhugs pa /
yadi punarnavamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇāt kāmadhātorvītarāgau bhavata ūrdhvaṃ vā yāvadākiñcanyāyatanāt tau tṛtīya pratīpannakāvucyete / katamacca tṛtīyam
# gal te rnam pa dgu ba yang spangs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin nam / / gong ma ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na de gnyis 'bras bu gsum pa la zhugs pa zhes bya ste / / gsum gang zhe na /
anāgāmiphalam / ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ / ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne tau na punaḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇāvucyete
# phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o / / gang zhig gang la zhugs pa ni / / bcu drug pa la de 'bras gnas / / sems bcu drug pa skyes na de gnyis dad pa dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba zhes kyang mi bya la /
nāpi pratipannakau
# zhugs pa zhes kyang ni bya'o /
kiṃ tarhi
# 'o na ci zhe na /
phalastho / yatra phale yaḥ pratipannako bhūtaḥ sa tadānīṃ tatra phalasthito bhavati / srota āpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā / arhattvaṃ tu na śakyamāditaḥ prāptum
# 'bras bu la gnas pa dag yin te / / gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am / / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am / / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang rung 'bras bu gang la zhugs par gyur ba de ni de'i tshe 'bras bu de la gnas pa yin no / / dgra bcom pa nyid ni dang po nyid du thob par mi nus te /
darśanamārgeṇa bhāvanāheyānāmaprahāṇāt / pūrvaṃ ca bhavāgravairāgyāsaṃbhavāt
# mthong ba'i lam gyis bsgom pas spang bar bya ba mi spong ba'i phyir dang sngar yang srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro /
śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭacyāptau mṛdutokṣṇendriyau tadā
# de'i tshe dbang po rno rtul dag / / dad bas mos dang mthong bas thob /
tasminkāle yo mṛdvindriyaḥ śraddhānusāripūrvī sa śraddhādhimukta ityucyate
# de'i tshe dbang po rtul bo sngon dad pas rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni dad pas mos ba zhes bya'o /
yastīkṣṇendriyo dharmānusāripūrvī sa dṛṣṭiprāpta ityucyate / śraddhāprajñādhikatvenādhimokṣadṛṣṭiprabhāvitatvāt
# dbang po rnon po sngon chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba gang yin ba de ni mthong bas thob pa zhes bya ste / / dad pa dang shes rab lhag bas mos pa dang mthong bas rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro /
kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prahīṇapañcaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte srota āpanna evocyate na sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ
# ci'i phyir rnam pa lnga spangs kyang sems bcu drug pa la rgyun du zhugs pa kho na zhes bya la / / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa zhes mi bya zhe na /
yasmāt / phale phalaviśiṣṭasya lābho mārgasya nāstyanaḥ
# gang gi phyir / / 'bras thob 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis / / lam thob med pas de yi phyir /
nāprayukto viśeṣāya phalasthaḥ pratipannakaḥ / phale hi labhyamāne phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata ityeṣa niyamaḥ / ataḥ phalastho yāvanna viśeṣāya prayujyate phalāntaraprāptau tāvat pratipannako nocyate / evamanyatrāpi phale veditavyam
# 'bras gnas khyad par bya ba'i phyir / / mi brtson pa ni zhugs ma yin / / 'bras bu thob na 'bras bu khyad par can gyi lam mi 'thob po zhes bya ba 'di ni nges so / / de lta bas na 'bras bu la gnas pa ji srid du khyad par du bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu gzhan thob par bya pa la mi brtson pa de srid du zhugs pa zhes mi bya ste / / de bzhin du 'bras bu gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
yastu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgo 'dharāṃ bhūmi niśritya niyāmamavakrāmati so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārga saṃmukhīkaroti
# gang zhig bsam gtan gsum ba las 'dod chags dang bral la / / sa 'og ma la brten te nges par 'jug pa de ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu khyad par can gyi lam mngon du byed do /
anyathā hi sa tasmādūrdhvopapannaḥ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt
# de lta ma yin na de'i gong du skyes pa de bde ba'i dpang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro /
evaṃ tāvadbhūyaḥ kāmavītarāgāṇāṃ niyāmāvakrāntau pudgalavyavasthānam
# re zhig phal cher las dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis nges par 'jug pa'i gang zag rnam par gzhag pa ni de lta bu yin no /
ānupūrvikaṃ tu vaktavyam / ata idaṃ tāvadvacyavasthāpyate / yathaite kāmadhātau navaprakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭā evaṃ
# mthar gyis 'jug ba brjod par bya ste / / de'i phyir re zhig 'di rnam par gzhag par bya'o / / ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu po de dag bstan pa de bzhin du /
navaprakārā doṣā hi bhūmau bhūmau / yāvadbhavāgre / yathā ca doṣāḥ / tathā guṇāḥ / tatpratipakṣā apyānantaryavimuktimārgākhyā guṇā bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārā eva
# sa dang sa na nyes rnam dgu / / srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du'o / / nyes pa rnams ji lta bde bzhin du yang yon tan rnams sa dang sa na de'i gnyen bo bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba yon tan yang rnam pa dgu dgu kho na yod do /
kathaṃ kṛtvā
# ji ltar byas pas she na /
mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇāṃ punarmṛdvādibhedataḥ
# chung dang 'bring dang che rnams kyi / / chung ngu la sogs tha dad phyir /
mṛdumadhyādhimātrā hi trayo mūlaprakārāḥ / teṣāṃ punaḥ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratvena trividhatvāt nava vyavasthāpyante / tadyathā mṛdumṛduḥ prakāro mṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātro madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātro 'dhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśceti / tatra mṛdumṛdunāmārgeṇādhimātrādhimātrasya kleśasya prahāṇam
# rtsa ba'i rnam pa gsum ste / / chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'o / / de dag re re zhing yang chung du dang 'bring dang chen po nyid kyis rnam pa gsum yin pa'i phyir dgur rnam par gzhag ste / / chung ngu'i chung ngu'i rnam pa dang chung ngu'i 'bring dang chung ngu'i chen po dang 'bring gi chung ngu dang 'bring gi 'bring dang 'bring gi chen po dang chen po'i chung ngu dang chen po'i 'bring dang chen po'i chen po'o / / de la lam chung ngu'i chung dus ni nyon mongs pa chen po'i chen po sbong la /
evaṃ yāvadadhimātrādhimātreṇa mṛdumṛdoḥ / ādita evādhimātramārgasaṃbhavādutpannādhimātramārgasya cādhimātrakleśāsaṃbhavāt audāriko hi malaścelātpūrvaṃ nirdūyate paścāt sūkṣmaḥ / audārikaṃ ca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate sūkṣmaṃ cādhimātreṇetyeṣa dṛṣṭāntayogaḥ
# de bzhin du ma chen po'i chen pos ni nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bar du spong ste / / dang po kho nar lam chen po mi srid pa'i phyir dang lam chen bo skyes pa la nyon mongs ba chen po mi srid pa'i phyir ro / / gos la dri ma che long ni sngar 'khrul phra mo ni phyis 'khru ba dang mun pa che long ni snang ba chung ngus 'joms la phra mo ni chen pos sel zhes bya ba 'di ni dpe'i rnam pa yin no /
śuklā hi dharmā valavanto durbalāstu kṛṣṇāḥ / kṣaṇikamṛdukenāpyāryamārgeṇānādisaṃsāraparaṃparāpyāyitādhimātrāṇāṃ kleśānāmunmūlatvāt
# 'phags pa'i lam skad cig ma chung ngus kyang 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas brgyud pas spel ba'i nyon mongs pa chen po rnams rtsa ba nas med par byed pa'i phyir chos dkar po rnams ni stobs dang ldan pa yin la / / nag po rnams ni stobs chung ba yin te /
bahukālasaṃvarddhitānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ trivṛtkarṣavat kṣaṇikālpapradīpamahātamopaghātavacya / evaṃ navaprakāreṣu kleśeṣu sarvatra
# yun ring po nas bsags pa'i skyon rnams sman tri byid thun gcig gis 'byin pa lta bu dang mar me skad cig ma chung ngus mun pa chen po 'joms pa bzhin no / / de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams pa dgu po de dag thams cad du /
akṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtparaḥ
# 'bras gnas bsgom spang bya ma zad / / re ltar thogs na lan bdun pa /
yasya hi phalasthasyaiko 'pi bhāvanāheyaḥ prakāro 'prahīṇaḥ sa srota āpanaḥ
# 'bras bu la gnas pa gang zhig gis / / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa gcig kyang ma spangs pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa yin la /
saptajanmāni karotīti saptakṛta
# tshe bdun gyi bar du skye bas na re ltar thogs na lan bdun pa'o /
paraḥ sarvāntyaḥ / na hi sarvasaptakṛditi / saptakṛtvaḥparama iti sūtrapāṭhaḥ / saptakṛtvaḥ paramaṃ janmā 'syetyarthaḥ / prakarṣe paramaśabdaḥ
# thams cad du ni lan bdun pa ma yin pas re ltar thogs na zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi tha shal ba'o / / mdo las / / mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa zhes 'byung ba ni de mchog tu thogs na skye ba lan bdun pa zhes bya pa'i tha tshig ste / / mchog ces bya ba'i sgra ni rab tu'o /
nirvāṇasroto hi mārgastena tatra gamanāt
# mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyun ni lam ste / / des na der 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
tadasāvāpanna āgataḥ prāpta iti srota āpannaḥ
# 'di ni der zhugs shing phyin la son pas na rgyun du zhugs pa yin no /
kathamāpannaḥ
# ji ltar na zhugs pa yin /
ādyamārgalābhāccet aṣṭamako 'pi syāt
# gal te lam dang pho thob pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni brgyad pa yang yin par 'gyur ro /
ādyaphalalābhāccet bhūyo vītarāgo 'pi syāt / kāmavītarāgaḥ / sarvaphalaprāpiṇamadhikṛtyādyaphalalābhāt / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sa eva nāṣṭamakaḥ
# gal te 'bras bu dang po thob ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni phal tshor las 'dod chags dang bral pa yang yin par 'gyur la / / 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba yang yin par 'gyur ro / / 'bras bu thams cad thob pa'i dbang du byas nas 'bras bu dang po thob pa'i phyir ro / / ci'i phyir de kho na yin la brgyad pa ni ma yin zhe na /
pratipannakaphalamārgalābhāt darśanabhāvanāmārgalābhāt sakalasroto 'bhisamayācca mārgānvayajñāne
# lam la rjes su shes pa la ni zhugs pa dang 'bras bu'i lam thob ba'i phyir dang mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam thob pa'i phyir dang rgyun thams cad mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
sa eva tasmādanyānsaptopapattibhavānmanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdadhāti saptāntarābhavān / evaṃ deveṣvityaṣṭāviṃśatiyavān pratisaṃdadhāti / saptakasāmānyāttu saptakṛtvaḥ / parama uktaḥ / saptasthānakauśalasaptaparṇavaditi vaibhāṣikāḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re de ni de las gzhan ba skye ba'i srid pa bdun dang srid pa bar ma bdun du mi rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed la de bo zhin du lha dag gi nang du yang nying mtshams sbyor bar byed do / / de ltar na srid pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du nying mtshams sbyor bar byed do / / srid pa bdun tshan du 'dra ba'i phyir mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa zhes bshad de / / gnas bdun la mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang 'dab ma bdun ba zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes zer ro /
yattarhhi sūtra uktaṃ asthānamanavakāśo yaddaṣṭisaṃpannaḥ pudgalo 'ṣṭamaṃ bhavamabhinirvartayiṣyati / nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti
# 'o na gang mdo las / / gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa srid pa brgyad pa mngon par 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de 'di ni gnas med do zhes gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
ekasyāṃ gatāvityabhiprāyaḥ
# 'gro ba gcig tu dgongs pa yin no /
yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāne 'ntarābhavo 'pi na syāt evamapyūredhvasrotaso bhavāgraparamasyaikasyāṃ gatāvaṣṭama upapattibhāvo na prāpnoti
# 'on te sgra ji bzhin du brtags na ni srid pa bar ma yang yod par mi 'gyur ro / / de lta na yang srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du gong du 'pho ba 'gro ba gcig tu skye ba'i srid pa brgyad par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
kāmadhātvabhi saṃdhivacanādadoṣaḥ
# 'dod pa'i khams las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir nyes pa med do /
kimatra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktirvā / iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvo na pounarubhayeṣveva saptakṛtva iti / evaṃ hi paṭhacyate / saptakṛtvo devāśca manuṣyāśceti
# 'di la shes par byed pa mdo'am rigs pa ci zhig yod / / lha dang mi dag gi nang nas sor lan bdun skye'i gnyi ga'i nang du lan bdun ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba 'di la yang shes par byed pa ci zhig yod de / / 'di skad du lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun zhes 'byung ngo zhe na /
pratyekamapi tu kāśyapīyāḥ paṭhanti
# 'od srungs pa rnams lha rnams su lan bdun /
saptakṛtvo devān saptakṛtvo manuṣyāniti / nātrābhiniveṣṭavyam / yaśca manuṣyesu srota āpanno bhavati sa tānevāgamya parinirvāti / yo deveṣu sa tāneva / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamaṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayati / tāvatā kakalenāvaśyaṃ saṃtatiparipākāt / mārgo hi sa tajjātīyaḥ
# mi rnams su lan bdun zhes so sor yang 'don pas 'di la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o / / gang zhig mi dag gi nang du rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de ni de kho nar 'ongs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das la / / gang zhig lha dag gi nang du rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa de ni de kho nar 'ongs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o / / ci'i phyir srid pa brgyad pa mngon par mi 'grub ce na / / dus de srid kyis gdon mi za bar rgyud yongs su smin pa'i phyir ro / / lam de ni de 'dra ste /
saptapadāśīviṣa daṣṭavaccāturthakajvaravacca / saptasaṃyojanāvaśeṣatvācca / dve avarabhāgīye pañca cordhvabhāgīyānīti
# sprul gom pa bdun pas zin pa lta bu dang rims nyin bzhi ba bzhin no / / kun tu sbyor ba bdun po tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa gnyis dang gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga lus pa'i yang phyir ro /
antareṇāpyāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkurvāṇo na parinirvāti
# bar skabs su yang 'phags pa'i lam mngon du byed cing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste /
tāvat bhavavedanīyasya karmaṇo valādhānāt / asati buddhotpādagrahastha evārhattvaṃ prāpnoti / agāraṃ tu pounarnādhyāvasati
# de srid du srid ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro / / sangs rgyas 'byung pa med na khyim pa kho nar dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob na khyim na ni mi gnas so /
dharmatāpratilambhikaṃ tu bhikṣuliṅga pratilabhate
# chos nyid kyis 'thob pa'i dge slong gi mtshan ma yang 'thob bo / / gzhan dag na re /
anyāśramikaṃ liṅgenetyapare
# dge spyong gzhan gyis mtshan mas so zhes zer ro /
kasmādavinipātakadharmā bhavati
# ci'i phyir log bar ltung pa'i chos can ma yin zhe na /
tadgāmi karmānupacayādupacitavipākadānavaiguṇyācca saṃtaterbalavatkuśalā dhivāsanātprayogāśayaśuddhitaḥ / apāyanipāte tu karmaṇyasau kṣāntimapi notpādayet
# der 'gro ba'i las mi sogs pa'i phyir dang bsags pa yang sbyor ba dang bsam pa dag ba'i sgo nas dge ba'i rtsa ba stobs dang ldan pas bsgos pa'i phyir rgyud rnam par smin ba dang mi mthun pa byas pa'i phyir ro / / ngan song du nges ba'i las yod na ni des bzod pa yang bskyed bar mi 'gyur ro /
āha cātra / kṛtvā budho 'lpamapi pāpamadhaḥ prayāti
# 'dir smra sa pa / / mi mkhas pas ni sdig pa chung du byas kyang 'og tu 'gro /
kṛtvā budho mahadapi prajahātyanartham
# mkhas pas chen po byas kyang gnod ba rab tu spong bar 'gyur /
majjanyadho 'lpamapi vāriṇi saṃhataṃ hi / pātrikṛtaṃ mahadapi plavate tadeva iti
# lcags kyi gong bu chung yang chu yi gting du 'bying 'gyur la / / de nyid snod du byas na che yang steng du 'phyo bar 'gyur /
duḥkhasyāntaṃ karotīti ko duḥkhasyāntaḥ / yasmāt pareṇa duḥkhaṃ nāsti
# sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed do zhes bya ba sdug bsngal gyi mtha' gang yin zhe na / / gang phan chad sdug bsngal med ba ste /
apratisaṃdhikaṃ duḥkhaṃ karotītyarthaḥ
# sdug bsngal gyi nying mtshams mi sbyor bar byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
athavā nirvāṇamantaḥ / kathaṃ nirvāṇaṃ karoti
# yang na mtha' ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no / / mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar byed ce na /
tatprāptivivandhāpanayanāt / yathākāśaṃ kuru maṇḍapaṃ pātayeti bhavanti vaktāraḥ / anyo 'pi ca syātsaptakṛtvaḥ paramo na tu niyata iti nocyate / evaṃ tāvadakṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtvaḥ paramo bhavati
# de 'thob pa'i bgegs bsal ba'i phyir te dper na smra ba po 'dun khang rdib la nam mkha' gyis [*yis] zhes 'dzer ba lta bu yin no / / mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa gzhan yang yod mod kyi ma nges pas mi brjod do / / re zhig 'bras bu la gnas ba bsgos pas spang par bya ba ma zad pa mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa ni de lta bu yin no /
tricaturvidhamuktastu dvitrijanmā kulaṅkulaḥ
# rnam gsum rnam bzhi las grol ba / / tshe gnyis gsum du rigs nas rigs /
sa eva srota āpannastribhiḥ / kleśaprahāṇatastricatuḥporakāraprahīṇatvāt / indriyatastatpratipakṣānāsravendriyalābhāt / janmato dvitrijanmāvaśeṣatvāt
# rgyun du zhugs pa de nyid rgyu gsum gyis na rigs nas rigs su skye ba yin te / / nyon mongs pa spang ba las ni nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gsum mam bzhi spang ba'i phyir ro / / dbang po lngas ni de'i gnyen po zag pa med pa'i dbang po thob pa'i phyir ro / / skye ba las ni tshe gnyis sam gsum lus pa'i phyir ro /
śloke tu dvayorgrahaṇaṃ srota āpannasya paścātprahīṇe sati tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyasyānuktasiddhatvāt
# tshigs su bcad pa'i nang du gnyis shig smos pa ni / / rgyun du zhugs pa phyis nyon mongs pa spong bar byed na de'i gnyen po zag ba med pa'i dbang bo thob pa ni ma smos kyang grub pa'i phyir ro /
pareṇa bhavyatvād / ato 'sya grahaṇam / kasmānna pañcaprakāraprahāṇāt / tatprahāṇe ṣaṣṭhasyāvaśyaṃ prahāṇāt nahi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samarthaḥ
# skye ba ni gal te gong ma'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ches nyung dur yang 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'di smos so / / ci'i phyir rnam pa lnga spangs pa'i phyir ma yin zhe na / / de spangs na drug pa yang gdon mi za bar spong ba'i phyir te / / de'i rnam ba gcig gis ni bar chad gcig pa'i bzhin du 'bras bu la bgegs bya bar mi nus te /
ekavīcikasyeva dhātvanatikramāt
# khams las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
sa eva kulaṅkulo dvividhaḥ
# rigs nas rigs su skye bde ni rnam pa gnyis te /
devakulaṅkulo yo deveṣa dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃśritya parinirvāti tatra vā 'nyatra vā devanikāye
# lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni lha dag gi nang du rigs gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas lha'i rigs de'am gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o /
manuṣyakulaṅkulo yo manuṣyeṣu tatra vā 'nyatra va dvīpe parinirvāti / sa eva punaḥ phalasthaḥ
# mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni mi dag gi nang du rigs gnyis sam gsum du 'khor nas gling de'am gzhan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o / / 'bras bu la gnas ba de nyid /
āpañcamaprakāraghno dvitīyapratīpannakaḥ
# rnam pa lnga yi bar bcom pa / / gnyis pa la ni zhugs pa yin /
yasya phalasthasyaikaprakāroyāvatpañcamaḥ prahīṇo bhavati asau dvitīyaphalapratipannako veditavyaḥ
# 'bras bu la gnas pa gang gis rnam pa gcig nas lnga'i bar du spangs ba yin na de'i 'bras bu gnyis pa la zhugs pa yin bar rig par bya'o /
kṣīṇaṣaṣṭhaprakārastu sakṛdāgāmyasau punaḥ / dvitīyaphalaprāpto bhavati
# rnam pa drug pa zad gyur pa / / de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba / / de ni 'bras bu gnyis pa thob pa yin te /
devān gatvā sakṛnmanuṣyalokāgamanātsakṛdāgāmī
# lha dag gi nang du song nas mi'i 'jig rten du lan cig phyir 'od ba'i phyir 'ong ba ste /
pareṇa janmāghāvāt / rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvādityucyate / mṛduprakārāvaśeṣatvāt / sa eva punaḥ phalasthaḥ
# phan chad skye ba med pa'i phyir ro / / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams bsrabs pa'i phyir zhes 'byung pa ni chung du'i rnam pa lus pa'i phyir ro / / 'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid /
kṣīṇasaptāṣṭadoṣāṃśa ekajanmaikavīcikaḥ / tṛtīyapratipannaśca
# nyis cha bdun dang brgyad zad pa / / tshe gcig bar chad gcig pa dang / / gsum pa la ni zhugs pa'ang yin /
tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ / sa eva sakṛdāgāmyekavīcido veditavyaḥ / saptāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇāt / tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyalābhādekajanmāvaśeṣatvāt / kathamasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vidhnayitum śaknoti
# yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba de nyid rgyu gsum gyis bar chad gcig pa yin par rig par bya ste / / nyon mongs pa'i rnam ba bdun nam brgyad spangs pa'i phyir dang de'i gnyen po zag pa med pa'i dbang bo thob pa'i phyir dang tshe gcig lus pa'i phyir ro / / ji ltar na 'di'i rnam pa gcig gis 'bras bu la bgegs byed bar nus she na /
dhātvatikramāt
# khams las 'da' ba'i phyir te /
avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vidhnāyopatiṣṭhanta ityuktaṃ prāk / yathā karmāṇyevaṃ kleśā api veditavyā iti
# gong du las rnams ni gnas skabs gsum du bgegs byed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so zhes bshad zin to / / las rnams ji lta bar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste /
vipākaniḥṣyandaphalabhūmyatikramāt / vīcirnāmāntaraṃ tasya caikajamavyavahitatvāt nirvāṇasya ekakleśaprakāravyavahitatvādvā 'nāgāmiphalasyaiko vīcirasyetyekavīcikaḥ / tṛtīyaphalapratipannakaścaikavīciko veditavyaḥ prahīṇasaptāṣṭaprakāraḥ
# rnam par smin pa dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'i sa las 'da' ba'i phyir ro / / bar chad ces bya ba ni bar chad byed pa'o / / de'i mya ngan las 'da' ba la tshe gcig gis chod pa'i phyir ram / / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa gcig gis chod pa'i phyir 'di la bar chad gcig yod pas na bar chad gcig pa yin no / / rnam pa bdun dang brgyad spangs pa de ni 'bras bu gsum pa la zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o /
pūrvaprahīṇaprakārastu phalaprāptau na tāvatkulaṅkulo bhavatyekavīciko vā yāvatphalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na samukhīkṛtaḥ
# sngon rnam pa gsum dang bzhi spangs pa'am / / bdun pa dang brgyad pa spangs pa 'bras bu thob pa ni ji srid du 'bras bu khyad par can gyi lam mngon du ma byas pa de srid du rigs nas rigs su skye ba'am bar chad gcig pa ma yin no /
so 'nāgāmī navakṣayāt / sa evapunaḥ phalastho navaprakāraprahāṇādanāgāmī upadiṣṭaḥ
# de dgu zad pas phyir mi 'ong / / 'bras bu la gnas pa de nyid rnam pa dgu spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin par rig par bya ste /
kāmadhātvanāgamanāt
# 'dod pa'i khams su mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro /
pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādityucyate prahāṇasaṃkulanāt
# kun tu sbyor ba tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa rnam pa lnga spangs pa'i phyir zhes 'byung ba ni spangs pa sngom pa'i phyir te /
avaśyaṃ dve trīṇi vā pūrvaṃ prahīṇāni bhavanti
# gdon mi za bar sngon gnyis sam gsum spangs pa yin no; /
so 'ntarotpannasaṃskārāsaṃskāraparinirvṛtiḥ
# de ni bar skyes 'du byed dang / / 'du byed med spangs mya ngan 'da' /
ūrdhvasrotāśca / antarā parinirvṛtirasyetyantarāparinirvṛtiḥ
# gong du 'pho ba rnams 'di bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas na bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste /
evamutpannasya saṃskāreṇāsaṃskāreṇeti yojyam / sa evānāgāmī punaḥ pañcadhā bhavati
# de bzhin du skyes nas dang 'du byed pa dang 'du byed pa med pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o / / phyir mi 'ong ba de nyid rnam pa lnga yin te /
antarāparinirvāyī yo 'ntarābhave parinirvāti / upapadyaparinirvāyī ya upapannamātrī na cirāt parinirvātyabhiyuktavāhimārgatvāt / sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇena
# bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni srid pa bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa'o / / skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni skyes pa tsam las mi 'chi bar phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste / / mngon par brtson pa dang lam ngang gis 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro /
so 'ppi nirūpadhiśeṣeṇetyapare / nāyurutsargāvaśitvāt / sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī kila upapadyāprati prasrabdhaprayogaḥ / sābhisaṃskāraṃ parinirvātyabhiyuktāvāhimārgatvāt
# gzhan dag na re de yang phung po'i lhag ma med pas so zhes zer ro / / ma yin te / / tshe 'dor ba la dbang med pa'i phyir ro / / mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni skyes nas sbyor ba ma btang zhing mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba gang yin pa ste /
anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī tvaṃnabhisaṃskāreṇābhiyogavāhimārgābhāvāt / saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtālambanamārganirvāṇādityapare / tattu na / atiprasaṅgāt / sūtre tvanābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pūrva paṭhacyate / tathaiva ca yujyate / vāhyavāhimārgayoranabhisaṃskārābhisaṃskārasādhyatvādayatnayatnaprāptitaḥ / upapadyaparinirvāyiṇastu vāhitaro 'dhimātrataraśca mārgo mṛdutarāścānuśayā iti / ūrdhvasrotā yasyordhvaṃ gatirna tatriva parinirvāṇaṃ yatropapannaḥ / sroto gatirityeko 'rthaḥ
# mngon par brtson pa dang lam ngang gis 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste / / mngon par mi brtson pa dang lam ngang gis 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes grag go / / gzhan dag na re 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa la dmigs pa'i lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / / de ni mi rung ste / / ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / mdo las ni mngon bar 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba sngar 'byung bas de kho na bzhin du rung ste / / lam ngang gis 'byung ba dang ngang gis 'byung ba ma yin pa dag ni 'bad pa med pa dang 'bad pas 'thob ba'i sgo nas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang mngon par 'du byed pas bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni lam ches ngang gis 'byung ba dang ches che ba dang phra rgyas ches chung ba yin no / / gong du 'pho ba ni gang du skyes pa de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gong du 'gro ba gang yin pa ste / / 'pho ba dang 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni don gcig go /
sa dhyāne vyavakīrṇo 'kaniṣṭhagaḥ
# de ni bsam gtan spel nas 'og min 'gro /
ūrdhvasrotā dvivadho hetutaḥ phalataśca
# gong du 'pho ba de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis te /
hetuto vyavakorṇāvyavakīrṇadhyānatvāt
# rgyu'i sgo nas ni bsam gtan spel ba dang spel ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
phalato 'kaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvāt tatra yena dhyānaṃ vyavakīrṇaṃ so 'kaniṣṭhān gatvā parinirvāti / sa pluto 'rdhaplutaḥ sarvacyutaśca
# 'bras bu'i sgo nas ni 'og min dang srid pa'i rtse mo la thug pa'i phyir ro / / de la gang gis bsam gtan spel ba de ni 'og min du song nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o / / de 'phar phyed 'phar thams cad du /
sa punareṣo 'kaniṣṭhaparama ūrdhvaṃsrotāstrividhaḥ / plutādibhedāt
# 'chi 'pho gong du 'pho ba 'og min gyi mthar thug pa de yang 'phar ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum ste /
tatra pluto nāma ya iha dhyānāni vyayakīrya dhyānacyāt oparihīṇaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamāsvādya brahmakāyikeṣūpapannaḥ pūrvābhyāsavaśāccaturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tasmāt pracyuto 'kaniṣṭheṣūpapadyate
# de la 'phar ba zhes bya ba ni 'dir bsam gtan rnam par spel nas bsam gtan dang po'i ro myangs te bsam gtan gsum las yongs su nyams pa tshangs ris pa dag gi nang du skyes nas sngon goms ba'i dbang gis bsam gtan bzhi pa spel te / / de nas shi 'phos nas 'og min pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa ste /
eṣa himadhyānimajjanāt plutaḥ
# de ni bar du mi 'gro bas na 'phar ba zhes bya'o /
ardhpluto nāma yastataḥ śuddhāvāseṣūpapadya madhyādekamapi sthānāntaraṃ vilaṅghacyākaniṣṭhān praviśati / mahābrahmasvāryo nopapadyate dṛṣṭisthānatvādekanāyakatvācceti / sarvacyuto nāma yaḥ sarvāṇi sthānāntarāṇi saṃcaryākaniṣṭhān praviśati / na ca dakācidanāgāmī / tatraivolpatyāyatane dvitīyaṃ janmābhinirvartayati
# phyed du 'phar ba zhes bya ba ni de nas gnas gtsang ma rnams su skyes la bar nas gnas gzhan 'ga' tsam yang rgal te 'og min du 'phos nas 'og min du 'jug pa gang yin pa'o / / 'phags pa ni tshangs chen pa dag gi nang du mi skye ste / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / lta ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir dang gtso bo gcig tu zad pa'i phyir dang gnas thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni gnas gzhan thams cad du 'phos nas 'og min du 'jug pa gang yin pa'o / / phyir mi 'ong ba ni nam yang skye ba'i skye mched de nyid du tshe gnyis pa mngon par 'grub par mi byed de /
viśeṣagāmitvāt / evaṃ cāsya paripūrṇamanāgāmitvaṃ bhavati / yatropapannastasyādhastatra cātyantamanāgamanāt
# khyad par du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'di ltar na 'di'i phyir mi 'ong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs pa yin te / / gang du skyes pa de 'og dang der gtan du mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tāvaddhacyāne vyavakīrṇe 'kaniṣṭago veditavyaḥ / tataḥ
# re zhig bsam gtan spel nas 'og min du 'gro ba ni de lta bu yin par rig par bya'o /
anyo bhavāgragaḥ
# de las gzhan srid rtse mor 'gro /
avyavakīrṇadhyāna ūrdhvaṃsrotā bhavāgraniṣṭho bhavati / sa hi samāpattyantarāṇyāsvādayan sarvasthānāntareṣūpapadyāpraviśyaiva śuddhāvasānārupyakramotpattito bhavāgraṃ gatvā parinirvāti / śamathacarito hyeṣaḥ / pūrvakastu vipaśyanācaritaḥ
# gong du 'pho ba bsam gtan ma spel ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa yin te / / de ni snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan rnams ro myong bar byed cing gnas gzhan thams cad du skye la / / gnas gtsang ma rnams su mi 'jug pa kho na ra gzugs med par skye ba'i rim gyis srid pa'i rtsa mor song ste / / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o / / 'di ni zhi gnas spyad pa yin no / / snga ma ni lhag mthong spyad pa yin no /
antarāpi tu parinirvāṇamūrdhvaṃsrotaso yujyamānaṃ paśyāmaḥ
# gong du 'pho ba bar skabs su yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar rung bar blta'o /
akaniṣṭhabhavāgraparamatvaṃ tu pareṇa gatyabhāvādyathā sapta kṛtvaḥparamatvaṃ srota āpannasyeti
# 'og min dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa nyid ni phan chad du 'gro ba med pa'i phyir te / / dper na rgyun du zhugs pa mchog tu thogs na lan bdun pa nyid bzhin no /
ime tāvat pañca rupopagā anāgāminaḥ
# re zhig de dag ni gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba lnga yin no /
ārugyagaścaturdhānyaḥ
# gzhan ni gzugs med 'gro rnam bzhi /
anya ārupyago 'nāgāmī yo rūpavītarāga itaścacyutvārupyeṣupapadyate / sa punaścaturvidha upapadyādiparinirvāyibhedāt
# phyir mi 'ong ba gzhan ni gzugs med par nye bar 'gro ba ste / / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas gzugs med pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa'o / / de yang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi ste /
ta ete ṣaḍanāgāmino bhavanti / tataḥ
# de dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnam pa drug yin no /
iha nirvāpako 'paraḥ
# gzhan ni 'di la mya ngan 'da' /
ihaiva janmanyaparaḥ parinirvāti
# gzhan ni tshe 'di kho na la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
sa dṛṣṭadharmaparinirvāyo saptamaḥ
# mthong ba'i chos la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de ni bdun pa yin no /
punastrīṃstrividhān kṛtvā nava rupopagāḥ smṛtāḥ / punastrayāṇāmanāgāmināṃ tridhā bhedādrūpopagā navānāgāmino bhavanti / katameṣāṃ trayāṇām
# gsum la rnam gsum phyi nas su / / gzugs su nyer 'gro dgur bshad do / / phyir mi 'ong ba gsum la yang rnam pa gsum du phye bas gzugs su nye bar 'gro ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba dgu yin no / / gsum po gang dag /
antaropapadyaparinirvāyiṇorurdhvasrotasaśca
# ce na; bar ma do dang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang gong du 'pho ba'o /
kathaṃ tridhābhedāt
# rnam pa gsum du phye bas ji lta bu zhe na /
antarāparinirvāyiṇastāvadāśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāt dṛṣṭāntatrayeṇa / upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa upapadyābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāṇāt / sarve hyete trayo 'pyupapanna parinirvāṇādupapadyaparinirvāyiṇaḥ
# re zhig bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni dpe gsum gyis myur ba dang myur ba ma yin pa dang yun ring mo zhig nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro / / skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni skyes nas dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro / / de dag thams cad kyang skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag yin no /
ūrdhvaṃsrotasaḥ plutādibhedāt
# gong du 'pho ba ni 'phar ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so /
sarveṣāṃ vā trayāṇāmāśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāditi tritvam
# yang na gsum po thams cad myur ba dang myur ba ma yin pa dang yun ring mo zhig nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
tadviśeṣaḥ punaḥ karmakleśendriyaviśeṣataḥ / teṣāṃ punastrayāṇāṃ navānāṃ cānāgāmināṃ karmakleśenriyaviśeṣādviśeṣaḥ / trayāṇāṃ tāvadabhinirvṛttyupapadyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmopacitatvādyathākramaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātra kleśasamudācāra tvādadhimātramadhyamudvindriyatvācca
# de dag gi ni khyad par rnams / / las dbang nyon mongs bye brag las / / phyir mi 'ong ba gsum dang dgu po de dag gi khyad par ni las dang nyon mongs pa dang dbang po'i bye brag las te / / re zhig gsum po ni go rims bzhin du mngon par 'grub ba dang skyes pa dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa kun du spyod pa chung ba dang 'bring dang chen po'i phyir dang dbang po chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'i phyir ro /
teṣāmapi navānāṃ prtyekamata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣaḥ / prathamayostrikayoḥ kleśendriyaviśeṣāt pūrvavat
# de nyid kyi phyir de dag so so'i khyad par yang ci rigs par gsum tshan dang po gnyis ni gong ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang dbang po'i bye brag las so /
paścimasya trikasyāparaparyāyavedanīyakarmaviśeṣācceti / ta ete navaprakārakleśendriyatvānnavānāgāmino bhavanti
# gsum tshan tha ma ni lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi bye brag las kyang khyad par du blta ste / / de dag ni nyon mongs pa dang dbang po'i rnam pa dgu'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba dgu yin no /
kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitāḥ
# 'o na mdo las skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na /
ūrdhvaṃsroturabhedena sapta sadgatayo matāḥ
# gong du 'pho ba ma phye bar / / dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun du 'dod /
ūrdhvaṃ sravaṇadharmā ūrdhvaṃsrotā
# gong du 'gro ba'i chos ni gong du 'gro ba'o /
tasyābhedanirdeśātsapta satpuruṣagatayaḥ sūtre 'bhihitāḥ
# mdo las ni de ma phye bar bstan pa'i phyir mdo las skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba bdun zhes gsungs so /
kasmāt punaretā eva satpuruṣagatayo nānyāḥ śaikṣagatayaḥ
# ci'i phyir 'di dag kho na skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba yin la / / slob pa'i 'gro ba gzhan dag ni ma yin zhe na /
etā hi gatayo yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ satyeva karmāṇi vṛttiḥ kuśale asatyavṛttirakuśale / etāśca gatīrgatānāṃ na punaḥ pratyāgatirasti
# gang dag la 'gro ba 'di dag yod pa de dag ni las dam pa dge ba kho na la 'jug cing dam pa ma yin pa mi dge ba la mi 'jug pa dang 'gro ba 'di dag tu son pa rnams la yang phyir 'ong ba med pa yin la ji skad du bshad pa 'di dag gzhan la ni med pas de'i phyir /
natvetadyathoktamanyatrāsti
# dam pa dam min 'jug mi 'jug /
ataḥ / sadasadvṛttyavṛttibhyāṃ gatāopratyāgateśca tāḥ
# son pa phyir mi 'ong phyir te / / skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba dag yin gyi gzhan dag ni ma yin no /
sapta satpuruṣagatayo nānyā iti / yattarhi sūtre evoktaṃ satpuruṣāḥ katamaḥ / śaikṣyaḥ samyagdṛṣṭacyā samanvāgata iti vistaraḥ
# 'o na mdo kho na las skyes bu dam pa gang zhe na / / slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba rang ldan pa'o zhes rgyas par gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
anyeṣāmapyasti poāryāyikaṃ satpuruṣatvam / pañcavidhasya pāpasyātyantamakaraṇasaṃvarapratilambhāt prāyeṇākuśalaprahāṇācca
