# gzhan dag la yang sdig pa rnam pa lnga gtan mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa mi dge ba phal cher spangs pa'i phyir rnam grangs pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid yid mod kyi /
yeṣāṃ tu niṣparyāyeṇa teṣāmihādhhikāraḥ / kiṃ punaḥ parivṛttajanmano 'pyanāgāmina eṣa bhedo 'sti
# 'dir ni gang dag la rnam grangs med par yod pa de dag gi skabs yin no / / ci phyir mi 'ong ba tshe yongs su gyur pa la yang dbye ba 'di yod dam zhe na /
yasmāt / na parāvṛttajanmāryaḥ kāme dhātvantaropagaḥ / kāmadhātau parāvṛttajanmāntara āryo na dhātvantaraṃ gacchati / anāgāmi phalaṃ prāpya tatraiva janmani parinirvāṇāt
# med de / / 'di ltar / / 'dod par tshe yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags / / khams gzhan du ni 'gro ba med / / 'dod pa'i khams su tshe yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags pa ni khams gzhan du mi 'gro ste / / tshe 'di nyid la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir ro /
rūpadhātau tu parāvṛttajanma kadācidārupyānpraviśati
# gzugs kyi khams su tshe yongs su gyur ba ni gal te na gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu yang 'jug ste /
ya ūrdhvaṃsrotā bhavāgraparamaḥ / yattarhi śakreṇoktaṃ ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ / ante me hīyamānasya tatropapattirbhaviṣyati
# gong du 'pho ba srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug par 'gro ba gang yin pa'o / / 'o na brgya byin gyis / / bdag ni tham nyams na lha gang 'og min zhes / / rnam par grags ba de ni skye bar 'gyur bar shog /
abhidharmā nabhijñatvāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ / bhavatā pyanivāraṇaṃ saṃharṣaṇīyatvā diti / sa cordhvajaśca naivākṣasaṃcāraparihāṇibhāk / sa ca kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmā ūrdhvadhātūpapannaścāryo naivendriyāṇi saṃcarati nāpi kathañcit parihīyate / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ parivṛttajanmāntāsyāryasya rūpārupyapraveśendriyasaṃcāraparihāṇayo neṣyante
# ces gang smras pa ji lta bu zhe na / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re chos mngon ba mngon par mi shes pa'i phyir te / / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba yin ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma bkag go zhes zer ro / / de dang gong mar skyes pa ni / / yongs nyams dbang po 'pho mi bsten / / 'dod pa'i khams su tshe yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags pa de dang khams gong mar skyes ba'i 'phags pa ni dbang po rnams kyang 'di mi 'pho la ji ltar yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro / / ci'i phyir 'phags pa tshe gzhan du yongs su gyur pa gzugs dang gzugs med par 'jug pa dang dbang po 'pho ba dang yongs su nyams pa dag tu mi 'dod ce na /
yasmānna santi / kasmānna santi / janmāntaraparivāsenendriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvādāśrayaviśeṣalābhācca / atha kasmādvītarāgaḥ śaikṣo nāntarāye parinirvāyī bhavati
# 'di ltar med pa'i phyir ro / / ci'i phyir med ce na; tshe rabs gzhan nas yongs su 'dris pas dbang por nams ches yongs su smin pa'i phyir dang rten khyad par can thob pa'i phyir ro / / yang ci'i phyir slob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
mārgasyājitatvādasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt duḥsamatikrāmatvātkāmavātoriti vaibhāṣikāḥ / bahu hyanena kartavyaṃ bhavati / akuśalāmyākṛtakleśaprahāṇaṃ dvitriśrāmaṇyaphalaprāptistridhātusamatikramaśca / taccāntarābhavastho na śaktaḥ kartumiti
# lam ma 'dris pas mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang phra rgyas rnams shin tu chung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar dka' ba'i phyir te / / 'dis nyon mongs pa mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa spangs pa dang dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gnyis sam gsum thob pa dang khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba dang mang po zhig bya dgos la / / de yang srid pa bar ma la gnas pas bya bar mi nus zhes zer ro /
yaduktaṃ sa dhyāne vyavakīrṇe 'kaniṣṭhaga iti
# de ni bsam gtan spel nas 'og min 'gro / / zhes bshad pa /
atha katamaddhacyānaṃ prathamato vyavakīryate
# yang dang po nyid du bsam gtan gang spel bar byed ce na /
ākīryate caturthaṃ prāk / sa hi sarvakarmaṇyaḥ samādhiḥ sukhapratipadāmagracyatvāt / evaṃ ca punaḥ vyavakīryate
# dang por bzhi ba spel bar byed / / ting nge 'dzin ni thams cad pas las su rung ba dang lam sla ba rnams kyi nang na mchog yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'di ltar spel bar byed de /
arhannanāgāmī vā pravāhayuktamanāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
# dgra bcom pa 'am phyir mi 'ong ba yang rung ste zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa rgyun dang ldan pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /
tasmādvacyutthāya pravāhayuktaṃ tadeva sāsravaṃ samāpadyate punaścānāsravam
# de las langs nas de nyid zag pa dang bcas pa rgyun dang ldan pa la snyoms par 'jug la / / yang zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug ste /
evaṃ pravāhāprahāsena yadā kila dvau kṣaṇāvanāsravau samāpadyate dvau sāsravau punaścānāsravāvayaṃ vyavakiraṇasya prayogaḥ / niṣpatti kṣaṇamiśraṇāt
# de bzhin du rgyun phri nas / / gang gi tshe skad cig ma gnyis zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig ma gnyis zag pa dang bcas pa la snyoms bar 'jug la yang zag pa med pa la snyoms par 'jug go zhes grag ste / / 'di ni spel ba'i sbyor ba yin no / / skad cig ma ni bsres pas 'grub /
yadā tvanāsravasya kṣayasyānantaraṃ sāsravaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti sāsravasyānāsravam / evaṃ sāsravasya kṣaṇasyānāsravābhyāṃ miśraṇāt vyavakiraṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gang gi tshe zag pa med pa'i skad cig ma'i mjug thogs su zag pa dang bcas pa mngon sum du byed cing / / zag pa dang bcas pa'i mjug thogs su yang zag pa med pa mngon sum du byed la / / de ltar zag pa dang bcas pa'i skad cig ma dang zag pa med pa dag tu bsres pas spel ba 'grub pa yin te /
dvau hi kṣaṇāvānantaryamārgasadṛśau tṛtī yo vimuktimārgasadṛśa iti
# skad cig ma gnyis ni bar chad med pa'i lam lta bu yin la / / gsum pa ni rnam par grol ba'i lam lta bu yin no zhes zer ro /
evaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vyavakīrya tadvalelnānyānyapi vyavakīryante
# de ltar bsam gtan bzhi pa spel nas / / de'i stobs kyis gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang spel bar byed de /
kāmadhātau triṣu dvīpeṣu prathamaṃ vyavakīryate
# dang por 'dod pa'i khams su gling gsum dag tu spel bar byed la /
paścāt parihīṇena rūpadhātau / aśakyaṃ tu kṣaṇavyavakiraṇamanyatra buddhāt
# phyis ni yongs su nyams pas gzugs kyi khams su spel bar byed do / / sangs rgyas ma gtogs pas skad cig ma spel bar mi nus te /
ata icchātaḥ pravāhatrayasamāpattito niṣpannaṃ bhavatīti paśyāmaḥ
# de'i phyir rgyun chags gsum la ji srid du 'dod par snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya bar blta'o /
kimarthaṃ pounardhyānaṃ vyavakīryate
# ci'i phyir bsam gtan spel bar byed ce na /
upapattivihārārthaṃ kleśabhīrutayā 'pi ca
# skye dang gnas par bya phyir dang / / nyon mongs pas ni 'jig phyir yang /
tribhiḥ kāraṇairdhyānaṃ vyavakiranti / tīkṣṇendriyā anāgāminaḥ śuddhāvāsopapattyarthaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ ca
# rgyu gsum gyis na bsam gtan spel bar byed de / / phyir mi 'ong ba dbang po rnon po rnams ni gnas gtsang ma rnams su skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas bar bya ba'i phyir ro /
mṛdvindriyāḥ kleśabhirutayā cāsvādanāsaṃprayuktasamādhidūrīkaraṇādaparihīṇārtham / arhantastu tīkṣaṇendriyā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārtham
# dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i yang phyir te / / ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thag bsrings pa'i sgo nas yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir ro / / dgra bcom pa dbang po rnon po rnams ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro /
mṛdvindriyāḥ kleśabhīrutvāccāparihīṇārtham / atha kasmāt pañcaiva śuddhāvāsopapattayaḥ
# dbang po rtul po rnams ni nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i yang phyir te / / yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir ro / / yang ci'i phyir gnas gtsang mar skye ba lnga kho na yin zhe na /
yadetadvacyavakīrṇabhāvitaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamuktam / tatpāñcavidhyātpañcaiva śuddhāvāsopapattayaḥ
# bsam gtan bzhi pa spel mar bsgoms par bshad pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa lnga'i phyir; gnas gtsang skye ba lnga kho na /
sā hi vyavakīrṇabhāvanā pañcaprakārā mrdumadhyādhimātrataratamabhedāt
# spel mar bsgom pa de ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang shin tu che ba dang shin tu ches che ba'i bye brag gis rnam pa lnga yin te /
prathamāyāṃ trīṇi cittāni saṃmukhīdriyante / anāsravaṃ sāsravamanāsravaṃ ca
# dang po la ni zag pa med pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa dang po dang sems gsum mngon sum du byed do /
dvitīyāyāṃ ṣaṭ
# gnyis pa la ni drug go /
tṛtīyāyāṃ nava / caturthyāṃ dvādaśa
# gsum pa la ni dgu'o / / bzhi pa la bcu gnyis so /
pañcamyāṃ pañcadaśa
# lnga pa la ni bco lnga ste /
tāsāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pañca śuddhāvāsāḥ phalam / yattatra sāsravaṃ tadvaśātteṣūpapattiḥ
# de dag gi 'bras bu ni grangs bzhin du gnas gtsang ma lnga yin la de la zag pa dang bas pa gang yin pa de'i dbang gas de dag tu skye'o /
śraddhādīndriyādhikyāt pañcetyapare / nirodhalābhyanāgāmī kāyasākṣī punarmataḥ
# gzhan dag na re dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa lhag pa'i phyir lnga yin no zhes zer ro / / 'gog pa thob pa'i phyir mi 'ong / / lus kyis mngon du byed par 'dod /
nirodhalābho 'syāstīti nirodhalābhī / yo hi kaścidanāgāmī nirodhasamāpattilābhī sa kāyasākṣītyucyate / nirvāṇasadṛśasya dharmasya kāyena sākṣātkaraṇāt
# 'di la 'gog pa'i thob pa yod pas na 'gog pa thob pa ste / / phyir mi 'ong ba gang la la 'gog pa thob pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i chos lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir lus kyis mngon sum du thob pa zhes bya'o /
kathaṃ punaḥ kāyena sākṣātkaroti
# ji ltar na lugs kyis mngon sum du byed ce na /
cittābhāvāt kāyāśrayotpatteḥ
# sems med pas lus la brten te skye ba'i phyir ro /
evaṃ tu bhavitavyam / sa hi tasmādvyutthāyāpratilabdhapūrvā savijñānakāṃ kāyaśāntiṃ pratilabhate / yato 'syaivaṃ bhavati śāntā vata nirodhasamāpattirnirvāṇasadṛśī vata nirodhasamāpattiriti / evamanena tasyāḥ śāntatvaṃ kāyena sākṣatkṛtaṃ bhavati / prāptijñānasākṣātkriyābhyāṃ pratyakṣīkāro hi sākṣātkriyā / aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ityatra sūtre ki kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ
# 'di lta bu yin par 'gyur te / / de 'gog pa de las langs nas gang las de ni 'di snyam du kye ma 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra bar zhi ba yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ba rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus zhi ba sngon ma thob pa thob par 'gyur te / / de ltar na 'dis de'i zhi ba nyid du lus kyis mngon du byas pa yin te / / thob pa dang shes pas mngon sum du byed pa dag gis mngon sum du gyur pa ni mngon du byed pa yin no / / mdo las slob pa bco brgyad ces gsungs pa der lus kyis mngon du byed pa ci'i phyir ma gsungs she na /
kāraṇābhāvāt
# rgyu med pa'i phyir ro /
ki punaḥ kāraṇam / anāsravāstisraḥ śaikṣāstatphāṃ ca
# rgyu gang zhig yin zhe na / / zag pa med pa'i slob pa gsum dang de'i 'bras bu ste /
tadviśeṣeṇa hi śaikṣāṇāṃ vyavasthānam / nirodhasamāpattiśca naivaśaikṣānāśikṣā phalam
# de'i khyad par gyis slob pa rnams rnam par gzhag go / / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni slob pa yang ma yin la slob pa'i 'bras bu yang ma yin te /
ato na tadyogācdhaikṣaviśeṣa uktaḥ
# de'i phyir de dang ldan pas slob pa'i khyad par du ma gsungs so /
eṣa tāvadanāgāmināṃ yathāsthūlaṃ bhedaḥ
# 'di ni re zhig phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi dbye ba che long yin no; /
sūkṣmaṃ tu bhidyamānāḥ sahasraśo bhidyante
# zhib tu dbye na ni stong phrag tu dbye ba yod de /
antarāparinirvāyiṇastrayo mṛdumadhyādhimātrendriyabhedāt
# bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la dbang po rtul po dang 'bring po dang rnon po'i bye brag gis gsum mo /
bhūmibhedāccatvāraḥ / parihāṇadharmādigotrabhedāt ṣaṭ
# de dag nyid sa'i bye brag gis bzhi'o / / yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag gis drug go /
sthānāntarabhedāt ṣoḍaśa bhūmivairāgyabhedāt ṣaṭtriṃśat
# gnas gzhan gyi bye brag gis bcu drug go / / sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bye brag gis sum cu rtsa drug ste /
rūpadhatau sakalābandhano yāvaccaturthadhyānāṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ / sthānāntaragotravairāgyendriyabhedādvānavatāni pañcaviṃśatiḥ śatāni
# gzugs kyi khams kyi 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rnam pa brgyad las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar ro / / gnas gzhan dang rigs dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang dbang po'i bye brag gis nyis stong lnga brgyad gu bcu rtsa gnyis te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / ekasmin sthāne ṣaṭ gotrāṇi
# ji ltar byas pas she na / / gnas gcig na rigs drug go /
gotre gotre nava pudgalāḥ sakalabandhano yāvadaṣṭaprakāravītarāgaḥ svasmātsthānāt ṣaṇṇṇavakāni catuṣpañcāśat ṣoḍaśa catuṣpañcāśatkāni catuḥṣaṣṭānyaṣṭau śatāni
# rigs re re la 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa nas rang gi gnas kyi rnam pa brgyad las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar gang zag dgu dgu ste / / dgu drug ni lnga bcu bzhi'o / / lnga bcu rtsa bzhi phrag bcu drug ni brgyad brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi'o / / yang dbang pa'i bye brag gis sum 'gyur te /
indriyabhedāt punastriguṇā ityevaṃ kṛtvā yo 'dharadhyāne navaprakāravītarāgaḥ sa uttare sakalabandhana uktaḥ / samagaṇanārtham
# de ltar byas pas so / / 'dra bar rtse ba'i phyir bsam gtan 'og ma'i rnam pa dgu las 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni gong ma'i 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan par bshad pa yin no /
yathāntarāparinirvāyiṇa evaṃ yavadūrdhvasrotasa ityabhisamasya sarve catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāpyanāgāmināṃ bhavanti
# bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ji lta bar gong du 'pho ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bas thams cad bsdus na phyir mi 'ong ba khri nyis stong dgu brgya drug cu yin no /
ābhavāgrāṣṭabhāgakṣidarhattve pratipakṣakaḥ
# srid rtse'i bar cha brgyad zad pa / / dgra bcom nyid la zhugs ba yin /
anāgāmītyadhikṛtam / sa khalvayamanāgāmī prathamadhyānaikaprakāravairāgyāt prabṛti yāvat bhavāgrāṣṭaprakāraprahāṇādarhattvapratipannako bhavanti
# phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa ste / / yang phyir mi 'ong ba de bsam gtan dang po'i rnam pa gcig las 'dod chags dang bral ba nas bzung ste / / srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam par brgyad kyi bar spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid la zhugs pa yin no /
navamasyāpyānantaryapathe
# dgu yi bar chad med lam yang /
navamasyāpi bhāvāgrikasya prakārasya prahāṇāyānantaryamārge so 'rhattvapratipannaka eva / vajropamaśca saḥ
# de srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa dgu pa spong bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam la gnas pa na / / yang dgra bcom pa nyid la zhugs pa kho na yin no / / de ni rdo rje lta bu yin /
sa cānantaryamārgo vajropamaḥ samādhirityucyeta / sarvānuśayabheditvāt
# bar chad med pa'i lam de ni phra rgyas thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o /
bhinnatvādasau na punaḥ sarvān bhinatti
# bcom zin pa'i phyir 'dis thams cad 'joms pa ni ma yin gyi /
sarvāstu bhettuṃ samarthaḥ / sarvānantaryamārgāṇāmadhimātratamatvāt
# bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad kyi nang nas shin tu che ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad 'joms bar nus pa yin no /
vajropamānāṃ tu bahubhedaṃ varṇayanti
# rdo rje lta bu rnams kyi bye brag ni rnam ba mang po zhig tu brjod de /
anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītā bhāvāgrikaduḥkhasamudāyālambanairduḥkhasamudayānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau / nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau / nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāḥ prathamadhyānanirodhālambanāścatvāraḥ / evaṃ yāvat bhavāgranirodhālambanāścatvāraḥ / mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāścatvāraḥ
# mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la dmigs pas sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa brgyad dang 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes ba'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs pa ldan pa brgyad dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bsam gtan dang po'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa bzhi nas de bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i bar du bzhi dang lam la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bzhi ste / / rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa zad par la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / de dag ni shes pa'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu lnga bcu rtsa gnyis yin no /
kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣasyālambanāt / ta ime jñānākārālambanabhedabhinnā dvāpañcāśadvajropamā bhavanti / yathā 'nāgāmyasaṃgṛhītā evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītāḥ / ākāśavijñānānantyākiñcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā yathāsaṃkhyamaṣṭāviṃśatiścaturviṃśativiṃśatiśca bhavanti
# mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa ji lta bar bsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa'i bar dag kyang de dang 'dra'o / / nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas dang ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa rnams ni grangs bzhin du nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang nyi shu yin te /
teṣu dharmajñānasyādhobhūminirodhālambanasya cānvayajñānasyābhāvāt / adhobhūmipratipakṣālambanaṃ tu bhavati / tasyānyo 'nyahetutvāditi / yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānamapyekaikabhūmipratipakṣālambanamiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatimadhikān prakṣīpyānāgamyasaṃgṛhītā aśītirvajropamā bhavanti / evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyāna saṃgṛhītāḥ / ākāśānantyāyatanādiṣu yathākramaṃ catvāriṃśat dvātriṃśaccaturviśatiśca bhavanti / punargotrendriyabhedāt bhūyāṃso bhavanti / yastvasau bhāvāgriko navamaḥ prakāra ukto yasya vajropamena prahāṇaṃ / tatkṣayāptyā kṣayajñānaṃ / tasya punarnavamasya prakārasya saha kṣayaprāptyā kṣayajñānamutpadyate / vajropamasamādheranantaraṃ paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ / ata eva tatkṣayajñānaṃ sarvāsravakṣayaprāptisahajatvātprathamataḥ
# de dag ni chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pas sa 'og ma'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro / / sa 'og mi'i gnyen po la dmigs pa ni yod de / / de ni phan tshun du rgyu pa'i phyir ro; / / gang dag lam la rjes su shes pa yang sa re re'i gnyen po la dmigs pa yin par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na nyi shu rtsa brgyad lhag par bsnan nams mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa rdo rje lta bu ni brgyad cu yin te / / bsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o / / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa dag ni go rims bzhin du bzhi bcu dang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin no / / yang rigs dang dbang po'i bye brag gis ni ches mang ba yin no / / gang srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa dgu par bshad pa rdo rje lta bus spangs pa gang yin pa / / de zad thob dang zad pa shes / / rnam pa dgu pa de zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig tu zad pa shes pa skye ste / / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mjug thogs su rnam par grol ba'i lam tham skye ba yin no / / de nyid kyi phyir de ni dang po nyid du zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba'i phyir zad pa shes pa yin no /
aśaikṣo 'rhannasau tadā / utpanne ca punaḥ kṣayajñāne so 'rhattvapratipannakaḥ aśaikṣo bhavatyarhaścārhattvaphalaprāptaḥ / phalāntaraṃ prati punaḥ śikṣitavyābhāvādaśaikṣaḥ / ata eva sa paramārtaṃ karaṇārthatvāt sarvasarāgapūjārhattvāccārhanniti siddhaṃ bhavatyanye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti
# de tshe de mi slob dgra bcom / / yang dgra bcom pa nyid la zhugs pa de zad pa shes pa skye nas mi slob pa dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob pa yin te / / 'bras bu gzhan gyi phyir slob par bya ba ma med pa'i phyir mi slob pa yin no / / de nyid kyi phyir de ni gzhan gyi don byed par 'os pa'i phyir dang 'dod chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa yin no / / gang zag sngar bshad pa gzhan bdun ni slob pa dag yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
kena te śaikṣāḥ / āsravakṣayāya nityaṃ śikṣaṇaśīlatvācchikṣātraye adhiśīlamadhicittamadhiprajñaṃ ca
# ci'i phyir de dag slob pa yin zhe na / / zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir bslab pa gsum po lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab la rtag tu slob pa'i dang tshul can yin pa'i phyir to /
tāḥ punaḥ śīlasamādhiprajñāsvabhāvāḥ / pṛthagjano 'pi śaikṣaḥ prāpnoti
# de dag ni tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin dag yin no / / so so'i skye bo yang slob pa yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
na / yathābhūtaṃ satyāprajñānāt punaścāpaśikṣaṇāt / ata eva dvirabhidhānaṃ sūtre śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣāyāṃ śikṣata iti śivakatasmācchaikṣa ityucyata iti
# ma yin te / / bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir dang yang slob ba gtong ba'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir ci nas kyang gang zhig slob pa de kho na slob pa yin gyi slob pa 'dor ba ni ma yin no zhes dmigs kyis bsal ba shes par bya ba'i phyir mdo las /
yaḥ śikṣata eva nāpaśikṣate sa śaikṣa ityavadhāraṇaṃ yathā vijñāyeta
# zhi byed bslab pa la slob cing / / bslab pa la slob pas ni de'i phyir slob pa zhes bya'o zhes lan gnyis su gsungs so /
prakṛtistha āryaḥ kathaṃ śikṣaṇaśīlaḥ
# 'phags pa rang bzhin du gnas pa ji ltar slob pa'i dang tshul can yin zhe na /
āśayataḥ / sthitādhvagavat prāptyanuṣaṅgataśca ṣikṣātrayasya / atha śaikṣā dharmāḥ katame
# bsam pa'i sgo nas te / / lam du 'gro ba gnas pa bzhin no / / thob pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i yang phyir ro / / yang slob pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
śaikṣasyānāsravāḥ / aśaikṣāḥ katame
# slob pa'i zag pa med pa rnams so / / mi slob pa rnams gang zhe na /
aśaikṣasyānāsravāḥ
# mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa rnams so /
nirvāṇaṃ kasmānna śaikṣam
# ci'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa slob pa ma yin zhe na /
aśaikṣapṛthagjanayorapi tadyogāt
# mi slob pa dang so so'i skye bo gnyi ga yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro; /
kasmānnāśaikṣam / śaikṣapṛthagjanayorapi tadyogāt
# ci'i phyir mi slob pa ma yin zhe na / / slob pa dang so so'i skye bo gnyi ga yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
ta ete sarva evāṣṭāvāryapudgalā bhavanti / pratipannakāścatvāraśca phale sthitāḥ
# de dag thams cad ni zhugs pa bzhi dang 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi dang 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad kho na yin te /
tadyathā srota āpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ srota āpannaḥ / evaṃ yāvadarhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratiṃpannako 'rhanniti
# 'di lta ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang rgyun du zhugs pa nas de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang dgra bcom pa'i bar yin no /
nāmata ete 'ṣṭau bhavanti / dravyatastu pañca / prathamaḥ pratipannakaścatvāraśca phalasthāḥ
# ming gi sgo nas ni brgyad yin no / / rdzas su ni lnga yin te / / zhugs pa dang po dang 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi'o /
śeṣāṇāṃ pratipannakānāṃ triphalasthāvyatirekāt
# zhugs pa lhag ma rnams ni 'bras bu la gnas pa gsum las tha mi dad ba'i phyir ro /
anupūrvādhigamaṃ pratyevamucyate / bhūyaḥkāmavītarāgau tu syātāṃ darśanamārge sakudāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakau na ca srota āpanna sakṛdāgāmināviti / dvividho hi bhāvanāmārga ukto laukiko lokottaraśceti / kenāyaṃ śaikṣaṃḥ kuto vairāgyaṃ prāpnoti / lokottareṇa vairāgyaṃ bhavāgrāt
# mthar gyis 'thob ba'i phyir de skad ces bshad kyi / / phal cher dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba dag cig yin na ni mthong ba'i lam la lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa dag yin gyi / / rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag ni ma yin no / / bsgom pa'i lam 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa la / / slob pa 'di gang gis gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob ce na / / 'jig rten 'das kyis srid rtse las /
na laukikena / ki kāraṇam / tata ūrdhva laukikābhāvāt svabhūmikasya vā pratipakṣatvāt / kasmānna pratipakṣaḥ
# chags bral 'jig rten pas ni ma yin no / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / de'i gong na 'jig rten pa med pa'i phyir dang rang gis pa'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / ci'i phyir gnyen po ma yin zhe na /
tatkleśānuśayitatvāt / yo hi kleśo yatra vastunyanuśete na tasya tadvastu oprahāṇāya saṃvartate yasya ca yaḥ pratipakṣo na tatra sa kleśo 'nuśete iti
# de'i nyon mongs pa rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir te / / nyon mongs pa gang zhig dngos po gang la rgyas par 'gyur ba de ni dngos po des spong bar byed pa ma yin la / / gang gi gnyen po gang yin pa de la ni nyon mongs pa de rgyas par yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
anyato dvidhā
# gzhan las rnam pa gnyis /
bhavāgrādanyataḥ sarvato bhūmelaukikenāopi vairāgyaṃ lokottareṇāpi
# srid pa'i rtse mo las gzhan pa'i sa thams cad las ni 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis kyang 'dod chags dang bral la /
tatra punaḥ / laukikenāryavairāgye visaṃyogāptayo dvidhā / laukikena mārgeṇāryavairāgyaṃ gacchato dvividhā visaṃyogaprāptaya utpadyante laukikyo lokottarāśca
# 'jig rten las 'das pas kyang 'dod chags dang bral lo / / 'jig rten pa yis chags bral ba'i / / 'phags la bral ba'i thob rnams gnyis / / 'phags pa 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa la bral ba'i thob pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang rnam pa gnyis skye'o /
lokottareṇa cetyeke
# kha cig 'jig rten 'das kyis kyang /
lokottareṇāpyevamityapare / kiṃ kāraṇam / tyavate kleśāsamanvayāt
# gzhan dag na re 'jig rten las 'das pas kyang de dang 'dra'o zhes zer ro / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / btang la nyon mongs mi ldan phyir /
yadi hyāryamārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ prāpnuvato laukikī visaṃyogaprāpotirnotpadyate evaṃ sati ya āryamārgeṇākiñcanyāyatanādvītarāgo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati sakṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgātkevalaphalamārgalābhāccordhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyogenāsamanvāgataḥ syāt / tyakte ca tasmin taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syāditi
# gal te 'phags pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob pa la 'jig rten pa'i bral ba'i thob pa mi skye na / / de lta na 'phags pa'i lam gyis ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral ba bsam gtan la brten te dbang po rnams 'pho bar byed pa gang yin pa de lam snga ma zad par btang pa'i phyir dang 'bras bu'i lam 'ba' zhig thob pa'i phyir sa gong ma pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bral ba dang mi ldan par yang 'gyur la / / de btang na yang nyon mongs pa de dag dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro /
bhavāgrādhavimuktordhvajātavattvasamanvayaḥ / asatyāmapi tu tasyāṃ laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau na taiḥ samanvāgamaḥ syāt / tadyathā bhavāgrādardha prakāravimuktasyāsatyāmapi tu laukikyāṃ tadvisaṃyogaprāptau tyaktāyāmapi cendriyasaṃcāreṇa lokottarāyāṃ na punastaiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavati / yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmerurdhvaṃ jātasya kāmāvacarakleśavisaṃyogaprāptityāgānna punastaiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatītyajñāpakametat
# srid rtse'i phyed las rnam grol dang / / gong du skyes pa bzhin mi ldan / / de la 'jig rten pa'i bral ba'i thob pa med du zin kyang de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur te / / dper na srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa phyed la rnam par grol ba la de'i bral ba'i 'thob pa 'jig rten pa yang med la / / dbang po 'pho bas 'jig rten las 'das pa yang btang bzhin du nyon mongs pa de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba dang yang dper na so so'i skye bo bsam gtan dang po yan chad du skyes pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bral ba'i thob pa btang bas yang de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba bzhin bas 'di ni shes par byed pa ma yin no /
katapayā punarbhūmyā kuto vairāgyaṃ bhavati
# sa gang zhig gis gang las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur zhe na /
anāsraveṇa vairāgyamanāgāmyena sarvataḥ
# zag med mi lcogs med pa yis / / thams cad las ni 'dod chags bral /
ābhavāgrāt / atha yaḥ sāmantakaṃ niśrityādharabhūmivairāgyaṃ prāpnoti kimasyānantaryamāgavatsarve vimuktimārgāḥ sāmantakādbhavanti
# srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar las so / / yang gang zhig nyer bsdogs la brten te sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob na / / ci'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam thams cad bar chad med pa'i lam bzhin du nyer bsdogs las skye'am zhe na /
netyāha
# smras pa /
kiṃ tarhi / dhyānātsāmantakādvā 'ntyo mukti mārgastribhūjaye
# ma yin no / / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / sa gsum rgyal la bsam gtan nam / / nyer bsdogs las mtha'i rnam grol lam /
nava hyapapattibhūmayaḥ / sarvakāmadhāturaṣṭau ca dhyānārupyāḥ
# skye ba'i sa ni thams cad du dgu ste / / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad do /
tatra yāvat dvitīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ tribhūmijayaḥ / tasmin paścimo vimuktimārgaḥ sāmantakādbhavati dhyānādvā maulāt
# de la bsam gtan gnyis kyi bar las 'dod chags dang bral ba sa gsum las rgyal ba de la ni rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma nyer bsdogs sam bsam gtan dngos gzhi las skye'o /
nordhvaṃ sāmantakāt
# gong ma'i nye bar bsdogs las min /
tribhūmijayādūrdhvaṃ maulādeva na punaḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyasāmānyāt / triṣu hi dhyāneṣu sāmantakamaulayorindriyabhedāt kaścinna śaknoti maulaṃ dhyānaṃ praveṣṭum / indriyasaṃcārasya duṣkaratvāt
# sa gsum las rgyal ba yan chad ni btang snyoms kyi dbang po thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir dngos gzhi kho na las skye'i nyer bsdogs las ni ma yin no / / bsam gtan gsum na ni nyer bsdogs dang dngos gzhi gnyis kyi dbang po tha dad pa'i phyir la la bsam gtan dang dngos gzhi la 'jug mi nus te / / dbang po'i 'pho ba ni dka' ba'i phyir ro /
atastribhūmivairāgye dhyānasāmantakādapyanyo vimuktimārgo bhavati
# de lta bas nas gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma nyer bsdogs las kyang skye'o / / zag med mi lcogs med pa yis /
anāsraveṇa vairāgyamanāgamyena sarvata ityuktamanyaistu noktam
# thams cad las ni 'dod chags bral / / zhes bshad kyi gzhan dag gis ni ma bshad pas de'i phyir /
ata ucyate / āryairaṣṭābhiḥ svordhvabhūjayaḥ
# 'phags / / brgyad kyis rang gong sa las rgyal / / zhes bya ba smos te /
anāsravairaṣṭābhirdhyānadhyānāntarārupyaiḥ svasyā ūrdhvāyāśca bhūmervairāgyaṃ nādharāyā vītarāgatvāt / tatra lokottarā ānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ satyālambanatvātsatyākārapravṛttā iti siddham
# zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang gzugs med pa brgyad kyis ni rang gi sa dang sa gong ma las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro / / 'og ma las ni ma yin te / / 'dod chags dang bral zin pa'i phyir ro / / de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni bden pa la dmigs pa'i phyir bden pa'i rnam par zhugs pa dag yin no zhes bya bar grub po /
vimuktyānantaryapathā laukikāstu yathākramam / śāntādyudārādyākārāḥ
# 'jig rten pa yi rnam grol dang / / bar chad med lam go rims bzhin / / zhi sogs rags sogs rnam pa can /
vimuktimārgāḥ śāntādyākārā ānantaryamārgā audārikādyākārāḥ / te punaryathākramam / uktarādharagocarāḥ / vimuktimārgā uttarāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsarṇataścākārayanti saṃbhavataḥ
# rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa can dag yin la / / bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can dag yin no / / de dag kyang go rims bzhin du / / gong dang 'go ma'i spyod yul can / / rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni ci rigs par sa gong ma la zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par blta'o /
ānantaryamārgā adharāṃ bhūmimaudārikato duḥkhilataḥ sthūlabhittikataśca / aśāntatvādaudarikato mahābhisaṃskārataratvāt
# bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni sa 'go ma la rags pa dang tha ma ngan pa dang rtsig pa stug po lta bur blta ste / / mngon par 'du byed pa shin tu che ba nyid kyis ma zhi ba'i phyir rags pa blta'o / / gya nom pa ma yin pa'i phyir tha ba ngan par blta ste /
apraṇītatvāt duḥkhilato bahudauṣṭhulyataratvena pratikūlabhāvāt
# gnas ngan len rab tu mang ba nyid kyis mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir ro /
sthūlabhittikatastayaiva tadbhūmyaniḥsaraṇāt bhittyaniḥsaraṇavat
# rtsig pa las nges par mi 'byung ba bzhin du de nyid kyis sa de las nges par mi 'byung ba'i phyir rtsig pa steg po lta bur blta'o /
eṣāṃ viparyayeṇa śāntapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārāḥ
# de dag las bzlog pa ni zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa can dag yin no /
gata mānuṣaṅgikam
# zhar la 'ongs pa rdzogs so /
idaṃ tu vaktavyam / atha kṣayajñānākanantaraṃ kimutpadyate
# dkyus ma kho na brjod par bya ste; yang zad pa shes pa'i mjug thogs su ci zhig skye zhe na /
yadyakopyaḥ kṣayajñānādanutpādamatiḥ / akopyadharmā cedarhanbhavati kṣayajñānātsamanantaramanutpādajñānamasyotpadyate
# gal te mi g yo zad shes las / / mi skye'i blo gros / / gal te dgra bcom pa mi g yo ba'i chos can zhig yin na de la zad pa shes pa'i de ma thag tu mi skye ba'i shes ba skye'o /
na cet / kṣayajñānamaśaikṣī vā dṛṣṭiḥ
# gal te min / / zad pa shes sam mi slob lta /
na cedakopyadharmā bhavati kṣayajñānāt kṣavajñānamevotpadyate aśaikṣī vā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ
# gal te mi g yo ba'i chos can ma yin na ni zad pa shes pa las zad pa shes pa kho na'am / / mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye'o /
na tvanutpādajñānaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāt
# yongs su nyams pa srid pa'i phyir mi skye bshes pa ni ma yin no /
kiṃ punarakopoyadharmaṇaḥ sā naivotpadyate
# ci mi g yo ba'i chos can la de mi skye ba kho na yin nam zhe na /
sarvasya sā 'rhataḥ / akopyadharmaṇo 'pyanutpādajñānātkadācidanutpādajñānamevotpadyate kadācidaśaikṣī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ
# de ni dgra bcom thams cad la / / mi g yo ba'i chos can la yang res 'ga' mi skye ba shes pa las mi skye ba shes pa kho na skye la / / res 'ga' ni mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye'o /
yānyetāni catvāri phalānyuktāni kasyaitāni phalāni / śramaṇyaphalāni
# gang dag 'bras bu bzhir bshad pa de dag gang gi 'bras bu dag yin zhe na dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu yin no /
kimidaṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ nāma / śrāvaṇyamamalo mārgaṃḥ
# dge sbyong gi tshul zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig ce na / / dge sbyong tshul ni dri med lam /
anāsravo mārgaḥ śramaṇyam
# dge sbyong gi tshul ni zag pa med pa'i lam yin no /
tena hhi śramaṇo bhavati / kleśasaṃśamanāt
# des nyon mongs pa yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i sgo nas dge sbyong du 'gyur te / / mdo las /
śamitā anena bhavanti anekavidhāḥ ṣāpakā akuśalā dharmā vistareṇa yāvajjarāmaraṇīyāstasmācchramaṇa ityucyata iti sūtre vacanāt
# 'dis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos zhes bya ba nas rgyas par rga shir 'gyur ba'i bar rnam pa du ma zhi bar byas pa yin pas / / de'i phyir dge sbyong zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
anatyantaśamanānna pṛthagjanaḥ paramārthaśramaṇaḥ / tasya punaḥ śrāmaṇyasya
# so so'i skye bo ni gtan du zhi bar mi byed pa'i phyir don dam pa'i dge sbyong ma yin no /
saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ phalam / saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtāni hi śrāmaṇyaphalāni punaścatvāryuktāni sūtre / api tu
# dge sbyong gi tshul de'i 'bras bu 'dus byas 'dus ma byas / / dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams yin no / / de dag kyang mdo las rnam pa bzhir gsungs so /
ekānnanavatistāni / kāni punastāni / muktimārgāḥ saha kṣayaiḥ / darśanaheyaprahāṇāyāṣṭāvānantryamārgā aṣṭau vimuktimārgā bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāya navasu bhūmiṣu pratyekaṃ nava prakārāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya tāvanta evānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca
# gzhan yang de dag brgyad cu rtsa dgu'o / / de dag kyang gang zhe na / / grol lam zad pa rnams dang bcas / / mthong bas spang bar bya ba spong bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam brgyad dang rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba spong bar byed pa sa dgu po re re zhing yang nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu dgu spong bar byed pa de snyed kho na'i bar chad med pa'i lam dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dag go /
tatrānantaryamārgāḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ vimuktimārgāḥ saṃskṛtāni śrāmaṇyaphalāni
# de la bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni dge sbyong gi tshul yin no / / rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu 'dus byas dag yin te /
tanniṣyandapuruṣakāraphalatvāt / teṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānyasaṃskṛtāni śrāmaṇyaphalāni
# de'i rgyu mthun pa dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro / / nyon mongs pa de dag gi spangs pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu 'dus ma byas dag yin te /
evamekānnanavatirbhavanti
# de ltar brgyad cu rtsa dgu yin no /
evaṃ tarhi buddhasyopasaṃkhyānaṃ kartavyaṃ jāyate / na kartavyam
# de ltar na 'o na ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa kha bskang bar bya dgos par 'gyur ro zhe na / / bya mi dgos te /
yadyapi bhūyāṃsi phalāni
# gal te yang 'bras bu rnams mang mod kyi /
catuṣphalavyavasthā tu pañakāraṇasaṃbhavāt / yasyāṃ hi prahāṇamārgāvasthāyāṃ pañca kāraṇāni saṃbhavanti tasyāṃ kia bhagavatā phalaṃ vyavasthāpitam / katamāni pañca
# 'bras bu bzhi rnam gzhag pa ni / / rgyu lnga dag ni srid phyir ro / / bcom ldan 'das kyis spong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs gang la rgyu lnga srid pa de la 'bras bu rnam par gzhag go zhes grag go / / lnga gang zhe na /
pūrvatyāgo 'nyamārgāptiḥ kṣayasaṃkalanaṃ phale
# 'bras la sngon lam btang ba dang / / gzhan thob pa dang zad bsdoms dang shes pa brgyad tshan thob pa dang /
jñānāṣṭakasya lābho 'tha ṣoḍaśākārabhāvanā / pūrvamārgatyāgo 'pūrvamārgāptiḥ pratipannakaphalamārgatyāgalābhāt
# rnam pa bcu drug thob pa'o / / lam snga ma btang ba dang sngon med pa'i lam thob pa ni zhugs pa dang 'bras bu'i lam btang ba dang thob pa'i phyir ro /
prahāṇasaṃkalanaṃ sarvasyaikaprāptilābhāt / yugapadaṣṭajñānalābhaścaturvidhanāṃ dharmānvayajñānānām
# spangs pa bsdoms pa ni thams cad kyis thob pa cig rnyed pa'i phyir ro / / shes pa brgyad cig car du 'thob pa ni chos dang rjes su shes pa rnam pa bzhi'o /
ṣoḍaśākārabhāvanā anityādyākārāṇām
# rnam pa bcu drug thob pa ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa la sogs pa ste /
imāni hi pañca kāraṇāni phale phale bhavanti / yadyanāsravo mārgaḥ śrāmaṇyaṃ kathaṃ laukikamārgaprāptaṃ phaladvayaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaṃ yujyate
# rgyu lnga po de dag ni 'bras bu re re la yod do / / gal te zag pa med pa'i lam kho na dge sbyong gi tshul yin na 'jig rten ba'i lam gyis thob pa'i 'bras bu gnyis ji ltar dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bur rung zhe na /
laukikāoptaṃ tu miśratvānāsravāptiḥ dhṛteḥ phalalm / na hi tatra laukikamārgaphalamev prahāṇaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā bhavatyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā
# 'jig rten pa yis thob 'bras ni / / bsres dang zag med thob 'dzin phyir / / de la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'bras bu spangs pa kho na yang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / darśanamārgaphalamapi prahāṇaṃ tatra miśrīkriyate
# 'o na ci zhe na / / mthong ba'i lam gyis 'bras bu spangs pa yang der bsre bar bya ste /
sarvasya tatphalasaṃgṛhītaikavisaṃyogaprāptilābhāt
# thams cad kyi thob pa de'i 'bras bur bsdus pa cig rnyed pa'i phyir ro /
ata eva hi sūtra uktaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ katamat
# de nyid kyi phyir mdo las / / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na /
yattrayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇaṃ rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tatutvamiti / anāgāmiphalaṃ katamat
# kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pa dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams bsrabs pa gang yin pa de yin na / / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang zhe na /
yaduta pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇamiti / anāsravayā ca visaṃyogāprāptyā tatprahāṇaṃ sadhāryate / tadvalena parihīṇāmaraṇāt / ato 'pyasya maraṇaṃ yuktaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalam
# kun du sbyor ba tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga spangs pa gang yin pa de yin no zhes gsungs so / / de'i stobs kyis yongs su nyams pa mi 'chi ba'i phyir bral ba'i thob pa zag pa med pas spangs pa de 'dzin par yang byed de / / 'di'i phyir yang 'di dge sbyong gi 'bras bu nyid du rigs so /
yadeva caitacchrāmaṇyayuktaṃ
# dge sbyong gi tshul du bshad pa gang yin pa /
brāhmaṇyaṃ brahmacakraṃ ca tadeva
# de nyid tshangs tshul tshangs pa yi / / 'khor lo /
kleśānāṃ vāhanādvāhmaṇyaṃ brahmacakraṃ tu
# nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i tshul lo / / tshangs pa'i 'khor lo ni /
brahmāvartanāt
# tshangs pas bskor phyir ro /
anuttarabrahmaṇyayogāt bhagavānbrahmā / eṣa hi bhagavān brahmā ityapi śāntaḥ śītībhūta ityapīti sūtrāt
# bcom ldan 'das ni tshangs pa'i tshul bla na med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir tshangs pa yin te / / mdo las / / bcom ldan 'das de ni tshangs pa zhes kyang bya / / zhi ba dang bsil bar gyur pa zhes kyang bya zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
tasyedaṃ cakramiti brāhmaṃ tena prartitatvāt
# 'khor lo 'di ni de'i yin pas na tshangs pa'i 'khor lo ste / / des bskor pa'i phyir ro /
dharmacakraṃ tu dṛṅmārgaḥ
# chos kyi 'khor lo mthong ba'i lam /
caṅkramaṇāccakraṃ tatsādharmyāddarśanamārgo dharmacakram
# rgyu bas na 'khor lo'o / / de dang chos mthun pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam ni chos kyi 'khor lo yin no /
kathamasya sādharmyam / āśugatvādyarādibhiḥ
# 'di'i chos mthun pa ji lta bu zhe na / / myur bar 'gro sogs rtsibs sogs kyis /
āśugatvāttyajanakramaṇāt ajitajayajitādhyavasanādutpatananipattanācca / evamāśugatvādibhiḥ arādibhiḥ sādharmyādāryāṣṭāṅṅgo mārgaścakramiti bhadantaghoṣakaḥ
# myur du 'gro ba'i phyir dang 'dor ba dang 'jug pa'i phyir dang ma rgyal ba rgyal bar byed pa dang rgyal ba rnal du dgod pa'i phyir dang 'phar ba dang 'bab pa'i phyir te / / myur bar 'gro ba la sogs pa ni de lta bu yin no / / btsun pa dbyangs sgrogs na re 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rtsibs la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa'i phyir 'khor lo zhes bya ste /
samyagdṛṣṭisaṃkalpavyāyāmasmṛtayo hyarasthānīyāḥ
# yang dag pa'i lta ba dang rtog pa dang rtsol ba dang dran pa rnams ni rtsibs lta bu yin no /
samyagvākkarmāntājīvā nābhisthānīyāḥ samādhirnemisthānīya iti darśanamārgo dharmacakramiti
# yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams ni lte ba lta bu yin no / / ting nge 'dzin ni mu khyud lta bu yin no zhes zer ro /
kuta etat āryakauṇḍinyasya tadutpattau pravarttitaṃ dharmacakramiti vacanāt / kathaṃ tattriparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca
# mthong ba'i lam chos kyi 'khor lo yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na 'phags pa koondi n+ya la de skyes pa na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / ji ltar na de lan gsum du bzlas pa dang rnam pa bcu gnyis yin zhe na / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyam
# 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o /
tat khalu parijñeyaṃ tat khalu parijñātamityete trayaḥ parivartāḥ
# de yongs su shes par bya'o / / de yongs su shes so zhes bya ba 'di dag ni lan gsum du bzlas pa yin no /
ekaikasmiṃśca parivarte cakṣurudapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhirudapādi ityete dvādaśākārāḥ
# bzlas pa re re la mig skyes so / / shes pa dang rigs pa dang blo skyes so zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rnam pa bcu gnyis yin te /
pratisatyemevaṃ bhavanti
# bden pa re re la yang de dang 'dra'o /
trikadvādaśakasādharmyāttu triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāramuktam / dvayasaptasthānakauśalādeśanāvat / ebhiśca parivartairdarśanabhāvanāśaikṣamārgā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ darśatā iti vaibhāṣikāḥ / yadyevaṃ na tarhi darśanamārga eva triparivartto dvādaśākāra iti kathamasau dharmacakraṃ vyavasthāpyate
# gsum tshan dang bcu gnyis su chos mthun pa'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te / / rnam pa bcu gnyis zhes bshad de / / gnyis dang gnas bdun la mkhas pa bstan pa bzhin no / / bzlas pa 'di dag gis ni grangs bzhin du mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams bstan to zhes zer ro / / gal te de lta na 'o na ni mthong ba'i lam kho na la lan gsum du bzlas pa yang ma yin la rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang ma yin na ji ltar na mthong ba'i lam 'di chos kyi 'khor lor rnam par gzhag /
tasmātsa eva dharmaparyāyo dharmacakraṃ triparirtaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ ca yujyate / kathaṃ ca punastriparivartam
# de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid chos kyi 'khor lo yang yin lan gsum du bzlas pa dang rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang yin par rung ngo / / ji ltar na lan gsum du bzlas pa yin zhe na /
satyānāṃ triḥ parivarttanāt
# bden pa rnams lan gsum du bzlas pa'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ dvādaśākāram
# ji ltar na rnam pa bcu gnyis yin zhe na /
caturṇāṃ satyānāṃ tridhākaraṇāt
# bden pa rnams la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung /
duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti
# 'gog pa / / lam zhes bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya / / spang bar bya /
parijñeyaṃ praheyaṃ sākṣātkartavyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti
# mngon sum du bya / / bsgom par bya zhes bya ba dang / / yongs su shes spangs /
parijñātaṃ prahīṇaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ bhāvitamiti
# mngon sum du byas / / bsgoms zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum du byas pa'i phyir ro /
tasya punaḥ pravartanaṃ parasaṃtāne gamanamarthajñāpanāt
# de bskor ba ni gzhan gyis rgyud la go bar byed pa ste / / don shes par byed pa'i phyir ro /
athavā sarva evāryamārgo dharmacakraṃ veneyasaṃtānakramaṇāt / tattu parasaṃtāne darśanamārgotpādanādvartayitumārabdhamataḥ pravartitamityucyate
# yang na 'phags pa'i lam thams cad kyang gdul bya'i rgyud la 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo yin te / / de ni gzhan gyi rgyud la mthong ba'i lam bskyed pa'i phyir bskor bar brtsams pa yin pas de'i phyir bskor ba zhes bya'o /
atha kasmindhātau kati śrāmaṇyaphalāni prāpyante / kāme trayāptiḥ / kāmadhātāveva trayāṇāṃ śrāmaṇyaphalānāṃ prāptirnānyatra
# yang khams gang du dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu du dag cig 'thob ce na / / 'dod par gsum thob / / gsum ni 'dod pa'i khams kho nar 'thob kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no /
antyasya triṣu
# tha ma ni / / gsum du /
antyaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalamarhatvaṃ tasya triṣu dhātuṣu prāptiḥ
# dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu tha ma ni dgra bcom pa nyid de / / de ni khams gsum du 'thob po /
phaladvayasya tāvadavītarāgaprāpyatvādūrdhvamaprāptiryuktā
# re zhig 'bras bu gnyis ni 'dod chags dang ma bral bas thob bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir gong mar mi 'thob par yang rigs na gsum pa go /
tṛtīyasya tu kasmādaprāptiḥ / nordhvaṃ hi dṛkpathaḥ / ūrdhvaṃ hi kāmadhātordarśanamārgo nāsti / na ca tena vinā 'sti vītarāgasyānāgāmi phalaprāptirityetat kāraṇam / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra darśanamārgo nāsti / ārupyeṣu tāvat śravaṇābhāvādadhodhātvanālambanācca / rūpadhātau tu
# ci'i phyir mi 'thob ce na / / gong na mthong lam med / / 'dod pa'i khams las gang na ni mthong ba'i lam med la / / de med par yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa med pas zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no / / ci'i phyir de na mthong ba'i lam med ce na / / re zhig gzugs med pa'i khams na ni nyan pa med pa dang khams 'og ma la mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro; / / gzugs kyi khams na ni /
asaṃvegādiha vidhā tatra niṣṭheti cāgamāt
# mi skye lung las 'dir rtsom zhing / / der mthar phyin zhes 'byung phyir ro /
rūpāvacarā hi pṛthagjanāḥ samāpattimukhasaṅgā duḥkhavedanābhāvācca na saṃvijante / na ca vinā saṃgenāryamārgaḥ śakto labdhum / iyaṃ tāvadyuktiḥ / āgamo 'pyayaṃ pañcānāṃ pudgalānāmiha vidhā tatra niṣṭhā antarāparinirvāyiṇo yāvadūrdhvaṃsrotasa iti
# gzugs na spyod pa'i so so'i skye bo rnams ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba la chags pa'i phyir dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med pa'i phyir kun du skyo bar mi 'gyur la / / skyo ba med bar yang 'phags pa'i lam thob par mi 'gyur te / / 'di ni re zhig rigs pa yin no / / lung yang / / bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas na gong du 'pho ba'i bar gang zag lnga ni 'dir rtsom zhing der mthar phyin bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa 'di yin no /
vidhā hi mārgarambho nirvāṇopāyatvāt / idamuktaṃ yadyakopyaḥ kṣayajñānādanutpādamati riti / tatra kimarhatamapyasti bhedaḥ
# rtsom pa zhes bya ba ni lam rtsom pa yin te / / mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'di skad du / / gal te mi g yo'i zad shes la / / mi skye blo gros zhes bshad de / / ci dgra bcom pa la yang dbye ba yod dam zhe na smras pa yod de /
astītyucyate
# dgra bcom drug 'dod /
ṣaḍarhanto matāḥ / sūtra uktaṃ ṣaḍarhantaḥ parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇā dharmā sthitākampoyaḥ prativedhanābhavyo 'kopyadharmā ceti
# mdo las dgra bcom pa drug gsungs te / / yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang rjes su srung ba'i chos can dang gnas pa las mi bskyod pa dang rtogs pa'i skal ba can dang mi g yo ba'i chos can no /
teṣāṃ pañca śraddhādhhimuktijāḥ
# de dag las / / lnga ni dad pas mos las skyes /
akokpyadharmāṇaṃ varjayitvā 'nye pañca śraddhādhimukti pūrvakāḥ
# mi g yo ba'i chos can ma gtogs pa gzhan lnga ni dad pas mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dag yin no /
vimuktiḥ sāmayikyeṣām
# de dag rnam grol dus dang sbyor /
eṣāṃ ca pañcānāṃ sāmayikī kānta cetovimuktirveditavyā
# lnga po 'di dag gi sems kyi rnam par grol ba ni dus dang sbyor bas 'phangs pa yin par rig par bya ste /
nityānurakṣyatvāt
# rtag tu rjes su srung ba'i phyir ro /
ata evaite samayavimuktā ucyante
# de nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni dus kyi rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o /
samayāpekṣāścaite 'dhimuktāśceti samayavimuktā madhyapadalopāt dhṛtaghaṭavat / eṣāṃ hi samayāpekṣāsamādhisaṃmukhībhāva upakaraṇārogyadeśaviśeṣāpekṣatvāt
# 'di dag ni dus la ltos pa yang yin la rnam par grol ba yang yin pas dus kyi rnam par grol ba dag ste / / bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pa'i phyir mar gyi bum pa bzhin no / / 'di dag gi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur pa ni yo byad dang nad med pa dang yul gyi bye brag la ltos pa'i phyir dus la ltos pa yin no /
akopyākopyadharmaṇaḥ
# mi g yo'i chos can mi g yo ba /
akopyadharmaṇastvakopyā vimuktiḥ / kopayitumaśakyatvādaparihāṇitaḥ / ato 'samayamukto 'sau
# mi g yo ba'i chos can gyi rnam par grol ba ni yongs su mi nyams pa'i sgo nas g yo bar mi nus pa'i phyir mi g yo ba yin no / / de'i phyir de dus mi sbyor grol /
ata evāsamayavimukti ucyate / sa hyasamayāpekṣāvimuktiśca / icchātaḥ samādhisaṃmukhībhāvāt
# de nyid kyi phyir de ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba ste / / de ni 'dod dgur ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur ba'i phyir dus la mi ltos par rnam par grol ba yin no /
kālāntarātyantavimuktito vā kopyākopyadharmaṇoḥ samayāsamaye vimuktatvaṃ parihāṇisaṃbhavāsaṃbhavataḥ
# yang na yongs su nyams pa srid pa dang mi srid pa'i sgo nas dus gzhan gyi bar dang gtan du rnam par grol ba'i phyir dus kyi rnam par grol ba dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba nyid yin no /
dṛṣṭipraptānvayaśca saḥ
# de ni mthong thob rgyu las byung /
sa cākopyadharmā dṛṣṭiprāptapūrvako veditavyaḥ
# mi g yo ba'i chos can de ni mthong bas thob pa sngon du 'gro ba yin par rig par bya'o /
kiṃ punarete ṣaḍarhanta ādita eva tadgotrā bhavantyatha paścāt
# ci dgra bcom pa drug po 'di dag dang po kho na nas de'i rigs can kho na dag cig yin nam / / 'on te phyis yin zhe na /
tadgotrā āditaḥ kecitkeciduttāpanāgatāḥ
# kha cig dang po nas de'i rigs / / kha cig sbyangs pa las gyur to /
kaścitprathamata eva cetanādharmagotrako bhavati / kaścitpunaḥ parihāṇadharmā bhūtvendriyāṇāmuttāpanayā cetanādharmatāṃ gataḥ
# kha cig ni dang po nyid nas 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can gyi rigs can yin la kha cig ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can du gyur pa las dbang po rnams sbyangs pas 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can du gyur pa yin te /
evaṃ yāvadakoopyadharmatāṃ gato veditavyaḥ
# mi g yo ba'i chos can du gyur ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o /
tatra parihāṇadharmā yaḥ parihātuṃ bhavyo na cetanādidharmā / cetanādharmā yaścetayituṃ bhavyaḥ / anurakṣaṇādharmā yo 'nurakṣituṃ bhavyaḥ / sthitākampyo yaḥ parihāṇipratyayaṃ balavantamantareṇānurakṣannapi sthātuṃ bhavyo na hātuṃ nāpi vardhayituṃ vinābhiyogena
# de la yongs su nyams pa'i chos can ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i skal ba dang ldan gyi 'chi bar sems pa la sogs pa'i chos can ni ma yin pa gang yin pa'o / / 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can ni 'chi bar sems par 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa'o / / rjes su srung ba'i chos can ni rjes su srung bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa'o / / gnas pa las mi bskyod pa ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i rkyen stobs dang ldan pa med na rjes su ma bsrungs kyang gnas par 'gyur ba'i skal ba can yin zhing nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang mngon par brtson pa med na 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa'o /
prativedhanābhavyo yo 'kopyaḥ prativeddhaṃ bhavyaḥ
# rtogs pa'i skal pa can ni mi g yo ba rtogs par 'gyur ba'i skal pa can gang yin pa'o /
akopyadharmā yo naiva parihātuṃ bhavyaḥ / prathamau dvau pūrvameva śaikṣāvasthāyāṃ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogavikalau / tṛtīyaḥ sātatyaprayogī
# mi g yo ba'i chos can ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa de kho na'o / / dang po gnyis ni sngon slob pa'i gnas skabs kho na na rgyun du sbyor ba dang gus par sbyor ba med pa yin no / / gsum pa ni rgyun du sbyor ba yin no /
caturthaḥ satkṛtyaprayogī
# bzhi pa ni gus par sbyor ba yin no /
pañcama ubhayathāprayogī mṛdvindriyastu / ṣaṣṭha ubhayathāprayogī tīkṣṇendriyaśca
# lnga pa ni gnyi gar sbyor ba pa ni yin la dbang po rtul po yin no / / drug pa ni gnyi gar sbyor ba dang dbang po rnon po yin no /
nacāvaśyaṃ varihāṇadharmā parihīyate nāpi yāvat prativedhanābhavyaḥ pratividhyati / saṃbhavaṃ tu pratyevamucyate
# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yang gdon mi za bar yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin la / / rtogs pa'i skal ba can gyi bar du yang rtogs bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi srid ba'i phyir de skad ces bshad do /
evaṃ kṛtvā dhātutraye 'piṣaḍarhanto yujyante
# de ltar byas na khams gsum char na yang dgra bcom pa drug yod par rung ngo /
yeṣāṃ tvavaśyaṃ parihīyate yāvat pratividhyati teṣāṃ kāmadhātau ṣaṭ rūpārupyadhātvoḥ sthitākampyo 'kopyadharmā ca
# gang dag gi gdon mi za bar yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba nas mngon par rtogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ba de dag gi ltar na 'dod pa'i khams na ni drug go / / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na ni gnas pa las mi bskyod ba dang mi g yo ba'i chos can dang gnyis te /
tayoḥparihāṇicetanendriyasaṃcārābhāvāt / kaḥ punareṣāṃ kutaḥ parihīyate / phalāt gotrādvā
# de gnyis na yongs su nyams pa dang 'chi bar sems pa dang dbang po 'pho ba med pa'i phyir ro / / 'di dag las gang zhig 'bras bu 'am rigs gang las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro zhe na /
gotrāccaturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ phalāddhāniḥ
# bzhi ni rigs las lnga 'bras las / / nyams 'gyur /
cetanādharmādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ gotrātparihāṇiḥ / na hi parihāṇadharmā punaḥ svagotrāt parihīyate
# 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can la sogs pa bzhi ni rigs las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro / / yongs su nyams pa'i chos can ni rang gi rigs las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro /
parihāṇadharmādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ phalāt parihāṇiḥ / teṣāmapi tu
# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa lnga ni 'bras bu las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro / / de dag kyang /
na pūrvakāt / yasya yat prathamagotraṃ sa tasmānna parihīyate
# dang po las ma yin / / gang gi rigs dang po gang yin pa de las ni de yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te /
śaikṣāśaikṣamārgābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkutatvāt / śaikṣastu laukikalokattarābhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt na parihīyate svagotrāt / yattu paścāt pratilabdhamuttāpanayā tasmāt parihīyate / yasya ca yat prathamaṃ phalaṃ sa tasmānā parihīyate
# slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro / / slob pa ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro / / phyis sbyangs pas thob pa gang yin pa de las ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro / / gang gi 'bras bu dang po gang yin pa de las kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro /
śeṣāt parihīyate / ata eva srota āpattiphalānnāsti parihāṇiḥ / evaṃ ca kṛtvā parihāṇadharmaṇastrayaḥ prakārā bhavanti
# lhag ma las ni yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro / / de nyid kyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa med do / / de ltar byas na yongs su nyams pa'i chos can ni rnam pa gsum yin te /
tadavasthasya parinirvāṇamindriyasaṃcāraḥ
# de'i so na gnas pa bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang dbang po 'pho ba'am /
parihāya vā śaikṣatvam
# yongs su nyams nas slob pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o /
cetanādharmaṇaścatvāraḥ / eta eva trayaḥ parihāṇadharmagotrapratyāgamanaṃ ca / evamanyeṣāṃ trayāṇāmekaikaprakāravṛddhacyā yathākramaṃ pañca ṣaṭ sapta prakārā veditavyāḥ / yasya ca yat prathamaṃ gotraṃ sa parihāya śaikṣobhūtastatraivāvatiṣṭhate nānyasmin / anyathā hi tadgotraviśeṣa labhād vṛddhirevāsya syānna parihāṇiḥ / kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prathamānām nāsti parihāṇiḥ
# 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can ni bzhi ste / / gsum po de dag nyid dang yongs su nyams pa'i chos can gyi rigs su slar 'ong ba'o / / de bzhin du gsum la yang re re bskyed de / / go rims bzhin du rnam pa lnga dang drug dang bdun yin par rig par bya'o / / de slob par gyur na gang gi rigs dang po gang yin pa de kho na la gnas kyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin no; / / de lta ma yin na rigs khyad par can rnyed pa'i phyir de 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur gyi yongs su nyams par ni mi 'gyur ro / / ci'i phyir 'bras bu dang po las yongs su nyams pa med ce na /
darśanaheyānāmavastukatvāt
# mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams gzhi med pa'i phyir te /
ātmādhiṣṭhānapravṛttā hyete / satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakatvāt
# de dag ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir bdag gi gzhi la 'jug pa can yin na bdag de yang med do /
sa cātmā nāstīti / asadālambanāstarhi prāpnuvanti / nāsadālambanāḥ
# 'o na med pa la dmigs par 'gyur ro zhe na / / bden pa la dmigs pa'i phyir med pa la dmigs pa ni ma yin gya phyin ci log te dmigs pa dag ni yin no /
satyālambanatvāt / vitathālambanāstu / katamaśca kleśo naivamasti viśeṣaḥ / ātmadṛṣṭihi rūpādike vastuni kārakavedakavaśavartitvenātmatvamabhūtamadhyāropayati tadadhiṣṭhānānuvṛttāścāntagrāhadṛṣṭacyādaya ityavastukā ucyante
# de lta ma yin pa'i nyon mongs pa gang zhig yin zhe na / / khyad par yod de / / bdag tu lta ba ni bdag med bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang dbang bsgyur ba nyid du bdag yang dag ba ma yin pa sgro 'dogs par byed la / / mthar 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang de'i gzhi la zhugs pa yin pas gzhi med pa dag ces bya'o /
bhāvanāheyāstu rāgapratighamānāvidyā rūpādike vastuni kevalaṃ saktyāghātonnatyasaṃprakhyānabhāvena vartanta iti savastukā ucyante / asti ca tacdhrātādimātraṃ yatra teṣāṃ pravṛttayaḥ na tvātmādileśo 'pi
# bsgom pas spang bar bya ba 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang ma rig pa rnam pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la chags pa dang kun nas mnar sems dang khengs pa dang mi gsal ba'i ngo bor zhugs pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pas gzhi dang bcas pa dag ces bya ste / / gang la de dag 'jug par 'gyur ba sdug pa la sogs pa tsam de ni yod kyi / / bdag la sogs pa ni bdag kyang med do / / gzhan dag ni 'di skad ces zer te /
tathā hi bhāvanāheyānāmasti pratiniyataṃ vastumanāpāmanāpalakṣaṇaṃ na tu darśanaheyānāmātmādilakṣaṇam
# 'di ltar bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams la ni gzhi yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid so sor nges pa yod kyi / / mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams la ni bdag la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid med de /
tasmādapyavastukāucyante / api khalvāryasyānupanidhyāyataḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣāt kleśa utpadyate nopanidhyāyato rajjvāmiva sarpasaṃjñā / na cānupanidhyāyata ātmadṛṣṭacyādīnāmupapattiryujyate santīrakatvāditi nāsti darśanaheyakleśa prahāṇātparihāṇiḥ
# de lta bas na gzhi so sor nges pa med pa dag ces bya'o / / gzhan yang 'phags pa des par mi rtog pa la dran pa nyams pas nyon mongs pa rnams skye bar 'gyur gyi nges par rtog pa la ni ma yin te / / thag pa la sprul gyi 'du shes bzhin no / / nges par mi rtog pa la ni bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa 'byung bar mi rung ste / / kun du rtog par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / de lta bas na mthong bas spang bar bya ba spangs pas sa dang po las yongs su nyams pa med do /
arhatvādapi nāsti parihāṇiriti sautrāntikāḥ
# mdo sde ba rnams na re dgra bcom pa nyid las kyang yongs su nyams pa med do zhes zer te /
eṣa eva canyāyaḥ / kathamidaṃ gamyate
# de nyid rigs pa yin no / / 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
āgamādyuktitaśca
# lung dang rigs pa las so /
kathamāgamāt / taddhi bhikṣavaḥ prahīṇaṃ yadāryayā prajñayā prahīṇamityuktam / ādyantayośca phalayorāryayaiva prajñayā 'dhigamaḥ / śaikṣasya cāpramādakaraṇiye 'pramādakaraṇīyaṃ vadāmī tyuktaṃ nā 'rhataḥ / arhato 'pyahamānanda lābhasatkāramantrāyakaraṃ vadāmītyatra sūtre dṛṣṭadhamesukhavihāramātrādeva parihāṇiruktā / yā tvanenākopyacetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā / tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇaṃ vadāmīti coktam
# lung las ji lta bu zhe na / / dge slong dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis spangs pa gang yin pa de ni spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang slob pa la bag yod pa la bag yod par bya'o zhes dang smra'o gsungs kyi dgra bcom pa la ni ma yin no / / kun dga' bo dgra bcom pa la yang rnyed pa dang bkur stis bar chad byed pa yin par nga smra'o zhes gsungs pa'i mdo de las ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa tsam kho na las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gsungs par zad de / / 'dis sems rnam par grol ba mi g yo ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de las ni rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs so /
sāmayikyā astīti cet
# gal te dus dang sbyor ba la yod do zhe na /
vayamapyevaṃ brūmaḥ
# kho bo cag kyang de skad ces ni zer ro /
sā tu vicāryā / kimarhattvamāhosviddhacyānānīti / maulo hi dhyānasamādhiḥ samaye saṃmukhībhāvātsāmayikī cimuktirityucyate / dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ ca punaḥ punareṣaṇīyatvātkāntetyucyate
# ci de dgra bcom pa nyid yin nam / / 'on te bsam gtan pa rnams yin zhes bya ba dpyad par byas te / / bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ni dus su mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba zhes kyang bya la mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir yang dang yang du btsal bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba zhes kyang bya'o /
āsvādanīyatvādityapare / arhattvavimuktistu nityānugatatvānna yujyate / yadi cārhattvāt parihaṇisaṃbhavo 'bhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ bhagavānādhicetasikebhya eva dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇimavakṣyat / ato gamyate sarvasyaivārhato vimuktirakopyādṛṣṭadhrmasukhavihāretyustu
# gzhan dag na re ro myang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro / / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rnam par grol ba ni rtag tu rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir dus dang sbyor ba yin par yang mi rung la / / yang don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba yang ma yin no / / gal te yang dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa srid pa zhig tu gyur na / / ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par lhag pa'i sems las byung ba dag kho na las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar gsungs par gyur te / / de'i phyir dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ni mi g yo ba yin par khong du chud do /
kaścit lābhasatkāravyākṣepadīṣāt parihīyate vaśitvabrhaśādyo mṛdvindriyaḥ
# mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dag las ni la la ni rnyed pa dang bkur stis g yen sbyo ba'i nyes pas dbang nyams pa'i phyir yongs su nyams par 'gyur te /
kaścinna parihīyate yastīkṣṇendriyaḥ / tatra yaḥ parihīyate sa parihāṇadharmā / yo na parihīyate so 'parihāṇadharmā / evaṃ cetanādharmādayo 'pi yojyāḥ / aparihāṇadharmasthitākampyākopyadharmaṇāṃ ko viśeṣaḥ / aparihāṇadharmā 'nuttāpanāgataḥ / akopyadharmā tūttāpanāgataḥ
# dbang po rtul po gang yin pa'o / / la la yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te / / dbang po rnon po gang yin pa'o / / de la gang zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yin la / / gang zhig yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur pa de ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin te / / de bzhin du 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o / / yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can dang gnas pa las mi bskyod pa dang mi g yo ba'i chos can rnams la khyad par ci yod ce na / / yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can ni sbyangs pa las gyur pa ni ma yin la / / mi g yo ba'i chos can ni sbyangs pa las gyur pa yin te /
tau hi yaṃ yameva samāpattiviśeṣamutpādayatastasmānna parihīyete
# de gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gang kho na skyed par byed pa de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro /
sthitākampyastu yasminneva guṇe sthitastasmātkevalaṃ na parihīyate na tvanyamutpādayati / utpādayati vā tasmāttu kampata ityeva viśeṣo lakṣyate
# gnas pa las mi bskyod pa ni yon tan gang kho nal gnas pa de las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi / / gzhan yang skyed par mi byed pa'am / / skyed par byed na yang de las g yo bar 'gyur ba yin pas 'di ni khyad par yin par mngon no /
āyuṣmānbhautikaḥ śaikṣībhūtaḥ sāmayikyā vimukteratyāsvādanānmṛdvindriyatvāccabhīkṣṇaṃ parihīyamāṇo nirviṇnaḥ śastramādhārayan kāyajīvitanirapekṣatvānmaraṇakāla evārhattvaprāptaḥ parinirvṛttaśca / tasmātso 'pi nārhattvāt parihīṇaḥ
# tshe dang ldan pa gnag tshogs can slob par gyur pa ha cang ro myang ba'i phyir dang dbang bo rtul po yin pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba pa las yang dang yang du yongs su nyams pa dang yi chad nas lus dang srog la mi lta bar mtshon gyis 'debs par byed la / / 'chi ba'i dus kho nar dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das par yang gyur te / / de lta bas na de yang dgra bcom pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa ma yin no /
daśottare coktam / eko dharma utpādayitavyaḥ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktiḥ
# bcu las 'phros pa las kyang bskyed par bya ba'i chos ni gcig ste / / sems rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba yid du 'ong ba yin no /
eko dharmaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ akopyā cetovimuktiriti / yadi cārhattvaṃ sāmayikī kāntā cetovimuktirabhaviṣyat kimarthaṃ tatraiva daśake 'rhattvasya dvigrahaṇamakariṣyāt
# mngon sum du bya ba'i chos ni gcig ste / / sems rnam par grol ba mi g yo ba yin no zhes gsungs te / / gal te sems rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba pa yid du 'ong ba dgra bcom pa nyid kho na yin par gyur na; ci'i phyir bcu tshan de kho na las dgra bcom pa nyid lan gnyis su smos par 'gyur /
na ca kvacidarhattvamutpādayitavyamuktam
# dgra bcom pa nyid bskyed par bya ba yin par ni gang du yang ma gsungs so /
kiṃ tarhi
# 'o na ci zhe na /
sākṣātkartavyaṃ mṛdvindriyasaṃgṛhītaṃ cārhattvamutpādayitavyamiti / kimanena jñāpitaṃ bhavati
# mngon sum du bya ba yin no / / dbang po rtul pos bsdus pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid bskyed par bya ba yin no zhe na / / yang 'dis ci zhig shes par bya ba yin /
yadi tāvadutpādayituṃ śakyamityadapi śakyam
# re zhig gal te bskyed par bya bar nus pa yin no zhe na ni / / gzhan yang nus so /
athotpādanamarhatīti / anyatsutarāmarhati
# 'on te bskyed par 'os pa yin no zhe na ni gzhan ches shin tu 'os pa yin te /
tasmānna sāmayikī vimuktirarhattvam / kathaṃ tarhi samayavimukto 'rhannucyate
# de lta bas na rnam par grol ba dus dang sbyor ba pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no / / 'o na dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom pa zhes ji skad ces bya zhe na /
yasya mṛdvindriyatvātsamayāpekṣaḥ samādhisamukhībhāvaḥ
# gang zhig dbang po rtul po'i phyir ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du 'gyur ba dus la ltos pa yin no /
viparyayādasamayavimuktaḥ / abhidharme 'pi coktaṃ tribhiḥ sthāneḥ kāmarāgānuśayasyotpādo bhavati / kāmarāgānuśayio 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra iti
# bzlog pa ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba yin no / / chos mngon pa las kyang / / gnas gsum gyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas skye bar 'gyur te / / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes pa yin / / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris par gyur pa'i chos rnams kyang snang bar gyur pa yin / / de la yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin zhes gsungs so /
paripūrṇotpattirevamiti cet / kasya vā paripūrṇakāraṇasyotpattiḥ
# gal te de lta bu ni rgyu yongs su tshang ba las skyes pa yin no zhe na / / rgyu yongs su ma tshang bar go gang zhig skye zhe na /
evaṃ tāvadāgamāt / kathaṃ yuktitaḥ / yadi tāvadarhatastadrūpaḥ pratipakṣa utpanno yena kleśā atyantamanutpattidharmatāmāpannāḥ kathaṃ punaḥ parihīyate / atha notpannaḥ
# re zhig lung las ni de lta bu yin no / / rigs pa las ji lta bu zhe na / / re zhig gal te dgra bcom pa la gang gis na nyon mongs pa rnams gtan tu mi skye ba'i chos nyid du gyur pa de lta bu'i gnyen po zhig skyes na ni ji ltar na yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur /
kathaṃ kṣīṇāsravo bhavati / atyantamanayoddhratāyāṃ tadbījadharmatāyāmakṣīṇāsravo vā punaḥ kathamarhanbhavatītyevaṃ yuktiḥ
# 'on te ma skyes te de'i sa bon gyi chos nyid gtan du rtsa nas ma bton na ni ji ltar zag pa zad pa yin / / zag pa ma zad na yang ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid yin te /
aṅgārakarṣūpomaṃ sūtraṃ tarhi parihāryam / yatredamuktaṃ tasya khalu śrutavata āryaśrāvakasyaivaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ kadācitkarhicit smṛtisaṃpramoṣādutpadyante pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā iti / sa hi tatrārhanneva jñāpitaḥ
# rigs pa las ni de lta bu yin no / / 'o na ni gang las 'di skad du 'phags pa nyan thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar spyod pa de ltar gnas pa de brgya la res 'ga' zhig dran pa nyams pa las sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa sol ba'i phung po lta bu'i mdo'i lan gdab dgos so / / de ni de las dgra bcom pa kho na yin par bstan te /
dīrgharātra vivekanimnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati yāvannirvāṇaprāgbhāramiti vacanāt
# yun ring po nas sems dben ba la gzhol ba yin zhes bya ba nas / / mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
arhato hyetadbalamanyatroktam
# gzhan las de ni dgra bcom pa'i stobs yin par yang gsungs la /
sarvairāsravasthānīyairdharmaiḥ śītībhūtaṃ vāntībhūtamiti cābhidhānāt astyetadevam / yāvattu cāro na supratibaddhastāvadevaṃ carato 'pi śaikṣasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ kleśotpattāviti śaikṣāvasthāmadhikṛtyaivaṃ vacanādadoṣaḥ / pratijñāyate hi laukikamārgapratilabdhātphaladvayātparihāṇiḥ
# zag pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos thams cad las ni bsil bar gyur cing bsil bar gyur pa zhes kyang gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / de skad du 'byung ba yang yod mod kyi ji srid du spyod pa legs par ma rtogs pa de srid du slob pa de ltar spyod pa la yang nyon mongs pa 'byung ba srid pa yod pas slob pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbang du mdzad nas de skad du gsungs pa'i phyir nyes pa med do /
arhattvādapi tu parihāṇiṃ varṇayanti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni dgra bcom pa nyid las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar brjod do /
kiṃ punarime 'rhanta eva ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti athānye 'pi ṣaḍgotrā bhavanti
# ci dgra bcom pa de dag kho na rigs drug dang ldan nam / / 'on te gzhan dag kyang rigs drug dang ldan zhe na /
śaikṣānāryāśca ṣaḍgotrāḥ / śaikṣapṛthagjanā apyevaṃ ṣaḍgotrāḥ
# slob dang 'phags min rigs drug ldan / / slob pa dang so so'i skye bo rnams kyang de bzhin du rigs drug dang ldan te /
tatpūrvakāṇyeva hyarhatāṃ gotrāṇi
# dgra bcom pa'i rigs rnams ni de dag sngon du 'gro ba yin no /
api tu / saṃcāro nāsti darśane
# gzhan yang / / mthong ba la ni 'pho ba med /
darśanamārgādanyatrendriyasaṃcāro bhavati / prayogāsaṃbhavānna darśanamārge
# mthong ba'i lam las gzhan pa la dbang po 'pho ba yod kyi sbyor ba mi srid pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni ma yin no /
kaścit pṛthagjanāvasthāyāmindriyāṇi saṃcarati / kaścicchaddhādhimuktāvasthāyām / yadidaṃ sūtra uktaṃ ye tvanena catvāra ādhicaitasikā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārā adhigatāstato 'hamasyānyatamānyatamasmāt parihāṇiṃ vadāmi yā tvanenaikākinā yāvadakopyā cetovimuktiḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtā tato 'haṃ na kenacit paryāyeṇa parihāṇiṃ vadāmīti / kathamakopyadharmaṇo dṛṣṭdharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇiḥ
# la la ni so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs na dbang po rnams 'pho'o / / la la ni dad pas mos pa'i gnas skabs na'o / / mdo las 'di skad du / / 'dis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa lhag pa'i sems las byung ba bzhi thob pa gang dag yin pa de las gang yang rung ba zhig las 'di yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar ni nga smra'i 'di gcig pus sems kyi rnam par grol ba mi g yo ba'i bar du lus kyis mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de las ni 'di'i rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar na mi smra'o zhes gang gsungs pa yang ji ltar na ma g yo ba'i chos can mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dag las yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhe na /
parihāṇistridhā jñeyā prāptāprāptopabhogataḥ / prāptaparihāṇiryadi pratilabdhāt guṇāt parihīyate
# thob dang ma thob nyer spyad las / / yongs nyams rnam pa gsum shes bya / / gal te yon tan thob pa las yongs su nyams na thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no /
aprāptaparihāṇiryadi prāpyaṃ guṇaṃ na prāpnoti / upabhogaparihāṇiryadi prāptaguṇaṃ na saṃmukhīkaroti
# gal te yon tan thob par bya ba ma thob na ma thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no / / gal te yon tan thob pa mngon sum du mi byed na nye bar spyod pa las yongs su nyams pa yin no /
āsāṃ punaḥ parihāṇīnām
# yongs su nyams pa 'di rnams las /
antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā
# ston pa tha ma mi g yo la / / bar ma 'ang gzhan la rnam gsum mo /
buddhasyopabhogaparihāṇireva nānyā / akopyadharmaṇaḥ sā cāprāptaparihāṇiśca
# sangs rgyas lan nye bar spyad pa las yongs su nyams pa kho na mnga'i gzhan ni mi mnga'o / / mi g yo ba'i chos can la ni de dang ma thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yang yod de /
pudgalaviśeṣadharmāprāpaṇāt / anyasyārhataḥ prāptaparihāṇirapyasti
# gang zag khyad par can gyi chos ma thob pa'i phyir ro / / dgra bcom pa gzhan la ni thob pa las yongs su nyams pa yang yod do /
ata upabhogaparihāṇivacanādakopyadharmaṇaḥ sūtravirodhaḥ
# de'i phyir mi g yo ba'i chos can nye bar spyad pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdo dang mi 'gal lo /
sarvasyānāsravā vimuktirakopyā / akopyadharmavyavasthānaṃ tu yathā tathoktam / ata etadcodyamityaparihāṇivādī
# yongs su mi nyams par smra ba na re thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa ni mi g yo ba yin la / / mi g yo ba'i chos can du ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa ni de bzhin du bshad zin pa de'i phyir 'di ni klan kar mi rung ngo zhes zer ro /
atha yoi 'rhatphalātparihīyate kimasau punarjāyate
# yang gang zhig dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu las yongs su nyams na ci de yang skye 'am zhe na /
nāstyetat / yasmāt / mriyate na phalabhraṣṭaḥ / naiva hi kaścitphalāt parihīṇaḥ kālaṃ karoti
# de lta bu ni med de / / 'di ltar / / 'bras las nyams pa 'chi ba med / / 'bras bu las yongs su nyams pa ni 'ga' yang 'chi ba med de /
dhandhā bhikṣava āryaśrāvakasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣā atha ca punaḥ kṣipramevāntaṃ parikṣayaṃ sapadi saṃgacchanīti sūtre vacanāt
# mdo las / / dge slong dag 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa la dran pa nyams pa chung du 'byung mod kyi 'on kyang yang myur ba kho nar nub pa dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
anyathā hyanāśvāsikaṃ brahmacaryaṃ syāt / yataśca phalāt parihīyate tatphalasthena yadakāryaṃ
# de lta ma yin na tshangs par spyod pa yid brtan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro / / 'bras bu gang zhig las yongs su nyams pa ni 'bras bu de la gnas pas bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa'i /
tādakāryaṃ karoti na / parihīṇo 'pi saṃstatphalaviruddhāṃ kriyāṃ na karoti
# bya ba ma yin de mi byed / / yongs su nyams kyang 'bras bu de dang 'gal ba'i bya ba mi byed de /
śūrapraskhalanāpatanavat
# rtsal po che bred pa rdeg mi 'cha' ba bzhin no /
athendriyāṇi saṃcaratāṃ katyānantaryavimuktimārgā bhavanti
# yang dbang po rnams 'pho ba la bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam du dag cig skye zhe na /
vimuktyānantaryapathā navokopye
# mi g yo rnam grol bar chad med / / lam dgu'o /
akopyagotre pratividhyamāne pritivedhabhāvanābhavyasya navānantaryamārgā vimuktimārgāśca bhavanti
# rtogs pa'i skal ba can zhig mi g yo ba'i rigs can rtogs par byed na bar chad med pa'i lam dgu dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu skye ste /
yathārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ
# dper na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa bzhin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
atisevanāt / tasya mṛdvindriyagotraṃ bhavatīti nālpena vyāvarttayituṃ śakyate / śaikṣāśaikṣa mārgabhyāṃ dṛḍhīkṛtatvāt / dṛṣṭacyāptatāyāmekaikaḥ / dṛṣṭiprāptāyāṃ pratividhyamānāyāmeka evānantaryamārgo bhavatyeko vimuktimārgaḥ / prayogamārgastu sarvatraika eva / te punaḥ sarva evānantaryavimuktimārgāḥ
# dbang po rtul po'i rigs de shin tu brten phyir ro / / des dbang po rtul po'i rigs de shin tu goms par byas pa yin pas 'bad pa chung dus bzlog par mi nus te / / slob pa dang mi slob pa'i lam dag gis brtan por byas pa'i phyir ro / / mthong bas thob la re re'o / / mthong bas thob pa rtogs par byed na bar chad med pa'i lam gcig kho na dang rnam par grol ba'i lam gcig kho na skye'o / / sbyor ba'i lam ni thams cad du gcig kho na yin no / / bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam de dag thams cad ni /
anāsravāḥ
# zag med /
na hi sāsraveṇa mārgeṇāryāṇāmindriyasaṃcāraḥ
# 'phags pa rnams kyi dbang po ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam gyis 'pho ba med do /
kva punarindriyāṇi vardhante
# dbang po rnams gang du 'pho zhe na /
nṛṣu vardhanam
# mi yi nang du 'pho /
manuṣyeṣvevendriyasaṃcāro nānyatra
# mi rnams kyi nang kho nar dbang po 'pho'i gzhan du ni ma yin te /
parihāṇyasaṃbhavāt / kaḥ punaḥ katamāṃ bhūmi niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati / aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ
# yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro / / gang zhig sa gang la brten nas dbang po rnams 'pho bar byed ce na / / mi slob pa dgu la brten te /
anāgamyasyānantaraṃ catvāri dhyānāni trīṇi cārupyāṇi / śaikṣastu ṣaṭ
# mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa gsum pa la'o / / slob pa drug la /
ārupyavarjyaḥ / kiṃ kāraṇam
# gzugs med pa rnams ma gtogs so / / ci'i phyir zhe na /
yataḥ / saviśeṣaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā phalamāpnoti vardhayan / indriyāṇi hi saṃcaran phalaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ ca mṛdvindriyamārgaṃ tyaktvā tīkṣṇendriyagotrakaṃ phalamārgameva pratilabhate / na cānāgāmiphalamārupyabhūmisaṃgṛhītamastītyetat kāraṇam
# gang gi phyir; 'phel ba 'bras bu khyad par can / / btang ste 'bras bu thob par 'gyur / / dbang po rnams 'pho ba na dbang bo rtul po'i lam gyi 'bras bu dang 'bras bu khyad par can btang ste dbang po rnon po'i rigs kyi lam gyi 'bras bu kho na 'thob par 'gyur na / / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzugs med pas bsdus pa ni med do zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no /
ta ete ṣaḍevārhanto nava bhavanti / indriyabhedāt
# dgra bcom pa 'di dag thams cad ni dbang po'i bye brag las dgu kho na yin te /
kathaṃ kṛtvā
# ji ltar byas pas shi na /
dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ / katame sapta śrāvakāḥ
# sangs rgyas gnyis dang nyan thos bdun / / de dgu dbang po rnam dgu can / / nyan thos bdun gang zhe na /
parihāṇadharmādayaḥ pañca / akopyadharmā ca dvividha uttāpanāgata āditaśca tadgotraḥ akopyabheda eva / dvau buddhau pratyekabuddho buddhaśca
# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa lnga dang mi g yo ba'i chos can rnam pa gnyis te / / sbyangs pa las gyur pa dang dang po nas de'i rigs can no / / sangs rgyas gnyis ni mi g yo ba'i bye brag kho na yin te / / rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas so /
ityate mṛdumṛdvādinavaprakārendriyabhedānnava pudgalā bhavanti / sarva eva tvāryapudgalāḥ sapta bhavanti / śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī śraddhādhimukto dṛṣṭioprāptaḥ kāyasākṣī prajñāvimukta ubhayatovimuktaśca
# de ltar na de dag ni chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa dbang po rnam ba dgu'i bye brag gis gang zag dgu yin no / / 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni thams cad du bdun yin te / / dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang dad pas mos pa dang mthong bas thob pa dang lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa dang shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o /
ete punaḥ / prayogākṣasamāpattivimuktyubhayataḥ kṛtāḥ
# gang zag bdun po de dag kyang sbyor ba dang dbang po snyoms 'jug rnam grol dang /
pudgalāḥ sapta
# gnyi gas byas pa'o /
prayogataḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇau / pūrvameva parapratyayadharmānusārābhyāmartheṣu prayogāt
# sbyor ba las ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag ste / / dang po nyid nas gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag gis don rnams la sbyor ba'i phyir ro /
indriyata śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptau
# dbang po las ni dad pas mos pa dang mthong bas thob pa dag ste /
mṛdutīkṣṇendriyatvāt śraddhādhimokṣaprajñādhikyataḥ
# dad pas mos pa dang shes rab lhag pa'i sgo nas dbang po rtul po dang rnon po yin pa'i phyir ro /
samāpattitaḥ kāyasākṣī nirodhasamāpatti sākṣātkaraṇāt / vimuktitaḥ prajñāvimuktaḥ
# snyoms par 'jug pa las ni lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ste / / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro / / rnam par grol ba las ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba'o /
samāpattivimuktitaḥ ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ
# snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par grol ba las ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba'o /
nāmata ete sapta pudgalāḥ
# ming gi sgo nas ni gang zag de bdun yin no /
ṣaṭ tvete / dravyatastvete ṣaṭ bhavanti / dvau dvau mārgatraye yataḥ
# de dag drug / / rdzas su ni de dag drug yin te / / 'di ltar lam gsum la gnyis gnyis /
darśanamārge hi dvau pudgalau śraddhādharmānusāriṇau / tāveva bhāvanāmārge dvau bhavataḥ
# mthong ba'i lam la gang zag gnyis te / / dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag go / / de dag nyid bsgom pa'i lam la gnyis te /
śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptau / tau punaraśaikṣamārge dvau bhavataḥ / samayāsamayavimuktāviti
# dad pas mos pa dang mthong bas thob pa dag go / / de gnyis kyang mi slob pa'i lam la gnyis yin te / / dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang /
tatrendriyatastrayaḥ / śraddhānusāriṇaḥ gotrataḥ pañca / mārgataḥ pañcadaśa / aṣṭa kṣāntisaptajñānasthāḥ
# dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba dag go / / de la dad pas rjes 'brang ba dbang po'i sgo nas ni gsum mo / / rigs kyi sgo nas ni lnga'o / / lam gyi sgo nas bco lnga ste / / bzod pa brgyad dang shes pa bdun la gnas pa'o /
vairāgyatastrisaptatiḥ / sakalabandhanaḥ
# 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas ni bdun cu rtsa gsum ste /
kāmavairāgyānnava / evaṃ yāvadākiñcanyāyatanavairāgyāt / āśrayato nava / tridvīpaṣāḍdevanikāyajāḥ / indriyagotramārgavairāgyāśrayataḥ paṇḍitāḥ śatasahasraṃ saṃpadyante sahasrāṇi ca saptacatvāriṃśacchatāni cāṣṭau pañcaviśatiśca / evamanye 'pi pudgalāḥ saṃbhavataḥ saṃkhyeyāḥ
# 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa dang 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir dgu nas de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir gyi bar du'o / / rten gyi sgo nas ni dgu ste / / gling gsum dang lha'i ris drug tu skyes pa'o / / dbang po dang rigs dang lam dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang rten gyi sgo nas bsdoms na ni / / 'bum bzhi khri bdun stong brgyad brgya nyi shu rtsa lngar 'gyur te / / gang zag gzhan dag kyang ci rigs par de bzhin du brtsi bar bya'o /
koyimubhayatobhāgavimukta ityucyate kaśca prajñāvimuktaḥ
# gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni gang / / shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ni gang zhe na /
nirodhalābhyubhayatovimuktaḥ prajñayetaraḥ
# 'gog thob gnyi ga las rnam grol / / shes rab kyis ni cig shos so /
yo nirodhasamāpattilābhī sa ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ
# gang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa de ni gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba yin te /
prajñāsamādhibalābhyāṃ kleśavimokṣāvaraṇavimuktatvāt / itaraḥ prajñāvimuktaḥ / prajñābalena kevalaṃ kleśāvaraṇavimuktatvāt / yaduktaṃ bhagavatā kleśān prahāyeha hi yastu pañca ahāryadharmā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣa iti
# shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dag gis nyon mongs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro / / cig shos ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba yin te / / shes rab kyi stobs kyis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa 'ba' zhig las rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro / / bcom ldan 'das kyis / / 'di la gang zhig nyon mongs lnga spangs te / / mi 'phrogs chos ldan slob pa yongs su rdzogs / / zhes gang gsungs pa /
kiyatā paripūrṇaḥ śaikṣo bhavati
