# ji tsam gyis na slob pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na /
samāpattindriyaphalaiḥ pūrṇaḥ śaikṣo 'bhidhīyate
# snyoms 'jug dbang po 'bras rnams kyis / / slob pa yongs rdzogs zhes bya'o /
trividhā śaikṣasya parīpūriḥ
# slob pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
phalataḥ indriyataḥ samāpattitaśca
# 'bras bu dang dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so /
phalata eva śraddhādhimuktasyākāyasākṣiṇo 'nāgāminaḥ
# phyir mi 'ong ba dad pas mos pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni 'bras bu kho na las so /
indriyata eva dṛṣṭiprāptasyāvītarāgasya
# mthong bas thob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni dbang po kho na las so /
phalendriyato dṛṣṭiprāptasya kāyasākṣiṇo 'nāgāminaḥ
# phyir mi 'ong ba mthong bas thob pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa ni 'bras bu dang dbang po las so /
phalasamāpattitaḥ śraddhādhimuktasya kāyasākṣiṇaḥ
# dad pas mos pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ni 'bras bu dang snyoms par 'jug pa kho na las so /
phalendriyasamāpattito dṛṣṭiprāptasya kāyasākṣiṇaḥ / samāpattita eva samāpattīndriyaśca paripūrṇatvaṃ nāsti vina phalena
# mthong bas thob pa lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa ni 'bras bu dang dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so / / snyoms par 'jug pa kho na dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang dbang po las yongs su rdzogs pa nyid ni mad do /
aśaikṣaparipūrṇatvaṃ dvābhyām / indriyataḥ samāpattiśca
# gnyis kyis mi slob yongs su rdzogs / / dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa las so /
phalena tvaparipūrṇasyāśaikṣatvameva nāstīti nāsya punaḥ phalena paripūrṇaparipūrṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate
# 'bras bu yongs su ma rdzogs pa la ni mi slob pa nyid kyang med pa kho na yin pas 'di'i 'bras bu rdzogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid du rnam par ma bzhag go /
indriyat evāsamayavimuktasya prajñāvimuktasya / samāpattita eva samayavimuktasyobhayabhāgavimuktasya
# shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba ni dbang po kho na las so / / gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba dus kyis rnam par grol ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa kho na las so /
indriyasamāpattibhyāmasamayavimuktasyobhayatobhāgavimuktasya
# gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba ni dbang po dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag las so /
vahava ime mārgabhedā uktā laukikalokokttaradarśanabhāvanā 'śaikṣamārgāḥ prayogānantaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgā iti / katividha eṣa samāsato mārga iti
# 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang mi slob pa'i lam rnams dang sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba'i lam dang khyad par can gyi lam rnams zhes bya ba lam gyi bye brag mang po zhig bshad pa de dag mdor bsdu na lam rnam pa du zhig yin zhe na /
mārgaḥ samāsataḥ
# mdor na lam ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
viśeṣamuktyānantaryaprayogākhyaścaturvidhaḥ
# khyad par can dang rnam grol dang / / bar chad med dang sbyor zhes bya /
prayogamārgo yasmādanantarmānantaryamārgotpattiḥ / ānantaryamārgo yenāvaraṇaṃ prajahāti
# sbyor ba'i lam ni gang gi mjug thogs su bar chad med pa'i lam skye ba'o / / bar chad med pa'i lam ni gang gis sgrib pa rab tu spong ba'o /
vimuktimārgo yastatpraheyāvaraṇavinirmuktastat prathamata utpadyate
# rnam par grol ba'i lam ni des spang bar bya ba'i sgrib pa las nges par grol pa dang po nyid du skye ba gang yin pa'o /
viśeṣamārgo ya ebhyo 'nyo mārgaḥ / kasmāt mārga ityucyate
# khyad par can gyi lam ni de dag las gzhan pa'i lam gang yin pa'o / / ci'i phyir lam zhes bya zhe na /
eṣa hi nirvāṇasya panthā etena tadgamanāt / nirvāṇaṃ mārgayantyaneneti vā / vimuktiviśeṣamārga yoḥ kathaṃ mārgatvam
# de nas der 'gro ba'i phyir ram / / 'dis mya ngan las 'das pa tshol ba'i phyir 'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yin no / / rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam dag ji ltar na lam nyid yin zhe na /
tajjātīyādadhimātrataratvāduttarottaraprāpaṇāt nirūpadhiśeṣapraveśādvā / mārga eva punaḥ pratipadityukto nirvāṇapratipādanāt
# de dang 'dra ba dang ches che ba yin pa'i phyir te / / gong nas gong du phyin par byed pa'i phyir ram / / phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par 'jug pa'i phyir ro / / yang lam nyid mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir sgrub pa zhes gsungs so /
catasraḥ pratipadaḥ / asti pratipadduḥkhā dhandhābhijñā
# lam ni bzhi ste / / mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam yang yod /
asti duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā
# mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam yang yod de /
evaṃ sukhā 'pi dvidhā / tatra / dhyāneṣu mārgaḥ pratipatsukhā
# de bzhin du sla ba yang rnam pa gnyis so / / de la / / bsam gtan dag gi lam rnams sla /
caturdhyāneṣu mārgaḥ sukhā pratipadaṅgaparigraha śamathavipaśyanā samatābhyāmayiatnavāhitvāt
# bsam gtan bzhi'i lam ni sla ba yin te / / yan lag gis yongs su zin pa dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mnyam pa dag gis 'bad mi dgos par rang gi dang gis 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
duḥkhā 'nyabhūmiṣu
# sa gzhan dag gi dka' ba yin /
anyāsvanāgamyadhyānāntarārupyabhūmiṣu mārgo duḥkhā pratidaṅgāparigrahācchamathavipaśyanānyūnatvācca yatnavāhitvāt śamathanyūne hyanāgamyadhyānāntare vipaśyanānyūnā ārupyā iti
# mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang gzugs med pa rnams kyi lam ni / / yan lag gis yongs su ma zin pa'i phyir dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chung ba'i phyir lam dka' ba yin te / / mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can na ni zhi gnas chung ngo /
sā punardvividhā 'pi pratipat
# gzugs med pa dag na ni lhag mthong chung ngo /
dhanyābhijñā mṛdumateḥ kṣiprābhijñetarasya tu
# lam de yang rnam pa gnyis te / / blo rtul mngon shes bul ba ste /
mṛdvindriyasya sukhā duḥkhā vā pratipaddhandhābhijñā tīkṣṇendriyasya kṣiprābhijñā dhandhābhijñā asyāṃ pratipadi / seyaṃ dhandhābhijñā / evaṃ kṣiprābhijñā
# cig shos kyi ni mngon shes myur / / dbang po rtul po ni lam sla ba 'am dka' ba yang rung ste / / mngon par shes pa bul ba yin no / / dbang po rnon po ni mngon par shes pa myur ba yin no /
dhandhasya vā pudgalasyeyamiti dhandhābhijñā / punarapyeṣa mārgo bodhipakṣyākhyāṃ labhate / saptatriṃśadvodhipakṣā dharmāḥ / catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni / catvāri samyak prahāṇāni / catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ
# lam nyid la mngon par shes pa bul ba yod pas na 'di ni mngon par shes pa bul ba ste / / mngon par shes pa myur ba yang de dang 'dra'o / / yang na 'di gang zag dbang po rtul po'i yin pas mngon par shes pa bul ba yin la /
pañcendriyāṇi / pañca balāni
# yid rnon po'i yin pas mngon par shes pa myur ba'o /
sapta bodhyaṅgāni / āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ iti
# lam 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob ste /
tatra / anutpādakṣayajñāne bodhiḥ / kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca / pudgalabhedena tisro bodhaya utpadyante / śrāvakabodhiḥ pratyekabodhiranuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti / aśeṣāvidyāprahāṇāt / tābhyāṃ svarthasya yathābhūta kṛtāpunaḥkartavyatāvavodhācca / tādanulomyataḥ / saptatriṃśattu tatpakṣyāḥ / bodheranulomatvādbodhipakṣyāḥ saptatriṃśadutpadyante / nāmato dravyato daśa / daśa dravyāṇi sarve bodhipakṣyāḥ / katamāni daśa
# byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa sum cu rtsa bdun ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par sbong ba zhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do / / de la zad dang mi skye shes pa ni / / byang chub zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa na gang zag gi bye brag gis nyan thos kyi byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang byang chub gsum zhes bya ste / / de gnyis kyis ma rig pa ma lus par spangs pa'i phyir dang rang gi don byas pa dang yang byar med pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro / / de dang mthun nyid phyir / / sum cu rtsa bdun de'i phyogs mthun / / byang chub dang mthun pa'i phyir ro / / ming gi sgo nas / / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya'o / / rdzas su bcu / / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa thams cad ni rdzas su bcu ste / / bcu gang zhe na /
śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe
# dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang / / shes rab ting 'dzin btang snyoms dga' /
praśrabdhiśīlasaṃkalpāḥ
# rtog dang tshul khrims shin tu sbyangs /
ityetāni daśa dravyāṇi
# de ltar byas na de dag ni rdzas su bcu'o /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / prajñā hi smṛtyupasthitiḥ
# ji ltar byas pas shan / / dran pa nyer gzhag shes rab ste; /
vīryaṃ samyakprahāṇākhyamṛddhipādāḥ samādhayaḥ / prajñāvīryasamādhisvabhādhā hi smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ ata indriyāṇi tāvadvalāni ca nāmagrāhikayā śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñādravyāṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyagṛṣṭiśca prajñaiva
# brtson 'grus yang dag 'jog ces bya / / rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ting 'dzin to / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no / / de'i phyir re zhig dbang po dang stobs rnams ni ming gis smos pa dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rdzas lnga yin te / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i lta ba ni shes rab kho na yin no /
samyakprahāṇāni vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyagvyāyāmaśca vīryameva
# yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams dang brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni brtson 'grus kho na yin no /
ṛddhipādāḥ samādhisambodhyaṅgaṃ samyak samādhiśca samādhireva / smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samyak smṛtiśca smṛtireva
# rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin kha na yin no / / dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i dran pa ni dran pa kho na yin no /
kimavaśiṣyate
# ci zhig lus she na /
prītiprasrabdhyupekṣasaṃbodhyaṅgāni samyaksaṃkalpaḥ śīlāṅgani ca / tānyetāni pañca dravyāṇi evamete bodhipakṣyā daśa dravyāṇi bhavanti
# dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams dang rdzas de lnga ste / / de ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa de dag ni rdzas bcu yin no /
vaibhaṣikāṇā mekādaśa / kāyavākkarmaṇorasaṃbhinnatvāt śīlāṅgāni dve dravye iti
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi ltar na lus dang ngag gi las dag tha dad cing rigs mi mthun pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi yan lag rnams rdzas gnyis yin pas rdzas bcu gcig yin no /
yattvetaduktaṃ prajñāvīryasamādhisvabhāvāḥ smṛtyupasthānādaya iti / atra veditavyam / pradhānagrahaṇaṃ sarve gunāḥ prāyogikāstu te / pradhānagrahaṇenaivamuktam
# 'di skad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa ni shes rab dang brtson 'grus dang ting 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa der ni / / gtso bo smos pa yin par rig par bya'o / / de dag ni / / sbyor byung yon tan kun kyang yin / / gtso bo smos pas de skad bshad kyi /
sarve tu prāyogikā guṇāḥḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādāḥ / kasmādvīrya samyakpradhānamuktam / tena samyakkāyavāṅmanāṃsi pradhīyante
# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i yon tan thams cad kyang yin no / / ci'i phyir brtson 'grus la yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa zhes bshad ce na / / des lus dang ngag dang yid yang dag par 'jog pas so /
samādhiḥ kasmād ṛddhipāda uktaḥ / tatpratiṣṭhatvātsarvaguṇasaṃpatteḥ / ye tvāhuḥ samādhirevarddhiḥ pādāśchandādaya iti
# ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bshad ce na / / de ni yon tan thams cad sbyor ba'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro / / gang dag rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin kho na yin la /
teṣāṃ dravyatastrayodaśa bodhipakṣyāḥ prāpnuvanti / cchandacittayoirādhikyātsūtraṃ ca virudhyate
# 'dun pa la sogs pa ni rkang pa yin no zhes zer ba de dag gi ltar na ni 'dun pa dang sems dag lhag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rdzas bcu gsum du 'gyur la /
ṛddhim ca vo bhikṣavo darśayiṣyāmi ṛddhipādāṃśaca yāvadṛddhiḥ katamā
# dge slong dag rdzu 'phrul yang bshad pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang bshad do zhes bya ba nas / / rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na /
iha bhikṣuranekavidhamṛddhiviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati
# 'di na dge slong rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed cing /
eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavatīti vistaraḥ / kasmādindriyāṇyeva valānyuktāni
# gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gsungs pa'i mdo dang yang 'gal lo / / ci'i phyir dbang po rnams kho na yang stobs rnams su bshad ce na /
mṛdvadhimātrabhedādavamardanīyānavamardanīyatvāt / indriyāṇāṃ kiṅkṛto 'nukramaḥ
# chung ngu dang chen po'i bye brag gis rdzi ba dang rdzi ba med pa'i phyir ro / / dbang po rnams kyi go rims cis byas she na /
śraddadhāno hi phalārthaṃ vīryamārabhate
# dad par gyur pa ni 'bras bu'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do /
ārabdhavīryasya smṛtirūpatiṣṭhate
# brtson 'grus brtsams na dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro /
upasthitasmṛteravikṣepāccittaṃ samādhīyate
# dran pa nye bar gnas na rnam par mi g yeng ba'i phyir sems mnyam par 'jog go /
samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti
# sems mnyam par gzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes par 'gyur ro /
kasyāmavasthāyāṃ katame te bodhipakṣyāḥ prabhāvyante
# gnas skabs gang du byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gang zhig rab tu 'byed can bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
ādikarmikanirvedhabhāgīyeṣu prabhāvitāḥ / bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam / ādikarmikāvasthāyāṃ kāyādyupalakṣaṇārthaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni
# sde tshan bdun ni go rigs bzhin / / las ni dang po pa dag dang / / nges 'byed cha mthun rnams dang ni / / bsgom dang mthong la rab tu phye / / las dang po pa'i gnas skabs su ni lus la sogs pa la nye bar brtag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so /
viśeṣādhigamena vīryasaṃbadhaṃnādūṣmagateṣu samyakpradhānāni
# khyad par thob pas brtson 'grus yang dag par spel ba'i phyir dro bar gyur pa dag la ni yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so /
aparihāṇīyakuśalamūlapraveśatvāt mūrdhaṣvṛddhipādāḥ
# yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la 'jug pa'i phyir rtse mo dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so /
apunaḥparihāṇita ādhipatyaprāptatvāt kṣāntiṣvindriyāṇi
# yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i sgo nas dbang po thob pa'i phyir bzod pa dag la ni dbang po rnams so /
kleśānavamardanīyatvādgradharmeṣu balāni laukikānyadharmānavamardanīyatvādvā
# nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir ram / / 'jig rten pa'i chos can gzhan dag gis mi brdzi ba'i phyir chos kyi mchog dag la ni stobs rnams so /
bodhyāsannatvāt bhāvanāmārge bodhyaṅgāni
# byang chub dang nye ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam dag la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so /
gamanaprabhāvitvāddarśanamārge mārgāṅgānī
# 'gro bas rab tu phye ba'i phyir mthong ba'i lam la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams te /
tasyāśugāmitvāt / saṃkhyānupūrvīvidhānārthaṃ tu pūrva saptoktāni paścādaṣṭau
# de ni myur bar 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / grangs kyi rim pa bzhin du bya ba'i phyir sngar bdun bshad la phyis brgyad bshad do /
tatra dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bodhirvodhyaṅgaṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭirmārgo mārgāṅgaṃ ceti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni byang chub kyang yin la byang chub kyi yan lag kyang yin no / / yang dag pa'i lta ba ni lam yang yin la lam gyi yan lag kyang yin no zhes zer ro /
apare punarabhittvaiva kramaṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāmānupūrvī varṇayanti
# gzhan dag ni go rims ma nyams pa kho nar byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams go rims bzhin du brjod do /
ādita eva tāvadvahuvidhaviṣapavyāsekavisāriṇīnāṃ buddhīnāṃ nigrahārya smṛtyupasthānāni cetasa upanibaddhāni bhavanti yāvadeva gardhāśritānāṃ smarasaṃkalpānāṃ prativinodanāyeti sūtre vacanāt / tadvalena vīryasaṃvardhanāccaturvidhakāryasaṃpādanāya samyakcittaṃ pradadhātīti samyakpradhānāni
# re zhig dang po kho nar yul rnam pa mang po la g yeng bar 'phro ba'i blo rnams tshar bcad pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po 'di dag ni de'i sems kyi nye bar 'dogs pa yin te / / mdo las 'di lta ste / / zhen pa la brten pa'i dran pa'i kun du rtog pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / de'i stobs kyis brtson 'grus yang dag par 'phel bas dgos pa rnam pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir sems yang dag par rab tu 'jog pas na yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa rnams so /
tataḥ samādhiviśodhanādṛddhipādāḥ / samādhisaṃniśrayeṇa lokottaradharmādhipatibhūtāni śraddhādīnīndriyāṇi
# de'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so / / ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par brten nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur ba'i phyir dad pa la sogs pa ni dbang po rnams so /
tānyeva ca nirjitavipakṣasamudācārāṇi balāni
# de dag nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kun tu spyod pa las nges par rgyal ba ni stobs rnams so /
darśanamārge bodhyaṅgāni
# mthong ba'i lam la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams te /
prahamato dharmatattvāvalokāt ubhayormārgāṅgāni / tathā hyuktam āryāṣṭāṅge khalu mārge bhāvanāparipūri gacchati
# dang po nyid du chos kyi de kho na rtogs pa'i phyir ro / / gnyi ga la ni lam gyi yan lag rnams te / / 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur na /
catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti yāvat sapta bodhyaṅgānīti / punaścoktaṃ yathābhūtavacanārocanamiti bhikṣavaścaturṇāmāryasatyānāmetadadhivacanaṃ yathāgatena mārgeṇa prakramaṇamiti bhikṣo āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasyaitadadhivacanamiti
# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rnams byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi bar du bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so / / yang dge slong yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig brjod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i tshig bla dags yin no / / dge slong ji ltar rtogs pa'i lam gyis 'jug ces bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi tshig bla dags yin no zhes gsungs so /
tasmādubhayorāryāṣṭāṅgo mārga eṣṭavyaḥ / siddho 'nukramaḥ
# de lta bas na gnyi ga la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 'dod par bya dgos pas go rims grub pa yin no /
idaṃ tu vaktavyam / kati bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ sāsravā iti katyanāsravā iti
# byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa du zhig ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag yin / / du zhig ni zag pa med pa dag yin zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya ste /
anāsravāṇi bodhyaṅgamārgāṅgāni
# byang chub yan lag lam yan lag / / zag pa med /
bhāvanādarśanamārga yostadvacyavasthāpanāt
# de gnyis ni bsgom pa'i lam dang mthong ba'i lam la rnam par gzhag pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
laukikā api hi samyagdṛṣṭacyādayaḥ santi
# 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa yang yod mod kyi /
te tu nāryamārgaśabdaṃ labhante
# de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam zhes bya ba'i sgra mi 'thob po /
dvidhetare
# gzhan rnam gnyis so /
anye bodhipakṣāḥ sāsravāḥ / kasyāṃ bhūmau kati bodhipakṣāḥ / sakalāḥ prathame dhyāne / sarve saptatriṃśatprathame dhyāne
# byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa gzhan dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yang yin no / / sa gang na byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa du zhig yod ce na bsam gtan dang po na thams cad / / bsam gtan dang po na sum cu rtsa bdun po thams cad yod do /
anāgamye prītivarjitāḥ
# mi lcogs med na dga' ma gtogs /
kasmādanāgamye prītyabhāvaḥ / sāmantakānāṃ balavāhanīyatvādadharabhūmisāśaṅkatvācca
# ci'i phyir mi lcogs pa med pa na dga' ba med ce na / / nyer bsdogs rnams ni stobs kyis drang dgos pa'i phyir dang sa 'og ma'i dogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro /
dvitīye 'nyatra saṃkalpāt
# gnyis pa na ni rtog ma gtogs /
dvitīye dhyāne samyaksaṃkalpavarjyāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadeva
# bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa drug kho na yod de /
tatra vitarkābhāvāt / dvayostaddvayavarjitāḥ
# de na rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro / / gnyis na de gnyis ma gtogs pa /
tṛtīyacaturthayordhyānayoḥ prītisaṃkalpābhyāṃ varjitāḥ pañcatriṃśat / dhyānāntare ca
# bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni dga' ba dang rtog pa dag ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga yod do / / bsam gtan bar na'ang /
tābhyāmeva dvābhyāṃ varjitāḥ pañcatriṃśadeva
# de gnyis nyid ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa lnga kho na yod do / / gzugs med pa /
śīlāṅgaistābhyāṃ ca triṣvarupiṣu
# gsum na'ang de dang mtshungs yan lag /
varjitā iti vartate
# ma gtogs zhes bya bar sbyar te /
ārupyesu samyagvākkarmāntājīvaiḥ prītisaṃkalpābhyāṃ ca varjitā dvātriṃśat / kāmadhātau bhavāgre ca bodhimārgāṅgavarjitāḥ
# gzugs med pa dag na ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams dang dga' ba dang rtog pa dag ma gtogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do / / byang chub dang ni lam yan lag / / ma gtogs 'dod khams srid rtse na /
dvārviśatirbodhipakṣyāstayoranāsravamārgābhāvāt / bodhipakṣeṣu vartamānasya kasyāmavasthāyāmavetyaprasādalābho veditavyaḥ
# de gnyis ni zag pa med pa'i lam med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod do / / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams la gnas pa gnas skabs gang du shes nas dad pa 'thob par rig par bya zhe na /
trisatyadarśane śīladharmāvetyaprasādayoḥ
# bden gsum mthong na tshul khrims dang / / chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob /
lābho mārgābhisamaye buddhatatsaṃghayiorapi / duḥkhasamudayanirodhasatyānyabhisamayan dharme cāvetyaprasādamāryakāntāni ca śīlāni pratilabhate
# lam mngon rtogs na sangs rgyas dang / / de yi dge 'dun dag la yang / / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs na chos la shes nas dad pa dang 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rnams 'thob bo /
mārgasatyamabhisamayan buddhe tasya ca śrāvakasaṃghe 'vetyaprasādaṃ pratilabhete
# lam gyi bden pa mngon par rtogs na sangs rgyas dang de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa 'thob ste /
yo hi tayoḥ prasādaḥ so 'śaikṣyeṣu buddhakarakeṣu dharmeṣu śaikṣāyāśaikṣeṣu ca saṃghakarakeṣu prasādaḥ
# gang zhig de gnyis la dad pa de ni sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos mi slob pa rnams dang dge 'dun du byed pa'i chos slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams la dad pa yin no /
api śabdācchīladharmāvetyaprasādau ca pratilabhate
# yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni tshul khrims dang chos la shes nas dad pa dag kyang 'thob par ston to /
ko 'yamiha dharmo 'bhipretaḥ / dharmaḥ satyatrayaṃ bodhisattvapratyekabuddhayoḥ
# 'dir gang la chos su dgongs pa yin zhe na / / chos bden gsum dang rang sangs rgyas /
mārgaśca / ataścatvaryapi satyānyabhisamayato dharmāvetyaprasādalābhaḥ
# byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no / / de'i phyir bden pa bzhi char yang mngon par rtogs na chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob po /
ta ete śraddhādhiṣṭhānabhedānnāmataścatvāro 'vetyaprasādā ucyante / dravyatastu dve śraddhā śīlaṃ ca
# de dag ni dad pa'i gzhi'i bye brag las ming gi sgo nas shes nas dad pa bzhi zhes bya ba'o / / rdzas su gnyis te dad pa dang tshul khrims /
buddhadharmasaṃghāvetyaprasādāḥ śraddhāsvabhāvāḥ āryakāntāni ca śīlāni śīlamiti dve dravye bhavataḥ / kiṃ punarete sāsravānāsravā ekāntenāvetyaprasādāḥ
# sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa rnams ni dad pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no / / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rnams ni tshul khrims yin pas rdzas gnyis so / / ci 'di dag zag pa dang bcas pa dag cig gam zag pa med pa dag cig yin zhe na / / shes nas dad pa rnams ni gcig tu /
nirmalā / avetyaprasādā iti ko 'rthaḥ
# dri ma med pa yin / / shes nas dad pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
yathābhūtasatyānyavabudhya saṃpratyayo 'vetyaprasādaḥ / yathā ca vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhīkaroti tathaiṣāmānupūrvīm / kathaṃ vyutthitaḥ saṃmukhī karoti
# bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs nas yid ches pa ni shes nas dad pa yin no / / 'di dag gi rim pa ni langs nas ji ltar mngon sum du byed pa de bzhin du bkod do / / langs nas ji ltar mngon sum byed ce na / / kye ma bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no / / de'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin no /
samyaksaṃbuddho vata bhagavān svākhyāto 'sya dharmavinayaḥ supratipanno 'sya śrāvakasaṃgha iti vaidyabhaiṣajyopasthāpakabhūtatvāt / cittaprasādakṛtaśca śīlaprasāda ityucyate caturtha uktaḥ
# de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa yin no zhes bya bar mngon sum du byed de / / sman pa dang sman dang nad g yog lta bur gyur pa'i phyir ro / / sems rab tu dang bas byas pa'i tshul khrims kyang rab tu dang ba yin pas tha mar bzhi pa bshad de /
evaṃ prasannasyaiṣā pratipattiriti / ārogyabhūtatvādvā deśika mārga sārthikayānavadvā / sūtra uktamaṣṭābhiraṅgai samanvāgataḥ śaikṣo darśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'śaikṣa iti / kasmācchaikṣasya samyak vimuktiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca noktam / noktā vimuktiḥ śaikṣāṅga baddhatvāt
# 'di ni de ltar rab tu dang bar gyur pa'i sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / yang na nad med pa lta bur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / yang na ston par byed pa dang lam dang lam grogs dang bzhon pa lta bu yin no / / mdo las slob pa ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan no / / mi slob pa ni yan lag bcu dang ldan no zhes gsungs pa / / ci'i phyir slob pa la yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang yang dag pa'i shes pa ma bshad ce na /
baddho hi śaikṣaḥ kleśabandhanairadyāpīti / kathaṃ baddhasyaiva sato vimuktirvyavasthāpyeta / na hi bandhanaikadeśānmukto mukta ityucyate / binā ca vimuktacyā kathaṃ vimuktijñānam vyavasthāpyate / aśaikṣastu sarvakleśabandhanātyantanirmokṣādvimuktitatpratyātmajñānābhyāṃ prabhāvita iti tasyaiva tadvacanaṃ nyāyyam
# bcings phyir slob pa'i yan lag tu / / rnam grol ma bshad / / slob pa ni da dung nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams kyis bcings pa yin pas bcings bzhin du ji ltar rnam par grol bar rnam par gzhag ste 'ching ba'i phyogs gcig las grol bas ni grol zhes mi bya'o / / rnam par grol ba med par yang ji ltar rnam par grol ba'i shes pa rnam par gzhag / / mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad las gtan du nges par thar pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba dang de so so rang gi shes pa dag gis rab tu phye ba yin pas de kho na la de smos pa rig pa dang ldan pa yin no /
keyaṃ vimuktirnāma / sā punardvidhā / saṃskṛtā cāsaṃskṛtā ca / tatra / asaṃskṛtā kleśahānamadhimuktastu saṃskṛtā / kleśaprahāṇamasaṃskṛtā vimuktiḥ / aśaikṣādhimokṣaḥ saṃskṛtā vimuktiḥ
# rnam par grol zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / / de rnam gnyis / / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas so / / de la / / nyon mongs bcom pa 'dus ma byas / / mos pa 'dus byas nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas yin no / / mi slob pa'i mos pa ni rnam par grol ba 'dus byas yin no /
sāṅgaḥ / saivāsaṃskṛtā vimuktiraśaikṣāṅgayuktā
# yan lag ni de yin / / rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de ni mi slob pa'i yan lag tu bshad de /
aṅgānāṃ saṃskṛtatvāt / saiva vimuktī dve / saiva saṃskṛtā vimuktirdve vimuktī sūtra ukte
# yan lag rnams ni 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir ro / / de nyid rnam grol gnyis / / rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de nyid mdo las /
ceto vimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktiśca / vimuktiskndho 'pi sa eva draṣṭṭavyaḥ
# sems rnam par grol ba dang shes rab rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba gnyis su gsungs te / / de nyid rnam par grol ba'i phung po yin par yang blta'o /
yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ katamacca vyāgrābodhyāyanā vimuktipariśuddhipradhānam / iha bhikṣavo rāgāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktaṃ dveṣānmohāccittaṃ viraktaṃ bhavati vimuktamityaparipūrṇasya vā vimuktiskandhasya paripūraye paripūrṇasya cānugrahāya cchandovīryamiti vistaraḥ / tasmānādhimokṣa eva vimuktiḥ
# gzhan dag na re mdo las / / stag gi byang chub kyi bu dag rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa gtso bo gang yin zhe na / / 'di na dge slong 'dod chags las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin / / zhe sdang dang gti mug las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin te / / 'di ltar rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su ma rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'am / / yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus gang yin pa zhes rgyas par gang gsungs pa ji lta bu / / de'i phyir rnam par grol ba ni mos pa kho na yin par ma zad do /
kiṃ tarhi
# 'o na ci zhe na /
tattvajñānāpanīteṣu rāgādiṣu cetaso vaimalyaṃ vimuktirityapare
# de kho na shes pas 'dod chags la sogs pa spangs nas sems dri ma med pa nyid rnam par grol ba yin no zhes zer ro /
uktā vimuktiḥ / samyagjñānaṃ tu samyagdṛṣṭiḥ / vyatiriktaṃ katamat / jñānaṃ bodhiryathoditā / yaiva hi pūrvaṃ bodhiruktā saiveha samyagjñānaṃ veditavyam
# yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba bshad zin to / / yang dag pa'i lta ba las ma gtogs pa yang dag pa'i shes pa gang zhig yin zhe na / / byang chub ji skad bshad shes pa / / sngar byang chub ji skad du bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dir yang dag pa'i shes pa yin par rig par bya ste /
yaduta kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca / katamat punaścittaṃ vimucyate kimatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannam
# 'di lta ste / / zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o / / sems gang zhig rnam par grol bar 'gyur / / ci 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa 'am da ltar byung ba yin zhe na /
vimucyate jāyamānasaśaikṣaṃ cittamāvṛteḥ / anāgataṃ cittamutpadyamānaṃ visucyate aśaikṣamāvaraṇebhya iti śāstrapāṭhaḥ / kiṃ punastasyāvaraṇam / kleśaprāptistadutpattivivandhatvāt
# mi slob sems ni skye 'gyur ba / / sgrib pa las ni rnam grol 'gyur / / bstan bcos las mi slob pa'i sems ma 'ongs pa sgrib pa rnam las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo / / de'i sgrib pa yang gang zhe na / / nyon mongs pa'i thob pa yin te /
vajropame hi samādho sa ca prahīyate
# de skye ba la bgegs byed pa'i phyir ro /
taccotpadyamānamaśaikṣaṃ cittaṃ vimucyate / sā ca prahīṇā bhavati
# rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe de yang slong bar 'gyur la mi slob pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro /
tacāśaikṣaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vimuktaṃ ca
# de spangs nas ni mi slob pa'i sems de yang skyes pa dang rnam par grol ba yin no /
yattarhi notpadyamānaṃ laukikaṃ ca / tadapi vimucyate / yattu niyatamutpattau tadevoktam
# 'o na skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang 'jig rten pa gang yin pa ji lta bu zhe na / / de dag kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur mod kyi skye bar nges pa gang yin pa de kho na bshad do /
laukikaṃ kuto vimucyate / tata evotpattyāvaraṇāt / nanu cāmuktasyāpi śaikṣasya laukikamutpadyate na tattādṛśam
# gang las 'jig rten pa rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhe na / / skye ba'i sgrib pa de nyid las so / / ma grol ba la yang 'jig rten pa'i skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na / / de ni de dang mi 'dra'o /
kīdṛśaṃ tat
# de ci 'dra zhe na /
kleśaprāptisahitam / kimavastho mārgastadutpattyāvaraṇaṃ prajahāti
# nyon mongs pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no / / gnas skabs gang yin pa'i lam gyis de skye ba'i sgrib pa spong zhe na /
nirudhyamāno mārgastu prajahāti tadāvṛtim
# 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis ni / / de yi sgrib pa rab tu spong /
vartamāna ityarthaḥ / yā cāsaṃskṛtā vimuktiruktā ye ca trayodhātava ucyante prahāṇadhāturviṃrāgadhātunirodhadhāturiti / ka eṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ / asaṃskṛtaiva dhātvākhyā / saivāsaṃskṛtā vimuktistrayo dhātavaḥ / tatra punaḥ
# de ltar gyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas su bshad pa gang yin pa dang khams gsum po spangs pa'i khams dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams dang 'gog pa'i khams zhes 'byung ba gang yin de dag la khyad par ci yod ce na / / 'dus ma byas nyid khams zhes bya / / rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas de nyid khams gsum yin no / / de la /
virāgo rāgasaṃkṣayaḥ
# 'dod chags kun zad 'dod chags bral /
rāgasya prahāṇaṃ virāgadhātuḥ
# 'dod chags spangs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams yin no /
prahāṇadhāturanyeṣāṃ
# spangs pa'i khams ni gzhan dag go /
saṃkṣaya iti vartate
# yang dag par zad pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
rāgādanyeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇadhātuḥ
# 'dod chags las gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa ni spangs pa'i khams yin no /
nirodhākhyastu vastunaḥ / saṃkṣaya ityevānuvartate
# 'gog pa'i khams zhes bya ba gzhi / / yang dag par zad pa zhes bya ba kho nar sbyar te /
kleśanirmuktasya vastunaḥ prahāṇaṃ nirodhadhātuḥ
# nyon mongs pa las ma gtogs pa bzhi spangs pa ni 'gog pa'i khams yin no /
yena vastu nirvidyate virajyate 'pi tena vastunā / catuṣkoṭikam
# dngos po gang gis yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po des 'dod chags dang bral bar yang 'gyur ram zhe na / / mu bzhi'o /
kathaṃ kṛtvā / nirvidyate duḥkhahetukṣāntijñānaiḥ
# ji ltar byas pas she na / / sdug bsngal rgyu bzod shes rnams kyis /
duḥkhe samudayakṣāntijñānaireva nirvidyate nānyaiḥ / virajyate / sarvairjahāti yaiḥ / sarvairapi duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga kṣāntijñānairvirajyate / yaiḥ kleśān prajahāti
# yid 'byung sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kho nas yid 'byung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no / / gang gis spong 'gyur ba / / kun gyis 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur / / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa gang dag gis nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyis kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro /
evaṃ catuṣkoṭikasaṃbhavaḥ
# de lta na ni mu bzhi srid; de lta na mu bzhir grub ste /
evaṃ catuṣkotikaṃ sidhyati / nirvidyata eva duḥkhasamudayakṣāntijñānaiḥ / kleśān prajahat nirvedavastvālambanatvāt
# sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong na yid 'byung ba kho na yin te / / yid 'byung ba'i dngos po kho na la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
virajyata eva nirodhamārgakṣāntijñānaiḥ kleśān prajahat / prāmodyavastvālambanatvāt
# 'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag spong na 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yin te / / mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
ubhayaṃ pūrvaiḥ kleśān prajahat
# snga ma rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag spong na gnyi ga yin no /
nobhayamuttaraiḥ kleśānaprajahaditi / tatra vītarāgaḥ satyāni paśyandharmajñānakṣāntibhiḥ kleśānna prajahāti / jñānaistu prayogavimuktiviśeṣamārgasaṃgṛhītairna prajahātīti / abhidharmakośabhāṣye mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti
# phyi ma rnams kyis nyon mongs bdag mi spong na gnyi ga ma yin no / / de la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig bden pa rnams la lta na chos shes pa dang bzod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong ngo / / shes pa rnams kyis ni sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam gyis bsdus pa rnams kyis mi spong ngo / / chos mngon pa mdzod kyi bshad pa las lam dang gang zag bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa'o /
saptamaṃ kośasthānam
# bzod pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung /
namo buddhāya / kṣāntayaścocyante jñānāni ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagjñānaṃ ca / kiṃ punaḥ kṣāntayo na jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭiḥ
# shes pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung / / yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes kyang 'byung / / yang dag pa'i shes pa zhes kyang 'byung na ci bzod pa dag yin la shes pa ma yin nam / / yang dag pa'i shes pa yin la yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin nam zhe na /
nāmalā kṣāntayo jñānaṃ / tatpraheyasya vicikitsā 'nuśayasyāgrahīṇatvāt
# dri med bzod rnams shes pa yin / / des spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas the tshom ma spangs pa'i phyir ro /
dṛṣṭayastu tā santiraṇātmakattvāt yathā ca kṣāntayo dṛṣṭirna jñānamevaṃ punaḥ / kṣayānutpādadhīrna dak / kṣayānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca na dṛṣṭirasantīraṇāparimārgaṇāśayatvāt / tadnyobhayathāryā dhīḥ / kṣāntikṣayānutpādajñānebhyo 'nyā 'nāsravā prajñā dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ ca
# de dag yang dag par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir lta ba dag yin no / / ji ltar bzod pa rnams lta ba yin gyi shes pa ma yin pa de bzhin du / / zad dang mi skye'i blo lta min / / zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa med pa dang yongs su 'tshol ba'i bsam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir lta ba ma yin no / / de las gzhan 'phags blo gnyi ga / / bzod pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag las gzhan pa zag pa med pa'i shes rab ni lta ba dang shes pa yang yin no /
anyā jñānaṃ / laukikī prajñā sarvaiva jñānam / dṛśaśca ṣaṭ / pañca dṛṣṭayo laukikī ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ / eṣā ṣaḍvidhā laukikī prajñādṛṣṭiḥ anyā na dṛṣṭiḥ / jñānaṃ tveṣā cānyā ca / kiyatā sarvajñānasaṃgrahaḥ
# gzhan shes 'jig rten pa'i shes rab thams cad ni shes pa kho na yin no / / drug ni lta ba'ang yin / / lta ba lnga dang 'jig rten pa'i lta ba yang dag pa'i lta ba ste / / 'jig rten pa'i shes pa rnam pa drug ni lta ba yin gyi gzhan ni lta ba ma yin no / / 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang shes pa ni ma yin no / / ji snyed cig gis shes pa thams cad bsdus she na /
daśabhirjñānaiḥ / samāsena tu / sāsravānāsravaṃ jñānaṃ
# shes pa bcus bsdus so / / mdor bsdu na ni gnyis te / / shes pa zag bcas zag pa med /
tayoḥ punaḥ / ādyaṃ saṃvṛtijñāpakam
# de gnyis las kyang / / dang po kun rdzob ces bya'o /
yatsāsravaṃ tatsaṃvṛtijñānam / prāyeṇa ghaṭapaṭastrīpuruṣādisaṃvṛtigrahāt / ajñānasaṃvṛtatvāt ityapare / anāsravaṃ dvidhā dharmajñānamanvayameva ca
# zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni phal cher bum pa dang snam bu dang skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa kun rdzob 'dzin pa'i phyir kun rdzob shes pa yin no / / zag med rnam gnyis chos dang ni / / rjes su shes pa kho na yin / / zag pa med pa'i shes pa la rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
anāsrvaṃ jñānaṃ dvidhā bhidyate
# chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa'o /
dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ ca / evagete dve jñāne trīṇi bhavanti / saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dharmajñānaṃ ca / tatra / sāṃvṛtaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ
# de ltar na shes pa 'di gnyis ni gsum yin te / / kun rdzob shes pa dang chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa'o / / de la / / kun rdzob yul ni thams cad do /
saṃvṛtijñānasya sarvadharmāḥ saṣkṛtāsaṃskṛtā ālambanaṃ saṃbhavataḥ
# kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni ci rigs par 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad yin no /
kāmaduḥkhadigocaram
# chos shes bya ba'i spyod yul ni /
dharmakhyam / dharmajñānasya kāmāvacaraṃ dukhaṃ tatsamudayanirodhapratipakṣāścālambanam
# 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa / / chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang de kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams yin no /
anvayajñānaṃ tūrdhvaduḥkhādigocaram / anvayajñānasya rūpārupyāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ tatsamudayanirodhapratipakṣāścālambanam / te eva satyabhedena catvāri / te eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne satyabhedena punaścatvāri jñānāni bhavanti / duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni / tadālambanatvāt
# rjes su shes pa'i spyod yul ni / / gong ma'i sdug bsngal la sogs yin / / rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang de kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams so / / de dag nyid bden bye brag gis / / bzhi ste / / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa de dag nyid bden pa'i bye brag gis sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams dang shes pa bzhi yin te / / de dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
ete caturvidhe / anutpādakṣayajñāne / ete eva dharmajñānānvayajñāne caturvidhe adṛṣṭisvabhāve kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ cocyate
# rnam bzhi de dag ni / / mi skye ba dang zad pa shes / / chos dang rjes su shes pa lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa bzhi po de dag kho nar zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa zhes bya'o /
te punaḥ prathamodite / duḥkhahetvanvayajñāne / prathamotpanne tu kṣayajñānānutpādajñāne duḥkhasamudayānvayajñāne duḥkhasamudayākārairbhāvāgrikaskandhālambanatvāt
# de gnyis dang po skyes pa ni / / sdug bsngal rgyu rjes shes pa yin / / zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang po skyes pa ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin te / / srid pa'i rtse mo'i phung po la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
kim khalu vajropamo 'pi tābhyāmekālamvano 'sti
# yang ci rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de gnyis dang dmigs pa gcig pa zhig yin nam zhe na /
yadi duḥkhasamudayālamvano bhavati
# gal te sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la dmigs na ni yin no /
atha nirodhamārgālambano naikālambanaḥ
# 'on te 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa zhig yin na ni dmigs pa gcig pa ma yin no /
caturbhyaḥ paracittavit
# bzhi las pha rol sems rig pa /
vettīti vit jñānam / paracittajñānaṃ caturbhyo jñānebhyo draṣṭavyam
# rig par byed pas na rig pa ste shes pa'o / / pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni shes pa bzhi las skye bar blta bar bya ste /
dharmānvayajñānamārgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānebhyaḥ / tasya punarayaṃ niyamaḥ
# chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang lam shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams las so / / de'i nges pa ni 'di yin te /
bhūmyakṣapudgalotkrāntam naṣṭājātaṃ na veti tat
# des ni sa dbang gang zag 'das / / zhig dang ma skyes mi rig go /
bhūmyatikrāntaṃ na jānātīti / adharadhyānabhūmikenottaradhyānabhūmikamindriyātikrāntaṃ na jānāti / śraddhādhimuktasamayamuktamārgeṇa dṛṣṭiprāptāsamayavimuktārga pudgalotkrāntaṃ na jānāti
# sa 'das pa mi shes pa ni bsam gtan 'og ma'i sa pas bsam gtan gong ma'i sa pa mi shes pa'o / / dbang po 'das pa mi shes pa ni dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam mi shes pa'o /
anāgāmyahañcchāvaka pratyekabuddhabuddhamārggaṇāmadhareṇottaraṃ naṣṭājātaṃ na jānāti
# gang zag 'das pa mi shes pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi lam rnams 'og mas gong ma mi shes pa'o /
atītānāgataṃ vartamānapara cittacaittaviṣayatvāt / kiṃ ca bhūyaḥ
# zhig pa dang ma skyes pa mi shes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi shes pa ste / / da ltar gyi pha rol gyi sems yul yin pa'i phyir ro /
ta dharmānvayadhīpakṣyamanyo 'nyaṃ
# gzhan yang chos rjes blo phyogs phan tshun min /
dharmajñānapakṣyaṃ paracittajñānamanvayajñānapakṣyaṃ cittaṃ na jānāti
# pha rol gyi sems shes pa chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems mi shes la /
anvayajñānapakṣyaṃ ca dharmajñānapakṣyaṃ na jānāti
# rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems mi shes te /
kāmadhāturdhvadhātupratikṣālambanatvāttayoḥ / darśanamārge paracittajñānaṃ nāsti / tadālambanaṃ tvasti / tatra paracittajñānena darjñanamārga jñātukāmaḥ prayogaṃ kṛtvā prathamau
# de gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / mthong ba'i lam la pha rol gyi sems shes pa med do / / de'i dmigs pa ni yod de / / de la pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam shes par 'dod pas sbyor ba byas na /
darśanakṣaṇau / śrāvako vetti khaṅgastrīn sarvānbuddho 'prayogataḥ / śrāvako darśanamārgāt paracittajñānena dvau kṣaṇau jānāti / duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ dharmajñānaṃ ca / anvayajñānapakṣālambanasyānyaprayogasādhyatvāt / yāvacca sa tatra prayogamāra mate tāvadayaṃ ṣoḍaśacittamanuprāpto bhavatītyantarā na jānāti
# nyan thos mthong ba'i skad cig gnyis / / rig ste bse ru lta bus gsum / / sangs rgyas sbyor ba med par kun / / nyan thos kyis ni pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam las skad cig ma gnyis shes te / / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang chos shes pa'o / / rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa la dmigs pa ni sbyor ba gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de ji srid kyis sbyor ba rtsom pa de srid gyis [*kyis] des sems bcu drug rjes su 'thob par 'gyur bas bar du ni mi shes so /
pratyekabuddhastrīn kṣaṇān / prathamau ca dvāvaṣṭamaṃ ca samudayānvayajñānaṃ mṛduprayogatvāt
# rang sangs rgyas kyis ni dang po gnyis dang brgyad pa kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa dang gsum shes te / / sbyor ba chung ba'i phyir ro /
prathamadvitīyapañcadaśānityapare / buddhastu sarvāneva darśanamārgakṣaṇānaprayogeṇa jānāti / atha kṣayajñānānutpādajñānayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ
# gzhan dag na re dang po dang gnyis pa dang bco lnga pa rnams shes so zhes zer ro / / sangs rgyas kyis ni sbyor ba med par mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma thams cad mkhyen to / / yang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
kṣayajñānaṃ hi satyeṣu parijñātādiniścayaḥ
# zad pa shes pa bden rnams la / / yongs shes la sogs nges pa'o /
na parijñeyamityādiranutpādamatirmatā
# yongs shes byar med ces la sogs / / mi skye ba yi blor 'dod do / / bstan bcos las /
kṣayajñānaṃ katamat
# zad pa shes pa gang zhe na /
duḥkhaṃ me parijñātamiti jānāti / samudayaḥ prahīṇo nirodhaḥ sākṣātakṛto mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti / tadupādāya yat jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhirbodhiḥ prajñā āloko 'bhisamayamidamucyate kṣayajñānam / anutpādajñānaṃ katamat
# bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes bya bar shes pa dang kun 'byung spangs so / / 'gog pa mngon du byas so / / lam bsgoms so zhes bya bar shes pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i shes pa dang mthong ba dang rig ba dang blo dang rtogs pa dang shes rab dang snang ba dang mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa 'di ni zad pa shes pa zhes bya'o / / mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na /
duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na pounaḥ parijñeyamiti jānāti yāvat mārgo bhāvito na punarbhāvayitavya iti / tadupādāyeti vistareṇoktaṃ śāstre
# bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes te / / yang yongs su shes par byar med do zhes bya bar shes pa nas bdag gis lam bsgoms te yang bsgom du med do zhes bya ba'i bar du shes pa de'i rgyu las byung ba'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo /
kathamanāsraveṇa jñānenaivaṃ jānāti / tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena vyutthita evaṃ jānāti
# ji ltar na zag pa med pa'i shes pas de ltar shes she na / / kha che ba rnams na re bstan bcos las / / de'i rjes la langs bas de ltar shes te /
atastadviśeṣeṇa tayorviśeṣaḥ / śāstre jñāpiota iti kāśmīrāḥ
# de'i phyir de'i bye brag gis de gnyis kyi bye brag bstan to zhes zer ro /
anāsraveṇāpyevaṃ jānātītyapare darśanavacanaṃ tu bhāṣyākṣepāt
# gzhan dag na re zag pa med pas kyang de ltar shes te / / mthong ba smos pa ni bshad pa 'phangs pa'i phyir ram /
jpratyakṣavṛttitvādvā / ata evoktaṃ yāvat jñānaṃ darśanamapi taditi / ityetāni daśa jñānāni bhavanti yaduta dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayañṇyānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca / tatra saṃvṛtijñānamekaṃ jñānamekasya ca bhāgaḥ
# yang na mngon sum du 'jug pa'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir re zhig shes pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba yang yin no zhes 'byung ngo zhes zer ro / / de ltar na de dag ni shes pa bcu yin te / / 'di lta ste chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang sdug bsngal shes pa dang kun 'byung shes pa dang 'gog pa shes pa dang lam shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o /
dharmajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ saptānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ
# de la kun rdzob shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la gcig gi cha yang yin no /
duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga kṣayānutpādaparacittajñānānām
# chos shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bdun gyi cha yang yin te /
evamanvayajñānam / duḥkhajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ caturṇā ca bhāgaḥ / dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānām / evaṃ samudayanirodhajñāne caturṇāṃ bhāgaḥ
# rjes su shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o / / sdug bsngal shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i cha yang yin te / / kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa shes pa de dang 'dra'o /
mārgajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ pañcānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ / caturṇāmanantaroktānāṃ paracittasya ca / paracittajñanamekaṃ jñānaṃ caturṇāṃ ca bhāgaḥ / dharmānvayamārga saṃvṛtijñānānām / kṣayajñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ca bhāgaḥ / dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānām / evamanutpādajñānam / kasmāt punaretāni vīṇi santi daśa vyavasthāpyante / svabhāvapratipakṣānyāmākārākāragocarāt / prayogakṛtakṛtyatvahetūpacayoto daśa
# lam shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la lnga'i cha yang yin no / / pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i cha yang yin no / / zad pa ni shes pa gcig yin la / / drug gi cha yang yin te / / mi skye ba shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o / / ci'i phyir de dag gsum yod la bcur rnam par gzhag ce na / / rang bzhin dang ni gnyen po dang / / rnam pa rnam pa spyod yul dang / / sbyor dang bya ba byas nyid dang / / rgyu rgyas pa las bcu yin no /
saptabhiḥ kila kāraṇairdaśa jñānāni vyavasthāpyante
# rgyu bdun gyis shes pa bcur rnam par gzhag go zhes grag ste /
svabhāvataḥ saṃvṛtijñānamaparamārthajñānatvāt
# rang bzhin las ni kun rdzob shes pa ste / / don dam pa mi shes pa'i phyir ro /
pratipakṣato dharmānvayajñāne
# gnyen po las ni chos dang rjes su shes pa dag ste /
kāmathāturdhvadhātupratipakṣatvāt
# 'dod pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
ākārato duḥkhasamudayajñāne / ālambanābhedāt / ākārālambanato nirodhamārgajñāne
# rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba shes pa dag ste / / dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro / / rnam pa dang dmigs pa las ni 'gog pa dang lam shes pa dag ste /
ākārālambanabhedāt / prayogataḥ paracittajñānam / na hi tena caittā na jñāyate / cittajñānārthe tu prayuktasyābhiniṣpatteḥ paracittajñānamuktam
# rnam pa dang dmigs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro / / sbyor ba las ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa ste / / des ni sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi shes pa ma yin mod kyi sems shes par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba byas pa las grub pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bshad do / / bya ba byas pa las ni zad pa shes pa ste /
kṛtakṛtyataḥ kṣayajñānaṃ kṛtakṛtyasaṃtānotpatteḥ
# bya ba byas pa'i rgyud la dang po nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro /
prathamataḥ hetūpacayato 'nutpādajñānaṃ sarvānāsravahetukatvāditi
# rgyu rgyas pa las ni mi skye ba shes pa ste / / zag pa med pa'i shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro /
sakalasya sakalapratipakṣatvāt kāmadhātupratīpakṣo dharmajñānamityuktam / api tu / dharmajñānanirodhe yanmārge vā bhāvanāpathe
# thams cad kyi gnyen po thams cad yin pa'i phyir / / chos shes pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po zhes bshad par zad kyi gzhan yang / / bsgom pa'i lam la 'gog pa'am / / lam la chos shes gang yin pa /
tridhātupratipakṣastat / nirodhamārgajñāne bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhīte tridhātupratipakṣaḥ
# khams gsum gyi ni gnyen po yin / / 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa dag ni khams gsum char gyi gnyen po yin no /
kāmadhātostu nānvayam
# 'dod pa'i khams kyi rjes ma yin /
anvayajñānam tu sarvathā nāsti kāmadhātuporatipakṣaḥ / eṣāṃ daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ
# 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po rjes su shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad du med do / / shes pa bcu po de dag las /
dharmajñānānvayajñānaṃ ṣoḍḍaśākāram
# chos shes pa dang rjes su shes / / rnam pa bcu drug /
tān purastādupadekṣyāmaḥ
# de dag ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o /
anyathā / tathā ca sāṃvṛtaṃ
# kun rdzob ni / / de bzhin gzhan du'ang /
saṃvṛtijñānaṃ ṣoḍaśākāramanyathākāraṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svasāmānyalakṣaṇādigrahaṇāt
# kun rdzob shes pa ni rnam pa bcu drug can yang yin la gzhan gyi rnam pa can yang yin te / / chos thams cad kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro /
svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiścatuṣṭayam
# rang rang gi bden pa'i rnam pas bzhi yin no /
duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārga jñānāni svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiḥ pravartanta ityekaikaṃ caturākāraṃ bhavanti / tathā paramatojñānaṃ nirmalaṃ
# sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams ni rang rang gi bden pa'i rnam pa dag tu 'jug pas re re zhing rnam pa bzhi bzhi yin no / / pha rol yid shes dri med kyang /
anāsravaṃ paracittajñānaṃ tatheva / svasatyākāratvāccuturākāraṃ mārgajñānatvāt
# de bzhin pha rol gyi sems shes pa zag pa med pa yang de bzhin kho nar rang gi bden pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi can yin te / / lam shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
samalaṃ punaḥ
# dri ma dang bcas ni /
śeyasvalakṣaṇākāraṃ
# shes bya'i rang gi mtshan nyid rnams /
sāsravaṃ paracittajñānaṃ jñeyānāṃ cittacaittānāṃ yat svalakṣaṇam tadākārayati
# pha rol gyi sems shes pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni shes bya sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de'i rnam pa 'dzin te /
svalakṣaṇagrāhakatvāt / labhayamapi tu / ekaikadravyagocaram
# rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / gnyi ga yang / / rdzas re re zhig spyod yul lo /
yadā cittaṃ gṛhlāti na tadā cittānāṃ yadā vedanāṃ na tadā saṃjñāmityevamādi
# gang gi tshe sems 'dzin pa de'i tshe sems las byung ba rnams mi 'dzin la / / gang gi tshe tshor ba 'dzin pa de'i tshe 'du shes mi 'dzin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o /
yattarhi bhagavatīktam sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātītyevamādi / na tayordugapadgrahaṇam / vastramalāyugāpadgrahaṇavat
# 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na / / de gnyis cig car du 'dzin pa ni ma yin te / / gos dang dri ma cig car du mi 'dzin pa bzhin no /
sarāgaṃ cittamiti dvidhā sarāgatā / saṃsṛṣṭasarāgatā saṃyoiga sarāgatā ca / tatra sarāgaṃ saṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarāgaṃ tato 'nyatsāsravaṃ saṃyogasarāgatayā sarāgam
# 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid rnam pa gnyis te / / 'dres pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid do / / de la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni gnyis kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no / / de las gzhan pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pas na 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no /
atra tu sūtre rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣī vigatarāgamityeke / yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syādanyakleśasamprayuktamapi syāt
# kha cig na re mdo 'dir ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la / / 'dod chags kyi gnyen por ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bshad pa yin te / / gal te 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na ni nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
evaṃ tarhi tadapratipakṣaḥ sāsravaṃ cittamakliṣṭaṃ naiva sarāgaṃ na vigatarāgaṃ syādityevamādi / tasmādrāgasaṃprayuktatayā 'pi sarāgaṃ cittamatreṣṭavyamityapare
# gzhan dag na re de lta na ni 'o na de'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma yin la / / 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par 'gyur bas / / de lta bas na mdo 'dir 'dod chags dang ldan pas kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par bya ste /
evaṃ yāvatsamohaṃ vigatamohaṃ ca veditavyam / saṃkṣiptaṃ kuśalamālambanābhisaṃkṣepāt / vikṣiptaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vikṣepasaṃprayogāt / saṃkṣiptaṃ middhasaṃprayuktaṃ vikṣiptamanyata kliṣṭamiti pāścāttyāḥ / tadetanna varṇayanti / tadeva hi cittaṃ saṃkṣiptavikṣiptaṃ syāt kliṣṭamiddhasaṃprayīgāt / śāstravirodhaśca syāt
# gti mug dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bral ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o zhes zer ro / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re kun du bsdus pa ni dmigs pa la mngon par sdud pa'i phyir dge ba yin no / / rnam par g yeng ba ni rnam par g yeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no zhes zer ro / / nub phyogs pa rnams na re kun tu bsdus pa ni gnyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no / / rnam par g yeng ba ni nyon mongs pa can gzhan yin no zhes zer ro / / de skad du mi brjod de / / nyon mongs pa can gyi gnyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir sems de nyid bsdus pa yang yin la rnam par g yengs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro / / bstan bcos las /
saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
# sems kun du bsdus pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so /
tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānāni dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ mārgajñānamiti
# de shes pa'i shes pa ni bzhi ste / / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa dang lam shes pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
līnaṃ cittaṃ kliṣṭaṃ kauśīdyasaṃprayogāt
# sems zhum pa ni le lo dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yin no /
pragṛhītaṃ kuśalaṃ vīryasaṃprayogāt
# rab tu bzung ba ni brtson 'grus dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dge ba yin no /
parītāṃ kliṣṭaṃ vyavadānaparīttairniṣevitatvāt
# chung ngu ni rnam par byang ba chung du dag gis bsten pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no /
mahadgataṃ kuśalaṃ tadviparyayāt / mūlamūlyaparivārānuparivartakavalālpavahutvācca
# chen por gyur pa ni de las bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no / / rtsa ba dang rin dang 'khor dang rjes su 'brang ba dang stobs che chung gi yang phyir te /
kliṣṭacittaṃ dvābhyāmakuśalamūlābhyāṃ samulam
# nyon mongs pa can ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis kyis rtsa ba dang bcas pa yin no /
kuśalaṃ tribhiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ
# dge ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum gyis so /
kliṣṭamalpamūlyamayatnasādhyatvāt / kuśalaṃ bhumūlyaṃ vahābhisaṃskārasādhyatvāt / kliṣṭaṃ tajjātīyānāgatabhāvanā 'bhāvānna mahāparivāraṃ tribhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam / kuśalaṃ tu mahāparivāraṃ caturbhiśca skandhaiḥ sānuparivartam / alpabalaṃ khalvapi kliṣṭaṃ bahubalaṃ kuśalam
# nyon mongs pa can ni 'bad pas bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir rin chung ba yin no / / dge ba ni tshogs chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rin che ba yin no / / nyon mongs pa can ni de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa 'thob pa'i phyir 'khor mang ba ma yin la phung po gsum gyis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no / / dge ba ni 'khor mang ba yin la phung po bzhis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no / / yang nyon mongs pa can ni stobs chung ba yin no /
ekayā hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyā daśānuśayātyantasamudghātaḥ kriyate / tasmādapi kliṣṭam parīttaṃ kuśalaṃ mahadgatam
# dge ba ni stobs che ba yin no / / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa gcig gis kyang phra rgyas bcu gtan du 'joms par byed pas de'i phyir yang nyon mongs pa ni chung ba yin la dge ba ni chen por gyur pa yin no /
uddhataṃ kliṣṭamauddhatyasaṃprayogāt
# rgod pa ni rgod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no /
anuddhataṃ kukśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvāt
# rgod pa ma yin pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no /
evamabyupaśāntṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ca
# rnam par ma zhi ba dang rnam par zhi ba yang de dang 'dra'o /
asamāhitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ vikṣepasaṃprayogāt / samāhitaṃ kuśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvāt
# mnyam par ma bzhag pa ni rnam par g yeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can no / / mnyam par bzhag pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no /
abhāvitaṃ kliṣṭaṃ pratilambhatiṣevaṇabhāvanābhyāmabhāvitatvāt / bhāvitaṃ kuśalaṃ tābhyāṃ bhāvitatvāt vimuktaṃ kliṣṭaṃ svabhāvasaṃtānavimuktibhyāmavimuktatvāt / vimuktaṃ kuśalaṃ tābhayaṃ vimuktatvāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ / evaṃ tu sūtraṃ nānulomitaṃ bhavati
# ma bsgoms pa ni 'thob pa dang bsten pa'i bsgom pa dag gis ma bsgoms pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can no; / / bsgoms pa ni de gnyis kyis bsgoms pa'i phyir dge ba yin no / / rnam par ma grol ba ni rang bzhin dang rgyud rnam par ma grol ba dag gis rnam par grol ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no / / rnam par grol ba ni de gnyis kyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dge ba yin no zhes zer ro / / de lta na ni mdo dang mi mthun par byas pa yang yin la /
eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavati / sūtra uktaṃ kathaṃ cittamadhyātmaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ bhavati
# tshig de rnams kyi don gyi khyad par yang ma bshad pa yin no / / ji ltar na mdo dang mi mthun par byas pa yin zhe na / / mdo las ji ltar na sems nang du kun du bsdus pa yin zhe na /
yaccittam styānamiddhasahagatamadhyātmaṃ saṃnirodhasahagataṃ no tu vipaśyanayā samanvāgatam
# sems gang rmugs pa dang gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur cing nang du kun du 'gog pa dang lhan cig par gyur la lhag mthong dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa yin no /
kathaṃ vahirvikṣiptaṃ bhavati
# ji ltar na phyi rol du rnam par g yengs pa yin zhe na /
yaccittaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣvanuvikṣiptaṃ bhavatyanuvisṛtamiti / nanu coktaṃ tadeva cittaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ syādvikṣiptaṃ ceti
# sems gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la rjes su g yengs pa yin zhing rnam par 'phros pa yin no zhes gsungs so / / sems de nyid kun du bsdus pa yin la rnam par g yengs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa yin nam zhe na /
uktamidamayuktaṃ tūktaṃ viddhasahagatasya kliṣṭasya vikṣiptatvāpratijñānāt / nanu coktaṃ śāstravirodhaḥ syāditi
# de skad du ni bshad mod kyi rigs par bshad pa ni ma yin te / / nyon mongs pa can gyi gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur ba rnam par g yengs pa nyid du dam ma bcas pa'i phyir ro / / bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa ma yin nam /
varaṃ śāstravirodho na sūtravirīdhaḥ
# bstan bcos dang 'gal ba ni bla'i mdo dang 'gal ba ni ma yin no /
kathameṣāṃ padānāṃ nārthaviśeṣa ukto bhavati
# ji ltar na tshig de rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ma bshad pa yin zhe na /
vikṣiptalilinoddhatāvyupaśāntāsamāhitābhāvitāvimuktānāṃ cittānāmabhinnalakṣaṇavacanāt saṃkṣiptapragṛhītādīnāṃ ca / na vai noktaḥ padānāmarthaviśeṣo bhavati / kliṣṭasāmānye 'pi taddoṣasaṃdarśanāt / ityapyetat kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnamiti vistaraḥ / evaṃ kuśalasyāpi guṇaviśeṣasaṃdarśanādukta evarthaviśeṣo bhavati
# sems rnam par g yengs pa dang zhum pa dang rgod pa dang rnam par ma zhi ba dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang ma bsgoms pa dang rnam par ma grol ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad pa'i phyir la / / kun du bsdus pa dang rab tu bzung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad pa'i phyir ro / / tshig rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ni ma bshad pa ma yin pa nyid de / / nyon mongs pa can du mtshungs kyang 'di ltar sems nyon mongs pa can 'di ni rnam par g yengs pa yin no / / 'di ni zhum pa yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par de'i nyes pa'i khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir la / / de bzhin du dge ba yang yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir don gyi khyad par bshad pa kho na yin no /
sūtravirodhasyāparihārānnaiṣa eṣāṃ padānāmarthaḥ / yadi ca sūtre tadeva līnaṃ cittaṃ tadevoddhatamityabhipretaṃ syāt idaṃ noktaṃ syāt / yasminsamaye līnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati layābhirśaṅka vā akālastasminsamaye prasrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyāḥ
# mdo dang 'gal ba ma spangs pa'i phyir de ni tshig de rnams kyi don ma yin no / / gal te mdo las sems de nyid zhum pa yang yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin no zhes bya bar bshad na ni gang gi tshe sems zhum pa dang zhum par dogs pa de'i tshe shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no /
yasminsagaye uddhātaṃ cittaṃ bhavati auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā akālastasminsamaye dharmavicayavīryaprītisaṃvodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyā iti
# gang gi tshe sems rgod pa dang rgod par dogs pa de'i tshe chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang brtson 'grus dang dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no zhes pa 'di dag gsungs par mi 'gyur ro /
kiṃ punarvodhyaṅgānāṃ vyagrā bhāvanā
# ci 'di la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so sor bsgom mam zhe na /
manasikaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bhāvaneṣṭā na saṃmukhībhāva ityadoṣa eṣaḥ / kauśīdyādhikamatra cittaṃ līnamityuktam / auddhatyādhikaṃ coddhatamityavirodhaḥ / tayostu sahabhāvāttadeva cittaṃ līnaṃ tadevoddhatamiti brūmaḥ
# 'di dag yid la byed pa bsgom pa yin par 'dod kyi mngon sum du gyur pa ni ma yin pas nyes pa med pa nyid do / / 'di las le lo lhag pa'i sems ni zhum pa zhes bshad la / / rgod pa lhag pa ni rgod pa zhes bshad pas 'gal ba med de / / de gnyis kyang lhan cig pa yin pa'i phyir sems de nyid zhum pa yang yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin zhes smra'o /
nābhiprayikaṃ vacanaṃ vāryate / sūtre tu nāyamabhiprāya iti brūmaḥ / yattūktaṃ sarvameva rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamiti / katamaccittaṃ rāgasaṃprayuktam
# bsam pa can gyi tshig la ni bzlog pa med kyi mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'di ma yin no zhes smra'o / / 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems thams cad 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no zhes gang bshad pa / / 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems gang zhig yin /
rāgaprāptisahitaṃ cet / asāsravamiti sarāgaṃ prāpnoti śaikṣacittam
# gal te 'dod chags kyi thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no zhe na ni slob pa'i sems zag pa med pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas par 'gyur ro /
rāgālambanaṃ cet / arhato 'pi sāsravaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamiti gṛhlīyāt / rāgālambanatvāt / kathaṃ vā tatsāsravam / sāmānya kleśālambanatvāditi cet
# gal te 'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin no zhe na ni dgra bcom pa'i sems zag pa dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhes bya bar gzung bar 'gyur te / / 'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / yang na ji ltar de zag pa dang bcas pa yin / / gal te nyon mongs pa spyi ba'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni /
evamapi samohaṃ gṛhlīyānmohālambanatvāt / na ca paracittajñānaṃ prāptyālambanaṃ nāpi taccittālambanaṃ rāgālambanam
# de lta na yang gti mug dang bcas par gzung bar 'gyur te / / gti mug gi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni thob pa la dmigs pa yang ma yin la / / sems de la dmigs pa'i 'dod chags la dmigs pa can yang ma yin no /
tasmānna rāgasaṃprayogātsarāgaṃ cittamatreṣṭam / kiṃ tarhi
# de lta bas na 'dir 'dod chags dang ldan pas 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par mi bya'o; 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamasaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgamiti sūtrābhigrāyo dṛśyate / yat tūktaṃ vigatarāgamasya taccittaṃ bhavati vigatadveṣaṃ vigatamohamanāvarttikadharmi kāmabhave rūpabhave ārupyabhave iti / tatra tatpraptivigamaṃ saṃdhāyoktam
# mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la / / 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no zhes bya bar snang ngo / / gang las 'di'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba yin / / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang gti mug dang bral ba yin / / 'dod pa'i srid pa dang gzugs kyi srid pa dang gzugs med pa'i srid par phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can yin zhes gsungs pa der ni de'i thob pa dang bral ba las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no /
nanu coktam anyakleśasaṃprayuktamapi cittaṃ rāgaviprayuktatvādvigatarāgaṃ syāditi / etenābhisaṃdhinā na doṣaḥ / na tu tadvigatarāgamiti kṛtvā gṛhyate
# nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ma yin nam dgongs pa 'di ni nyes pa med de / / de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya bar mi gzung ngo /
kiṃ tarhi / sadveṣaṃ samohamityevamādi / alaṃ prasaṅgena siddhānto varṇyatām / kiṃ paracittajñānaṃ paracittasyākāramālambanaṃ vā gṛhlāti
# 'o na ci lta zhe na / / zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par gzung ngo / / zhar la 'ongs pas chog go / / grub pa'i mtha' brjod par bya ste / / ci pha rol gyi sems shes pa pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa 'am dmigs pa 'dzin zhe na / / mi 'dzin to /
na gṛhlāti ākāralambananirapekṣaṃṃ hi tadraktamidaṃ cittamiti jānāti natvamuṣmin rupe raktamiti jānāti / anyathā hi tadrūpālambanamapi syāt tadālambanaṃ ca paracittaṃ gṛhlataḥ svabhāvagrahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt / sarvaṃ ca paracittajñānaṃ dravyasvalakṣaṇacittacaittapratyutpannaparasaṃtatikāmarūpapratisaṃyuktāpratisaṃyuktaviṣayaṃ darśanamārgapratiṣiddhaṃ bhāvanāmārga upalabhyate / śūnyatā 'nimittasamādhi viprayuktaṃ kṣayānutpādajñānāsaṃgṛhītamānantaryamārga pratiṣiddhaṃ ca vedittavyam
# de ni rnam pa dang dmigs pa la mi ltos pa yin te / / sems 'di chags pa yin no zhes bya bar shes kyi gzugs che ge mo zhig la chags so zhes bya bar ni mi shes so / / de lta ma yin na / / de gzugs la dmigs par yang 'gyur la / / de la dmigs pa'i pha rol gyi sems 'dzin pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro / / gzhan gyi sems shes pa thams cad ni sems dang sems las byung ba dang rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang da ltar byung ba dang pha rol gyi rgyud dang 'dod pa dang gzugs dang ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yul can mthong ba'i lam bkag pa dang bsgom pa'i lam la dmigs pa dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang mi ldan pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pas ma bsdus pa dang bar chad med pa'i lam bkag pa yin par rig par bya'o /
uktaṃ paracittajñānam
# pha rol gyi sems shes pa bshad zin to /
śeṣe caturdaśākāre śūnyānātmavivarjite
# lhag ma rnam pa bcu bzhi can / / stong dang bdag med ma gtogs so /
kṣayānutpādajñāne śeṣe te caturdaśākāre śūnyānātmakārau varjayitvā
# lhag ma ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag ste / / de gnyis ni stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag ma gtogs pa rnam pa bcu bzhi can yin no /
pāramārthikayorapi saṃvṛtibhajanāt śīṇā me jātirnāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti tadvalānuvyavahārataḥ / kimanāsravaḥ svalakṣaṇākāro 'styatha na
# don dam pa pa dag yin yang de dag gi stobs kyi rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i sgo nas bdag gi skye ba zad do / / 'di las srid pa gzhan rab tu mi shes so zhes kun rdzob la ston pa'i phyir ro / / ci zag pa med pa la rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa yod dam / / 'on te med ce na /
kāśmīrāṇāṃ tāvat / nāmalaḥ ṣoḍaśabhyo 'nya ākāraḥ / nāstyanāsravākāraḥ ṣoḍaśākāranirmuktaḥ
# re zhig kha che ba rnams kyi ltar na / / dri med bcu drug gzhan rnams med / / rnam pa bcu drug las ma gtogs pa zag pa med pa'i rnam pa med do /
anye 'sti śāstrataḥ / śranye punarastītyāhurvahirdeśakāḥ
# gzhan yod ces bya bstan bcos las / / gzhan nyi 'og pa rnams na re yod do zhes zer ro /
kathaṃ gamyate / śāstrataḥ iti / śāstre hyevamāha / syādapratisaṃyuktena cittena kāmapratisaṃyuktāndharmānvijānīyāt
# ji ltar na khong du chud ce na / / bstan bcos las zhes bya ba smos te / / bstan bcos las 'di skad du mi ldan pa'i sems kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na / / shes par 'gyur te /
anityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataḥ / astyetasthānamastyetadvastviti
# rigs pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa dang rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen dang 'di ni gnas yod do / / 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo /
yogavihitatī vijānoyāditi / nāsyāyamartho yadastyetatsthānamastyetadvastvityevaṃ vijānīyāditi api tvastyetat sthānamastyetadvastu yadanityādito vijānīyāditi cet
# gal te gang las 'di ni gnas yod do / / 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes de snyam du shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni 'di ma yin te / / 'on kyang mi rtag pa la sogs pa shes par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni gnas yod do / / 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya ba yin no /
na / anyatrāvacanāt
# zhe na / / ma yin te /
eṣa cecchāstrārtho 'bhaviṣyat
# gzhan nas mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
yadidaṃ paṭhacyate syāddarśanaprahātavyena cittena kāmapratisaṃyuktāndharmānvijānīyāditi / āha
# gal te 'di bstan bcos kyi don yin par 'gyur na / / 'di skad du mthong bas spang par bya ba'i sems kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na /
vijānīyāt
# shes par 'gyur te /
ātmata ātmīyata ucchedataḥ śāśvatataḥ ahetuto 'kriyāto 'pavādato 'grataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataḥ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataḥ kāṅkṣāto vimatito vicikitsātaḥ
# rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas bdag dang bdag gi dang rtag pa dang chad pa dang rgyu med pa dang byed pa med pa dang skur ba 'debs pa dang mchog dang gtso bo dang khyad par du 'phags pa dang dam pa dang dag pa dang grol ba dang nges par 'dzin par byed pa dang nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tshom du shes par 'gyur zhing /
rajyeta dviṣyānmanyeta muhyedayogavihitato vijānīyāditi / atrāpyevaṃ pāṭho 'bhaviṣyat / astyetat sthānamastyetadvastviti / na tvevaṃ paṭhacyate / tasmānnāsyāyamarthaḥ
# chags pa dang sdang ba dang rlom pa dang rmongs par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa der yang 'di skad du 'di ni gnas yod do / / 'di ni gzhi yod do zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig na / / de skad kyang mi 'byung ste / / de lta bas na 'di ni de'i don ma yin no /
kiṃ punarime ṣoḍaśākārā nāmata āhosvit dravyataḥ
# ci rnam pa bcu drug po 'di dag ming gi sgo nas sam / / 'on te rdzas su zhe na /
sapta dravyato nāmataḥ ṣoḍaśetyeke / duḥkhakārāścatvāraḥ samudayanirodhamārgākārāṇāmekakadravyatvāt
# kha cig na re rdzas su ni bdun yin la ming gi sgo nas ni bcu drug yin te / / kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams rdzas su re re yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
evaṃ tu varṇayanti / dravyataḥ ṣoḍaśākārāḥ / tatpratyayādhīnatvāt anityam
# 'di skad du brjod de rdzas su rnam pa bcu drug go / / de la rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o /
ṣīḍātmakatvāt duḥkham / ātmīyadṛṣṭivipakṣeṇa śūnyam
# gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o / / bdag gir lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis stong pa'o /
ātmadṛṣṭivipakṣeṇānātmā / heturvījadharmayogena
# bdag tu lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis bdag med pa'o / / sa bon gyi chos kyi tshul gyis rgyu'o /
samudayaḥ prādurbhāvayoigena
# 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshul gyis kun 'byung ba'o /
prabhavaḥ prabandhayogena
# 'brel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o /
abhiniṣpādanārthena pratyayaḥ
# mngon par sgrub pa'i don gyis ni rkyen te /
tadyathā mṛtpiṇdadaṇdacatrasūtrodakasamavāyāt ghaṭābhiniṣpattirbhavati tadvaditi / akndhoparamatvāt nirodhaḥ / agninirvāṣaṇāt śāntaḥ
# dper na 'jim pa'i gong bu dang thal zhar dang 'khor lo dang thag gu dang chu rnams 'dus pa las bum pa mngon par grub pa de bzhin no / / phung po zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o / / me gsum zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'o /
nirūpadravtvāt praṇītaḥ / sarvāpakṣālavimuktatvānniḥ saraṇamiti / gamanārthena mārgaḥ
# 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o / / skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o / / bgrod pa'i don gyis lam mo /
yogayuktatvānnyāyaḥ
# rigs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir rigs pa'o /
samyakpratipādanārthena pratipat
# yang dag par bsgrub pa'i don gyis sgrub pa'o /
atyantasamatikramaṇānnairyāṇika iti
# shin tu yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin par byed pa'o /
athavā anātyantikatvādanityam
# yang na gtan du ba ma yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o /
abhinyāsabhūtatvāt duḥkham / antarvyāpārapuruṣaparahitattvācchūnyam
# khur lta bur gyur pa'i phyir / / sdug bsngal ba'o / / nang gi skyes bu dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o /
akāmakāritvādanātmā / heturāgamanayogena
# 'dod dgur byed pa med pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o / / 'ong ba'i tshul gyis rgyu'o /
samudaya unmajjanayogena
# 'byung ba'i tshul gyis kun 'byung ba'o /
prabhavaḥ prasaraṇayogena
# 'phel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o /
pratisaraṇārghena pratyaya iti / asaṃbandhaḥ saṃbandhoparamatvānnirodhaḥ / trisaṃskṛtalakṣaṇavimuktatvācchāntaḥ / kuśalatvāt praṇītaḥ
# so sor 'brad ba'i tshul gyis rkyen no / / 'brel ba med pas 'brel pa zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o / / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang 'bral ba'i phyir zhi ba'o / / dge ba'i phyir gya nom pa'o /
paramāśvāsatvānniḥ saraṇamiti
# yid brtan pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o /
kumārgavipakṣeṇa mārgaḥ
# lam ngan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis lam mo /
anyāyavipakṣeṇa nyāyaḥ / nirvāṇapurāvirodhanārthena pratipat / sarvabhavapratipakṣatvānnairyāṇikaḥ / ityeṣāṃ vyākhyānamanekaparyāyaḥ
# rigs pa ma yin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis rigs pa'o / / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong dang mi 'gal ba'i don gyis sgrub pa'o / / srid pa thams cad kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byin par byed pa'o /
yathābhipretaṃ pravakṣyāmaḥ / udayavyayatvādanityam
# ji ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o /
pratikūlabhāvāt / duḥkham / ātmarahitatvācchūnyam
# mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o / / bdag dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o /
svayamanātmatvādanātma / hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayatvaṃ tu yadeva sūtra uktam / ime pañcopādānaskandhāśchandamūlakāśchandasamudayāśchandajātīyāśchandaprabhavā iti
# bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o / / rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen nyid ni gang mdo las nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag ni 'dun pa'i rtsa ba can / / 'dun pa las kun 'byung ba / / 'dun pa dang 'dra ba / / 'dun pa las rab tu skye ba dag yin no zhes gsungs pa kho na yin te /
prabhavaśabdaḥ kevalaṃ paścāt paṭhitavyaḥ śāstre
# rab tu skye ba zhes bya ba'i sgra tha mar gdon ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do /
kaḥ punareṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ
# yang 'di dag la khyad par ci yod ce na /
caturvidho hi cchandaḥ
# 'dun pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
asmītyabhedenātmabhāvcchandaḥ
# nga'o snyam pa ni bye brag med par lus pa 'dun pa yin no /
syāmityabhedena punarbhavacchandaḥ
# gyur cig snyam pa ni bye brag tu med par yang srid pa la 'dun pa yin no /
ityaṃ syāmiti bhedena punarbhavacchandaḥ
# 'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa ni / / bye brag tu yang srid pa la 'dun pa yin no /
pratisaṃdhivandhacchandaścaturthaḥ
# bzhi pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i 'ching ba la 'dun pa yin no /
karmābhisaṃskāracchando vā / tatra prathomo duḥkhasyādikāraṇatvānmūlahetuḥ / phalasyeva vījam / dvitīyaḥ samudayastena tatsamudāgamātphalasyevāṅkurādiprasavaḥ
# yang na las mngon par 'du byed pa la 'dun pa yin no / / de la dang po ni sdug bsngal gyi dang po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyu yin te / / 'bras bu'i sa bon bzhin no / / gnyis pa ni kun 'byung ba yin te / / des de yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir / / 'bras bu'i myu gu la sogs pa skye ba bzhin no /
tṛtīyastajjātīyaduḥkhapratyayaḥ / phalasyeva kṣotrodakapāśyādikam / kṣetrādivaśena hi phalasya gandharasavīryavipākaprabhāvabhedā bhavanti caturthaḥ prabhavastataḥ eva tatsaṃbhavāt phalasyeva puṣpāvasānamiti
# gsum pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rkyen yin te / / 'bras bu'i zhing dang chu dang lud la sogs pa bzhin no / / zhing la sogs pa'i dbang gis ni 'bras bu'i dri dang ro dang nus pa dang smin pa dang mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro / / bzhi pa ni rab tu skye ba ste / / de kho na las de skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i tha ma me tog bzhin no /
athavā / tṛṣṇāvicaritānāṃ dvau pañcakau dvau catuṣkau catvāraśchandāḥ
# yang na sred pa rnam par spyad pa rnams kyi 'dun pa bzhi ni sred pa'i bye brag rnams las lnga tshan gnyis dang bzhi tshan gnyis yin te /
asmīti bhikṣavaḥ sāti itthamasmīti bhavati evamasmīti bhavati anyathā 'smīti sadasmīti asadasmīti / bhaviṣyāmītyasya bhavati na bhaviṣyāmi itthaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi evaṃ bhaviṣyāmi śranyathā bhaviṣyāmi / syāmityasya bhavati itthaṃ syām evaṃ syām anyathā syām apitu syām apītthaṃ syām apyevaṃ syām apyanyathā syāmityasya bhavati / pravṛttyuparmatvānnirodhaḥ / nirduḥkhatvācchantaḥ / iti hi bhikṣavo duḥkhāḥ saṃskārāḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti vacanāta / niruttaratvāt praṇītaḥ / apunarāvṛttitvānniḥsaraṇam / pathibhūtatvānmārgaḥ / yathābhūtapravṛttatvānnyāyaḥ / pratiniyatatvāt pratipat / yathoktam / eṣa mārgo hi nāstyanyo darśanasya viśuddhaya iti
# dge slong dag nga'o snyam pa yod na nga 'di lta bu'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / / nga ni 'di 'dra'o snyam pa dang nga de lta ma yin no snyam pa dang nga bzang ngo snyam pa dang nga ngan no snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro / / de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam par 'gyur zhing / / de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar mi bya'o snyam pa dang 'di lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang 'di 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang de lta ma yin par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro / / de la gyur cig snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / / de la 'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa dang de 'dra bar gyur cig snyam pa dang de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang 'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang 'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no / / 'jug pa med pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o / / sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir zhi ba ste / / dge slong dag de ltar na 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o / / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / gong na med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o / / yang phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o / / lam lta bur gyur pa'i phyir lam mo / / yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du zhugs pa'i phyir rigs pa'o / / so sor nges pa'i phyir sgrub ba ste / / ji skad du mthong ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'di lam yin gyi gzhan ni med do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o /
atyantaniryāṇānnairyāṇikaḥ / athavā nityasukhātmīyātmadṛṣṭicaritānāṃ pratipakṣeṇānityaduḥkhaśunyānātmākārāḥ / ahetvekahetupariṇāmabuddhipūrvaka dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa hetusamudayaprabhavapratyayākārāḥ
# gtan du nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin pa'o / / yang na rtag pa dang bde ba dang bdag gi dang bdag tu lta pa spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag yin no / / rgyu med pa dang rgyu gcig pu dang 'gyur ba dang blo sngar btang ba dang lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen gyi rnam pa dag yin no /
nāsti mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ nirodhākāraḥ
# thar pa med do snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por 'gog pa'i rnam pa yin no /
duḥkho mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ śāntākāraḥ / dhyānasukhapraṇītadṛṣṭicaritānāṃ praṇītākāraḥ
# sdug bsngal la thar pa yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen bor zhi ba'i rnam pa yin no / / bsam gtan gyi bde ba gya nom pa yin par lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por gya nom pa yin no /
punaḥ punaḥ parihāṇito nātyantiko mokṣa iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ niḥsaraṇākāraḥ
# yang dang yang yongs su nyams bar 'gyur ba'i sgo nas thar ba ni gtan du ma yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa yin no /
nāsti mārgaḥ kumārgo 'yamanyo mārgaḥ punarāvartī mārga iti dṛṣṭicaritānāṃ mārganyāyapratipannairyāṇikākārā iti
# lam med do snyam pa dang lam 'di yin no snyam pa dang gzhan yang lam yin no snyam pa dang lam 'di yang lhag go snyam du lta bar spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du lam dang regs pa dang sgrub pa dang des par 'byin pa'i rnam pa dag yin no /
ākāro nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ
# rnam pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na /
prajñākāraḥ
# rnam pa shes rab /
evaṃ tarhi prajñā sākārā na bhaviṣyati
# de lta na ni 'o na shes rab gzhan dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir /
prajñāntarāsaṃyogāt / evaṃ tu yuktaṃ syāt / sarveṣāṃ cittacaittānāmālambanagrahaṇaprakāra ākāra iti / atha kiṃ prajñaivākārayati netyāha
# shes rab rnam pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur gyi / / 'di ltar rnam pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa 'dzin pa'i bye brag ni rnam pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs par 'gyur ro / / yang ci shes rab kho nas 'dzin par byed dam zhe na /
kiṃ tarhi
# smras bam yin no /
tayā saha / ākāraynti sālambāḥ / prajñā cānye ca sarve sālambanā dharmā ākārayanti
