# 'on ji lta bu zhe na / / de dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed / / shes rab dang dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos gzhan thams cad kyis kyang 'dzin par byed do /
sarvamākāryate tu sat
# yod pa thams cad gzung bya yin /
yatkiñcidasti sarvamākāryate / tadevaṃ kṛtvā siddhaṃ bhavati prajñā ākāraścākārayati cākāryante ca
# gang ci yod kyang rung thams cad gzung bar bya ba yin no / / de ltar byas na shes rab ni rnam ba yang yin / / 'dzin par byed pa yang yin /
ālambanā ākāryanta eveti / ataḥ parameṣāṃ jñānānāṃ kuśalādibhedaṃ nirvekṣyāmaḥ / tridhādyaṃ kuśalānyanyāni / saṃvṛtijñānaṃ ślokādau bhavatvādādyam / tattrividham / kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtam / anyāni nava jñānāni kuśalānyeva
# gzung bar bya ba yang yin no / / dmigs pa dang bcas pa gzhan ni 'dzin par byed pa dang gzung bar bya ba yin no / / dmigs pa med pa rnams ni gzung bar bya ba kho na yin no / / 'di man chad ni shes pa bcu po 'di dag gi dge ba la sogs pa'i bye brag bstan par bya ste / / dang po rnam gsum gzhan rnams dge / / kun rdzob shes pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i dang po ni yod pa'i phyir dang po ste / / de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin no / / shes pa gzhan dgu ni dge ba kho na yin no /
ādyaṃ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu
# dang pos rnams thams cad na /
kāmadhātī yāvadbhavāgre / dharmākhyaṃ ṣaṭsu / dharmajñānaṃ caturṣu dhyāneṣvanāgamye dhyānāntare ca / navasu tvanvayākhyaṃ / anvayajñānaṃ tāsveva ca ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣvārupyatraye ca / tathaiva ṣaṭ / duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgakṣayānutpādajñānānyapyetāsveva navasu bhūmiṣvabhedena / bhedena punrdharmajñānasaṃgṛhītāni ṣaṭsu anvayajñāna saṃgṛhītāni navasu / dhyāneṣvanyamanojñānaṃ / paracittajñānaṃ caturṣveva dhyāneṣu nānyatra / kāmarūpāśrayaṃ ca tat / kāmarūpadhātvośca tat paracittajñānaṃ saṃmukhīkriyate / kāmāśrayaṃ tu dharmāruyam
# 'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar na yod do / / drug na chos shes bya / / chos shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi dang mi lcogs pa med ba dang bsam gtan khyad par can na yod do / / dgu na rjes shes bya ba / / rjes su shes pa ni sa drug po de dag nyid dang gzugs med pa gsum na yod do / / de bzhin du drug / / sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog ba dang lam dang zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyang bye brag med bar ni sa dgu po de dag nyid na yod do / / dbye ba ni chos shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa drug na yod do / / rjes su shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa dgu na yod do / / gzhan yid shes pa bsam gtan bzhi / / pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi kho na na yod kyi gzhan na med do / / de na 'dod dang gzugs rten can / / pha rol gyi sems shes pa de ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi khams dag tu mngon sum du byed do / / chos shes bya ba 'dod rten can / / chos shes pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rten can kho na yin gyi / / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu ni mngon sum du mi byed do / / khams gsum pa yi rten can gzhan / / gzhan gang zhe na; pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang chos shes pa ma gtogs pa'o / / sa dag dang rten bshad zin to / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis bsdus pa brjod par bya ste / / de smras pa /
dharmajñānaṃ tu kāmadhātvāśrayameva / na rūpārupyadhātvoḥ saṃmukhīkriyate / anyattraidhātukāśrayam / kiṃ punaranyat / paracittajñānaṃ dharmajñānanirmuktam / kṛto bhūmyaśrayanirdeśaḥ / smṛtyupasthānasaṃgraho vaktavyaḥ / so 'yamucyate / smṛtyupasthānamekaṃ dhīrnirodhe / dhīḥ prajñā jñānamiti paryāyāḥ / nirodhajñānamekaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam / paracittadhīḥ / trīṇi / paracittajñānaṃ trīṇi vedanācittadharmasmṛtyupasthānāni / catvāri śeṣāṇi / nirodhaparacittajñānābhyāmanyāni jñānāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni / katamasya jñānasya kati jñānānyālambanam / dharmadhīgocaro nava / dharmajñānasya nava jñānānyālambanamanyatrānvayajñānāt / nava mārgānvayadiyoḥ
# 'gog blo dran pa nyer gzhag pa / / gcig ste blo dang shes rab dang / / shes pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs yin no / / 'gog pa shes pa ni gcig ste / / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no / / pha rol gyi sems blo ni gsum mo / / pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni gsum ste / / tshor ba dang sems dang chos dran ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin no / / lhag ma bzhi yin no / / 'gog pa dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa dag las gzhan pa'i shes pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no / / shes pa gang gis dmigs pa shes pa du zhig yin zhe na / / chos blo'i spyod yul dgu yin no / / chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni shes pa dgu yin te; rjes su shes pa ma gtogs so / / lam rjes blo yi dgu yin no /
anvayajñānasyāpi nava jñānānyālambanamanyatra dharmajñānāt
# rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa yang shes pa dgu yin te / / chos shes pa ma gtogs so /
mārgajñānasyāpi nava jñānānyālambanamanyatra saṃvṛtijñānāt
# lam shes pa'i dmigs pa yang dgu yin te / / kun rdzob shes pa ma gtogs so /
duḥkhahetudhiyordvayam / duḥkhasamudayajñānayordve saṃvṛtiparacitajñāne ālambanam / caturṇāṃ daśa
# sdug bsngal rgyu blo'i gnyis yin no; sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa dag gi dmigs pa dag ni gnyis te / / kun rdzob dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa yin no / / bzhi yi bcu yin /
saṃvṛtiparacittakṣayānutpādajñānānāṃ daśa jñānānyālambanam / naikasya / ekasya nirodhajñānasya naiva jñānamālambanam / yojyā dharmāḥ punardaśa / katame daśa / traidhātu kāmalā dharmā akṛtāśca dvidhā dvidhā
# kun rdzob shes pa dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni shes pa bcu char yang yin no / / gcig gi min / / 'gog pa shes pa ni gcig phu'i dmigs pa ni shes pa ma yin pa nyid do / / chos bcu dag ni sbyar bar bya / / bcu gang dag ce na / / khams gsum pa dang dri med chos /
saṃkṛtā dharmā aṣṭadhā kriyante
# 'dus ma byas rnams gnyis gnyis so /
kāmarūpārupyāvacarānāsravāṇāṃ saṃprayuktaviprayuktabhedāt / asaṃskṛtā dvidhā kriyante / kuśalāvyākṛtabhedāt / ime daśa dharmāḥ kathaṃ yojyāḥ kasya jñānasya katyālambanamiti / tatra saṃvṛtijñānasya sarve daśa dharmā ālambanam
# chos 'dus byas rnams la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med ba na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa rnams mtshungs par ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa brgyad du bya'o / / 'dus ma byas rnams la dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i bye brag gis rnam ba gnyis su bya'o / / chos bcu po 'di dag ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na / / shes pa gang gis dmigs pa du zhig yin zhes sbyar bar bya ste / / de la kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos bcu po thams cad yin no /
dharmajñānasya pañca / kāmāvacarānāsravā ścatvāraḥ kuśalaṃ cāsaṃskṛtam
# chos shes pa ni lnga ste / / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang gzhi dang 'dus ma byas dge ba yin no /
anvayajñānasya sapta
# rjes su shes pa ni bdun te /
rūpārupyāvacarānāsravāḥ ṣaṭ kuśalaṃ cāsaṃskṛtam
# gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang drug dang 'dus ma byas dge ba yin no /
duḥkhasamudayajñānayoḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ ṣaṭ / nirodhajñānasyaikaḥ / kuśalamevāsaṃskṛtam
# sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa dag gi ni drug ste / / 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams yin no / / 'gog pa shes pa'i ni gcig ste / / 'dus ma byas dge ba kho na yin no /
mārgajñānasya dvāvanāsravau
# lam shes pa'i ni gnyis te / / zag pa med pa dag yin no /
paracittajñānasya trayaḥ
# gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i ni gsum ste /
kāmarūpāvacarānāsravāḥ saṃprayuktāḥ / kṣayānutpādajñānayoḥ nava dharmā ālambanamavyākṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ muktvā
# 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa dang zag pa med pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba rnams yin no / / zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag gi dmigs pa ni chos dgu yin te / / 'dus ma byas lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so /
syādekena jñānena sarvadharmān jānīyāt / na syāt
# shes pa gcig gis chos thams cad shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na / / med do /
api tu
# 'on kyang /
sāṃvṛtaṃ svakalāpānyadekaṃ vidyādanātmataḥ / saṃvṛtijñānaṃ svasmātkalāpādanyān sarvadharmānanātvato jānīyāt sarvadharmā anātmāna iti
# kun rdzob gcig pus rang tshogs las / / gzhan ni bdag med nyid rigs 'gyur / / kun rdzob shes pas ni rang gi tshogs las gzhan pa'i chos thams cad ni bdag med ba'i zhes bdag med pa nyid du shes par 'gyur ro /
jsvabhāvastatsahabhuvaśca dharmāstasya svakalāpaḥ / teṣāmagrahaṇaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhedādekālambanatvāditi / saṃnikṛṣṭatvācca
# de'i rang gi tshogs ni rang gi ngo bo dang de dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i chos rnams yin te / / de dag ni yul dang yul can tha dad pa'i phyir dang dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir dang ha cang nye ba'i phyir mi 'dzin to /
tacca kāmāvacaraṃ śrutacintāmayaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ śrutamayam bhāvanāmayam / tasya vyavacchinnabhūmyālambanatvāt
# de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa las byung ba yin no / / gzugs na spyod pa ni thos pa las byung ba yin no / / bsgom pa las byung ba ni ma yin te / / de ni sa rnam pa chad pa las dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
anyathā hi yugapatsarvato vairāgyaṃ syāt / gatametat
# de lta ma yin na thams cad las cig car 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro / / 'di ni rdzogs so /
idaṃ tu vaktavyam
# gang zhig shes pa du dang ldan /
kaḥ katibhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgata iti
# zhes bya ba 'di brjod bar bya ste /
pṛthagjanastāvadekena samanvāgataḥ / saṃvṛtijñānena
# re zhig so so'i skye bo ni kun rdzob shes pa gcig bu dang ldan no /
vītarāgastu paracittajñānenāpi / āryaḥ punaḥ
# 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang yang ldan no / / 'phags pa ni /
ekajñānānvito rāgīprathame 'nāsravakṣaṇe / kāmāvītarāgo duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntavekenaiva saṃvṛtijñānena samanvāgato bhavati
# zag med skad cig dang po la / / chags can shes pa gcig dang ldan / / 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba zhig yin na / / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa la kun rdzob shes pa gcig kho na dang ldan pa yin no /
dvitīye tribhiḥ / duḥkhadharmajñāne tribhiḥ saṃvṛtijñānadharmajñānaduḥkhajñānaiḥ
# gnyis pa la gsum / / sdug bsngal la chos shes pa la ni kun rdzob shes pa dang chos shes pa dang sdug bsngal shes pa ste / / gsum dang ldan no /
ūrdhvastu catuṣrvekaikavṛddhimān
# yan chad ni / / bzhi la re re 'phel dang ldan /
ataḥ paraṃ caturṣu kṣaṇeṣu ekaikajñānavṛddhirasya jñātavyā / duḥkhe 'nvayajñāne 'nvayajñānaṃ vardhate / samudayanirodhamārgadharmajñāneṣu samudayanirodhamārgajñānāni vardhanta iti mārgadharmajñāne saptabhirjñānaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati / vītarāgastu sarvatrādhikena paracittajñānena samanvāgato veditavyaḥ
# de yan chad kyi skad cig ma bzhi la ni / / de la shes pa re re / / 'phel bar shes bar bya ste / / sdug bsngal la rjes su shes ba la ni rjes su shes pa 'phel la / / kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa rnams la ni kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams 'phel bas lam la chos shes pa la shes pa bdun dang ldan pa yin no / / 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni thams cad du gzhan gyi sems shes pa lhag par ldan par rig par bya'o /
atha kasyāmavasthāyāṃ kati jñānāni bhavyante
# yang na gnas skabs gang du shes pa du dag cig 'thob ce na /
yathotpannāni bhāvyante kṣāntijñānāni darśane
# mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang / / shes pa ji ltar skyes pa rnams /
anāgatāni / darśanamārge yadyadevotpadyate kṣāntirjñānaṃ vā tajjātīyamanāgataṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati tadākārā eva catvāraḥ
# ma 'ongs pa 'thob / / mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa'am / / shes pa gang dang gang skyes pa de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa de'i rnam pa bzhi kho na 'thob bar 'gyur ro / / ci'i phyir / / mthong ba'i lam la shes pa dang /
kasmāddarśanamārge sabhāgajñānākārabhāvanaiva gotrāṇāmaporatilabdhatvāt
# rnam ba 'dra ba kho na 'thob ce na / / rigs rnams ma thob pa'i phyir ro /
tatraiva sāṃvṛtaṃ cānvayatraye / tatraiva darśanamārge saṃvṛtijñānaṃ cāpi bhāvyate triṣu duḥkhasamudayanirodhānvayajñāneṣu
# de nyid las / / rjes gsum la ni kun rdzob kyang / / mthong ba'i lam de nyid la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa la rjes su shes ba gsum la kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo / / chos shes pa la ni ma yin te /
na dharmajñāneṣvakṛtsnasatyābhisamayāt
# bden pa zad par mngon par ma rtogs ba'i phyir ro /
ato 'bhisamayāntyākhyaṃ
# de nyid kyi phyir mngon rtogs mtha' zhes bya ba /
ata eva tadābhisamayāntikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānamākhyāvate
# de nyid kyi phyir kun rdzob shes pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba zhes bya ste /
ekaikasatyābhisamayānte bhāvanāt / kasmānna mārgānvayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchati
# bden pa re re mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes la 'thob pa'i phyir ro / / ci'i phyir lam la rjes su shes pa na 'thob bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
mārgasatyasya pūrva laukikena mārgeṇānabhisamitatvāt akṛtsnābhisamayācca
# lam gyi bden ba ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang zad par mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
kṛtsnaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ śakyate parijñātuṃ samudayaḥ prahātuṃ nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartu na tu mārgaḥ śakyate kṛtsno bhāvayitum ityabhisamayāntābhāvānna tasminnābhisamayāntikaṃ bhāvyate
# sdug bsngal zad par yongs su shes par bya ba dang kun 'byung spang bar bya ba dang; 'gog pa mngon du bya bar ni nus kyi / / lam ni zad par bsgom par mi nus pas mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir /
samudayo 'pi na tadā sarvaḥ prahīṇo bhavatīti na syādābhisamayāntikam / na / tatsatyadarśanaheyaḥ sarvaḥ prahīṇno bhavati / mārgastaddarśanaheyapratipakṣo na sarvaḥ śakyate bhāvayituṃ vahugotratvāt ityasti mahānviśeṣaḥ / darśanamārgaparivāratvādityapare
# de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba mi 'thob bo / / de'i tshe kun 'byung ba la yang thams cad spangs pa ma yin pas mngon par rtogs ba'i mtha' las byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na / / de'i bden pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad spangs pa yin no / / lam ni rigs mang ba'i phyir / / mthong bas spang ba'i gnyen por thams cad bsgom par mi nus pas khyad par cher yod do / / gzhan dag na re mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
tadidaṃ sādhyatvādajñāpakam / kiṃ punastadābhisamayāntikaṃ samvṛtijñānaṃ kadācitsaṃmukhīkriyate / na kadācit ekāntena hi
# 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir shes par byed pa ma yin no / / ci kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs ba'i mtha' las byung ba de res 'ga' mngon sum du byed dam zhe na / / nam yang mi byed de /
tadānutpattidharmakam
# gcig kho nar de ni mi skye ba'i chos can yin /
kathaṃ punastadbhāvitaṃ bhavati / alabdhalābhāt kathamidānīṃ tatpratilabdhaṃ yadi naiva saṃmukhīkartu śakyate
# ji ltar na de thob pa yin te / / ma rnyed pa las rnyed pa'i phyir ro / / da ni gal te de mngon sum du bya ba mi nus pa kho na yin na ji ltar na de rnyed pa yin /
prāptitaḥ / yasmāllabdhaṃ tasmāllabdhamityapūrvaiṣā nirdeśajātiḥ
# thob pa'i sgo nas so / / gang gi phyir rnyed pa de'i phyir rnyed do zhes ston pa 'di ni sngon ma byung ba'i rnam pa yin no /
tasmānnaivaṃ bhāvanā sidhyati / evaṃ tu sidhyati yad āhuḥ pūrvācāryāḥ / kathaṃ ca pūrvācāryā āhuḥ / lokottaramārgasāmarthyāt saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate yad vyutthitaḥ satyālambanam viśiṣṭataraṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti / eṣa eva ca tasya lābho yattatsaṃmukhībhāvasamarthāśrayalābhaḥ
# de lta bas na de lta na ni thob pa mi 'grub pa nyid kyis sngon gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer ba de lta na 'grub bar 'gyur ro / / sngon gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer zhe na / / 'jig rten las 'das ba'i lam gyi mthus de las langs nas 'jig rten pa'i shes pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa bden pa la dmigs ba mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba kun rdzob shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro / / de mngon sum du 'gyur bar nus pa'i rten rnyed pa gang yin pa de nyid rnyed pa yin te /
gotre hi labdhe labdhaṃ gautrikaṃ bhavati / eva tu necchanti vaibhāṣikāḥ / katibhūmikaṃ punastatsaṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate
# rigs rnyed na rigs las byung ba yang rnyed pa yin no zhes zer ro / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams ni 'di mi 'dod do / / sa du pa'i kun rdzob shes pa de 'thob ce na /
darśanamārgasya
# mthong ba'i lam gyis ni /
svadhobhūmi / yadbhūmiko darśanamārgo bhavati tadbhūmikam cāvarabhūmikaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāvyate
# rang dang 'gog pa mthong ba'i lam las sa gang pa yin pa sa de pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i kun rdzob shes pa 'thob ba ste / / gal te mthong ba'i lam mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa zhig yin na ni /
ānāgamyabhūmikaścedbhavati dvibhūmikaṃ bāvyate / anāgamyabhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ ca / evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmike darśanamārge saptabhūmikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ bhāṣyate / tatra punaḥ kati smṛtyupasthānāni / nirodhe 'ntyaṃ
# mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang sa gnyis pa thob la / / de bzhin du mthong ba'i lam / / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin na sa bdun pa'i kun rdzob shes pa thob ba'i bar du'o / / de yang dran ba nye bar gzhag pa du dag cig yin zhe na / / 'gog pa'i mtha' /
nirodhe 'bhisamite yat saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tadantyaṃ smṛtyupasthānaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānam
# 'gog pa'i mngon par rtogs pa'i kun rdzob shes pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tha ma ste / / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no /
ekasya parisaṃkhyānātsiddhaṃ bhavati śeṣaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānānīti
# gcig grangs bcad pas lhag ma ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no zhes bya bar grub pa yin no /
taccaitadābhisamayāntikaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ / svasatyākāraṃ
# kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba de ni rang bden rnams can /
yatsatyābhisamayāllabhyate tatsatyākārameva
# bden pa gang zhig mngon bar rtogs pa'i 'thob pa bden pa de'i rnam pa can kho na yin no /
tadākāravacanādālambanasya tadeva satyamityuktaṃ bhavati
# de'i rnam pa can yin no / / zhes smos pas 'di'i dmigs pa yang bden pa de nyid yin no zhes bshad pa yin no /
darśanamārgalabhyatvācca tat / yatnikam / prāyogikamityarthaḥ / saparivāragrahaṇātkāmarūpāvacārāṇi catuṣpañcaskandhasvabhāvāni
# de ni mthong ba'i lam gyis 'thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'bad las byung ba sbyor ba las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa smos pa'i phyir / / 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa ni phung po bzhi dang lnga'i rang bzhin yin no /
ṣoḍaśe ṣaṭ sarāgasya
# chags bcas bcu drug pa la drug /
bhāvyanta iti vartate
# 'thob ces bya bar sbyar te /
avītarāgasya ṣoḍaśe mārgānvayajñānakṣaṇe dve jñāne pratyutpanne / mārgajñānamārgānvayajñāne / purāgatāni ṣaṭ bhāvyante
# 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa las shes pa gnyis da ltar byung ba yin la / / ma 'ongs pa drug 'thob ste /
dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānāni / vītarāgasya sapta tu
# chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams so / / 'dod la chags dang bral bas bdun /
vītarāgasya paracittajñānaṃ saptamaṃ bhāvyate / sarāgabhāvanā mārge tadūrdhvaṃ saptabhāvanā
# 'dod chags dang bral bas ni bdun pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa 'thob bo / / de yi gong ma chags bcas kyi / / bsgom ba'i lam la bdun 'thob po /
ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇādurdhvaṃ bhāvanāmārge yāvanna vītarāgo bhavati tāvat sarveṣu prayogāntaryavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante
# skad cig ma bcu drug gi gong ma'i bsgom pa'i lam la ni ji srid du 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bam yin pa de srid du sbyor ba dang bar chad med pa dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste /
dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasaṃvṛtijñānāni / laukikaścet bhāvanāmārgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pratyutpannam / lokottaraścet caturṇāṃ dharmajñānānāmanyatamat
# chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams so / / gal te bsgom ba'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no / / gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa zhig yin na ni / / chos shes pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no; /
saptabhūmijayā 'bhijñākopyāptyākīrṇabhāvite
# sa bdun las rgyal mngon shes dang / / mi g yo 'thob dang spel bsgoms pa'i /
ānanataryapatheṣūrdhvaṃ muktimārgāṣṭake 'pi ca / saptajñānāni bhāvyante iti vartate / sapta bhūmayaḥ catvāri dhyānāni trayaścārupyāḥ / tāsāṃ jayaḥ vairāgyaṃ tasmin saptabhūmike vairāgye pañcasu cābhijñāsu akopyaprativedhe ca vyavakīrṇabhāvite ca dhyāne śaikṣasya yāvantaḥ ānantaryamārgāsteṣvapi sarveṣu sapta jñānāni bhāvyante tānyeva
# bar chad med pa'i lam dag dang / / gong ma'i grol ba'i lam brgyad la'ang / / shes pa bdun 'thob bo zhes bya bar sbyar te / / sa bdun ni bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa gsum mo / / de dag las rgyal ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste / / slob pas bdun po de dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang mi g yo ba rtogs par byed pa dang bsam gtan spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ji snyed ba de dag thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste / / de dag nyid do /
laukikeścet bhāvnāmārgaḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pratyutpannam
# gal te bsgom pa'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni / / kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no /
lokottaraśceccaturṇāmanvajñānānāṃ dvayośca dharmajñānayoranyatamat
# 'jig rten las 'das pa zhig yin na ni rjes su shes pa bzhi dang chos shes pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no /
akopyaprativedhe tu saṃvṛtijñānaṃ na bhāvyate / bhavāgrāprati pakṣatvāt / tatra jayajñānaṃ saptamaṃ veditavyam / saptabhūmivairāgyādapi cordhvaṃbhavāgravairāgye vimuktimārgeṣvaṣṭāsu saptaiva jñānāni bhāvyante
# mi g yo ba rtogs par byed ba la ni kun rdzob shes pa mi 'thob ste; srid pa'i tse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / der ni zad pa shes ba bdun ba yin par rig par bya'o / / sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i yang gong ma srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad la yang shes pa bdun kho na 'thob ste /
dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgaparacittajñānāni / saṃvṛtijñānaṃ na bhāvyate
# chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog ba dang lam dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams so / / kun rdzob shes pa ni mi 'thob ste /
bhavāgrāpratipakṣatvāt / pratyutpannaṃ tu caturṇāmanvayajñānānāṃ dvayośca dharmajñānayoranyatamat
# srid pa'i rtse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / rjes su shes pa rnam pa bzhi dang chos shes pa rnam pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no /
śaikṣottāpanamuktau vā ṣaṭsaptajñānabhāvanā / śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāṃ vimuktimārge sarāgasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā dharmānvayaduḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgajñānānāṃ vitarāgasya saptānāṃ paracittajñānaṃ prakṣipya
# slob pa sbyong ba'i grol ba la / / shes pa drug dang bdun 'thob bam / / slob pa 'dod chags dang bcas pas ni dbang po sbyor ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam la drug 'thob ste / / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams so / / 'dod chags dang bral bas ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa bsnan te /
saṃvṛtijñānasyāpyubhayoriti kecit / tatra matavikalpajñāpanārtho vāśabdhaḥ / prayogamārge tu tayoḥ saṃvṛtijñānasyāpi bhāvanā
# bdun 'thob bo / / 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kha cig na re gnyi gas kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo zhes zer ba'i lugs tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro / / sbyor ba'i lam la ni de gnyis kyis kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo /
ānantaryapatha ṣaṇṇāṃ / vītarāgasyāvītarāgasya vā śaikṣasyendriyottāpanāyāmānantaryamārge ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā pūrvavat
# bar chad med pa'i lam la drug / / slob pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yang rung / / 'dod chags dang ma bral ba yang rung / / dbang po sbyor ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam la drug 'thob ste /
na saṃvṛtijñānasya / darśanamārga sādṛśyāt
# snga ma bzhin no / / kun rdzob shes pa ni ma yin te / / mthong ba'i lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
na paracittajñānasya
# pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang ma yin te /
sarvānantaryamārga pratipiddhatvāt
# bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad la bkag pa'i phyir ro /
kimartha pratipidhyate / apratipakṣatvāt
# ci'i phyir bkag pa ci zhe na / / gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
bhavāgravijaye tathā / bhavāgravairāgye 'pyānantaryamārgeṣu ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāvanā tathaiva / navānāṃ tu kṣayajñāne
# de bzhin srid rtse'i rnam rgyal la / / srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la yang de bzhin du drug 'thob bo / / zad pa shes pa la dgu'o /
bhavāgravairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ kṣayajñānam / tatra navānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā anyatrānutpādajñānāt
# srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa ni zad pa shes pa yin te / / de la mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa dgu 'thob po /
akopyasya daśa bhāvanā
# mi g yo bas ni bcu 'thob bo /
yastvakopyadharmā bhavati tasya daśānāṃ jñānānāṃ bhāvanā
# mi g yo ba'i chos can gang yin pa des ni bcu 'thob ste /
anutpādajñānalābhāt / tatsaṃcare 'ntyamuktau ca
# mi skye ba shes pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro / / der 'pho ba'i grol ba tha ma la'ang /
yo 'pyakopyatāṃ saṃcarati tasyāpyantye vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvanā
# gang zhig mi g yo ba nyid du 'pho ba de'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma la yang bcu 'thob bo; /
proktaśeṣe 'ṣṭabhāvanā
# bshad pa'i lhag ma la brgyad 'thob bo /
kiṃ punaḥ śeṣam
# lhag ma yang gang zhig ce na /
kāmavairāgye navamo vimuktimārgaḥ saptabhūmivairāgyābhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāviteṣu vimuktimārgaḥ akopyaprativedho 'ṣṭau vimuktimārgāḥ sarve ca vītarāgasya prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ
# 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa dang sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa dag gis rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang mi g yo ba rtogs par byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sbyor ba dang khyad par can gyi lam thams cad de /
teṣu sarveṣvaṣṭau jñānāni bhāvyante / anāgatabhāvanayā kṣayānutpādajñāne hitvā
# de dag thams cad la ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs pa shes pa brgyad ma 'ongs pa 'thob pas 'thob pa ste /
śaikṣasyaivam / aśaikṣasya punarabhijñādiprayogavimuktaviśeṣamārgeṣu nava jñānāni daśa vā / abhijñāvyavakīrṇabhāvitānantaryavimuktimārgeṣu tvaṣṭau nava vā dvayostvabhhijñāvimuktimārgayoravyākṛtatvānna kicidanāgate bhāvyate / pṛthagjanasya tu kāmatridhyānavairāgyāntyavimuktimārgeṣu dhyānabhūmikeṣu ca prayogābhijñātrayavimuktimārgāpramāṇādiguṇābhinirhāreṣu saṃvṛtijñānamanāgataṃ bhāvyate paracittajñānaṃ cānyatra nirvedhabhāgīyebhyaḥ / teṣu hi paracittajñānaṃ na bhāvyate / darśanamārgaparivāratvāt / anyatrāpūrvamārgalābhe saṃvāṛtijñānamevānāgataṃ bhāvyate / atha kasminmārge katibhūmikaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvyate / saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvadyadbhūmiko mārgo yāṃ ca prathamato bhūmi labhate tadbhūmikamanāgataṃ bhāvyate / anāsravaṃ tu na kevalaṃ yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ
# slob pa ni de lta bu yin no / / mi slob pa'i mngon pa shes pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam rnams la shes pa dgu 'am bcu 'thob bo / / mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la ni brgyad dam dgu 'thob po / / mngon par shes pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa cung zad kyang mi 'thob bo / / so so'i skye bo ni 'dod pa dang bsam gtan gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma rnams dang bsam gtan gyis pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang mngon par shes pa gsum gyi rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang tshad med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par sgrub pa rnams la kun rdzob shes pa ma 'ongs pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang mngon par shes pa gsum gyi rnam par grol ba ma gtogs pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang 'thob bo / / de dag la ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa yang mi 'thob ste / / mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro / / sngon med pa'i lam thob pa gzhan la ni kun rdzob shes pa kho na ma 'ongs pa 'thob bo / / yang lam gang las du pa'i shes pa thob ce na / / re zhig kun rdzob shes pa ni lam sa gang pa'i yin pa dang dang po nyid du sa gang 'thob pas de pa'i ma 'ongs pa 'thob bo / / zag pa med pa'i lam gang yin pa 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do /
kiṃ tarhi / yardvarāgyāya yallābhastatra cādhaśca bhāvyate / yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi dvividho 'pi mārgo bhavati prayogamārgādiḥ yāṃ ca bhūmi labhate vairāgyatastdbhūmikānyadhobhūmikāni cānāsravāṇi jñānāni bhāvanāṃ gacchanti
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / gang las chags bral bya phyir gang / / 'thab pa der yang 'og ma'ang 'thob / / sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang lam yang sbyor ba'i lam la sogs pa rnam pa gnyis yin la / / 'dod chags dang bral ba sa gang zhig thob ba de'i sa ba dang sa 'og ma ba'i zag pa med pa'i shes pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro /
sāsravāśca kṣayajñāne / kṣayajñāne tu sarvabhūmikāḥ sāsravā api guṇāḥ kṣayajñānalābhikā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti a rajjucchedāducchvasantīva peḍāsādharmyeṇa
# zad pa shes la zag bcas kyang / / sa kun zad pa shes pa la ni zad pa shes pas 'thob pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i yon tan mi sdug pa dang dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang tshad med pa dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pas thams cad sprog ma thag pa bcad de / / dbugs phyin pa lta bu dang chos mthun pa 'thob ste /
svacittādhirājyaprāptasya prāptibhiḥ sarvakuśaladharmapratyudgamanādādhirājyaporaptau prābhṛtena viṣayapratyudgamanavat
# rgyal srid chen po thob na / / yul gyi mi rnams kyis dbul bar bya bas bsu ba bzhin du rang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid 'thob pa la dge ba'i chos thams cad 'thob pa rnams kyis bsu ba'i phyir ro /
yat kicillabhyate tatsarva bhāvyate
# gang ci rnyed pa de thams cad 'thob bam zhe na / / smras pa /
yadapūrva labhyate tat bhāvyate / labdhapūrva na bhāvyate / yadvihīnaṃ punarlabhyate na tt bhāvyate
# gang sngon med pa las rnyed pa yin pas / / de thams cad ni 'thob kyi / / sngon rnyed zin pa ni mi 'thob bo / / gang rnam par nyams pa las yang rnyed ba de yang mi 'thob ste /
bhāvitotsṛṣṭatvāt / kiṃ khalu pratilambha eva bhāvanā netyucyate
# thob pa btang ba'i phyir ro / / ci 'thob pa rnyed pa kho na yin nam zhe na /
caturvidhā hi bhāvanā / pratilambhabhāvanā niṣevaṇabhāvanā pratipakṣabhāvanā vinirdhāvanabhāvanā ca
# smras pa ma yin no / / 'thob pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / nyen pa 'thob pa dang bsten pa 'thob pa dang gnyen po 'thob pa dang thag bsring ba 'thob ba'o /
tatra / pratilambhaniṣevākhye śubhasaṃskṛtabhāvane
# de la rnyed pa dang bsten ces bya ba ni / / dge ba 'dus byas 'thob bo /
pratipakṣavinirdhavabhāvane sāsravasya tu
# gnyen po dang ni thag bsring ba'i / / 'thob pa zag dang bcas pa'i yin /
pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane kujñalasaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmanāgatānāmekā pratyutpannānāmubhe
# rnyed pa dang bsten pa 'thob pa dag ni dge ba 'dus byas rnams kyi yin te / / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi ni gcig go / / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi ni gnyi ga'o /
pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām / tadevaṃ kuśalasāsravāṇāṃ catasro bhāvanā bhavanti
# gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa dag ni / / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi yin te / / de ltar na dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi ni 'thob pa bzhi yin no /
anāsravāṇāṃ dve kliṣṭāvyākṛtānāṃ ca / bāhyābhidharmikāṇāṃ ṣaṭ bhāvnāḥ / etāścatasraḥ saṃvarabhāvanā vibhāvana ca
# zag pa med pa rnams dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi ni gnyis yin no / / chos mngon pa pa nyi 'og pa rnams kyi ltar na 'thob pa drug ste / / bzhi po de dag dang sdom pa 'thob pa dang rnam par 'jig pa 'thob pa'o /
indriyāṇāṃ pūrvī kāyasyottarā / ṣaḍigānīndriyāṇi sudāntāni yāvatsubhāvitāni tathā santyasminkāye kleśā iti vistaraḥ
# snga ma ni dbang po rnams kyi yin la / / phyi ma ni lus kyi yin te / / dbang po drug po 'di dag shin tu dul ba dang shin tu bsgoms pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang de bzhin du lus 'di la skra yang yod ces bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa yin no /
te tu pratipakṣanirdhāvabhāvanāntarbhūte iti kāśmīrāḥ
# gang dag kha che ba rnams na re de gnyis ni gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa'i khongs su 'dus so zhes zer ro /
sāmānyena sarveṣāṃ pudgalānāṃ kṣayajñāne guṇabhāvanoktā / aṣṭādaśāveṇikāstu buddhadharmā balādayaḥ
# gang zag thams cad kyis zad pa shes pa'i tshe / / yon tan 'thob pa'i phyir bshad kyi / / sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa / / stobs la sogs pa bco brgyad do /
ye buddhasyaiva bhagavataḥ kṣayajñāne bhāvanāṃ gacchanti nānyasya / katame 'ṣṭādaśa / daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni mahākaruṇā ca
# gang dag sangs rgyas kho nas zad pa mkhyen pa'i tshe brnyes par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa'o / / bco brgyad gang zhe na / / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang thugs rje chen po'o /
asādhāraṇaṃ hyāveṇikamityucyate / tatra / sthānāsthāne daśa jñānāni / sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni / aṣṭau karmaphale
# thun mong ma yin pas na ma 'dres pa zhes bya'o / / de la / / gnas dang gnas min shes pa bcu / / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa bcu yin no / / las 'bras la brgyad /
kamavipākajñānabalamaṣṭī jñānāni
# las dang rnam par smin pa 'am mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa brgyad de /
nirodhamārgajñāne hitvā
# 'gog pa dang lam shes pa dag ma gtogs so /
nava / dhyānādyakṣādhhimokṣeṣu dhātau ca
# bsam gtan sogs / / dbang po mos dang khams la ni / / dgu'o /
dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalaṃ nava jñānāni
# bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa dgu yin te /
nirodha jñānaṃ hitvā / evamindriyaparāparajñāna balaṃ nānādhimuktijñānabalaṃ nānādhātujñānabalaṃ veditavyam / pratipatsu tu / daśa vā / nava veti matavikalpā 'rtho vāśabdaḥ
# 'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs so / / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o / / lam dag la bcu'am / / 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dgu 'am zhes lugs tha dad pa'i don te /
yadi saphalā pratipat gṛhyate / sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni
# gal te lam de 'bras bu dang bcas par gzung na ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen ba'i stobs shes pa bcu'o /
na cennava / anyatra nirodhajñānāt
# gal te ma yin na ni dgu ste / / 'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs so /
saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dvayoḥ
# gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa yin /
pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānabalaṃ ca saṃvṛtijñānam / ṣaṭ daśa vā kṣaye / āsravakṣayajñānabalaṃ saḍ jñānāni dharmānvayanirodhakṣayānutpādasaṃvṛtijñānāniṃ / yadi nirodhajñānamevāsravakṣayajñānam
# sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang shi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun rdzob shes pa yin no / / zad pa drug gam bcu yin no / / gal te zag pa zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa kho na zhig yin na ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs shes pa drug yin te / / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang 'gog pa shes pa dang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams so /
atha kṣīṇasravasaṃtāne jñānamāsravakṣayajñānaṃ tato daśa jñānāni
# 'on te zad pa shes pa zad pa zad pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i shes pa yin na ni / / des na shes pa bcu yin no /
uktaḥ svabhāvo bhūmiridānīmucyate
# rang bzhin bshad zin to / / da ni sa brjod par bya ste /
prāṅinavisacyutotpādabaladhyāneṣu
# sngon gnas shi 'pho skye ba'i stobs / / bsam gtan dag na /
cyutireva cyutam / pūrvanivāsacyutyupapatījñānaṃ balaṃ caturdhyānabhūmikam
# 'chi 'pho ba ni 'chi 'pho ba kho na ste / / sngon gyi gnas dang shi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa ba yin no /
śeṣitam / sarvabhūmiṣu / śeṣaṃ balaṃ sarvabhūmisaṃgṛhītam
# lhag ma ni sa rnams kun na / / stobs lhag ma ni sa thams cad kyis bsdus pa yin te /
tāḥ punarekādaśa / kāmadhāturanāgamya dhyānāntaraṃ dhyānārupyāśca
# de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams dang mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o /
sarvāṇi / jambūdvīpapuruṣāśrayāṇi
# thams cad kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa'i rten can yin te /
anyatra duddhānutpādāt / tadetaddaśavidhaṃ jñānamanyasya balaṃ nocyate
# gzhan du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / shes pa rnam pa bcu po 'di nyid gzhan gyi ni stobs zhes mi bya'o /
buddhasyaiva balamiti
# sangs rgyas kho na'i stobs zhes bya'o /
kenāsya balamavyāhatam yataḥ
# ci'i phyir / / 'di'i stobs gang phyir thogs mi mnga' /
yasmādasya sarvatra jñeye jñānabhavyāhataṃ vartate tasmādvalam
# gang gi phyir 'di'i mkhyen pa shes bya thams cad la thogs pa mi mnga' bar 'jug pa de'i phyir stobs yin no /
aneṣāṃ tu vyāhanyate / jñānaṃ vavacidicchatāmapyapravṛtteriti nārhati tadbalādhyāṃ labdhum / sthaviraśāriputreṇa pravrajyāpekṣapuruṣapratyākhyānaṃ śyenopadrutasya pakṣiṇa upapattyādīparyantājñānaṃ cātrodāharaṇam
# gzhan dag gi shes pa ni la lar 'dod kyang mi 'jug pa'i phyir / / thogs pa yin pas de ni stobs zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'os pa ma yin te / / 'dir dpe ni gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi phyir btang ba dang bya zhig khras gtses pa skye ba la sogs pa'i mtha' ma shes pa lta bu yin no /
evaṃ tāvadavyāhatajñānatvādbuddhānāṃ jñeyavadanantaṃ mānasaṃ balam
# re zhig de ltar na mkhyen pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi stobs ni shes bzhin du mtha' yas pa yin no /
nārāyaṇabalaṃ kāye
# sku la sred med bu yi stobs /
kāye punarbuddhasya nārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ varṇayati
# sangs rgyas kyi sku la ni srid med bu'i stobs mnga'o zhes brjod do /
saṃdhiṣvanye
# gzhan dag tshigs na /
sandhau sandhau nārāyaṇabalamityapare
# gzhan dag na re tshigs dang tshigs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs mnga'o zhes zer ro /
mānasavat kāyikamapyasyāna taṃ balamiti bhadantaḥ / anyathā hyananatajñānabalasahiṣṇu naṃ syāditi
# btsun pa na re sku'i stobs kyang thugs kyi stobs bzhin du mtha' yas pa yin no / / de lta ma yin na mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pas bzod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro /
nāgagrandhiśaṅkalāśaṅkusaṃdhayaśca budhapratyekabuddhacakravartinaḥ
# sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi tshigs kyi mdud pa dang lu gu brgyud dang gzar bus btab pa lta bu dag yin no /
kiṃ punarnārāyaṇasya balasya pramāṇam
# sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi tshad ji tsam zhe na /
daśādhikam / hastyādisaptakabalam
# glang chen sogs bdun cus glags pa'i stobs yin no /
yaddaśānāṃ prākṛtahastināṃ balaṃ tadekasya gandhahastinaḥ
# glang po che phal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni spos kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs yin no /
evaṃ mahānagnapraskandivarāṅgacānūranārāyaṇānāṃ daśottaravṛddhirvattavyā
# de bzhin du tshan po che chen po dang rab gnon dang yan lag mchog dang stobs mchog dang sred med kyi bu rnams gong nas gong du bcu 'gyur du bskyed de brjod par bya'o /
prākṛtagandhahastimahānagnapraskandināṃ daśāttaravṛddhacyārdhanārāyaṇaṃ balaṃ tat dviguṇaṃ nārāyaṇa mityapare / yathā tu vahutara tathā yujyate / spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ ca tat / taccatatkāyikaṃ balaṃ sarvasyaiva spraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvaṃ mahābhūtaviśeṣa eva
# gzhan dag na re glang po che phal ba dang spos kyi glang po che dang tshan po che chen po dang rab gnon dang yan lag mchog dang stobs mchog rnams gong nas gong du bcu 'gyur du bskyed pa ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi phyed yin la / / de gnyis su bsgyur ba ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs yin no zhes zer te / / ji ltar ches che ba de ltar rung ngo / / de ni reg bya'i skye mched do / / lus kyi stobs de ni thams cad kyang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba chen po'i khyad par kho na yin par rig par bya'o /
upādāyarūpaṃ saptabhyo 'rthāntaramityapare
# gzhan dag na re bdun las don gzhan du gyur pa rgyur byas pa'i gzugs yin no zhes zer ro /
uktāni valāni / vaiśāradhyaṃ caturdhā tu
# stobs rnams bshad zin to / / mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi /
yathāsūtram / etāni punaścatvāri vaiśāradyāni
# mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no / / mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang /
yathādyadaśame bale / dvitīyasaptame caiva / yathā sthānāsthānajñānabalamevaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me sate ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam / yathāsravakṣayajñānabalamevaṃ kṣīṇāsravasya vata me sata ityetadvaiśāradyam / yathā karmasvakajñānavalamevaṃ ye vā punarmayā śrāvakāṇāmantarāyikā dharmā ādhyātā ityetadvaiśāradyam / yathā sarvatragāminī pratipajjñānaṃ valamevaṃ yo va punarmayā śrāvakāṇāṃ niryāṇāya mārga ādhyāta ityetadvaiśāradyaṃ veditavyam
# ji ltar stobs ni dang po dang bcu pa gnyis pa bdun pa bzhin no / / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar / / kye mang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o / / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar kye mang zag pa zad par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o / / las bdag gir bya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar ngas gang dag nyan thos rnam la bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o / / kun du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar das gang nyan thos rnams kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o /
kathaṃ na jñānameva vaiśārdyam / nirbhayatā hi vaiśāradyam
# ji ltar na mkhyen pa nyid mi 'jigs pa yin zhe na / / mi 'jigs pa ni mi skrag pa yin la /
ebhiśca nirbhayo bhavati
# 'di dag gis kyang mi skrag par 'gyur ro /
jñānakṛtaṃ vaiśāradyaṃ yujyate / na jñānameva / trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni parṣadbhedāt bhavanti yathāsūtram
# shes pas byas pa ni mi 'jigs par rung gi shes pa nyid ni ma yin no / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni 'khor gyi bye brag las gsum yin te /
tattvetat / smṛtiprajñātmakaṃ trayam / smṛtisaṃprajñānasvabhāvānyetāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni
# mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no / / de yang dran pa shes rab dag nyid gsum / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum po 'di dag ni dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no /
yadā śrāvakasyāpi śuśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūpamāṇobhayeṣvānandī na bhavatyāghāto vā
# gang gi tshe nyan thos dag kyang gus par nyan pa dang gus par mi nyan pa dang gnyi ga la kun du dga' ba'am / / kun nas mnar sems mi 'byung ba na /
kasmādete āveṇikā buddhadharmā ucyante
# ci'i phyir / / 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya zhe na /
savāsanaprahāṇāt / athavā yasya śrāvakāstasya cacchūśrūṣamāṇāśuśrūṣamāṇobhayeṣu saumanasyādyavakāśaḥ sutarāṃ na tathā 'nyasyeti tasyaiva tānutpādādāścarya vyavasthāpyate nānyasyeti
# bag chags dang bcas par spangs pa'i phyir ro / / yang na nyan thos rnams gang yin pa de la ni gus par nyan pa dang gus par mi nyan pa dang gnyis po de dag la shin tu yang yid bde ba la sogs pa'i go skabs su mi 'gyur gyi / / gzhan la ni de lta ma yin pas de kho na la de mi 'byung ba ya mtshan du rnam par gzhag gi gzhan la ni ma yin no /
mahākaruṇedānī vaktavyā
# da ni thugs rje chen po brjod par bya ste /
seyamucyate
# de smras pa /
mahākṛpā saṃvṛtidhīḥ
# thugs rje chen po kun rdzob blo /
saṃvṛtijñānātmikā mahākaruṇā
# thugs rje chen po ni kun rdzob shes pa'i bdag nyid yin no /
anyathā hi na sarvasattvālambanā sidhyet na ca triduḥkhatākārā / karuṇāvat / kasmādiyaṃ mahākaruṇetyucyate
# de lta ma yin na sems can thams cad la dmigs par yang mi 'grub la / / snying rje bzhin du sdug bsngal gsum gyi rnam pa can du yang mi 'grub bo / / 'di ci'i phyir thugs rje chen po zhes bya zhe na /
saṃbhārākāragocaraiḥ
# tshogs dang rnam pa spyod yul dang /
samatvādādhimāvyācca
# mnyam pa'i phyir dang ches che'i phyir /
sabhāreṇa mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamāt
# tshogs ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen pos yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro /
ākāreṇa triduḥkhatākaraṇāt
# rnam pa ni sdug bsngal gsum la rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
ālambanena tridhātukālambanāt
# dmigs pa ni khams gsum pa'i sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
samatyena sarvasattveṣu samavṛttitvāt
# mnyam pa nyid ni sems can thams cad la 'dra bar 'jug pa'i phyir ro; /
abhimātratvena sarvasttveṣu samavṛttitvāt
# ches che ba nyid ni de bas cha ba med pa'i phyir ro /
adhimātratvena tato 'dhimātratarābhāvāt / karuṇāmahākaruṇayoḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇam
# snying rje dang thugs rje chen po gnyis la tha dad du bya ba ni ci zhig yod ce na /
nānākaraṇamaṣṭdhā
# tha dad bya ba rnam pa brgyad /
svabhāvato 'dveṣāmohasvabhāvatvāt / ākārata ekatriduḥkhatākāratvāt / ālambanata ekatridhātvālambanatvāt / bhūmitaścaturdhyānacaturthadhyānabhūmikatvāt
# ngo bo nyid las ni zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / / rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal gcig dang gsum gyi rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro / / dmigs pa las ni khams gcig dang gsum gyi sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / sa las ni bsam gtan bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
saṃtānataḥ śrāvakādibuddhasaṃtānajatvāt / lābhataḥ kāmadhātubhavāgravairāgyalabhyatvāt / aparitrāṇaparitrāṇataḥ atulyakaruṇāyanācca
# rgyud las ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / thob pa las ni 'dod pa'i khams dang srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa'i phyir ro /
kiṃ punaḥ sarve buddhāḥ sarvaprakārasāmānyā bhavanti / netyāha
# yongs su mi skyob pa dang yongs su skyob pa dang mi 'dra ba dang 'dra bar thugs rje mdzad pa'i phyir ro /
saṃbhāradharmakāyābhyāṃ jagataścārthacaryayā
# ci sangs rgyas thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyis mnyam ba yin nam zhe na /
samatā sarvabuddhānāṃ nāyurjātipramāṇataḥ
# sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang ni / / chos sku 'gro ba'i don spyod pas /
tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sāmyaṃ sarvabuddhānām / sarvapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamudāgamataḥ dharmakāyapariniṣpattitaḥ arthacaryayā ca lokasya / āyurjātigotrapramāṇakṛtastu bhedo bhavati
# mnyam pa nyid de sku tshe dang / / rigs dang sku bong tshod kyis min / / sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu gsum po sngon gyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'grub pa dang chos kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa dang 'jig rten gyi don spyod pas mnyam pa nyid yin no /
cirālpatarajīvanāt kṣatriyavrāhmaṇajātibhedāt kāśyapagautamādigotrabhedāt alpānalpapramāṇabhedācca yathakālamiti / etāmeva ca trividhāṃ saṃpadaṃ manasikurvāṇena viduṣā śakyaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike tīvraprema gauravaṃ cotpādayituṃ yaduta hetusaṃpadaṃ phalasaṃpadamupakārasaṃpadaṃ ca
# sku tshe dang rigs dang gdung dang sku bong tshod du mdzad pa la ni bye brag yod de dus ji lta ba bzhin du yun shin tu ring ba dang thung ngur 'tsho ba'i phyir dang rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs tha dad pa'i phyir dang 'od srungs dang sh'akya la sogs pa gdung tha dad pa'i phyir dang sku bong tshod chung ba dang chung ba ma yin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro / / phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di kho na yid la byed pa mkhas pas ni / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dga' ba dang gus pa chen po skyed par nus te / / 'di lta ste / / rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'o /
tatra caturdhā hetusaṃpat
# de la rgyu phun sum tshogs pa ni; rnam pa bzhi ste /
sarvapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārābhyāso dīrghakālābhyāso nirantarābhyāsaḥ satkṛtyābhyāsaśca
# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la goms pa dang yun ring po nas goms pa dang bar chad med par goms pa dang gus par byas te goms pa'o /
caturvidhā phalasaṃpat / jñānasaṃpat prahāṇasaṃpat prabhāvasaṃpadrūpakayasaṃpacva
# 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa ba ni ste / / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang spang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'o /
caturvidhopakārasaṃpat / apāyatrayasaṃsāraduḥkhātyantanirmokṣasaṃpat yānatrayasugati pratiṣṭhāpanasaṃpadvā / jñānasaṃpat punaścaturvidhā
# phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste / / ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las gtan du thar bar mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o / / yang na theg pa gsum dang bde 'gro la 'god par mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o / / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
anupadiṣṭajñānaṃ sarvatrajñāna sarvathājñānamayatnajñānaṃ ca
# ma bstan par mkhyen pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ma 'bad par mkhyen pa'o /
caturvidhā prahāṇasaṃpat / sarvakleśaprahāṇam atyantaprahāṇaṃ savāsanaprahāṇaṃ sarvasamādhisamāpattyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ ca caturvidhā prabhāvasaṃpat
# spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste / / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang gtan du spangs pa dang bag chags dang bcas te spangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib ba thams cad spangs pa'o / / mthu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
bāhyaviṣayanirmāṇapariṇāmanā dhiṣṭhānavaśityasaṃpat āyurutptargādhiṣṭhānavaśitvasaṃpat āvṛtākāśadūrakṣīpragamanālpavahutvapraveśana vaśitvasaṃpat vividhanijāścaryadharmasaṃpacca
# phyi'i yul sprul pa dang yongs su bsgyur ba dang sku tshe gtong ba dang byin gyis rlob pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang sgrib pa dang nam mkha' dang shin tu ring ba la myur du gshegs pa dang chung ngur mang po 'jug par mdzad pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang ya mtshan gyi chos nar ma rnam ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'o /
caturvidhā rūpakāyasaṃpat
# gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
lakṣaṇasaṃpat anuvyañjanasaṃpat balasaṃpat vajrasārāsthisaṃpat / ityetatsāmāsikaṃ buddhānāṃ māhātmyam / anantaprabhedaṃ tu tadbhidyamānaṃ jāyate
# mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang sku gdung rdo rje ltar sra ba nyid phun sum tshogs pa'o / / de ltar na de dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid mdor bsdus pa yin no / / de dbyen ni mtha' yas par 'gyur te /
tacca punarbuddhā eva sakalaṃ jñātuṃ baktuṃ ca samarthāḥ yadyanekāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kalpaṃ jīvitamadhitiṣṭheyuḥ
# de yang bcom ldan 'das rnams kho na nas gal te sku tshe bskal pa grangs med pa du mar byin gyis brlabs par gyur na mtha' dag mkhyen pa dang brjod par spyod do /
evaṃ ca tāvadanantādbhūtaguṇajñānaprabhāvopakāramāharatnākarāstathāgatāḥ / atha capunarbālāḥ svaguṇadāridracyahatādhimokṣāḥ śruṇvanto 'pi tāṃ tādṛśīṃ guṇasamṛddhiṃ buddhaṃ ca nādriyante tasya ca dharmam
# re zhig de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan dang ye shes dang mthu dang phan 'dogs pa mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba ni rin po che chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no / / 'on kyang byis pa rang nyid yon tan dbul bas mos pa bcom pa rnams ni yon tan 'byor pa de lta bu de thos su zin kyang sangs rgyas dang de'i chos la gus par mi byed kyi /
paṇḍitāstu punarmajjābhirapi taṃ bhagavantamabhiprapadyante tasya ca dharmam
# mkhas pa rnams ni rkang yan chad nas kyang / / bcom ldan 'das de dang de'i chos la mngon par rab tu dang bar 'gyur te /
te he śraddhāmātrakeṇāpyekāntikenābhiprasannā aniyatavipākānāṃ pāpānāṃ rāśīnabhibhūya daivīṃ mānuṣīṃ ca śriyamabhibhūya nirvāṇaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvartante / ata eva tathāgatā anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetramucyante
# gcig tu rab tu dang ba de dag ni dang ba tsam gyis kyang rnam par smin par ma nges pa'i sdig pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan te lha dang mi'i legs pa nyams su myong nas bgrod par bya ba'i mchog mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro / / de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa zhes bya ste /
avandhyeṣṭhaporakṛṣṭāśusvantaphalatvāt / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā / ye 'nyānapi jine kārānkariṣyanti vināyake / vicitraṃ svargamāgamya te lapsyante 'mṛtaṃ padamiti / ime tāvadaṣṭādaśa buddhānāmāveṇikā dharmā ucyante
# 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang mchog tu gyur pa dang myur ba dang mtha' bzang ba'i phyir ro / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / / gang dag rgyal ba rnam 'dren la / / bya ba chung ngu byed 'gyur ba'ang / / de dag mtho ris sna tshogs dag / / bgrod nas bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob / / ces gsungs so / / re zhig de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o /
śiṣyasādhāraṇā anye dharmāḥ / śrāvakasādhāraṇāstvanye guṇā buddhānām / kecit pṛthagjanaiḥ / ke punasta iti yathāyogam
# chos gzhan slob dang thun mong min / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan gzhan dag ni nyan thos dang thun mong yin no / / kha cig so so'i skye bo dang de dag kyang gang zhe na / / ci rigs par / / nyon mongs med dang smon nas shes / / so so yang dag rig sngon sogs /
araṇāpraṇidhijñānapratisaṃvidguṇādayaḥ / araṇapraṇidhijñānapratisaṃvidabhijñādhyānārupyāṃpramāṇavimokṣābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanādayaḥ / tatrāraṇā nāma kaścidevārhan kleśaprabhavaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ viditvātmānaṃ ca dakṣiṇīyaviśeṣaṃ pareṣāṃ tadālambanaṃ kleśotpādaṃ parihartukāmastādṛśaṃ jñānamutpādayati bhena pareṣāṃ sarvathā 'pi raṇaṃ notpādayati
# nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa dang tshad med pa dang rnam par thar pa dang zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang zad par gyi skye mched la sogs pa'o / / de la nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa la sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni nyon mongs pa las rab tu skye ba dang bdag nyid kyang yon gnas gyi [*kyi] khyad par yin par rig nas pha rol po dag de la dmigs nas / / nyon mongs pa skye ba yongs su spangs par 'dod de /
na kasyacittadālambano rāga utpadyate dveṣo māno vā / naiṣā pratipat kañcideva raṇayatītyaraṇā / sā punareṣā / saṃvṛtijñānamaraṇā / ayamasyā svabhāvaḥ / dhyāne 'ntye / caturthadhyāna bhūmikā sukhapratipadāmagratvāt
# gang gis na pha rol po dag rnam pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa skye bar mi byed cing 'ga' yang de la dmigs nas 'dod chags sam / / zhes sdang ngam / / nga rgyal skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes pa skyed bar byed pa ste / / lam de ni 'ga' yang nyon mongs pa skyed par mi byed pas na nyon mongs pa med pa yin no / / nyon mongs pa med par de ni / / kun rdzob shes / / de'i rang bzhin ni 'di yin no / / bsam gtan mtha' na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin te / / lam sla ba rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro /
akopyadharmaṇaḥ
# mi g yo ba'i chos /
nānyasyārhataḥ / anyo hi svasaṃtānādapi kadācit kleśaraṇaṃ parihartu na śaknoti
# dgra bcom pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin te / / gzhan ni res 'ga' rang gi rgyud las kyang nyon mongs pa mtha' dag yongs su spang bar mi nus so /
nṛjā / manuṣyeṣvevotpadyate triṣu dvīpeṣu
# mis skyed / / gling gsum du mi dag gi nang kho nar skyed par byed do /
anutpannakāmāptasavastukleśagocarāḥ
# nyon mongs 'dod gtogs pa / / ma skyed gzhir bcas spyod yul can /
anāgatāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ savastukāḥ kleśāḥ asyā ālambanaṃ nāpareṣāṃ kleśa udapādītyevaṃ pravṛttatvāt
# 'di'i dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa ma 'ongs pa gzhi dang bcas pa rnams yin te / / pha rol po dag nyon mongs pa skye bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba de ltar zhugs pa'i phyir ro /
avastukāstu kleśā na śakyāḥ parihartuṃ sarvatragāṇāṃ sakalasvabhūmyālambanatvāt
# nyon mongs pa gzhi med pa rnams ni yongs su spang bar mi nus te / / thams cad du 'gro ba rnams ne rang gis mtha' dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
yathā cāraṇoktā / tathaiva praṇidhijñānaṃ / tadapi hi saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dhyāne 'ntye 'kopyadharmaṇaḥ manuṣyāśrayaṃ ca
# nyon mongs pa med pa ji skad du bshad pa / / smon nas shes pa'ang de bzhin no / / de yang kun rdzob shes pa dang / / bsam gtan mtha' na yod pa dang / / mi g yo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang mi'i rten can yin no /
sarvālambaṃ tu tat / sarvadharmālambanaṃ tu praṇidhijñānamityeva viśeṣaḥ
# de'i dmigs pa thams cad do / / smon nas shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos thams cad yin bas 'di ni bye brag yin no /
ārupyāstu na sākṣāt prāṇidhijñānena jñāyante
# bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re smon nas shes pa gzugs med pa rnams mngon sum du mi shes so /
kiṃ tarhi / niṣpannacaritaviśeṣāt / karṣakanidarśanaṃ cātreti vaibhāṣikāḥ
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / rgyu mthun pa dang spyod pa'i bye brag las shes te / / 'dir dpe ni zhing ba lta bu'o zhes zer ro /
praṇidhipūrvakaṃ jñānaṃ praṇidhijñānaṃ yaddhi praṇidhāya prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
# smon pa sngar btang ba'i shes pa ni smon nas shes pa ste / / 'di shes par bya'o snyam du smon nas rab kyi mtha'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /
idaṃ jānīyāmiti tadyathābhūtaṃ jānāti / sarvastatsamādhiviṣayaḥ
# ting nge 'dzin de'i yul du ji tsam zhig gyur pa gang yin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'o /
tathā / dharmārthayorniruktau ca pratibhāne ca saṃvidaḥ
# de bzhin chos don des tshig dang / / spobs pa so so yang dag rig /
catasro hi pratisaṃvidaḥ
# so so yang dag par rig pa ni bzhi ste /
dharmapratisaṃvidarthapratisaṃvinniruktipratisaṃvitpratibhānapratisaṃvicca
# chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang don so so yang dag par rig pa dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o /
tā api dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidastathaiva yathā 'raṇā / kimāsāṃ tathaiva akopyadharmamanuṣyāśrayatvam / ālambanabhūmisvabhāvaviśeṣastvāsāṃ pṛthagucyate
# de dag kyang nyon mongs pa med pa ji lta ba de dang 'dra'o / / de dag gi de dang 'dra ba ci zhe na / / mi g yo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang mi'i rten can nyid yin no / / 'di dag gi dmigs pa dang sa dang rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag ni tha dad par brjod de /
tisro nāmathavāgjñānamavivartya yathākramam
# gsum ni go rims bzhin ming dang / / don dang ngag la thogs med shes /
nāmapadavyañjanakāyeṣvarthavācitā avivartyajñānaṃ dharmāthaṃniruktipratisaṃvido yathākramam
# chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni go rims bzhin du ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang don dang ngag la thogs pa med par shes pa yin no /
caturthīyuktomuktābhilāpamārgavaśitvayoḥ
# bzhi pa rigs pa thags thogs med / / mngon brjod lam la dbang nyid dang /
avivartyaṃ jñānamiti vartate
# thogs pa med par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
yuktamutābhilāpitāyāṃ samādhivaśisaṃprakyāne cāvivartyaṃ jñānaṃ pratibhānasaṃvit / vāṅmārgālambanā cāsau / vākca mārgaśca tasyāḥ ālmvanam
# spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni rigs pa dang thags thogs med par mngon par brjod pa nyid dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang gsal bar bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa yin no / / de yi dmigs pa ngag dang lam / / de'i dmigs pa ni ngag kyang yin la lam yang yin no /
nava jñānāni
# shes pa dgu'o /
navajñānasvabhāvā pratibhānapratisaṃvidanyatra nirodhajñānāt
# spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes pa dgu'i rang bzhin yin te / / 'gog ba shes pa ma gtogs so /
sarvabhūḥ
# sa thams cad /
sarvabhūmikā cāsau kāmadhātau yāvat bhavāgre vāṅmārgayoranyatarālambanāt / daśa ṣaḍvā 'rthasaṃvit
# 'di ni ngag dang lam gnyis las gang yang rung pa zhig la dmigs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar sa thams cad ba yang yin no / / yang dag don rig bcu 'am drug /
arthapratibhānasaṃvit sarvadharmāśccedarthā daśa jñānāni
# don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gal te don chos thams cad yin na ni shes pa bcu yin no /
nirvāṇaṃ cedarthaḥ ṣaṭ jñānāni
# gal te don mya ngan las 'das pa yan na ni shes pa drug ste /
dharmānvayanirodhakṣayānutpādasaṃvṛtijñānāni / sā sarvatra
# chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang 'gog pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams so / / don ni kun na /
sā punareṣā 'rthapratisaṃvit sarvabhūmikā
# don so so yang dag par rig pa de ni sa thams cad pa yin no /
anye tu sāṃvṛtam
# gzhan kun rdzob /
anye tu dve dharmaniruktipratisavidau saṃvṛtijñānasvabhāve nāmakāyādivāgālambanasvabhāvatvāt
# gzhan chos dang nges pa'i tshigs so so yang dag par rig pa gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa'i rang bzhin dag yin te / / ming gi tshogs la sogs pa dang ngag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
kāmadhyāneṣu dharme vit
# chos rig 'dod dang bsam gtan na /
dharmapratisaṃvit pañcabhūmikā kāmadhātucaturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītā ūrdhvaṃ nāmakāyābhāvāt
# chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni sa lnga po 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan bzhis bsdus pa yin te / / yan chad na ming gi tshogs med pa'i phyir ro /
vāci prathamakāmayoḥ / vāṅniruktir ity eko 'rthaḥ
# ngag ni 'dod pa dang po na / / ngag dang nges pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni don gcig go /
niruktipratisaṃvitkāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmikā ūrdhvaṃ vitarkābhāvāt / prajñaptau tu pratisaṃvidāmeva nirdeśaḥ
# nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'dad pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag yin te / / yang chad na rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
padavyañjane tasyaivarthe tasyaikadvivahustrīpuruṣādyadhivacane tasyāsaktatāyāmavivartyajñānaṃ dharmāvipratisaṃvida ityata evāsāṃ kramasiddhiḥ / nirvacanaṃ niruktiḥ / yathā rupyate tasmādrūpamityevamādi / uttarottarapratibhā pratibhānamityapare / āsāṃ ca kila pratisaṃvidāṃ gaṇitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ śabdavaidyā hetuvidyā ca pūrvaprayogo yathākramam / nāpyeteṣvakṛtakauśalastā utpādayituṃ śaknotīti
# btags pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'di skad du tshig dang yi ge dang de nyid kyi don dang de nyid kyi gcig dang gnyis dang mang po dang pho dang mo la sogs pa'i tshig bla dags dang de la thags thogs med par bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa ni chos so so yang dag par rigs pa la sogs pa yin no zhes ston te / / de nyid kyis 'di dag gi go rims grub pa yin no / / tshig nges pa ni nges pa'i tshig ste / / dper na gzugs su rung bas ni de'i phyir / / gzugs zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yin no / / gzhan dag na re lan dang lan la spobs pas na spobs pa yin no zhes zer ro / / so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba ni go rims bzhin du rtsis dang sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang sgra rig pa dang gtan tshigs rig pa dag yin te / / 'di dag la mkhas par ma byas bar de dag skyed par mi nus so zhes grag go /
buddhavacanameva tu sarvāsāṃ prayogaṃ varṇayanti
# thams cad kyi sbyor ba sangs rgyas kyi bka' kho na yin no zhes brjod do /
yasya caikā tasyāvaśyaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidī bhavanti / vikalābhirna tallābhī
# gang la gcig yod pa de la gdon mi za bar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi char yod do / / ma tshang bar ni de thob med /
nahi vikalābhistābhiḥ pratisaṃvillābhī bhavati
# de dag ma tshang bar ni so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob pa ma yin no /
ye caita upadiṣṭā araṇādayo guṇāḥ
# nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bstan pa gang dag yin pa /
ṣaḍete prāṇtakoṭikāḥ
# drug po de dag rab mtha' bas /
prāntakoṭikadhyānavalenaiṣāṃ lābhaḥ
# de dag ni rab kyi mtha' pa'i bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis 'thob po /
tatṣaḍivadhaṃ
# de ni rnam drug /
tadapi prāntakoṭikaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ ṣaḍātmakam / araṇāpraṇidhijñānaṃ tisraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ
# bsam gtan bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' pa de yang nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa gsum dang rab kyi mtha' pa de nyid dang drug gi bdag nyid yin no /
tadeva prantakoṭikam / niruktipratisaṃvidastadvalena lābho na tu sā caturthadhyānabhūmikā
# nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni de'i stobs kyis 'thob pa yin gyi de bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ punaridaṃ prāntakoṭikaṃ nāma
# rab kyi mtha' pa zhes bya ba ni ci zhe na /
dhyānamantyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam / sarvabhūmyanulomitam
# bsam gtan mtha' / / bsam gtan bzhi pa yin no / / de ni sa kun gyis mthun pas /
vṛddhikāṣṭāgataṃ tacca
# 'phel ba'i rab tu phyin pa yin /
kathaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam / kāmāvacarāccittātprathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
# ji ltar nas thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin zhe na / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la /
tato dvitīyamevaṃ krameṇa yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam / pratilomaṃ punaryāvatkāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ tataḥ punaranulomaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamevaṃ sarvabhūmyanulomitam
# de las ni bsam gtan gnyis pa ste / / de bzhin du rim gyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug go / / mi mthun pa ni yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyi bar la'o / / de la yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du mthun pa yin te /
katham vṛddhikāṣṭāgatam / tathābhāvitānmṛduno madhyaṃ madhyādadhimātraṃ samāpadyate / vṛddhiprakarṣo hi vṛddhikāṣṭā
# de ltar na sa thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin no / / ji ltar na 'phel ba'i rab tu phyin pa'i bar du yin zhe na / / de ltar bsgoms pa chung ngu las 'bring / / 'bring las chen po la snyoms par 'jug pa ste / / 'phel ba'i mchog ni 'phel ba'i rab yin no /
idamīdṛśaṃ prāntakoṭikaṃ pragatā 'nta koṭirasyeti kṛtvā / koṭiḥ punaratra vṛddhiḥ prakāro vā
# bsam gtan 'di lta bu 'di ni rab kyi mtha' pa yin te / / 'di la mthar rab tu phyin pa yod pa'i phyir ro / / 'dir mtha' ni 'phel ba 'am rnam pa yin te /
catuṣkoṭikavat
# mu bzhi pa bzhin no /
ete punaḥ buddhatuṇāḥ
# yon tan drug po de dag kyang /
buddhānyasya prayogajāḥ
# sangs rgyas las gzhan sbyor las skyes /
buddhādanyasya prāyogikā na vairāgyalābhikāḥ / buddhasya nāsti kiñcit prāyogikam
# sangs rgyas las gzhan pa ni sbyor ba las byung ba yin gyi 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa ni ma yin no / / sangs rgyas kyi ni sbyor ba las byung ba cung zad kyang med de /
tasya sarvadharmeśvaratvādicchāmātra pratibadhaḥ sarvaguṇasaṃpatsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ
# 'dod chags can gyi dbang phyug yin pa'i phyir / / de'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa ni bzhed pa tsam la rag las pa yin no /
ime tāvacchrādakasādhāraṇaguṇā abhijñādayaḥ pṛthagjanairapi / keyamabhijñā nāma / ṛddhhiśrotramanaḥpūrvajanmacyutyudayakṣaye
# re zhig de dag ni nyan thos dang thun mong pa'i yon tan dag yin no / / mngon par shes pa la sogs pa ni so so'i skye bo dag dang yang thun mong yin no / / mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / / rdzu 'phrul rna ba yid dang ni / / sngon tshe 'chi 'pho skye ba dang /
jñātasākṣīkriyā 'bhijñā ṣaḍvidhā
# zad shes mngon du bya ba yi / / mngon shes rnam pa drug /
ṛddhiviṣaye jñānasākṣātkriyā abhijñā / divyaśrotracetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsānusmṛticyutyutpapādāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyā abhijñāḥ
# rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes dang lha'i rna ba dang sems kyi rnam grangs dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa ste /
etāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā / āsāṃ pañca pṛthagjanaiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ
# de dag ni mngon par shes pa drug yin no / / de dag las lnga ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong ba yin no /
sarvāstvetāḥ / muktimārgadhīḥ
# de dag thams cad ni / / rnam grol blo /
vimuktimārgaprajñāsvabhāvāḥ / śrāmaṇyaphalavat
# dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhin du / / rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin no /
catasraḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ
# bzhi ni kun rdzob shes pa ste /
cetaḥparyāyāsravakṣayajñānābhijñe hitvā / cetasi jñānapañcakam
# sems kyi rnam grangs dang zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ma gtogs so / / sems la shes pa lnga yin no /
cetaḥparyāyābhijñā pañca dharmānvayamārgasaṃvṛtiparacittajñānāni / kṣayābhijñā balaṃ yadvat
# sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa ni lnga yin te / / chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang lam dang kun rdzob dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams so / / zag pa mngon shes stobs bzhin no /
yathāsravakṣayajñānavalamuktaṃ tathā veditavyā / ṣaḍ daśa jñānānīti / sarvabhūmikā 'pyeṣā tathaiva jñātvyā
# 'di ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji skad du bshad pa de bzhin du shes pa drug gam bcu yin bde yang rig par bya la / / de bzhin du 'di ni sa thams cad pa yin par yang shes par bya'o /
śeṣāstu / pañca dhyānacatuṣṭaye
# lhag ma / / lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi dag na /
pañcābhijñāḥ caturthadhyānabhūmikāḥ / kasmādārupyabhūmikā na santi / tisrastāvanna santi / rūpālambanatvāt
# mngon par shes pa lnga ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa dag yin no / / ci'i phyir gzugs med pa'i sa pa dag med ce na / / re zhig gsum ni med de / / gzugs la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
cetaḥparyāyābhhijñāpi nāsti rūpatīrthābhiniṣpādyatvāt
# sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa yang med de gzugs la stegs bcas nas mngon par bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
pūrvanivāsasmṛtirapyanupūrvāvasthāntaramaraṇābhiniṣpatteḥ / sthānagotrādyālambanatvācca
# sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa yang med de mthar gyis sngon gyi gnas gzhan rjes su dran pas mngon par 'grub pa'i phyir dang gnas dang rus la sogs pa la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
paracittaṃ hi jñātukāma ātmanaḥ kāyacittayornimittamudgṛhlāti / kīdṛśe 'pi me kāye kīdṛśaṃ cittam bhavaty evaṃ pareṣāmapyābhujataścittajñānādabhiniṣpannā bhavati
# gzhan gyi sems shes par 'dod pa ni bdag gi lus 'di 'dra ba zhig las sems ni 'di 'dra ba zhig yin no zhes lus dang sems kyi mtshan ma 'dzin cing de bzhin du pha rol bo dag la yang gtod de / / sems shes pa las mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro /
abhiniṣpannāyāmabhijñāyāṃ rūpanirapekṣo jānāti
# mngon par shes pa mngon par grub na ni gzugs la mi ltos par mngon par shes so /
pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmartukāmaḥ samanantaraniruddhamanovijñāno nimittamudgṛhya tatsamanantaraprātilomyenāvasthāntarāṇi manasikaroti / yāvatsaṃdhicittam / tato 'ntarābhavasyaikakṣaṇaṃ maraṇe 'pi niṣpanno bhavati / evaṃ parasyāpi smarati / abhiniṣpannāyāṃ vilaṅghyāpi smaraṇam / anubhūtapūrvasyaiva smaraṇam / śuddhāvāsānāṃ katham smaraṇam / śravaṇenānubhūtatvāt
# sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'dod pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'gags ma thag pa'i mtshan ma bzung nas de'i lugs las bzlog ste / / mtshams sbyor ba'i sems kyi bar du de ma thag pa'i gnas skabs gzhan rnams yin la byed do / / de nas srid pa bar ma'i skad cig ma gcig dran na yang grub pa yin no / / de bzhin du gzhan gyi yang dran no / / mngon par grub nas ni thod rgal du yang dran no / / sngon nyams su myong ba kho na dran no / / gnas gtsang ma rnams ji ltar dran zhe na / / thos pas nyams su myong ba'i phyir ro /
ārupyacyutasyehopapannasya parasaṃtatyadhiṣṭhānenotpādanam
# gzugs med pa nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa na pha rol pa'i rgyud la brten nas skyed de; /
anyeṣāṃ svasaṃtatyadhiṣṭhānena / ṛddhyādīnāṃ tu laghatvaśabdālokamanasikaraṇaṃ prayogaḥ
# gzhan dag ni rang gi rgyud la brten nas so / / rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni yang ba dang sgra dang snang ba yid la byed pa yin no /
tāḥ punaretāḥ pañcābhijñāḥ
# mngon par shes pa lnga po 'di dag ni /
svādhobhūviṣayāḥ
# rang dang 'og sa'i yul can yin /
yadbhūmikā ṛddhacyabhhijñā bhavati tāṃ bhūmi tayā gacchati / nirmiṇoti vā adharāṃ noktarām / evaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñayā svabhūmikameva śabdaṃ śṛṇotyadharabhūmikaṃ vā nordhvabhūmikam / cetaḥ paryāyābhijñayā nordhvabhūmikaṃ cittaṃ jānāti / pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyā na smarati / cyutopapādābhijñayā na paśyati
# rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa gang yin pa des sa de 'am 'og mar 'gro ba'am sprul par byed kyi gong du ni ma yin no / / de bzhin du lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pas kyang rang gi sa kho na'am sa 'og ma ba'i sgra thos kyi sa gong ma ni ma yin no / / sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pas kyang sa gong ma pa'i sems ni mi shes so / / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas kyang mi dran no / / 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mngon par shes pas kyang mi mthong ngo /
ata evārupyabhumikaṃ cittaṃ cetaḥparyāyapūrvanivāsabhijñābhyāṃ na gṛhlātyurdhvabhūmikatvāt
# de nyid kyi phyir gzugs med pa'i sa pa'i sems ni sa gong ma pa yin pa'i phyir / / sems kyi rnam grangs dang sngon gyi gnas mngon par shes pa gnyis kyis mi 'dzin to /
kathametā labhyante
# 'di dag ji ltar 'thob ce na /
atucittāḥ prayogataḥ
# ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sbyor bas /
labhyā ucitāstu virāgataḥ
# thob bya 'dris pa chags bral bas /
janmāntarābhyastā abhijñā vairāgyato labhyante vaiśeṣikyaḥ prayogataḥ
# mngon par shes pa tshe rabs gzhan na goms pa rnams ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob bo / / bye brag can rnams ni sbyor bas so /
sarvāsāṃ tu prayogeṇotpādanam / tṛtīyā trīpyupasthānāni
# thams cad kyang sbyong bas bskyed pa yin no / / gsum pa dran pa nyer gzhag gsum /
cetaḥparyāyābhijñā trīṇi vedanācittadharmasmṛtyupasthānāni / cittacaittālamlbanatvāt / ādyaṃ śrotrardvivakṣuṣi
# sems kyi rnam grangs mngon par shes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir / / tshor ba dang sems dang chos dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyi rang bzhin no / / dang po rdzu 'phrul rna ba mig /
abhijñeti vartate / ṛddhidivyaśrotradivyacakṣurabhijñā ādyaṃ smṛtyupasthānamityarthaḥ / rūpālambanatvāt / ṛddhiścaturbāhyāyatanālambanā 'nyatra śabdāt / divyaśrotracakṣurabhijñe śabdarūpāyatanālambane
# mngon par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te / / rdzu 'phrul dang lha'i rna ba dang lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa ni gzugs la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po yin te / / lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / rdzu 'phrul gyi dmigs pa ni phyi'i skye mched bzhi yin te / / sgra ma gtogs so / / lha'i rna ba dang mig gi mngon par shes pa'i dmigs pa ni sgra dang gzugs kyi skye mched yin no /
kathaṃ tarhi cyutopapādajñānenaiva jānāti amī bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ ityevamādi / na tattena jānāti / abhijñāparivārajñānaṃ tu tadanyadāryāṇāmutpadyate yenaivaṃ jānanti
# 'di ji ltar na / / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes pas 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyad pa dang ldan no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par shes she na / / de ni des mi shes kyi 'phags pa rnams la de las gzhan pa gang gis na de lta bur shes par 'gyur ba mngon par shes pa'i 'khor du gyur pa'i shes pa skye'o /
anirdhāraṇāccheṣe catuḥsmṛtyupasthānasvabhāve iti siddham
# lhag ma ni dmigs kyis ma phye ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes bya bar grub bo /
avyākṛte śrotracakṣurabhijñe itarāḥ śubhāḥ
# mig dang rna ba'i mngon shes ni / / lung du ma bstan lhag rnams dge /
divyacakṣuḥśrotrābhijñe avyākṛte
# lha'i mig dang rna ba'i mngon par shes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
te punaścakṣuḥśrotravijñānasaṃprayuktaprajñe
# de dag kyang mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan ba'i shes rab yin no /
kathaṃ tarhi te caturdhyānabhūmike sidhyataḥ / āśrayavaśena tadbhūminirdeśāt / tadāśraye hi cakṣuḥśrotre caturdhyānabhūmike
# 'o na de dag ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi'i sa par grub ce na; rten gyi dbang gis de'i sa bstan pa'i phyir te / / de'i rten mig dang rna ba ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa yin no /
ānantaryamārgavaśena vā
# yang na bar chad med pa'i lam gyi dbang gis so /
anyāścatasraḥ kuśalāḥ
# gzhan bzhi ni dge ba dag yin no /
yattarhi prakaraṇeṣūktam abhijñā katamā
# 'o na rab tu byed pa las mngon par shes pa gang zhe na /
kuśalā prajñeti / pradhānika eṣa nirdeśo vāhuliko vā / āsāṃ cābhijñānāṃ
# shes pa dge ba yin no zhes gang bshad pa ji lta bu zhe na / / de ni gtso bo'am phal che ba bstan pa yin no / / mngon par shes pa 'di rnams las /
tisro vidyāḥ
# gsum ni rig pa /
pūrvanivāsacyutyupapādāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyāstisraḥ aśaikṣyo vidyā ucyante
# sngon gyi gnas dang 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba rnams ni mi slob pa'i rig pa gsum zhes bya'o /
kasmādetā eva nānyāḥ / avidyāyāḥ pūrvāntādau nivarttanāt
# ci'i phyir de dag kho na yin gyi gzhan dag ma yin zhe na / / sngon mtha' sogs / / ma rig pa ni bzlog phyir ro /
etā hi pūrvāparāntamadhyasaṃmohaṃ vyāvartayanti yathākramam
# 'di dag gis ni go rims bzhin du sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang bar la kun du rmongs pa bzlog par byed do /
āsāṃ paramārthena
# de dag las kyang don dam par /
aśaikṣyantyā / āsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyaivāśaikṣī vidyā
# mi slob tha ma / / zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba kho na mi slob pa'i rig pa yin no /
tadāsye dve tatsaṃtānasudbhavāt
# gnyis ni de'i / / rgyud las skyes phyir de zhes bya /
anye dve aśaikṣyasaṃtānasaṃbhūtatvādaśaikṣyāvucyete / naiva tu te śaikṣyo nāśaikṣyau
# gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i rgyud las skyes pa'i phyir mi slob pa zhes bya'i de gnyis ni slob pa yang ma yin la mi slob pa yang ma yin no /
kiṃ punarete abhijñe śaikṣyasya nocyete / yataḥ śaikṣyau vidye nocyete
# mngon par shes pa 'di dag slob ba'i yin par mi 'dod dam zhe na gang gi phyir slob pa'i rig pa dag ces mi bya zhe na /
iṣṭe śaikṣsya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ
# slob la 'dod de ma rig dang / / bcas rgyud phyir na rig ma bshad /
na hi sāvidyasaṃtāne vidyāvyavasthānaṃ yujyate / punarapyavidyābhibhavāt / āsāṃ cābhijñānām
# rgyud ma rig pa dang bcas bzhin du rig pa rnam par gzhag tu ni mi rung ste / / yang ma rig pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro / / mngon par shes pa 'di dag las /
ādyā tṛtīyā ṣaṣṭhī ca prātihāryāṇi
# dang po gsum pa drug pa ni / / cho 'phrul rnams yin rdzu 'phrul dang /
ṛddhicetaḥparyāyāsravakṣayābhijñāstrīṇi prātihāryāṇi yathākramam ṛddhacyādeśanānuśāsanaprātihāryāṇi / vineyamanasāmādito 'tyartha haraṇāt prātihāryāṇi prātiśabdayorādikarmabṛśārthatvāt
# sems kyi rnam grangs dang zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni go rims bzhin du cho 'phrul gsum yin te / / rdzu 'phrul dang kun rdzob pa dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams yin no / / dang po nyid du gdul bya'i yid shen tu 'phrog par byed pa'i phyir cho 'phrul dag yin pa 'am /
pratihatamadhyasthānāṃ manāṃsyebhiḥ pratiharantīti prātihāryāṇi vā
# 'di dag gis zhe 'gras pa dang bar mar gnas pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog par byed pas na cho 'phrul dag yin no /
eṣāṃ punaḥ
# 'di dag gi nang na /
śāsanam / agcryam / anuśāsanaṃ pratihāryamagcya m
# bstan pa mchog / / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni / / mi 'khrul phyir dang phan pa dang /
avyabhicāritvāddhiteṣṭaphalayojanāt
# yid 'ong 'bras la sbyor byed phyir / / mchog yin no /
ṛddhacyādeśane hi vidyayā vikeiyete
# rdzu 'phrul dang kun brjod pa dag ni rig sngags kyis kyang /
asti hi ca gāndhārī nāma vidyā yayāphāśena gacchati īkṣaṇikā ca nāma vidyā yayā paracittaṃ jānāti / na tu yathābhūtānuśāsanam anyathā śakyaṃ kartumavybhicāritvāt / pradhānamāvarjanamātraṃ ca tābhyāmanuśāsanaprātihāryeṇa tu hitena iṣṭenaphalena yogo bhavatyupāyopadeśādityevāvaśyam ṛddhirityucyate
# byed de / / ghan dha ri zhes bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang rtog byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags gang gis na pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang yod mod kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su bstan pa ni gzhan gyis bya bar mi nus pas mi 'khrul pa'i phyir 'di ni gtso bo yin no / / de gnyis kyis ni gtod pa tsam du zad kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ni thabs nye bar bstan pa'i sgro nas phan pa dang yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor bas 'di nyid mchog yin no /
keyamṛddhiḥ / vaibhāṣikanyāyena / ṛddhiḥ samādhiḥ
# rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyis ni / / rdzu 'phrul ting nge 'dzin /
ṛdhyatyaneneti kṛtvā yojayitavyam
# 'dis 'byor par byed pas na zhes bya bar sbyar ro /
kiṃ tena samṛdhyati / gamanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ ca
# des ci zhig yang dag par 'byor par 'gyur zhe na / / de las ni / / sprul dang 'gro ba ste /
tatastatra / gatistridhā / śarīravāhinī ādhimokṣikī manojavā ca tatra gatiḥ / śāsturmanojavā
# de la 'gro ba ni rnam pa gsum ste / / lus kyis phyin byed dang mos pa las byung ba dang yid mgyogs pa'o / / ston pa la / / yid mgyogs 'gro ba dang yid bzhin du mgyogs pas ni yid mgyogs kyi 'gro ba ste /
manasa ivāsyā rava iti manojavā gatirbuddhasyaiva nānyasya
# de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho na yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no /
sudūramapi deśaṃ cittotpādakālelna gamanāt
# yul thag shin tu ring por yang thugs bskyed pa'i dus kyi byon pa'i phyir ro /
ata evācintyo buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣaya ityuktaṃ bhagavatā
# de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba gsungs so /
itare tu gatī buddhasyānuktasiddhe
# 'gro ba gzhan dag ni ma bshad kyang sangs rgyas la mnga' bar grub po /
anyeṣāṃ vāhinyapyādhimokṣikī / śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ śarīravāhinī ca gatiḥ
# gzhan dag la / / phyin byed mos pa las byung yang / / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la ni lus phyin byed kyi 'gro ba yang yod de /
pakṣivatkrameṇa śarīravāhanāt
# bya bzhin du rim gyis lus phyin par byed pa'i phyir ro /
ādhimokṣikī ca dūrasyāsannādhimokṣeṇāśugamanāt
# mos pa las byung ba yang yod de / / thag ring po la nye bar mos nas myur du 'gro ba'i phyir ro /
nirmāṇaṃ punardvividham / kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca / tatra tāvat
# sprul pa ni rnam pa gnyis te / / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'o / / de la re zhig /
kāmāptaṃ nirmitaṃ bāhyaṃ caturāyatanaṃ / kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇaṃ rūparasagandhaspraṣṭavyāyatanasvabhāvam
# 'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa ni / / phyi'i skye mched bzhi / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa ni gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin yin no /
tat punar / dvidhā / svaparaśarīrasaṃbaddham / rūpāptaṃ dve tu
# de yang rnam gnyis / / bdag dang gzhan gyi lus dang sprul pa'o / / gzugs gtogs gnyis /
rūpāvacaranirmāṇaṃ dve rūpaspraṣṭavyāyatane / tatra gandharasābhāvāt / tadapi dvividhaṃ tathaiva / kāmadhātāvidaṃ caturvidhaṃ nirmāṇamevaṃ rūpadhātauityaṣṭavidhaṃ samāsato nirmāṇam
# gzugs na spyod pa'i sprul pa ni / / de na dri dang ro med pa'i phyir gzugs dang reg bya'i skye mched gnyis yin no / / de yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du rnam pa gnyis yin te / / 'di ni sprul pa rnam pa bzhi yin no / / gzugs kyi khams na yang de dang 'dra bas mdor bsdu na sprul pa ni rnam pa brgyad yin no /
kathaṃ rūpadhātūpapannasya kāmāvacaranirmāṇe gandharasābhyāṃ na samanvāgamo bhavati / vastrābharaṇavanna samanvāgamaḥ
# gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa 'dod pa na spyod pa sprul pa na ji ltar na dri dang ro dag dang mi ldan pa yang yin zhe na / / gos dang rgyan bzhin du mi ldan no /
dvacyāyātanaṃ nirmiṇotītyapare
# gzhan dag na re skye mched gnyis sprul par byed do zhes zer ro /
kiṃ khalvabhijñayaiva nirmāṇaṃ nirmīyate
# yang ci mngon par shes pa kho nas sprul pa sprul par byed dam zhe na /
netyucyate
# smras pa /
kiṃ tarhi / abhijñāphalaiḥ / nirmāṇacittaistāni caturdaśa
# ma yin no / / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu / / sprul sems dag gis de dag kyang ni bcu bzhi'o /
tāni punaścaturdaśa nirmāṇacittāni / yathākramaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ dve yāvat pañca
# sprul pa'i sems bcu bzhi po de dag ni / / bsam gtan 'bras gnyis nas lnga'i bar rim bzhin /
prathamadhyānaphalaṃ dve kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmike nirmāṇacitte / dvitīyadhyānaphalaṃ trīṇi kāmadhātuprathamadvitīyadhyānabhūmikāni / evaṃ tṛtīyacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri pañca ca yojyāni / svabhūmikādharabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ veditavyam
# bsam gtan dang po'i 'bras bu sprul pa'i sems ni gnyis te / / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa dag go / / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i 'bras bu ni gsum ste / / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa pa dag go / / da bzhin du bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i sa pa dag kyang bzhi dang lngar spyor bar bya'o / / bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu sprul pa'i sems ni rang gis pa dang sa 'og ma yin par rig par bya'o /
nordhvajam / nordhvabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇacittamadharadhyānaphalamasti
# gong ma las skyes min / / bsam gtan 'og ma'i 'bras bus gong ma'i sprul pa'i sems ni med do /
