dvitīyādidhyānaphalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikādgatito viśiṣyate / tallabho dhyānavat / teṣāṃ ca nirmāṇacittānāṃ dhyānavallābhaḥ / ki khalu nirmāṇacittādeva syāt vyutthānam
# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sprul pa bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni / / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa de'i 'bras bu las 'gros kyi sgo nas khyad par du 'phags so / / de rnyed bsam gtan bzhin / / sprul pa'i sems de dag rnyed pa ni bsam gtan bzhin no / / yang ci sprul pa'i sems kho na las ldang bar 'gyur ram zhe na /
nāstyetat / yasmādutpadyate
# de lta bu ni med de / / 'di ltar /
śuddhāttatsvataśca / śuddhakāddhacyānādantaraṃ nirmāṇacittamutpadyate nirmāṇacittadvā nānyataḥ / tato 'pi te / nirmāṇacittādapi śuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ cotpadyate nānyat / na hi samādhiphalasthitasvāpraviśya punaḥ samādhiṃ tasmāt vyutthānamasti / sarvasya ca nirmitasya
# de ni / / dag dang rang las skye bar 'gyur te / / sprul pa'i sems ni bsam gtan dag pa pa'am sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug thogs su skye'i gzhan du ni ma yin no / / de las gnyis / / sprul pa'i sems las kyang bsam gtan dag pa pa dang sprul pa'i sems skye ste / / gzhan du ni ma yin no / / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu la gnas pa ni yang ting nge 'dzin la ma zhugs par ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba med do / / sprul pa thams cad kyang /
svabhūmikena nirmāṇaṃ / nānyabhūmikena nirmāṇacittenānyabhūmikaṃ nirmāṇaṃ nirmīyate / bhāṣaṇaṃ tvadhareṇa ca
# rang gi sa pas sprul par byed / / sa gzhan pa'i sprul pa'i sems kyis sa gzhan pa'i sprul par ni mi byed do / / smrar 'jug pa ni 'og mas kyang /
svabhūmikena ceti caśabdaḥ / kāmadhātuprathamadhyānabhūmiko hi nirmitaḥ svabhūmikenaiva cittena bhāṣyate / ūrdhvabhūmikastu prathamadhyānabhūmikena
# kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rang gi sa pas kyang smrar 'jug go zhes bya ba yin te / / 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i sprul pa ni rang gis pa'i sems kho nas smrar 'jug go / / sa gong ma pa ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa ste /
ūrdhvaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakābhāvāt
# yan chad na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa med pa'i phyir ro /
vahūnāṃ nirmitānāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ / nirmātraiva sahāśāstuḥ / buddhādanyasya nirmāṇaṃ nirmātrā saha bhāṣate
# sprul pa mang po rnams smra ba ni ston min sprul pa dang bcas / / sangs rgyas las gzhan pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa dang bcas te / / smra bas gang gi tshe sprul pa mang po zhig yin pa de'i tshe cig car smra ste /
yadā ca vahavo nirmitā bhavanti tadā yugapat bhāṣante
# gcig cig smra bar byed pa na / / sprul pa thams cad smra bar byed /
ekasya bhāṣamāṇasya bhāṣante saha nirmitāḥ / ekasya tūṣṇīṃbhūtasya sarvetūṣṇīṃ bhavanti ta iti gāthā
# gcig mi smra bar gyur pa dang / / de dag thams cad smrar mi 'gyur / / zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
buddhasya pūrva paścādvā yathecchaṃ nirmitā bhāṣante / yadā bhāṣaṇacittaṃ tadā nirmāṇacittābhāvo nirmāṇacittābhāvānnirmitābhāva iti kathamenaṃ bhāṣayanti
# sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ni snga phyi ji ltar bzhed par smra'o / / gang gi tshe smrar 'jug pa'i sems yod pa de'i tshe sprul pa'i sems med pa'i phyir sprul pa med na ji ltar smrar 'jug ce na /
adhiṣṭhāyānyavarttanāt
# byin gyis brlabs nas gzhan 'jug phyir /
nirmāṇamadhiṣṭhāyāvasthānakāmatayā 'nyena manasā vācaṃ pravartayanti
# gnas par 'dod pas sprul pa byin gyis brlabs nas yid gzhan rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pas ngag 'jug par byed do /
kiṃ jīvita evādhiṣṭhānamanuvartate atha mṛtaścāpi / mṛtasyāpyastyadhiṣṭhānaṃ
# ci gson po kho na la byin gyi rlabs yod dam / / 'on te shi ba la yod ce na / / shi ba la yang byin gyi rlabs yod /
āryamahākaśyapādhiṣṭhānena tadasthisaṃkalāvasthānāt
# 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i rus pa'i keng rus gnas pa'i phyir ro /
tattu / nāsthirasya / asthirasya tu bhāvasya nāstyadhiṣṭhānam
# de yang mi brtan la med / / mi brtan pa'i dngos po la ni byin gyi rlabs med de /
āryakāśyapena māṃsādīnāmadhhiṣṭhānāt
# 'phags pa 'od srungs chen pos sha la sogs pa byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i phyir ro /
apare tu na / apare punarāhurnāsti mṛtasyādhiṣṭhānam / asthiśaṅkalāvasthānaṃ tu devatānubhāvāditi
# gzhan dag min gzhan dag na re / / shi ba la byin gyi rlabs med kyi / / rus pa'i keng rus gnas pa ni lha'i mthus so zhes zer ro /
kimekena cittenaikameva nirmita nirmiṇoti
# ci sems gcig gis sprul pa gcig kho na sprul bar byed dam zhe na /
ādāvekamanekena jitāyāṃ tu viparyayāt
# dang por du mas gcig yin te / / bya bar gyur nas bzlog pa'o /
ādita ekaṃ nirmitamanekena nirmāṇacittena nirmiṇoti
# dang po nyid du ni sprul pa'i sems du mas sprul pa gcig sprul par byed do /
jitāyāṃ tvabhijñāyāmekena cittenānekaṃ nirmiṇoti yāvannirmātumiṣṭaṃ bhavati
# mngon par shes pa byang nas ni sems gcig gis sprul pa po ji snyed dod pa du ma sprul par byed do /
atha kiṃ sarvanirmāṇacittamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati
# yang sprul pa'i sems thams cad lung du ma bstan pa yin nam zhe na /
avyākṛtaṃ bhāvanājaṃ
# bsgoms las skyes pa lung ma bstan /
yadbhāvanāphalaṃ tadavaśyamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati
# bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni nges par lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
trividhaṃ tūpapatījam / upapattipratilambhikaṃ tu nirmāṇacittaṃ kuśalākuśalamavyākṛtaṃ bhavati devanāgapiśācādīnām
# skye ba las skyes rnam gsum mo / / lha dang klu dang sha za la sogs pa'i skye bas thob pa'i sprul pa'i sems ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa yin no /
tatkṛtaṃ ca svaparaśarīranirmāṇaṃ navāyatanikaṃ bhavatyaśabdarupyāyatanatvādindriyāvinirbhūtatvāt / na tvindriyaṃ nirmīyate / kimeṣaiva dvividharddhibhāvanāmayī copapattilābhikā ca
# de dag gis byas pa'i sprul ba rang dang gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel ba ni sgra med pa'i gzugs can gyi skye mched yin pa'i phyir / / skye mched dug pa yin te / / dbang po dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro / / dbang po ni sprul par mi byed do / / ci bsgoms pa las byung ba dang skye bas thob pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam pa 'di gnyis kho nar zad dam zhe na /
eṣā ca dvividhā / ṛddhirmantrauṣadhābhyāṃ ca karmajā ceti pañcadhā
# rdzu 'phrul rnam pa gnyis pa de dang gsang sngags sman dag dang las las skyes dang rnam pa lnga /
samāstaḥ pañcavidhāmṛddhhiṃ varṇayanti
# rdzu 'phrul ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga'o zhes brjod de /
bhāvanāphalamupapattilābhikaṃ mantrajāmauṣadhajāṃ karmajāṃ ca
# bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dang skye bas thob pa dang gsang sngags las skyes pa dang sman las skyes pa dang las las skyes pa ste /
yathā māndhāturantarābhavikānāṃ ca
# dper na nga las nu dang srid pa bar ma pa rnams kyi lta bu'o /
yadidaṃ divyaśrotramuktaṃ cakṣuśca
# lha'i rna ba dang mig tu bshad pa gang yin pa de dag ci lha'i kho na yin nam /
kimete divye eva āhosvit divye eva divye / yathā bodhisattvacakravartigṛhapatiratnānām / divyaśrotrākṣiṇī
# 'on te byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba dang khyim bdag rin po che rnams kyi lta bur lha'i dang 'dra bas lha'i yin zhe na / / lha yi mig dang rna ba yin /
yasmātte / rūpaprasādau dhyānabhūmikau / dhyānasamāpannasya śabdālokābhogaprayogeṇa dhyānabhūmikāni bhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādau nirvartete cakṣuḥśrotrasāmantake rūpaśabdyordarśanaśravaṇahetū iti dhyānabhūmikatvāt divye eva te cakṣuḥśrotre
# 'di ltar de gnyis ni / / bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang ba / / bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i mig dang rna ba'i thod kor du sgra dang snang ba la gtod pa'i sbyor bas bsam gtan gyis pa'i 'byung ba rnams rgyur byas pa'i gzugs dang sgra dag mthong ba dang thos pa'i rgyu mngon par 'grub pas bsam gtan gyis pa yin pa'i phyir mig dang rna ba de dag ni lha'i kho na yin no /
te ca punaḥ / sabhāgāvikale nityaṃ dūrasūkṣmādigocare / nāsti divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca tatsabhāgaṃ nityaṃ vijñānasahitatvāt nāpi vikalaṃ kāṇavibrāntābhāvāt
# de gnyis kyang rtag tu brten bcas ma tshang med / / thag ring phra sogs spyod yul can / / lha'i mig dang rna ba ni rtag tu rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs pa med do / / zhar ba dang 'on pa med pa'i phyir ma tshang ba yang ma yin te /
rūpāvacarasattvavat
# gzugs na spyod pa'i sems can bzhin no /
dūrasūkṣmavatānyapi rūpāṇi śabdhāśca tayiorviṣyaḥ / āha cātra / dūrasthamāvṛtaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sarvataśca na paśyati
# de gnyis kyi yul ni gzugs dang sgra thag ring ba dang phra ba dang bsgribs pa dag kyang yin no / / 'dir smras pa / / gang phyir sha yi mig gis gzugs / / thag ring gnas dang bsgribs pa dang / / phra rgyas thams cad mi mthong ba /
māṃsacakṣuryato rūpamato divyaṃ dṛgiṣyate / kiyaddūraṃ punardivyena cakṣuṣā paśyati / yasya yādṛśaṃ cakṣurbhavati / śrāvakapratyekabuddhabuddhāstvanabhhisaṃskāreṇa sāhasradvisāhasratrisāhasrakān lokadhātūn yathāsaṃkhyaṃ paśyanti / abhisaṃskāreṇa tu
# de phyir lha yis mthong bar 'dod / / lha'i mig gis thag ji srid cig mthong zhe na / / gang gi mig ji lta bu yin ba'o / / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par stong dang stong gnyis pa dang stong gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ngo / / mngon par 'du byed pas ni /
dvitrisāhasrakāsaṃkhyadṛśo 'rhatkhaṅgavaiśikāḥ
# dgra bcom bse ru ston rnams kyis / / stong gnyis gsum dang grangs med mthong /
sarvābhhisaṃskāreṇa saha śrāvako 'pi dvisāhasra lokadhātuṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati
# nyan thos chen pos kyang mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis lha'i mig gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ngo /
trisāhasraṃ khaṅgaviṣāṇakalpaḥ
# bse ru lta bus ni stong gsum pa mthong ngo /
buddhastu bhagavānasaṃkhyeyān lokahātūn paśyati yāvadevecchati
# sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ji tsam bzhed par 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa gzigs so /
kimṛddhirevopapattilābhikā bhavatyarhānyadapi
# ci rdzu 'phrul kho na skye bas 'thob pa yin nam / / 'on te gzhan yang yin zhe na /
anyadapyupapattyāptaṃ / divyaśrotrādikamapi catuṣṭayamupapattipratilabhyamasti / na tūpapattyāptaṃ kiñcidabhijñākhyāṃ labhate
# gzhan yang skye bas kyang 'thob / / lha'i rna ba la sogs pa bzhi yang skye bas 'thob bar bya ba yod mod kyi / / skye bas thob pa ni cung zad kyang mngon par shes pa'i ming mi 'thob bo /
yattūpapattipratilambhikaṃ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ
# skye bas 'thob pa'i lha'i mig gang yin pa / / des ni /
taddṛśyo nāntarībhavaḥ
# srid pa bar ma mi mthong ngo /
abhijñācakṣuṣaiva hyantarābhavo dṛśyate / nopapattipratilabdhena / cetojñānaṃ tu tattredhā
# srid pa bar ma ni mngon par shes pa'i mig kho nas mthong gi / / skye bas thob pa ni ma yin no / / sems shes de ni rnam pa gsum /
upapattyāptamiti vartate / paracittajñānaṃ tūpapattipratilabdhaṃ trividhaṃ veditavyaṃ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtam
# skye bas 'thob pa zhes bya bar sbyar te / / pha rol gyi sems shes pa skye bas 'thob pa de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin par rig par bya'o /
tarkavidyākṛtaṃ ca yat / yaccāpi tārkikaṃ paracittajñānaṃ naimittikānāṃ yacca vidyākṛtaṃ tadapi trividhaṃ veditavyam
# gang rtogs dang rig sngags kyis byas pa'ang / / gang yang mtshan ma pa rnams kyis pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang rtog ge ba dang gang yang rig sngags kyis byas pa de yang rnam pa gsum yin bar rig par bya ste /
na yathā bhāvanāphalaṃ kuśalameva
# ji ltar bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dge ba kho na yin pa lta bu ni ma yin no /
upapattipratilambhikābhyāṃ tu paracittajñānapūrvanivāsānusmṛtibhyāṃ / jānate nārakā ādau
# pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa skye bas thob pa dag gis ni dmyal ba pas ni dang po shes /
yāvanna duḥkhavedanābhyāhatā bhavanti
# ji srid du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas ma nyen pa de srid du shes so /
anyagatisthā nityaṃ jānate / nṛṇāṃ notpattilābhikam / mānuṣyāṇāmetadyathoktamṛddhacyādikaṃ nāstyupapattiprātilambhikam
# 'gro ba gzhan na gnas pas ni rtag tu shes so / / mi la skye bas thob pa med / / mi rnams la ni rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa de skye bas thob pa med do /
yattarhi prakṛtijātismarā bhavanti
# 'o na rang bzhin gyis tshe rabs dran pa gang yin pa ji lta bu zhe na /
karmaviśeṣajā 'sau teṣām
# de dag gi de ni las kyi khyad par las skyes pa yin te /
trividhā hi pūrvanivāsānusmṛtirbhāvanāphalamupapattilabdhā karmajā ceti
# sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ni rnam pa gsum ste / / bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu dang skye bas thob pa dang las las skyes pa'o /
sthaviraśrīlāmāvākasya yadatra puṇyam / aṣṭamaṃ kośasthānam
# chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa las ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas bdun pa'o /
oṃ namo buddhāya / jñānādhikāreṇa jñānamayānāṃ guṇānāṃ kṛto nirdeśaḥ
# shes pa'i skabs kyis shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi yon tan rnams ni bshad zin to /
asya svabhāvānāṃ tu kartavya ityādita eva dhyānānyārabhyante sarvaguṇāśrayatvāt
# rang bzhin gzhan rnams brjod par bya ste / / de lta bas na yon tan thams cad kyi rten yin pa'i phyir dang po kho nar bsam gtan rnams brtsams te /
dvidhā dhyānāni
# bsam gtan dag ni rnam pa gnyis /
samāsato dvividhāni dhyānānyupapattisamāpattidhyānabhedāt
# bsam gtan rnams ni mdor bsdu na skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so /
tāni punaḥ / catvāri / prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvaccaturtham / tatra dhyānopapattayaḥ punarna vaktavyāḥ / lokanirdeśakośasthāne hi
# de dag kyang bzhi / / bsam gtan dang po nas bzhi pa'i bar ro / / de la bsam gtan du skye ba rnams ni yang mi brjod de / / 'jig rten bstan pa'i mdzod kyi gnas su /
proktāstadupapattayaḥ
# der skye ba dag rab tu bshad /
kathaṃ proktāḥ
# ji skad du bshad ce na /
pṛthak pṛthak / dhyānaṃ tribhūmikaṃ tatra caturtha tvaṣṭabhūmikamiti
# der so so'i / / bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin / / bzhi pa sa ni brgyad pa yin / / zhes bya ba yin no /
samāpattidhyānaṃ tu vaktavyam
# snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan brjod par bya ste /
ata ucyate
# de'i phyir smras pa /
samāpattiḥ śubhaikāgyraṃ
# snyoms 'jug dge ba rtse gcig pa /
abhedena kuśalacittaikāgratā dhyānam
# bye brag med par dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa ni bsam gtan yin te /
samādhisvabhāvatvāt / pañcaskandhāstu sānugam / saparivāraṃ tu pañcaskandhasvabhāvaṃ veditavyam
# ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro / / rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga / / 'khor dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin par rig par bya'o /
keyamekāgratā nāma / ekālambanatā / evaṃ tarhi cittānyevaikālambanāni samādhirna caitasikaṃ dharmāntaramiti prāpnoti
# rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na / / dmigs pa gcig pa nyid do / / de lta na ni 'o na sems dmigs pa gcig pa dag kho na ting nge 'dzin yin gyi chos gzhan sems las byung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
na cittānyeva samādhiḥ / yena tu tānyekāgrāṇi vartante sa dharmaḥ samādhiḥ
# sems rnams kho na ting nge 'dzin ma yin gyi gang gis de dag rtse gcig par byed pa'i chos de ting nge 'dzin yin la de nyid rtse gcig pa nyid yin no /
saiva cittaikāgratā / nanu ca kṣaṇikatvātsarvaṃ cittamekāgraṃ dvitīyasya tasmādavikṣepa iti cet
# skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir sems thams cad rtse gcig pa ma yin nam / / gal te gnyis pa de las rnam par mi g yeng ba yin no zhe na ni /
saṃprayukte samādhivaiyarthyam / yata eva ca smādhistata eva cittānāmekālambanatvaṃ kiṃ neṣyate
# mtshungs par ldan pa la ting nge 'dzin don med pa yin no / / gang kho na las ting nge 'dzin yin pa de kho na las sems rnams kyi dmigs pa gcig pa nyid du yang ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
mahābhūmikatvācca samādheḥ sarvacittānāmekāgratāprasaṅgaḥ / na durbalatvātsamādheḥ
# ting nge 'dzin sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir sems thams cad rtse gcig pa nyid du yang thal bar 'gyur ro / / ma yin te / / ting nge 'dzin stobs chung ba'i phyir ro /
cittānyevaikāgrāṇi samādhiḥ / tathā hyadhicittaṃ śikṣā cittapariśuddhipradhānaṃ ca sūtre catvāri dhyānānyuktānītyapare / dhyānamiti ko'rthaḥ
# gzhan dag na re sems rtse gcig pa dag kho na ting nge 'dzin yin te / / 'di ltar mdo las / / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang sems yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo ni bsam gtan bzhi yin no zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro / / bsam gtan zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
dhyāyantyaneneti / prajānantītyarthaḥ / samāhitacittasya yathābhūtaprajñānāt / cintanārtho hyeṣa dhātuḥ / cintanaṃ ca prajñeti siddhāntaḥ
# 'dis sems par byed pas na bsam gtan te / / sems mnyam par bzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa'i phyir rab tu shes par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste / / skad kyi byings 'di ni sems pa'i don yin la / / sems pa yang shes rab yin no zhes grub pa'i mtha' las 'byung ngo /
evaṃ tarhi sarvasamādhidhyānaprasaṅgaḥ
# de lta na ni 'o na ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsam gtan du thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
na / prakarṣayukte tannāmavidhānādbhāskaravat
# ma yin te / / phul du phyin pa dang ldan ba la de'i ming du btags pa'i phyir nyi ma bzhin no /
kaśca prakarṣayuktaḥ / yo 'ṅgasamāyuktaḥ samādhiḥ
# phul du phyin pa dang ldan pa yang gang zhe na / / ting nge 'dzin gang yan lag dang ldan pa yin te /
sa hi śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ yuganddhavāhitvāddṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāra uktaḥ sukhā ca pratipaditi / sutarāṃ tena dhyāyanti / kliṣṭasya kathaṃ dhyānatvam
# de ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel par ngang gis 'byung ba'i phyir mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dang lam sla ba zhes gsungs pas de ni shin tu yang sems par byed do / / nyon mongs pa can ji ltar bsam gtan yin zhe na /
mithyopanidhyānāt
# log par nges pa sems pa'i phyir ro /
atiprasaṅgaḥ / na / uktāni cākuśalāni dhyānānyapi bhagavatā / kīdṛśaṃ punaḥ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ kīdṛśaṃ yāvaccaturtham / prathamaṃ tāvat / vicāraprītisukhavat
# ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na / / ma yin te / / de dang mthun pa kho na la de'i ming du btags pa'i phyir te / / sa bon rul pa bzhin no / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan mi dge ba dag kyang gsungs so / / yang dge ba rtse gcig pa bsam gtan dang po ni ji lta bu / / bzhi pa'i bar ni ji lta bu zhe na / / re zhig dang po ni / / dpyod dang dga' dang bde dang ldan /
vicāraprītisukhasaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamaikāgyraṃ tat prathamaṃ dhyānam
# dge ba rtse gcig pa bsam gtan dang po ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no /
vicāravacanādvitarko 'pyukto bhavati
# dpyod pa smos pas rtog pa yang bshad pa yin te /
sāhacaryāddhūmāgnivat / na hi prītisukhavānvicāro vinā vitarkeṇāsti
# lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir du ba dang me bzhin du / / rtog pa med par ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa med do /
śeṣaṃ punrdhyānatrayaṃ
# bsam gtan lhag ma gsum ni /
pūrvapūrvāṅgavarjitam / śubhaikāgryam iti vartate / vicāravivarjitaṃ prītisukhavat dvitīyaṃ vicāraprītivarjitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vicāraprītisukhavarjitaṃ caturthamiti
# yan lag lnga lnga spangs pa yin / / dge ba rtse gcig pa zhes bya bar sbyar te / / bsam gtan gnyis pa ni dpyod pa spangs la / / dga' ba dang bde ba dang ldan pa yin no / / gsum pa ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba spangs la bde ba dang ldan pa yin no / / bzhi pa ni dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba spangs pa yin no /
yathā dhyānāni / tathārūpyāḥ
# bsam gtan rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs med /
kena prakāreṇa
# rnam pa gang gis she na /
ete 'pi hi dvidhā upapattisamāpattitaḥ / catvāraśca eṣāmapi copapattaya uktāḥ / samāpattyārupyāsvabhedena kuśalaikāgratāsvabhāvā ityanena prakāreṇa saparivārāḥ
# de dag kyang skye ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis kyang yin la bzhi yang yin no / / de dag gi yang skye ba rnams ni bshad zin to / / snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzugs med pa rnams ni bye brag med par dge ba'i sems rtse gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam pa des bshad zin to /
catuskandhāḥ
# 'khor dang bcas na ni /
anuparivartirūpābhāvāt / adhobhūmivivekajāḥ
# phung po bzhi rjes su 'brang ba'i gzugs med pa'i phyir ro / / 'og ma'i sa dben las skyes pa /
caturthadhyānavivekajaṃ hyākāśānantyāyatanam
# bsam gtan bzhi pa las dben pa las skyes pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched yin no /
tadvivekajaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam
# de las dben ba las skyes pa ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched yin no /
tadvivekajamākiñcanyāyatanam / tadvivekajaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsamjñāyatanamityevaṃ catvāra ārupyāḥ
# de las dben ba las skyes pa ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched yin no / / de las dben pa las skyes pa ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched yin te / / de ltar na gzugs med pa bzhi yin no /
ko 'yaṃ viveko nāma
# dben pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
yena mārgeṇādhastādvimucyate
# lam gang gis ni 'og ma las rnam par 'byed pa ste /
vairāgyagamanāt / ta eva cārupyāḥ
# 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir ro / / gzugs med pa de dag kyang /
vibhūtarūpasaṃjñākhyāḥ saha sāmantakaistribhiḥ / ākāśānantyāyatanasāmantakaṃ caturthadhyānālambanatvādvibhūtarūpasaṃjñākhyāṃ na labhate
# nyer bsdogs gsum dang bcas par ni / / gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya / / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la dmigs pa'i phyir gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya ba'i ming mi 'thob bo /
na hi tatra rūpasaṃjñā vibhūtā na vigatetyarthaḥ / yaduktaṃ catuskandhā iti sādhyaṃ tāvadetadārupyeṣu rūpaṃ nāstīti
# de la ni gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig pa ma yin te / / ma bral zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / phung po bzhi zhes gang bshad pa re zhig gzugs med pa dag na gzugs med do zhes bya ba 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no /
yadi hi syātkathamārupyā ucyeran
# gal te yod na ji ltar na gzugs med pa rnams brjod par 'gyur /
īṣadrūpatvā dāpiṅgalavat / kīdṛśaṃ tāvadīṣadrūpaṃ tatreṣyate
# gzugs cung zad cig yod pa'i phyir te / / cung zad zer ba bzhin no / / re zhig de ni gzugs ji lta bu zhig yod par 'dod /
yadi kāyavāk saṃvaramātraṃ kathaṃ tadabhāve tatsaṃvarau bhaviṣyataḥ
# gal te lus dang ngag gi sdom ba tsam zhig go zhe na / / de dag med na ji ltar de dag gi sdom par 'gyur /
na cāsati bhūte bhautikaṃ yujyate
# 'byung ba med par ni 'byung ba las gyur pa mi rung ngo /
anāsravasaṃvaravaccet
# gal te zag pa med pa'i sdom pa bzhin no zhe na /
sāsravabhūtasadbhāvāt / smāpattāvapi tatpratiṣedha uktaḥ / atha kāyo 'pyastīndriyāṇyapi rūpīṇi
# ma yin te zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba yod pa'i phyir ro / / snyoms par 'jug pa la yang de dgag par bshad do / / 'on te lus kyang yod la dbang po gzugs can rnams kyang yod do zhe na ni /
kathaṃ tadīṣadrūpā iṣyante
# ji ltar na de dag gzugs cung zad yod par 'dod /
parimāṇālpatvāccet / udakajantukeṣvapyadṛśyarupeṣu prasaṅgaḥ
# gal te bong tshod chung ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni chung ngu'i skye bo gzugs bltar mi snang ba dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
acchatvāccet / antarābhavarūpāvacareṣvapi prasaṅgaḥ
# gal te dang ba'i phyir ro zhe na ni / / srid pa bar ma dag dang gzugs na spyod pa rnams la yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
yato nācchataraṃ cet / bhavāgramevārupyaṃ syāt / samāpattivattadupapattiviśeṣāt / dhyānopapattirūpasyāpi cādharabhūmikendriyāgrahaṇāt kastatra viśeṣaḥ
# gal te gang las ches dang ba med pa yin no zhe na ni / / srid pa'i rtse mo kho na gzugs med pa yin par 'gyur te / / snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir ro / / bsam gtan du skye ba'i gzugs kyang sa 'og ma'i dbang pos mi zin pa'i phyir de dang yang khyad par ci zhig yod /
dvayoranvarthā saṃjñā nārupyadhātoriti cet
# gal te gnyis kyi ming ni don dang mthun pa yin gyi gzugs med pa'i khams kyi ni ma yin no zhe na /
kā 'tra yuktiḥ
# de la rigs pa ci zhig yod /
āyuruṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭavacanānnaḍakalāpīdvayavannāmarūpayoranyonyaniśritavacanā dvijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti vacanāt anyatrarūpādyāvatsaṃskārebhyo vijñānasyāgatigatipratiṣedhāccārūpyeṣu rūpāstitvasiddhiriti cet
# gal te tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres par gsungs pa'i phyir dang 'dam bu'i shog gnyis bzhin du ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun brten to zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang / / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang gzugs nas 'du byed rnams kyi bar las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'ong ba'am 'gro ba bkag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa dag na gzugs yod pa nyid du grub bo zhe na /
na / saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetadyadidamāyuruṣmaṇoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvamuktam / kimidaṃ kāmāvacaramāyuḥ saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti / yacca nāmarūpayoranyonyāśritatvamuktaṃ kimidaṃ kāmarūpāvacaraṃ nāma saṃdhāyoktamāhosvitsarvamiti / yacca vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamuktaṃ kimatra sarva vijñānaṃ nāmarūpasya pratyayamuktamāhosvitsarve nāmarūpaṃ vijñānapratyayamiti
# ma yin te / / dpyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / re zhig tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres pa nyid du gang gsungs pa 'di ci 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i tshe las dgongs te gsungs sam / / 'on te thams cad las zhes bya ba dang gang yang ming dang gzugs dag phan tshun brten pa nyid du gsungs pa 'di ci 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa las dgongs te gsungs sam / / 'on te thams cad las zhes bya ba dang gang yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa 'di ci rnam par shes pa thams cad ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du gsungs sam /
yaccānyatra rūpādibhyo vijñānasyāgatipratiṣedhaḥ / kimatra sarvaireva tairvinā tatpratiṣedha āhosvit ekenāpīti
# 'on te ming dang gzugs thams cad rnam par shes pa'i rkyen du gsungs zhes bya ba dang gang yang gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'ong ba dang 'gro ba bkag par gsungs pa 'di ci de dag thams cad med na de bkag gam /
aviśeṣavacanānna saṃpradhāryamiti cet
# 'on te 'ga' zhig kyang zhes bya ba 'di dpyad par bya dgos so /
atiprasaṅgaḥ / bāhyasyāpi hyaṣmaṇa āyuṣā binā bhāvo na prāpnoti / bāhyasyāpi ca rūpasya nāmāśritatvamaviśeṣavacanāt
# gal te bye brag med par gsungs pa'i phyir dpyad par mi bya'o zhe na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur te / / tshe med par phyi'i dro ba yang yod par mi 'gyur la / / phyi'i gzugs kyang rnam par shes pa la brten pa nyid du 'gyur te / / khyad par med par 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
caturvijñānasthitivaccāhāracatuṣkavacanādrūpārupyadhātvorapi kavaḍīkārāhāraprasaṅgaḥ
# rnam par shes pa gnas bzhin du zas bzhi gsungs pa'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag na yang kham du byed pa'i zas yod par thal bar yang 'gyur ro /
atikramya devān kavaḍīkārā hārabhakṣāniti vacanāt prītyāhāravacanāccāprasaṅga iti cet / ārupyeṣvapi rūpasyāprasaṅgaḥ / rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇamārupyāḥ
# gal te kham du byed pa'i zas za ba'i lha rnams las 'das te zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang dga' ba'i zas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na ni gzugs med pa dag na yang gzugs yod par thal bar mi 'gyur te /
ye te śāntā vimokṣā atikramya rūpāṇyārupyāḥ / arupiṇaḥ santi sattvāḥ sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāditi vacanāt / sati hi rupe svaṃ rūpamavaśyaṃ saṃjānīranniti / audārikamadhobhūmikaṃ rūpamabhisaṃdhāyoktamiti cet
# gzugs med pa rnams ni gzugs rnams las nges par 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba dang gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das nas zhes bya ba dang gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can dag yod ces bya ba dang rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / gzugs shig yod na ni rang gi gzugs gdon mi za bar 'du shes par byed par 'gyur ro / / gal te sa 'og ma pa'i gzugs rags pa las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no zhe na ni /
kavaḍīkāre 'pi tulyam / dhyānānāmapi cādhobhūminiḥsaraṇatvādārupya prasaṅgaḥ
# kham gyi zas la yang mtshungs so / / bsam gtan rnams kyang sa 'og ma pa las nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs med par thal bar 'gyur ro /
vedanādiniḥsaraṇaṃ ca kiṃ noktāḥ / adhobhūmikavedanāniḥsaraṇāt / rūpajātiṃ tu kutsnāmatikrāntā na vedanādijātim / ato rūpāṇāṃ niḥsaraṇamuktāḥ
# sa 'og ma pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir tshor ba la sogs pa las kyang nges par 'byung ba yin bar ci'i phyir ma bshad de / / gzugs kyi rnam pa zad par las 'das la tshor ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa las ni ma yin pas de'i phyir gzugs rnams las nges par 'byung ba zhes gsungs so /
bhavena bhavasyāniḥsaraṇavacanaṃ tu tenaiva tasyāniḥsaraṇādasarvānatyanta niḥsaraṇācca
# srid pas srid pa las nges par mi 'byung bar gsungs pa ni de nyid kyis de las nges par mi 'byung ba'i phyir dang thams cad dang gtan du nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
dhyānesu coktaṃ bhagavatā yattatra bhavati rūpagataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti / ārupyeṣu tūktaṃ yattatra bhavati vedanāgataṃ vā yāvadvijñānagataṃ veti
# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan dag la ni gang de na gzugs kyi rnam pa yod pa'ang rung rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i bar yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs la / / gzugs med pa dag la ni gang de na tshor ba'i rnam pa yod pa'ang rung rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i bar yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs te /
satyāṃ tesu rūpajātau kasmādrūpagataṃ veti nāvakṣyat / tasmāt / nārupye rūpasadbhāvaḥ / kathamidānīmanalpakalpocchinnādrūpāt punarapi rupotpattistataḥ pracyutānām / rupotpattistu cittataḥ
# de dag na gzugs kyi rnam ba zhig yod na ci'i phyir gzugs kyi rnam pa yod pa'ang rung zhes gsungs par mi 'gyur te de lta bas na gzugs med pa na gzugs med do / / de ni ji ltar na de nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi gzugs bskal pa mi nyung ba zhig tu gzugs rgyun chad pa las yang skye bar 'gyur zhe na / / gzugs ni sems las skye bar 'gyur /
rūpasya cittādevotpattistadvipākahetuparibhāvitāllabdhavṛttitaḥ / kathamanāśritya rūpaṃ cittaṃ vartate / kasmānna vartitavyam
# gzugs ni de'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyus yongs su bsgos pa'i sems 'jug pa rnyed pa las skye bar 'gyur ro / / ji ltar na sems gzugs lam brten par gnas she na / / ci'i phyir gnas par mi 'gyur /
ihaivamadarśanāt / kavaḍīkārāntareṇā 'pi vinā rūpadhātau na vartitavyam
# 'di na de lta bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro / / kham gyi zas med par yang gzugs kyi khams na gnas par mi 'gyur ro /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
ihaivamadarśanāt / uktaṃ ca pūrvaṃ yathā vartate
# 'di na de lta bu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro / / ji ltar gnas pa ni sngar bshad zin to /
gatametadidaṃ vaktavyam / kimepāmākāśānantyāyatanādīnāmākāśādaya evālambanaṃ yata evaṃ samākhyāyate
# 'di ni rdzogs so / / 'di brjod par bya ste / / ci nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa de dag nam mkha' la sogs pa kho na la dmigs pa yin pas de'i phyir de skad ces bya'am zhe na /
na hi / kathaṃ tarhi / trayastāvat
# ma yin no / / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / re zhig gsum mo /
ākāśānantyavijñānānantyākiñcanyasaṃjñakāḥ
# rnam shes mtha' yas mkha' mtha' yas / / ci yang med ces bya de ltar /
tathāprayogāt / anantamākāśamanantaṃ vijñānaṃ nāsti kiñcidityeva manasikurvāṇasteṣu prayujyante yathāsaṃkhyam / ata eṣāmetāḥ saṃjñā iti / māndyāktu nasaṃjñanāpyasaṃjñakaḥ / mṛdutvāttu saṃjñāyā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamuktam / na hi sā paṭvī saṃjñā na ca punarnaiva saṃjñeti / yadyapi tatrāpyevaṃ prayujyante saṃjñārogaḥ saṃjñāgaṇdaḥ saṃjñāśalyaḥ āsaṃjñikasaṃmohaḥ etacchāntametatpraṇītaṃ yaduta naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamiti / kasmāttu taistadevaṃ gṛhyata ityavaśyamidaṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate / mṛdutvātsaṃjñāmityetadevoktam
# sbyor phyir grangs bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas so / / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so / / ci yang med do zhes de ltar yid la byed cing de dag la rab tu sbyor bas de'i phyir de dag gi ming de dag yin no / / dman phyir 'du shes med / / 'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa'o / / 'du shes chung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min zhes bshad de / / de ni 'du shes gsal ba yang ma yin la 'du shes med pa kho na yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / gal te de la yang 'di ltar 'du shes ni nad do / / 'du shes ni 'bras so / / 'du shes ni zug rngu'o / / 'du shes med pa ni kun du rmongs pa'o / / 'di ltar 'du shes med / / 'du shes med min skye mched 'di ni zhi ba'o / / 'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes bya bar sbyor ba yod mod kyi ci'i phyir de dag gis de la de ltar 'dzin zhes byas pa dang 'du shes rnams chung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di gdon mi za bar brjod dgos par 'gyur bas de nyid bshad do / / de ltar snyoms 'jug dngos gzhi'i rdzas /
iti maulaṃ samāpattidravyamaṣṭavidhaṃ / ityetānyaṣṭau maulāni samāpattidravyāṇi yaduta catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārupyā iti / teṣāṃ punaḥ / tridhā
# rnam pa brgyad / / de ltar na 'di dag ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i dngos gzhi'i rdzas brgyad yin te / / 'di lta ste / / bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa bzhi'o /
sapta / bhavāgrādanyāni sapta trividhāni
# de dag las bdun rnam pa gsum / / srid pa'i rtse mo las gzhan pa bdun ni rnam pa gsum yin te /
āsvādanāvacchūddhānāsravāṇi
# ro myang ldan dang dag pa dang / / zag med /
āsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni śuddhakānyanāsravāṇi ca
# ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang dag pa pa rnams dang zag pa med pa rnams so /
aṣṭamaṃ dvidhā / bhavāgramāsvādanāsaṃprayuktaṃ śuddhakaṃ ca / anāsrava nāsti / tatra punaḥ
# brgyad pa rnam pa gnyis / / srid pa'i rtse mo ni ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang dag pa pa yin gyi zag pa med pa ni med do / / de la /
āsvādanāsaṃprayuktaṃ satṛṣṇaṃ / tṛṣṇā hyāsvādanā
# ro myang mtshungs ldan sred bcas so / / ro myang ba ni sred pa yin no /
laukikaṃ śubham / śuddhakaṃ
# 'jig rten pa yi dge ba ni / / dag pa /
laukikaṃ kuśalaṃ samāpattidravyaṃ śuddhakamuccayate 'lobhādi śuddhadharmayogāt / kiṃ punastenāsvādanāsaṃprayuktenāsvādyate / tattadāsvādyaṃ / tacchuddhakaṃ samāpattidravyaṃ tenāsvādyate samanantarātītam
# 'jig rten pa'i dge ba snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas ni dag pa zhes bya ste / / ma chags pa la sogs pa chos dkar po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro / / ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa des ci zhig ro myong bar byed ce na / / de ni des myang bya / / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang 'das ma thag pa de ni des ro myong bar byed de /
yadāsvādayati tasmādvyutthito yenāsvādayati tatsamāpannaḥ
# ro myang bar bya ba gang yin pa de las ni langs pa yin no / / gang gis ro myong bar byed pa de la ni snyoms par zhugs pa yin no /
lokattaramanāsravam
# zag med 'jig rten 'das pa'o /
yallokottaraṃ samāpattidravyaṃ tadanāsravam / eṣāṃ ca samāpattidravyāṇāṃ dhyānānyeva bhavanti nārupyāḥ
# 'jig rten las 'das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang yin pa de ni zag pa med pa yin no snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas de dag las bsam gtan rnams kho na yan lag dang ldan pa yin gyi gzugs med pa rnams ni ma yin no /
tatra / pañcādye
# de la dang po la lnga /
prathame bhāge pañcāṅgāni / tarkacārau ca prītisaukhyasamādhayaḥ / vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā cetyetāni pañcāṅgāni samādhiḥ kilāṅgaṃ dhyānaṃ ca
# bsam gtan po la yan lag lnga ste / / rtog dpyod dang dga' bas bde dang ting 'dzin rnams / / rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid de / / de ltar na de dag ni yan lag lnga yin no / / ting nge 'dzin ni yan lag kyang yin la bsam gtan yang yin no /
śeṣāṇyaṅgānīti / yathā caturaṅgā senā evaṃ pañcāṅgaṃ dhyānam
# lhag ma rnams ni yan lag dag yin no zhes grag go / / yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag ji lta bar yan lag lnga'i bsam gtan yang de dang 'dra'o /
prītyādayaḥ prasādaśca dvitīye 'ṅgacatuṣṭayam / dvitīye dhyāne catvāryaṅgāni / adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittekāgratā ca / tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ / tṛtīye tu dhyāne pañcāṅgāni / upekṣā smṛtiḥ saṃprajñānaṃ sukhaṃ smādhiśca / samādhiparyāyo hi sthitiḥ
# gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi / / rab dang dad ni dga' la sogs / / bsam gtan gnyis pa la yan lag bzhi ste / / nang rab tu dang ba dang dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid do / / gsum pa la lnga btang snyoms dang / / dran dang shes rab bde dang gnas / / bsam gtan gsum pa la yang yan lag lnga ste / / btang snyoms dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang bden pa dang ting nge 'dzin to / / gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam grangs yin te /
samyaksamādhiḥ katamaḥ / yā cittasya sthitiriti sūtre vacanāt
# mdo las / / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / / gang sems gnas pa dang yang dag par gnas pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
catvāryante 'sukhāduḥkhopekṣāsmṛtisamādhayaḥ
# mtha' na bzhi dran btang snyoms dang / / bde min sdug min ting 'dzin rnams /
caturthaṃ dhyānamantyam / tatra catvāryaṅgāni
# mtha' ma ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o / / de la yan lag bzhi ste /
aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā upekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiḥ samādhiśca / tānyetānyaṣṭādaśa dhyānāṅgāni bhavanti
# bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang dran pa yongs su dag pa dang ting 'dzin yongs su dag pa'o / / de dag ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag bco brgyad yin te /
prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pañcāṅgatvāt / dvitīyacaturthayoścaturaṅgatvāt
# dang po dang gsum pa dag la ni yan lag lnga yin pa'i phyir dang gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dag la ni yan lag bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro /
nāmata evam / dravyato daśa caikaṃ ca
# ming gi sgo nas ni de lta'o / / rdzas su bcu gcig /
dravyata etānyekādaśa bhavanti
# rdzas su ni de dag bcu gcig yin te /
prāthamadhyānikāni pañca
# bsam gtan dang po la lnga'o /
dvitīye 'dhyātmasaṃprasādo vardhate
# gnyis pa la ni nang rab tu dang ba lhag go /
tṛtīye upekṣāsmṛtisaṃprajñānasukhāni
# gsum pa la ni btang snyoms dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang bde ba rnams so /
caturthe 'duḥkhāsukhā vedaneti / ata evocyate yānyaṅgāni prathame dhyāne dvitīye 'pi tānīti catuṣkoṭikam
# bzhi pa la bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'o / / de nyid kyi phyir smras pa / / yan lag gang dag bsam gtan dang po na yod pa de dag gnyis pa na yang yod dam zhe na / / mu bzhi ste /
prathamā koṭirvitarkavicārau
# mu dang po ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag go /
dvitīyā adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ / tṛtīyā prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ca
# gnyis pa ni nang rab tu dang pa'o / / gsum pa ni dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid do /
caturthī koṭiruktanirmuktā dharmā iti
# mu bzhi pa ni bshad pa las ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams so zhes bya'o /
evaṃ sarvāṇi dhyānāṅgāni parasparaṃ yojyāni / kasmāt / tṛtīye dhyāne sukhaṃ dravyāntaramucyate / yasmāttadvedanāsukhaṃ dhyānayostu
# de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi yan lag thams cad phan tshun du sbyar bar bya'o / / ci'i phyir bsam gtan gsum pa na yod pa'i bde ba rdzas gzhan du brjod ce na / / 'di ltar de'i bde ba ni tshor ba yin la /
prasrabdhisukhamādyayoḥ / prathamadvitīyayostu dhyānayoḥ prasrabdhisukhamityuktam
# bsam gtan dang po na; shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin / / bsam gtan dang po dag na ni shin tu sbyangs pa la bde ba zhes bshad do /
iha prasrabdhisukhaṃ tatra vedanāsukhamiti kuta etat
# 'di la ni shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin la / / de la ni tshor ba bde ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las shes she na /
dvayordhyānasamāpattyoḥ sukhendriyāyogāt / na hi tattayoḥ kāyikaṃ yujyate
# snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gnyis na bde ba'i dbang po dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te / / de gnyis na de lus kyi yin par ni mi rung ste /
samāpannasya vijñānakāyābhāvāt / nāpi caitasikaṃ prītivacanāt / prītirhi saumanasyam / na ca sukhasaumanasyayoryaugapadyamasti / na cāpi tayoḥ paryāyeṇa dhyāne vṛttiryuktā pañcāṅgavacanāditi
# snyoms par zhugs pa la rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga med pa'i phyir ro / / sems las byung ba yang ma yin te / / dga' ba zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin na / / bde ba dang yid bde ba gnyis cig car 'byung ba med do / / de gnyis rnam grangs kyis bsam gtan na yod par yang rigs pa ma yin te /
apare punarāhuḥ / nāstyeva caitasikaṃ sukhendriyaṃ triṣvapi hi dhyāneṣu
# yan lag lnga zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / gzhan dag na re sems las byung ba'i bde ba'i dbang po ni kho na ste /
kāyikameva sukhamaṅgaṃ vyavasthāpitamiti / yattarhi sutra uktaṃ sukhendriyaṃ katamat / yatsukhavedanīyena sparśena spṛṣṭasyotpadyate kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ sātaṃ veditaṃ vedanāgatamidamucyate sukhendriyamiti
# bsam gtan gsum char na yang lus kyi bde ba kho na yan lag tu rnam par gzhag go zhes zer ro / / 'o na mdo las / / bde ba'i dbang po gang zhe na bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i reg pas reg pa na lus kyi dang sems las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rnam pa bde ba sim pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni bde ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
adhyāropita eṣa pāṭhaḥ / kenāpi sarvanikāyāntareṣu kāyikamityeva pāṭhāt / sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti svaśabdena vacanācca
# tshig de ni 'ga' zhig gis sgro btags pa yin te / / sde pa gzhan thams cad las lus kyi zhes bya ba kho na 'byung ba'i phyir dang bde ba lus kyis myong la zhes rang gi sgras gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
manaskāyeneticet / evamuktvā ko guṇaḥ / caturthe dhyāne prasrabdhibhūyastve 'pi sukhāvacanācca
# gal te yid kyi lus kyis so zhe na ni; de skad bshad pa la yon tan ci zhig yod / / bsam gtan bzhi pa la shin tu sbyangs pa mang bzhin du bde ba ma smos pa'i yang phyir ro /
sukhavedanānukūlā prasrabdhiḥ sukhamiti cet
# gal te bde ba'i tshor ba dang mthun pa'i shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin no zhe na ni /
tṛtīye prasrabdhisukhāvacanaṃ kasmāt
# gsum pa na yod pa'i shin tu sbyangs pa bde bar ma gsungs pa yang ci'i phyir /
upekṣopahatatvāditi cet
# gal te btang snyoms kyis bcom pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
na upekṣayaiva tadvṛddhiḥ / pūrvikābhyastādviśeṣāt / yasminsamaye āryaśrāvakaḥ pravivekajāṃ prītiṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatītyatra sūtre prasrabdhisukhayoḥ pṛthagvacanānna prasrabdhireva sukham
# ma yin te / / snga ma gnyis pas de khyad par du 'phags pas btang snyoms kho nas de 'phel ba'i phyir ro / / gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa'i bde ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di las kyang shin tu sbyangs pa dang bde ba gnyis tha dad par 'byung ba'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa kho na bde ba ma yin no /
samāpannasya katham kāyavijñānamiti cet
# gal te snyoms par zhugs pa la ji ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung zhe na /
samādhiviśeṣajena prasrabdhisaṃjñakena sukhavedanīyena vāyunā kāyasphuraṇāt
# ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las skyes pa shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i rlung gis lus la rgyas pa'i phyir ro /
bahirvikṣepāssamādhibraṃśa iti cet / na / samādhijasyāntaḥkāyasaṃbhūtasya kāyasukhasya samādhyanukūlatvāt
# gal te phyi rol du rnam par g yengs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin las nyams par 'gyur ro zhe na / / ma yin te / / ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa lus kyi bde ba nang du 'byung ba'i lus kyi bde ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i phyir ro /
kāyavijñā nakāle vyutthitaḥ syāditi cet
# gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i tshe langs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
na / ata eva / kāmāvacareṇa kāyendriyeṇa rūpāvacaraspraṣṭavyavijñānānutpattiriti cet
# ma yin te / / de nyid kyi phyir ro / / gal te 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus kyi dbang pos gzugs na spyod pa'i reg bya la rnam par shes pa mi skye'o zhe na /
na / prasrabdhivijñānasyotpatteḥ
# ma yin te / / shin tu sbyangs pa'i rnam par shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro /
anāsrave api spraṣṭavyakāyavijñāne syātām / mā bhūtkiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kiñcidanāsravamiti cet
# gal te yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas pa cung zad cig ni zag pa med pa yin na mi rung bas reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa zag pa med pa dag tu yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
kāyikaprasrabdhivodhyaṅga vacanāt / iṣṭe bodhyaṅgānukūlatvāditi cet / anāsravatvamapyevam
# lus shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu gsungs pas 'dod pa'i phyir ro / / gal te byang chub kyi yan lag dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni zag pa med pa nyid kyang de dang 'dra'o /
sāsravā dharmāḥ katame / cakṣuryāvadeva spraṣṭavyamityasya sūtrasya virodhāditi cet
# gal te zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na / / mig ji snyed pa zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di dang 'gal lo zhe na /
na / anyaspraṣṭavya kāyavijñānābhisaṃdhivacanāt
# ma yin te / / reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
na cānāsrave kiñcidaṅgaṃ sāsravaṃ kicidanāsravaṃ syāditi cet / ayaugapadyātko doṣaḥ sukhaprītyasamavadhānānna pañcāṅgaṃ syāditi cet
# gal te zag pa med pa la yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas ba cung zad cig ni zag pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na / / cig car ma yin pa'i phyir nyes pa ci zhig yod / / gal te bde ba dang dga' ba phrad pa med pa'i phyir yan lag lnga par mi 'gyur ro zhe na / / ma yin te /
na saṃbhavaṃ pratyupadeśāndvitarkavicāravat
# srid pa'i phyir bstan pas rtog pa dang dpyod pa bzhin no /
sādhyamiti cet / siddhaṃ cittasyaudārikasūkṣmatayorvirodhāt doṣāvacanācca
# gal te bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na / / sems rtsing ba dang zhib pa gnyis 'gal ba'i phyir dang nyes pa smos pa'i phyir grub pa yin no /
tasmādyānyeva prathamadhyāne pañcāṅgāni teṣāṃ dvitricaturaṅgāpakarṣeṇa dvitīyādidhyānavyavasthānam
# de lta bas na bsam gtan dang po la yod pa'i yan lag lnga po gang dag yin pa de dag kho na las yan lag gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi bor nas bsam gtan gnyis ba la sogs pa rnam par gzhag go /
ata eva ca prathame dhyāne pañcānāmaṅgatvamuktam / tadapakarṣeṇottaradhyānavyavasthāpanāt / na tu saṃjñādīnāmaṅgatvamuktam / kimartha vā pañcānāmevāṅgatvamuktam
# de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan dang po la ni yan lag lnga nyid du bshad la / / de dag las thor bas ni bsam gtan phyi ma rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir 'du shes la sogs pa ni ma yin no / / yang na ci'i phyir lnga kho na yan lag nyid yin /
upakārakatvāditi cet
# gal te phan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
na / vitarkavicārābhyāṃ smṛtiprajñayorapakārakataratvāt / astyeṣa ekeṣāṃ vādaḥ / naiva tu pūrvācāryā evaṃ nirdiśanti sma yāvantaḥ prajñāntam
# ma yin te / / rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis pas dran pa dang shes rab dag ches phan pa'i phyir ro / / kha cig de skad du rgol ba yod mod kyi sngon gyi slob dpon rnams ni ji snyed mngon pa de ltar mi ston te /
tasmādvicāryametat / adhyātmasaṃprasādo nāma ka eṣa dharmaḥ
# de lta bas na 'di ni dpyad par bya ba yin no / / nang rab tu dang ba zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na /
vitarkavicārakṣobhavirahāt praśāntavāhitā saṃtater adhyātmasaṃprasādaḥ
# rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i 'khrug pa dang bral bas rgyud rab tu zhi bar gyur pa ni nang rab tu dang ba yin te /
sormikeva hi nadī vitarkavicārakṣobhitā saṃtatir aprasannā vartate iti / na tarhi sa dravyāntaram iti kathaṃ dravyata ekādaśāṅgāni bhavanti / tasmāttarhi
# rtog pa dang dpyod pas dkrugs pa'i rgyud ni chu bo dba' rlabs dang bcas pa bzhin du rab tu ma dang ba yin no / / 'o na ni de rdzas gzhan ma yin pas ji ltar na rdzas su yan lag bcu gcig yin / / de lta bas na /
śraddhā prasādaḥ
# rab tu dang ba dad pa yin /
tasya hi dvitīyadhyānalātsamāhibhūminihsaraṇe saṃpratyaya utpadyate / so 'tradhyātmasaṃprasāda iti / naiva hi vitarkavicārasamādhayo nāpyadhātmasaṃprasādo dravyāntarāṇītyapare / kathamasati dravyāntaratve caitasikatvaṃ siddhyati
# de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa las nges par 'byung ba la yid ches ba skye ste / / de ni 'dir nang rab tu dang ba zhes bya'o / / gzhan dag na re rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rdzas gzhan ma yin la nang rab tu dang ba yang rdzas gzhan ma yin no / / rdzas gzhan med na ji ltar sems las byung pa nyid du 'grub ce na /
avasthāviseso hi nāma cetasaścetasiko bhavati
# sems can gyi gnas skabs kyi bye brag kyang sems las byung ba yin no zhes zer te /
natveṣa śastrasiddhāntaḥ
# 'di ni bstan bcos kyi grub pa'i mtha' ma yin no /
kathamidaṃ gamyate / kimanyat bhavatu / yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ
# dga' ba ni yid bde ba yin no zhes gang bshad pa 'di ji ltar khong du chud / / gzhan ci zhig yin / / ji ltar sde pa gzhan dag 'dod pa lta bu yin no / 
saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyāneṣu sukhamiti / yathecchanti nikāyāntarīyāḥ dharmāntarameva caitasikaṃ prītiḥ saumanasyaṃ tu triṣvapi dhyānesu sukhamiti
# sde ba gzhan dag ji ltar 'dod ce na / / dga' ba ni sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan dag kho na yin la yid bde ba ni bsam gtan gsum char gyi yang bde ba yin par 'dod do /
na vai sukhaṃ dhyāneṣu saumanasyaṃ yujyate
# bsam gtan dag na yod pa'i bde ba ni yid bde ba yin par mi rung ba nyid kyi /
prītistu saumanasyaṃ dvidhāgamāt / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā aviparītakasūtre tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamuktvā atrāsyotpannaṃ saumanasyendriyamapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyata iti / caturthe ca dhyāne sukhendriyaṃ nirudhyata ityuktam / punaścoktaṃ sukhasya ca prahāṇāt duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṅgamādityato 'pi na tṛtīye dhyāne saumanasyendriyamasti
# lus rnams gnyis phyir dga' yid bde / / bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par sgyur ba'i mdo las bsam gtan gsum pa bka' stsal nas 'dir 'di'i yid bde ba'i dbang po skyes pa ma lus bar 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal la / / bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni bde ba'i dbang po 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to / / yang bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir yang bsam gtan gsum pa na yid bde ba'i dbang po med de /
tasmāt prītireva saumansyaṃ na sukham
# de ltar bas na dga' ba kho na yid bde ba yin gyi bde ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ punaḥ kliṣṭeṣvapi dhyāneṣu yathāvihitānyaṅgāni bhavanti
# ci nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan dag la yang ji skad du bshad pa ltar yan lag de dag yod dam zhe na /
na hi kiṃ teṣu na vidyate
# med do / / de dag na ci zhig med ce na /
kliṣṭeṣvasatprītisukhaṃ prasādaḥ saṃpradhīḥ smṛṭiḥ / upekṣāsmṛtiśuddhiśca / prathame dhyāne vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ nāsti
# nyon mongs can la dga' bde dang / / dran dang shes bzhin dran pa dang / / btang snyoms dran pa dag pa med / / bsam gtan dang po la ni bde ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba med de /
kleśāviviktatvāt / dvitīye dhyāne 'dhyātmasaṃprasādo nāsti
# nyon mongs pa las dben ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / gnyis pa la ni nang rab tu dang ba med de /
kleśāvilatvāt / tṛtīye smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ nāsti
# nyon mongs pas rnyog pa'i phyir ro / / gsum pa la ni dran pa dang shes bzhin med de /
kliṣṭasukhasaṃbrhamitatvāt / ccaturthe upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhirnāsti
# nyon mongs pa can gyi bde bas kun du rmongs par bya ba'i phyir ro / / bzhi pa la ni btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa med de /
kleśamalinatvāt / evaṃ tāvat kecidāhuḥ
# nyon mongs pas dri ma can du byas pa'i phyir ro / / re zhig kha cig de skad zer ro /
kecit prasrabdhyupekṣaṇe / kecitpunaḥ prathamadvitīyayoḥ kliṣṭayoḥ prasrabdhirnāsti / tṛtīyacaturthayorupekṣā nāsti
# kha cig shin tu sbyangs btang snyoms / / kha cig na re nyon mongs pa can dang po dang gnyis pa dag na ni shin tu sbyangs pa med la gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni btang snyoms med de /
kuśalalmahābhūmikatvādanayoriti
# de gnyis ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro /
trīṇi ca dhyānāni señjitāni uktāni bhagavatā / sāpakṣālatvāt
# bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gsum ni skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir g yo ba dang bcas pa dag yin no zhes bka' stsal te /
aṣṭāpakṣālamuktatvādāniñjaṃ tu caturthakam
# skyon brgyad las ni grol ba'i phyir / / bzhi pa g yo ba med pa yin /
ke punaste 'pakṣālāḥ / vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam
# skyon de dag kyang gang zhe na / / rtog dang dpyod dang dbugs dag dang / / bde ba la sogs bzhi yin no /
vitarkavicārau sukhaduḥkhe saumanasyadaurmanasye śvāsapraśvāsāśca
# rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dang dbugs rngub pa dang dbugs 'byung ba ste /
eṣāmaṣṭānāmeko'pyapakṣālaścaturthe nāstyatastadāneñjyamuktam
# bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni skyon brgyad po de dag gcig kyang med pas de'i phyir de ni mi g yo ba zhes bshad do /
vitarkavicāraprītisukhairakampanīyatvādāneñjyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ sūtre nirvāta pradīpanidarśanādityapare
# gzhan dag na re bzhi pa ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dag gis g yo bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mi g yo ba yin te / / mdo las rlung med pa'i mar me dper mdzad pa'i phyir zhes zer ro /
dvayordhyānayoḥ saumanasyamuktaṃ prītivacanāt
# bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni dga' ba zhes smos pa'i phyir yid bde ba yod par bshad /
tṛtīye sukhaṃ caturthe upekṣā / taskiṃ yā dhyānasamāpattiṣu vedanāstā eva dhyānopapattiṣu / netyāha
# gsum pa na ni bde ba / / bzhi pa na ni btang snyoms yod par bshad na / / de ci / / snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan dag na yod pa'i tshor ba gang dag yin ba de dag nyid skye ba'i bsam gtan dag na yod dam zhe na / / smras pa ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / saumanasyasukhopekṣā upekṣāsumanaskate / sukhhopekṣe upekṣā pravido dhyānopapattiṣu / prathamadhyānotpatto tisro vedanāḥ / sukhaṃ trivijñānakāyikaṃ saumanasyaṃ manobhūmikam / upekṣā caturvijñānakāyikī / dvitīyadhyānopapattau dve vedane saumanasyopekṣe manobhūmike / sukhaṃ nāstyasya vijñānakāyābhāvāt / tṛtīyadhyānopapattī dve vedane / sukhopekṣe manobhūmike / caturthadhyānopapattāvupekṣaiva / yadi dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu trayo vijñānakāyā na saṃvidyante vitarkavicārau ca katham te paśyanti yāvatspṛśanti katham cāvijñapti samutthāpayanti
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / skye ba'i bsam gtan dag na ni / / yid bde ba dang btang snyoms dang / / btang snyoms yid bde bde ba dang / / btang snyoms btang snyoms tshor ba yod / / skye ba'i bsam gtan dang po na ni / / tshor ba gsum yod de / / rnam par shes ba'i tshogs gsum pa'i bde ba dang yid kyis pa'i yid bde ba dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa'i btang snyoms so / / skye ba'i bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni tshor ba gnyis te / / yid kyi sa ba'i yid bde ba dang btang snyoms so / / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gzhan med pa'i phyir bde ba dang yid kyis pa'i yid bde ba dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhi pa'i btang snyoms so / / skye ba'i bsam gtan gnyis pa na ni tshor ba gnyis te / / yid kyi sa pa'i yid bde ba dang btang snyoms so / / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gzhan med pa'i phyir bde ba med do / / skye ba'i bsam gtan gsum pa na ni tshor ba gnyis te / / yid kyi sa pa'i bde ba dang btang snyoms skye ba'i bsam gtan bzhi pa na ni btang snyoms kho na yod do / / gal te bsam gtan gsum pa la sogs pa dag na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gsum med pa la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag kyang med na ji ltar na de dag gis mthong ba nas reg pa'i bar du 'gyur / / ji ltar na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed ce na /
na ve keṣūpapannānāṃ cakṣurvijñānādayona santi / na tu svabhūmikāḥ
# de dag tu skyes pa rnams la mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa med pa nyid kyang ma yin la rang gis pa yang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / kāyākṣiśrotravijñānaṃ vijñaptyutthāpakaṃ ca yat
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / gnyis pa sogs na lus mig dang / / rna ba'i rnam shes rnam rig slong /
dvitīyādau tadādyāptaṃ / prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrakāyavijñānaṃ vijñaptisamutthāpakaṃ ca dvitīyādiṣu ca dhyāneṣu saṃmukhīkurvanti / nirmāṇacittavadyena te paśyanti yāvadvijñapti samutthāpayanti
# gang yin de ni dang por gtogs / / bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na ni sprul pa'i sems bzhin du gang gis na de dag gis mthong bas na rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed pa'i bar bsam gtan dang po'i sa ba'i mig dang rna ba dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang rnam par rig byed kun nas slong par byed pa mngon sum du byed do /
akliṣṭāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat / anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ ca tat prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ vijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ yatte saṃmukhīkurvanti
# de lung ma bstan nyon mongs min / / de dag mngon sum du byed pa bsam gtan dang bo'i sa pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin gyi /
na kliṣṭaṃ vītarāgatvānna kuśalaṃ hīnatvāditi / avasitaṃ dhyānakāryam
# 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin la / / dman pa'i phyir dge ba yang ma yin no / / bsam gtan gyi bya ba rdzogs so /
atha śuddhakādīnāṃ dhyānārupyāṇāṃ kathaṃ lābhaḥ
# yang dag pa sa la sogs pa'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams ji ltar 'thob ce na /
atadvān labhate śuddhaṃ vairāgyeṇopapattitaḥ
# de dang mi ldan 'dod chags bral / / skye ba las ni dag pa 'thob /
asamanvāgatastena śuddhakaṃ dhayanamārupyaṃ vā pratilabhate / adhobhūmivairāgyādvā
# de dang mi ldan pa ni bsam gtan nam gzugs med pa dag sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba'am /
adhobhūmyupapattito vā / anyatra bhavāgrāt / na hi tasyopapattito lābhaḥ
# srid pa'i rtse mo ma gtogs pas 'og mar skye ba las 'thob ste / / de ni skye bas 'thob pa med do /
atadvāniti kimartha samanvāgataḥ
# ci'i phyir de dang mi ldan pa zhes brjod ce na /
śuddhakena prayogato 'pi nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ śuddhakaṃ pratilabhate parihāṇito vā hānabhāgīyam
# dag pa ba dang ldan pa ni sbyor ba las kyang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dag pa pa 'thob la / / yongs su nyams pa las kyang nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'thob bo /
ata evocyate syācchuddhakaṃ dhyānaṃ vairāgyeṇa pratilabheta vairāgyeṇa vijahyāt / evaṃ parihāṇyā copapattyā ca
# de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan dag pa pa 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob par 'gyur la 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin du yongs su nyams pa dang skye bas 'thob pa dang 'dor bar 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na yod de /
syāddhānabhāgīyaṃ prathamaṃ dhayānam / taddhi kāmavairāgyeṇa labhyate
# bsam gtan dang po nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par ro / / de ni 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob la /
brahmalokavairāgyeṇa tyajyate
# tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor ro /
brahmalokavairāgyaparihāṇyā labhyate / kāmavairāgyaprahāṇyā tyajyate / upariṣṭādbrahmaloka utpadyamāno labhate / tasmāt punaḥ kāmadhātāvupapapadyamāno vijahātīti
# tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa las 'thob la / / 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa las 'dor ro / / gang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba na 'thob la / / des na 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba na 'dor ro zhes 'byung ngo /
anāsravaṃ tu vairāgyāt
# zag med 'dod chags bral ba yis /
atadvān labhate iti vartate
# de dang mi ldan pa las 'thob / / ces bya bar sbyor ro /
tadvāṃstu kṣayajñānato 'pyaśaikṣaṃ labhate indriyasaṃcārato 'pi śaikṣaśaikṣam
# de dang ldan pa ni zad pa shes pa las kyang mi sgrol ba 'thob la / / dbang po 'pho ba las kyang slob pa dang mi slob pa 'thob bo /
nanu ca niyāmā vakrāntito 'pyanāsravaṃ prathamato labhate
# nges par 'jug pa las kyang dang po nyid du zag pa med pa 'thob pa ma yin nam zhe na /
nāvaśyamānupūrvikeṇālābhāt
# mthar gyis pas mi 'thob pa'i phyir gdon mi za ba yin te /
yathā tvavaśyaṃ labhate tathoktam
# ji ltar gdon mi za bar 'thob pa de ltar bshad do /
kliṣṭaṃ hānyupapattitaḥ
# nyon mongs can nyams skye ba yis /
atadvān labhata ityevānuvartate
# de dang mi ldan ba las 'thob / / ces bya ba kho nar sbyar te /
parihāṇito yadi tadvairāgyātparihīyate / upapattito yadyuparibhūmeradharāyāmupapadyate / katamasmātsamāpattidravyādanantaraṃ katyupapadyante
# gal te de las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams na yongs su nyams pa las 'thob bo / / gal te sa gong ma las nas 'og mar skyes na skye bas 'thob bo / / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas gang gi mjug thogs su du zhig skye zhe na /
anāsravaprathamadhyānāntaraṃ ṣaḍutpadyante / svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave dvitīyatṛtīyadhyānabhūmike ca
# zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i mjug thogs su drug skye ste / / rang gi sa pa dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa gzhan dag go /
ākiñcanyāyatanānantaraṃ sapta / svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave vijñānākāśānantyāyatanabhūmike ca / bhavāgraṃ śuddhakamevānāsravābhāvāt
# ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi mjug thogs su bdun te rang gis pa dang rnam shes dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa pa'i dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i dag pa kho na ste / / zag pa med pa med pa'i phyir ro /
dvitīyadhyānāntaramaṣṭau / svabhūmike śuddhakānāsrave tṛtīyacaturthaprathamadhyānabhūmike ca / vijñānānantyāyatanānantaraṃ nava / svabhūmike dve ākāśānantyāyatanacaturthadhyānabhūmikāni catvāri ākiñcanyāyatanabhavāgrabhūmikāni trīṇīti / evamanyadhyānārupyānantaraṃ daśa dravyāṇi yojyāni / eṣa tu saṃkṣepaḥ
# bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mjug thogs su brgyad de / / rang gi sa pa dang bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang dang po'i sa pa'i dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dag go / / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi mjug thogs su dgu ste / / rang gi sa pa gnyis dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa bzhi dang ci yang med pa dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ba gsum mo / / de bzhin du bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan gyi mjug thogs su yang rdzas bcu sbyar bar bya'o / / 'di ni mdor bsdu ba yin te /
tṛtīyādyāvadūrdhvādho 'nāsravānantaraṃ śubham
# zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su / / ltag 'og gsum pa'i bar dge ba skye ba'o /
utpadyate / śubhagrahaṇena śuddhamanāsravaṃ ca gṛhyate kuśalatvāt anāsravasya samāpatti dravyasyānantaraṃ svabhūmike ca śuddhānāsrave utpadyete / ūrdhvādhobhūmike ca tṛtīvādyāvat
# dge ba smos pa ni dag pa ba dang zag pa med pa gzung ste / / dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro / / zag pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas kyi mjug thogs su rang gi sa pa dang sa god ma dang 'og ma sa gsum pa'i bar gyi dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa skye ste /
vyutkrāntakasamāpattāro hi tṛtīyāt pareṇa laṅghayituṃ notsahante
# thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug par byed pas gsum pa las phan chad du ni rgal bar mi nus so /
anvayajñānānantaraṃ cārupyān samāpadyante na dharmajñānānantaram / tasyādharāśrayālambanatvāditi
# rjes su shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug gi chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su ni ma yin te / / de'i rten dang dmigs pa 'og ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
yathā cānāsravādanantaramuktam veditavyam / tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam / svabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭamadhikaṃ śuddhakādanantaramutpadyate
# ji ltar zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su bshad pa ltar dag pa las de bzhin / / rig par bya la / / rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang / / dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su lhag par rang gis pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'o /
śeṣaṃ yathaivānāsravāt / anāsravasya hi samanantaraṃ kliṣṭotpattirnāstīti
# lhag ma ni zag pa med pa las bshad pa ji lta ba bzhin no / / zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su ni nyon mongs pa can skye ba med do /
kliṣṭāt svaṃ śuddhakaṃ kliṣṭaṃ / kliṣṭātsamāpattidravyādanantaraṃ svabhūmike śuddhakakliṣṭe utpadyete / evaṃ cādharaśuddhakam
# nyon mongs can las rang dag dang / / nyon mongs pa can gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas kyi mjug thogs su ni rang gi sa pa'i dag pa ba dang nyon mongs pa can dag skye'o / / 'og ma'i dag cig kyang /
kleśotpīḍito hyadharamapi samāpattiṃ śuddhakaṃ bahu manyate
# nyon mongs pas gzir ba ni 'og ma'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dag pa pa la yang dga' bar 'gyur ro /
yadi kliṣṭaṃ paricchidyādhaḥ saṃcarati / kuśalātsaṃcarito bhavati na kliṣṭāt
# gal te nyon mongs pa can yongs su bcad nas 'og mar 'phon ni dge ba las 'phos pa yin gyi nyon mongs pa can las ni ma yin no /
athāparicchidya kathaṃ saṃcarati
# 'on te yongs su ma bcad na ni ji ltar 'pho zhe na /
pūrvāvedhāt pūrvaṃ hi sa evaṅkāmo bhavati varamadhastāt śuddhakaṃ nopariṣṭāt kliṣṭamiti / pūrvābhiprāyaṃ ca saṃtatiranuvartate sattvānām / praṇidhāya suptasyābhipretakālaprabodhavat / anāsravaṃ tu kliṣṭādanantaraṃ sarvathā notpadyate / samāpattikālaṃ pratyetaduktam / śuddhakāt kliṣṭācca samanantaraṃ svabhūmikameva kliṣṭamutpadyate nānyabhūmikamiti
# sngon 'phangs pa'i phyir te / / sngon 'di snyam du 'og ma'i dag pa ba ni bla'i gong ma'i nyon mongs pa can ni ma yin no snyam du 'dod par 'gyur la / / sngon gyi bsam pa yang sems can rnams kyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brangs te / / bsams nas gnyid log par 'dod pa'i dus su sad pa bzhin no / / zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su rnam pa thams cad du mi skye'o / / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus kyi phyir dag pa pa dang nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs pa can kho na skye'i gzhan gyi sa pa ni ma yin no zhes de skad du bshad kyi /
cyutau tu śuddhakāt kliṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ / cyutikāle tu upapattilābhikācchuddhakādanantaraṃ sarvabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate
# 'chi 'pho dag las nyon mongs kun / / 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe skye bas thob pa'i dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su sa thams cad pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'o /
kliṣṭāttu nottaram
# nyon mongs can las gong ma min /
kliṣṭāttu dhyānārūpyādanantaraṃ cyutikāle svādharabhūmikaṃ kliṣṭamutpadyate / nordhvabhūmikam / na ca sarvasmācchuddhakādanāśravaṃ samāpattidravyamutpadyate
# 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i mjug thogs su rang gi sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'i sa gong ma pa ni ma yin no / / dag pa pa thams cad las zag pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rdzas skye ba yang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / caturdhā śuddhakaṃ hānabhāgīyādi
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / dag pa nyams pa'i cha mthun sogs / / rnam bzhi /
hānabhāgīyaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyaṃ sthitibhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyamiti caturvidhaṃ śuddhakam
# dag pa pa ni nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang rnam pa bzhi'o /
bhavāgraṃ tu trividhamanyatra viśeṣabhāgīyāt / kimasya lakṣaṇam
# srid pa'i rtse mo ni rnam pa gsum yin te / / khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so / / 'di'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
yathākramam
# de ni go rims bzhin du /
kleśotpattisvabhūmyūrdhvānāsravānuguṇaṃ hi tat / kleśotpattyanuguṇaṃ hānabhāgīyaṃ svabhūmyanuguṇaṃ sthitibhāgīyamūrdhvabhūmyanuguṇaṃ viśeṣabhāgīyamanāsravānuguṇaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyam / tasmādanāsravamutpadyate / athaiṣāṃ caturṇā kati kasmādanantaramutpadyante / dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram
# nyon mongs skye dang rang sa dang / / gong dang zag med rjes mthun pa'o / / nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni nyon mongs pa skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'o / / gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni rang gi sa dang rjes su mthun pa'o / / khyad par can gyi cha dang rjes su mthun pa ni sa gong ma dang rjes su mthun pa'o / / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni zag pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa ste / / zag pa med pa ni de las skye'o / / yang bzhi po de dag las gang gi mjug thogs su du zhig skye zhe na / / nyams cha mthun sogs mjug thogs su / / gnyis dang gsum dang gsum dang gcig /
hānabhāgīyaṃ hānabhāk / tasmādanantaraṃ dve utpadyete
# nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa nyi nyams pa dang brten pa'o / / de'i mjug thogs su ni gnyis skye ste /
hānisthitibhāgīye / sthitibhāgīyānantaraṃ trīṇyanyatra nirvedhabhāgīyāt / viśeṣabhāgīyādanantaraṃ trīṇyanyatra hānabhāgīyāt nirvedhabhāgīyādanantaraṃ tadevaikamiti
# nyams pa dang gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag go / / gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni gsum ste / / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so / / khyad par can gyi cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni gsum ste / / nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so / / nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni gcig ste /
kathaṃ vyutkrāntakasamāpattirutpadyate
# de gcig pu skye'o / / thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pa ji ltar skye zhe na /
gatvāgamya dvidhā bhūmīraṣṭau śliṣṭaikalaṅghitāḥ / vyutkrāntakasamāpattirvisabhāgatṛtīyagā
# sa brgyad rnam gnyis 'brel ba dang / / gcig rgal song zhing 'ongs nas ni / / ris mi mthun pa gsum par 'gor /
gatvetyanulomaṃ samāpadya
# thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin /
āgamyeti pratilomaṃ samāpadya / dvidheti sāsravānāsravā bhūmīḥ / aṣṭāviti dhyānārupyasamāpattīḥ
# sa brgyad ces bya ba ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so / / rnam gnyis zhes bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'o / / 'brel pa dang zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin du'o /
śliṣṭā ityanukrameṇa
# gcig rgal zhes bya ba ni re re rgal nas so /
ekalaṅghitā ityekāmekāmutkramya / sāsravā aṣṭau bhūmiranulomapratilomasamāpattito nirjitya anāsravāśca sapta / paścātsāsravāt prathamāddhyānāt sāsravaṃ tṛtīyaṃ samāpadyate / tasmādākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādākṃicanyāvatanam / evaṃ punaḥ pratilomaṃ nirjitya anāsravā apyekalaṅghitā anulomapratilomaṃ ca samāpadyate / ayaṃ prayogo vyutkrāntakasamāpatteḥ / yadā tu prathamātsāsravāt tṛtīyamanāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tasmātsāsravamākāśānantyāyatanaṃ tasmādanāsravamākiñcanyāyatanam
# song zhing zhes bya ba ni lugs dang mthun par snyoms par zhugs nas so / / 'ongs nas zhes bya ba ni lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par bzhugs nas so / / zag pa dang bcas pa'i sa brgyad dang zag pa med pa'i sa bdun lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo nas byang bar byas nas / / phyis zag pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang po nas zag pa dang bcas pa'i gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug cing / / de nas ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la / / de nas ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go / / de bzhin du lugs dang mi mthun pa yang byang bar byas nas zag pa med pa rnams kyang re re rgal zhing lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug pa ni thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yin no / / gang gi tshe zag pa dang bcas pa dang po nas zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug cing / / de nas ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la /
evaṃ punaḥ pratilomam / tadā visabhāgatṛtīyadravyagamanādabhiniṣpannā bhavati / ativiprakṛṣṭatvānna caturthī samāpadyate / tāṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu asamayavimukta evārhannutpādayati
# de nas ni zag pa med pa'i ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug cing / / de bzhin du lugs dang mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe ris mi mthun pa'i rdzas gsum par 'gro ba'i phyir / / mngon par grub pa yin no / / shin tu ring ba'i phyir bzhi pa la ni snyoms par mi 'jug go / / de yang gling gsum du dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par gro ba'i dgra bcom pa kho nas skyed par byed de /
niḥkleśatvātsamādhivaśitvācca / dṛṣṭiprāptasya yadyapi tīkṣṇendriyatvāt samādhau vaśitvaṃ na tu niṣkleśaḥ / samayavimukto yadyapi niḥkleśo natvasya samādhau vaśitvamiti / kenāśrayeṇa kati dhyānārupyāḥ saṃmukhīkriyante / svādhobhūmyāśrayā eva / dhyānāśrayā eva
# nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang pa'i phyir ro / / mthong bas 'thob pa ni gal te dbang po rnon po yin pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba yin yang nyon mongs pa med pa ni ma yin no / / dus kyis rnam par grol ba ni gal te nyon mongs pa med pa yin yang / / ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba ni ma yin no / / rten gang gis bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa du zhig mngon gsum du byed ce na / / bsam gtan gzugs med rang dang ni /
dhyānārūpyāḥ / bhavāgraṃ bhavāgre ca saṃmukhīkriyate adhaśca yāvatkāmadhātau
# 'og sa'i rten can srid pa'i rtse mor yang mngon sum du byed la 'og ma 'dod pa'i khams kyi bar du yang mngon sum du byed do /
śeṣāṇi svasyāṃ bhūmāvadhaśceti / kiṃ kāraṇamūrdhvopapanno nādharāṃ samāpatti saṃmukhīkaroti
# de bzhin du lhag ma rnams kyang rang gis dang sa 'og mar mngon sum du byed do / / ci'i phyir gong du skyes pa snyoms par 'jug pa 'og ma mngon sum du mi byed ce na /
tasmāttasya / vṛthā'dharam
# 'di ltar de la 'og dgos med /
nahi tasyādhareṇa samāpattidravyeṇa kiñcit prayojanaṃ vidhīyate / nihīnatvāt
# de la ni snyoms par 'jug pa 'og ma'i rdzas kyis cung zad kyang dgos pa mi byed de dman pa'i phyir ro /
utsarga kṛtvā 'pavādaṃ karoti
# spyir bstan pa byas nas dmigs kyis ston par byed de /
āryākiñcanyasāṃmukhyāt bhavāgre tvāsravakṣayaḥ / bhavāgre tūpapannasyānāsravākiñcanyāyatanasaṃmukhībhāvādāsravakṣayo bhavati / kathaṃ tatropapannasya tatsaṃmukhībhāvaḥ
# srid rtser 'phags pa ci yang med / / mngon sum byas nas zag pa zad / / 'phags pa srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa ni zag pa med pa'i ci yang med pa'i skye mched mngon sum du byas nas zag pa zad par 'gyur ro / / ji ltar na der skyes pa de mngon sum du byed ce na /
svasyābhāvāttasya cābhyāsāt / athaiṣāṃ dhyānārūpyāṇāṃ kimālambanam / satṛṣṇāḥ svabhavālambāḥ
# rang gi med pa'i phyir dang de yang nye ba'i phyir ro / / yang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa 'di dag gi dmigs pa ci zhig yin zhe na / / sred bcas rang gi srid la dmigs /
āsvādanāsaṃprayuktāḥ svabhūmikaṃ bhavamālambante
# ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan ba rnams ni rang gis pa'i srid pa la dmigs so /
bhavagrahaṇena sāsravaṃ vastu gṛhyate
# srid pa smos pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gzung ngo /
nādharamālambante vītarāgatvānnottaraṃ tṛṣṇāparichinnatvāt bhūmīnām
# 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'og ma la yang mi dmigs so / / sa rnams ni srid pas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir gong ma la yang ma yin no /
nānāsravaṃ kuśalatvaprasaṅgāditi / dhyānaṃ sadviṣayaṃ śubham / kuśalaṃ dhyānaṃ śubhakamanāsravaṃ ca
# dge ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zag pa med pa la yang ma yin no / / bsam gtan dge yul yod dgu yin / / dge ba'i bsam gtan dag pa dang /
tat sarvālambanaṃ yatkiñcidasti saṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ vā
# zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan de'i dmigs pa ni 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas gang ci yod kyang rung ba thams cad yin no /
na maulāḥ kuśalārūpyāḥ sāsravādharagocarāḥ
# gzugs mod dngos gzhi dge rnams kyi / / spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min /
maulānāṃ kuśalārūpyāṇāmadhobhūmikaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu nālambanaṃ svordhvabhūmyālambanatvāt
# gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi dge ba rnams kyi dmigs pa ni sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po ma yin te / / rang gi sa pa dang sa gong ma la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
anāsravaṃ tvālambanam / sarvānvayajñānapakṣyo na dharmajñānapakṣo nādhobhūminirodhaḥ
# dmigs pa zag pa med pa ni rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa thams cad yin gyi chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa yang ma yin la sa 'og ma'i 'gog pa yang ma yin no /
sāmantakānantaryamārgāṇāṃ tvadharā bhūmirālambanam / eṣāṃ ca punastrividhānāṃ dhyānānāṃ rūpyārūpyāṇām
# nyer bsdogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi dmigs pa ni sa 'og ma yin no / / bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnam pa gsum po 'di dag las /
anāsraveṇa hīyante kleśāḥ
# zag pa med pas nyon mongs pa rnams spong ngo /
na śuddhakena / kuta eva kliṣṭena / vītarāgatvānnādhaḥ / tasyaiva tadapratipakṣatvānna svabhūmau / viśiṣṭataratvānnordhvamiti
# dag pa pas kyang mi spong na / / nyon mongs pa can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te / / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'og ma la yang ma yin la / / de nyid de'i gnyen po ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi sa na yod pa yang ma yin no / / ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir gong ma yang ma yin no /
samantakena ca / dhyānārūpyasāmantakena ca kleśāḥ prahīyante śuddhakenāpi / adhobhūmipratipakṣatvāt
# nyer bsdogs dag pas kyang / / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i nyer bsdogs ni dag pa pas kyang nyon mongs pa rnams spong ste / / sa 'og ma pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro /
kati punaḥ sāmantakāni / aṣṭau sāmantakānyeṣāṃ / ekaikasyaikaikaṃ yena tatpraveśaḥ / kiṃ tānyapi trividhāni tathaiva ca teṣu vedanā
# nyer bsdogs du zhig yod ce na / / de dag la ni nyer bsdogs brgyad / / re re la gang gis de la 'jug pa re re yod do / / ci de dag kyang rnam pa gsum yin la de dag la tshor ba yang de dang 'dra bar yod dam zhe na /
netyucyate
# smras pa /
śuddhāduḥkhāsukhāni hi
# ma yin te / / dag pa bde min sdug bsngal min /
śuddhakāni ca tānyupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktāni ca yantabāhyatvādadhobhūmyudvegānapagamāt vairāgyapathatvācca nāsvādanāsaṃprayuktāni / āryaṃ cādyaṃ / ādyaṃ sāmantakamanāgamyaṃ tacchuddhakaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca yadyapi sāmantakacittena pratisaṃdhibandhaḥ kliṣṭo bhavati
# de dag ni dag pa yang yin la btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan ba dag kyang yin te / / 'bad de drang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang sa 'og ma pa las yid 'byung ba dang ma bral ba'i phyir dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro myang ba dang mtshungs bar ldan pa ma yin no / / dang po 'phags pa'ang / / nyer bsdogs kyi dang po ni mi lcogs pa med pa ste / / de ni dag pa yang yin la zag pa med pa yang yin no /
samāhitasya tu kliṣṭatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate / tridhā kecit / kecitpunaricchanti / āsvādanāsaṃprayuktamapyanāgamyaṃ sāmantakaṃ cocyate dhyānāntaraṃ ca
# nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyi snying mtshams sbyor ba nyon mongs pa can yin mod kyi mnyam par gzhag pa la ni nyon mongs ba can nyid dgag go / / kha cig gsum / / kha cig ni mi lcogs pa med pa ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang 'dod do / / nyer bsdogs zhes kyang 'byung / / bsam gtan khyad par can zhes kyang 'byung na /
kimidamekārthamāhosvinnānārtham / sāmantakaṃ hi vairāgyamārgaḥ / atarka dhyānamantaram
# ci 'di'i don gcig pa zhig gam / / 'on te don tha dad pa zhig yin zhe na / / don tha dad ba yin te / / nyer bsdogs ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin la / / rtog med bsam gtan khyad par can /
dhyānameva hi vitarkāsaṃprayuktaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ dhyānaviśeṣatvāt
# bsam gtan dang po kho na rtog pa dang / / mtshungs par mi ldan pa ni bsam gtan khyad par can yin te /
ata eva dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu na vyayasthāpyate viśeṣābhāvāditi
# bsam gtan gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro / / de nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa na rnam par mi gzhag pa ste /
tatpunardhyānāntaraṃ / tridhā / āsvādanāsaṃprayuktam śuddhakamanāsravaṃ ca / aduḥkhāsukhaṃ tacca
# khyad par med pa'i phyir ro / / bsam gtan khyad par can de ni / / rnam gsum / / ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang dag pa dang zag pa med pa yin no / / de bden min sdug min /
nātra sukhaṃ duḥkhamityaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣendriyasaṃprayuktamityarthaḥ / na prītisaṃprayuktaṃ sābhisaṃskāravāhitvāt / ata eva duḥkhā pratipat
# 'di la bde pa yang med bas na bde ba yang ma yin pa sdug bsngal yang ma yin ba ste / / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / / mngon par 'du bya ba dang bcas pas drangs ba yin pa'i phyir / / dga' ba dang mtshungs par ldan ba yang ma yin te / / de nyid kyi phyir lam dka' ba yin no /
tasya tarhi dhyānāntarasya kaḥ phalaviśeṣaḥ / taddhi / mahābrahmaphalaṃ ca tat
# 'o na bsam gtan khyad par can de'i 'bras bu khyad par can gang zhig yin zhe na / / de ni tshangs chen 'bras bu can /
tāṃ hi dhyānāntarikāṃ bhāvayitvā mahābrahmā bhavati
# bsam gtan khyad par can de bsgoms nas tshangs pa chen por 'gyur ro / / yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mdor bsdus te /
punaḥ sarvasamādhīn saṃkalayya trayaḥ samādhayaḥ uktāḥ sūtre / savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ
# mdo las rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gsum du bka' stsal te /
avitarko vicāramātraḥ / avitarko 'vicāra iti / tatra dhyānāntaraṃ tāvadavitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhhiriti jñāpitam / vitarkamātrapratiṣedhāt
# de la re zhig bsam gtan khyad par can na ni / / rtog pa tsam zhig bkag pa'i phyir rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes shes par byas zin to /
tataḥ / savitarkavicāro'dhaḥsamādhiḥ
# de man chad rtog dpyod bcas pa'i / / ting nge 'dzin /
tasmāddhyānāntarādadhaḥsamādhiḥ savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ / prathamaṃ dhyānamanāgamyaṃ ca
# bsam gtan khyad par can de man chad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan dang po dang mi lcogs pa med pa ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa yin no /
parato 'dvayaḥ
# yan chad gnyi ga med pas na /
nātra dvayamastītyadvayaḥ
# 'di na gnyi ga med pa ste /
pareṇa tu dhyānāntarātsamādhiravitarko 'vicāraḥ / dvitīyadhyānasāmantakādyāvat bhavāgram
# bsam gtan khyad par can yan chad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar ni rtog pa yang med pa dpyod pa yang med pa'o /
punastrayaḥ uktāḥ / śūnyatāsamādhirapraṇihita ānimittaśca / tatra / ānimittaḥ samākāraiḥ
# yang stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin dang smon pa med ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs te / / de la / / mtshan med zhi ba'i rnam ba dang /
nirodhasatyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhirānimittaścaturākāraḥ / nirvāṇaṃ hi daśanimittāpagatatvādanimittam
# 'gog pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa ste / / rnam pa bzhi pa yin no / / mya ngan las 'das pa ni mtshan ma bcu dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin la /
tadālambanaḥ samādhirānimittaḥ / pañcaviṣayastrīpuruṣatrisaṃskṛtalakṣaṇanimittāni daśa
# de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin te / / mtshan ma bcu ni yul lnga dang pho dang mo dang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid rnams so /
śūnyatānātmaśunyataḥ
# stong nyid bdag med stong nyid du /
pravartate / anātmaśūnyatākārābhyāṃ saṃprayuktaḥ śūnyatāsamādhidvarcyākāraḥ
# 'jug pa'o / / bdag med pa dang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa nyid de / / rnam pa gnyis pa yin no /
apraṇihitaḥ satyākārairataḥ paraiḥ
# smon pa med pa ni / / de las gzhan bden rnam pa dang /
paraiḥ śeṣaiḥ satyākāraiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ samādhipraṇihito daśākāraḥ
# bden pa lhag ma'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa ste / / rnam pa bcu yin no /
anityaduḥkhataddhetubhya udvegāt mārgasya ca kolopamatayā 'vaśyatyājyatvāttadākāraḥ samādhirapraṇihitaḥ
# mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal pa dang de'i rgyu dag gis yid 'byung ba'i phyir dang lam yang gdon mi za bar gzings lta bur dor bar bya ba yin pa nyid kyi phyir de'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin ni smon pa med pa yin te /
tadatikramābhimukhatvāt śūnyatānātmatābhyāṃ tu nodvego nirvāṇasāmānyāt
# de las 'da' bar mngon sum du phyogs pa'i phyir ro / / mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir stong pa dang bdag med pa dag gis ni yid mi 'byung ngo /
ta ete trayaḥ samādhayo dvividhāḥ
# ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni rnam pa gnyis te /
śuddhāmalāḥ
# dag dang dri ma med /
śuddhakāścānāsravāśca / laukikalokottaratvāt / laukikā ekādaśasu bhūmiṣu
# 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / dag pa pa yang yin la zag pa med pa dag kyang yin te / / 'jig rten pa rnams ni sa bcu gcig na yod do /
lokottarā yatra mārgaḥ / nirmalāstu te vimokṣamukhatrayam
# 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams ni gang na lam yod pa na yod do / / de dag / / dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo /
anāsravāstvete trayaḥ samādhayastrīṇi vimokṣamukhānyucyante / śūnyatā vimokṣamukhamapraṇihitamānimittaṃ vimokṣamukhamiti
# ting nge 'dzin gsum po de dag dri ma med pa'i thar pa'i sgo yin pa'i phyir rnam bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang rnam par pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste /
mokṣadvāratvāt / punaścocyante / śūnyatāśūnyatādyākhyāstrayo 'parasamādhayaḥ / śūnyatāśūnyatā apraṇihitāpraṇihitaḥ ānimittānimittaśca / śūnyatādyālambanatvāttannāma / teṣāṃ punaḥ
# rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum zhes bya'o / / yang / / stong nyid stong nyid ces la sogs / / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gsum mo / / zhes bya ba ste / / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang smon pa med pa smon pa med pa dang mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'o / / stong pa nyid la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ming de skad ces bya'o / / de dag las /
ālambete akṣaikṣaṃ dvau śūnyataścāpyanityataḥ
# gnyis ni stong dang mi rtag par / / mi slob pa la dmigs pa yin /
aśaikṣaṃ samādhiṃ dvāvaparasamādhī ālambete / śūnyatāśūnyatā aśaikṣaṃ śūnyatāsamādhimālambate śūnyatākāreṇa
