# ting nge 'dzin gzhan gnyis ni mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa yin te / / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni mi slob pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la stong pa'i rnam par dmigs so /
apraṇihitāpraṇihito 'pyaśaikṣamapraṇihitamanityākāreṇa / na duḥkhato na hetvādito 'nāsravasyātallakṣaṇatvānna mārgākāraiḥ dūṣaṇīyatvāt
# smon pa med pa smon pa med pa yang mi slob pa'i smon pa med pa la mi rtag pa'i rnam par dmigs so / / sdug bsngal bar yang ma yin la rgyu la sogs par yang ma yin te / / zag pa med pa ni de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / lam gyi rnam pa rnams su yang ma yin te / / sun dbyung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
ānimittānimittastu śāntato'saṃkhyayā kṣayam / ānimittānimittastu samādhiraśaikṣasyānimittasyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhamālambate
# mtshan ma med pa mtshan med ni / / zhi bar ma brtags zad pa la / / mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi slob pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i so sor ma brtags pas /
śāntākāreṇa / anāsravasya pratisaṃkhayānirodhābhāvāt
# 'gog pa la zhi ba'i rnam par dmigs te / / zag pa med pa la so sor brtags pas / / 'gos pa med pa'i phyir ro /
na nirodhapraṇītaniḥsaraṇākārairanityatānirodhasādhāraṇatvādavyākṛtatvā / davisaṃyogācca / ekāntena caite parasamādhayaḥ
# 'gog pa dang gya nom pa dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par ni ma yin te / / mi rtag ba nyid kyi 'gog pa dang thun mong yin pa nyed kyi phyir dang lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir dang bral ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro / / ting nge 'dzin gzhan 'di dag ni gcig tu zag bcas /
sāsravāḥ / āryamārgadveṣitvāt nahyevamanāsravā iti
# 'phags pa'i lam la sdang pa'i phyir te / / zag pa med pa dag ni de lta ma yin no /
kutrotpadyante
# gang du skyed par byed ce na /
nṛṣu / manuṣyeṣveva na deveṣu / kasyotpadyante
# mi'i nang / / mi rnams kyi nang kho nar skyed kyi lha dag gi nang du ni ma yin no /
akopyasya
# su la skye zhe na /
nānyasyārhataḥ / katibhūmikāḥ / saptasāmantavarjitāḥ
# mi g yo la dgra bcom pa gzhan la ni ma yin no / / sa du pa zhig la ni ma yin zhe na / / nyer bsdogs bdun ni ma gtogs so /
sapta sāmantakāni hitvānyāsvekādaśasu bhūmiṣu / kāmadhātvanāgamyadhyānāntaradhyānārupyeṣu / punaścatasraḥ samādhibhāvanā ucyante
# nyer bsdogs bdun ma gtogs pa sa gzhan bcu gcig po 'dod pa'i khams dang mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa rnams na yod do / / yang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa bzhi ste /
asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya saṃvartate iti vistaraḥ
# ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun tu brten bsgoms par byas lan mang du byas na / / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba yang yod ces bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba de la /
tatra / samādhibhāvanā dhyānaṃ śubhamādyaṃ sukhāya hi / kuśalaṃ prathamaṃ śuddhakamanāsravaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya samādhibhāvanā
# dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ni / / bde 'gyur ting 'dzin bsgom pa yin / / dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ste / / dag pa pa'am / / zag pa med pa ni / / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no /
tadādikatvādanyānyapi jñeyāni / nāvaśyaṃ saṃparāyasukhavihārāyāparihiṇordhvopapannaparinirvṛtānāṃ tadabhāvāt
# de dang po yin pa'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin par shes par bya'o / / tshe phyi ma la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba ni nges pa med de / / yongs su nyams pa dang gong du skyes pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la de med pa'i phyir ro /
darśanāyākṣyabhijñeṣṭā
# mig gi mngon shes mthong 'gyur 'dod /
divyacakṣurabhijñā jñānadarśanāya samādhibhāvanā
# lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa ni shes pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no /
dhībhedāya prayogajāḥ
# sbyor ba las byung blo dbyer 'gyur /
prayogajāḥ sarve guṇāstraidhātukā anāsravāḥ prajñāprabhedāya samādhibhāvanā
# sbyor ba las byung ba'i yon tan khams gsum pa dang zag pa med pa thams cad ni shes rab rab tu rnam par dbye bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no /
vajropamo'ntye yo dhyāne sāsravakṣayabhāvanā / yaścaturthadhyāne vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ sa āsravakṣayāya samādhibhāvanā
# rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan mtha'i / / gang yin de zag zad 'gyur bsgom / / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni zag pa zad par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yin no /
ātmopanāyikī kilaiṣā bhagavato dharmadeśanā
# bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa 'di ni bdag nyid la nyer bar gtod pa yin te /
ataścaturbhya evāha / kṛtaḥ samādhīnāṃ kālagato nirdeśaḥ
# de'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi kho nar gsungs so zhes grag go / / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi skabs nas 'ongs ba bshad zin to /
idānīṃ samādhisaṃniśritānāṃ guṇānāṃ nirdeśakāla iti vyākhyāyante
# nga ni ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i yon tan rnams bstan pa'i skabs yin pas bshang bar bya ste /
apramāṇāni catvāri / maitrī karuṇā muditopekṣā ca / apramāṇasattvālambanatvāt
# tshad med pa ni bzhi yin no / / byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te / / sems can tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro /
kimarthaṃ catvāryeva / vyāpādādivipakṣataḥ
# ci'i phyir bzhi kho na yin zhe na / / gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir /
vyāpādaviṃhisā 'ratikāmarāgavyāpādabahulānāṃ tatprahāṇāya catvāri yathāsaṃkhyam
# gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang mi dga' ba dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems mang ba rnams kyis de dag spang bar bya ba'i phyir bzhi ste grangs bzhin no /
aśubhopekṣayoḥ kāmarāgapratipakṣatve ko viśeṣaḥ / varṇarāgasyāśubhā maithunarāgasyopekṣeti vaibhāṣikāḥ / evaṃ tu yujyate / maithūnarāgasyāśubhā mātāpitṛputrajñātirāgasyopekṣeti / tatra / maitryadveṣaḥ / adveṣasvabhāvā maitrī / api karuṇā / karuṇāpyevam
# mi sdug pa dang btang snyoms gnyis 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po nyid du khyad par ci zhig yod ce na / / bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re / / kha dog gi 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni mi sdug pa'o / / 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni btang snyoms so zhes zer ro / / 'di skad du 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni mi sdug pa'o / / pha dang ma dang bu dang nye du'i 'dod chags kyi gnyen po ni btang snyoms so zhes bya ba ni rung ngo / / de la / / zhe sdang med byams / / byams pa ni zhe sdang med pa'i rang bzhin no / / snying rje yang / / snying rje yang de dang 'dra'o /
muditā sumanaskatā / saumanasyasvabhāvā muditā
# yid bde ba ni dga' ba yin / / dga' ba ni yid bde ba'i rang bzhin no /
upekṣā 'lobhaḥ
# btang snyoms ma chags /
alobhātmikopekṣā / kathaṃ vyāpādapratipakṣaḥ
# btang snyoms ni ma chags pa'i bdag nyid yin no / / ji ltar na gnod sems kyi gnyer po yin zhe na /
tasya lobhākṛṣṭatvāt / ubhayasvabhāvā tvasau yujyate
# de ni chags pas drangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'di ni gnyi ga'i rang bzhin yin na rung ngo /
eṣāṃ tu maitryādīnāṃ
# byams pa la sogs pa 'di dag gi rnam pa ni /
ākāraḥ sukhitā duḥkhitā vata / modantāmiti sattvāśca
# kye ma bder gyur sdug bsngal dang / / dgar gyur sems can rnams snyoms pa /
sukhitā vata sattvā iti manasikurvan maitrīṃ samāpadyate / duḥkhitā vata sattvā iti karuṇāṃ modantāṃ vata sattvā iti muditāṃ sattvā ityeva manasi kurvannupekṣāṃ samāpadyate
# kye ma sems can rnams bde bar gyur cig snyam du yid la byed cing byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go / / kye ma sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo snyam du yid la byed cing snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go / / kye ma sems can rnams yid bde bar gyur cig snyam du yid la byed cing dga' ba la snyoms bar 'jug go / / sems can rnams mnyam mo snyam du de ltar yid la byed cing btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug ste /
mādhyasthyāt / atadvatāṃ sukhādhimokṣatvāt kathaṃ na viparītatvaṃ bhavati
# bar mar gnas pa'i phyir ro / / de dang mi ldan pa rnams la bde bar mos pa'i phyir ji ltar na phyin ci log nyid du mi 'gyur zhe na /
santvityabhiprāyāt
# gyur cig snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro /
āśayasyāviparītatvādvā 'dhimuktisaṃjñānāt
# yang na bsam pa phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir te / / mos par 'du shes pa'i phyir ro /
athavā ka evaṃ viparītatve doṣaḥ
# yang na de ltar phyin ci log ba nyid yin na yang nyes pa ci zhig yod /
akuśalatvamiti cet / na kuśalamūlatvādvyāpādādipratipakṣatvācca
# gal te mi dge ba nyid yin no zhe na ni / / ma yin te / / gnod sems la sogs pa'i gnyen po yin bas dge ba'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
ukta eṣāmākāraḥ / kāmasattvāstu gocaraḥ
# 'di dag gi rnam pa ni bshad zin to / / spyod yul 'dod pa'i sems can rnams /
kāmāvacarāḥ sattvā eṣāmālambanam / tadālambanānāṃ vyāpādādīnāṃ pratipakṣatvāt / yattūktamekāṃ diśamadhimucyeteti tadbhājanena bhājanagataṃ darśitam
# 'di dag gi dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can rnams yin te / / de la dmigs pa'i gnod sems la sogs pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro / / phyogs gcig tu mos nas zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni snod kyi snod na gnas pa bstan pa yin no /
katibhūmikānyetāni
# de dag sa du pa zhig yin zhe na /
dhyānayormuditā
# dga' ba bsam gtan gnyis na yod /
prathamadvitīyadhyānayormuditā / saumanasyatvāt
# dga' ba ni bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa na yod de / / yid bde ba yin pa'i phyir ro /
anyāni ṣaṭsu
# gzhan ni drug na /
anyāni trīṇi apramāṇāni ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣu / anāgamye dhyānāntaredhyāneṣu ca
# tshad med pa gzhan gsum ni sa drug po mi lcogs pa med ba dang bsam gtan khyad par can dang bsam gtan rnams na yod do /
saprayogamaulagrahaṇāt / kecittu pañcasu
# kha cig lnga / / kha cig ni 'di dag mi lcogs pa med pa ma gtogs pa lnga na yod par 'dod do /
kecit punaḥ anāgamyaṃ hitvā pañcasvetānīcchanti / daśasvityapare
# gzhan dag na re 'dod pa'i khams dang nyer bsngogs rnams bsnan nas bcu na yod do zhes zer te /
kāmadhātuṃ sāmantakāni ca prakṣipya samāhitāsamāhitamaulalprayogagrahaṇāt
# mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin pa dang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba smos pa'i phyir ro / / gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir /
yaduktaṃ vyāpādādivipakṣata iti kimapramāṇairapi kleśagrahaṇaṃ bhavati / na taiḥ prahāṇaṃ / mauladhyānabhūmikatvādadhimuktimanaskāratvātsattvālambanatvācca
# zhes gang bshad pa / / ci tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang nyon mongs pa spong ba yin nam zhe na / / de yis mi spong / / bsam gtan dngos gzhi'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir dang mos pa yin la byed pa'i phyir dang sems can la dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
tatprayogeṇa tu vyāpādādiviṣkambhaṇāttatpratipakṣatvamuktam / prahāṇa dūrīkaraṇācca
# de dag gi sbyor bas gnod sems la sogs pa rnam par gnon pa'i phyir dang spangs pa thag sring bar byed pa'i phyir de dag gi gnyen po nyid du bshad do /
kāmadhātvanāgamyabhūmikāni hi maitryādīni maulāpramāṇasadṛśāni saṃvidyante
# byams pa la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams dang mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa rnams ni dngos gzhi'i tshad med pa dang 'dra ba dag yod do /
taistānviṣkambhya prahāṇamārgaiḥ prajahāti
# de dag gis de rnams rnam par mnan nas spong ba'i lam rnams kyis rab tu spong bar byed do /
tato vītarāgāvasthāyāṃ maulāpramāṇalābhāt / balavatpratyayalābhe 'pi tairanādhṛṣyo bhavati / kathaṃ punarādikarmiko maitryāṃ prayujyate
# de nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas skabs na ni dngos gzhi'i tshad med pa rnyed pa'i phyir rkyen stobs dang ldan pa rnyed kyang de dag gis mi brdzi ba yin no / / yang las dang po pa byams pa la ji ltar sbyor zhe na /
yathā sukhitamātmānaṃ manyate parānvā śṛṇoti buddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakāṃstathā sattvānāṃ tatsukhamadhimucyate evaṃ sukhitā vata santu sattvā iti / na cecchaknoti kleśasyodbhatavṛttitvāt sa mitrapakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā 'dhimātre tatsukhamadhimucyate
# ji ltar bdag nyid kyi bde ba nyams pa yod pa'am / / gzhan sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i thos pa de bzhin du kye ma sems can rnams ni de ltar bde bar gyur cig ces sems can rnams la bde bar mos par byed do / / gal te nyon mongs pa'i 'jug pa shas che ba'i phyir mi nus na des mdza' po'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum du phye nas chen po la bde ba de mos par byed do /
tato madhye mṛdau ca / teṣu cetsamāṃ maitrīṃ labhate tata udāsīnapakṣe
# de nas 'bring dang chung du la bde ba de mos par byed do / / gal te de dag la byams pa mnyam pa thob na de'i 'og tu tha mal pa'i phyogs la mos par byed do /
tataḥ śatrūpakṣaṃ tridhā bhittvā mṛdau tat sukhamadhimucyate / tato madhye 'dhimātre ca / tataścedadhimātra iva mitrapakṣe sukhādhimokṣo na vyāvartate / tataḥ krameṇa grāmarāṣṭrasukhādhimokṣo yāvadekāṃ diśaṃ yāvatsarva lokaṃ maitryā sphurati / yastu sarvaguṇagrāhī samaitrīṃ kṣipramutpādayati
# de'i 'og tu dgra bo'i phyogs la rnam pa gsum du phye nas chung du la bde ba de mos par byed do / / de nas 'bring dang chen po la mos par byed do / / gal te de la mdza' bo chen po'i phyogs bzhin du bde bar mos ba mi ldog bar gyur na de'i 'og tu rim gyis khyim dang grong dang yul 'khor gyi bar du bde bar mos par byas nas phyogs gcig nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi bar du ba mas pa rgyas par byed do / / gang zhig thams cad du yon tan 'dzin pa de ni byams pa myur du skyed par byed do /
śakyaṃ hi samucchinna kuśalamūle 'pi guṇagrāhiṇā bhavituṃ pratyekabuddhe ca doṣa grāhiṇā pūrvaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaphalasaṃdarśanāt
# sngon gyi bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu snang ba'i sgo nas dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du chad pa la yang yon tan gzung bar nus la / / rang sangs rgyas la yang skyon gzung bar nus so /
evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāṃ ca prayujyate amī sattvā bahuvidhavyasanīdhanimagnā apyevaṃ duḥkhādvimucyeran apyevātipramoderannityadhimucyamāna upekṣāṃ tūdāsīnapakṣādārabhate
# snying rje dang dga' ba la yang de bzhin du sems can sdug bsngal ba rnam pa mang po'i chu bor bying ba 'di dag sdug bsngal las myur du thar kyang ci ma rung / / mngon par dga' bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du mos shing dga' ba la sbyor bar byed do /
etāni cāpramāṇāni / nṛṣveva janyante / manuṣyeṣūtpādyante / nānyatra / kiṃ punarya ekenāpramāṇena samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ sarvaiḥ
# btang snyoms ni tha mal ba'i phyogs las rtsom mo / / tshad med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni mi dag gi nang du skyed do / / mi rnams kyi nang du skyed kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no / / ci tshad med pa gcig dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni gdon mi za bar thams cad dang ldan na ma zhe na /
kintu / tryanvito dhruvam / tṛtīyacaturthadhyānopapanno muditayā na samanvāgato bhavati / tribhistvapramāṇalābhī nityaṃ samanvāgato bhavati / aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ
# thams cad dang ldan pa ni nges pa med do / / 'on kyang nges gsum ldan / / bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi par skyes pa dag dga' ba dang mi ldan no / / tshad med pa gsum dang ni rtag tu ldan pa yin no / / rnam par thar pa brgyad /
rūpī rūpāṇi paśyatīti prathamo vimokṣaḥ
# gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa dang po yin no /
adhyātmarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatīti dvitīyaḥ / śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharatīti tṛtīyaḥ
# nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yin no / / sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yin no /
catvāra ārupyāḥ / saṃjñāveditanirodhaścāṣṭamaḥ
# gzugs med pa bzhi dang brgyad pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'o /
teṣāṃ / prathamāvaśubhā
# de rnams las / / dang po gnyis / / mi sdug /
prathamau dvau vimokṣāvaśubhāsvabhāvau / vinīlakādyākāratvāt
# rnam par thar pa dang po gnyis ni rnam par bsngos pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pa'i rang bzhin dag yin te /
ata etayoraśubhāvannayo veditavyaḥ
# de nyid kyi phyir de gnyis kyi tshul ni mi sdug pa bzhin du rig par bya'o /
etau ca / dhyānayordvayoḥ
# de gnyis kyang bsam gtan gnyis na yod /
prathamadvitīyayordhyānayornānyasyāṃ bhūmau
# bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dag na yod kyi sa gzhan na ni med do /
kāmāvacaraprathamadhyānabhūmikayorvarṇarāgayoḥ pratipakṣeṇa yathāsaṃkhyam / tṛtīyo 'ntye
# 'dod pa na spyod pa dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags kyi gnyen por grangs bzhin no / / gsum pa mtha' na /
śubho vimokṣaścaturthadhyāne
# sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa na yod do /
sa cālobhaḥ
# de ma chags /
so 'pyalobhasvabhāvo natvaśūbhāsvabhāvaḥ / śubhākāratvāt / saparivārāstvete pañcaskandhasvabhāvāḥ / ārupyavimokṣāstu
# de yang ma chags pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi sdug pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir mi sdug pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no / / de dag 'khor dang bcas na ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin yin no / / gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams ni /
śubhārupyāḥ samāhitāḥ
# gzugs med mnyam gzhag dge rnams so /
kuśalāḥ samāhitā eva cārūpyavimokṣākhyāṃ labhante na kliṣṭā nāpyasamāhitāstadyathāmaraṇabhave / anyadāpyasamāhitāḥ santītyapare / sāmantakavimukti mārgā api vimokṣākhyāṃ labhante
# gzugs med pa'i mnyam par bzhag pa dge ba rnams kho na rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob kyi / / nyon mongs pa can rnams kyang ma yin la / / mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams kyang ma yin no / / 'di lta ste 'chi ba'i srid pa'i tshe lta bu'o / / gzhan dag na re gzhan na yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa yod do zhes zer ro / / nyer bsngogs kyi rnam par grol ba'i lam dag kyang rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo /
nānantaryamārgā adharālambanatvāt / vaimukhyārtho hi vimokṣārtha iti / nirodhastu samāpattiḥ / saṃjñāveditanirodhastu aṣṭamo vimokṣo nirodhasamāpattiḥ / sā ca pūrva nirdiṣṭā
# 'og ma la dmigs pa'i phyir bar chad med pa'i lam rnams ni ma yin te / / rnam par thar pa'i don ni rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i don yin no / / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o / / rnam par thar pa brgyad pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yin te / / de ni sngar bshad zin to /
saṃjñāveditavaimukhyātsarvasaṃskṛtādvā
# 'du shes dang tshor ba'am / / 'du byed thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i phyir ro /
samāpattyāvaraṇavimokṣaṇādvimokṣa ityapare / tāṃ tu samāpadyante / sūkṣmasūkṣmādanantaram
# gzhan dag na re snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro / / de la ni / / phra ba phra ba'i mjug thogs su / / snyoms par 'jug ste /
bhavāgraṃ hi saṃjñā sūkṣmaṃ tat punaḥ sūkṣmataraṃ kṛtvā nirodhaṃ samāpadyante / samāpannānāṃ tu
# srid pa'i rtse mo'i 'du shes ni phra ba yin te / / de bas kyang ches phra bar byas nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug go / / snyoms par zhugs pa rnams ni /
svaśuddhakādharāryeṇa vyutthānaṃ cetasā tataḥ
# rang gi dag dang 'og ma yin / / 'phags pa'i sems kyis de las ldang /
bhāvāgrikeṇa vā śuddhakena cetasā tato vyutthānaṃ bhavatyākiñcanyāyatana bhūmikena vā sāsraveṇa
# srid pa'i rtse mo'i sems dag pa'am / / ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa pa'i sems zag pa med pas de las ldang ste /
tadevaṃ tasyāḥ sāsravaṃ samāpatticittaṃ bhavati sāsravānāntarya tu vyutthānacittamiti / eṣāṃ ca vimokṣāṇāṃ
# de ltar na de'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems na zag pa dang bcas pa yin la / / ldang ba'i sems ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yang yin no / / rnam par thar pa 'di dag las /
kāmāptadṛśyaviṣayāḥ prathamāḥ
# dang po 'dod gtogs snang yul can /
kāmāvacarameṣāṃ rūpāyatanamālambanamamanojñaṃ manojñaṃ ca yathāyogam
# 'di dag gi dmigs pa ni ci rigs par 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched yid du mi 'ong ba dang yid du 'ong ba yin no /
ye tvarūpiṇaḥ / te 'nvayajñānapakṣordhvasvabhūduḥkhādigocarāḥ / ārūpyavimokṣāṇāṃ svabhūmikordhvabhūmikaṃ duḥkhaṃ taddhetunirodhau cālambanaṃ sarvaścānvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ
# gang dag gzugs can min de dag / / spyod yul gong dang rang gi sa'i / / sdug bsngal sogs dang rjes shes phyogs / / gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni rang gi sa ba dang sa gong ma pa'i sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu dang 'gog pa dag rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam thams cad yin no /
apratisaṃkhyānirodhaśceti vaktavyamākāśaṃ caikasyeti / kasmānna tṛtīye dhyāne vimokṣaḥ
# so sor ma brtags pas 'gog pa yang yin no zhes brjod par bya'o / / nam mkha' yang gcig gis yin no zhes brjod par bya ste / / ci'i phyir bsam gtan gsum pa la rnam par thar pa ma bzhag ce na /
dvitīyadhyānabhūmikavarṇarāgābhāvāt sukhamaṇḍeñjitatvācca
# bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i kha dog gi 'dod chags med pa'i phyir dang bde ba'i snying pos skyed pa'i phyir ro /
tasmācchubhaṃ vimokṣamutpādayati
# ci'i phyir sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa skyed par byed ce na /
aśubhayā līnaṃ saṃtatiṃ pramodayituṃ jijñāsanārthaṃ vā
# mi sdug pas rgyud zhum par rab tu dga' bar bya ba'am /
kaccidaśubhāvimokṣau niṣpannāviti / evaṃ ca punastau niṣpannau bhavato yadi śubhato 'pi manasi kurvataḥ kleśo notpadyata iti
# ci mi sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa dag grub pa yin nam ma yin zhes brtag pa'i phyir te / / gal te sdug par yid la byas kyang nyon mongs pa mi skye na de lta na de gnyis grub pa yin no /
dvābhyāṃ hi kāraṇābhyāṃ yogino vimokṣādīnutpādayanti
# rnal 'byor pa rnams ni rgyu gnyis kyis rnam par thar pa la sogs pa skyed par byed do /
kleśadūrīkaraṇārthaṃ samāpattivaśitvārthaṃ ca / araṇādiguṇābhinirhārāya āryāyāścarddheḥ / sā punaryayā vastupariṇāmādhiṣṭhānāyurutsargādīni kriyante
# nyon mongs pa med ba la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i ched dang 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par grub pa'i ched du / / nyon mongs pa thag bsring bar bya ba'i phyir dang snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang bar bya ba'i phyir ro / / de yang gang gis dngos po yongs su bsgyur ba dang byin gyis rlob pa dang tshe gtong ba la sogs par byed pa'o /
kasmāttṛtīyāṣṭamayoreva sākṣātkaraṇamuktaṃ nānyeṣām / pradhānatvāddhātubhūmiparyantāvasthitatvācca
# ci'i phyir gsum pa dang brgyad pa dag khon mngon sum du bya bar bshad la gzhan dag ni ma yin zhe na / / gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang khams dang sa'i mtha' na gnas pa'i phyir ro /
abhibhvāyatanānyaṣṭau
# zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad /
adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī vahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇāni durvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇyabhibhūyajānātyabhibhūya paśyatītyevaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ prathamamabhibhvāyatanam
# nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung bu ba dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes / / zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste / / de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po yin no /
evamadhimātrāṇi / adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñyevameva
# de bzhin du chen po rnams dang de kho na bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pa ste /
adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñyeva punarnīlapītalohitāvadātāni paśyatītyaṣṭau bhavanti
# de ltar bzhi po de dag dang gzugs med par 'du shes pa kho na sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po rnams la lta ba ste /
teṣāṃ / dvayamādyavimokṣavat / yathā prathamo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane prathamadvitīye
# de ltar na brgyad yin no / / de dag las gnyis ni rnam par thar pa dang po bzhin no / / rnam par thar pa dang po ji lta bar zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis po dang gnyis pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
dve dvitīyavat
# gnyis ni gnyis pa bzhin no /
yathā dvitīyo vimokṣa evaṃ dve abhibhvāyatane tṛtīyacaturthe
# rnam par thar pa gnyis pa ji lta bar zil gyis gnon po'i skye mched gnyis po gsum pa dang bzhi pa yang de dang 'dra'o /
anyāni punaḥ śubhavimokṣavat / yathā śubho vimokṣa evamanyāni catvāri
# gzhan sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa bzhin / / sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa ji lta bar gzhan bzhi yang de dang 'dra'o /
ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ tairvaimukhyamātram
# 'di ni khyad par yin te / / de dag gis ni rgyab kyis phyogs pa tsam du zad la /
ebhistvālambanābhibhavanaṃ yathecchamadhimokṣāt kleśānutpādācca / daśa kṛtsnāni
# 'di dag gis ni dmigs pa zil gyis gnon te / / ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mos pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro / / zad par bcu'o /
daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni nirantarakṛtsnaspharaṇāt
# bar chad med par zad par rgyas par byed pa'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched ni bcu ste /
pṛthivyaptejovāyunīlapītalohitāvadātakṛtsnāni / ākāśavijñānānantyāyatanakṛtsne ca
# zad par sa dang chu dang me dang rlu [*rlung] dang sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang zad par nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do /
teṣām / alobhāṣṭau
# de rnams las / / brgyad ma chags /
prathamānyaṣṭāvalobhasvabhāvāni
# dang po brgyad ni ma chags pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no /
dhyāne 'ntye
# bsam gtan mtha' na /
caturtha eva dhyāne
# bsam gtan bzhi pa kho na na yod do /
gocaraḥ punaḥ / kāmāḥ / kāmāvacararūpāyatanameṣā mālambanam
# spyod yul ni 'dod pa / / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched yin no /
vāyoḥ spraṣṭavyāyatana mityeke
# kha cig na re rlung gi ni reg bya'i skye mched yin no zhes zer ro /
dve śuddhakārupye
# de gnyis ni gzugs med dag /
dve paścime kṛtsne śuddhakārūpyasvabhāve / svacatuḥskandhagocare / svabhūmikāścatvāraḥ skandhā anyorālambanam
# zad par gyi skye mched tha ma gnyis ni gzugs med pa dag pa pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no / / spyod yul rang gi phung po bzhi / / 'di gnyis kyi dmigs pa ni rang gis pa'i phung po bzhi yin no /
vimokṣaprāveśikānyabhibhvāyatanāni / abhibhvāyatanaprāveśikāni kṛtsnāyatanāni / uttarottaraviśiṣṭatvāt / sarvāṇi caitāni vimokṣādīni pṛthagjanāryasāṃtānikāni sthāpayitvā nirodhavimokṣam / nirodha uktaḥ / nirodhavimokṣaḥ pūrvamevoktaḥ sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ / vairāgyaprayogāptaṃ tu śeṣitam / nirodhādanyāni vimokṣādīni vairāgyalābhikāni prāyogikāṇi ca
# zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams ni rnam par thar pa 'jug pa las byung ba can yin la / / zad par gyi skye mched rnams ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched 'jug pa las byung ba can yin te / / gong nas gong du khyad bar du 'phags pa'i phyir ro / / 'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa ma gtogs pa rnam par thar ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad ni so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i rgyud la yod pa dag yin no / / ci rnam par thar pa la sogs pa de dag sbyor ba las byung ba yin nam 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yin zhes bya ba'i 'dri ba 'di la 'gog ba bshad zin / / 'gog pa'i rnam par thar pa ni sngar rnam pa thams cad du bshad zin to / / lhag ma ni / / 'dod chags bral dang sbyor bas 'thob / / 'gog pa las gzhan pa'i rnam par thar pa la sogs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa yang yin la sbyor ba las byung ba dag kyang yin te /
ucitānucitatvāt / tridhātvāśrayamārūpyasaṃjñaṃ śeṣaṃ manuṣyajam / ārupyavimokṣā ārupyakṛtsne ca traidhātukāśrayāṇi śeṣaṃ manuṣyāśrayameva / upadeśasāmarthyenotpādanāt / kathaṃ rūpārupyadhātvorārūpyadhyānaviśeṣotpādanam
# 'dris pa dang ma 'dris pa'i phyir ro / / gzugs med ces bya khams gsum gyi / / rten can lhag ma mi las skye / / gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang gzugs med pa'i zad par ni khams gsum pa'i rten can dag yin no / / lhag ma ni mi'i rten can kho na yin te / / lung gi mthus skyed pa'i phyir ro / / ji ltar na gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu gzugs med pa dang bsam gtan gyi khyad par skye zhe na /
tribhiḥ kāraṇairdhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāmupapattirhetukarmadharmatābalaiḥ / tatra
# rgyu dang las dang chos nyid dang / / rgyu gsum gyis bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams skye ste / / de la /
hetukarmabalāddhātvorārūpyotpādanaṃ dvayoḥ
# khams gnyis dag tu gzugs med pa / / rgyu dang las kyi stobs kyis te /
dvayo rūpārūpyadhātvorārūpyasamāpattyutpādanam / hetubalādāsannābhīkṣṇābhyāsāt karmabalāccordhvabhūmikasyāparaparyāyavedanīyasya karmaṇaḥ pratyupasthitavipākatvāt
# gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa skye ba rgyu'i stobs kyis ni nye ba dang yang dang yang du goms pa la sa so / / las kyi stobs kyis ni sa gong ma'i lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir te /
nahyadhastādavīta rāgeṇordhva śakyamutpattumiti
# 'og ma las 'dod chags dang ma bral bas ni gong du skye bar mi nus so /
dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca
# gzugs kyi khams su bsam gtan rnams / / de dag dang chos nyid kyis kyang /
rūpadhātau dhyānotpādanametābhyāṃ hetukarmabalābhyāṃ dharmatayā ca saṃvartanīkāle
# gzugs kyi khams su ni bsam gtan gzhan rgyu dang las kyi stobs de dag dang chos nyid kyis kyang skye ste / / 'jig pa'i tshe lta bu'o /
tadānīṃ hi sarvasttvā evādharabhūmikāstaddhyānamutpādayanti
# de'i tshe ni sa 'og ma pa'i sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos rnams kyi 'jug pa shas che ba nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan de skyed par byed do /
kṛtsnānāṃ dharmāṇāmudbhūtavṛttitvāt
# gang la chos rnams kyi rnam pa ni du yod /
kiyacciraṃ punarayaṃ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati
# 'di lta bu'i mngon pa'i chos 'di ji srid du gnas she na /
yatreme īdṛśānām dharmāṇāṃ prakārāḥ prajñāyante / saddharmo dvividhaḥ śāsturāgamādhigamātmakaḥ / tatrāgamaḥ sūtravinayābhidharmā adhigamo bodhipakṣyā ityeṣa dvividhaḥ saddharmaḥ
# ston pa'i dam chos rnam gnyis te / / lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do / / de la lung ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang chos mngon pa rnams so / / rtogs ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams te / / de ltar na dam pa'i chos 'di ni rnam pa gnyis yin no /
dhātārastasya vaktāraḥ pratipattāra eva ca
# de 'dzin byed pa smra byed dang / / sgrub par byed pa khon yin /
āgamasya hi dhārayitāro vaktāraḥ
# lung 'dzin par byed pa ni smra bar byed pa yin no /
adhigamasya pratipattāraḥ
# rtogs pa 'dzin par byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa yan te /
ato yāvadete sthāsyanti tāvatsaddharma iti veditavyam / teṣāṃ tu varṣasahasra mavasthānamāhuḥ
# de'i phyir de nyid ji srid du gnas pa de srid du dam pa'i chos gnas par rig par bya'o / / de dag kyang lo stong du gnas so zhes bshad do /
adhigamasyaivam / āgamasya tu bhūyāṃsaṃ kālamityapare / yo 'yamiha śāstre 'bhidharma uktaḥ kimeṣa eva śāstrābhidharmo deśitaḥ
# gzhan dag na re rtogs pa ni de lta bu yin gyi / / lung ni yun ring du gnas so zhes zer ro / / ci bstan bcos 'dir chos mngon pa bshad pa gang yin pa'i chos mngon pa 'di nyid ston pas bshad dam zhe na /
kāśmīravaibhāṣikanītisiddhaḥ prāyo mayā 'yaṃ kathito 'bhidharmaḥ
# bdag gis mngon pa'i chos 'di phal cher ni / / kha che bye brag smra ba'i tshul grub bshad /
yaddurgṛhītaṃ tadihāsmadāgaḥ saddharmanītau manayaḥ pramāṇam
# nyes par zin gang de 'dir bdag gis nyes / / dam chos tshul la tshad ma thub rnams yin /
prāyeṇa hi kāśmīravaibhāṣikāṇāṃ nītyādisiddha eṣo 'smābhirabidharma ākhyātaḥ
# bdag gis chos mngon pa 'di phal cher kha che bye brag tu smra ba rnams kyi tshul du grub par bshad pa yin no /
yadatrāsmābhirdurgṛhītaṃ so 'smākamaparādhaḥ / saddharmanītau tu punarbuddhā eva pramāṇaṃ buddhaputrāśca
# 'di la bdag gis nyes par zin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag gis nyes pa yin te / / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul la ni sangs rgyas rnams 'khon dang sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams tshad ma yin no /
nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā
# ston pa 'jig rten mig ni zum gyur cing / / dbang gyur skye bo phal cher zad pa na /
adṛṣṭatattvairniravagrahaiḥ kṛtaṃ kutārkikaiḥ śāsanametadākulam
# de nyid ma mthong rang dgar gyur ba yi / / ngan rtog rnams kyis bstan pa 'di dkrugs so /
gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhurdhareṣu ca
# rang byung rang byung bstan pa gces 'dzin rnams / / mchog tu zhir gshegs 'gro mgon med pa na /
jagatyanāthe gunaghātibhirmataiḥ niraṅkuśaiḥ svairamihādya caryate
# 'doms med yon tan 'joms bar byed pa yi / / dri mas dga' mgur deng sang 'di na spyod /
iti kaṇṭhagataprāṇaṃ viditvā śāsanaṃ muneḥ / balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ
# de ltar thub pa dag gi bstan pa ni / / lkog mar srog phyin 'dra dang dri ma rnams / / stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig nas ni /
navamaṃ kośasthānam / namo buddhāya / kiṃ khalvato 'nyatra mokṣo nāsti / nāsti / kiṃ kāraṇam / vitathātmadṛṣṭiniviṣṭatvāt / nahi te skandhasaṃtāna evātmaprajñaptiṃ vyavasyanti
# thar pa 'dod bdag gis bag yod gyis [*kyis] / / chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi bshad pa las snyoms par 'dug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas brgyad pa'o / / yang ci 'di las gzhan la thar pa yod dam zhe na / / med do / / ci'i phyir zhe na / / bdag tu lta ba phyin ci log la zhen pa nyid kyi phyir te / / phung po'i rgyud kho na la bdag tu 'dogs pa ni nges par mi 'dzin to /
kiṃ tarhi
# 'o na ci zhe na /
dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ parikalpayanti ātmagrāhaprabhavāśca sarvakleśā iti / kathaṃ punaridaṃ gamyate skandhasaṃtāna evedamātmābhidhānaṃ vartate nānyasminnabhidheya iti
# rdzas gzhan kho na la bdag tu yongs su rtogs par byed la / / nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las rab tu skye ba yin no / / bdag tu mngon par brjod pa 'di ni phung po'i rgyud kho na la 'jug gi / / brjod par bya ba gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
pratyakṣānumānābhāvāt / ye hi dharmāḥ santi teṣāṃ pratyakṣamupalabdhirbhavatyasatyantarāye / tadyathā ṣaṇṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ manasaśca
# mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir te / / chos gang dag yod pa de dag ni bar chad byed pa med na mngon sum du dmigs pa yin te / / dper na yul drug dang yid lta bu'o /
anumānaṃ ca / tadyathā pañcānāmindriyāṇām / tatredamanumānam
# yang na rjes su dpag pas dmigs pa yin te; dper na dbang po lta bu'o / / de la 'di ni rjes su dpag pa yin te /
sati kāraṇe kāraṇāntarasyābhāve kāryasyābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhāve ca punarbhāvistadyathāṅkurasya / satyeva cābhāsaprāpte viṣaye manaskāre ca kāraṇe viṣayagrahaṇasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ punaśca bhāvo 'ndhavadhirādīnāmanandhāvadhirādīnāṃ ca / atastatrāpi kāraṇāntarasyābhāvo bhāvaśca niścīyate / yacca tatkāraṇāntaraṃ tadindriyamityetadanumānam / na caivamātmano 'stīti nāstyātmā
# rgyu yod kyang rgyu gzhan med na 'bras bu med par mthong la yod na ni yang yod par mthong ba ste / / dper na myu gu lta bu'o / / yul snang bar gyur pa dang rgyu yid la byed pa yod kyang yul 'dzin pa med par mthong la / / yang yod par mthong ba ste / / long ba dang 'on pa la sogs pa dang ma long ba dang ma 'on pa la sogs pa lta bu'o / / de'i phyir de la yang rgyu gzhan med pa dang yod par nges la / / rgyu gzhan gang yin bde ni dbang po yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rjes su dpag pa yin no / / bdag ni de ltar yod pa ma yin pas bdag med do /
yattrhi vātsīputriyāḥ pudgalaṃ santimicchanti
# 'o na gang gnas ma'i bu rnams gang zag yod par 'dod pa ji lta bu /
vicāryaṃ tāvadetat
# 'di ni re zhig dpyad par bya ba yin te /
kiṃ te dravyata icchantyāhosvit prajñaptitaḥ
# ci de dag rdzas su 'dod dam / / 'on te btags par 'dod /
kiṃ cedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptitaḥ
# rdzas su zhes bya ba 'di yang ci yang ci zhig / / btags par zhes bya ba 'di yang ci zhig yin /
rūpādivat bhāvāntaraṃ cet dravyataḥ / kṣīrādivat samudāyaścet prajñaptitaḥ / kiṃ cātaḥ
# gal te gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du dngos po gzhan zhig yin no zhe na ni rdzas su yod pa yin no / / gal te 'o ma la sogs pa bzhin du spyi yin no zhe na ni btags par yod pa yin no / / de las cir 'gyur /
yadi tāvat dravyataḥ / saṃbhinna svabhāvatvāt skandhebhyo 'nyo vaktavya itaretaraskandhavat
# re zhig gal te rdzas su yod na ni de rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir phung po rnams las gzhan no zhes brjod par bya ste /
kāraṇaṃ cāsya vaktavyam
# phan tshun gyi phung po bzhin no /
asaṃskṛto vā / atastīrthikadṛṣṭiprasaṅgo niṣprayojanatvaṃ ca
# 'di'i rgyu yang brjod dgos so / / 'on te 'dus ma byas yin na ni de'i phyir mu stegs can gyi lta bar yang thal bar 'gyur la /
atha prajñaptitaḥ
# dgos pa med pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro /
vayamapyevaṃ trūmaḥ / naiva hi dravyato 'sti nāpi prajñaptitaḥ / kiṃ tarhi / ādhyātmikānupāttānvarttamānān skandhānupādāya pudgalaḥ prajñapyate / tadidamandhavacanamanunmīlitārthaṃ na budhyāmahe / kimidamupādāyeti
# 'on te btags par yod do zhe na ni kho bo cag kyang de skad ces smras so / / de ni rdzas su yod pa kho na yang ma yin la btags par yod pa yang ma yin no / / 'o na ci zhe na / / da ltar gyi nang gi zin pa'i phung po rnams rgyur byas nas gang zag tu 'dogs so / / long ba lta bu'i tshig don mi gsal ba 'di ni mi go'o / / rgyur byas nas zhes bya ba 'di ci /
yadyayamarhtaḥ skandhānāṃ lakṣyate teṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti
# gal te 'di'i don phung po rnams la dmigs nas zhes bya ba 'di yin no zhe na ni / / de dag kho na la gang zag tu 'dogs par zad do /
yathā rūpādīnālamvya teṣveva kṣīraprajñaptiḥ
# dper na gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs nas / / de dag kho na la 'o ma 'dogs pa bzhin no /
athāyamarthaḥ skandhān pratīyeti / skandhānāṃ pudgalaprajñaptikāraṇatvāt / sa eva doṣaḥ
# 'on te 'di'i don phung po rnams la brten nas zhes bya ba 'di yin no zhe na ni phung po rnams gang zag gdags pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir skyon de nyid du 'gyur ro / / de ni de ltar mi 'dogs so /
na sa evaṃ prajñapyate
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
kathaṃ tarhi yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ / kathaṃ cendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate / na hi vinendhanenāgniḥ prajñapyate na cānya indhanādagniḥ śakyate prajñapayituṃ nāpyananyaḥ / yadi hānyaḥ syādanuṣṇamindhanaṃ syāt
# ji ltar bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs pa bzhin no / / ji ltar na bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs she na / / bud shing med par me mi 'dogs mod kyi / / bud shing las me gzhan yin par dam bca' bar yang mi nus la / / gzhan ma yin par dam bca' bar yang mi nus te / / gal te gzhan yin na ni bud shing dro ba nyid ma yin bar 'gyur ro /
athānanyaḥ syāddāhyameva dāhakaṃ syāt / evaṃ na ca vinā skanvaiḥ pudgalaḥ prajñapyate / na cānyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ śakyate pratijñātuṃ śāśvataprasaṅgāt
# 'on te gzhan ma yin na ni bsreg bya nyid sreg byed yin par 'gyur ro / / de ltar phung po rnams med par yang gang zag mi 'dogs la / / phung po rnams las gzhan yin par dam bca' bar yang mi nus te rtag par thal bar 'gyur ro /
nāpyananya ucchedaprasaṅgaditi / aṅga tāvadbrūhi kigindhanaṃ ko 'nniriti
# gzhan ma yin par yang dam bca' bar mi nus te chad par thal bar 'gyur ro / / re zhig kye bud shing ni ci /
tato jñāsyāmaḥ kathamindhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyata iti / kimatra vaktavyaṃ dāhyamindhanaṃ dāhako 'gniḥ / etadevātra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dāhyaṃ kok dāhaka iti
# me ni ci yin pa smros shig dang de las ji ltar na bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs par shes par bya'o / / 'di la ci zhig brjod par bya / / bsreg bya ni bud shing yin la sreg byed ni me yin par zad mod / / 'dir bsreg bar bya ba ni ci / / sreg par byed pa ni ci yin pa de nyid brjod par bya'o /
loke hi tāvadapradīptaṃ kāṣṭḥādikamindhanamucyate dāhyaṃ ca
# re zhig 'jig rten na ni shing la sogs ba ma 'bar ba la bud shing zhes kyang bya la bsreg bya zhes kyang bya'o /
pradīptamagnirdāhakaśca / yacca bhasvaraṃ coṣṇaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ca tena hi tadidhyate dhyate ca
# 'bar ba la ni me zhes kyang bya la sreg byed ces kyang bya ste / / 'bar ba dang shin tu tsha ba gang yin pa des de tshig pa dang sreg par byed de /
saṃtativikārāpādānāt
# rgyud 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro /
taccobhayamaṣṭadravyakaṃ taccegdhanaṃ pratītyāgnirutpadyate / yathā kṣīraṃ pratītya dadhi madhu pratītyaśuktam
# de gnyi ga yang rdzas brgyad pa yin no / / bud shing la brten nas me 'byung ba de yang dper na 'o ma la brten nas zho 'byung ba dang mngar po la brten nas tsha ba 'byung ba lta bu yin te /
tasmādhigdhanamupādāyetyucyate / anyaśca sa tasmādbhinnakālatvāt / yadi caiyaṃ pudgalaḥ skandhān pratītyotpadyate sa tebhyo 'nyaścānityaśca prāpnoti
# de lta bas na bud shing rgyur byas nas zhes bya ba la de ni de dang dus tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan pa yang yin no / / gal te de ltar phung po rnams la brten nas gang zag skye na ni de dag las gzhan pa dang mi rtag par yang 'gyur ro /
atha punastatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpte yadīṣṇyaṃ tadagnistatsahajātāni trīṇi bhūtānīndhanamiṣyante / tayorapi siddhamanyatvaṃ lakṣaṇabhedāt / upādāyārthastu vaktavyaḥ / kathaṃ tadindhanamupādāya so 'gniḥ prajñapyata iti / na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ / agnireva hi tatprajñapteḥ kāraṇam / yadyāśrayārtha upādāyārthaḥ sahabhāvārtho vā
# 'on te shing la sogs pa 'bar ba de nyid la dro ba nyid yod pa gang yin pa de ni me yin la / / de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i 'byung ba gsum ni bud shing yin par 'dod na ni de gnyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin par grub bo / / ji ltar na bud shing de rgyur byas nas me 'dogs par byed ba rgyur byas pa'i don yang brjod dgos te / / de ni de'i rgyu yang ma yin la de gdags ba'i rgyu yang ma yin gyi ma nyid de gdags ba'i rgyu yin no / / gal te rgyur byas pa'i don rten gyi don nam lhan cig 'byung ba'i don yin no zhe na ni /
skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti vispaṣṭamanyatvaṃ pratijñāyate / tadabhāve ca pudgalābhāvaḥ prāpnoti / indhanabhāva ivāgnyabhāvaḥ / yattu taduktaṃ yadīndhanādanyo 'gniḥ syādanuṣṇamindhanaṃ syāditi / kimidamuṣṇaṃ nāma
# phung po rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar gang zag gi rten nam lhan cig 'byung ba dag yin par 'gyur bas gzhan nyid du gsal bar dam 'cha' ba yin no / / de med na gang zag med par yang 'gyur te / / bud shing med na me med pa bzhin no / / gang yang bud shing las me gzhan yin na ni bud shing dro ba nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes smras ba de dro ba zhes bya ba 'di ci /
yadi tāvādīṣṇyam anuṣṇamevendhanamanyabhūtasvabhāvatvāt / atha yadauṣṇyavat / anyadapi taduṣṇasvabhāvādagneruṣṇaṃ sidhyatyīṣṇyayogāditi / nāstyanyatve doṣaḥ / atha punaḥ sarvameva tat pradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikamindhanaṃ cāgniśceṣyate / tadupādāyārthaśca vaktavyaḥ / skandhā eva ca pudgalā ityananyatvamanivāryaṃ prāpnoti
# re zhig gal te dro ba nyid yin no zhe na ni bud shing dro ba nyid ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur te / / 'byung ba gzhan gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'on te dro ba nyid dang ldan pa yin no zhe na ni dro ba nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi me las gzhan pa de yang dro ba yin par 'grub ste / / dro ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro / / de lta bas na don tha dad pa nyid yin na nyes pa med do / / 'on te shing la sogs pa 'bar bde dag thams cad bud shing yang yin la me yang yin par 'dod na ni des na rgyur byas pa'i don yang brjod par bya'o / / phung po rnams kho na yang gang zag yin pas gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid mi ldog par 'gyur ro /
tasmānna sidhyatyetat / yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate evaṃ skadhānupādāya pudgalaḥ iti / yadi cāyamanyaḥ skandhebhyo na vaktavyaḥ pañcavidhaṃ jñeyamatītānāgataṃ pratyupannamasaṃskṛtamavaktavyamiti na vaktavyaṃ prāpnoti / naiva hi tadatītādibhyaḥ pañcamaṃ nāpañcamaṃ vaktavyam / yadā ca pudgalaḥ prajñapyate ki tāvatskandhānupalabhya prajñapyate āhosvit pudgalam / yadi tāvat skandhāṃsteṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti / pudgalasyānupalambhāt / atha pudgalaṃ kathamasya skandhānupādāya prajñaptirbhavati / pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti
# de lta bas na ji ltar bud shing rgyur byas nas me 'dogs pa de ltar phung po rnams rgyur byas nas gang zag 'dogs so zhes bya ba 'di mi 'grub bo / / gal te yang 'di phung po rnams las gzhan du brjod par bya ba ma yin na / / shes bya ni rnam pa lnga ste / / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang 'dus ma byas dang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o zhes brjod par mi bya bar 'gyur te / / de ni 'das pa la sogs pa las lnga pa yang ma yin la lnga ba ma yin pa yang ma yin par brjod par bya'o / / gang gi tshe gang zag 'dogs ba na ci re zhig phung po rnams dmigs nas 'dogs sam / / 'on te gang zag dmigs nas 'dogs / / re zhig gal te phung po rnams na ni de dag kho na la gang zag 'dogs par 'gyur te / / gang zag mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro / / 'on te gang zag na ni 'di ji ltar na phung po rnams rgyur byas nas 'dogs pa yin te / / gang zag kho na de'i rgyu yin par 'gyur ro /
atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti
# 'on te phung po rnams yod na gang zag dmigs te / / de'i phyir phung po rnams rgyur byas nas 'di 'dogs so zhes bya bar 'dod do zhen ni /
tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā / rūpavacca pudgalasyānyatvaṃ spaṣṭam
# de lta na gzugs kyang dmigs pa dang yid la byed pa dang snang ba rnams yong na dmigs pas de dag rgyur byas nas btags pa yin par brjod par bya'o /
idaṃ tāvadvaktavyam
# re zhig 'di yang brjod par bya ste /
ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ katamena pudgalo vijñeyaḥ
# rnam par shes pa drug rnams las gang zag rnam par shes pa gang gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin /
ṣaḍbhirapītyucyate / kathaṃ kṛtvā / cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītyapudgalaṃ pratibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyaḥ no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vāno vā
# drug car gyis kyang shes bar bya ba yin no zhes bya'o / / ji ltar byas pas she na / / gal te mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la brten nas / / gang zag dmigs par byed na ni gang zag mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya la / / gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya /
evaṃ yāvat manovijñeyān ceddharmān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayati manovijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyo no tu vaktavyo dharmā vā no vā / evaṃ tarhi kṣīrādibhiḥ samānaḥ prāpnoti / cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ vibhāvayatyudakaṃ vā cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīramudakaṃ ceti vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vā
# gzugs rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o / / de bzhin du yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyi bar la brten nas / / gang zag dmigs bar byed na ni / / gang zag yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya la / / chos rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya la / / chos rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o / / de lta na ni 'o na 'o ma la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te / / gal te mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la brten nas 'o ma 'am / / chu dmigs par byed na ni 'o ma 'am chu mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba yin no zhes brjod par bya la gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya / / gzugs rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o /
evaṃ ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñeyaṃ vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ spraṣṭavyāni vā no vā / mābhūt kṣīrodakayoścatuṣṭvaprasaṅga iti / ato yathā rūpādīnyeva kṣīramudakaṃ vā prajñapyate samastānyevaṃ skandhāḥ pudgala iti siddham
# de bzhin du gal te sna dang lce dang lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin par brjod par bya la / / reg bya rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya / / reg bya rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya ste / / 'o ma dang chu gnyis bzhi nyid du thal bar 'gyur du 'ong bas so / / de'i phyir ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i spyi kho na la / / 'o ma 'am / / chu zhes 'dogs pa de bzhin du phung bo rnams la gang zag 'dogs so zhes bya bar grub bo /
yaccocyate cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti / ko 'sya vākyasyārthaḥ / kiṃ tāvadrūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavatiti āhosvidrūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhata iti / yadi rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ / evaṃ tarhi rūpamapyālokacakṣurmanaskārebhyo 'nyanna vaktavyam / teṣāṃ tadupalabdhikāraṇatvāt / atha rūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhate / kiṃ tayaivopalabdhyopalabhate āhosvidanyayā / yadi tayaiva / rūpādabhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti rūpa eva vā tatprajñāptiḥ / idaṃ ca rūpamayaṃ pudgalaḥ kathamidaṃ gamyate
# gang yang mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la brten nas gang zag dmigs par byed ces smras pa'i tshig de'i don ci zhig yin / / ci re zhig gzugs rnams gang zag dmigs pa'i rgyu zhig yin nam / / 'on te gzugs rnams dmigs na gang zag dmigs so zhes bya ba yin no / / gal te gzugs rnams gang zag dmigs pa'i rgyu yin la de yang de dag las gzhan du brjod bar mi bya'o zhe na ni / / de lta na ni 'o na gzugs kyang snang ba dang mig dang yid la byed pa dag las gzhan du brjod par mi bya ste / / de dag ni de dmigs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro / / 'on te gzugs rnams dmigs na gang zag dmigs so zhe na ni ci dmigs pa de kho nas dmigs sam / / 'on te gzhan gyis gal te de kho nas so zhe na ni gang zag gzugs las rang bzhin tha mi dad pa'am gzugs kho na la de 'dogs par 'gyur na / / 'di ni gzugs so / / 'di ni gang zag go zhes bya ba 'di yang ji ltar yongs su gcod /
athaivaṃ na paricchidyate / kathamidaṃ pratijñāyate rūpamapyasti pudgalo 'pyastīti / upalabdhivaśena hi tasyāstitvaṃ pratijñāyate
# 'on te de ltar yongs su mi gcod na ni gzugs kyang yod do / / gang zag kyang yod do zhes bya ba 'di yang ji ltar dam 'cha' ste / / dmigs pa'i dbang gis de yod par dam 'cha' bar zad do /
evaṃ yāvaddharmebhyo vaktavyam / athānyayā bhinnakālo palambhādanyo rūpātprāpnoti
# de bzhin du chos kyi bar dag la yang brjod par bya'o / / 'on te gzhan gyis so zhe na ni / / dus tha dad dmigs pa'i phyir gzugs las gzhan yin par 'gyur te /
nīlādiya pītaṃ kṣaṇādiva ca kṣaṇāntaram
# sngon po las ser po lta bu dang skad cig ma las skad cig ma gzhan bzhin no /
evaṃ yāvaddharmebhyo vaktavyam
# de bzhin du chos kyi bar dag la yang brjod par bya'o /
atha rūpapudgalavaktadupalabdhyorapyanyānanyatvamavaktavyam
# 'on te gzugs dang gang zag bzhin du de dag dmigs pa dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid du brjod par me bya'o zhe na /
tena tarhi saṃskṛte 'pyavaktavyaṃ bhavatīti siddhāntabhedaḥ / yadi cāyamasti no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā to vā
# 'o na ni des na 'dus ma byas kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin par gyur pas / / grub pa'i mtha' nyams pa yin no / / gal te yang 'di yod la gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya / / gzugs rnams ma yin no zhes kyang brjod par mi bya na /
kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ rūpamanātmā yāvadvijñānamanātmeti / yena cāyaṃ cakṣurvijñānena pudgala upalabhyate / kiṃ tadrūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate āhosvit pudgalamubhayaṃ vā
# 'o na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs bdag ma yin pa nas / / rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs / / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang gis gang zag 'di dmigs pa de ci gzugs la brten nas skye'am / / 'on te gang zag gam /
yadi rūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate
# gnyi ga la brten nas skye /
notsahiṣyate pudgalaṃ vijñātuṃ śabdādivat / yameva hi viṣayaṃ cakṣurvijñāneṣu pratītyotpadyate vijñānaṃ sa eva tasyālambanapratyayaḥ
# gal te gzugs rnams la brten nas skye na ni sgra la sogs pa bzhin du gang zag dam par shes par mi nus te / / yul gang kho na na la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye ba de nyid de'i dmigs pa'i rkyen yin no /
atha pudgalaṃ pratītyotpadyate ubhayaṃ vā
# 'on te gang zag gam / / gnyi ga la brten nas skye'o zhe na /
idamutsūtram / sūtre hi nirdhāritaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavatīti
# 'di ni mdo las thal ba yin te / / mdo las ni / / gnyis la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye ba yin no zhes nges par gzung ngo /
tathā cakṣurbhikṣo hetū rūpāṇi pratyayaścakṣurvijñānasyotpādāya
# de bzhin du dge slong mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa la / / rgyu ni mig yin no / / rkyen ni gzugs rnams yin no /
tatkasya hetoḥ / yatkiñcit bhikṣo cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvaṃ taccakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ceti / anityaśca pudgala evaṃ prāpnoti
# de ci'i phyir zhe na / / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas skye'o zhes gsungs so / / de lta na ni gang zag mi rtag par 'gyur te; mdo las /
ye hi hetayo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā iti sūtre vacanāt
# mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed pa la rgyu gang dag yin ba dang rkyen gang yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro /
atha pudgalo na tasyālambanaṃ na tarhi tena vijñeyaḥ
# 'on te de'i dmigs pa gang zag ma yin na 'o na ni des rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro /
yadi ca pudgalaḥ ṣaḍvijñānavijñeyaḥ pratijñāyate / sa śrotravijñānavijñeyatvādrūpādanyaḥ prāpnoti śabdhavat
# gal te yang gang zag rnam par shes pa drug gis rnam par shes bar bya ba yin par dam 'cha' na ni de rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs las gzhan yin par 'gyur te / / sgra bzhin no /
caturvijñānavijñeyatvācchabdādanyaḥ prāpnoti rūpavat
# mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir sgra las gzhan yin par 'gyur te gzugs bzhin no /
evamanyebhyo 'pi yojyam
# de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o /
idaṃ ca sūtrapadaṃ vādhitaṃ bhavati / yānīmāni brāhmaṇa pañcendriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavanti / nānyadanyasya gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavati / tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyam / mana eṣaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati manaścaiṣāṃ pratisaraṇamiti
# bram ze dbang po lnga po 'di dag ni spyod yul tha dad pa can yin zhing yul tha dad ba can yin te / / rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul so sor nyams su myong ba yin gyi gzhan gyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong ba ni ma yin pa dag ste / / 'di lta ste / / mig gi dbang po dang rna ba'i dbang po dang sna'i dbang po dang lce'i dbang po dang lus kyi dbang po lnga'o / / yid kyi dbang bo ni dbang po lnga po 'di dag gi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong ba yin zhing / / yid kyi dbang po ni 'di dag gi rten yin no zhes gsungs pa'i mdo'i tshig 'di dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro /
na vā pudgalo viṣayaḥ
# yang na gang zag yul ma yin par 'gyur ro /
na cedviṣayo na tarhi vijñeyaḥ / yadyevaṃ manaindriyasyāpyavyabhicāraḥ prāpnoti
# gal te yul ma yin no zhe na / / 'o na ni rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro / / gal te de lta na yid kyi dbang po yang 'khrul pa med bar 'gyur te /
ṣaḍimānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣayamākāṅkṣantī tyuktaṃ ṣaṭprāṇakopame
# srog chags drug pa lta bu'i mdo las / / dbang po drug po 'di dag ni spyod yul tha dad ba can yin zhing yul tha dad pa can yin te /
na ttrendriyamemvendriyaṃ kṛtvoktam
# rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul 'dod pa dag yin no zhes gsungs so /
pañcānāṃ darśanādyā kāṅkṣaṇāsaṃbhavāt tadvijñānānāṃ ca / atastadādhipatyādhyākṛtamatra manovijñānendriyaṃ kṛtvoktam / yacca tatkevalaṃ mana ādhipatyādhyākṛtaṃ manovijñānaṃ naivaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ viṣayamākāṅkṣatyato nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ / uktaṃ ca bhagavatā sarvābhijñeyaṃ vo bhikṣavo dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayiṣyāmītyuktvā cakṣurabhijñeyaṃ rūpāṇi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yadapi taccakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayamadhyātmamutpadyate veditaṃ suḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā yāvat manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayam
# der ni dbang po kho na la dbang po yin par ma gsungs kyi lnga po dang de dag gi rnam par shes pa rnams ni mthong ba la sogs par 'dod mi srid pa'i phyir de dag gi dbang gis drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dbang po yin par gsungs so / / yid kyi dbang po 'ba' zhig gis drangs pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni de las gzhan pa dag gi spyod yul la mi 'dod pa nyid pas de'i phyir de nyes pa med do / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad bshad par bya'o zhes gsungs nas / / mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ni mig dang gzugs rnams dang mig gi rnam par shes ba dang mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang gang yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am / / sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa skye ba de dang zhes bya ba nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par gsungs te /
ayamucyate sarvābhijñeyaparijñeyo dharmaparyāyaḥ iti
# 'di ni mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad yin no zhes gsungs so /
ata etāvadevābhijñeyaṃ pratijñeyaṃ cetyavardhāryate na pudgalaḥ
# de'i phyir mngon par shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ni de snyed cig yin par nges par gzung gi / / gang zag ni ma yin pas /
tasmādvijñeyo 'pyasau na bhavati / prajñāvijñānayoḥ samānaviṣayatvāt
# de lta bas na 'di rnam par shes par bya ba yang ma yin te / / shes rab dang rnam par shes pa gnyis ni yul 'dra ba'i phyir ro /
cakṣuṣa ca pudgalaṃ paśyām iti paśyanta paudgalikā anātmanā ātmānaṃ paśyāma iti dṛṣṭisthānamāpannā bhavanti / sūtre ca bhagavatā nītametat
# gang zag pa rnams mig gis gang zag blta'o zhes gang zag lta ba ni bdag med pas bdag blta'o zhes bya ba yin pas bdag tu lta ba'i gnas su gyur ba yang yin no / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo las /
skandheṣveva pudgalādhyeti mānuṣyakasūtram / cakṣuḥpratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśasahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetanā itīme catvāro rupiṇaḥ skandhāśvakṣurindriyaṃ ca rūpametāvanmanuṣyatvamucyate / atreyaṃ saṃjñā sattvo naro manuṣyo mānavaśca poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo jīvo janturiti / atreyaṃ pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmīti / atrāyaṃ vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evañjātya evaṅgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evandīrghāyurevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyanta iti
# phung bo rnams kho na la gang zag ces bya'o zhes 'di nges par mdzad do / / nges pa'i don gyi mdo las kyang / / mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o / / gsum 'dus pas ni reg pa'o / / lhan cig skyes pas ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang sems pa dag ste / / de ltar na gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po de bzhin dang gzugs can mig gi dbang po dang de snyed cig la mi nyid ces bya'o / / 'di la sems can dang ming dang shed las skyes dang shed bu dang gso ba dang gang zag dang srog dang skye bo zhes bya ba 'di ni ming yin no / / 'di la bdag gis mig gi gzugs rnams blta'o zhes bya ba 'di ni khas 'che ba yin no / / 'di la ni 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa de'i ming ni 'di zhes bya / / rigs ni 'di zhes bya / / rus ni 'di zhes bya / / kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za / / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong / / tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub / / yun ni ji srid cig gnas /
iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātrakamevaita dvyavahāramātrakamevaitat / sarva ime dharmāḥ anityāḥ saṃskṛtāśceti tāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti / nītārthaṃ ca sūtraṃ pratisaraṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā
# tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig go zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad yin no / / dge slong dag de ltar na 'di dag ni ming tsam / / 'di dag khas 'che ba tsam / / 'di dag ni tha snyad tsam ste / / chos 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa / / 'dus byas pa / / sems pas 'phangs pa / / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dag yin no zhes gsungs so / / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo la brten par gsungs te /
tasmānna punaḥ parīkṣyate / tathā coktaṃ sarvamastīti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyanānīti
# de lta bas na 'di ni yang dang yang du brtag par bya ba yin no / / de bzhin du bram ze thams cad yod do zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / / skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu zad do zhes kyang gsungs so /
yadi cāyaṃ pudgalo nāyatanaṃ na sostīti siddham / athāyatanaṃ na tarhyavaktavyaḥ / teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ceti / bimbisārasūtre coktam ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya mānamutpadyate iti vistaraḥ / śailayāpyarhantyā māramārabhyoktaṃ / manyase ki nu sattveti māradṛṣṭigataṃ hi te / śūnyaḥ saṃskārapuñjo 'yaṃ nahi sattvjotra vidyate
# gal te gang zag 'di skye mched ma yin na ni de yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar grub bo / / 'on te skye mched yin no zhe na / / 'o na ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no / / de dag gi ltar na yang 'di skad du dge slong mi ji snyed pa dang gzugs ji snyed pa zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs nas / / dge slong 'di ji snyed cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dogs par mdzad do / / thams cad brtags so zhes gsungs so zhes 'don to / / gzugs can snying po'i mdo las kyang / / dge slong dag bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas brtags pa la lhung bar zad de / / 'di la bdag ga bdag gi ni med kyi sdug bsngal 'di skye ba na skye bar zad do zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs so / / dgra bcom pa drug gis kyang bdud las brtsams nas / / sems can zhes bya bdud ci sems / / khyod ni lta bar gyur pa yin / / 'du byed phung po 'di stong ste; / / 'di la sems can yod ma yin /
yathaiva hyaṅgasaṃbhārātsaṃjñā ratha iti smṛtā
# ji ltar yan lag tshogs rnams la / / shing rta'i ming du bshad pa ltar /
evaṃ skandhānupādāya saṃvṛtyā sattva ucyate
# de bzhin phung po rnams brten nas / / kun rdzob sems can zhes bya'o /
kṣadrake 'pi cāgame dāridrabrāhmaṇamathikṛtyoktaṃ / śṛṇu tvaṃ svādare dharmaḥ sarvagranthipramocanam / yathā saṃkliśyate cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ viśudhyati
# zhes bshad do / / lung phran tshegs las kyang / / bram ze rgya shug gi bu'i dbang du byas nas / / ji ltar sems ni kun nyon mongs / / ji ltar sems ni rnam byang dang / / mdud pa thams cad 'jig byed pa'i / / chos ni rgya shug bu khyod nyon /
ātmaiva hyātmano nāsti viparītena kalpyate / nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ / dvādaśaiva bhavāṅgāni skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ
# bdag nyid kyis ni bdag med de / / phyin ci log gis rtogs par byed / / 'di la bdag gam sems can med / / chos 'di dag ni rgyu dang bcas / / srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang / / phung po skye mched khams rnams te /
vicintya sarvāṇyetāni pudgalo nopalabhyate
# rnam par bsams na 'di kun la / / gang zag dmigs pa ma yin no /
śūnyamadhyātmakaṃ paśya śūnyaṃ paśya bahirgatam
# nang gi stong pa yin par ltos / / phyi rol gnas pa stong par ltos /
na labhyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatāmiti
# rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa / / de yang 'ga' yang mi dmigs so /
tathoktaṃ pañcādīnavā ātmopalambhe
# zhes gsungs so / / de bzhin du bdag tu dmigs pa la nyes dmigs lnga yod do /
ātmadṛṣṭirbhavati sattvadṛṣṭiḥ
# bdag tu lta ba dang sems can du lta ba dang srog tu lta bar 'gyur /
nirviśeṣo bhavati tīrthikaiḥ sārdham / unmārgapratipanno bhavati
# mu stegs can rnams dang khyad par med par 'gyur / / lam gol bar zhugs par 'gyur /
śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate na vimucyate
# 'di'i sems stong pa nyid la mi 'jug cing rab tu dang bar mi 'gyur la yang dag par mi gnas pas rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur /
āryadharmā asya na vyavadāyanta iti
# 'di'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so /
na vaita evaṃ grandhaṃ pramāṇaṃ kurvanti
# de dag ni gzhung 'di tshad mar mi byed pa nyid do /
kiṃ kāraṇam / nāsmākamayaṃ nikāye paṭhacyata iti
# ci'i phyir zhe na / / 'di kho bo cag gi sde pa mi 'don to zhes zer ro /
kiṃ punasteṣāṃ nikāya eva pramāṇamāhosvidbuddhavacanam
# ci de dag la sde pa kho na tshad ma yin nam / / 'on te sangs rgyas kyi bka' tshad ma yin /
yadi nikāya eva pramāṇaṃ na tarhi teṣāṃ budhaḥ śāstā / na ca te śākyaputrīyā bhavanti
# gal te sde pa kho na tshad ma yin na 'o na ni de dag gi ston pa yang sangs rgyas ma yin la / / sh'akya'i bu yang ma yin par 'gyur /
atha buddhavacanaṃ pramāṇam / ayaṃ granthaḥ kasmānna pramāṇam
# 'on te sangs rgyas kyi bka' tshad ma yin no zhe na ni gzhung 'di ci'i phyir tshad ma ma yin /
nahi kilaitat buddhavacanamiti
# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no /
kiṃ kāraṇam / nāsmākaṃ nikāye paṭhacyata iti
# de ci'i phyir zhe na ni / / kho bo cag gi sde pa mi 'don pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro zhes grag go /
ayamanyāyo vartate
# 'di ni mi rigs par zhugs pa yin no /
ko 'trānyāyaḥ / yo hi granthaḥ sarveṣu nikāyāntareṣvāmnāyate na ca sūtraṃ dharmatāṃ vā bādhate so 'smābhirapāṭhānna buddhavacanamiti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ sāhasamātram / kiṃ cedamapi teṣāṃ sūtraṃ nāsti sarvadharmā anātāna iti / syāt matam / naiva hi pudgalo dharma ucyate nāpyanyo dharmāditi
# 'dir mi rigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na / / gzhung gang zhig sde pa gzhan thams cad las 'byung la mdo dang chos nyid dang yang mi 'gal bde kho bo cag mi 'don pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no zhes smra ba ste / / gzu lums tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad do / / gzhan yang de dag la chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di yang med dam / / gang zag ni chos zhes kyang mi bya la chos las gzhan zhes kyang mi bya'o zhes bya bar 'dod par gyur na /
evaṃ tarhi na manovijñeyaḥ sidhyati
# de lta na ni yid kyi rnam par shes par bya bar mi 'grub ste /
dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādaḥ ityavadhāraṇāt / iha caivaṃ vikalpyate anātmanyāteti saṃjñāviparyāsa ścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa iti / anātmanyātmeti viparyāso na tvātmani kiṃ ca punaḥ
# gnyis la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes nges par gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / bdag med pa la bdag go snyam du 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log pa zhes bya ba 'di kho na la yang ji ltar rtog / / bdag med pa la bdag go snyam pa phyin ci log yin gyi bdag la ni ma yin no / / bdag med pa yang gang zhig yin /
nātmā skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ yattāvaduktaṃ prāk no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no veti tattāvadaśocam / uktaṃ ca sūtrāntare ye kecit bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāniti
# phung po dang skye mched dang khams rnams yin no / / re zhig sngar gzugs rnams zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o / / gzugs rnams ma yin zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa ni bsal to / / mdo gzhan las / / dge slong dag dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la bdag go snyam du rjes su lta ba de dag thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kho na la zhes gsungs te /
tasmātsarva evānātmanyātmagrāhaḥ / tathoktaṃ ye kecidanekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarantaḥ samanusmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve ta imāneva opañcopādanaskandhāniti
# de lta bas na bdag tu 'dzin pa thams cad ni bdag med pa kho na la yin no / / de bzhin du gang la sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dum rjes su dran par gyur tam / / rjes su dran nam / / rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kho na la zhes gsungs so /
yadyevamidaṃ kasmādāha rūpavānahamabhūvamatīte adhvanīti
# gal te de lta na ni ci'i phyir bdag ni 'das pa'i dus na gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to zhes gsungs /
evamanekavidhaṃ ye samanusmarantīti pradarśayati
# gang dag de ltar rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba rab tu ston par byed do /
yadi tu rūpavantaṃ pudgalaṃ paśyetsatkāyadṛṣṭiprasaṅgaḥ syāt
# gal te gang zag gzugs dang ldan par lta bar gyur na 'jig tshogs la lta bar thal bar 'gyur bas 'di la ni ma bton pa kho na skyabs yin no /
apāṭha eva tvanna śaraṇaṃ syāt / tasmāt prajñāptisatpudgalo rāśidhārāvat
# de lta bas na gang zag ni btags pa'i yod pa yin te / / phung po dang rgyun la sogs pa bzhin no /
yadyevaṃ tarhi na buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ prapnoti
# gal te de ltar na 'on ni sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
na hi kiñcictrittamasti caittā vā yatsarvaṃ jānīyāt
# thams cad shes par 'gyur ba'i sems sam sems las byung ba gang yin pa de ni cung zad kyang med do /
kṣaṇikatvāt / pudgalastu jānīyāt / evaṃ tarhi cittavināśe pudgalasyāvināśābhyupagamāt nityatvamasyābhyupetaṃ bhavati
# skad cig ma yin pa'i phyir gang zag gis ni shes par 'gyur ro / / de lta ni 'o na sems 'jig pa na gang zag mi 'jig par khas blangs pa'i phyir 'di rtag pa nyid du khas blangs pa yin no /
naiva ca vayaṃ sarvatra jñānasaṃmukhībhāvād buddhaṃ sarvajñamācakṣmahe
# kho bo cag ni thams cad mkhyen pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa yin par ni mi smra'o /
kiṃ tarhi / sāmarthyāt / yā hyasau buddhākhyā saṃtatistasyā idamasti sāmarthyaṃ yadābhogamātreṇāviparītaṃ jñānamutpadyate yatreṣṭam / āha cātra
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / mthu yod pa'i phyir te / / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i rgyud gang yin pa de la gang du bzhed par gtang ba tsam gyis phyin ci ma log pa'i mkhyen pa skye ba gang yin pa'i mthu 'di yod do / / 'dir smras pa /
saṃtānena samarthatvādyathāgniḥ sarvabhuṅmataḥ
# rgyun gyis spyod pa'i phyir na dper / / me yis thams cad sreg 'dod lta /
tathā sarvavideṣṭavyo 'sakṛtsarvasya vedanāt / kathamidaṃ gamyate
# de bzhin thams cad mkhyen 'dod bya'i / / cig car thams cad mkhyen phyir min / / 'di ji ltar khong du chud ce na /
atītādivacanāt / ye cābhyatītāḥ saṃbuddhā ye ca buddhā anāgatāḥ
# 'das pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir te / / rdzogs sangs rgyas 'das gang dag dang / / sangs rgyas ma byon gang dag dang /
yaśca etarhhi saṃbuddho bahūnāṃ śokanāśana iti
# da lta'i rdzogs sangs rgyas gang yin / / mang po rnams ni mya ngan sel /
skandhā eva ca traiyadhvikā iṣyante na pudgalā yuṣmābhiḥ
# zhes gsungs so / / khyed cag kyang phung po rnams kho na dus gsum pa yin par 'dod kyi gang zag ni ma yin no /
yadi skandhā eva pudgalāḥ kasmādidamāha / bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ceti / kasmādidaṃ na vaktavyaṃ syāt / na hi bhāra eva bhārahāro yuktaḥ
# gal te phung po rnams kho na gang zag yin na ci'i phyir dge slong dag khyed la khur yang bstan to / / khur len pa dang khur 'dor ba dang khur khyer ba yang bstan gyi zhes gsungs / / ci'i phyir gsungs par mi bya / / khur nyid khur khyer ba yin par ni rigs pa ma yin te /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
nahyevaṃ dṛśyata iti
# de lta bu mi snang ba'i phyir ro /
avaktavyo 'pi na yuktaḥ
# brjod par bya ba ma yin pa yang rigs pa ma yin te /
kiṃ kāraṇam
# ci'i phyir zhe na /
na hyevaṃ dṛśyate / bhārādānasyāpi skandhāsaṃgrahaprasaṅgācca
# de lta bu mi snang ba'i phyir ro / / khur len pa yang phung pos ma bsdus par yang thal bar 'gyur ro /
ityarthameva bhārahāraṃ nirdideśa bhagavān / yo 'sāvāyupmānevaṃnāmā yāvadevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ sa eṣa yathā vijñāyeta / mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vā avaktavyaṃ veti / skandhā eva ca skandhānāmupadhātāya saṃvartante pūrvakā uttareṣāmiti bhāraṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca kṛtvoktāḥ
# khur khyer ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas tshe dang ldan pa ming 'di zhes bya ba nas yun ni 'di srid cig gnas nas tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig go zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa de nyid shes par 'gyur zhing / / rtag pa'am gang zag ces bya ba gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur ba don de kho na'i phyir bstan te phung po snga ma rnams kho na phung po phyi ma rnams la gnod par byed pa yin pas khur dang khur khyer ba zhes bshad pa yin no /
upaghātārtho hi bhāra iti / asty eva pudgalo yasmād uktaṃ nāsti sattva upapāduka iti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ / kaścaivam āha nāsti sattva upapāduka iti
# gang zag ni yod pa nyid de / / 'di ltar sems can skye ba ba med do zhes zer ba ni log par lta ba yin no zhes gsungs so / / sems can skye ba pa med do zhes su zer /
sattvastu yathā 'sti tathā vibhakto bhagavateti brūmo mānuṣyakasūtre / tasmād yaḥ paratropapādukasattvākhyaskandhasaṃtānāpavādaṃ karoti tasyaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir nāsti sattva upapāduka iti / skandhānām upapādukatvāt / athaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pudgalāpavādikā satī kiṃprahātavyā bhavet
# ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ba ltar yod do / / zhes zer ro / / de lta bas na 'di ni gang zhig pha rol du skye ba pa sems can zhes bya ba phung po'i rgyun la sems can skye ba pa med do zhes skur pa 'debs pa de'i log par lta ba yin te / / phung po rnams ni skye ba pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / gang zag la skur pa 'debs pa 'di log par lta ba yin na yang ci zhig gis spang bar bya bar 'gyur /
nahyeṣā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā yujyate / pudgalasya sattveṣvantarbhāvāt / ekaḥ pudgalo loka utpadyamāna utpadyate iti vacanāt na skandhā iti cet
# 'di bden pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin par yang mi rung la bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin par yang mi rung ste / / gang zag bden pa rnams kyi khongs su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro / / gal te 'jig rten na yang gang zag gcig pu skye ba na skye'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir phung po rnams ma yin no zhen ma yin te /
na / samudāye 'pyekopacārādekatilaikataṇḍulavat ekarāśyekavacanavacca
# spyi la yang gcig nye bar 'dogs pa'i phyir til gcig dang 'bras thug po che gcig ces bya ba lta bu dang phung po gcig dang tshig gcig ces bya ba bzhin no /
saṃskṛta iti vā pudgalo vaktavya utpatīmattvābhyupagamāt
# yang na gang zag 'dus byas yin no zhes bya bar brjod par bya ste / / skye ba dang ldan pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
na sa evamutpadyate yathā skandhā apūrvaprādurbhāvāt
# de ni ji ltar phung po rnams sngon med pa las byung ba de ltar skye ba ni ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / skandhāntaropādānāt
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / phung po gzhan len pa'i phyir te /
yathā yājñiko jāto vaiyākaraṇo jāta ityucyate vidyopādānāt
# dper na rig pa blangs pa'i phyir mchod sbyin pa skyes so /
bhikṣurjātaḥ parivrājako jāta iti liṅgopādānāt
# brda sprod pa pa skyes so zhes bya ba dang rtags blangs pa'i phyir dge slong skyes so /
buddhojāto vyādhito jāta ityavasthāntaropādānāditi / na pratikṣepāt sūtra eva hi pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavatā paramārthaśūnyatāyām / iti hibhikṣavo 'sti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyate / ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāditi
# kun du rgyu skyes so zhes bya ba dang gnas skabs gzhan blangs pa'i phyir rga ba skyes so / / na ba skyes so zhes bya ba bzhin no / / ma yin te / / bkag pa'i phyir ro / / bcom ldan 'das kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mdo khon las / / dge slong dag las ni yod do / / rnam par smin pa ni yod do / / chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa gang zhig phung po 'di rnams 'dor bar byed cing phung po gzhan dag nyid mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i byed pa po ni mi dmigs so zhes gsungs so /
phalgusūtre coktam upādatta iti phalgu na vadāmīti
# dbo las skyes kyi mdo las kyang / / dbo las skyes len ces mi ba'o zhes gsungs te /
tasmānnāsti skandhānāṃ kaścidupādātā nāpi nikṣiptā
# de lta bas na phung po rnams len par byed pa yang 'ga' yang med la / / 'dor bar byed pa yang med do /
kaṃ ca tāvadbhavānyājñikaṃ yāvadvacyā dhita madhimucyate
# re zhig khyod mchod sbyin pa nas rga ba'i bar gang gi dbang du byas nas dper byed /
dṛṣṭātaṃ karoti pudgalaṃ yadi / so 'siddhaḥ / atha cittacaittāḥ / na / teṣāṃ pratikṣaṇamapūrvotpattireva
# gal te gang zag yin no zhen ni de ma grub bo / / 'on te sems dang sems las byung ba rnams yin no zhe na ni de dag skad cig re re la sngon med pa las skye ba khon yin no /
atha śarīram / tasyāpi tathā / śarīravidyāliṅgavacca skandhapudgalayoranyatvamāpadyate / jīrṇa śarīrāntarameva jyādhitaṃ ca / pratiṣiddho hi sāṃkhyīyaḥ pariṇāmavādaḥ
# 'on te lus yin no zhe na / / de yang de dang 'dra la / / lus dang rig ba dang rtags bzhin du phung po dang gang zag gnyis gzhan nyid du yang 'gyur ro / / rga ba dang na ba yang lus gzhan khon yin no / / grangs can pa'i 'gyur bar smra ba ni bkag zin to /
tasmādadṛṣṭāntā ete / yadi ca skandhānāmapūrvotpādo na pudgalasyeṣyate so 'nyaśca tebhyo nityaśca sphuṭaṃ dīpito bhavati / pañca skandhā ekaḥ pudgala iti brūvatā kathamanyatvaṃ nocyate
# de lta bas na 'di dag ni dpe ngan pa yin no / / gal te yang phung po rnams ni sngon med pa las skyes pa yin la / / gang zag ni ma yin par 'dod na ni de de dag las gzhan pa dang rtag par gsal bar yongs su bstan pa yin no / / phung po ni lnga'o / / gang zag ni gcig go zhes smra bas ji ltar na gzhan nyid du mi brjod /
kathaṃ tāvat bhūtāni catvāri rūpaṃ tvekaṃ na ca bhūtebhyyo 'nyadrūpam
# re zhig ji ltar na 'byung ba dag ni bzhi yin / / gzugs ni gcig yin la 'byung ba rnams las gzugs gzhan yang ma yin /
pākṣika eṣa doṣaḥ / katamasminpakṣa
# smra ba 'di ni phyogs la yod pa yin no / / phyogs gang la zhe na /
bhūtamātrikapakṣe / tathāpi tu yathā bhūtamātraṃ rūpamevaṃ skandhamātraṃ pudgala ityabhyupetaṃ bhavati / yadi skandhamātraṃ pudgalaḥ kasmāt bhagavatā sa jīvastaccharīrakanyo veti navyākṛtam
# 'byung ba tsam pa'i phyogs la'o / / de lta na yang ji ltar 'byung ba tsam gzugs yin pa de bzhin du phung po tsam gang zag yin par khas blangs pa yin no / / gal te phung po tsam gang zag yin na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis srog de nyid lus yin pa'am / / gzhan yin no zhes lung ma bstan zhe na /
praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā / sa hi jīvadravyamekamantarvyāpāra puruṣamadhikṛtya pṛṣṭavān / sa ca kasmiścinnāstīti kathamasyānyatvamananyatvaṃ vā vyākriyatām / kaurmasyeva romṇo 'ntaḥkharatā mṛdutā vā
# 'dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos pa'i phyir te / / des na ni nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu srog gi rdzas gcig po dris so / / de yang 'ga' yang med na 'di ji ltar gzhan nyid dam gzhan ma yin pa nyid lung bstan par bya ste / / rus sbal gyi yul ba shor ram 'jam zhes bya ba bzhin no /
eṣa ca granthaḥ pūrvakaireva nirmocitaḥ
# mdud pa 'di ni snga ma dag kho nas kyang bkrol zin te /
sthāviro hi nāgasenaḥkaliṅgena rājñopasaṃkramyoktaḥ / pṛccheyamahaṃ bhadantam bahuvollakāśca śravaṇā bhavanti / yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti
# rgyal po des 'du sbyin gnas brtan klu sde'i thad du 'ongs nas btsun pa dge sbyong rnams ni smra ba mang ba ma lags so / / gal te gang dris pa de nyid lan 'debs na bdag 'dri bar 'tshal lo zhes smras so /
pṛcchetyuktaḥ pṛṣṭavān
# drir gsol zhes smras pa dag ci lags /
kiṃ nu sa jīvastaccharīramanyio jīvo 'nyaccharīramiti
# srog de nyid lus lags sam / / srog kyang gzhan lags la lus kyang gzhan lags zhes dris so /
avyākṛtametadityavocat sthaviraḥ / sa āha
# gnas brtan gyis 'di ni lan mi gdags pa yin no zhes smras pa dang des smras pa /
nanu bhadantaḥ pūrvameva pratijñāṃ kārito nā 'nyadvacyākartavyamiti
# bdag gis snga nas btsun pa gzhan lung bstan par mi bya'o zhes dam 'char gsol ba ma lags sam /
kimidamanyadevoktamavyākṛtametaditi
# ci'i slad du 'di skad du 'di ni lan mi gdab pa yin no zhes gzhan kho na gsungs /
sthavira āha
# gnas brtan gyis smras pa /
ahamapi mahārājaṃ pṛccheyaṃ bahuvollakāśca rājāno bhavanti
# rgyal po chen po rgyal po rnams ni smra ba mang ba lags so /
yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti
# gal te gang dris pa de nyid lan 'debs na bdag kyang 'dri bar 'tshal lags so /
pṛcchetyuktaḥ pṛṣṭavān / yaste 'ntaḥpure ābhravṛkṣastasya kimamlāni phalāni āhosvit madhurāṇīti / naiva mamāntaḥpure kaścidābhravṛkṣo 'stītyāha / nanu mayā pūrvameva mahārājaḥ pratijñāṃ kārito nānyadvacyākartavyamiti
# drir gsol zhes smras pa dang khyod kyi slas la shing ljon pa aa mra 'bras bu yod pa gang yin pa de'i 'bras bu rnams ci skyur ram 'on te mngar lags zhes dris so / / bdag gi smras la shing ljon pa aa mra nyid 'ga' yang med do zhes smras so / / bdag gis snga nas rgyal po chen po gzhan lung bstan par mi bya'o zhes dam 'char gsol ba ma lags sam /
kimidamanyadevoktamābhra eva nāstīti / sa āha kathamasato vṛkṣasya phalānāmamlatāṃ madhuratāṃ vā vyākaromīti / evameva mahārāja sa eva jīvo nāsti kuto 'sya śarīrādanyatāmananyatāṃ vā vyākaromīti
# ci'i slad du 'di skad du shing ljon pa aa mra nyid med do zhes gzhan kho na gsungs / / des smras pa / / ji ltar na shing ljon pa med pa'i 'bras bu rnams skyur ba'am mngar ba nyid du lung bstan par bya / / rgyal po chen po de bzhin du srog de nyid med na ci'i slad du 'di lus las gzhan pa nyid dam gzhan ma yin pa nyid du lung bstan par bgyi zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
kasmāt bhagavatā 'pi noktaṃ nāstyeveti
# ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang med pa kho na'o zhes ma gsungs she na /
praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā / sa hi yasyāpi skandhasaṃtānasya jīva ityākhyā tasyāpyabhāvaṃ pratīyāditi mithyādṛṣṭiṃ pātitaḥ syāt
# dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos pa'i phyir te / / des srog ces bya ba phung po'i rgyun gang yin pa de yang med par go bar gyur na log par lta bar ltung bar 'gyur te /
pratotya samutpādasyājñānāt / sa cataddeśanāyā akṣamaḥ / itaścaitadevaṃ niścīyate / yat bhagavatoktam astyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanvakalpaṃ syādvacanāya sarvadharmā anātmāna iti
# rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes pa'i phyir ro / / de ni de bstan pa yang mi bzod do / / 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo kun du rgyu gnas pa dang rus mthun pas dri ba dris pa dag yod do zhes lung bstan na ni chos thams cad bdag med pas tshig ma legs pa ma yin nam /
nāstyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanu vatsasagotraḥ parivrājakaḥ pūrvameva saṃmūḍho bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmohamāpadyeta abhūt me ātmāsa me etarhi nāstīti / astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya pareti
# kun dga' bo kun du rgyu gnas pa dang rus mthun pa'i dri ba dris pa bdag med do zhes lung bstan na ni kun tu rgyu gnas pa dang rus mthun pa'i snga nas kun du rmongs pa yod pa dag gis bdag sngon yod par gyur pa las da ni bdag gi de yang med do zhes kun du rmongs pa phyir zhing ches rgyas par 'gyur ba ma yin nam / / kun dga' bo bdag yod ces bya ba ni rtag pa'i mthar 'gyur ro /
nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paretīti vistaraḥ / āha cānna / dṛṣṭidaṃṣṭrāvabhadaṃ ca braṃśaṃ cāpekṣya karmaṇām
# kun dga' bo bdag med ces bya ba ni chad pa'i mthar 'gyur ro zhes rgyas par gsungs pa gang yin pa 'di las kyang de bzhin du nges par zung shig / / 'dir smras pa / / lta ba'i mche bas smras pa dang / / las rnams 'jig pa la ltos nas /
deśayanti jinā dharma vyāgrīpītāpahāravat
# stag mos phru gu khyer ba ltar / / rgyal bas chos ni ston par mdzad /
ātmāstitvaṃ hyupagato bhinnaḥ syāddṛṣṭidaṃṣṭrayā
# bdag yod nyid du khas blangs nas / / lta ba'i mche bas smras par gyur /
bhraṃśaṃ kukśalapotasya kuryādaprāpya saṃvṛtimiti
# kun rdzob rtog par ma gyur nas / / dge ba phru gu nyams byed 'gyur /
punarāha
# yang smras pa /
asattvādbhagavān jīvaṃ tattvānyatvena nāvadat / nāstītyapi ca nāvocanmābhūt prājñaptikopyasan
# med phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis srog / / de nyid gzhan du ma gsungs so / / brtags pa'ang med du 'gyur 'ong bas / / med do zhes kyang ma gsungs so /
yatra hi skandhasaṃtāne śubhāśubhaphalāstitā
# phung po'i rgyu ni gang la dge / / mi dge'i 'bras bu yod pa nyid /
jīvākhyā tatra sā na syāt jīvanāstitvadeśanāt
# de la srog ces bya ste de / / srog ming bstan pas med par 'gyur /
prajñaptimātraṃ skandhesu jīva ityapināvadat
# srog ces bya ba phung po la / / btags tsam zhes kyang ma gsungs te /
abhavyaḥ śūnyatāṃ boddhuṃ tadānīṃ tādṛśo janaḥ / tathā hyātmāsti nāstīti pṛṣṭo vāstyeva nāvadat / āśayāpekṣāyā praṣṭuḥ sati tvastīti nāha kim / śāśvatalokādīnāmapyavayākaraṇaṃ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā
# de tshe'i skye bo de 'dra ste / / stong nyid rtogs pa'i skal ldan min / / 'di ltar gnas pas bdag yod dam / / med ces dri ba 'dri ba yi / / bsam pa la ltos ma gsungs te / / yod na ci phyir yod mi gsungs / / 'jig rten rtag ces bya ba la sogs pa yang 'dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos nas lung ma bstan te /
yadi hi tāvadātmā loka iṣṭaḥ syāttasyābhāvādayuktaṃ caturdhā vyākaraṇam
# re zhig gal te 'jig rten bdag yin bar 'dod par gyur na ni de med pa'i phyir lung ma bstan pa rnam pa bzhi char mi rigs so /
atha sarva eva saṃsāro lokastasyāpyayuktam
# 'on te 'jig rten 'khor ba thams cad yin no zhe na ni de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt
# 'jig rten rtag na 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro /
śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt / aśāśvate sarvepāmucchedaḥ prāpnuyāt / ubhayathātve niyamata ekeṣāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt ekeṣāṃ na / anubhayathātve naiva parinirvāṇaṃ nāparinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt
