# mi rtag na ni thams cad chad par 'gyur ro / / gnyi ga ltar yin na ni kha cig ni nges par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la kha cig ni mi 'gyur ro / / gnyi ga ltar ma yin na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ma yin / / yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba yang ma yin pa kho nar 'gyur ro /
ato mārgadhīnatvāt parinirvāṇasya caturdhāpi niyamo na vyākriyate nirgrantha
# de'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni lam la rag lus pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi char yang nges par lung mi ston te / / gcer bu pa'i nyan thos kyis byi'u bzung ba bzhin no /
ata evāntavān loka iti catuṣkāvyākaraṇam / tulyārtho hyeṣa catuṣkaḥ
# de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten mtha' dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi yang lung ma bstan te / / bzhi tshan 'di ni don mthun no /
tathāhi muktikaḥ parivrājaka eva catuṣkaṃ pṛṣṭvā punaḥ pṛṣṭavān kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryātyāhosvidekadeśo lokasyeti / sthavira ānanda āha yameva tvaṃ muktika tatprathamato bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstame vaitarhi pṛcchasyanena paryāyeṇeti sarvam
# 'di ltar kun du rgyu smra byed kyis bzhi tshan 'di zhus nas yang ci lags / / 'jig rten thams cad lam 'di nges par 'byung ngam / / 'on te 'jig rten phyogs gcig lags zhes zhus pa dang gnas brtan kun dga' bos smra byed khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la dang po nyid du zhu ba zhus pa gang yin pa de nyid de rnam grangs gzhan gyis 'dri'am zhes smra'o /
bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maranādityapi catuṣkaḥ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā na vyākṛtaḥ
# de bzhin 'ongs pa shi phan chad yod dam zhes bya ba bzhi tshan 'di yang dri ba po'i bsam pa la ltos nas lung ma bstan te /
sa hi muktvāmānaṃ tathāgataṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭavān
# des ni bdag grol ba de bzhin 'ongs pa yin par bsams nas zhu ba zhus so /
paudgalikastu paryanuyojyaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān jīvantaṃ pudgalamastīti vyākaroti paraṃ maraṇānna vyākarotīti
# gang zag pa rnams la brgal zhing brtag par bya ste / / bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir gang zag gson po ni yod do zhes lung ston la shi phan chad ni lung mi ston /
śāśvata doṣaprasaṅgaḥ / idaṃ tarhi kasmādvacyākaroti bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maitreyānāgate 'dhvani tathāgato 'rhan saṃyaksaṃbuddha iti / kasmācca śrāvakamabhyatītaṃ kālagatamupapattau vyākarotyamuko 'mutropapanna iti / evamapi hi śāśvatatvaprasaṅgaḥ / yadi ca bhagavān pūrvaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā parinirvṛtaṃ punaḥ na paśyatyajñānānna vyakarotīti sarvajñatvaṃ śāsturutpāditaṃ bhavati na vā so 'stītyabhyupagantavyam
# rtag pa'i nyes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro / / 'o na ni ci'i phyir byams pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ston / / ci'i phyir che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes nyan thos 'das pa dus 'das pa skye ba la lung ston / / de lta yin na ni rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro / / gal te yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag sngar gzigs la yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mi gzigs te / / mi mkhyen pa'i phyir lung mi ston to zhe na ni / / ston pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsal ba yin no /
atha paśyatyanucyamāno 'pyasāvasti śāśvataśceti siddhaṃ bhavati / arthatadapi na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā naveti
# yang na ni de med do zhes khas blang bar bya dgos so / / 'on te gzigs na ni ma gsungs bzhin du yang de yod pa dang rtag pa zhes bya bar grub pa yin no / / 'on te gzigs sam mi gzigs zhes bya ba 'di yang brjod par mi bya ba yin na /
evaṃ tarhi idamapi śanaiḥ śanairavaktavyaṃ kriyatāṃ sarvajño vā na vā bhagavānna veti
# de lta na ni 'o na bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa yin nam ma yin zhes bya ba 'di yang rim gyis mi brjod par gyis shig /
astyeva pudgalo yasmātsatyataḥ sthitito nāsti me ātmeti dṛṣṭisthānamuktam / astītyapi dṛṣṭisthānamuktam
# gang zag ni yod pa nyid de / / 'di ltar bden pa dang gnas par bdag gi bdag med do snyam pa ni lta ba'i gnas su gsungs so / / yod do snyam pa yang lta ba'i gnas su gsungs te /
tasmādajñāpakametat / ubhayamapi tvetadantagrāhadṛṣṭi śāśvatocchedadṛṣṭisaṃgṛhītamityābhidharmikāḥ
# de lta bas na 'di ni khungs su mi rung ngo / / chos mngon ba ba rnams na re 'di gnyi ga yang mthar 'dzin pa yin te / / rtag pa dang chad par lta bas bsdus pa dag yin no zhes zer ro /
tathaiva ca yuktam / astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya paraiti nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paraitīti vātsyasūtre vacanāt / yadi tarhi pudgalo nāsti ka eṣa saṃsarati / nahi saṃsāra eṣa saṃsaratīti yuktam
# de kho na bzhin du rigs te gnas ma bu'i mdo las / / kun dga' bo bdag yod ces bya ba mi rtag par 'gyur ro / / kun dga' bo bdag med ces bya ba ni chad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro / / gal te yang gang zag med na 'khor ba 'di su'i yin / / 'khor ba nyid 'khor bar rig pa ma yin no /
uktaṃ ca bhagavatā avidyānivaraṇānāṃ sattvanāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāmiti
# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can ma rig pa'i sgrib pa can kun du rgyu ba rnams 'khor ro zhes gsungs so /
atha pudgalaḥ kathaṃ saṃsarati / skandhāntaratyāgopādānāt
# yang gang zag ji ltar 'khor phung po gzhan 'dor ba dang len pa'i phyir ro /
uktottara eṣa pakṣaḥ / yathātu kṣaṇiko 'gniḥ saṃtatyā saṃsaratītyucyate tathā sattvākhyaḥ skndhasamudāyastṛṣṇopādānaḥ saṃsaratītyucyate
# phyogs 'di ni lan btab zin to / / ji ltar me skad cig ma yin yang rgyun gyis dro ba de bzhin du sred pa nye bar len pa can sems can zhes bya ba phung po'i tshogs 'khor ro /
yadi skandhāmātramidaṃ kasmādāha bhagavān grahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena sunetro nāma śāstā 'bhūvamiti / kasmānna vaktavyaṃ syāt
# gal te 'di phung po tsam yin na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na mig bzangs zhes / / bya ba'i ston par gyur to zhes gsungs so / / ci'i phyir gsung par mi 'gyur /
anyatvāt skandhānām
# phung po rnams gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro /
atha kiṃ pudgalaḥ / sa evāsau / śāśvato hi syāt / tasmādahameva sa ityekasaṃtānatāṃ darśayati
# 'o na ci de nyid gang zag yin na ni rtag par 'gyur ro / / de lta bas na nga nyid de yin no zhes bya ba ni rgyud gcig pa nyid du ston par mdzad pa yin te /
yathā sa evāgnirdahannāgata iti
# dper na me de nyid sreg cing 'ongs so zhes bya ba bzhin no /
yadi cātmā bhavettthāgatā eva suvyaktaṃ paśyeyuḥ
# gal te yang bdag de yod par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu gsal ba kho nar gzigs par 'gyur ro /
paśyatāṃ cātmagrāho dṛḍhataraḥ syādātmasnehaśca
# gzigs na yang bdag tu 'dzin pa shin tu dam por 'gyur ro /
ātmani ca satyātmīyaṃ bhavatīti sūtre vacanādātmagrāho 'pyeṣāṃ skandheṣvadhikaṃ pravarteta / saiṣā syātsatkāyadṛṣṭi
# bdag yod na bdag gir yang 'gyur ro zhes mdo las 'byung ba'i phyir de dag phung po rnams la bdag gir 'dzin pa lhag bar 'byung bas de ni de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bar 'gyur ro /
ātmīyadṛṣṭau ca satyāmātmīyasnehaḥ / evameṣāṃ dṛḍhatarātmātmīyasnehaparisāditavandhanānāṃ mokṣo dūratarībhavet
# bdag gir lta ba yod na yang bdag gir chags par 'gyur te / / de lta bas na bdag dang bdag gir chags pa'i 'ching ba shin tu dam pos glags pa de dag la thar pa thag ring bar 'gyur ro /
atha mataṃ naivātmani pravartate sneha iti / tat ka idānīmeṣa yogo yadanātmanyātmadhimokṣāt sneha utpadyate ātmanyeva tu notpadyate / tasmāt dṛṣṭacyarvudametasmin śāsane utpannaṃ ya eṣa ekeṣāṃ pudgalagrāha ekeṣāṃ sarvanāstitāgrāhaḥ / ye 'pi ca dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ manyante tīrthakārāstepāmeva mokṣābhāvadoṣo niṣkampaḥ / yadi tarhi sarvathāpi nāstyātmā kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu citteṣu cirānubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavati pratyabhijñānaṃ vā / smṛtiviṣayasaṃjñānvayāccittaviśeṣāt
# 'on te bdag la chags pa mi 'byung ba kho na'o zhes bya bar 'dod na / / de ni bdag med pa la ni bdag tu rmongs pas chags pa skye'i bdag nyid la mi skye'o zhes bya ba de ga la rung ste / / de lta bas na kha cig ni gang zag tu 'dzin kha cig ni thams cad med pa nyid du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bstan pa 'di la skyon byung ba yin no / / mu stegs byed gang dag bdag rdzas gzhan kho na yin par sems pa de dag gi ltar na yang thar pa med pa'i nyes pa 'di g yo ba med pa yin no / / 'o na gal te bdag rnam pa thams cad du med na sems skad cig ma rnams la nyams su myong nas ring mo zhig lon pa'i don ji ltar dran pa'am ngo shes par 'gyur / / dran pa'i yul la 'du shes pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems kyi khyad par las so /
kīdṛśāccittaviśeṣāt yato 'nantaraṃ smṛtirbhavati / tadābhogasadṛśasamvandhisaṃjñādimato 'nupahata prabhāvādāśrayaviśeṣaśokavyākṣepādibhiḥ / tādṛśo 'pi hyatadanvayaścittaviśeṣo na samarthaḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayituṃ tadanvayo 'pi cānyādṛśo na samarthastāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayitum
# sems kyi khyad par ji lta bu las she na / / gang gi mjug thogs su dran pa skye ba ste / / de dag la rtag pa dang 'dra ba dang 'brel ba can gyi 'du shes la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang rten gyi khyad par dang mya ngan dang rnam par g yengs pa la sogs pas mthu ma nyams pa can las so / / de lta bu yin yang de'i rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa'i sems kyi khyad par gyis ni dran pa de bskyed par mi nus so /
labhayathā tu samartha ityevaṃ smṛtirbhavatyanyasyāṃ sāmarthyādarśanāt / kathamidānīmanyena cetasā dṛṣṭamanyatsmarati / evaṃ hi devadattacetasā dṛṣṭaṃ yajñadattacetaḥ smaret
# de'i rgyu las byung ba yin yang gzhan lta bu ni dran pa de skyed par mi nus kyi gnyi ga ltar na nus pas de ltar na dran par 'gyur te / / gzhan la ni de'i mthu ma mthong pa'i phyir ro / / da ni ji ltar na sems gzhan gyis mthong la gzhan gyis dran de ltar na ni lha sbyin gyis sems kyis mthong la mchod sbyin gyis sems kyis dran par 'gyur ro /
nāsambandhāt / na hi tayoḥ saṃbandho 'sti akārya kāraṇabhāvādyathaikasaṃtānikayoḥ / na ca brūmo 'nyena cetasā dṛṣṭamanyatsmaratīti / api tu darśanacittātsmṛticittamanyadutpadyate / saṃtatipariṇatyā yathoktamiti ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ / smaraṇādeva ca pratyabhijñānaṃ bhavati
# ma yin te 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro / / de gnyis ni rgyu dang 'bras bur ma gyur pa'i phyir ji ltar na rgyud gcig la yod pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bur 'brel ba ni med do / / sems gzhan gyis mthong la gzhan gyis dran no zhes kyang mi zer ro / / 'on kyang ji skad bshad pa ltar rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis mthong pa'i sems la dran pa'i sems gzhan skye'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la nyes pa ci zhig yod / / dran pa kho na las ngo shes pa yang yin no /
asatyātmanika eṣa smarati / smaratīti ko 'rthaḥ
# bdag med na su zhig gis de ltar dran / / dran zhes bya ba'i don ci yin /
smṛtyā viṣayaṃ gṛhlāti / kiṃ tadgrahaṇamanyatsmaraṇāt
# dran pas yul 'dzin pa'o / / ci de 'dzin pa dran pa las gzhan zhig yin nam /
smṛtiṃ tarhi kaḥ karoti
# 'o na ni dran pa byed pa yin no /
uktaḥ sa yastāṃ karoti smṛtihetucittaviśeṣaḥ / yattarhi caitraḥ smaratītyucyate
# gang gis de byed pa de ni bshad zin te / / dran pa'i rgyu ni sems kyi khyad par yin no / / 'o na gang nag pas dran no zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
tato caitrākhyātsaṃtānāttāṃ bhavantīṃ dṛṣṭvocyate caitraḥ smaratīti / asatyātmani kasyevaṃ smṛtiḥ
# nag pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud de las de skye bar mthong nas smra bar zad do / / bdag med pa na dran pa 'di su'i yin /
kiṃarthaiṣā ṣaṣṭhī
# drug pa 'di'i don ji lta bu yin /
svāmyarthā
# rje bo'i don yin no /
yathā kasya kaḥ svāmī
# dper na gang gi rje bo gang lta bu yin /
yathā goścaitraḥ
# dper na ba'i nag pa lta bu yin no /
kathamasau tasyāḥ svāmī
# 'di ji ltar de'i rje bo yin /
tadādhīno hi tasyā vāhadohādiṣu viniyogaḥ
# de rmo ba dang bzho ba la sogs pa la sbyor ba de la rag lus pa yin no /
kva ca punaḥ smṛtirviniyoktavyā va evaṃ tasyāḥ svāmī mṛgyate
# dran pa gang du sbyar bar bya na / / 'di ltar de'i rje bo btsal /
smartavye 'rthe
# dran par bya ba'i don la'o /
kimartha viniyoktavyā
# ci'i phyir sbyar bar bya /
smaraṇārtham / aho sūktāni sukhaidhitānām / saiva hi nāma tadarthaṃ viniyoktavyeti / kathaṃ ca viniyoktavyā
# dran par bya ba'i phyir ro / / kye ma de nyid de'i don du sbyor ro zhes bya ba ni bsod nams kyis bskyed pa rnams kyis legs par smras so / / ji ltar sbyar bar bya /
utpādanata ahosvitsaṃpreṣaṇataḥ
# ci de bskyed pa'i sgo nas sam / / 'on te mngag pa'i sgo nas /
smṛtigatyayogādutpādanataḥ / hetureva tarhi svāmī prāpnoti phalameva ca svam / yasmāddhetorādhipatyaṃ phale phalena ca tadvān heturiti / yo hyeva hetuḥ smṛtestasyaivāsau / yaścāpi sa caitrābhidhānaḥ saṃskārasamūhasaṃtāna ekato gṛhītvā gavākhyasvāmītyucyate sa cāpi tasya deśāntaravikārotpattau kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasi kṛtvā na tu khalu kaścidekaścaitro nāmāsti na cāpi gauḥ / tasmāttatrāpi na hetubhāvaṃ vyatītyāsti svāmihbāvaḥ / evaṃ ko vijānāti kasya vijñānamityevamādiṣu vaktavyam
# dran pa la 'gro ba mi rung bas bskyed pa'i sgo nas so / / de lta na ni rgyu kho na la rje bo yin la 'bras bu kho na bran yin par 'gyur te / / 'di ltar rgyu ni 'bras bu la dbang byed la 'bras bu yang de dang ldan na rgyu yin pas de ni dran pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na yin no / / gang yang nag pa zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi tshogs kyi rgyun la gcig tu bzung nas ba zhes bya ba'i rje bo brjod pa de yang de yul gzhan du dang 'gyur ba 'byung ba la rgyu'i dngos po yid la bsams nas rje bo zhes brjod par zad kyi nag pa zhes bya ba gcig pu ni 'ga' yang med la ba zhes bya ba yang med do / / de lta bas na de la yang rgyu'i dngos po ma gtogs pa'i rje bo'i dngos po med do / / de bzhin du su zhig gis rnam par shes / / su'i rnam par shes pa yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yang brjod par bya ste /
tasya heturindriyārthamanaskārā yathāyogamityeṣa viśeṣaḥ
# de'i rgyu ni ci rigs par dbang po dang don dang yid la byed pa dag yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par yin no /
yo 'pyāha bhāvasya bhavitrapekṣatvāt sarvo hi bhāvo bhavitāramapekṣate
# gang yang bya ba ni byed pa bo la ltos pa'i phyir te / / bya ba thams cad ni byed pa po la ltos te /
yathā devadatto gacchatītyatra gatirbhāvo gantāraṃ devadattamapekṣate
# ji ltar lha sbyin 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'di la 'gro bar bya ba ni 'gro ba po lhas byin la ltos pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni bya ba yin no /
tathā vijñānaṃ bhāvaḥ / tasmādyo vijānāti tena bhavitavyamiti
# de lta bas na gang zhig gis rnam par shes pa de yang brjod dgos so zhes zer ba de la lhas byin zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhes brjod par bya'o /
sa vaktavyaḥ / ko 'yaṃ devadatta iti
# gal te bdag yin no zhe na / / de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no /
yadyātmā sa eva sādhyaḥ / atha vyavahārapuruṣaḥ
# 'on te skyes bur tha snyad gdags pa yin no zhe na /
so 'pi na kaścidekaḥ saṃskārā hi ta evaṃnāmānaḥ / tatra yathā devadatto gacchati yathā vijānāti / kathaṃ ca devadatto gacchati / kṣaṇikā hisaṃskārā abhinnasaṃtānā devadatta iti bālairekasattvapiṇḍagraheṇādhimuktāḥ svasya saṃtānasya deśāntare kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante gacchati devadatta iti / sā ca deśāntaropattirgatirita / jvālāśabdasaṃtānayorgacchatigamanābhidhānavat / ta eva ca punarvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante jānāti devadatta iti
# de yang gcig pu ni 'ga' yang med kyi 'du byed de dag la yang ming de skad ces bya'o / / de la ji ltar lhas byin 'gro pa de bzhin du rnam par shes so / / lha sbyin ji ltar 'gro zhe na / / 'du byed skad cig pa rgyun tha mi dad pa rnams la byis pa rnams kyis gcig pa nyid du bzung nas lhas byin zhes mos pa rnams rang gi rgyun yul gzhan du 'byung ba la rgyur gyur na lhas byin 'gro'o zhes bya'o / / yul gzhan du 'byung ba de ni 'gro ba yin te / / me dang sgra'i rgyun dag la 'gro'o zhes brjod pa yin no / / de dag nyid rnam par shes pa'i rgyur gyur na lhas byin gyis rnam par shes so zhes kyang bya'o /
āryairapi teṣāṃ saṃjñayā tathocyante vyavahārārtham / yattarhi vijñānaṃ vijānātīti sūtra uktaṃ kiṃ tatra vijñānaṃ karoti / na kiñcitkaroti
# 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang tha snyad gdags pa'i don du de dag la ming du de skad ces gsungs so / / 'o na gang mdo las rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes gsungs pa de la rnam par shes pa ci zhig byed /
yathā tu kāryaṃ kāraṇamanuvidhīyata ityucyate / sādṛśyenātmalābhādakurvadapi kiñcit / evaṃ vijñānamapi vijānātītyucyate / sādṛśyenātmalābhādakurvadapi kiñcit
# cung zad kyang mi byed de / / ji ltar 'bras bu ni cung zad kyang mi byed mod kyi 'dra bar bdag nyid thob pa'i phyir rgyu dang mthun par byed do zhes bya ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang cung zad kyang mi byed mod kyi 'dra bar bdag nyid thob pa'i phyir yul rnam par shes so zhes bya'o / / 'di'i 'dra ba ci zhe na /
kiṃ punarasya sādṛśyam / tadākāratā / ata eva tadindriyādapyutpannaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate nendriyam / athavā tathā 'trāpi vijñānasaṃtānasya vijñāne kāraṇabhāvādvijñānaṃ vijānātīti vacanānnirdoṣaṃ kāraṇe dartṛśabdanirdeśāt
# de'i rnam pa nyid do / / de nyid kyi phyir de ni dbang po las kyang skyes mod kyi yul rnam par shes so zhes bya ba'i dbang po ni ma yin no / / yang na ni der yang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun rnam par shes ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes gsungs pas nyes pa med de /
ghaṇṭā rautīti yadvat / api khalu yathā pradīpo gacchati tathā vijñānaṃ vijānātīti / kathaṃ ca pradīpo gacchati
# rgyu la byed pa po'i sgrar bstan pa'i phyir dril bu sgrogs so zhes bya ba bzhin no / / gzhan yang ji ltar sgron ma 'gro ba ltar rnam par shes pas rnam par shes so zhes bya ba yang de dang 'dra'o / / sgron ma ji ltar 'gro zhe na /
pradīpa ityarciṣāṃ saṃtāna upacaryate
# sgron ma zhes bya ba ni me lce rnams kyi rgyun la nye bar 'dogs par byed la /
sa deśāntareṣūtpadyamānastaṃ deśaṃ gacchatītyucyate
# de yul gzhan dag tu 'byung ba las yul de dang der 'gro'o zhes bya'o /
evaṃ vijñānamapi cittānāṃ saṃtāna upacaryate / tadviṣayāntareṣūtpadyamānaṃ taṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate
# de bzhin du rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni sems rnams kyi rgyun la nye bar 'dogs par byed la de yul gzhan dag la skye ba la yul de dang de rnam par shes so zhes bya'o /
yathā cābhijāyate tiṣṭhati rūpamityatra bhaviturbhāvādanarthantaratvamevaṃ vijñānasyāpi syāt / yadi vijñānādvijñānamutpadyate nātmānaḥ kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatradivat
# yang na ji ltar gzugs 'gyur ro / / skye'o gnas so zhes bya ba 'di la 'gyur ba po dang 'gyur ba don gzhan ma yin pa ltar rnam par shes pa la de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro / / gal te rnam par shes pa las rnam par shes pa skye'i bdag las ma yin na ci'i phyir rtag tu de dag 'dra ba kho nar skye bar mi 'gyur zhing myu gu dang sdong po dang 'dab ma la sogs pa bzhin du rim pa nges par skye bar mi 'gyur zhe na /
sthityanyathātvasya saṃskṛtlakṣaṇatvāt / eṣa hi saṃskṛtasya svabhāvo yadavaśyaṃ prabandhasyānyathātvaṃ bhavati / anyathā hi nikāmadhyānasamāhitānāṃ sadṛśakāyacittotpattau prathamakṣaṇaniṃrviśeṣatvāt paścādapi na syāt svayaṃ vyutthānam
# gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te / / rgyun gdon mi za bar gzhan du 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin no / / de lta ma yin na bsam gtan rdzogs pas mnyam par gzhag pa rnams las lus dang sems 'dra ba skye na skad cig ma dang po dang khyad par med pa'i phyir phyis kyang bdag nyid ldang bar mi 'gyur ro /
kramo 'pi hi cittānāṃ niyata eva / yato nūtpattavyaṃ tata eva tasyotpādāt / tulyākāramapi hi kiñcidutpādane samarthaṃ bhavati / gotraviśeṣāt
# gang las gang zhig skye bar 'gyur ba de kho na las de skye ba'i phyir sems can rnams kyi rim pa yang nges pa kho na ste / / rigs kyi bye brag las sems rnam pa 'dra yang 'ga' zhig sems 'ga' bskyed pa la nus pa yin te / / dper na bud med kyi mjug thogs su gsal te de'i lus sun 'byin pa'i sems sam /
yadyathā strīcittānantaraṃ yadi tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittamutpannaṃ bhavati tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā punaśca paścātsaṃtatipariṇatyā strīcittamutpadyate tat samartha bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatpatiputrādicittotpādane vā / tadgotratvāt / anyathā na samartham
# de'i khyo'am bu la sogs pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur la / / yang phyis rgyud yongs su 'gyur pas bud med kyi sems skye na de ni / / de'i lus sun 'byin pa'i sems bskyed pa'am / / de'i khyo 'am / / bu la sogs pa'i sems bskyed par nus pa yin te / / de'i rigs can yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro / / gzhan du ni mi nus so /
atha punaḥ paryāyeṇa strīcittādvahuvidhaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vahutara māsannataraṃ vā tadevotpadyate
# yang bud med kyi sems las rnam grangs kyi sems rnam pa mang po zhig skyes par gyur na de las ches mang ba dang ches gsal ba dang ches nye bar skyes pa gang yin pa de kho na skye bar 'gyur te /
tadbhāvanāyā valīyastvāt / anyatra tatkālikātkāyabāhyapratyayaviśeṣāt
# de'i bsgos pa stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro / / de'i 'dus pa'i lus dang phyi rol gyi rkyen gyi khyad par ni ma gtogs so /
saiva balīyasī bhāvanā kasmānnityaṃ na phalati
# bsgos pa de nyid ches stobs dang ldan na ci'i phyir rtag tu 'bras bu mi 'byin zhe na /
sthityanyathātvasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvāt tasya cānyathātvasyānyabhāvanāphalotpattāvānuguṇyāt / etaddhi sarvacittaprakāreṣu diṅmātram / nirantarakāraṇajñāne tu buddhānāṃ prabhutvam
# gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur pa nyid ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir la / / gzhan du 'gyur ba de yang bsgos pa gzhan gyi 'bras bu skye ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro / / 'di ni sems kyi rnam pa thams cad la phyogs tsam du zad kyi mjug thogs kyi rgyu shes pa la ni sangs rgyas rnams mnga' bdag yin te /
evaṃ hyāhuḥ / sarvākārakāraṇamekasya mayūracandrakasyāpi / nāsarvajñairjñeyaṃ sarvajñabalaṃ hi tajjñānamiti
# 'di skad du rma bya'i mdongs ni gcig la yang / / rgyu yi rnam pa thams cad ni / / kun mkhyen min pas shes bya min / / de shes kun mkhyen stobs yin no / / zhes bshad na /
prāgevārupiṇāṃ cittabhedānām / ya eva tvayamekīyastīrthika ātmaprabhavāṃ cittotpattiṃ manyate tasyaivedaṃ sphuṭaṃ codyamāpadyate kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatrādivaditi / manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣāpekṣatvāditi cet
# gzugs can ma yin pa sems kyi bye brag rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos / / ci'i phyir de dang 'dra ba kho nar skye bar mi 'gyur zhing myu gu dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma la sogs pa bzhin du rim pa nges par skye bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni mu stegs can gang la la sems ni bdag las skye'o snyam du sems pa de kho na la gsal bar klan kar 'gyur ro / / gal te yid dang phrad pa'i bye brag la ltos pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
na / anyasaṃyogāsiddheḥ
# 'brel pa gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro /
saṃyoginostu paricchinnatvādaprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ samyoga iti lakṣaṇavyākhyānāccātmānaḥ paricchedaprasaṅgaḥ
# 'brel pa can dag yongs su chang pa'i phyir dang phrad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma phrad pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi phrad pa yin no zhes rnam par bshad pa'i phyir bdag yongs su chad par thal bar 'gyur ro; /
tato manaḥsamcārādātmanaḥ saṃcāraprasaṅgo virāgasya vā
# de'i phyir yid 'phros pa la bdag 'pho ba'am / / nyams par thal bar 'gyur ro /
pradeśasaṃyoga iti cet
# gal te phyogs gcig phrad do zhe na /
na / tasyaiva tatpradeśatvāyogāt / astu vā saṃyogastathāpi nityamaviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ / buddhiviśeṣāpekṣa iti cet / sa eva paricodyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti / saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣādātmamanaḥ saṃyogāditi cet
# ma yin te / / phyogs de de nyid kyi yin pa nyid du mi rung ba'i phyir ro / / phrad pa yod du chug na yang 'on kyang yid rtag tu khyad par med pa la ji ltar phrad pa khyad par du 'gyur / / gal te blo'i khyad par la ltos pa yin no zhe na / / ji ltar blo'i khyad par yin zhes de nyid la klan ka tshol bar byed do / / gal te 'du byed kyi khyad par la ltos pa'i bdag dang yid phrad pa las so zhe na /
cittādevāstu saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣatvāt / nahi kiñcidātmanaḥ upalabhyate sāmarthmauṣadha kāryasiddhāviva kuhakavaidyaphuḥsvāhānām
# 'du byed kyi khyad par la ltos pa'i sems kho na las yin par zad kyi bdag gis nus pa ni cung zad kyang mi dmigs te / / sman gyi 'bras bu grub pa la sman pa ngan g yo can gyis phu sv'a h'a zhes smras pa dag bzhin no /
satyātmani tayoḥ saṃyoga iti cet
# gal te bdag yod na de gnyis srid do zhe na ni /
vāṅmātram / āśrayaḥ sa iti cet
# tshig tsam du zad do / / gal te de ni rten yin no zhe na /
yathā kaḥ kasyāśrayaḥ / na hi te citravadarādivadādhārye nāpi sa kuḍacyakuṇḍādivadādhāro yuktaḥ
# dper na gang gi rten gang yin pa lta bu de dag kyang ri mo dang rgya shug la sogs pa ltar brten pa ma yin la / / de yang rtsig pa dang gzhong bu la sogs pa ltar rten du rigs pa ma yin te /
pratighātiyutadoṣāt naiva sa evamāśrayaḥ
# thogs pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyis nyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
kathaṃ tarhi / yathā gandhādīnāṃ pṛthivīti cet / atiparitoṣitāḥ smaḥ / idameva hi naḥ pratyāyakaṃ nāstyātmeti / yathā na gandhādibhyo 'nyā pṛthivīti
# gal te de ni de lta bur rten ma yin no / / 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / dper na dri la sogs pa'i sa lta bu'o zhe na / / 'di nyid kho bo'i bdag med do zhes bya ba yid ches par byed pa yin pas kho bo yongs su tshim par byas te / / dper na dri la sogs pa las sa gzhan ma yin pa bzhin no /
ko hi sa gandhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirdhārayati
# dri la sogs pa las sa gzhan yin par nges par 'dzin par byed pa de su zhig yin /
vyapadeśastu pṛthivyā gandhādaya iti viśeṣaṇārtham / te hyeva tadākhyā gandhādayo yathā pratīyerannānya iti
# sa'i dri la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i tha snyad ni ci nas dri la sogs pa de dag nyid de zhes bya'i / / gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ba khyad par du bya ba'i phyir te /
kāṣṭhapratimāyāṃ śarīravyapadeśavat / satyapi ca saṃskāraviśeṣāpekṣatve kasmānna yugapatsarvajñānotpattiḥ
# shing gi gzugs kyi lus zhes bya ba bzhin no / / 'du byed kyi khyad par la ltos pa yin du zin kyang ci'i phyir shes pa thams cad dus gcig tu skye bar mi 'gyur /
yo hi baliṣṭhastenānyeṣāṃ prativandhaḥ / sa eva valiṣṭhaḥ kasmānnityaṃ na phalati
# gang zhig stobs che ba des gzhan dag la gegs byed do / / stobs che ba de nyid ci'i phyir rtag par 'bras bu mi 'byin te /
yo 'sya nyāyaḥ so 'stu bhāvanāyāḥ / ātmā tu nirarthakaḥ kalpyate / avaśyamātmābhyupagantavyaḥ / smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāt tasya cārthādavaśyaṃ dravyāśritatvāt teṣāṃ cānyāśrayāyogāditi cet
# 'di'i tshul gang yin pa de bsgos pa yin na bdag tu rtog pa ni don med pa yin no / / gal te bdag ni gdon mi za bar khas blang bar bya ste / / dran pa la sogs pa ni yon tan gyi dngos po yin pa'i phyir la de yang gdon mi za bar rdzas la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro / / de dag gi rten gzhan yin par yang mi rung pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
na / na hyeṣāṃ guṇapadārthatvaṃ siddham / sarvameva no vidyamānaṃ dravya
# ma yin te / / ma grub pa'i phyir ro / / 'di dag ni yon tan gyi dngos po nyid yin par ma grub bo / / kho bo cag gi ltar na yod pa thams cad ni rdzas yin te /
ṣaṭ dravyāṇi śrāmaṇyaphalānīti vacanāt / nāpyeṣāṃ dravyāśritatvaṃ siddham
# dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu ni rdzas drug go zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro / / de dag rdzas la brten pa nyid du yang ma grub ste /
parīkṣito hyāśrayārthaḥ / tasmādyatkiñcideva tat
# rten gyi don ni brtags zin to / / de lta bas na 'di ni gyi na'o /
ātmanyasati kimarthaḥ karmārambhaḥ / ahaṃ sukhī syāmahaṃ duḥkhī na syāmityevamarthaḥ
# bdag med na ci'i phyir las rtsom / / bdag bde bar gyur cig / / bdag sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba de'i phyir ro /
ko 'sāvahaṃ nāma yadviṣayio 'yamahaṅkāraḥ / skandhaviṣayaḥ / kathaṃ jñāyate / teṣu snehāt / gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāttu / gauro 'hamahaṃ śyāmaḥ sthūlo 'hamahaṃ kṛśaḥ jīrṇo 'hamahaṃ yuveti gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇo 'yamahaṅkāro dṛśyate / na cātmana ete prakārā dṛśyante
# yang bdag ces bya ba yang gang zhig yin / / bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di'i yul gang yin pa'o / / bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di'i yul gang zhig yin / / yul ni phung po yin no / / ji ltar shes / / de dag la chags pa'i phyir dang dkar sham la sogs pa'i blos gzhi mthun par byed pa'i phyir te / / bdag dkar sham mo / / bdag sngo bsangs so / / bdag sbom mo / / bdag skem mo / / bdag rgas so / / bdag dar la bab po zhes dkar sham la sogs pa'i blos bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di gzhi mthun par byed par snang ngo / / rnam pa de dag bdag gi yin par ni mi 'dod de /
tasmādapi skandheṣvayamiti gamyate / ātmana upakārake 'pi śarīra ātmopacāro yathā ya evāyaṃ sa evāhaṃ sa evāyaṃ me bṛtya iti bhavatyupakārake 'pi ātmopacāro natvahaṅkāraḥ / sati śarīrālambanatve paraśarīrālamvano 'pi kasmānna bhavati
# de lta bas na 'di ni phung po rnams la 'dzin par shes so / / bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i lus la yang bdag nye bar 'dogs te / / dper na bdag gang yin pa de nyid bdag gi bran 'di yin no zhes bya ba bzhin no phan 'dogs pa la bdag nye bar 'dogs pa yin yang bdag tu 'dzin pa ni ma yin no / / lus la dmigs pa yin na ci'i phyir pha rol gyi lus la dmigs pa yang ma yin /
asaṃvandhāt / yenaiva hi sahāsya saṃvandhaḥ kāyena cittena vā yatraivāyamahaṅkāra utpadyate nānvatra
# 'brel ba med pa'i phyir te / / 'di ni lus sam sems gang dang lhan cig 'brel pa de kho na la bdag tu 'dzin pa 'di 'byung gi gzhan la ni ma yin te /
anādau saṃsārra evamabhyāsāt / kaśca saṃbandhaḥ
# 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas de ltar goms pa'i phyir ro / / 'brel pa yang gang zhig yin /
kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ / yadyātmā nāsti kasyāyamahaṅkāraḥ / idaṃ punastadeāyātaṃ kimarthaiṣā ṣaṣṭhīti / yāvadya evāsya hetustasyaivāyamiti
# rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i 'bras bu yin no / / gal te bdag med pa na bdag tu 'dzin pa ni su'i yin / / 'di ni drug pa 'di'i don ji lta bu yin zhes bya ba nas de ni dran pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de kho na yin no zhes bya ba'i bar de nyid 'ongs pa yin no /
kaścānyo hetuḥ / pūrvāhaṅkāraparibhāvitaṃ svasaṃtativiṣayaṃ sāvadyaṃ cittam
# 'di'i rgyu gang zhig yin zhe na / / sngon bdag tu 'dzin pas yongs su bsgos pa rang gi rgyud kyi yul can ma rig pa dang bcas pa'i sems yin no /
asatyātmani ka eṣa sukhito duḥkhito vā / yasminnāśraye sukhamutpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā
# bdag med na bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba su zhig yin / / rten gang bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'byung ba ste / / dper na shing ljon ba me tog chags so /
yathā puṣpito vṛkṣaḥ phalitaṃ vanamiti
# nags tshal 'bras bu chags so zhes bya ba lta bu'o /
kaḥ punaranayorāśrayaḥ
# 'di gnyis kyi rten gang zhe na /
ṣaḍāyatanam
# skye mched drug yin te /
yathā kṛtvā tathoktam
# ji ltar yin pa de ltar ni bshad zin to /
asatyātmani ka eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā kaśca phalānāṃ bhoktā bhavati
# bdag med na las rnams kyi byed pa po ni gang yin / / 'bras bu rnams kyi zab po gang yin /
karteti ka eṣa vāhyarthaḥ
# byed pa po zhes bya ba'am /
karotīti kartā / bhuṅkta iti bhoktā / paryāya ucyate nārthaḥ / svatantraḥ karteti kartṛ lakṣaṇamācakṣate lākṣaṇikāḥ
# za ba bo zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ji lta bu byed pas na byed pa po yin la / / za bas na zab po yin no / / rnam grangs smras su zin gyi don ni ma yin no / / mtshan nyid rnams ni byed pa po'i mtshan nyid rang dbang can ni byed pa po yin no zhes zer na /
asti punaḥ kvacideva kārye kasyacit svātantryam
# 'jig rten na 'bras bu 'ga' la yang la la zhig rang dbang yod pa lta bu mthong ngam /
loke dṛṣṭaṃ devadattasya snānāsanagamanādau
# mthong ste khrus dang zab dang 'gro ba la sogs pa la lhas byin lta bu'o /
kaḥ punarbhavān devadattamudāharati
# khyod lhas byin gang zhig dper brjod /
yadyātmānaṃ sa eva sādhyaḥ / atha pañcaskandhakaṃ sa ev kartā / trividhaṃ cedaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanaskarma / tatra kāyakarmaṇi tāvat kāyasya cittaparatantrā vṛttiḥ / cittasyāpi kāye svakāraṇaparatantrā vṛttistasyāpyevamiti nāsti kasyacit svātantryam
# gal te bdag yin no zhe na ni de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no / / 'on te phung po lnga yin no zhe na ni de nyid byed pa po yin te / / las 'di ni rnam pa gsum ste / / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las so / / de la re zhig lus dang ngag gi las la sems kyi gzhan gyi dbang gis 'jug go / / sems kyang lus dang ngag la rang gi rgyu'i gzhan gyi dbang gis 'jug go / / de yang de dang 'dra bas gang la yang rang dbang med de /
pratyayaparatantrā hi sarve bhāvāḥ pravartante / ātmano 'pi ca nirapekṣasyākāraṇatvābhyupagamātra svātantryaṃ sidhyati
# dngos po thams cad ni rkyen gyi gzhan gyi dbang gis 'jug go / / bdag kyang ltos pa med par rgyu nyid du khas mi len pa'i phyir ro / / rang dbang can du mi 'grub bo /
tasmānnaivaṃlakṣaṇam upalabhyate kaścitkartā / yattu yasya pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tattsya kartetyucyate / na ca ātmanaḥ kvacidapi kāraṇatvaṃ dṛśyate / tasmātsa evamapi na kartā yujyate / smṛtijo hi cchandaḥ cchandajo vitarko vitarkātprayatnaḥ prayatnādvāyustataḥ karmeti kimatrātmā kurute / phalasyāpica ka upabhogo yamayamātmā kurvannupabhoktā kalpyate
# de lta bas na de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi byed pa po ni 'ga' yang mi dmigs so / / gang zhig gang gi rgyu'i gtso bo yin ba de ni de'i byed pa po zhes bya na bdag ni gang la yang rgyu yin par mi snang ste / / de lta bas na de ni de lta bur yang byed pa por mi rung ngo / / dran pa las ni 'dun pa skye'o / / 'dun pa las ni rtog pa skye'o / / rnam par rtog pa las ni rab tu 'bad pa'o / / rab tu 'bad pa las ni rlung ngo / / de las ni las 'byung na 'di la bdag ci zhig byed / / 'bras bu la yang gang la bdag med na za ba bor brtags pa'i nye bar spyod pa de gang zhig yin /
upalabhiriti cet
# gal te dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
nātmanaḥ upalabdhau sāmarthyaṃ vijñāne pratipedhāt
# dmigs pa la bdag gi nus pa med de / / rnam par shes pa la nus pa bkag pa'i phyir ro /
asatyātmani kasmādasattvādhiṣṭhānaḥ pāpapuṇyopacayo na bhavati / vedanādyanāśrayatvāt tadāśrayaśca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nātmā yathā tathoktam
# bdag med na ci'i phyir sems can gyi rten ma yin pa la yang sdig pa dang bsod nams nye bar stsogs par mi 'gyur / / tshor ba'i rten ma yin pa'i phyir te / / de'i rten ni skye mched drug yin gyi bdag ma yin no / / ji ltar yin pa de ltar ni bshad zin to /
kathamasatyātmani venaṣṭātkarmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ / ātmanyapi sati kathaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ
# bdag med na ji ltar na las zhig zin pa las tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu 'byung / / bdag yod na yang ji ltar na las zhi zhig zin pa las tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu 'byung /
tadāśritāddharmādharmāt / yathā kaḥkimāśrita ityuktottaraiṣā vāco yuktiḥ
# de la brten pa'i chos dang chos ma yin pa las 'byung ngo / / tshig gi lugs 'di ni dper na gang gi rten gang yin pa lta bu zhes lan btab zin to /
tasmādanāśritādeva dharmādharmāt bhavatu / naiva tu vayaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiṃ brūmaḥ
# de lta bas na chos dang chos ma yin pa rten med pa kho na las 'byung ngo / / kho bo cag kyang las zhig zin ba la tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu 'byung bar mi smra'o /
kiṃ tarhi / tatsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣādvījaphalavat / yathā vījātphalamutpadyata ityucyate
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / de'i rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las te / / sa bon dang 'bras bu bzhin no /
na ca tadvinaṣṭādvījādutpadyate / nāpyanantarameva / kiṃ tarhi / tatsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādikramaniṣpannāt puṣpāvasānāt / tat punaḥ puṣpānniṣpannaṃ kasmāttasya vījasya phalamityucyate
# dper na sa bon las 'bras bu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni zhig pa las 'byung ba yang ma yin la mjug thogs kho nar 'byung ba yang ma yin no / / 'o na ci zhe na / / rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las te / / myu gu dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma la sogs pa me tog la thug pa rim pa rdzogs pa las 'byung ba bzhin no / / de ni me tog las grub pa yin na ci'i phyir sa bon de'i 'bras bu zhes bya zhe na /
tadāhitaṃ hi tat parayāpuṣpe sāmarthyam / yadi hi tatpūrvikānnabhaviṣyat tattādṛśasya phalasyotopattau na samarthamabhaviṣyat / evaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalamutpadyata ityucyate / na ca tadviniṣṭātkarmaṇa utpadyate nāpyanantarameva
# des brgyud pas me tog la de'i nus pa bskyed pas so / / gal te sa bon de sngon du 'gro bar ma gyur na 'bras bu de 'dra ba skyed pa la de'i nus pa yod par mi 'gyur ro / / de bzhin du las las 'bras bu 'byung ngo / / zhes bya ba de yang las zhig pa las kyang mi 'byung la / / mjug thogs su yang ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi / tatsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣāt / kā punaḥ saṃtatiḥ kaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ko viśeṣaḥ
# 'o na ji lta bu zhe na / / rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las so / / rgyud ni ci yin / / yongs su 'gyur ba ni ci yin / / khyad par ni ci yin zhe na /
yaḥ karmapūrva uttarottaracittapravasaḥ sā saṃtatistasyā anyathotpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ
# las sngon du 'gro ba'i sems phyir zhing 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni rgyud yin no / / de gzhan dang gzhan du skye ba ni yongs su 'gyur ba yin no /
sa punartho 'ntaraṃ phalotpādanasamarthaḥ so 'ntapariṇāmaviśiṣṭatvāt pariṇamaviśeṣaḥ
# de'i mjug thogs su 'bras bu skyed nus pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su 'gyur ba gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par yin te /
tadyāthā sopādānaṃ maraṇacittaṃ punarbhavasya / trividhakarmapūrvakatve 'pi yatkarma guru vā bhavatyāsannamabhyastaṃ vā yatkṛtaṃ sāmarthyaṃ dyotyate natvanyasya
# dper na yang srid pa'i nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'chi ba'i sems lta bu'o / / las rnam pa sna tshogs pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid yin yang las gang lci ba'am / / nye ba 'am / / goms pa yin pa des byas pa'i nus pa bsal bar byed kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
āha ca / yat guru yaccāsannaṃ yaccābhyastaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat
# ji skad du / / las kyi 'khor ba lci gang dang nye ba gang dang goms pa gang / / sngon byas gang yin de las ni /
pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ vīpacyate karmasaṃsāre / tatra vipākahetvāhitaṃ tu vipākaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ vipākaṃ dattvā vinivartate
# snga ma snga ma rnam smin 'gyur / / zhes bshad pa lta bu'o / / de la rnam par smin pa'i rgyus bskyed pa rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa ni rnam par smin pa bskyed nas ldog go /
sabhāgahetvāhitaṃ tu niṣyandaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ kliṣṭānāṃ pratipakṣodayādvinivartate
# skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyus bskyed pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa ni nyon mongs pa can rnams kyi ni gnyen po skyes nas ldog go /
akliṣṭānāṃ cittasaṃtānātyantavinivṛtteryadā parinirvāti / atha kasmādvipākādvipākāntaraṃ notpadyate vījaphalādiva phalāntaram
# nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa rnams kyi ni sems kyi rgyun gtan du log pa ste / / gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na'o / / yang ci'i phyir sa bon gyi 'bras bu bzhin du rnam par smin pa gzhan mi skye na /
na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvaṃ samānaṃ bhavati / tatrāpi tu na phalādeva punaḥ phalāntaramutpadyate
# re zhig thams cad dpe dang 'dra ba ni ma yin no / / de la yang 'bras bu kho na las 'bras bu gzhan skye ba ma yin no /
kiṃ tarhi
# 'o na ci zhe na /
viklittiviśeṣajādvikāraviśeṣāt / yo hi tatra bhūtaprakārāṅkuraṃ nirvartayati sa tasya vījaṃ nānyaḥ
# rnam par 'drul ba'i khyad par las skyes pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i khyad par las skye ste / / de la 'byung ba'i rnam pa myu gu 'grub par byed pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni de'i sa bon yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no /
bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate
# 'gyur ba'i ming gis sam / / 'dra ba'i phyir rgyun snga ma yang sa bon zhes bya'o /
evamihāpi tasmādvipākādyadi sadasaddharmaśravaṇā dipratyayaviśeṣajaḥ kuśalasāsravo 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate tasmātpunarvikārāntaramutpadyate nānyatheti samānametat / athavā punaretadevaṃ vijñātavyam / yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt na punarvipākāntaramiti
# de bzhin du 'di la yang rnam par smin pa de las gal te dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos nyan ba la sogs pa'i rkyen las skyes pa dge ba zag ba dang bcas pa 'am / / mi dge ba'i sems kyi 'gyur ba skye na de las ni rnam par smin pa gzhan skye'i gzhan du ni ma yin pas 'di ni mtshungs so / / yang na de ni 'di ltar shes par bya ste / / ji star ma du lung ga'i me tog rgya skyegs kyi khu bas kha dog bsgyur ba las 'bras bu'i nang du rgyud yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par las skyes pa ge sar dmar po skye bar 'gyur zhing de las ni gzhan mi skye ba de bzhin du las las skyes pa'i rnam par smin pa las yang rnam par smin pa gzhan mi skye'o /
yathāsthūlamidamasmadbuddhigamyaṃ darśitam
# che long tsam 'di ni bdag gi blos rtogs par bya ba rab tu bstan pa yin te /
nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ / āha khalvapi
# mthu rnam pa sna tshogs pas tha dad pa'i las rnams kyis bsgos pa'i rgyu rnams gnas skabs 'dir phyir na 'bras bu 'di lta bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kho na'i yul yin no / / yang smras pa /
karma tadbhāvanāṃ tasyā vṛttilābhaṃ tataḥ phalam
# las dang de'i bsgos de'i 'jug rnyed / / de las 'bras bu sangs rgyas las /
niyamena prajānāti buddhādanyio na sarvathā
# gzhan gyi rnam pa thams cad ni / / nges par rab tu mi shes so /
ityetāṃ suvihitahetumārgaśuddhāṃ
# de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung rab rigs pa'i lam /
buddhānāṃ pravacanadharmatāṃ niśamya
# legs par gsungs pa'i dag pa chos nyid 'di mthong nas /
andhānāṃ vividhakudṛṣṭiceṣṭitānāṃ
# mu stegs long ba ltas ngan sna tshogs g yo rnams kyi /
tīrthyānāṃ matamapavidhya yāntyanandhāḥ
# gzhung lugs spangs te long ba ma yin rnams 'gro'o /
imaṃ hi nirvāṇapuraikavartinīṃ
# de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i gsung 'od kyis /
tathāgatādityavacoṃ 'śubhāsvatīm / nirātmatāmāryasahasravāhitāṃ / na mandacakṣurvivṛtāmapīkṣate
# snang ldan mya ngan 'das grong lam gcig pa / / bdag med 'phags pa stong gis bgrod pa 'di / / phye yang dman pa'i mig gis mi mthong ngo /
iti diṅmātramevedamupadiṣṭaṃ sumedhasām
# de ltar 'di ni phyogs tsam zhig / / rang gi mthu yis rnam 'phel ba'i /
braṇadeśoviṣasyeva svasāmarthyavisarpaṇa iti
# dug la rma yi phyogs bzhin du / / shin tu mkhas pa rnams la bstan /
pudgalakośamabhidharmakośabhāṣyaṃ samāptamiti / 
# chos mngon pa'i mdzod las gang zag dgag pa bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas dgu pa ste /
kṛtiriyamācāryavasubandhupādānāmiti
# chos mngon ba'i mdzod kyi bshad ba slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so /
